column2: Abraham sapa David sapa Jesu Khrista ahungshuwna puhpee lerii
Abraham ing Issak aberhing, Issak ing Jakob aberhing engkhejege Jakob ing Judas le auanehe aberhing,
Judas le Tamar ing Perez le Zora emberhing, Perez ing Hezron aberhing engkhejege Hezron ing Aram aberhing,
Aram ing Aminadab aberhing, Aminadab ing Nason aberhing engkhejege Nason ing Salmon aberhing,
Salmon le Rahab ing Boaz emberhing, Boaz le Ruth ing Obed aberhing engkhejege Obed ing Jesse aberhing.
Jesse ing iruwng David aberhing, David iruwng ing mensa ing Uriah lumhi enshuw besachuw alumhi besuwge Solomon aberhing.
Solomon ing Rehaboam aberhing, Rehoboam ing Abijah aberhing engkhejege Abijah ing Asa aberhing.
Asa ing Jehoshaphat aberhing. Jehoshaphat ing Joram aberhing engkhejege Joram ing Uzziah aberhing,
Uzziah ing Jotham aberhing, Jotham ing Ahaz aberhing engkhejege Ahaz ing Hezekiah aberhing.
Hezekiah ing Manasseh aberhing, Manasseh ing Amos aberhing engkhejege Amos ing Josiah aberhing.
Amaching Babilon paamte Israel sitihechuw mine ing enrhie apha rove leching Josiah ing Jekonia engkhejege auanehe aberhing.
Babilonte enghinrhie aanhuwna Jekonia ing Shealtiel aberhing engkhejege Shealtiel ing Zerubbabel aberhing,
Jerubbabel ing Abiud aberhing, Abiud ing Eliakim aberhing engkhejege Eliakim ing Azor aberhing.
Azor ing Zadok aberhing, Zadok ing Achim aberhing engkhejege Achim ign Eliud aberhing.
Eliud ing Eleazar aberhing, Eleazaring Matthan aberhing engkhejege Matthan ing Jakob aberhing.
Jakob ing Khrista ate Jesu aanrhing Mary puwsar Joseph chuw aberhing.

Hanghing ichiin Abraham na betthiimge David phana chuw meesien sum malhii minlii chona David ing Babilon te enghinrhie epha in meesien sum malhii minlii, engkhejege Babilon te enghinrhiena joliege Jesu Khrista phanahing meesien summalhie minlii ne.
Ate Jesu Khrista aberhing chuw hanghin ichiin iheshuw, amanuw Mary chuw Joseph ing Zuw tiige changgechuw empaarhama lhiile Enthiing Chipita ne areenpe.
Changechuw apusar Joseph hie dharmo echermi aansuwtana Mary chuw mi mhekungna ningjaa apinamaa ing derenging bethin gete tege amindeen.

Changgechuw amaing changchin amindeen le, ibiirruw, Thangnhang meechier ingkhe ing aromhang ingkhena anhingna theng ge amana arhier, Joseph, “David sapa,” nang nalumhe mary kha ne areenpe tein ebii ittemaa, awin na enthin nepang kha Enthiing Chipi taga.
Ama ing sapa ingkhe berhing vate, engkhejege nang ing ama aromhing chuw Jesu Khrista tevang niete, ajiena ate inche ama ing amihe chuw isii tena karpi vate.
Thangnhang ing Larchang Pa dee aminrhier besa attongdeen chuw abesuwna rotum chove chuw isuwga, hevebekhehie Thangpa ing Thiimdee aminrhierkha abesuwga amachuwbe,

“Ibierruw, Ibuwrmalhii lunghaa ingkhe ing ne reen niege sapa ingkhe berhing vate, engkhejege aromhing chuw Emmanual, ateche aeniethoh eeonghaa Thangnhang, tevate. Aanhuwna Joseph ijaartena hangthiege Thangnhang michier ing anhingna abetthoh bekhe chuw ama ing atupe, engkhejege alumhi chuw abiipe.”
Hanghing Joseph ing ajaartaatena hangthiege Thangven michiering arhier inhuw ijiing alumhe chuw abiipe.
Changgechuw mary ing asapa amhuwr aberhing maa taang engkhejege aromhing Jesu tege aphuwmaa taang Joseph ing mary chuw shaangram tuhaamaa.
Herod Eruwng apaarle Judia paam Bethlehem na Jesu aberhing aanhuwna, ibeerruw, Tehang tena Mahe ehe mihe Jerusalemte theng hege enrhier.
Jehudi heta “Eruwng in ijungoum chuw akhunaga? Ajiina ate inche kinnuw ing ate aarsii chuw Tehangna kim mhuwtaana amachuw erum ethenggung.”
Heve ttonghie Herod Eruwng ing athie taana ama ingkhejege Jerusalem na eong mi bekhe tho embelungriir jase,
Khourpuw aalhunghe ingkhejege Thiimdee hechuw ama ing mingkonghege Khrista chuw akhuna berhing vang atega tege ennhingna arodeh.
Emmenie ing anhingna enrhier, “Judia paam Bethlehem na;” ajiena ate inche “Laarchangpa ching hanghin ichii ing abejii:
‘Judas paam shungna aeoum Bethlehem nang Judas aapuhe kaarna aashiengse maagechie,
ajiena ate inche nanhing tena lepaa aapuw inkhe jungsuw vate,
amaching kemi Israel chuw puhvate.’ ”
Chona Herod ing Mahe ehe hechuw inruwje ing eenge aarsii aandangna apha chuw ennhingna siige aminghuw.

Engkhejege ama ing emmenie chuw Bethlehem te chier hege hang ing arhier, “shiruw ingkhejege nedoung chuw belung ilhuhpaaing jongruw, chona ninnuw ing ama chuw nintuw le kenhingna rhierruw, kieje shiningge ama chuw roumsa vang gete.”
Eruwng ttong chuw enthii nhuwte emmenie hechuw sisehe, ingkhejege ibeerruw Tehangna emmenie ing emmhuw besa aarsii ching nedoung oumna mhin chungna chin aniir maataang emmana ehesi.
Emmenii ing aarsii chuw emmhuw che ethijour ing enrotha rhose.

Ingkhejege eensuwng teching emvalhuw che neduwng chuw amanuw Mary tho amhuwpehe, ingkhejege emmenie ing khirukhuw phinhege amachuw aroumhe, Chona emmenie ing lerchii bowr etohhege Sana, Kunduru ingkhejege Gandhars chuw anhingte keethuwr apipehe.
Ingkhejege Herod nhingte enlimaruw tege Thangnhnang ing enromhangna arhier inhuw ijiin emmenieing leentaang lham jiehege enlepaa te enlisehe.

Emmenie chuw engeeng kether teching ibeerruw. Thangnhang miechier ingkhe ing Joseph romhangna endange arhier, “hangthie, neduwngle amanuw kha rhii ing Egypt te tenruw, ingkhejege kii ing kerhier maataang amana ongruw, ajiena ate inche Herod ing Neduwngkha memaang gete tege jongrong atena.”
Ingkhejege ama ing jenna hangthiige neduwngle amanuw chuw rhiege Egypt te tense,
ingkhejege Herod chuw athee maataang amana ongse. Heve hii hanghin ichiin Thangnhang ing Laarchang Pa aminrhier besachuw atungnaga, “kii ing kesapa chuw Egypt tena ke eenpe.”

Mahe ehe miheching amachuw ami muwpe ichii aminghuwtaana Herod ather ephuwr ing ashung besase, ingkhejege mahe ehe mihe nhingtena aminghuw apha enhuw ejiin ama ing mi chierge Bethlehem shungna ingkhejege khoveem na oong kumnhie ingkhejege adertena pesarti aangkheng hechuw athe cherpe.
Chang ichiin Laarchang Pa Jeremia ing hanghin aherhier chuw tungse:
“Ramah paamna chin tacham liige ennhuh nge nge ing ettaa iruwr endang,
Rachel ing asitihe rotoumna ttaane,
amachuw enthe rhumaase,
ajiena ate inche asitihe chuw uwmmaasehe.”
Changechuw Herod athee nhute, ibeerruw, Egypt na Joseph romhangna Thangnhang michier ingkhe endange arhier.
“Hangthie, nedoungle amanuwkha rhieing engkeing Israel paamte si, ajiena ate inche nedoung rhingrie memaang kete tege ajong mihekha theesehe.”
Ingkhejege ama ing hangthiige nedoungle amanuw chuw rhiege Israel paamte hungeenlise.

Changechuw Arkelous ing amapa Herod changthaana Judia na Eruwng viene ichii athietaana Joseph amate inliwang ate etteese, ingkhejege aromhangna Thangnhnang ing arhier inhuw ijiing ama Galile te pierse.
Ingkhejege ama ing sige Nazareth ate khupuw ingkhe nachin paarse, amachuwbe Thiimdee hing hanghing aherhier chuw atungnaga. “Amchuw Nazareth miga tewate.”
Chove apha nachin chii aalupa Johon hungsuwge Judia paamna ttongjiirchuw ajeer.
“Nimbelungrier minteruw, ajiena chiinche Thangven Eruwng lepaa chuw ennheengse.”
Ajiina ate inche heve mi hie akhu hanghin ichiig Isaiah Laarchangpa ing aherhier khaga, Ramkang na euwng achuw ingkhe eruwr: Thangpa lham chuw rothangruw, alham chuw mintuwmruw.
Ate Johon ing Shariingsie mhuwr ing asem piendiir viege, shawin ingkhe ing adier rhiin na achiim, engkhejege ama ing ashaa the chuwbe Kheteh le rampa khienhiing ga.
Chona Jerusalem, Judia aangkheng, engkhejege Jordon arove na eoum paam bekhe tena miheching anhingte etheng.
Engkhejege enta esiikha phuwnghege emmenie chuw ama ing Jordon ewana alupee he.

Changgechuw Pharisi hele Saddusi he enhimpaa ing chiiluh rotumna etheng hechuw amhuwtaana ama ing ennhingna arhier, “Beruwr chiireen ninnuw, achuw ing ninnuw chuw hungsuwang ate belung esii tena tenruw tege arhierga?
Belungrier inte amindangcheh aanraa chin enraruw.
Engkhejege kinnuwbe kimmapa Abraham oumne tevang Kinte temaaruw, ajiena ate inche kie ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, amachuwbe Thangnnhang ing heve lhung hehie Abraham chiireen abesuw chese.
Ateleje thingbourhe rojungna chin rhii chuhne, changtaana ching aanra aettha enramaa thingbour bekhe chuw aphuwrna engkhejege mhi shungte athaana.

Kieing ninnuw chuw belungrier mintena rotum chii keluh gechuw, changgechuw keenhuwna ejuwng ama chuwbe kie chungna beteh lhaane, kiebe akhikum eshii phanang rovaar mang, ama ing ninnuwchuw enthieng Chipina engkhejege mhina eluh vate.
Ajaangya chuw akeena oumne, engkhejege ama ing ashee thii chuw minthiing niege Gehu chuw aetumte buwm vate, Changgechuw shaariisie chuwbe ama ing ettiim enema mhi shungte buwm vate.”
Chona Jesu ing Johon nhingna chii enlu gete tege Galile tena Jordon te huwngse.
Changgechuw Johon ing ama chuw hedurge arhier “kii gelha chuw nang ing chii elu vang natechin nang kenhingte etheng gechie?”
Jesu ing anhingte abesang, “atelebe hangthaa resii, ajiena ate inche hanghin ichiin Dharmo echer nong aangkheng atungna rotum enieing etuhie angene.” amajing arhuwpe.
Engkhejege Jesu chuw chii enluge ahungsuw tho ebierruw, Thangven chuw enlangse, engkhejege Thangnhang Chipi ching Vatthuw khangkhin ichiin jottumge ataalina echuw chuw ama amhuw.
Engkhejege, ebierruw, Thangven tena eruwr engkhe ing arhier, “Hevehii kening aminsiepah kesapaga, anhingna kening chimpaahne.”
Anhuwna Saitaan ing abetheem na rotum Jesu chuw Chipi ing Ramkang te arhiepe.
Engkhejege amaing asiim summinlie le ajen summinlie vinttaam atong, engkhejege aanhuwna ama avin ettam.
Engkhejege aantheem ching vage anhingna arhier, nanghie Thangnhang sapa geteniibe heve lhunghe nhingna tan ensuwh ruwteing rhier.
Changgechuw ama ing abesang, “heve hii enjiise, Tanpanging mi rhingmaanie, Changgechuw Thangnhang nhertena ejungsuw jelha bekhe ching rhingvate.”
Chona Seitaan chin amachuw enthieng kurnung te chin rhiege Thangnhang rumna een phethung taalina amengong,
engkhejege anhingna arhier, “nanghie Thangnhang sapa Keteniibe aderte juwngkhuwng,
ajiena ate inche hanghin enjiige oumne,
ama ing narotumna Thangven michier he jichier vate.
Engkhejege lhung taalina nakhi naminvar namang emmenie ing nangchuw engkee taalina eethoh vatehe.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Hanghin vonu enjiine, nang ing Thangpa nathangnhang chuw minseem maavang natega.”
Vonuh Seitaan ching ama chuw ingkaang pah boungte arhiepe, engkhejege Simrii Eruwng ongna lepaa aangkheng engkhejege enthang enlaar bekhe chuw anhingna aminthii.
engkhejege anhingna arhier “nang ing tiih teniege kie chuw erum teniebe kie ing heve aangkheng hie nanhingna pevang gechie.”
Chona Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “ongmaa ten Seitaan! Ajiina ate inche hevehie enjiine, nang ing Thangpa nathangnhang chuw rumvang natega, engkhejege amapang chuw adur lievang natega!”
Chona chin Seitaan ching ama chuw abethinpe, engkhejege ebierruw Thangven michier he ching juwnghege Jesu chuw abum pehe.
Ate Johon chuw ashuwr pehe ichii athietaana ama ing Galili shungte empeemse.
Engkhejege ama ing Nazareth bethin ge Zabulun le Naphtali ram Rimchii kurna eoum Kapernauwm te sige paarse.
Heve hii Isaiah Laarchangpa ing aherhier chuw tungresii ate taanaga,
“Zebulun ram engkhejege Naphtali ram,
rimchie entongte,
Jordon raarna, leentaang yati heta Galili!
Enthim na aeong mihe ching elhungpaa Lengwaar ingkhe emmhuwpe,
engkhejege ethii deliim paam na aeong he rotum Lengwaar chuw thengse.”
Chove apha nachin betthiimge, “belungrier minteruw, ajiena ate inche Thangven Eruwng lepaa chuw enheengse,” tege Jesu ing ejeer abetthiimpe.
Ama ing Galili rimchie kurna asile Piter ate Simon le anepa Andrew emmenie uwne ennhii hing rimchii shungte echaah endeeng chuw amhu; ajiena ate inche emmenie chuw ngasuwrgehe.
Engkhejege ama ing ennhingna arhier, “keenhuw jiiruw engkhejege kieing ninnuw chuw misuwr minsuw vang gechuw.”
Aniekungna emmenie ing ingeechaah bethin hege aanhuw enjiipe.

Engkhejege chove mhintena ahungsile Ama ing leentaang uwne ennhiihe, Zebedee sapa Jakob le anepa Johon, emmapa Zebedee tho rukuwng shungna ingeechaah iphie hege eong hechuw amhuw, engkhejege ama ing emmenie chuw aeen.
Aniekungna emmenieing rukuwng le emmapa chuw mahege Ama aanhuw chuw enjiipehe.
Engkhejege Ama ing Galili ehurge, engkhuwngsang shungna aminchuw he, engkhejege Eruwng lepaa khuwna aettha ttong chuw ajeer, engkhejege mihe karna lena areen bekhe le Isur emhang apum amindam.

Changchin ichiin athang chuw Siria itungdeh ing enjaamse, engkhejege emmenie ing ina ikie, Lena ajeing amenang, Ronham ing asa, Rongor adeen engkhejege Shuwr ing aki, bekhe chuw anhingte emvirhie engkhejege Ama ing emmenie chuw amindam.
Engkhejege, Galili tena, Dekapoli tena, Jerusalem le Judia tena, engkhejege Jordon rartena miruwpuw ayeing aanhuw ajiihe.
Mi ruhpuw chuw amhutaana Ama ing boungte ehangkar, engkhejege Ama ing aongleching asepho heching anhingte ahimpuw,
Engkhejege Ama ing emmeniechuw minchuwge arhier:
“Chipina entur hechuw enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche Thangven
Eruwng lepaa chuw emmenie taga!
Havi endeen hechuw enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche Thangnhang ing emvaang minlum vate.
Belungrier eduur hechuw enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche emmenie ing Lolhiipaam aerii chuw kumvatehe!
Dharmo echer rotumna winttaam chiihaar atong emmenie chuw enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche emmenie chuw mimvapi vatehe!
Ningsie ehe emmenie chuw enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche emmenie ing ningsie phavatehe!
Belungrier enthieng he enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche emmenie ing Thangnhang chuw mhuwate!
Dejiim oumna nong aatuhe chuw enshii tthane,
ajiena ate inche emmenie Thangnhang siti gehe tevate!
Dharmo echer nong khuna encho enchii apha emmenie chuw enshii ttane,
ajiena ate inche Thangven Eruwng lepaa chuw enrotumga!
“Kii khuna mihin engeese, engeecho engeechii engkhejege nintaalina isii ikha echummaa menuw emminreen ninnu chuw ninshii tthane.
Rotha minrho ruw engkhejege nung nge saruw, ajiena ate inche Thangven na nimmana lhungne, hanghin ichiin nimmana laarchangpa hechuw mihin amenanggehe.

“Ninnuwhie Lolhiipaam bechii chuwgechuw; chang gechuw bechii chuw aphung maangniebe ajiekhang ama iar nachuw oumrih chevate? Heve hii taangte enlhieniege mihin achienna maaniige ikana ajiidong oummanie.
“Ninnuw hii Lolhie paam Lengwaar chuw gechuw. Bung taalina enier kurnung chuw ethuwr rhumaa.
Engkhejege mihin mhi beleng hege beluw mingkhumma. Chang gechuw taarbung taalina taarge eenshuwngna eong bekhena lengwaar apina.
Hanghing ichiin nalengwaar chuw mihe mhekungna lengresie, engkhejege emmenie ing ninnong etthachuw mhuwhesing Thangvenna aeong nimnapa chuw mimpaa heresie.
“Waajeer ttongthole Laarchangpa hechuw amemaangna ejuwng ga ichiin emindeen maruw, kieing emmenie chuw emmang ejuwng maging changgechuw emmenie chuw abethungna ajuwng ging.

Kie ing ninnhingna atataah ing kerhiernaa, Lolhie engkhejege Minven hii attim maataang, waajeer ttongtho chuw atungchir maataang, waajeer ttongtho tena aarie che le asin che azii ediise ingkhe pangdong maangmaanie.

Achuwchuw gejenie heve ttongtho karna hing asiing engkhe pang gejenie bejur niige changchin mi nhingna minchuw niebe amachuw Thangven Eruwng lepaana asiing ga tevate, changgechuw minjieniege echum ing aminchuw ama mi chuwbe Thangven Eruwng lepaa na elhuwngga tevate.
Kieing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, nindharmo echer khing Thiempuw engkhejege Pharisi he dharmo echer chuw thimaa niebe ninnuw Thangven Eruwng lepaa chuw sulhuwh lhuwh matenuw.
“Nang ing mi etheh rhumaanie, ingkhejege achuw engkhe ing mi thehniebe waajeer kengsiete bovate tege tiena mihe nhingna aherhier chuw ninnuw ing ninthiepe.

Chang gechuw kie ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa amachuwbe auw ane nhingna abelung esii mi bekhe chuw waajeer kengsiete bovate, ingkhejege achuw engkhe ing auw ane chuw ningyaa peniebe ama upahe tantii phavate, engkhejege achuw engkhe ing inhuwr nang teniebe ama mhi longkong te bovate.
Changtaa naching nang ing nakeethur chuw hebe kungna minlhen Kete natele, ingkhejege na-uw nane hing nataalina enrhuw nama oum niege ama chuw enthii teniebe,
nakeethur chuw hebekungnama ing engkhejege enli, mensa ing nauw nanetho chuh enlure, chona vaanleeng ingkhejege nakeethur chuw minlhen.

“Nang ingeerhuma mi ing nang chuw waajeer aapuw nhingte enrhiele lhamna amatho ethupang aanrhuwna tu, changmaniebe ama ing nang chuw waajeer aapuw nhingte epevate, ingkhejege waajeer aapuw ing Rhingkhuwm aarhung nhingte epeniege nang chuw Rhingkhuwm shungte ethin vate.
Kie ing ninnhingna atataa ing kerhiernaa, ninnuw ing nintuur bekhe sheer ninsing suwmataang chove mhin tena jungsuw matenuw.
“Mi puwsar, mi lumhee ing mitho Naama itu rhumanie tege aherhier kha ninnuw ing ninthiepe.
Changgechuw kieing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, amachuwbe achuw ingkhe ing nepenuw ingkhe chuw ekaam khuwthier ing ebier niebe ama ing abelungrier na nepenuw thoching naama atupe.
Namhee tachang ing nangchuw isii emintuniebe, chove chuw ekherjo ing lhimvourre; amaching nataa napum hie longkongte inthaah vang nate chang ingbe nahum baahkhe imaang ing tthalhane.
Ingkhejege nakee tachang ing nang chuw isii emintuniebe chove chuw tinbong ing lhinvourre; amaching nataa napum hii longkongte inthaah vang nate changingbe nahum baahkhe imaang ing tthalhane.
“Hanghin je aherhier, ‘achuw ingkhe ing aalhangnuw entthefuwniebe ama ing alumhi nhingna entthena Lerii peresie!’

Changgechuw kie ing nanhingna kerhiernaa, naama itu nong lina maaniege achuw ingkhe alumhi chuw entthephuw niebe ama ing alumhi chuw naama itu aminsuwga; ingkhejege achuw ingkhe ing aantthefuw besa nepenuw beniebe ama ing mi lumhee naama atuga.
“Avonhie ninnuw ing tienana arhierbesa ninthiega, ‘nang ing ichuwm ma ing waasaah tumaa, nang ing ttong nadeen besa kha Thangpa nhingna nong ing tuh.’
Changgechuw kii ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, Thangven romhingna ttong deenmaderuw ajiena ate inche heve hii Thangnhang Eruwng ongnaga;

changmaniege lolhie romhing naje wasaahmaaruw ajiena ate inche heve hii Thangnhang khee chuwngnaga, changmaniege Jerusalem romhingna wasaahmaaruw ajiena ate inche heve hii elhungpaa Eruwng kurnung ga.
Ingkhejege naluw bechuw ing wasaahmaa, ajiena ate inche nang ing sham ingkhe ipur changmaniege minduh chemachie.
Nang ing narhier chuw ‘Ung’ genie ‘Ung’ changmaage ‘Ma’ genie ‘Ma’ teye; heve chungna athi chuwbe aetthamaa tena esuwhga.
“Hanghin ichiin aherhier chuw ninnuw ing ninthiepe, ‘Mhee ingkhe rotumna mhee ingkhe ingkhejege haa ingkhe rotumna haa ingkhe.’
Changgechuw kie ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, etthamaa achuw ingkhe chuw diirmaruw changgechuw achuw ingkhe ing naheembeeng tachangna ibeengniebe anhingte leentaang paangkhe jechuw duh.
Ingkhejege achuw ingkhe ing nalungo chuw ketaga teniege nataalina risang kaniebe napien jekha liesa-resii.
Ingkhejege achuw ingkhe ing nang chuw lhammel ingkhe eminsitee niebe, amatho mel ennhii sih.
Nanhingna ennhii ama nhingna chin pere, ingkhejege nanhingna epuwh ning ate mi chuw rutheemare.
“Hanghin ichiin aherhier chuw ninnu ing ninthiepe, ‘Vim chaang chuw ninning minsiiruw ingkhejege ingeerhuma hechuw harruw.’
Changgechuw kii ninnhingna kerhiernaa, ninnuw ingeerhuma hechuw ninning minsiiruw ingkhejege ninnuw ingeecho ingeechii he rotumna hinnheru.
Changgeniebe Thangven na aeong nimmapa sitihe ensuwh vangninte, ajiena ate inche atthamaa ingkhejege ettha taalina enie abesuw na, ingkhejege echumle echummaa taalina khuw aminsuwrna.
Ajiina ate inche, ninnuw aning eminsii michuw ninning minsii tenube ajii mana nimphaphuw oumne? Khachana aakhum he rangge changchin ichiin tumaa he khang?
Ingkhejege ninnuw ing ninguw ninnehe pang chuw berhiim tenuwche leentaang he ethiing ajii nintu lhaase? Jaat leentaang he rang ge changchin ichiin tumaa he khang?
Changtaah nachin, Thangven na aeong nimmapa changrier hanghin ichiin ninnuwjeng changrier vang nintega.
“Ninnuw ing ninta dramho icher nong chuw mi ing mhuwresie tetenuwge emmhe koungna nintunama ing enriemruw; Changmaaniibe Thangven na aeong Nimmapa Thangnhang nhingtena nimphaphuw mana oummaa.

“Chang taana chin ninnuw ing daan nintule ettha embuning ate heching mi ing imimpaa heresie ente taana khuwngsang engkhejege lhampu na entu khangkhin ichiin toumpee toummaaruw. Atataa ing ninnhingna kieing kerhiernaa, emmeniebe emmana emphape.
Chang gechuw ninnuw ing daan nintule ningkee tachang ing atu chuw ningkee tali ing minghuw maresii.
Chang geniebe daan nintu chuw enruw ing nintu ensuwh niege enruw ing engeemhuw nimmapa Thangnhang ching ninnuw chuw mana ipe vate.

“Engkhejege ninnuw ing ninnhiele aettha embuning atehe tho enghaa maaruw, ajiena ate inche emmeniebe mi ing imhuw resii entetaana khuwngsang soungna engkhejege lhamkur bekhena niirhege inhie engeedii naa. Atataa in ninnhingna kie ing kerhiernaa, emmeniebe emmana emphape.

Chang gechuw ninnuw ing ninnhiele adeen engkhe soungte lhuwruw engkhejege eenkhaar kamnuwng enruwhjeh ing aeong nimmapa nhingte ching hinnheruw; engkhejege enruwhjeh ing engeemhuw nimmapa chin ninnuw chuw mana ipe vate.
“Ninnuw ing ninnhiele leentaang Yatihe entu khangkhing ichiin aruw zelha nuhbour maaruw; ajiena ate inche ttong aenhimpaa enrhier taana ithie vate ichiin emmenie ing emmindeen naa.
Emmenie tho chin enghaa maaruw ajiena ate inche Nimmapa ching ninghinnhie malhiele nimvehna chuw aminghuga.
Chang geniiche hanghin ichiin nheruw:
‘Thangven na aeong kimmapa,
Naromhing enthieng ensuwh resii.
Naaruwng lepaa juwng resii,
Thangven na atu khangkhing ichiin
Lolhii na namindeen unshuwresie.
Aanie aanie na kinshaphuw chuw atenie hin ipe sare.
Engkhejege kinnuw Jeng kinler aatur hechuw kingkuhpee khangkhin ichiin,
kinlertur chuw ikuhpee.
Engkhejege kinnuw chuw entheemna soungte irhie samaare,
Chang gechuw etthamaa tena kinnuw chuw eetin peere.’
“Ajiena ate inche nintaa lina aelaar atu mihe chuw ninnuw ing kuhpee tenuwbe Thangven na eong Nimmapa jeching ninnuw chuw ikuhpee vate.
Chang gechuw nintaa lina aelaar atu mihe chuw ninnuw ing kuhpeemaa tenuwbe nimmapa jeching ninlaar na bekhe chuw ikuhpee maanie.

“Engkhejege ninnuw ing vinttaam nintongle ettha embuning atehe khangkhing iya nungchin mindang maaruw, ajiena ate inche emmeniebe vinttaam entongle mi hing imhuw resii tehege iya nungchin emmindangnaa. Atataa ing ninnhingna kii ing kerhiernaa, emmeniebe emmana emphape.
Chang gechuw ninnuw ing vinttaam nintongle nimmhe phieruw, engkhejege ninluwhna thou etehnuwng.
Winttaam nintong chuw mi leentaang hing mhuwmaa heresie, chang gechuw enruwhjeh ing eong Nimmapa ching imhuw resie; engkhejege enruwhjeh ing engeemhuw Nimmapa ching ninnuw chuw mana ipe vate.
“Sadie le thiirrhie ing shavang ate engkhejege enruwhing valhuw heniege berovang ente lolhiepaam nahin ninrotum lerchii mingkong maaruw.
Chang gechuw, Sadie le thiirrhie ing shamaa vang ate engkhejege enruwhing valhuw heniege beromaa vang ente Thangven teching ninrotoumna lerchii mingkongruw.
Ajiina ate inche ninler ninchie uwmtaa nachin nimbelungriirje oumvate.
“Mhee hie huwm thoumhichuwga. Changtaana chin namhibiir tthaniebe ninghuwm apoum chuw lengwaar ing siih vate.
Chang gechuw nimmhee tthamaa niebe ninghuwm apoum chuw enthim ing siih vate. Chang taanachin ninnhingna lengwaar chuw enthim geniibe, chove enthim chuw ajechaa minthim vate?

“Achuw engkhe dong ing aapuw ennhii ta dur ilii chehmaa, ajiena ate inche ama ing engkhe chuw harniege leentaang chuw aning minsiih vate, changmaa niege ama ing engkhe nhingte belung minlhuw niege leentaang chuw tho samaanie, ninnuw ing Thangnhang engkhejege lerchii aannhiemeh ta dur ilii chemaa tenuw.

“Changtaana chin ninnhingna kerhiernaa, ninrhingrie rotoumna ajie shavang kintega changmaaniige ajie eenvang kintega, changmaa niige ninghuwm rotoumna ajie vievang kintega tenung nimbelungriir minja maaruw, rhingrie ching the chuw athimaa gekhang, engkhejege huwm ching piendeer chuw athimaa gekhang?

Ibierruw mimvenna vati hehie, emmenie ing ivorje vormaahe, engkhejege ikumje kummaahe, changmaa niege aetoum teje mingkong maahe, chang gechuw thangven na aeong nimmapa Thangnhang ing emmenie chuw ajuh naahe. Ninnuwbe emmenie chungna nimmin luwlhaa maakhang?
Engkhejege ningkaarna achuw engkhe ing nimbelungriir aya taana ninrhingrie chuw poungpha engkhe ber ibu ninchese?
“Engkhejege ajie tuna piendeer lina belungrier nimminjaga? Phelhiena ipaar thambalrii hing ajiekhang imhuwng gehe ichii chuw mindeenruw, emmenie ing enlhiengye enlhieng maahe, laye chimaahe.
Chang geyenie kie ing ninnhingna kerhier naa, athang alaar eoum Solomon raang ge heve riehe kaarna engkhe tho dong enttim in attheh isuwh ing enthongmaa.

Chang gechuw atenie rhingge atuhnie lhungthuw soungte enthaa phe lhiina imhung phuwr chuw Thangnhang ing changjeh meh bethong niebe, ama ing ninnu chuw ibethonglhaa maanie khang, oh ninthacha esur mihe?”
“Changtaana chin ‘ajii shava teruw? Changmaaniege,’ ‘ajii een vateruw?’ ‘Changmaaniige’ ‘ajii vievateruw?’ Tenung nimbelungriir minja maaruw.
Ajiina ate inche leentaang Yaatiheching heve pee bekhe hehie enjongnaa engkhejege Thangven na eong nimmapa Thangnhang chin heve bekhe hehie ningeedieh naa ichii aminghuse.
Chang gechuw amhuwr rimna Thangnhang Eruwng lepaa le adramho icher chuw jongruw engkhejege heve pee bekhe heyehie ninta ensuwh vate.
Changtaana chin atuhnie rotoumna belungrier minya maaruw ajiena ate inche atuhnie rotoum chuw atuhnie ing hinreen vate. Aanie aaniena iya nabekhe chuw aanie rotoumin ensuwh resii.
“Ninnuw chuw Thangnhang ing waajeer entu namaa ing ninnuw jeng leentaang hechuw waajeer tumaaruw.
Ajiena ate inche nimwaajeer khing ninnuw chuw waajeer itu vate, engkhejege ninnuw ing ningkheeng arii tho enttim ninnuwng ilhaang vang ninte.
Nimmhi soungna enthin thiengkier khache mindeen maa chuwge ajietuna ninguw ninne mhee soungna enthin abouretie chuw ningeebierga?
Changmaa niege nimmhih soungna thingkier aanthin gelohle ajiekhang ninguw ninne nhingna ‘namhee soungna enthin ebuwr-etie liepee gechie’ ninte chehga?
Ettha embu ninnuw, amhuwrrimna nintaasaa mhee soungtena thingkier kha liejoh jaaruw, chona ninnuw ing ninguw ninne mhee soungna enthin ebuwr etie chuw enthieng ing mhuwtenuge iliejoh cheh vang ninte.
“Ethieng chuw utihe pemaaruw; engkhejege mukta chuw woh he kurna lhinmaaruw emmenieing engkhi ing chiinna vatehe engkhejege vaanleh heniege ninnuw chuw iminliim vatehe.
“Nheruw chove chuw ninnhingna ipe vate; Jongruw ninnuw ing tuw vang ninte; engkhejege enuhruw ninnhingna eemhongpee vate.
Ajiena ate inche aanhie bekhe ching aphanaa, Aajong ama ching atuwhnaa, engkhejege arukhuung ama nhingna ching imhong pee vate.
Chang maage achuwga ningkaarna asapa ing tan anhiih taana lhoung pevang ate chuw?
Changmaage ama ing nga engkhe anhiih taana anhingna beruwr pevang ninte kha?

Chona, etthamaa ninnuw raange ninsitihe nhingte ettha keethuwr chuw ajiekhang pevnag nintega ichii minghuw tenuw che, Thangven na aeong Nimmapa anhingna aanhiehe nhingte ayemeh ang aettha peese chuw pevate!
“Changtaana chin ajiejie gejenie mi hing ninnhingna mintuning ninte kha ninnuw jeng ennhingna turuw; ajiena ate inche heve hie waajeer ttong engkhejege Laarchang he ttongrhierga.
“Embee suwngkoung teching lhuwruw; ajiena ate inche imaangna te ilhuwna suwngkoung chuw mimvenna, engkhejege lham chuw minjane, engkhejege chove soungte ilhuw mi nhimne.
Ajiena ate inche rhingrie toungna suwngkoung chuw mimbeene, engkhejege lham chuw siengne, engkhejege chove chuw ajii mi tumne.
“Zou piendeer avie, chang gechuw asoung nache erhaang utiraar khangchie echummaa Laarchanghe tena enriemruw.
Ninnuw ing emmenie chuw engeenranaching minghuw vang ninte Mi hing drakha aanra chuw aelhingbour tena, chang maaniege thechang chuw aelhingbour tena aarhiih chaaga?
Chang ichiin aettha thingbour bekhe ching aanra aettha enrane, chang gechuw aetthamaa thingbour ching aanra etthamaa enrane.
Ettha thingbour engkhe ing aanra etthamaa, changmaa niege aethaama thingbour engkhe ing aanra ettha enra chehmaa.
Aanra aettha enramaa thingbour bekhe chuw phuwrge mhi soungte athaa naa.
Chang taana ching ninnuw ing emmenie chuw engeenra nachin minghuw vang ninte.
“Kenhingna ‘Thangpa, Thangpa,’ ate bekhe ing thangven Eruwng lepaa chuw lhuwhchir maanie, chang gechuw thangven na aeong kemapa ing amindeen aatu ama ching lhuwh vate.

Chove enie naching aanhim ing kenhingna hanghin rhier vatehe ‘Thangpa, Thangpa kinnuw ing naromhingna Thangnhang ttong kintong maaga engkhejege naromhingna ronham kinthour maaga engkhejege naromhing ruwngpuw nong kintu maaga?’
Engkhejege chale chin kieing ennhingna hanghin rhier vang gete ‘Kie ing ninnuw chuw minghuw maangchuw; etthamaa itu ninnuw kenhingtena engkeruw.’
“Heve kettong hehie aronge, engkhejege atu mi bekhe chuw lhung taalina een atu aesing mi engkhe tho enghaa vate.
Engkhejege khuw suwrge chii liimse, engkhejege thie rhaang ge chove een taalina chin amimvarpe, chang gechuw lhung taalina aniirna chove een chuw tiehmaase.
“Engkhejege heve kettong hehie thiege atumaa mi bekhe chuw siih taalina een atu aenhuwr mi engkhe tho enghaane.
Engkhejege khuw suwrge chii liimse, engkhejege thie rhaangge chove een taalina chin amimvarpe, engkhejege een chuw mher isiipaa in tiihse.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing heve hehie irhier abetthunhute aathie mi ruhpuw hechuw enluw rhiihse.
Ajiena ate inche ama ing emmenie chuw thiimdeehe khangkhin ichiin minchuwmaa hege, itu acheh engkhe khangkhin ichiin aminghuwgehe.
Jesu ing boung taalina ajungttumle mi ruhpuw aye ing aanhuw ajie;
Engkhejege ibeerruw enchor mi engkhe theng ge akurna akhi ruwkhuw phin ge arhier, “Thangpa emindeen pee teniebe kie hie eminthieng pisare.”
Engkhejege ama ing akee vejaam ge ama chuw perge arhier, “Kerhuwse; minthiing sare,” engkhejege aniekungna aanchor chuw minthiingse.

Engkhejege Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Ibeer! Nang achuw dong nhingna rhiermaa, chang gechuw shi, khorpuw nhingte nataa kha vaanthii engkhejege mi bekhena saarkhie ipina rotoum Moses ing abetthoh keethuwr chuw minlhen.”
Ama ing Kapernauwm avalhuw tho raarmi roza aapuw engkhe ing amachuw entuw phuwge anhingna hanghin ichiin rhierge athamsaa:
“Thangpa, kemine hie suwr ing kige iya echaampaa ing eenna entorjehne.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing anhingna arhier “kie vahvang gete engkhejege ama chuw mindam vang gete.”
Chang gechuw raarmi roza aapuw chin anhingna abesang “Thangpa nang ing ke eente epuwkho vang nate hie kii rovaar samaa ing; chang gechuw dam resie ichiipang irhier peeteniebe kemine chuw damvate.

Ajiina ate inche kieje itu iche he derna aeong ging engkhejege keder naye sepehe oumne, engkhejege kie ing engkhe nhingna ‘shi’ ketele ama shine, engkhejege leentaang engkhe nhingna ‘huwng’ ketele ama huwngne, engkhejege kesuwh nhingna ‘heve hie tu’ ketele ama ing atuna.”
Chove chuw Jesu ing athie taana ama alu rhiege aanhuw ejie he nhingna arhier, atataa ing kie ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, Israel shungna raange hanghin ichiin athacha mi engkhe dong tuw maang.
“Kie ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, mi enhimpaa tehang engkhejege tetaa tena thengniege Abraham, Issak, engkhejege Jakob tho thangven eruwng lepaa nachin onghaa vatehe.
Chale chin eruwng lepaa asiti hechuw taang inthim shoungte lhinvatehe; chove amhin nachin mihe ching ttaavatehe engkhejege ingha eriir vatehe.
Engkhejege Jesu ing raarmi roza aapuw nhingna chin arhier, “Shi, nathacha enhuw ijiin heve hie nanhingna suwh resie, engkhejege chove pungpha narah chin amine chuw damse.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing Piter eente avalhuwle ama ing Piter mapi rhietheng ing nage entour chuw amhuw.
Ama ing akee chuw apar taana arhie etheng chuw engkuhse engkhejege ama ing hangthiege adur alie.
Chove kholhiena chin emmenie ing ronham ing asa mi enhimpaa anhingte emvirhie; engkhejege ama ing etthamaa chipi hechuw rukuh ge athour engkhejege ena bekhe hechuw amindam.
Chove chuh Isaiah Laarchang ing, “ama ing kinsurna ina iki enlie pipe engkhejege kinlena bekhe enreen pipe,” tege aherhier chuw atungnaga.
Ate Jesu ing mi ruhpuw aye ing arokur chuw amhu taana ama ing emmenie chuw pangkhe entongte shiru tege abettho pehe.
Engkhejege thiempuw engkhe theng ge anhingna arhier, “aanchuwpa nang nasitaa bekhena nanhuw jiigechii.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Emhihe engkhour oumne engkhejege thiena enyaa vatihe enruvuw oumne, chang gechuw Mi Sapa chuwbe aluw mingkamna akhuna dong oumma.”
Sepoh leentaang engkhe ing anhingna arhier “Thangpa mensa rimna kie engke ning ge kemapa hungrhee jah gete.”
“Chang gechuw Jesu ing anhingna arhier” “keenhuw jii engkhejege ethie hechuw ethie hing arheena tusaheresie.”
Engkhejege ama ing ruwkuwng atungle asepoh hing aanhuw enjiehe.
Engkhejege ibeerruw riimchiena khuw-thie eper paa hangeenlehge ruwkuwng chuw chii ennoh ching beluh rong atele Jesu chuwbe ehejaarye.
Engkhejege emenie ing anhingte vahege amachuw bethie hege hanghin enrhier “Ekarsare Thangpa, kinnuw therong kintena, ichinsagung.”
Engkhejege ama ing ennhingna arhier, “ajietuna enttii gechuw, Oh thacha ishur ninnuw?” Chona chin ama ing hangthiege thiele riimchie chuw aasepe, “engkhejege apoum alaang depose.”
Engkhejege mi hechuw enlu rhiege hanghin ichiin enrhier, “heve hie ajii khangchie miga, thiele riimchie jing anu aminjiehie?”

Engkhejege ama ing paangkheh entongte hinjiege Gadari lepaa te ahungsile ronham ing ashaa mi ennhie ing then soungtena hangsuwh hege ama chuw lhamna aantuwphuwhe. Emmenie chuw ajehmeh ittiishuga ichiin che achuwdong ing chove lham chuw ijie chehmaa.
Engkhejege ibeerruw, emmenie ing iounghe, “kinnuw chuw ajie iminlu ginte natega, Thangnhang Sapa? Nang ing kinnuw chuw apha aviemaa lhiele imemaang gungte techiige heve nahin itheng gechie?”
Chalechin ennhing tena tapieh endaa amhin engkhe na woh aenhimpaa aruwh engkhe imhaar.
Engkhejege ronhamhe ching ama chuw thamsa hege enrhier, “Nang ing kinnuw hie enthour geteniibe sose woh aruwhhe soungte sin iminlhuw sare.”

Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Shiruw;” changtaana chin emmenie ing jungsuw hege wohhe soungte lhuwsehe; engkhejege ibeerruw, woh aruw apoum ching engkhohpaa riimchie kham teching jungjaam sehe, engkhejege chii soungte lhuwh hege theesehe.
Woh iser mihe ching ten hege khuwpu soungte hunglhuw sehe engkhejege emmenie ing chove bekhe chuw le ronham ing ashaa mihe nhingna isuwh aangkheng chuw entongpehe.
Engkhejege ibiirruw khuwpuw apoum ing Jesu entuwhphuwte tehege ejungsuwhe, engkhejege emmenie ing ama chuw emmhuw che chove enram chuw ibethinpeere tehege anhingna enthamsaape.
Engkhejege ama ing ruwkuwng engkhe tungge aalenpe, engkhejege ataasah akhuwpuw te hungse.

Engkhejege ibeerruw, emmenie ing suwr ing aki engkhe chuw ajaarna tho emvirhie, engkhejege Jesu ing enthacha chuw amhuw taana ama ing suwr ing aki nhingna chin arhier, “Kesapa, nabeloung mengam; isii natu bekhe kha kekuhpee pechii!”
Engkhejege ibeerruw, thiimpuw tepie hechin ennajeer na enrhier, “Have pesar hing Thangnhang chuw arokaarnaa.”
Chang gechuw emmindeen chuw minghuwge Jesu ing arhier, “Ajie tuna ninseloung na aetthamaa nimmindeen ga?
Ajiena ate inche ‘Isii natu bekhe kha kekuhpee pechii’ atele ‘Hangthii ing shi’ ate chuw akhukha lelhaane?
Ninnuw ing minghuw vang ninte chuwbe mi Sapa ching Lolhie paam na isie ikuw achehse,” chona ama ing suwr ing aki nhingna chin arhier “Hangthii, najaarna jolie engkhejege een te engke.”
engkhejege ama ing hangthiige een te engkese.
Mi ruhpuw heching chove chuw emmhuw taana emmenie ittee sehe, engkhejege mi taalina changchii itu icheh aapi Thangnhang chuw emmenie ing emmimpaape.

Jesu ing chove mhin chuw bethinge ahungsile ama ing Mathi ate pesar engkhe chuw rampaar chiipaar khachana ekhuwm een engkhe na eong amhuw, engkhejege anhingna arhier, “keenhuw jie?” Engkhejege ama ing hangthiege Jesu inhuw ajiepe.
Ama ing eensoung na bowsa avaong tho rampaar chiipaar aakhuwhe le ishii icherhe aenhimpaa vatheng hege Jesu engkhejege asepohhe tho onghaasehe
Engkhejege Pharisi hing heve hii mhuwhege emmenie ing asepohhe nhingna enrhier, “Ajii tuna ninnuw ninthimpuw ing rampaar chiipaar aakhuwhe engkhejege isii icherhe tho the ashaahaaga?”
Chang gechuw heve hie athie taana ama ing arhier, “Edamhe rotoumna aethiim kanamaa, chang gechuw inahe rotoumnaga.

Kii ing ningsii ihe keediih naa, engkhejege enthina hebe idemaang atehie ajii atenaga ichii aminghuwna ninnu shinuwng vatamruw. Ajiina ate inche kie ing dramho icher chuw aeennaing ijuwng maaging, isii icherhe chuwga.”
Chona Johon asepoh hing anhingte theng hege enrhier, “Pharisihe le kinnuw ing aphabekhena vinttaam tong oungge ajietuna nasepo hing vinttaam atongmaa gehe?”

Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna anhier, “Lerpa tho engongle taang riekhie inie aeriim na itheng mharhe chuw enning dongvate khang? Lerpa chuw ennhingtena Jelhie vang ate inie chuw thengvate, engkhejege chale ching emmenie ing vinttaam tong vatehe.
Engkhejege achuwdong ing piendeer beluw taalina pien ethar alhehkheh mimbermaa, ajiena ate inche mimber niebe aphiih taa lolang naching aenhimseh entthiehne.

Chang maage mi hing drakha chii ethar chuw beluw shawin abuwr na thinmaa, thinniebe shawin chuw jinge drakha chii chuw entane, engkhejege shawin chuw amemaang naa. Chang gechuw drakha chii ethar chuw ethar shawin abuwrna athin naa, engkhejege aannhiimeh chin maangmaa.”

Chang ichiin ama ing ennhingna arhierle ibeerruw, waajeer aapuw engkhe valhuwge Jesu chuw roumge arhier, “Kesanuw chuw atelerarah theese, chang gechuw nang ivathengpee ing ataalina nakee ibangpee engkhejege ama rhing vate.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing hangthiege asepohhe tho aanhuw enjiepehe;
Engkhejege ibeerruw koumsum alhii ennhii thii entage ina nepenuw engkhe ing atuhnhung na vage apien betha aparpe.
Ajiina ate inche “kie ing apien betha pang ruwruw chuw parsa ningbe damvang gete” tege abelungrier na amindeen.
Jesu avaanleh che ama chuw mhuwge arhier, “Nabeloung mengam sare, kesanuw, nathacha khing nang chuw emminthiingpe.” Engkhejege aniekungna nepenuw chuw damse.
Engkhejege waajeer aapuw eensoung teching avalhuw che toumla aatoumhe le huwjaar amintam mi ruhpuw chuw mhuwge,
ama ing arhier, “Enseenruw, ajiena ate inche nepenuti hii ithie maaga, ijaarga.” Engkhejege emmenie ing Thangpa chuw emmenie.
Chang gechuw mi ruhpuw chuw taang abesuw aanhuwna ama valhuwge nepenuwti chuw akee na abechuw che ama hangthiese.
Engkhejege heve khu hii chove paam apoum nachin emvorse.
Engkhejege Jesu ing chove mhin tena chuw ahungsi che mheechuw pesar ennhii ing aanhuw enjii belham ing “David Sapa kinnuw chuw naning eminsii sare” tehege iunghe.

Ama ing eensoung avalhuwle amhee ichu pesar ennhii ching anhingte ivahe; engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Kii ing heve hii itu kechese ichii nimminghuwga?” Emmenie ing anhingna embesang, “Oung, Thangpa.”
Chona chin ama ing emmhee hechuw parge arhier, “ninthacha inhuw ijiin ninnhingna heve hie suwh resie.”
Engkhejege emmhee hechuw enlangse. Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna entehpaa in arhier, “Achuwdong ing heve hie minghuwmaa resie.”
Chang gechuw emmenie ing shihege Thangpa romhing chuw paam apoumna chin enjarpe.
Engkhejege emmenie ing aangke nhuwtehe, ibeerruw, ronham ing ashaa attong isuwmaa engkhe chuw mi hing anhing te emvehrhii.
engkhejege ronham chuw aten aanhuwna attong isuwmaa mi ching ttongse engkhejege mi ruhpuw chuw enluw rhiige enrhier, “Heve tho enghaa ajiidong Israel soungna ateeledong mhuwmaa mii.”
Chang gechuw Pharisi hing enrhier, “Ronham eruwng sapa ing boumge ama ing ronham athorga.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing khuw engkhejege khupuw bekhe chuw ihurge khuwngsang soungna minchuwge, eruwng lepaa ettha ttong chuw ajeer engkhejege lena bekhe le ina iki, bekhe hechuw amindam.
Ama ing mi ruhpuw chuw amhuw che emmenie chuw aning aminttuwhpe, ajiena ate inche emmenie chuw ijachaam apha, aaboum eoummaa engkhejege aasherpee eoummaa Zouhe tho enghaa gehe.
Chona ama ing asepohhe nhingna arhier, “Ikumphuw shaang nhimne chang gechuw shaang aakum mibe tumpaane.
Chang taana chin shaang ikum mi ijin chiirna rotum shaang ikum aapuw nhingna hinnheruw.”
Chona Jesu ing asepoh sumalhie ennhie hechuw aeen engkhejege emmenie chuw enthiengmaa chipi ithour achena, lena bekhe engkhejege ina iki apoum endam achena ruwngpir apeehe.
Heve hehie sepoh sumalhie enhiehe romhing ga: amhuwrna, Piter ate Simon, engkhejege anepa Andrew; Zebedee sapa Jakob engkhejege anepa Johon;
Philip le Bartholomew; Thomas le khachana aekhum Mathi; Alpheus Sapa Jakob engkhejege Thaddaeus;
Kanan tena Simon engkhejege Jesu chuw alhien Judas Iskariot.
Jesu ing heve Summalhii ennhie hehie hanghin ichiin minchuwge achiirhe; “Leentaang Jaatihe kaarna shimaaruw engkhejege Samaria he khuwpuw soungte lhuwmaa ruw.
Chang gechuw Israel he eengkuw emmobesa zouhe nhingtelha shiruw.
Ninshi belham in Thangven Eruwng lepaa chuw ennheengse ate aettha ttong chuw minthangruw.
Ina mindamruw, ithie minrhingruw, enchor minthiingruw, ronham thourruw, ninnuw ing ngarhe ing ningee lhangkha, ngarhe ing peruw.
Sana lopa, engkhejege kori reenmaaruw?
Ramkhie ninshina thuung, lungoh ennhie, khikhum engkhejege romhor reenmaaruw; ajiena ate inche enlhiing mihe ching enthe saaphuw iphapham thengne.
“Ninnuw ing khuw gejenie khuwpuw gejenie ninlhuwhle heve sungna rukuwm itu chehvang ate mi chuw jongruw, engkhejege chove mhin chuw nimbethin maataang ama tho ongruw.
Ninnuw ing een teching nimvalhuw tho een ipuw hechuw berhiim ruw.
Engkhejege emmenie ing rukuwm itu heniebe eensoung nachin dejiim oumna naberhiim chuw cheengresie, chang gechuw rukuwm itumaa heniebe dejiim oumna naberhiim chuw inliresie.
Achuw engkhe ing ninnuw chuw rotha ihekur maaniibe engkhejege ninttong rongemaa niebe chove een chuw maaniige khuwpuw chuw ninbethin tho enrhiing ningkhina sheerbaar kha rukhuwngruw.
Kie ing ninnhingna atataa in kerhiernaa, waajeer inie nachin chove khuwpuw lamnabe Sodom le Gomorrah paam ing iya ichaam idiir akhohseh vate.
“Ibierruw kii ing ninnuw chuw imhihe kaarte Zauhe khangkhin ichiin kechiir naachuw; Changtaah naching beruwr khangkhing vierruw engkhejege Vatthuw khangkhing belungrier teumruw.
Emmenii chuw aeriim ruw ajiena ate inche emmenie ing ninnuw chuw uhpa laaluh te epevate he, engkhejege entaa khuwngsang naching ninnuw chuw emimver vatehe.
Emmenie nhingna, engkhejege mijaati leentaang he nhingna sarkhii rotoumna kie khuna ram aapuwhe engkhejege eruwng he mhekungna ninnuw chuw aehinrhii vatehe.

Emmenie ing ninnuw chuw changchin eminlhen hele ajiekhang ttong vang kintega changmaage ajii rhier vang kintega tenung belung minja maaruw; ajiena ate inche apha chaleching ninnuw ing rhiervang ninte chuw ninnhingna epevate.
Ajiina ate inche ettong chuw ninnuw magechuw chang gechuw nimmapa Thangnhang Chipi ing ninnuw chuw emminttong ga.
“Uwne ing uwne chuw engkhejege amapa ing asiti chuw entheena chin minlhenvate, engkhejege siti hechin emmanuw emmapa hechuw rhumaa heniege emmenie chuw mintthe vatehe.
Engkhejege kie keromhing khuna mi bekheching ninnuw chuw aeharvate changgechuw attuhpha phanang adiermi chuw karpivate.

Emmenie ching ninnuw chuw khuwpu engkhena iya inang ipe heniebe khuwpu engkhete tenruw; ajiena ate inche kii ing ninnhingna atataa ing kerhiernaa, Mi Sapa ajuwng maalhiele Israel khuwpu bekhe ihursuwmaa lhietenuw.
“Sepoh engkhe hii ama aanchuwpa chungna lhunglhaamaa chona suwh engkhe hii aapuw chungna lhunglhaa maa.

Sepoh ching aanchuw tho enghaa niege engkhejege Suwh ching aapuw tho inghahchin ensuwne. Emmenie ching een aapuw chuw Beelzebul teheniege eenheniebe ama aingkuw hechuw emmenie ching ajemeh etthamaa romhing minreen vate he?”
“Chang taana chin emmenie chuw ttiemaaruw; ajiena ate inche unluwge eoum chuw enlang maavang ate ajiidong oumma, engkhejege emphuwng maavang ate ouwngruw changchie ajiidong oumma.
enthimna kii ing ninnhingna kerhierkha lengwaar na tongruw; engkhejege anie kungna ninthie kha phethung taalina mindangruw.
Huwm etheh achehe changgechuw rhingrier etheh achemaa hechuw ttiemaaruw, chang gechuw longkong shungna humle rhingrier aannhing etheh acheh ama lhahchuw ttiiruw.
Waasaah ennhii chuw pesa engkhena juwr maahe khang? Chang gejenie nim Mapa ing rhumaa niege waasaah engkhe dong lolhie te jungbo maanie.
Engkhejege ninlosena sham bekhe rang ge inteem chirga.
Changtaa naching ittemaaruw, ninnuwbe waasaah enhimpaa chungna amin elulhaa gechuw.
“Changtaana ching leentaang he mhekungna kii engeerhuw mi bekhe chuw kii jeng Thangvenna ke Mapa mhekungna rhuvang gete.
Chang gechuw leentaang he mhekungna kii engeerhumaa michuw kii jeng Thangvenna ke Mapa mhekungna rhumaa ning.
“Kii hii Lolhiipaam na dejiim ipi ejuwng ga ichiin mindeen maaruw, kii dejiim ipi ejuwng maging chang gechuw chimseeh ipi ejuwng ging.
Ajiina ate inche Pesar engkhe amapatho, engkhejege sanuw engkhe ing amapitho, enlena maa ing ejuwng ging.
Achuw engkhe ama aarhumaa chuw ataasah eengkuw rara tena mi ensuwh vate.

“Achuw, chuw gejenie manuw engkhejege mapa chuw, kie aethi ing aning aminsiih lhaachuwbe kemi ensuwh vang ate rovaarmaa; engkhejege achuw chuw gejenie sapa engkhejege sanuw chuw kie aethi ing aning aminsiih lha tenuwbe kemi ensuwh vang ate rovaarmaa.
Engkhejege achuw chuw gejenie thingkher chuw reen niege kii keenhuw ajiemaa chuw kemi ensuwh vang ate rovaarmaa.
Enrhingrie rotoumna pang emmindeen emmenie ching enrhingrie chuw mimmoh vatehe, engkhejege kii rotoumna arhingrie amimmoh emmenie ching enrhingrie chuw tuvatehe.
“Achuwchuw gejenie ninnuw chuw rotha ingeekur chin kii chuw rotha engkur ga, engkhejege achuw chuw gejenie kii rotha ingeekur chin kii enjichiir amachuw rotha akurga.

“Achuwchuw gejenie Laarchang engkhe romhingna Laarchang engkhe rotha akur chin Laarchang ta atumin phavate, engkhejege achuwchuw gejenie dramho icher mi engkhe romhingna dramho icher mi engkhe chuw rotha akur chin dramho icher atumin phavate.

Engkhejege achuwchuw gejenie Sepoh engkhe romhingna heve esiinghe engkhe nhingna chiiseeh kureeh engkhe pang ruwruw api chuw kii ing atataa ing ninnhingna kerhiernaa emmenie ateele dong ing entumin emmomaanie.”
Ate Jesu ing sepoh suwmalhie ennhiihenhingna aminchuw betthoge amaing ama amhintena wasige ungkhuwpuw bekhena ttongjiirchuw aminjaampe.
Johon ing mikhuwm suwngna aongle Khrista akhuwchuw athietaana asepoh he vihcheerge arhierhe.
“Thengvang echiichuw nanggechiemo, changmaanieche lintaangchuw hehaavang kintega?”
Jesu ing abesang, “Engkenuwng Johonnhingna ninthiebekhe engkhejege nimmhuw bekhechuw tongruw:
Mhichuwheching imhuw ache, khibongheching isi ache, enchor ethungching edam, naasiheching athieche, aethiehe aminrhing amana saraheching aettha zelha aphahechuw.
Engkhejege ketaalina engkhi aminsiimaahechuw repaa itthaga.”
Emmenieching insinhuwte mi ruhpuwhe nhingna Johon Khuwchuw aettong abetthimpe: “Ninnuw ing rampakaarna ajii ibeerte techuwge aevagechuw? Thii ing asiim phuwrhechuwga?
Ajii ibeerte techuwge ethenggechuw? Piendeer insuwr ing aanthong Eruwng ongtaa aeonghe chuwga?
Ajii ibeerte techuwge evagechuw? Laarchangchuwga! uwng, ninnhiengna Kerhierga, engkhejege amabe Laarchangchuw athiga.
Ama khuwhie bejiige eheuwmbesaga, ‘Ebeer kieing namana Kettong aminthangpachuw Kebethinse, ataaching namana lhampuw rothangtuna Kecheerpe.’
Atataa nanhingna kerhierga nepenuwing aberhing kaarna Johon Baptist ithi ing elhuwng hungsuwmaalhie; changgechuw Thangven eruwng lepaana isiingsehching ama ithi ing elhuwngga.
Johon Baptist eniena bettiimge atenie ephaing eperpaa ing eruwng lepaachuw aajese, aajeheching namnang aliipehe.
Ajiiga chiinche laarchangpahe engkhejege waajeer ttongthohehing Johon athengmaalhiele amin thangbesaga.
Engkhejege Ninnuw ing rhuwtenuwbe ama thengvang atechuw Elijahga.
Aana eparching rongeresie!
“Changgechuw amaching heve misienhelina minttiivate amachuw Kithiir amhinna nepangheching engkhele engkhe ing eenhege eongtho enghaaga.
‘Kinnuw ing tumla narotum ing kintuwmga, nangche laammaachiige, belung ijapaa kingongle nimbelung minjamaachuw.’
Ajiigachiinche Johon ing isaaeen tulu ing ithengga, amana emmenieching arhier, ‘ama ronham ing apuhga.’
Mi sapaching sage eenge itheng engkhejege emmenieing arhier, ‘isiikha aatuhethoh, khachana ekhuwm hetho baarorhege beruwhege!’ Changgechuw evier sitiheching anongching atataachuw amindangga.”
Ama enhuwte Jesu ing ittii shuwpaa nong atu pihe khupuwbekhe ching embelung ahoungmaataana asehhe.
“Jasathaaruw khorazin, Bethseida, Jasaruw! ajiegachiinche minhingna ishuw ittiishuw nonghechuw Tirele Sidonnhingna shuhniebe bora pien serheniege amana lungvuw entehheniege belung houngvang atega.
Changgechuw ninnhingna kerhierga, waajeer atu enienachingbe Tirele Sidonna eongheching khaangche vatehe.

Eengkhejege Kapernauwm nang, nangche minven epha eethohvang atega? Nangbe longkong ipha ttumvangniete; ajiegachienche nanhingna ittiishuw ketu nong bekhekha Sodomna ishuhgeniebe, atenie ipha Sodomchuw uwmvang atega.
Changgechuw kerhierchuwga, amachuwbe waajeer etu eniena nang ithi ing Sodompaamching khaangchevate.”

Chaleching Jesu ing arhier, “kemimpaasaanachie Epa, Thangvenle simriipaam Aapuw, ajietunaching hevebekhehie evierhenhingna, engkhejege aminghuwhe nhingna thuwrchiige aeauwmkha nedounghe nhingna emphuwng se.
Uwng, Epa, hanghin eenrhuwpihgechie.

“Hevebekhehii Epa ing iminsernachiege; amana a Mapa maaniege a Sapachuw achuwdonging minghuhmaa, engkhejege a Sapachuw engkhejege asapanhingna mindangning atechuwmaaniege amaapachuw achuwdong ing minghuwmaa.
“Ijapaaing thapaa shuchuwge pee erhiihpaa irinhe kenhingte thengruw, engkhejege kieing ningjaachuw betthumpihvanggechuw.
Kerongkorchuw rinnuwng kenu minjieruw; ajiegachiinche kiebe kebelung edehga; engkhejege ninchipina ijachuw kha bethuwmsavangninte.
Ajiegachiinche kerongkorbe lepaane kepeerhiichuw yaangne.”
Chove aphanaching Jesu ing Eongna eniena shaangkaarna enghungsile, asepohheching invin ttaamge shaangchuw bejiihege asaahe.
Pharisiheching emmhuwtaana Jesunhingna arhier, “ebeerruw, nasepo heching Eongnaeniena tumaavang ichii atupehe.”
Amaing eennheengna arhier, “David ing aalhanghethoh emvin attamle atuhekha nimpamaaga?
Amaing Thangnhang eensuwngte valhuhge khorpuw hepanging savang ate tal emmenieing isaa arhuwmaa asaahekha.
Engkhejege Eongnaeniena khourpuwpuwheching Thangnhang eensuwngna valhuwhege Eongnaeniechuw bekhiehejenie enlaarmaaga atechuw waajeer ttongthona pamaachuw.
Ninnhingna khehiirga, Thangnhang een enthiing elhuwng engkhe hena ongne.
Changqechuw ningsie belung arinchuw kidiega, minlhen pihchuw aedemaaing, heve ttonghie ninnuw ing mingmhuwtenuwbe emmaraar eawmmaahechuw minlaar maavang nintega.
Ajiegachiinche, Mi Sapachin Eongna enieje aapuwga.”
Amhinchuw bethinge mi aangkongna khuwngsang te valhuwse.
Suwr ing aki ethie pesar engkhe eheong, engkhejege emmenieing asiihe, “Eongna eniena amintthaahie waajeer ing arhuga?” Hanghin amin laarnachuw ajonghe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing zou engkhepang adeen amachuw Eongna eniena ungkoungte bonieche naki ing bechuwteniege hingkimaatenie?
Michuwbe zou ithi ing amin elumaakhang? Chonaching Eongna eniena ittha nong etu rhuwmaakhang?”
Ama enhuwna pesarnhingnachin arhier, “naben mingken” amaing amingkenpe, engkhejege aminthaape, ethaa engkhekhang khin.
Changgechuw Pharisiheching jungshuwhege ajiekhangkhin memaangteruw tehege entanasehe.
Jesu ing aminghutaa naching lintaangte engkese, miruwhpuw heching aanhuw jiihege enabekheje chuw amindam pipe.
Engkhejege mihenhingna mindangmaaru tege abetthoh.
Amana Laarchangpa Isaiah nhingna aminrhier chuw alir asuwnaga.
“Ebeerruw, kieing keeturbesa mine,
Kebelungriiring arhuwpaa,
Kening Keminsii anhingna Kechipichuw thaarvanggie,
engkhejege amaching mi Yaati lintaangte ittha waajeer chuw minthangvate.
Amaing Kechepaaga teniege hintaarmaanie,
aeuwngje uwngmaanie, achuwdong ing lhampuna aaruwl thiemaanie.
Achihna waajeerchuw aviemaataang,
aariihbesa phuwrbourchuw khiehmaa lhienie,
amana mhikhuw euwm tosije ichuwmaanie.
Engkhejege aromhingna lintaang yaatiheching mindeensavatehe.”
Chalechin ronham ing apuwh, amhee echuw, aaruwlje ishuwhmaa virhiehege amintthaa cherpe, aaruwlje suwhse, emhuwje aphape.
Mi ruwpuwheching emmhuwtaana inlu liimge arhierhe, “David sapa chuw raraaga?”
Changgechuw Pharisi heching athietaanaching, emmenie ing arhier, “Amahie Belzebul, ronham aapuw chuwmaaniege aethor chemaanie.”
Emmenieing immindeenchuw minghuwge arhier, Erunwglepaa bekeching enjeh maaheniebe ijeh cheervatehe, engkhejege khuwpubekheching kiichernie che eengkuw bekhe hechuw paarchemaa henie.
Seitaanching seitaanhechuw thorniebe engkaarna kiichervate, changnieche alepaachuw ajiekhang paarvate.
Kieing Belzebul paangkar ing ronhamhechuw thorningche ninnuw ronham aathor heching emmeniechuw athorgehena? Changeniebe emmenieing nintaalina waajeer aapuw unshuvatehe.
Changgechuw kieing Thangnhang Chipi apaarnaching ronhamhechuw thorningche Thangnhang lepaachuw ninnhingna ethengga.
Amachuw maaniege eperpaa achuw engkhe eenna achuw engkhe valhuwniege phiernieche apih aseh liemaanieche ajiekhang sihche chervate? Aphiernhuw leching pihsechuw aberuchega.
Achuw engkhe kenhingna eongmaaching oungrhumaaga, engkhejege kietho oungchummaa hechuwbe enjehchervatehe,
changtanaching ninnhingna kerhierga, mi isi kha itthamaa khuw atongbekhe ekuhpi phasavate,
changgechuw Chipi Enthieng taalina ittonghechuwbe lolhiepaamnaje hungvievang ateleje kuhpeemaanie.
“Thingbour engkhejege aanrachuw mindangruw, amamaanieche thingbourje aanraje itthamaachuw mindangruw; ajiegachiinche thingbourchuw aanrachin amindangga.
Ninnuw Beruwr misienhe! Nang natthaamaaching ittha ettong nachega? Nabeloung sungna namindeenching nanhering aehangttonggechie?
Ittha minhingna ittha iriibuwr tena ittha pih abesuwga, engkhejege itthamaa michin itthamaa iriibuwrtena itthamaa ahimbesuwga.
“Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, ichamaa ttong aatongbekhe waajeer iniena pechervang ategehe.
Ajiegachiinche navattong taalina chuwmnechie ate engkhejege nattongheching nangchuw alaarpe atechuw emindangvate.”
Chalechin thiimdeehele Pharisi heching thenghege anhingna arhier “Thiimpuw, nanhingtena bietimna engkhe mhuwning kintena.”
Changgechew amaing abesang, “ithaamaa engkhejege naamaa etu misienheching bietimna nong ajonggehe, changgechuw laarchangpa Jonanhingna bietim nachuw maaniege engkhedonging mindangmaanie.
Ajiegachiinche Jonaing nga elhuwngpaa vinsuwngna yen siem inie nethuwm inthin khangkhing Mi sapaje yen siim enie nethuwm lolhiesuwngte inthinvate.

Ninevehna eongheching waajeer eniena heve misienhethoh hangniirheniege engkhejege minlaar vatehe, changgechuw Jonaing Zelha aminjaamle belung ehounghe engkhejege ibeerruw, hena Jona ithi ing elhuwng ongne.

Chietitena Ruwngnuwching waajeer iniena heve misienhethoh hangniirheniege minlaarvate; ajiegachienche amaing simriipaam engkhetena Solomon avierna thiegete tege ethengga; ibeerruw, henahing Solomon ithi ing ilhuwng engkhe ongne!
“Ibour chipiching mi engkhetena ahungshuwche aja mindena jongge chii aeummaakaarna bevege, changechuw phamaase.
Inhuwte ataaing arhier, ‘kieing kihuwngshuwna amhinteching eenligete,’ ahuwngeenliche amhinchuw ruwhse, rhuwhege inthiingjehchuw amhuwpe.
Ateche amaing vage ama ithi ing itthamaa chipi lintaang sarii hinrhiege, valhuwhege ongsehe; ama michuw attuhtatenaching amenna ithi ing tthamaase. Khang echiing etthamaa misienhelinanaje suwvate.”
Hanghin ichiin mi ruhpuwhe kaarna atongle amanule auwaneheching unteuphuwte tehege taangna eniirhe.
Achuw engkheching anhingna arhier, “ibeer nangnuwle naneheching nanhingna rhierning entetaana taangna niirnehe.”
Aarhierpa nhingnaching Jesu ing arhier, “achuwhechuw Kemanuw amana keu kenega?”
Engkhejege sepoh hechuw minthiege arhier, “hevehehie aena engkhejege keu kenegehe!
Achuw chuwgejenie Thangvenna eong Ipaching amindeen aatubekhechuw keu kenega engkhejege kesar engkhejege kemanuwga.”
Ama inienarahching eensungtena hungshuwge riimchie kurna ongse.
Mi aruhpuwching Jesu kourna engkonghege chaleching rukuwng taalite hangkarge siiphiena eonghe.
Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna aanttiimna ttong enhimpaa arhierpihe, amaing arhier, “rongeruw! Sachii evor mi engkhe ing sachie evor sise.
Engkhejege tepieching lhampuna boge, vatiheching aachumcherpe.
Lintaangching per aeuwmpaamaa lhungkaarna buwse, lolhiechuw minthumaage enrang-ing mhuwngse.
Inie ahangsuh che juwrse engkhejege arojung pechemaage ttongse.
Tepieching ilhingkaarna boge, elhingchuw ahanglhuwngche athehcherpe.
Changgechuw lintaangching lolhie entaana boge aanrachuw roza engkhe, lintanchin suwmruwh, alhehching sumthuwm aanra uwmse.
Aana euwmching thieresie!”
Chaleching asepohheching thenghege asii, “ajietuna ennhingna ttongttiim ttong narhierga?”
Ama ing abesang, “Ninnhingna thangven lepaa unruwh nongchuw aminghuwnaching kepigechuw, changgechuw ennhiingnabe pemaaing.
Achuw engkhe adeensehnhingna ching pevate, ama-ing ithiseh deenvate; changgechuw aadeenmaahe nhingna euwmbekhe liecher vate.
Hevelinahin ennhingna ttongttiiming kerhierga, ajiegachienche, emmenieing ibeerhejenie mhuwmaahe, rongehejenie thiemaahe, engkhejege minghuwchemaahe.
‘Isaiah ing arhierchuw alir asuwpe:
‘Ninnuw ing rongerim vangninte changgechuw minghuw maatenuw;
engkhejege ebeerchuwbe ebeervangninte,
changgechuw nimvaakhar walhuwmaanie.
Heve mihe belungrier jungdourse,
engkhejege ingngeenaching ronge chemaahe,
engkhejege immhi aasiingpehe,
engkheje immhee ing mhuwchemaahe,
engkhejege ingngeenajeeng thiemaasehe,
ajiina ichiingche amingmhuw chenachuw uwmmaaniege emmenie endamnaing vaanlehmaahenie.’
“Changechuw nimmhuwtaana ninrepaa tthane, ajiegachienche nimmhuwpe, ningngeenaching ninthie chepe.
Atataah kerhierga Laarchangpa hele dharmo icherheching nimmhuw khangkhin mhuwning ategehe changgechuw mhuwmaase, engkhejege thiening atejechuw thiemaasehe.
“Chogenieche saachii evorna ttonghie rongeruw.
Achuw engkheing Thangven lepaa khuwchuw thieniege, amaing aming humaataanaching itthamaaching thengge amhuwchuw aliidohpe; lhamna ibow saachii chuw amachuwga.
Chona lhuwngkaarna ibouchuwche rongege arotha rhoing aalhaangpe,
changgechuw arojung apimaataana amongpang khaangge; changgechew hevelinahing ijachaam, apha taanchana akhii minsiige tiehse.
Ilhing kaarna ibouching ttongchuw rongege, changgechuw simriipaam waakhar, lerchii phaning atetaana betheemge aanrah uwmmaase.
Ittha lolhiena ebouching ttongchuw rongege amingmhuw, amaing atataa aanrah uwmge, lintaangching roza engkhe, sumruh engkhejege sumthum ithiing enrase.”
Amaing lintaang ttongttiim apihe. “Thangven lepaachuw phelhiena ittha sachie avorthoh enghaaga.
Changgechuw enjaartherle itthamaahe ching thenghege saang kaarnaching phuwrmhuw vorge engkese.
Amhuwchuw hangsiinge aanra ahungngumle phuwr emhuwngje endangse.
Engkhejege een aapuwhe suwheching anhingna vage arhier, ‘Aapuw, nang ing ittha amhuw navor maakhang? Chogenieche phuwr emhuwng hie ajii tunaga?’
Amaing anhingna arhier, ‘itthamaaheching hangchie atuga. Minehe ching anhingna arhier, kinnuwing amachuw mingkonggungte’
Changgechuw amaing abesang, maa, chovechuw ninngeephi tanaching saangje ephivangninte.

Saangkuwmpha aphamaataang mhuwnghaaheresie, Saangkuwmphana aakhuwmhe nhingna rhierningge, phuwrchuw mensaa iphinuwng atouhing phiernuwng mhisuwngte abethuna seruw, changgechuw saangchuwbe aetuwmte mingkongruw!”
Amaing lintaang ttongttiimje apihe, “thangven lepaachuw achuw engkheing inttammhuwchuw alhiena avorthoh enghaaga.
Chovechuw isiingseh amhuwga, changgechuw ahanglhungche thing esiinghekaarna elhuwngseh thingchuw oungshuwse, chona vatiheching entaalina enrovuw ahuwpehe.”
Amaing lintaang ttongttiimje atongpihe; “Thangven lepaachuw nepenuw engkheing chor viliege jaam chaang unthuwmtho mimvege aangkheng apurmaataang athin chortho enghaaga.”
Jesu ing mi ruwpuwchuw hevebekhe ttongttiimhie arhierpihe, amaing ttongttiim maaniege ajiidong ttongmaa.
Hevehehie laarchangpa heching arhierbesachuw alir asuhnaga.
“Kieing kenher imhongningge ttongttiim tongvang gie;
simriipaam abetthiim pelena oungthur bekheje minthangvanggie.”
Chona miruhpuw hechuw mage een engkhete valhuwse. Engkhejege asepohheching aenhinghege arhier, “lhelena phuwr emhuwng ttongchuw emindangpiruw.”
Amaing abesang, “Ittha amhuw aavorchuw Mi Sapaga;
Lhelechuwbe lolhiepaamga engkhejege ittha amhuwchuw eruwng lepaa sitigehe; phuwr amhuwchuwbe echamaa sitigehe.
Engkhejege itthamaa amhuw avorhechuwbe saitaanga, saang akuwmchuwbe lolhiepaam attuhnaga engkhejege aakuwmhechuwbe thangven michiergehe.
Hanghin ichiin phuwrhechuw mingkongheniege mhisuwngte bethuvate, lolhiepaam attunaje khangkhinvate.
Mi sapaching thangven michierhechuw jibethinniege, eruwng lepaa suwngna isii kha atuhe engkhejege itthamaa atuhechuw mingkongwate.
Engkhejege mhisuwngnaching bethuvate, amana inghah iriirheniege ttaavatehe.
Dhormo icherheching eruwng A Mapa lepaanaching eniekhangkhing lengvatehe. Aana euwmching rongeresie.
“Thangven lepaachuwbe lerchii lhelena athurthoh, enghaaga, achuw engkheing Chovechuw vateuhge athuwr; changching arotha rhosage adeenbekhe jurge lhiechuw aaliepe.
“Avonhie, thangven lepaachuwbe lallon aatupaching amin elupaa mukta ajongtho enghaaga.
Amin elupaa muktachuw ateuhtaana ching engkege adeenbekhe jurge aalienape.
“Avonhie, thangven lepaachuwbe aechaa riimchiena vadeengge lintaang lintaang nga enhimpaa asurpe;
Aasiekungtaanaching siephiete hingkige ongge, itthachuw beluwna thaarge itthamachuw alhien.
Khangkhin ichiin attuhna enienaching suwvate, thangven michierhe thengheniege itthamaa hechuw dhormo icherkaartena mintthe henwate.
Engkhejege mhikouwm ittuwngsuwngte lhinvate amhin naching enghah iriirheniege ttaavatehe.
“Hevebekhehie nimminghuwpe?” Emmenieing besanghege, “Uwng,”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Chotanaching thiimdee bekheing thangven eruwng lepaana aanchuw ouwngsuwhege itharle belu lerchiibourchuw een aapuwching isuwge euwmthoh enghaaga.”
Jesu ing heve ttongttiim bekhe arhiernhuwte amhin apimpe.
Ate amaing apaamte engkege khuwngsang bekhena aminchuwhe, engkhejege mihe chin oungluw liimge arhier, Pesar hevehing ittiishuwpaa nong atu engkhejege evierna hii akhuwna aphaga?
Heve mihie thing nong atu mistri sapamaaga? Amanuwche Mary maakhang? Engkhejege Jakob, Joseph engkhejege Simon amana Judas hehie au-ane maakhang?
Engkhejege asarheje aekaarna eongmaakhang? Ajiikhang hevebekhehie aphaga?
Engkhejege ningjaa apipehe, changgechuw Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Laarchangpa chuw enlepaana engkhejege aeenkuw sungna aejasamaahe.”
Engkhejege enthachamaadehtaana ittiishuw nong enhimpaa tumaase.
Cheleching Herod Eruwng ing Jesu khuchuw thiege,
engkhejege aminehe nhingna arhier, “Hevemihii Johon chiiluh paga, aethie kaartena ehangrhinga, changtanaching ittiisuwpaa nong hii atuchega.”
Ajiena ateinche Herod ing anepa Philip alumhee Herodiaslina Johonchuw suwrge mikhwum sungna akhuwmga.
Ajiegachiinche Johon ing anhingna arhier, “ama nepenuwhie nang ing ibie waajiir ing rhumaa.”
Herod ing thehning tejenie mihechuw attiepe, ajiegachiinche emmenieing amahie laarchangpaga tehege arhugehe.
Changgechuw Herod aberhingna eniechuw viege, Herodia asanuwching laamge Herod chuw aning aminchii che,
changjemeh anhiebekhechuw pevanggete tege eperpaa ttongneer arhierpe.
Aminchinche amanuwing anhingna arhier, “chiilupa Johon losechuw aelang engkhena thin ing epare.”
Eruwngchuw abelung japaajenie asaahaahe mhekuwngna attongnierchuw irhuwmaa rhuwmaage chovechuw pere tege arhierpe.
Amaing mi vicheerge Johon losechuw amintinpe,
Alose chuw aelang engkhena lunghaa nhingnaching pege amanuwnhingna ahinchipe.
Asepohheching ithie ahuwmchuw aedumhege arhiepehe, ateche Jesu nhingte wahege atongpehe.
Ate Jesu ing amachuw athieche rukuwnglina Karge edeh paam engkhete pierge sise, changgechuw miruhpuwching athie taanaching khupuwtena ingkhi ing vahege ajiepehe.
Siiphiete ahoungche amaing ruwpuwhechuw amhuwche aning minsiige aenabekhechuw amintthape.
Kholhie ahungvietana sepoheching thenghege arhier, “hevehie idepaa rampaga, aphaje therse; mibekhehie aesa eenna ajongna bethin here.”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “engkemaaheresie, ninnuw ing aesaaphuwchuw peruw.”
Emmenieng abesanghe, “Tal rongale nga ennhiipang uwmthane, ajiidong uwmmaa.”
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “amachuw kenhingte vichiruw.”
Chona amang changjemeh michuw phuwr tahlina ameongna arhierpe, Tal rongale nga ennhiichuw viliege, thangven ibeerge bor apipe, amana bekhiege sepohechuw pege mibekhenhingna asimpipehe.
Engkhejege sasuwhege emvin vase, engkhejege abelhie akierhechuw amingkongheche beluh summalhie ennhii siihse.
Engkhejege aesah emvehechuw nepenu nepang emvelung pesarpang chiing rongaga.
Chaleraaching sepohechuw rukuwng taalite mingkarge mi ruhpuwhe aangkhengtho enrhiing mensahege raarkhete hesi sehe.
Engkhejege mibekhechuw abethinnhute bounglite ithamna hangkarse; kholhie avietaanaching athienening ongse.
Changgechuw thie arhaangtaanaching rukuwngchuw chiikur endahte chiiching aminluhpe.
Engkhejege yiengnaching jesu ing akhi ing rimchietaalina evasi.
Changgechuw sepoheching Thangpachuw emmhuw taana aettehege enrhier, “amahie erehga” tehege aettehege ongsehe.
Changgechuw chaleraaching Jesu ing hangttongge ennhingna arhier, “nimbeluwng ngamresie, kieging, aettemaaruw.”
Piter ing abesang, “Thangpa nanggetenieche nanhingte kevaana ttongtho epepisare.”
Thangpaing arhier, “vah.” Chonaching Piter ing rukuwngtena ttumge chiilina Jesunhingte vase.
Changgechuw thie aerhaangchuw amhuwche ittise, chiisungte borong atepe, “uwnge,” “Thangpa ikarsare!”
Chaleraaching jesu ing aben vihjamge bechuwge anhingna arhier, “nang nathacha euwmmaa, ajietuna nabelung irhiigechie?”
Rukuwnglite eeng karle thiechuw vadese.
Engkhejege rukuwngsuwngna eongheching rumhege enrhier, “atataa nanghie Thangnhang Sapagechie.”
Emmenieing raarkhete elenhege Genesarette ttumsehe.
Ama paamchuw emvatungle mibekeching rotha kuwrhege apaam mihechuw ttong bethahege enabekhechuw anhingna avirhiihe.
Engkhejege emmenieing aapienbetha apar arhruwnachuw anhiihe, engkhejege aaperbekhe chuw damse.
Chaleching Jerusalemtena pharisihele, thiimdee heching Jesu nhingna thenghege arhier,
“Ajiituna nasephoheching upahe poraa bekhiehege emmenieing buw ensaaphana ingki aatthiemaagehe?”
Amaing ennhingna abesang, “Engkhejege ninnuwjeng Thangnhang ttongtho chuw ninporaa yaarna nimbekhiiga?
Ajiina ate inche Thangnhang ing arhier, ‘nangnuw nangpahechuw aejare,’ engkhejege ‘achuw engkheing amapa changmaanieche amanuwchuw itthamaa ttonging beniebe therimvate.’
Changgechuw ninnuw ing rhiertenuwge achuw engkheing amapa engkhejege amanuwnhingna rhierniege, ‘kinnuw ing kimbumbekhehing Thangnhangte kimpiga!’ Chotaanaching ama michin amapachuw aajamaaga.
Chonaching nimporaa yaarna Thangnhang ttongchuw liemaasechuw.
Ninnuw itthachaang etuhe! Isaiah ing atataa ningkhuw lina arhierbesaga.
Miheching kiechuw ennherpang ing thang iyahege,
changgechuw embelungriir chuw kenhingtena endahpaane.
Ngarheing kiechuw oungrumnahe,
mee ing poraa amana entaasaa dhormochuw aminchuwnaahe.
Ama enhuwna mi ruwpuwhechuw eenhege, ennhingna arhier, “rongenuwng minghuwruw.
Beshungte elhuwching michuw memaangmaa, changgechuw anheerna ehuwngsuw ching mi amemaangga.”
Chona sepoheching amachuw enhinghege, arhier, “Pharisihe ching heve ttonghie athie taanaheching ingkhi aminsiepehe atechuw naminghuwse?”
Amaing abesang, “Thangven Ipaching abetthemaa thingbour bekhechuw iphichervate.”
“Enthenen ongheresie emmeniehie immhi chuwge mhee chuwhechuw arhiegehe. Engkhejege mheechuw engkheing mheechuw engkhechuw rhieniebe aannhii ing uwngkuwngte bovatehe.”
Changgechuw Piter ing anhingna arhier, “ama ttongttiimchie eminchuwsaruw.”
Chonaching amaing arhier, “ninnuwjeng atephana nimminghuw maalhiega?
Besuwngte elhuwching peebourte lhuwge, engkhejege touwring ashuw maakhang?
Changgechuw nheerna ehuwngshuwchuw belungrier tena ehuwngshuwga, engkhejege choveching amimbourga.
Ajiegachiinche belungriertena echamaa amindeen hechuwbe, mitheh, naamaa etu, nepenuw pesar ka alaar, oungruw, amamaa saarkhie epih, etthamaapang ittong.
Hevehehing michuw amimbuwrga, changgechuw akih itthiiluwng asaching mi amemaang maaga.”
Jesu ing amhinchuw bethinge Tire le Sidon paamte valhuwse.
Chalerahching Kanantena nepenuw engkhe ama paamtena ethengching uwngge, “Naning eminsiisare, David Sapa Thangpa; kesanuw chuw ronham ing aminjapaana.”
Changgechuw amaing nepenuwchuw besangmaase, Engkhejege asepoheching thenghege betthohege enrhier, “nepenuwhie mingkere, ajiegachienche enhingna aeuwmpang uwngne.”
Amaing abesang, “Kiehie Israel siti emmobesa zouhe rutumpang ing.”
Changgechuw nepenuwching thengge akhiruwkhuw phinsage arhier, “Thangpa, ebuwmsare.”
Amaing abesang, “Nepangheching savang ichii buwchuw utikaarna elhin etthamaaga.”
Nepenuwching abesang, “uwng, Thangpa, utihejeng aapuwhe buw asa ajiembebuw akiirhechuw asaana.”
Chonaching Jesu ing nepenuwchuw abesang, “Nepenuw, nathacha uwmpaane, nanging namindeenchuw phasare.” Engkhejege chalerahching asanuwchuw damse.
Ama enhuwna Jesu ing amhinchuw bethinge Galile riimchie kurte wage, bounglite karge ongse.
Mi ruhpuw chuw thenghege, akhii aebong, akih ethiehe, amhih ichuw, attong eshuhmaa, lintaangje vihrhiehege abuwmna mintorhege, engkhejege amintthaape.
Hanghin mi ruwpuwhechin attong eshuwmaing evattong, akhih ebong ing isi acheh, amhih echuwheching amhuwchuw amhuwheche oungluw liimge Israelhe Thangnhangchuw amimpaapehe.

Chaleching Jesu ing sepohechuw eenge arhier, “Ajiikhang rampa kaarnahing hangjehmeh enhim mihehie kemhuwtaana kening keminsiinaahe, emmenieing kietho enie nethuwm onghaauwngge enshaphuw uwmaase; lhamlena vinttaam theheniege tiehvatehe.”
Sepoheching anhingna arhier, “Ajiekhangkhing heve ramkangnahing hangjehmeh enhim mihechuw buw epi chevateruwkhang?”
Jesu ing ennhiingna arhier, “Tal ejemeh nindeense?” emmenieng abesang, “Tal aseh sariele nga tepii thane.”
Mi ruwpuwhechuw emmhinnaching ongruw ate.
Amaning tal sariele ngachuw viliege, Thangnhangchuw mimpaage, bekhiege sepoh henhingna avipeepe, sepoh heching amachuw asimpehe.
Engkhejege mibekheching sahege emvin vasehe; engkhejege abelhie akiirhechuw amingkongheche belu sarii siikangse.
Amana theh asahechuw pesar roza milliega, lintaangchuwbe nepenuhele nepanggehe.
Ruhpuwhechuw immingkenhuwte, amaing rukuwngte hangkarge engkhejege Magadan paamte huwngse.”
Pharisihe engkhejege Saddusi heching thenghege Jesuchuw chaang aambiirnaing thangventena bietimnachuw eminrthie atehe.
Amaing abesang, “Kholhie vieniebe, ninnuw ing ninrhier, ‘mimven sinne, khuw suwrmaanie.’

Engkhejege yiengnache, ‘ateniebe minvenhie sinne thie rhaangvate engkhejege enttiina uwmne,’ Ninnuw ing minven ebeerchuwge ayie shuhvate shuhmaanie atechuw nimminghuwse, changgeehuw apha eniechuwbe ajiekhang thengvate minghuwmaachuw.
Aetthamaa engkhejege naamaa etuheching, bietimnachuw ajongnaahe, changgechew Jonalina ishuwkha maaniege bietimnachuw epemaanie.” Ama enhuwna Jesu ing mahege engkese.
Sepohheching raarkhete emvaache, tal aesaaphuw irin abeherpehe.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Pharisi hele Saddusihe chorlina enriimsaruw.”
Emmenieeng engkhele engkhe enrhierhege, “hevehie enieing tal iriinmaataana gesiete.”
Engkhejege, amachuw minghuwge Jesu ing arhier, “Thacha eveh ninnuhe, ajietuna tal auwmmaataana aettonggechuw?”
“Ate ephaing nimmhuwmaaga? Mi roza ronga heching tal rongachuw sahege beluw ijehme nimmingkongkha che?
Tal sarieching mi roza millie, amana beluw ajeh nimmingkong?
Kieing ama taalina ettongmaaging ichiehie nimminghuw maa lhiega? Pharisihele Sadukihe chorlina enriimsaruw!”
Chonaching talle chorlina maaga, changgechuw pharisi hele Saddusihe aminchuw ttongchuwga tehege aminghuwpehe.
Ate Jesu ing Kesaria Philippi ramte houngse, sepoh hechuw asiehe, “Achuw ing Mi Sapachuw achuwga atenahe?”
“Engkhejege emmenieing arhier, alheheching Johon chiilumpaga, lintaangheching Elijahga, engkhejege lintaanheching Jeremiaga changmanieche laarchangpaga.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “changgenieche ninnuwing achuwga entenaachuw?”
Simon Piter ing abesang, “Nangbe irhing Thangnhang Sapa Khristagechie.”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Jona sapa Simon nang narepaa tthane, ajiegachiinche thangvenna aeong Ipamaaniege thiele bechiitena nahimphuwngmaaga.”
Engkhejege nanhingna Kerhierga, nanghie Pitergechie, engkhejege lhuwnglinahin kieing ruhchangchuw himmeniervanggete, engkhejege noroh sowngching amachuw namchemaanie.
Kieing Thangven lepaa chapi pevanggechie; simrii paamna naphierkha thangvennaje emphiervate, engkhejege simriipaamna nabejohchuw Thangvennaje enjohvate.”
Chonaching Thangpaing ama Aantinpaga ichiehie achuw nhingnadong rhier maaruw tege sepoh hechuw eperpaa ttongtho apeepe.

Ama aphana bettiimge, Jesu ing asepohenhingna Jerusalemte hangniege khorpuw elhunghe, upahe, amana thiimdeehe keelina ijachaam phaniege thehwatehe, engkhejege enie nethumna hangrhingvang atechuw ahimmindangpe.
Engkhejege, Piter ing anhingna enhiengge, isehge arhier, “Thangnhang ing rhuwmaa Thangpa! Nanhingna shuw maaresie.”

Changgechuw, amaing vaanlege Piter nhingna arhier, “Kepaangna ongmaa, saitan! Nanghie kikhi minsiinavang ate migechie, ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing amindeenchuw kharmaachie, changgechuw tepanging akharchuw nakharga.”
Chona Jesu ing asepohenhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing kinhuw jiigete teniebe, ataachuw rhuwluing athingkher chuw rinsing ijiiresie.
Ajiegachiinche achipi karsaning ateching maangvate, engkhejege, arhingrier kiekhuwlina maangsaniebe tuwsavete.
Ajiigachiinche mi engkheing simriipaam aadiebekhe phaniege, achipichuwche ajiethoh minteh vate? Changmanieche arhingriechuw ajii tho mintevatehe?
Ajiegachiinche Mi Sapaching a Mapa athang alaarthoh, thangven michierthoching juwngvate, engkhejege amaing ataa ataaing atu enhuw ijiing pevate,
Atatah kerhierga, hevena eniir mi tepie hing Mi Sapa ching aaruwng lepaa itheng amhuw maataang ithiechuw mintinmaanie.”
Enie neru aanhuwte Jesu ing Piter, Jakob, engkhejege anepa Johon chuw rhiihege engkaangpaa bounglite enthenen karsehe.
Engkhejege aruwngsin uwmvuwrge, amheje eniekhangkhin lengse, apiendiirje ewaarje inliming enthongse.
Minmhuw minghalu ing Mosile Elijah enlaarge emmenietho aettonghe.

Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, henahing paarmeniebe tthavate; nang ing rhuwteniebe, kieng epaarna amhin unthuwm tusagete, engkhechuw naroum, engkhechuw Mosi rotum, chona engkhechuw Elijah rotuwm.”
Changching attongle, minghuw minghalu ing elengjeh ruduwching mingkhuwmhege rudow kaartena eruwr ching ahinrhier, “Amahie keningkemminsii kesapaga, anhingna kening chimne attongrhier rongeruw.”
Sepohheching thiehege, lolhiena tiesehe engkhejege enttiiching achepehe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing thengge perhege arhier, “hangthieruw aettemaaruw.”
Engkhejege emmenieing aabiirheche, Jesu maaniege achuw dong mhuwmaasehe.
Hanghin boungte enjungttumle, Jesu ing ennhiingna ttongtho apihe, “heve mhirovaam mhimhuw hii Mi Sapaching ethietena ahangrhingmaatang achuw nhingnadong rhiermaaruw.”
Engkhejege sepoh heching ennhingna asiehe, “ajietuna, chogenieche, thiimdee heching Elijah mensang thengvate atemaaga?”
“Amaing abesang, Elijah thengrimvate engkhejege euwm bekhe mintharvate.
Changgechuw kerhierga, Elijahchuw mensa ethengbesaga, enkhejege amaga ichii minghumaahe, changgechuw tuning entebekhe atahlina atuhe, chonachin Mi Sapaje inkilina ijachaam phavate.”
Chotaana sepohheching Johon Baptist khu atongga tehege amingmhuwpehe.
Miruhpuwhe nhingte ahoungle, mi engkhe thengge, amana akhiruwkhuw phinge,
engkhejege arhier, “kesapahie naning minsiisare, ama rongor ing kige ijapaang ongne, mhinaje, chiisuongteje ebuwchaaga.
Engkhejege kieng sepohhenhingte kevirhiega, changgechuw mintthaa chemaahe.”
Jesu ing abesang, “Ninthacha euwmmaa engkhejege echaamaa misienhe, ejemeh apha isi ing ninnuwtho onghaavang ketega? Ama hevete virhieruw.”
Chona Jesu ing ronham chuw arukuwpe, engkhejege chalerahching pesartichuw damse.
Chona sepohheching athienen aongle thenghege, enrhier, “ajietuna kinnuw ing kinthorchemaaga?”

Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ninthacha auwmmaataanaga, ajie gachiinche atataa minnhingna kerhierga, ninnuw ing inttammhuwpang thachatenuwbe, heve bounghii, amhin engkhete insinre tetenuwje insinvate, engkhejege ajiidong tuchemaavang ate uwmmaanie.”
Changgechuw hangchiehie hinthamniege vinttaam etongmaaniege suwh chemaa.
Emmenieing Galilina ingngeengkongle, Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Mi Sapachuw mikilite lhinrong atenaahe,
engkhejege thehvatehe engkhejege enie anemin thumna hangrhingvate.” Engkhejege emmenieching embelung enhimpaa jasehe.
Kapernauwm emvatungche, Thangnhang een khachana ekhuwmheching Piternhingna vahege arhier, “ninthiimpuw ing Thangnhang een khachana apimaaga?”

Amaing arhier, “Uwng, apiga” amaing aeente ahungkele Jesu ing amachuw mensa asii, “Ajii nimmindeense, Simon? Simriipaam eruwngheching achuwnhingtena rampaar changmanieche khachana aliegehe? Insitihe nhingtenagemo changmaanieche lintaangtenaga?”
Piter ing abesang, “lintaangtenaga,” Jesu ing anhiingna arhier, “Chogenieche sitihechuw ningvesangsehe,

changgejenie, emmeniechuw enieing khih eminsiina maaing riimchiete vanung nga vakiruw, mensa nashuwrchuw hinki, engkhejege abechuw mingkaar, nang ing sheer tuvangniete; amachuw chinuwng narotumle kerotumchuw pere.”
Chove aphanaching sepoheching thenghege, asiihe, “achuwche Thangnhang Eruwng lepaana elhungsehga?”
Amaing nedounghechuw vaeenge engkaarna mengongge arhier,
Atataah kerhierchuwga, ninnuw ing enteh maatenuwge engkhejege nedounghe khangkhin uwmaatenube thangven lepaa lhumaadetenuw.
Achuw chuwgejenie nedounghe khangkhin belung edoung euwmchechuw thengven lepaana elhuwngsega.
Achuwchuwgejenie hangchie nedounghechuw keromhingna rotha kurniebe kiechuw rotha oungkurga.
“Achuw engkheing kie enthacha nedounghechuw ingkhi minsiina tuheniebe ariingna elhuwngpaa saang suwhnalhung bekhiniege riimchie unthuhpaana abebuwching etthasega.
Isiicher lolhiepaamna auwmtaanaching jasaruw. Heve bekhehie ishuwmaa maaga, changgechuw khi minsiina atuhechuw jasaruw.”

“Naki engkhejege nakhi ing khih minsiivang ategeniebe, chovechuw tinbong ing lhinre; naki ennhie, nakhi ennhieing ittiim inemaa mhisuwngte elhinvang ate geniebe, naki changmaanieche nakhi engkhe ibonging erhingnate elhuhching tthane.
Engkhejege namhee ing nakhi minsii vang ategeniebe, liejoh ing lhin; namhi ennhiing noroh mhisuwngte lhuwvang ate geniebe, namhi engkhepanging irhingna aphachin tthasehne.”

“Enriimruw, heve esniingsehenhingna engkhechuw na esinmaa tumaaruw, ajiegachiinche; kieing ninnhiengna kerhierga, thangven lepaana eong thangven michierheching thangvenna aeong Epa mhechuw aphabekhena amhuwgehe.
Ajiigachiinche emmobesha hechuw ajongna Mi Sapachuw ijuwnga.
“Ajii nakharga? Zou aaserching Zou roza engkhesuwngna engkhechuw bevedohniege, summeekuwlhie ikuchuw bounglina maniege engkhe emmochuw jongmaaniekhang?
Engkhejege amaing emmochuw tuniebe, atataa ninnhiengna kerhierga, amaing amalinaching summeekuwlhie ikuw ithiing arotha erhohga.
Changtaanaching esiingsehkaarna engkhe aammonamaaing thangvenna aeong nangpaching amindeenga.
“Achuw engkhe ruwhchangsungna Isiikha nataalina tuniebe! vaing alaarchuw ninthienengna ninlaarnachuw mindang. Ama michin erongeniebe, nang ing amachuw nache saaga.
Changgechuw nattongchuw rongemaaniebe, mi engkhe ennhii rhieing varhier, engkhejege nintongbekhechuw mi ennhie oungthum navirhieching saarkhie oungshuwvate.
Ama michin emmeniechuw rongepimaaniebe, ruwhchangna rhier, engkhejege ruwhchanghe ttongjechuw rongemaaniebe nanhingna lintaang yati engkheje khachana ekhuwmhetho enghaaresie.
“Atatah kieing kerhiernga, simriipaamna naphierkha thangvenaje phiervate, engkhejege simriipaamna nabejohkha thangvennaje enjoh vate.
“Avonhie atataa kerhierga, mi ennhiebekheing simriipaamna ninghinnhiechuw oungrhutenuwbe, amachuw thavenna aeong Epaching ekupihvae.
Mi ennhie enthum ing keromhingna oungkongtenuwbe amakaarna kieje emveging.”
Chonaching Piter ing thengge anhiingna arhier, “Thangpa, achuw engkhe ruwhchang suwngna mi engkheching isiikha tunieche vojehmeh kuhpeevang ketega? Vosariebekhevang atega?”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “vosariepangmaaga, changgechuw, nanhingna kerhierga, sumsariilhiesariimeh vang atega.”
Ajiegachiinche thangven lepaachuwbe aminehethoh sheerbaarlina apha engkhejege aminsina (hisssaap) emmindangtho aminttiimga.
Amaing iteem abetthiimle talent roza chiing suwm atur mi engkhe avirhiihe.
Changgechuw abilichemaataana ataaje, aalhangnuwje, asitiheje, adeenbekheje abilinaing juwrcherre tege arhier.
Chonaching amineching vatiege rumsage arhier, ‘Ehaaphesare, kieing belisawanggete.’
Engkhejege mine aapuwching aningminsiige abethinpe, aturbekheje akuhpipe.
Changgechuw aalhang engkheing anhiingna dinnar roza engkhe aaturchuw oungteuhsehe, amaing suwrge, ariing irahge arhier, ‘naturkha aevipe.’
Chonaching aalhangching vatiege anhingna arhier, ‘ihaaphere kiing belisawanggete.’
Changgechuw amaing rhumaase, chonaching abilimaataang mikhuwmtaate aminlhuwpe.
