Aalhang mineheching atubekhechuw amhuwheche, embelung jasehe, engkhejege amabekhechuw aapuwnhingte aminthangpehe.
Chovelinaching aapuwching amachuw vaeenge, anhingna arhier, ‘Itthamaa mine, nang ing kenhingna ennhietaanachii natur bekheje kekuhpeegechii.
Nangchuw kening keminsiikhangkhing naalhang minechuw naning minsiivang nate maakhang?’
Engkhejege aapuw abelung isieching aturbekhe abilimaataang aashuwrhe keelite apipe.”
Khangkhin ichiing nauw nanehechuw nimbelungriirna kuhpeemaatenuwbe, thangvenna aeong Epajeching nintaalina tuvate.
Jesu ing arhierbekhe abetthuw nhuwte Jordon evaraarte Galile ramchuw bethinge Judia paamte huwngse.
Mi ruwhpuw aanhuw ajihechuw amaing amintthaacherpe.
Pharisi heching thenghege, chaang ebeerhege anhingna asiihe, “Ajiijie linagejenie nepenuw aantthephuwhii waajir ttongthohing arhuwga?”
Amaing abesang, “Ayen ahetu besha aapuwching nuwle char asembesaga.

Engkhejege arhier, ‘ajiena ate inche hevelinaching pesarching amapa amanuw bethinniege anepenuw nhingte enchumvang atega, engkhejege emmeniechuw bechii engkhe enshuwvang atega tege arhierchuw pamaachuw?’
Chonaching emmenie chuw ennhie enshuw maasehe, changgechuw sabechie engkhepang enshuwsehe. Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing aminchumbesachuw achuwdong ing mintthemaaheresie.”
Emmeniieng anhingna arhier, “changgenieche ajietunaching Mosi ing nepenuw pesar aantthena attuhna lerii pege, enttherhuw tege ttongtho apigehe?”
Amaing arhier, “Nimbelungriir aperlamthitahna Mosi ing alumhih entthenachuw arhuwpigehe, changgechuw ayen chinbe hanghin atumaaga hevehiemaaga.
Engkhejege ninnhingna kerhierga, achuwchuwgejenie naamaa atulina maniige alumhih entthephuwniege nepenuw lintaangtho paarniebe naamaa atuga.”
Asepoheching asiihe, “hangchiehie pesarching anipenuwnhingna tuvang ategenieche avonhii riekhie aanchumna jongmaaresie.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “mibekheing heve ttonghie eliechemaahe, changgechuw apihbesahe nhingna apiga.

Ajiena ate inche aberhingpele asa-asem aminsambesa engkhejege achuw engkheche miching asa-asem euwmga, engkhejege atah ataajeng Eruwng lepaa rotumna asa semge euwmga. Elie acheheching hevehie aelhaangresie.”
Chaleching nedounghechuw entaalina akih baangheniege hinnhepeeheresie tehege anhingna avirhiihe. Asepoheching eperpaaing emmeniechuw arukuhe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing arhier, “Nedounghekha kepaangte thengheresie, engkhejege khaammaaruw, ajiegachienche thangven eruwng lepachuw hangchiehe rotumga.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing entaalina akih baangpihege engkese.
Chalechin mi engkhe anhingna vage arhier, “Aanchuwpa, ajiituningge ettiim enemaa erhingnachuw phachevang ketega?”
Amaing anhingna arhier, “ajietuna itthachuw ajiega techiige ensiegechie? Ittachuw engkhepangthaane, ittiim enemaa irhingnachuw phagete teteniebe Thangnhang ttongthohechuw minjie.”
Amaing anhingna arhier, “ajiega chovechuw?” Engkhejege Jesu ing arhier, “Mi thehmaa, naamaa tumaa, beromaa, amamaa saarkhie pemaa;
nangnuw nangpachuw aejare, avonhiena, veenchanghechuw nataakhangkhing naning minsiire.”
Elerching Jesu nhingna arhier, “hevebekhehie keminjiesaape,” ajiiche evaga?
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nang ing ketucherpe teteniebe, engke, nadeenbekhe juwrcher, chona nasheerchuw sarahechuw pe, chona thangvenna naler nachii uwmvate, chona huwng, kihnuw ejie.”
Ilerching ama ttongchuw athieche, abelung ejapaaing engkese, ajiegachiinche ama lerchii enhimpaa adeenga.
Chotaanaching Jesu ing asepohhenhingna arhier, “Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, sawangheching thangven lepaate avalhuwna cherpaane.
Avonhie ninnhingna kerhierga, sawang ing Thangnhang lepaate walhuwvang atehie sariingsie sahching rhimphii khorna ewalhuwching lelhaane.”
Sepohheching chovechuw athieheche inhimpah en luh liim hege arhierhe, “chogenieche achuw ingche ikarpi phachevate?”
Changgechuw Jesu ing ibeerhege arhier, “Tepanghe nhingnachinbe hangchiehie shuwchemaanie, changgechuw Thangnhangnhingnabe eshuwchega.”
Changtaanaching Piter ing besangge arhier, “Ebeer,” kinnuw ing kindeenbekhe bethincher uwngge naanhuw kinjiega. “Ate ajii kindeense?”

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Atatah kerhiernga, ithar hungvievang ate bekhe simriipaamna Mi Sapaching athang alaartho aongleching, Israel sake suwmmalhie ennhielina waajeer atule keenhuw ejie ninnuwjeng Eruwng singhason ongtaanaching ongvangninte.
Engkhejege achuw engkheing keromhinglina aeen-abaar, auw ane, asar ajuwr, changmanieche amapa, abethinche mibekheching saruh roza engkhe, engkhejege ittiim enemaa irhingnachuw phasavate.
Changgechuw men aesa enhimheching nhungkurvatehe, nhung ikurching mensavatehe.
“Ajiegachinche thangven Eruwngpaamchuwbe aram aapuwching darkha beerna nong etuna mi yieng enrangna avajongthoh enghaaga.
Enngeenrhuw nhuwte emmenieing nong intuna aminchuw inttimjeh aphanaing darkhaberte achiirpehe.
Hirring apha ekuw rovena emvasile kithiirna entuwphuw euwmaahe aeongjeh hechuw amhuwpe.
Engkhejege ennhingna arhier, ‘ninnuwjeng darkhaberte vanung, engkhejege hangjeh vate atechuw pevanggechuw,’ changchin wasehe,
siimpalena hirring enthum rovena amaing wage chang ngenge atupe.
Engkhejege hirring ronga rovena amaing awasiche lintaanghe aru eneerjehhechuw amhuwpe; engkhejege ennhingna arhier, ‘ajietunaching ajiedong tuluing eneerjehgechuw?’
Emmenieing arhier, ‘achuwdong ing ineh maahe.’ Amaing ennhingna arhier, ‘ninnuwje darkhaberte vasiruw.’
“Kholhiechuw avieche, darkhaber aapuwching lerchii aapananhingna arhier, ‘nong etuhechuw nhungkur ethenghele mensa ethenghethoching ashumin pehere’
Hirring rongana etthengching wage inie engkhe aminchuw apipe.
Ate mensapaching thengge, enhimlhah phasavanggete tege amindeen, changgechuw aatu bekheching anunu eniena ashuminchuw aphapehe.
Engkhejege emmenieing imphachernhuwte, emmeniieng ram apuwlina ttongchor sehe,
Arhierhe, ‘hevehie nhungkur ethengching hirring engkhepang ashuhga, engkhejege nang ing kinnuw ing enie ensah bedaar uwngge kintutho enghaajeng impipechuw.’
“Changgechuw amaing engkaarna ineer engkhenhingna arhier, ‘kilhang, kieng amamaa tusamaaing, nang ing anunu enie nekhe natumin phavang natehie narhumaakhang?
Narotumchuw lieing engkere, kieing, nanhingna kepikhangkhing nhungikur ethengje kepihie kikhu siga.
Kie ketasaachuw kieing tuning kete enhuw ejieing tumaaningkhang? Changmaanieche nang ing kebelung elhuwngga techiige ennuwrgechii?’ ”
Changchin ichiing nhungkurching mensavate, “engkhejege mensaching nhungkurvate.”
Jesu ing Jerusalemte ahangphana asepohhechuw asiih ing rhiihege lhamlena ennhingna arhier.
Ebeerruw, enieing Jerusalemte ihanggemie, “engkhejege Mi sapachuw khorpuwhe engkhejege thiimdeehe nhingna amaraar peheniege athehnaing minservatehe;
chonaching yati lintaanghenhingte ching siimnaheniege, binrii heniege thingkherlina thehvatehe; engkhejege aneminthum iniena hangrhingvate.”
Chaleching Zebedee sapahe rotumna emmanuwing virhiege Thangpachuw rumsage anhiisaape.
Engkhejege amaing anhingna arhier, “ajii naadiega?” Nepenuwching anhingna arhier, “nang ing nalepaana kesapahehie, engkheing natachangte, engkheing natalite aongna irhupeesare.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing abesang, “ninuw ing ninnhiehie ajiiga minghuwmaasechuw, kieng eenvang kete, Kamsengsungnahie eenchevangninte?” Emmenieng besanghege enrhier, “chevanggungte.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing eenchuwbe eenvangninte, changgechuw ketachangte engkhejege ketalite ongvang nintechuwbe kieng pevang ketemaagechuw, hevehiebe kemapaing abethongbesahe rutuwmga.”
Sepoh suwmheching amachuw enthieheche une ennhiehetahlina embelung sehse.

Changgechuw Jesu ing eenhege arhier, “yati lintaanghe (gentiles) aapuwheching entaalina aapuw oungshuwsehe, engkhejege aalhuwngheching entaalina aapuw aanshuwnaing tuning atepaning atuse atehie nimminghuwse.
Ningkaarna amachuw shuwmaaresie; changgechuw ningkaarna achuw ingkheching lhuwngning teniebe namine oungshuwvang atega,
Engkhejege achuw engkheing elhuwngseh oungshuwning teniebe amaching namine oungshuwvang atega;
Amakhangkhing Mi Sapaching ataachuw sepa atunaing ethengmaaga, changgechuw mi sepa atunaga, engkhejege arhingrierchuw peniege mee enhimpaachuw aatinpinaing ethengga.”
Emmenieing Jeriko mahege enghuwngle mi aruhpuwheching aanhuw ajiihe.
Chove lhamnaching mheechuw ennhii lhampukurna aeonghe, Jesu vasine ate enthietaanaching, uwnghege, “Thangpa, David sapa, naning iminsiisare.”
Mi ruwpuwching derengruw tehege eperpaain arukuhhe; changgechuw mimpersehhege euwnghe, “David sapa, naning eminsiisare!”
Jesu ing neerjehge emmeniechuw eenhege, arhier, “ajie etupi ningngeediega?”
Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “kimmhee imhongpisare.”
Amaing aning minsiihege immhihchuw aparpeepehe, aniekungnarahching emmhichuw tthage aanhuw ajiepehe.
Jesu ing Jerusalemte emvasile Oliv boungna Bethphagechuw vatungge asepoh ennhii cheerge
ennhingna arhier, “Nimmana euwm khuwna valhuwruw, engkhejege chalerahching ninnuwing sekursiing akhiehechuw ateetho mhuvangninte, bejohnung kenhingte hinrhieruw.
Achuw engkheing isiehenieche, hanghin besangruw, ‘Thangpaing emmeniehie anonglina aadiena,’ Engkhejege, aniekungnaching amaing epesavate.”
Hevehie laarchanpaging tege arhierbesachuw aleer ashuwnaga, hanghin arhier,
“Zion sanuwnhingna tong,
Ebeer, naaruwngchuw nanhingna thengne,
belung edepaaing sikursiing taalina,
engkhejege atee edoung sikursiinglina.”
Sepohheching Jesu ing arhier enhuw ejiing vasehe;
sikursiingchuw ateetho hinrhiehege ataalina pien thahege entaalina ongse.
Mi ruwpuwheching alhamna pien thahege, lintaang heching thingbaa sehhege athahe.
Mi ruwpuwheching amana sihege engkhejege aanhuw ejieheching aeuwnghe,
“Hosana David sapa!
Thangpa romhingna ethengchuw repaa itthaga!
Hosana thangven engkaangsehnaching!”
Jerusalemchuw emvalhuwche khupuwna eongbekhe ontohchorhege, enrhier, “Amahie achuwga?”
Mi ruwpuwheching arhierhe, “Amahie Galile paam Nazarethtena Laarchangpaga.”
Chalechin Jesu ing Thangnhang eensuwngna valhuwge, engkhejege, eensuwngna ajuwrhe engkhejege aanliihejechuw athorpehe, sheer alehnahe pihse, eenvatthuw ajuwrhe engongnahechuw abelehcherpe.
“Heve ke eenhie, Thangnhangte ahinnhiena eenvang atega; changgechuw ninnuw ing ouwngruwhe akhor nimbesuwpe.”
Mhihchuwhe khibongheching Thangnhang eennaching ethenghe, engkhejege amintthaacheerpehe.
Changgechuw khorpuw elhunghele thiimdeeheching luliimna nonghe, engkhejege nepangheching eensuwngnaching euwnghege, “Hosana David sapanhingna,” atehechuw athieheche emmenieing embelung sege
engkhejege anhingna arhier, “Nang ing hevebekhe arhierhie nathiese?” Jesu ing innheengna arhier, Uwng.
‘Nepanghe engkhejege amanuw ing amhaar nedounghe nherna nangchuw immimpaana abethongpe atehie nimpamalhiega?’ ”
Amaing emmeniechuw khupuwnaching mahege Bathanite vage yenkhe variihse.
Yieng himphage ahungsile avin ttaamse.

Chaleching thechang bour engkhe lhampuwkurna mhuwge aboumte avaache annhapang aeuwm enramaachuw ouwngshuwse, chonachin arhier, “avonhii aanrah euwmmaachuw ouwngshuwsare!” Engkhejege thechangborchuw aniekungnarahching mimviese.
Asepohheching emmhuwtaana ouwngluw liimhege arhierhe, “Ajiikhang aniekungna thechangborhie emviega?”

Jesu ing abesang, “Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, ninthacha uwmniege, nimmindeenchuw mormaatenuwbe thechangborna eshuwhiepang hie maavang atega, changgechuw heve boungjehie, ‘namheen impim, rimchie sungte vaboh’ tejetenuw shuwvate.
Achuwchuwgejenie hanghin ninthachaing hinnhetenuwbe phavangninte.”
Jesu ing Thangnhang eensungte valhuwge aminchuwleheching khorpuw elhunghe, upahechuw thenghege enrhier, “ajii natuche uwmge hevebekhehie natuga?”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “Kiejeng ninnuwnhingna siegechuw; ebesangtenuwbe kiejing ajie ketuchena uwmge kituga ichiichuw rhiergete.

Johon ing chii aluhhie thanventenagemo, chanmaanieche humtena abour ihungshuwga? chonaching ennajeer ing ensangsehe, “enieing thangventenaga temeniebe, amaing enhingna rhiervate, ajietuna amachuw ninthachamaaga?” tevate.
Changgechuw enieing rhiermeniege, ‘humtena ehungshuwga,’ temeniebe mi ruhpuwhechuw aettiina; ajiegachienche miheching Johonchuw aanchungpaga tehege aajagehe,”
chonaching emmenieing Jesuchuw abesanghe, “Minghumauwng.” Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kiejing ajie ketuche uwmge hevehehie ketuga rhiermaaning.
“Ajie nimmindeenna? Pesar engkheing asapa ennhie aeuwm, amensanhingna wage arhier, ‘kesapa, atenie darkhaberte nong etu sih.’
Amaing abesang, ‘simaaning,’ changgechuw enhuwte abelungrier belirihge wasise.
Amapachin amenhiena asapanhingna arhierche, ‘sivanggie, Epa;’ changgechuw simaase.

Heve ennhiekaarna achuw ing amapa amindeenchuw atuga?” Emmeniing arhier, “Mensaching.” Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, Khachana ekhuwmheching enkhejege ichuwmaa nepenuwheching thangven lepaana nimmana hesisehe.

Ajiegachiinche Johon ing dharmo icheer lhamlina ethengga, engkhejege thachamaasechuw, changgechuw khachana ekhuwmhele ichuwmaa nepenuwheching athachahe; engkhejege ninnuw ing nimmhuw nhuwteje, nimbelungriir mintehmaachuw ithachaje thachamaachuw.

“Lintaang ttongttiimhie rongeruw, aapuwching darkhabour abetthe, ropar ing amingher, darkha asuwngnaje akhuwr, engkhejege paam arhuwngna eenti thaam ameniir. Chona lhiethiehe nhiingna saarge paam engkhete sise.
Akuumpha aphache, aminehechuw, thengge amaing suwhhechuw akuumnaching avibethinpe.
Changgechuw lhie aathieheching suwrhege abinpehe, engkhejege athehpehe, engkhejege lintaangchuw lhung ing adeenghe.
Avonhie lintaang minehe avicheer, mensana ithi ing; engkhejege, emmenieje changnge nge atupehe,
changgechuw nhungkurna asapachuw vicheerge, arhier, ‘emmenieing kesapachuwbe ijavatehe.’
Changgechuw lhiethieheching asapachuw emmhuwche ennajir ing enrhierhe, ‘hevehiebe irii aakuumpaga, theruw, themeniige adeenbekhe lieteruw!’
Changchin suwrhege, darkhaber taangte alhinpehe, engkhejege athehpehe.
“Ate lhie aapuwching thengnieche ajii minluvatehe?”
Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “Amaing ichamaahechuw memangheniege thehvate, engkhejege lintaang lhiethiehenhingte saang kuumheniege aanrah apichehe nhingte pevate.”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Thiimjiisuwngna nimpape:
‘Een atuheching aekanamaaga amindeen chove raraaching bangriekiing lhung enshuwse;
hevehie Thangnhangtena engkhejege imhi ing eebeerle luliimnaga?’
“Chonachin kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, Thangnhang eruwng paamchuw ninnhingtena lieniege aanra apihche eruwng lepa mihenhingte pevate.”
Heve lhunglina itiechuw alhe lhe ing kiechervate; engkhejege hevetaalina ebuwhechuw jinchervate.
Khorpuw elhuwnghele Pharisiheching chove ttongttimchuw athieheche entaalina arhiernaga tehege amingmhuwpehe.
Emmenieing amachuw suwrning atepehe, changgechuw mi ruwpuwhechuw attiepehe, ajiena ichiingche immenieing laarchangpaga tehege ajagehe.
Avonhie Jesu ing ennhingna ttongttiimlina ttongge, arhier;
“Thangven Eruwng lepaachuw eruwng ing asapa riekhie enchumna mee aeenthohching aminttim.
Amaing ashuwhechuw chierge imhaar teching aethengna avamieenpehe, changgechuw thengning temaasehe.

Avonhie lintaang shuwhechuw cheerge arhier, ‘Kewila mihenhingna tongruw; Ebeerruw, imhaarna buwchuw kebethongcherpe, Kesiircharje, chona emar sabekheje theingge kebethongpe, riekhie enchuwmna iriim teching ethengpisaruw.’
Changgechuw achuwdong ing thosaluing embevenumnum bevechersehe, engkheing lhelete sihge, engkheche sheer baar etaar sise.
Lintaang shuwhhechuw suwrhege, engkhejege, minjahege athehpehe.
Eruwngchuw atherphuwrge, asepehechuw vibethinge mithehechuw amemaangpe engkhejege, khuwpuwbekheje abethupe.
Chalechin ashuwhenhingna arhier, ‘riekhie aanchum nachuw thoraang ttuhse, changgechuw kekursaahechuw rovaarmaasehe.
Siruw, chonaching lhampuw lhamtibekhena vasinung nimmhuwbekhehechuw imhaartaate vilaruw!’
Shuwheching lhambekhena vasihege emmhuwbekhechuw itthaje, itthamaaje, amingkongpehe; changchin riekhie aanchumna eenchuw mharheching siekangse.
“Changechuw eruwngching imhaarhechuw amhuwnaing avalhuwche, amaing ethengkaarna pesar engkhe riekhie piendier ing enthongmaa amhuwpe,
engkhejege anhingna arhier, ‘Kilhang, ajiekhang riekhie enchumna piendier vieluchiing evalhugechie?’ chonachin ttongchemaase.
Chalechin Eruwngching ethenghenhingna arhier, ‘aki akhi phierruw, engkhejege taang inthimpakaarte valhinruw, chove mhinnachin ttaaniege ahajeh eriirvate.’ ”
Ajiegachiinche enhimpaa eenvate, “changgechuw tepieti eturvate?”
Chonachin Pharisi heching engkehege Jesu chuw attong rhierlina ashuwrnaing enthongsehe.

Chonachin ensepoechuw Herodia mihetho enrhii ing arhierhe, “Thiimpuw nanghie atataa itu migechie, engkhejege Thangnhang lham jiinaje itthaje naminchuwga, engkhejege aanthierna minlinadong tumaachie; mi mheje ebierteniege tumaachie.
Eruwngnhingna khachana etimhie waajeer ing arhuga arhumaaga?”
Changgechuw, Jesu ing entthanamaachuw minghuwge arhier, “Ajiituna chaang ingeebeergechuw, itthachaang etu ninnuw?
Khachana pevang ninte sheerchuw eminthieruw.” Engkhejege emmenieing dinari engkhe avichihe.
Chonaching ennhingna arhier, “amahie achuw losega, engkhejege aromhinghie achuwtaga?”
Emmeniening abesang, “Eruwngpachuwga” chonaching innheengna arhier, “Eruwngtachuw eruwngte peruw, engkhejege Thangnhangtachuw Thangnhang nhingte peruw.”
Chovechuw enthietaana, enluw liimsehe engkhejege emmenieng Jesu chuw mahege engkesehe.
chove enienarahching Saddusehe thenghege, avonhii ihangrhing uwmmaa, engkhejege ttong siehege, arhierhe.
“Thiimpuw, Mosi ing arhier; pesarching asiti berhingluing theniebe anepaching mhikhuwnuwchuw beniege siti baasien arotum mavang atega.
Kenehe sarii uwmnehe, mensaching asiti uwmluing thise, mhikhuwnuwchuw anepanhingna amaape.
amenhienaching changching atu, hanghin achiin sarieheching abiehe.
Nhungkurte nepenuwjechuw thise
Avonhie ihangrhing eniena, chogenieche sariekaarna achuw lumhee enshuwvang atega? Ajiegachiinche emmeniebekheching abiega.”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “nang ing Thangnhangje enkhejege ittha ttongjiirjechuw naminghumaataana nalaarpe.
Ajiegachiinche avonhii ihangrhing enienaching saangramje engkheje riekhie enchumnachuw uwmmaa, changgechuw thangven michiertho onghaavatehe.
Engkhejege avonhie ethietena ihangrhinglina Thangnhang ing arhier nimpamaalhiega,
‘Kie Abraham Thangnhang ging, Issak Thangnhang ging enkhejege Jakob Thangnhang maage ingkhang?’ Ama ithiehe Thangnhangmaaga changgechuw irhinghe taga.”
Engkhejege mi ruwpuwheching athieheche arhierttonglina ouwnglu liimsehe.
Pharisi heching ama ttongching Sadukihe chuw emminttongche maataanaching oungkongsehe, engkhejege,
enkaarna waajiir aapuw engkheing chaang abiirnaing anhingna asiih.
“Thiimpuw, wajiir ttongthohkaarna akhukhache elhuwngseh ttongthoga?”
Amaing anhingna arhier, “‘Nang ing Aapuw Thangnhang chuw nabelungriirbekheing, nachipibekheing, namindeenbekheing naning minsiih.’
Hevehie aalhuwngseh engkhejege amhour ttongthochuwga.
Engkhejege amenhienachuwbe, ‘vimchaanghechuw nataangenge naning minsiih.’
Heve ttongtho bekhehie waajiir ttong engkhejege laarchangpahe nhingna iporga.”
Ate Pharisihe engkonghe nhingna Jesu ing hevebekhehie asiehe;
“Aantinpa (Messiah) lina ninnuw ing ajii ningkharna? Achuw sapaga?” Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “David sapaga.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajiekhang David ing chipi enthiing yaarna Thangnhang atega, hanghin arhier,
‘Thangnhang ching kethangnhang nhingna arhier,
ketachangna ongre nang ouwngrhumaahechuw kikhibeja derna kesiihmaataang?’
David ing amachuw Thangnhang tenieche, ajiekhang asapachuw ouwngshuwvang atega?”
Achuwdongjing besangchemaasehe, engkhejege ama enienabetthiimge ttong lintaang avonhii siemaa sehe.
Ama enhuna Jesu ing mi ruhpuw engkhejege sepohhenhingna arhier,
“Thiimdeehele Pharisiheching Mosi ongtaana aeonghe;
Ajiega ate inche emmenieing arhierchuw minjienung immintuning atebekhechuw turuw, changgechuw emmenieing entukhangkhinche tumaaruw, ajiegachienche emenieing aminchuw nongchuw tumaahe.
Emmenieing pih irhiipaa erin chehmaavang echiichuw mi lintaanglina abaanghe; changgechuw entaachinche inkimhour ing epardong parning temaahe.
Entubekhechuw miheching mhuwheresie atehe; hanghin ingngeen thongna areh mimpilhuwhege, oungsuwr piendier ing enthong he.
Emmenieing aeriim mhin mikaarna, khuwngsangsungna aetthaseh ongtaalina ongheniege mee ing ejavang ate chuw aadiegehe,
engkhejege kithiirsungna ejaheniege rukuum tuheniege rabbi atechuw aadiegehe,
changgechuw ninnuwchinbe thiimpuw entechuw edemaaruw, ajiegachiinche, thiimpuw engkhe ninta uwmne, amana ninnuwbekhe aatamgechuw.
Engkhejege simriipaamna Epa ateromhing phuwmaaruw, ajiegachienche thangvenna aeong Amapa panggetha.
Ninnuwchinbe aanchuwpa chuw tuning temaaruw, aanchuwpa chuw Aantinpa panggetha.
Ningkaarna elhuwngsehching mine nong tuvang atega,
Atahchuw minlhuwngning ateheching ouwngturpah ing uwmresie, engkhejege ouwngturpah ing aeuwmheching hanglhuwngvate.

“Changgechuw, thiimdeehe, Pharisihe, itthachaang etuhe jasaruw! Ajiegachiinche thangven lepaachuw mi mhekungna ningkampe, nintaaje valhuw chemaachuw, engkhejege valhuwsagete atehejechuw minlhuwmaachuw.
Itthachaang etu thiimdeehe, Pharisihe jasaruw, etthachaang tuchuwge Thangnhangte ninghin nhiileje mhikhuwnuwhe etum een siinchuwge, amalinachin elhuwngseh maraarchuw phavangninte.
“Itthachaang etu thiimdeehe, Pharisihe! Ninnuw ing rimchie engkhejege paam elenchuwge achuw engkhe insina lham minlechuwge ahungngeenlile ninnuwtaalina saru ennhii longkong siti nimbesuwpe.

“Mheechuw aarhii, ninnuw ing jasaruw! Ninnuw ing rhierchuwge, achuw engkheing Thangnhang eenlina wasahniebe ajiidongmaaga, changgechuw achuw engkheing Thangnhang eensungna euwm sanalina wasahniebe avasaaching asuwrga.
Mhihchuw inhuwrhe! Ajiegachiinche sanatho sana aminthiing eentho achuw elhuwngsehga?
Engkhejege ninnuw ing ninrhier, achuw engkheing hebekoung parchuwge wasahniebe ajiedongmaaga; changgechuw achuw engkheing ama taalina apihe peechuw parniege wasah michin awasaaching aphierga.
Ajiekhangkhin nimmhih ichuwga! Apee pisele, apee pihse aminthieng hebbekoungchuw achuw ing elhuwngsehga?
Chonaching hebekoung parniege wasahchin engkhejege ama ataalina euwm peebekhechuw parge wasah atubesaga.
Engkhejege Thangnhang een parniege wasah atuching amachuw engkhejege asungna aeong Thangnhang chuw parge wasah atuga.
Engkhejege thangvenlina wasahchin Thangnhang eruwng ongna engkhejege ataalina eong Thangnhang chuw parge wa asaaga.

“Itthachaang etuhe, Pharisihe engkhejege thiimdeehe jasaruw, ajiegachienche, thiemaroi hetha, hop, jira saru suum peniege, waajiir ttong ithi ing iluwshechuw, atataa, ningsiena engkhejege thachachuw nimbethinpe; changgechuw chovebekhechuw emmenieing turong atega, engkhejege lintaangchuw bethinmaawang ateching thengse.
Mheechuw aarhiihe! Ninnuw ing bethiechuw pienching soumchuwge, changgechuw sariingsii sahchuw nimbedor!

“Jasaruw, thiimdeehe engkhejege Pharisihe, itthachaang aatuhe, ajiegachienche, ninnuw ing kamseng engkhejege belin chuw taangnapang nimminlhiem, changgechuw sungnache belung ichamaaing uwmchuwge, engkhejege ninthienen rotumpang nimmindeen.
Mheechuw Pharisihe! Ningkamseng asungkha minlhiemruw, amanhuwna taangje minthiingresie.

“Itthachaang etu Pharisi, thiimdeehe! ninnuwhie thenkungchuw iwaarkhing aateh khanguhie, taangnache itthapaang emhuwna, sungnache ithiebesa saruw chona lintaang lintaang ibuwr ing esiihkhangchiegechuw.
Hanghin ichiing ninnuwjeng taangna dhormo icherpaa ongnechuw, changgechuw ninsungnabe itthachaang etu, waajiir ttong euwmmaagechuw.
“Ninnuw jasaruw, thiimdeehe engkhejege Pharisihe, itthachaang etuhe! Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing Laarchangpahe then chiichuwge, engkhejege dhormo icherhe thenchuw minrehchuwge.
Ninnuw ing ninrhier, ‘enieing imapuwhe imapahe aaniena irhingemeniebe Thangnhang ttongthangpahe thielina emmeniithoh enrhiing aesaru phamaavang etega.
Hanghin ninnuwjeng laarchangpahe aatheh sitigechuw ate saarkhie nimpeega.
Chogenieche, nangpuw nangpahe pee amintinachuw minsiiruw.
Beruwrhe, beruwr misienhe, norohna bovang nintechuw ensiihchemaatenuw.

Chovelinaching, kieng laarchangpahe, eviermihe, engkhejege thiimdeehe kevibethin, alheh hechuw thehvangninte, engkhejege thingkherlina thehtenuwge, engkhejege alhehechuw ruwchangsungte kitenuwge, bintenuwge engkhejege khupuwbekhena jongvang ninte.
Hanghin ichiin dhormo icherhe thie lolhiepaamna bebochuwge, Abel thie Barakia sapa Jekariah phanaing Thangnhang een enthiing hebekoungna ninthega.
Atataah kerhierga, hevebekhehie heve misienhelina thengvate.

“Jerusalem, Jerusalem, laarchangpahechuw aatheh, engkhejege kevicheerhechuw lhung ing nindeeng khupuw! Aar ing abethaderna atihe amingkhum khangkhin, kieing ninnuwchuw kemingkong aphabekhena kidiega changgechaw rhumaachuw!
Ebeerruw, ningeenbekhe aruw ing kemaapeesechuw,
Ajiina ate ingche ninnhingna kerhierga, ‘Thangnhang romhingna ethenghe rasie itthaga’ atehie ninrhiermaataang kiehie atevokhe emhuw maatenuw.”
Jesu ing Thangnhang eensungtena ahungshuwle, asepohheching Thangnhang een entubekhechuw anhingna aminthienaing ethenghe.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “hevebekhehie nimmhuwmaga? Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, hevena lhung engkheching engkhetaalina kiicherluing chinmaanie.”
Amaing Oliv bounglina aongle sepoh heching enthienen thenghege arhierhe, “hevebekhe ttonghie ateele shuwvang atega, engkhejege nang ing avonhie juwngvang nate, engkhejege kum adongnachuw itongpire?”
Jesu ing abesang, “achuwdong ing amamaate ingkinamaa ing enriimsaruw.
Ajiegachiinche mi enhimpaa keromhingna thengheniege rhiervate, ‘Kie Aantinpachuwging!’ engkhejege mi enhimpaa amamaate rhievatehe.
Engkhejege raarsa khu thievangninte; ebeerruw ninnuw ing belung minjamaaruw, ajiegachiienche hevehie shuwrimvate, changgechuw attuhnachuw vehne.
Yaati engkheing yaati engkhetaalina chona eruwng lepaa engkheing eruwng lepaa taalina betthimvate, engkhejege vinttaam chiihaar shuwvate engkhejege amhin amhinna lunglaang thengvate;
Hevebekhehie nedoung aberhingphana ejakhangkhinvate.
“Chona ninnuwchuw ebinriiheniege ethehvatehe, engkhejege keromhinglina yaatibekhechin iharvatehe.
Chotaanaching mi enhimpaa tiehvatehe, engkhejege engkhele engkhe inlhinniege, engkhejege engkhele engkhe engharvatehe.
Engkhejege amamaa laarchangpahe emphuwngvatahe engkhejege mi enhimpaa amamaate rhievate.
Engkhejege waajiir lham ijiimaa hinthiniege, mi inhimpaa enthacha jungdevate.
Changgechuw attuhna iphang adierche michuw karpivate.
Engkhejege Eruwng lepaa ttongjiirchuw Yaatibekhena saarkhie aanshuwnaing lolhiepaam bekhena minthangniege; engkhejege hanghin attuhna iniechuw vievate.
“Hanghin entershuwpaa ijachaam laarchangpa Danil ing arhier enhuw ijieng enthiing amhinna mhuwtenuwge.” (Aapahechin minghuwresie,)
“Chalechin Judiana eongheching bounglite tenheresie;
Eentaalina eongheching eensuwngte pih alienain ttummaaheresie.
Lhelena eongching alongoh valiegete teniege vaanlehmaaresie.
Chale neh arinhe, nedoung amhaarheching jasavate!
Eongna iniele pharbie sungna ashuwnamaaing hinnhesaruw.
Ajiegachiinche, chove aphanaching ijanapaa thengvate, chovehechuw atele engkhejege lolhiepaam abettiimpelena, ishuwmaadehlhie maaga.
Engkhejege changchii eniechuw memongmaaniebe chipi euwm achuwdong ing ikarpi phachemaanie; changgechuw aaturbesa mihe rotum ing iniechuw memongpivate.
“Achuw engkheing teniege, ‘Ebeer’ hena Aantinpa ongne! Changmaanieche, ‘ama hena eonghiega!’ thachamaaruw,
Ajiegachiinche amamaa Aantinpahe engkhejege amamaa laarchangpahe emphuwngvate engkhejege elhuwngpapaa bietimna, ettiishuwpapah mindangheniege amamaate rhiivatehe, rhuwniebe, aaturbesaheje emvevatehe.
Minghuwruw, kieing mensaang kerhierbesaga,
“Chonachin emmenieing ninnhingna rhierniege, ‘Ebeerruw! ama rampakaarna ongne,’ vaabeermaaruw. Emmenieing rhierniege ‘ibeer’ ama adeensungna ongne, thachamaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche tehaangtena bittih ithengkhangkhin tetaate elengphung khankhin echiing Mi Sapachuw juwngvate.
Ithiebesa auwmnamhinnaching laangtaheje engkongvatehe.
“Ijachaam iniehe aanhuwdehna,
Inie minthimvate, engkhejege thaing alengvaar ipemaanie;
aarsiihechuw minventena jungbovatehe,
engkhejege thangventena pirthangje ennuhvate.

Chove enhuwna Misapa bietimnahcuw minvenna endangvate, engkhejege lolhiepaam yaatibekheing tacham lieheniege ttahvatehe, engkhejege Mi Sapaching minven rudulina ruwngper tho athang alaarthoh ijuwng mhuwvangninte.
Engkhejege amaing minven michierhechuw vibethinniege engkaangpaa tumpi irur ing eenheniege, engkhejege immenieing aaturbesahechuw ariikieng millietena, minven paangkhetena paangkhete mingkongvate.
“Thechangborlina ttongttiim minghuwsaruw; edoung anhachuw ahangsienle, tthaar viese atechuw nimminghuwse,
Hanghin ichiin, hangchiebekhe nimmhuwle ninsungkuwngnarrah thengse tenuwng minghuwruw.
Atataah kerhierga, hevehangchiebekhe aviemaataang heve misienhie viemaalhienie.
Minvenle simriipaam maangvate, changgechuw kettonghechuwbe maangmaadehnie.
“Changgechuw chove apha engkhejege iniechuw achuwdong ing minghuwmaa, thangven michierhejeng, asapajeng, changgechuw amapaapang ing aminghuwgetha.
Noah eniehe khangkhin, Mi Sapa ajuwngleje khangkhin shuwvate.
Hanghin chiiliimna inie ahimphamaataang emmenieing sahege engkhejege eenhege, riekhie enchumhege saangram mintuhege Noah ing rukuwngsuwngte alhuw maataang eshuwga.
Engkhejege chiichuw liimge abeluwmaataang ajiidong minghuwmaahe, khangkhin ichiin mi Sapa athengleje shuwvate.
Phelhiena mi ennhie ongvate, engkhe chuw lievate, engkhechuw mavate.
Nepenuw ennhieng saang sohvatehe, engkhe lieniege, engkhechuw mavate.
“Ivier ing ongsaruw, ajiegachiinche Thangpa Jesu ajuwng eniechuw minghuwmaatenuw.
Changgechuw hevehie minghuwruw; eenpuwching ateele enruwching thengvate ate minghuwnieche, amaing ivier ing hehaaniege aeenchuw bekhiemaanie.
Changching ichiin ninnuwjeng enthongjeing ongruw, ajiegachiinche Mi Sapaching minghuw minghaluing juwngvate.
“Chogenieche achuw mine engkhena isah eenna aapuwching icha taanchana aminser ithacha arhu, engkhejege ivier minechuw achuwvate? Apuwching aminser anong etu minechuw achuwga?
Aapuwching athengle changchin atuhe minehechuw arasii itthaga.
Kieng atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, changchii mine nhingnaching aler achii adeenbekhechuw minsernavate.
Changgechuw ichamaa mineching rhierniege, ‘Kipuwpachuw ether ing tungvate,’
engkhejege aalhang minehechuw abinpe, engkhejege juw eenruwhetho sage aeenhe.
Ama mineching akharmaa iniena, aminghuwmaa aphana aapuwchuw tungniebe.
Amaing minechuw among ennhie beshuwhniege tinvate, engkhejege itthachaang aatuhethochin ahaa iriirniege ttavate.
Changchin thangven lepaachuw lunghaa suwm ing thoumhi chiheniege lerpa aantuwphuwnaing evahethoh enghaaga.
Rongahechuw enhuwrgehe engkhejege rongachuw eviergehe.
Changgechuw enhuwrhechin thoumhi chihege achiichuw thaarmaasehe;
Changgechuw evierheching thouthaartaana mhichii athaarhe.
Lerpachuw ajungtherlechin emmeniebekhe ouwngnguwhege jaarsehe.
“Yenttiim ahimpha taanchana erur eoung ‘Ebeeruw! Lerpachuw henaga! Jungshuwnung Ouwngteuphuwruw!’
Chonaching lunghaaheching hangthiehege thoumhichuw aminchuwpehe.
Enhuwrechin evierhenhingna enhier, ‘nimmhichii tepie ikhesaruw, ajiegachiinche kinthoumhi chuwmaase.’
Changgechuw evierheching abesang, Maa! Ninnuwje kinnuwje enchamaanie; ninnuw ing vanung aajuwrhenhingtena ninrotum vaalieruw!
‘Chona emvaaliether, lerpachuw thengse, engkhejege evierhe eongheching amathoh riekhie aanchumna amhinte valhuwhege eengkhaarchuw akampe.’
Inhuwte lintaang lunghaa heching thenghege enrhier, Thangpa, thangpa, imhongpisaruw!
Changgechuw amaing abesang, “atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, minghuwmaa oungchuw.”
Chotaanaching nimmhih mimvierruw, ajiegachiingche aphaje aanieje minghuwmaachuw.
“Ajiena ate inche pesar engkheing paam engkhete asiphana, aminehechuw eenge engkhejege alerchii aminserna chuwga.
Enche inhuw ijiing engkhenhingna talent ronga, engkhenhingna ennhie engkhenhingna engkhepang minsernage chona ramkhiete sise.
Talent ronga aphachin vasige sheer vataarge ronga aminthipe,
Amakhangkhing talent ennhie aphajeching sheer vataarge ennhie aminthipe.
Changechuw talent engkhe aphachin engkege khor chiige aapuwpa sheerchuw avadimpe.
“Esihpah enhuwna minehe aapuwchuw tungse engkhejege sheerbaar emvataar chuw aabiirpehe.
Talent ronga apha engkheching huwngge arhier, ‘Aanchungpa, talent ronga epesachiige; ebeer, kieing talent ronga keminthise.’
Aapuwching arhier, ‘itthapaaing natuse, ittha engkhejege ethacha arhuw mine, nang ing tepietina thacha erhu nong natuga, kieng enhimpaalina minsernavang gechie, naapuw rotha rhohnatechin valhuw.’
“Engkhejega talent ennhie aphajeching vathengge, arhier, ‘Aanchungpa, nang ing talent ennhie epechiege, ebeer, kieing talent ennhie keminthiesaase,’

Aapuwpaching anhingna arhier, ‘Ittha natuse, ittha engkhejege ethacha arhu mine, nang ing tepie panglina ethachaphuwgechie, kieing pih enhimpalina mimpanavanggechie; naapuw rotha rhohna buwmte valhuw.’

“Ama enhuwna talent engkhe aphajeching maangsohte thengge arhier, ‘Aanchungpa, kieing ichamaagechie ichie keminghuwgechie, engkhejege nang ing navormaachuw koumchiege engkhejege naajehmaa sachie chuw mingkongchiege,
Chonaching ittesaingge talent impeechiekha khorsuwngte kedimga, hevehiega natachuw.’
“ ‘Changgechuw aapuwching abesang,’ ‘itthamaa etar mine, kieing kevormaachuw kekuum, engkhejege amhuw kijehmaachuw kemingkong naminghuwga?
Chogenieche nang ing kisheerchuw sheer amintehenhingna pevang natega, engkhejege ketungle athithoh avonhii phavang ketega.
Chonaching anhingtena talent euwmchuw vesihnuwng talent suwm adeennhingte peruw.
Ajiegachiinche, adeenhenhingna pevate, engkhejege adeenmaahe tenachuw adeenbekhejechuw liechervate.
Heve ikanamaa minehie taang inthim kaarte lhinruw; ama amhinnaching aha iriirniege ttavate.’
“Mi Sapachin athang alaarthoh ajuwngle, engkhejege thangven michierhetho ajuwnglechin, amaing athang alaar ongtaana ongvate.
yaatibekhechuw Thangpa mhekungna mingkongvate, angkhejege mihechuw engkhe engkhete zou aaserpachin kirle Zouhechuw mintthevatehe,
engkhejege zouhechuw tachangte mingkongniege kirhechuw talite mingkongvatehe.
Chona eruwngching tachangna aeonghenhingna rhiervate, ‘Huwng, Epaing bor impibesa lolhiepaam abettiimpelena eruwng lepaa kebethongchuw phasaruw;
Ajiega chiin che Kevin attamle buw epechiege, kechii ahaarleje eenphuw epechiege, kieing mharpakhangkhin kethengle rukuwm etupichiege,
Keserphuw auwmmaale piendiir epechiege, ina iki ketule erhuwngsachiege, mikhum sungna keongle evirsachiege.’
“Chonaching dhormo icherheching anhingna abesanghe, ‘Thangpa, ateele navin attamle kimmhuwchii, engkhejege buw kimpichie, changmaanieche nachii ahaarle eenphuw kimpigechie?
Engkhejege mharpaing nathengle rukuwm kintuchie, changmaanieche naseh nauwmle pien kimpichie?
Engkhejege nanaale changmaanieche mikhumsungna naongle kimvirchie?’
Engkhejege eruwngching emmeniechuw abesang, ‘Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga hangchie isiingseh keu kene eenkuw nhingna nintuchuw kenhingna nintuga.’
“Chona talite aeonghenhingna rhiervate, ‘ninnuw seraap ephabesahe, kepaangna ongmaaruw, saitaanle amichierhe rotum kebethongbesa mhisungtechin engkeruw;
Ajiegachiinche, kieing kevin attamle esaaphuw epemaachuw, engkhejege kechii ahaarleje epemaachuw,
Mhar ing kethengleje rukuwm itumaachuw, keseh keongleje pien epemaachuw, kenaale engkhejege mikhum sungna keongleje evirmaachuw.’
“Chaleching emmenieing besangvatehe, ‘Aanchungpa, navin attamle, nachii ahaarle changmaanieche mikhumna naongle, engkhejege kinnuw ing rukuwm kintumaagechie?’
Chona amaing abesang, ‘Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, heve esiingseh kaarna engkhe nhingna nintumaakha kenhingna nintumaaga.’
Engkhejege heveheching ittiim enemaa tantie ephana amhinte sivatehe, changgechuw dhormo echerhechin ittiim enema irhingtechin sivatehe.”
Hevebekhehie Jesu ing arhiersuwnhuwte asepohhenhingna arhier,
“Inie nenhie aanhuwte Aminlenpi imhaarnachuw vieniege Mi Sapachuw thingkherlina thehvatehe ate nimminghuwse.”
Chove inhuwna korpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege upabekheching Kaiaphas ate khorpuw elhuwngthoh atebuhna engkongsehe,
Engkhejege amamaa chechor minsa hege Jesu chuw athennaing eenngihirpe.
Changgechuw emmenieing arhier, “amahie imhaarna enienahing tumaamenie, changmaaniebe mibekheching ttong beshuwpaavatehe.”
Ate Jesu ing Bethanina aongle enchor Simon eensuwngna,
Nepenuw engkheing amin eluwpaa riechii lhuwngbeer ivaarna hinchige Thangpabuwmte thengge buw ensaa phana alosena ajilhiepe.
Changgechuw asepohheching mhuwhege embelung sehege arhier, “Ijehme epaamga?”
“Ajiegachiinche, hevehie amin enhimpaa chin juwrmeniege sarahenhingte epee ing aetthaga.”
Amachuw Jesu ing minghuwjehge ennhingna arhier, “ajietunaching nepenuwchuw ninrhiersaaga? Amaing aetthapaa nong kenhingna atuse.
Ajiegachiinche Sarahechuwbe aanasiir aeonghaagechuw, changgechuw ninnuwchuwbe aanasiir onghaamaamenie.
Amaing heve riechii enttiirhie kie erheehvang ate aanthongnachuw ountupiga.
Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, lolhiepaam bekhena heve zelhahie aminthangnaing, heve nepenuwhing atuhie mibekheing amachuw aanthiejehnaga.”
Chalechin sepoh suwmmalhie ennhie kaarna Judas ateching khorpuw elhuwnghenhingna vage arhier,
“Kieing amachww ninnhingna asuwrnaing lhinningche ajie epevangninte?” Emmenieing sheer sumthumchuw apipehe.
Engkhejege ama aphanaching betthiimge, Jesu chuw asuwrnaing taancha aabiirpe.
Chor emvemaa imhaarna amhuwr enienaching sepohheching Jesu nhingna thenghege arhier, “Aminlenpi aemhaarnachuw enrang amimvernaing naadiechuw amhin akhunaga?”
Amaing arhier, “khupuwna aeong achuw engkhe nhingna vanung engkhejege rhierruw,” ‘Aanchungpaing arhier, keeniechuw hungviese; kieing naeensungna kesepohhetho Aelenna enie buwsachuw tusagungte.’ ”
Changchin sepohheching Jesu ing arhier enhuw ejieing Aminlen enie amhaarnachuw abethongpehe.
Kholhie ahimphache asepohhetho,
engkhejege ensaaleching, amaing arhier, “Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, ningkaarna engkheing elhinvate.”
Engkhejege embelung enhimpaa jahege engkhele engkhe ensiesehe, “kiegingmo, Thangpa?”
Amaing abesang, “Kekamsengsungna kih kimphuwmhaa amararaahchin elhinsavate.
Mi Sapachin ama khulina abejieh besa khangkhin ishuwga, changgechuw Mi Sapachuw aalhin arepaa isiiga Changchie michuw amanuw ing berhingmaaniebe tthasehvang atega.”
Judas ate aalhinpaching arhier, “Atatah kiegingmo, Aanchungpa?” Amaing abesang, “Nang ing narhier chuwga.”
Ensaaleching Jesu ing tal chuw viliege, hinnhege abekhiipe, asepohhechuw pege, arhier, “lieruw, saruw, amahie kebechiiga.”
Chona amaing belinchuw viliege chona mimpaage emmeniechuw pehege, arhier, ninnuwbekheing hevehie eenruw;
“ajiegachienche hevehie ttongdeenlina isiicher akuhna meebekhe rotum enta kethiechuwga.
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, Ipa Eruwng lepaa naching ninnuwtho heve aetthar darkha chiihie aeenna inie aviemaataang kieing avonhii ithar eenhaamaamenie.”
Lhachuw tuhege Oliv bungte sisehe.

Chona Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “kielina ninnuwbekheing atenie yennahing emachervangninte; ajiegachienche abejii besaga, ‘kieing Zou aaserpachuw mingkhervanggete, engkhejege zouhechuw enjehchervatehe.’
Changgechuw, kehangrhingnhuwna, Galilite nimmana hesivanggie.”
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Mibekhechin emacherjenie, kiechingbe mamaadehningchie.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Atatah nanhingna kerhierga, atenie yennarah aarkhuwng ing akhuwngmaataang vothummeh erhumaatenie.”
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “kieing nangtho ethie haamaataang, nangchuw bethinmaaningchie.” Engkhejege sepohbekhejeng changchin arhierhe.
Chona Jesu ing asepohhetho Gethsamani ate amhintechin vasehe, engkhejege sepohenhingna arhier, “Kieing hevenahing kehinnhiele henahing heongruw.”
Amaing Piterle Zebedee sapa ennhii rhiige, abelung ijaapaaing ongthie jaarthieluing uwmse.
Chalechin Thangpa ing ennhingna arhier, “kie ithie epha japaaning, hena ongruw, engkhejege kietho yaarluing mengsateruw.”
Engkhejege vaanseenge, lolhiena vakhuge ahinthampe, “Epa rhuniebe, heve belinhie eliepisare; changgechuw kieing kemindeen ouwngsuwmaaresie nang ing namindeenchuw ouwngshuwresie.”
Chona amaing sepohhenhingte hungngeenlise engkhejege aejaarhechuw amhuwpe; chonachin amaing Piter nhingna arhier, “hanghin ninnuw ing apha engkhedong erhiing ing aeong ninchemaaga?
Ninnuw ing hangthienung mengruw amachin aetthamaa entheem na techin bomaatenuw; ‘chipichinche atataa tuning atega, changgechuw humbechie surse.”
Avonhie vage ahinthampe, “Epa, kieing hevehie eenvang ketegekhage, heviehie iminlenpee ichepihmaateniebe, namindeenchuw ouwngshuwresie.”
Avonhie ahungngeenliche ijaarhechuw aphapehe, ajiegachienche emmhichuw enhimpaa khusehe.
Hanghin avonhie mahege avominthumna ahinthampe, ahinnhie besangengeing ehangttong.
Chona asepoh henhingte huwngge ennhingna arhier, “Ateche jaarnung ninja mindesaruw; ebeerruw, aphachuw ahimphape Mi Sapachuw isiicher henhingna pevatehe.
Hangthieruw, engketeruw, Ebeerruw, kie inlhinhechuw eennhingse.”
Hanghing amaing attongle, suwmmalhie ennhiekaarna Judas vatungge; khorpuw elhuwnghe, upaheching chimsiele romhor chihege avirhiipe.
Ate aalhinpachin bietimna pehege, arhier, “kieng ahimbeeng kebejuhchuw amaga, suwrruw.”
Chalerahching amaing Jesu paangte thengge arum, Aanchungpa tege abejuhpe.
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “kilhang, heve tuvang natechuw ture.” Chona emmenieing vahege ingkichin asuwrpehe.
Minghuwminghaluing, Jesutho enrhie engkheing achimsie ejuwge khorpuw elhuwng amine aanachuw aavehbongpe.
Chona Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nachimsiekha akhumte thaar, ajiegachienche chimsie achiheching chimsielina thevate,
Epanhingna kieing kehinrhierchemaaga techuwge nimmindeenga, engkhejege amaing thangven michier legian suwmmalhie ennhie jibethinchemaavang atega?
Changgechuw hanghin suwhnieche, thiimjii leriina suwvate atechuw ajiekhangche shuwvang atega?
Chove aphanaching Jesu ing miruhpuwhenhingna arhier, “ouwngruwchuw suwrte techuwge chimsiele romhor chichuwge ethenggechuw? Aanasier khuwngsangsungna keminchuwlechin esuwrmachuw.
Changgechuw Laarchangpahe thiimjii alir ashuwnaing hevebekhehie eshuwga. Chale asepohheching betthinhege tenchersehe.”
Jesu chuw aasuwrheching thiimdeehe engkhejege upahe aangkongna amhinte Kaiaphas khorpuw elhuwngboumte arhiepehe.
Changgechuw Piter ing endaapaaluing khorpuw elhuwng ongtaa sungte valhuhge ajie shuwvang atega tege aabiirnaing upahekaarna eonghaahe.
Ate khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege amana ouwngkong hechin ethehna arhunaing saarkhie ajongpehe.
Changgechuw amamaa saarkhie pehejenie tuwchemaahe. Enhuwte mi ennhie vathenghege,
eenrhier, “heve mihin arhier, ‘kieing Thangnhang eenhie memaangningge enie aneminthumna himmeniervanggete.’ ”
Khorpuw elhuwngching hangnierjohge arhier, “heve, saarkhielina nang ing ajiedong besangmaatenie?”

Changgechuw Jesu ing besangmaa. Chonaching khorpuw elhuwngching anhingna arhier, “Thangnhang sapachuw nanggechii, nangmaagechie, kenhingna narhiernaing kieing irhing Thangnhang ebier ingge wasah kemintugechie.”

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing narhierpe, changgechuw nanhingna kerhierga, heve enhuwna Mi Sapachin athang alaarthoh ruwngpertho enrhii ing atachangna ongniege engkhejege thangven ruduw taalina ijuwngchuw mhuvangnate.”
Chovelinaching khorpuw elhuwngching apien itthiige ahinrhier, “Amaing Thangnhangchuw ichamaaing arhierpe, heve ithi eng ajii saarkhie ajongna umvate? Ninnuw ing heve ichamaaing ettonghie ninthiepe.
Ninnuw ing ninniernachuw akhukhaga?” Emmenieing abesanghe, “Ama ithie arhuse.”
Chona emmenieng amhena becherhege engkhejege sohege, lintangchin amhena ebeenghege enrhier,
“Aantinpa! nang achuw ing ingeebeengga hinrhier?”
Ate Piter ing bichaartuna amhin taangna aongle mine lunghaa engkheching thengge arhier, “nanghie Galilitena Jesu tho enrhiehagechie.”
Changgechuw amaing mibekhe mhekungna ahinrhier, “kieing narhierhie minghuw maaing.”
Tebouhte avashuwche lintaang lunghaaing amhuwtaana enierhekaarna ahinrhier, “heve pesarhie Nazarethna Jesu tho enrhiehagehe.”
Avonhie wasah atu, “ama pesarchuw minghuwmaaing.”
Uwmphege apaangna eongheching thenghege Piter nhingna arhier, “atataa nangje engkaarna engkhegechie, ajiegachienche nattong ing amindangga.”
Chona amaing ataachuw seraap empege wasah hintuge, “kieing ama pesarchuw minghuwmaaing” Chalerahching aarkhuwngchuw khuwngse.
Chona Piter ing Jesu ing arhierchuw aanthiepe; “Aarkhuwnging akhuwngmaalhiele, nang ing vothum irhumaatenie.” Engkhejege jungshuwge ejapaaing ttaase.
Yieng ahungvieche khorpuw elhuwnghe, engkhejege upabekheching entanahege athehnachuw aminjongpehe.
Emmenieing phierhege arhiepehe, engkhejege lepaa aapuh Pilat nhingte apipehe.
Aalhinpa Juda ing Jesu chuw aminlaarpehe atechuw athietaanaching alaarchuw minghuwge sheer sumthumchuw khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege upahenhingna avichipe.
Amaing arhier, “kieng amaraar euwmmaa thiechuw kelhintanaching isiikha ketupe,” changgechuw emmenieing arhier, “Chovechuw kinthu uwmmaa, nathienening ebiersare.”
Sheerchuw Thangnhang eenna vilhinge, engkege rhuw ing enraase.
Changgechuw khorpuw elhuwngheching sheerchuw, viliehege arhierhe, “hevehie sheerboursungte ethaar tthamaanie, amahie thiechena sheerga.”
Ttong ingeentana enhuwna ramkhie ethenghe adimna beer atuhe amhinchuw aalienapehe.
Chovelinaching ama phelhiechuw thiephega tehege ateniephanang arhiernahe.
Laarchangpa Jeremiah ing arhier ttongchuw alir ashuwpe; “Engkhejege sheer aseh suwmthumchuw liehege Israel sitiheching amin amenebesalina aalhaanghe.
Engkhejege Thangnhang ing ttongtho apikhangkhin emmenieching beer atunahe phelhie rotumna apipehe.”
Ate Jesu chuw paam aapuw mhekungna niirse engkhejege paam aapuwching asie, “Nanghie Jehudihe eruwnggechii?” Jesu ing arhier, “nang ing narhierchuwga.”
Changgechuw khorpuw elhuwnghele upahechin minlaarjenie amaing besangmaa.
Chotaanaching Pilat ing anhingna arhier, “nataalina hangjehmeh imminlaarhehie nathiemaaga?”
Changgechuw, besangmaase, ttong engkhedong rhiermaase, chonaching lepaa aapupachuw alu liimse.
Ate anunuing imhaarna kummhesungna mi engkhe mikhumsungtena ingngeediechuw abethinna ehungviega.
Chaleching Barabbas ate ichuwmaa mikhumna eong.
Hanghin ingeengkonglechin Pilat ing ennhingna arhier, “achuw che ninrotumna bethinning nintega, Barabbas changmaaniiche Aantinpaga ate Jesu hie?”
Ajiegachiinche emmenieing kallaahege avipeegehe atechuw Pilat ing aminghuwga.
Waajiir tuna aongtaalina aongle alumheeng anhingna arhier, “dhormo icher heve mitaalina ajiidong tumaare, ajiegachienche hevelina keromhangna ijasapaging.”
Chalechin khorpuw elhuwnghe upahe engkhejege miruhpuw heching Barabbaschuw abethinna engkhejege Jesu chuw athenaing atupehe.
Paam aapuching ennhingna avonhie arhier, “Heve ennhii kaarna achuwche bethinre nintega?” Engkhejege emmenieing arhier, “Barabbas.”
Pilat ing ennhingna arhier, “Chogenieche Aantinpa ate Jesu hie ajie minluresie nintega?”
Mibekheching enrhier, “ama thingkherlina theresie!”
Chotaanaching amaing asiehe, “ajietunaching, ajie itthamaa atuga?” Changgechuw emmenieng ethiseh uwnghege, “Thingkherlina theresie!”

Chonaching Pilat ing ajiedong tuchemaasing atetahna iraang ishuwchuw amhuwtaana chii hinchige emmhekungna akih ithriige arhier, “dhormo echer heve milinahin thie ebow kemaraar uwmsamaaing, nintaaing ebersaruw.”
Mibekhechin engkhepang ing abesanghe, “Ama athiehie kintaalina engkhejege kinsitihelina boresie!”
Changchin ama aanhuwna Barabbaschuw enrotumna abethinpe; changgechuw Jesu chuw binriihege thingkherlina athehnaing apipe.
Chona lepaa aarhung raarmiheching Jesu chuw lepa aapu ongna amhintechin arhiepehe, engkhejege emmeniebekheching amachuw aaherpoh pehe.
Emmenieing apiendiir bejohcherhege pien isin aminserpehe.
Engkhejege emmenieing ilhing luhuw etthiehege alose na amingkhumpehe. Aki tachangna thingbaa minchihege amhekungna ingkhiruwkhuw phinhege enrhier, “He Jehudihe Eruwng!”
Ataalinaje abecherpehe, thingbaachuw viliehege alosena aminverhe.
Engkhejege Thangpa chuw meniehege pien aminserhe isinchuw liepeecherhege apienchuw minserhege, thingkherlina athenaing arhiepehe.
Hanghin inghungsile Sirenetena Simonchuw menamhege thingkherchuw aminrinhe.
Engkhejege Golgotha aminghuwnachuwbe loseruw amhin, ahimphale,
darkha chii sameetho mimvehege amingeenhe, changgechuw mintinge, amaing eenmaase.
Ate Jesu chuw thingkherlina aben jamhege athehnhuwtehe enrepaa ebierhege apienchuw itthiihege asimpehe;
Engkhejege onghege amachuw arhungpehe.
Aloselina arhunamahe ttong bejiihege, hanghin apahe, “amahie Jesu, Jehudihe Eruwngga.”
Chona ouwngruw mi ennhiechuw amatho thingkherlina, engkhechuw tachangte, engkhechuw talite athehpehe.
abuwmna isitung atuheching ouwngluw elehege,
engkhejege arhierhe, “Thangnhang een memaangteniege inie aminthumna nahintuche nang ing nathienen engkarsare! Nang Thangnhang Sapagetenieche thingkherlitena jungttum.”
Changngenge ichiin khorpuw elhuwnghe, thiimdeehe engkhejege upaheching meniehege enrhier,
“amaing lintaanghechuw karchege, ataache engkarchemaa. Ama Israelhe Eruwngga atele thingkhertaalitena jungttumresie, engkhejege kinnuw ing thachavangginte.
Amaing Thangnhang chuw thachage, amaing idenieche atelerah Thangnhang ing karpiresie, ajiegachienche amaing arhier, ‘kie Thangnhang Sapaging.”
Aboumna ouwngruw athehejeching changching echona ttong ing abiehe.
Siimttimchuw himphage apaambekhena apha ouwngthumna minthimpohse.
Apha ouwngthum rovena Jesu ing uwngge, “Eli Eli lema Sabakthani?” Ama atenachuwbe, “Ke-Thangnhang, kethangnhang, ajietunaching emmaagechie?”
Apaangna eneerheching chovechuw athieheche arhierhe, “Heve mihin Elijah aeennaa.”
Chaleraaching mi engkheing chiiju viliege ethuwr chiina luhge thingbaa lina etherge Thangpachuw eenre tege api.
Changgechuw lintaangheching, enrhier “Haaphe, Elijahchin juwngniege karpivatemo ebeerteruw.”
Chona Jesu ing avonhie uwngge chipi abethinpe.
Chaleraaching Thangnhang eensungna akhar pienchuw alirna bettiimge aderphanaing aseh ennhie shuwge entthiise; lolhieje enchiimse, lhungpuwheje kiecherse.
Thenbekheje emmhongse, engkhejege ithiebesa enthiinghe humbekheje hangthiesehe.
Ahangrhingnhuwte thentena hungshuwhege inthiing khuwpuwna mi enhimpaahetho enteuhsehe.

Ate raarmi roza engkhe aapuw engkhejege aanrhiiphuwheching Jesu chuw rhunghege, amana ishuw lienglaang etheng engkhejege ishuwbekhe amhuwheche ittelamthihege arhierhe, “atataa heve mihie Thangnhang Sapaga.”
Chalechin nepenuw enhimpaaing raarkhena aabiirche; emmeniechuw Galilitena asepa etupeena ahinjiegehe.
Engkaarnaching Mary Makdalene, Josephle Jakob amanuw Mary, engkhejege Zebedee sapahe emmanuwgehe.
Kholhie ahimphale Arimathiatena savang engkhe aromhing Joseph ateching, amaje Jesu sepohna emvebesaga.
Amaing Pilat nhingte vanhesage Jesu humchuw anhiesaape chona Pilat ing arhupina ttong apipe.
Changchin Joseph ing Jesu humchuw valiege enthiingpaa limon pien ing aelhumge,
engkhejege arotumna itharje lhungpuw viliige asiibeshasungna amintorpe. Chona amaing elhuwngpaa lhungpeechin then inkhaarchuw mingkhumge engkese.
Ama amhinnaching Mary Makdalene engkhejege lintaang Maryheje then apaangna eonghe.
Inie amenhiena, nong abethongna inie aanhuwna khorpuw elhuwng engkhejege Pharisi heching Pilat nhingna engkonghege
enrhier, “Aanchungpa, heve echamaa mihin arhingle inie amin thumna hangrhingvanggete atechuw kinthiese!

Chotahnaching thenhie inie nethum etthaje arhungnaing irhierpee, changmaaniebe asepohheching thengheniege berovatehe amaing ithie kaartena hangrhingse teheniege erhiir arhuse; changmaaniebe mensana amamaa ttongching nhungkur ithi eng itthamaa shuwvate.”
Pilat ing ennhingna arhier, “aarhunghe raarmihechuw varhieruw; vanung itthajeh ing minrhungruw.”
Hanghin engkehege aarhunghetho ataalina chum namhege thenchuw aminrhungpehe.
Eongna inie achinhuwna, hapta mensa inie ahungwaarle, Mary Makdalene, lintaang Mary ing thenchuw avavirhe.
Engkhejege minghuw minghaluing amana eperpaa lienglaang thengge, Thangnhang michier chin thangventena jungttumge lhungchuw belehjohge ataalina aeong.
Amhechuw bitti ethengthoh enghaaing apiendiirje ruwbuwr Aewaarkhangkhin iwaar.
Aarhunghechuw enttiilamthi ing ithiehe ngengeching tiesehe.
Changgechuw thangven michierchin nepenuwhe nhingna arhier, “Ittemaaruw, ninnuw ing thingkherlina ithie Jesu chuw ninjongga ichii keminghuwse.
Ama hena ongmaase, ataaing arhier khangkhin hangrhingse, amintorna amhinchuw vanung ebeerruw.
Chonaching enrang engkenung asepohhe nhingna vatongruw; ama ithietena hangrhingse, engkhejege nimmana Galilete hesise, amana ouwngtuvangninte hevehie kie kettongjirchuwga.”
Changchin thenchuw enrang mahege enttiipaaing engkhejege rotha rho ing sepohhenhingna attongnaing tensehe.
Minghuw minghaluing Jesu ing ouwngteuphuwhege arhier, “nongesaruw!” Engkhejege emmenieng vaanheenghege, akhichuw bechuwhege, engkhejege arumpehe.
Chona Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “ettemaaruw, vasinung keu-kenehechuw Galilete varuw tenuwng rhierruw, Chove mhinnachin kiechuw emhuwvatehe.”
Emmenieing emvasile lintaang aarhungheching khuwpuwte vahege khorpuw elhuwnghenhingna ishuwbekhechuw atongpehe.
Chovelinachin khorpuwhele Upaheching tanahege raarmihenhingna sheer enhimpaa pehege amimverpehe,
ennhingna hanghin arhierhe, “kinjaarther sepoh heching thenghege aberupehe, tenuwng rhierrimruw.
Heve ttonghie lepaa Aapuing thieheniebe amachuw kinnuw ing minimnungnge eja phamatenuw.”
Hanghin sheerchuw aelhaanghege turuw ate enhuw ijiieng atupehe. engkhejege heve theminhie atenie iphaang Jehudihe kaarna atonggehe.
Ate Jesu ing arhier enhuw ejiieng sepoh suwmmalhieengkheching Galili bounglite vasisehe.
Jesuchuw emmhuwtaanaching arumpehe; changgechuw lintaangheching inning irhiihe.
Engkhejege Jesu ing huwngge ennhingna arhier, “Thangvenna engkhejege lolhiepaamna itu achena kenhingna impipe.
Siruw, ajiegachienche Yaatibekhechuw Kesepoh beshuwruw, engkhejege Amapa, Asapa amana Chipi Enthiing romhingna chii luhpiruw,
engkhejege, kettongtho hevebekhehie minchuwruw. Engkhejege, kum attiimmaataang enrhiephuwvanggechuw ketehie enthietiruw.”
Thangnhang sapa Jesu Khrista aettha ttongjiir abettiimna.
Laarchangpa Isaiah ing abejii khangkhing,
“Ebeerruw, ‘kieing naamana ttongjiir irin kevicheer,
amaing ninlham bethongvate;’
Rampasungna erur engkheching uwngge:
‘Thangpa alhamchuw bethongruw,
alhamchuw minteumruw!’ ”
Rampasungna Chiilupa Johonchuw emphuwngge, isiikhatena akarna engkhejege belung amintenaching aminthang.
Engkhejege Judea ram bekhena, engkhejege Jerusalemna aeong mibekheching anhingna thenghege; isiikha eentubekhechuw phuwnghege Jordon chiiwana chii alupehe.
Johon ing sariingsie mhuwr pien aser, adierhiinna savin ing enchiimge, engkhejege Khesiele rampa khiinhiing asaa.
Amaing aminthang, “kinhuwna thengvang ate Thangpachin kie ithi ing atuchega, Thangpa kheekhum rhuw enjoh kechena uwmmaa.
Kieing ninnuwchuw chiisungna Keluhpechuw, changgejenie amaing ninnuwchuw Enthiing Chipiching eluhpivate.”
Chove enienaheching, Galili Nazarethtena Jesuchuw thengge Jordon chiiwana chii aluhpe.
Chiisungtena ahungsuwle Thangven emmhongge Chipi Enthiing ijuwttumchuw amaing amhuw.
Chalechin Thangventena irurchin arhier, “nanghie kening Keminsiipaa Kesapagechie, Kieing nanhingna kening chimsane.”
Engkhejege Chipichin minghuwminghaluing rampasungte arhiepe.
Amaing rampasungna inie summillie rampasahekarna Seitan ing betheemge, engkhejege Thangven michierhing arhunghe.
Ate Johonchuw suwrhege aanhuwdehna Jesu ing Galilitena vathengge Thangnhang aettha ttongjiirchuw amminthang pe
engkhejege arhier, “aphachuw alir asuwpe, engkhejege Thangnhang eruwng lepaachuw innheengse, engkhejege aettha ttongjiirchuw thacharuw.”
Hanghin Jesu ing Galili rimchiikurna ahuwngle, Simon, anepa Andrew ing rimchiina ichaa adeeng amhuwpe ajiegachiinche emmeniehie ngaalagehe.
Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “huwngruw, kinhuw ejiiruw, kieing mi isuwr besuwvanggechuw.”
Engkhejege, chalerahchin ichaachuw mahege ajiepehe.
Endah luwng imvasile Zebedi sapahe Jakoble anepa Johonchuw amhuwpehe, emmenieching ruwkuwngsungna ichaa iphiehege aeonghe.
Chalerahching emmapa Zebedi amana avehe minehchuw mahege ajiepehe.
Chona Kapernaumte vahege, engkhejege eongna inie hungviega khuwngsangna valhuwge aminchuwhe.
Emmenieng amaing aminchuwlina eenluw eliimhe, ajiegachiinche Thiimdeehechin aminchuw khangkhinmaage atuche engkeing aminchuwtaanachinga.
Chaleching, khuwngsang sungna ronham arin pesar aeong,
Engkhejege, amaing euwng, “kinnhingna ajie tute natega, Nazareth tena Jesu? Kinnuwhie aememaangvang ichien ethenggechie? Nang Thangnhang Enthieng enkhegechie echii keminghugechie.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing aesehge, arhier, “Derengre, engkhejege jungshuwre!”
Engkhejege, ebuwr chipichin imhehriige eperpaa erur ing uwngge jungshuwse.
Emmeniebekhechin eenluw rhiisehe, enthenen ing ettonghe, “Hevehie ajiega? Ethar ttong aminchuw-atuchehtho enrhiing. Amaing ebuwr chipihechin attongthohhie aminjiihie,”
Engkhejege Galili ing aruwkuwr paam bekhenaching akhu enjaamse.
Enrang ing emmenieng khuwngsang mahege Jakoble Johonthoh enrhiihege Simonle Andrew eente valhuhsehe.
Ate Simon amapichuw arhii thengge ajaartaana ouwngtor, engkhejege, chovechuw anhingna atonghe.
Amaing vage abenna bechuwge ahingkipe, chona arhii ithengchuw dese, engkhejege ensepa atupipehe.
Ama akholhie inie ajungbuhle emmenieng inabekhe amana ronham adeenhechuw avirhiihe.
Engkhejege ama khuwpuhna eongbekhe eengkhaarkungna ouwngkongsehe.
Engkhejege inahe, lintaang lintaang rhiereh chuw mintthaage, engkhejgege ronham irin enhimpaaje athorpe; engkhejege ronhamhechin ttongmaahe, ajiigachiinche emmenieing Khristaga ichii aminghuwgehe.
Yiengna enrangpaaing, khuw avaarmaa-lhiele hangthiege amana jungshuwge idepaa amhin engkhena vage Amapanhingte ahinthampe.
Amana Simonle lintaangheching aanhuw ajonghe,
Emvatuwche, emmenieing arhier, “Mibekheing eenjongnaahe,”
Amaing abesang, “Inieing arove khuwpuhbekhena siteruw, amanaje ttongjiir minjaamteruw, ajiegachiinche amalina ijuwngging.”
Engkhejege amaing Galile paam bekhena vasige khuwngsangbekhena engkhejege ronhamhechuw thorpihege aminjaampe.
Enchor ing epen engkhe thengge, anhingna nhesage, akhiruwkhuw phinge anhingna arhier, “nang ing erhupiteniebe eminthiengpi chevangniete.”
Alungsiichuw thengge, Jesu ing aben vijamge aparpe, engkhejege anhingna arhier, “Kieing Kerhupisechii, minthiengsare!”
Chaleraaching ipenchuw uwmmaase, engkhejege ama minthiengse.
Eperpaaing rhierpige, bethinge amingkepe.

anhingna arhier, “Ibeerre, hevehie achuwnhingnadong tongmaare, changgechuw vasi eng khorpuwnhingna vaaminthii engkhejege naminthiingnachuw Mosi ing arhier enhuw ejieng pihchuw saarkhii amindangna vape.

Changgechuw amaing engkege amabekhechuw minthiehege etong abetthiimpe,” engkhejege ttongchuw aminjaampe, chonaching Jesu ing khuwpuwna endang ing thengchemaase, changgechuw aram taangte, ideh asierte ongge ariekieng bekhetena mi ethenghe.
Inie tiepieh enhuwte amaing Kapernaumtena ahungngeenlile, eenna aeongga tehege aminthanghe.
Chonaching mi enhimpaaching ouwngkonghege adeen engkhedong ruwmaase, maangsoh ingkhaarje, engkhejege amaing ennhingna ttong aminchuwhe.
Chaleching miheching thenghege, aki akhi ithie pesarchuw mi millieing avidumhe.
Jesu apaangnaching mi anhimlhamthi eng invirhiichemaataanaheching, eenchungte hangkarhege ajaarnathoh ajih bebupehe.
Jesu ing enthachachuw amhuwtaanaching, amaing aki akhi ithienhingna arhier, “Kesapa, isikha bekhe kekupipechie.”
Ate amana aeong thiimdeeheching embelungriirna tehege,
“Ajietuna heve pesar ing hangchie ettongga? Amahie Thangnhang ing arhumaa arhierga! Thangnhang maaniege achuw ing isiikha akuhpichega?”
Chalerahching Jesuchuw Chipi ing entanabekhe ensiehechuw minghuwge; engkhejege amaing innhingna arhier, “Ajietunaching nimbelungriirna hevehie ensiegechuw?
‘Isiikha natuchuw kekuhpipechie,’ Changmaaniiche, ‘hangniir ing naduw chuw chi ing bevere’ ketettonglina akhukhin ilesehga?
Changgechuw, hevehin Mi sapaching simriipaamna isiikha akuhpichega ate minghuwvangninte.” Amaing aki akhi ithienhingna arhier–
“Nanhingna kerhierga, hangniir, naduw chi ing naeente engke.”
Amaing hangniirge, chalerahching aduwchuw chige mihe mhekungna engkese; chonaching miheching ouwngluw liimge Thangnhangchuw mimpaahege, arhierhe, “hangchiihie eniening mhuwmaadelhiimie.”
Jesu ing avonhie rimchiikurte evasi, mi rupuwheching arovena ouwngkonghege, engkhejege aminchuwhe.
Hanghin ahungsile khachana akhuwm amhinna Alphaeus sapa Levi eongchuw amhuw, amana anhingna arhier, “Ijiere.” Engkhejege hangthiege aanhuw ajiepe.
Engkhejege kholhie buw asaana Levi eenna engongleching khachana ikhuwm amana isiikha etuhejechuw Jesule sepohhethoh eonghe ajiegachiingche mi enhimpahing aanhuw ajiihe.
Pharisehe thiimdeehechin rampaar itthehe, isiikha atuheching amathoh asaahe chuw amhuwheche, emmenieing sepoh henhingna enrhier, “ajietunaching amaing khachana itthiinghe, isiikha ituhetho asaaga?”

Jesu ing amachuw athietaanaching ennhingna arhier, “Achuw engkhe enamaaheching ithiimchuw ngemaahe, changgechuw aenahechingga; kieing dhormo echerhechuw eengete tengge ethengmaaging changgechuw isiikha etuhe rotumga.”
Ate Johon sepohhele Pharisiheching vinttaam tonghege; angkhejege miheching thenghege anhingna asie, “Ajietunaching Johon sepohhele Phariseheching buw ahiele, nasepoheng buw ahiemaagehe?”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Riekhii ouwngchumna imhaar engkongheching Lerpa aongletaang buw hiemaahe, changmaaga? Lerpaching aongletaangching, emmenieching buw hiemaahenie.
Aaniechuw hungvieniege Lerpachuw ennhingtena engkevate, engkhejege chaleching buw hievatehe.
“Achuwdonging beluw pienlina ithar pien itthiemaa, iphieniebe, choveching beluwtena ithar pienchuw kiniege ama ithiseh ing entthiivate.

Engkhejege beluw sawin thuwngna ithar darkha chii thaarmaa, changgeniebe darkha chiichuw phuwrniege sawin thuwngchuw puwvate, engkhejege darkha chiithoh sawin thuwngchuw maangne; changgechuw ithar darkha chiichuw ithar sawin thuwngna athaarga.”
Eongna inie engkhena Jesu ing saangberna ehungsi; engkhejege asepohhe isihaaheching saangchuw abejiihe.
Phariseheching anhingna arhier, “Ebeer, ajietunaching eongna iniena waajir ttong ing arhumaa atugehe?”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “David ing ataa engkhejege aanrhiiphuwheng buw evehlina, engkhejege imvin attamle atuhechuw nimpamaalhiega?
Amaing Thangnhang eenna valhuwge, Abiathar ing khorpuw elhuwng atule, engkhejege khorpuwhemaaniege aesah arhumaa enthiing euwmjeh talchuw asaakhabe, amana aanrhiiphuwhejeching asachuw nimpamaaga?”
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “Eongna iniehie miherotum asemga.
Hanghin Mi Sapaje eongna inie taalina aapuwga.”
Avonhie Jesu ing khuwngsangte valhuwge, amana aki ithie pesar engkhe eong.
Emmenieing amaraar ajongnaing eongna enienaching mintthaavatemo tehege iriimjehhege aabiirhe.
Engkhejege aben ithie pasarnhingna arhier, “Kemana huwng,”
Chona ennhingna arhier, “Hevehie waajiir ttong ing arhugemo changmaanieche amemaangnagemo eongna eniena rhingrie akarna changmaanieche athehna atuchaakhang?” Changgechuw emmenieing derengsehe.
Abelung isiing arovechuw ebeerge, amaing embelung inhehpaa linaching jasage, engkhejege pesarnhingna arhier, “naben vihjam.” Amaing abenchuw avihjamche akichuw tthaase.
Pharisiheching jungshuwhege Herodmihethoh Jesuchuw athehna ttong entanasehe.
Jesu ing asepohhetho rimchiikurte engkesehe, engkhejege amana Galiletena mi ruhpuwheching aanhuw ajiehe.
Amaing atubekhechuw enthietaanaching Jerusalemtena, Judeatena engkhejege Idumea, Jordon raarkhetena, engkhejege Tyrele Sidon arovetena mi enhimpaa ethenghe.
Chonaching Jesu ing sepohhenhingna ruwkuwng engkhe minjonghege mi changjehmehching aalhumnamaaing arhier;
Hanghin mi inhimpaa mintthaage, inabekheching puwhege amachuw parte atepehe.
Ebuwr ronhamheching amhuwtaanahe abuwmna tiehege amhekungna euwnghe, “Thangnhang Sapa nang!”
Changgechuw miheching amachuw aminghuwnamaaing eperpaing arhier.
Amaing bounglite hangkarge amaing aadiehechuw eenhege anhingna ethenghe.
Engkhejege suwmmalhie ennhiechuw itourge Ttongjiirpa ichiin romhing phuwge, apaangna thengheniege ttongjiir aminjaamna nonglina acheernaing,
engkhejege ronhamhechuw athorchena apipehe.
Hanghing suwmmalhie ennhiechuw aatourpe; Simon Petertege aphuw.
Zebedee Sapa Jacob engkhejege Jakob anepa Johon, emmenie hie Boanerges, bitti ebuw sapahe atenaga;
Engkhejege Mathi, Thoma, amana Alphaeus sapa Jakob, amana Thaddas, Kanaantena Simon,
Engkhejege Judas Eskariot, aalhingpa. Chona ama aeente engkese.
Engkhejege mi ruhpuw ethenghechuw ouwngkonghege buw isaje phamaasehe.
Aeengkuwheching amachuw enthietaanachin tumaaresie tehege avaantuh phuwhe, ajiegachienche miheching “Amahie amamaate amindeenpehe” atetaanagehe.
Engkhejege Jerusalemtena thiimdeeheching thenghege arhier, “Amahie Bulzebul ing atoungpe, engkhejege ronhamhe aapuwchin ronham hechuw athorga.”
Engkhejege emmeniechuw eenge ttongttiim atongpihe, “Ajiekhang seitan ing Seitan thorvang atega?
Eruwng lepaaching enlehmaahenieche changchie eruwng lepaachuw neerchemaanie.
Engkhejege eengkuwching ennajir enlehmaahenieche, ama engkuwchuw neerchemaanie.
Engkhejege seitanching athienen ing ouwngrhumaaniege, kiehenieche, ama neerchemaanie changgechuw attuhnachuw iviega.
“Changgechuw eperpaa mi eenna valhuwniege, eperpaa michuw mensa phiermaanieche, apee aseh isiih chemaanie; aphiernhuwte apee asehchuw liechevang atega.
“Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, isiikha atuhe, engkhejege emmenieing amamaa ttongheniege, emmenieing isiikha atuhe amamaa ittonghechuw kupivate;
changgechuw achuw engkheing Chipi Enthiing taalina amamaaing ttongniebe ikupih phamaadehhenie, changgechuw ittiim enemaa isiikha lina alaarchuw phasavate.”
Ajiegachiinche emmenieng arhier, “Ama ebuwr chipi adeenga.”
Chona Jesu amanuwle anehe thenghege tebuthorna neerhege Jesuchuw ajungshuwnaing ttong abethahe.
Arovena aeong mi ruhpuwheching iherpohhege, engkhejege emmenieng anhingna arhier, “nangnuw engkhejege nanehe, nasarheching tebuna onghege enjongnahe.”
Amaing abesang, “Achuwheche aenage, engkhejege keu kenegehe?”
Engkhejege, amachuw ruwkuwrhege aeonghenhingna amaing arhier, “emmeniehie ina chona keukenegehe!
Achuwchuwgejenie Thangnhang ing amindeen atubekheching keukene, engkhejege kesar engkhejege inaga.”
Avonhie amaing rimchiikurna aminchuw abetthiimpe. Mi anhimlamthi taanaching ruwkuwngsungte karge ongse, mibekheje rimchii kurnaching aeonghe.
Amaing ttongtiim ing enhimpaa aminchuwna abetthiimpe engkejege aminchuwleching ennhingna arhier.
“Rongeruw, sachii aavorpaching sachii evor sige,
Engkhejege avorche, alhehing lhampuwna boge vatiheching aachuwmcherpe.
Litaangching lhungkaarna boge, per enhim auwmmaataana enrang ing mhuwngse, perchuw aanthumatana,
enie ahangshuwche, ineensaing adeengpe; arojung apimaataana, jungjuwrse.
Lintaang sachiiching ilhingkaarna boge, engkhejege elhingching hanglhuwngge akhumpe, engkhejege aanra viemaase.
Lintaang sachiiching ittha lolhiena boge aanra uwmse, hanglhuwngge engkhejege hinthige aanra suwmthum, engkhejege suwmruh, amana roza hanghin enrase.”
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “Achuw engkhe aana iuwmching rongesing thieresie!”
Athienen ing aongle, akurna aeonghetho sepohhe summalhie ennhiiheching ttongttiim lina asiihe.
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “ninnhingna enthu ttong” Thangnhang Eruwng paamlina kerhierpigechuw, changgechuw taangna aeonghenhingna ttongttiim kepigehe;
“‘Emmenieing ibeervatehe changgechuw mhuwmaahenie, engkhejege rongerimvatehe, changgechuw minghuwmaahenie; hanghin vaanleheniege ikuhpivatehe ichiin mindeen vatehe.’”
Engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “heve ttongttiimhie nimminghuwse? Chogenieche ajiekhang hevebekhe ttongttiim hie ninnuw ing minghuwvang nintega?
Sachii aavorpaching zelhachuw avor.
Hevehe Kaarna lhampuwna zelhachuw avorche, emmenieing thiehege Seitanching insungna avorchuw chaleraching thengge aliepipe.
Engkhejege ittha ttongjiirchuw rotharhoing aalhaang lhungkaarna avorchuwga;
Changgechuw arojun apichemaa taana apha tepie khaanghege; enhuwte heve ttongjiirlina immenang changmaanieche ijaachaam impha taanchana enrang ing khih minsiehege tiesehe.
Engkhejege lintaang ilhingkaarna avorching ttongjiirchuw rongehege,
changechuw lolhiepaam lerchiilina, lintaang lintaang aadie belungriir valhuwge ttongjiirchuw abeherpe, hanghin aanrachuw viechemaase.
Engkhejege lolhie ettaahna avorching, emmeniening ttongjiirchuw thiehege aalhaanghe, saruh suwmthum, suwmruh engkhejege roza engkhephana enrasehe.”
Amaing innhingna arhier, thoumhichuw asiitaana sehluwng beluhderna changmaanieche ejaartaa derna asiimaaga, engkhejege thoumhi asiitalina asiimaakhang?
Ajiegachiinche imphuwngmaavang ichii ouwngruw ing isii uwmmaa, engkhejege emphuwngmaavang ate ajiedong eummaa, elengte endangvate.
“Achuw engkhe aana euwnching thiesaresie!”
Engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing ninthielina belung peruw, ninnuw ing nimvur chaanglina ninnuwje evurvate, engkhejege ama ithisheh phavangninte.
Ajiegachiinche aadeenpaching phasevate; engkhejege adeenmaa minhingtenachuw adeenbekhe liechervate.”
Amajing arhier, “Thangnhang Eruwngpaamchuw achuw engkheing lolhiena amhuwchuw vorge,
engkhejege yaarge yen siim neluing ehanglhuwng amana amhuwchuw kiege, hangmhuwngge, amachuw amaing ajiekhang imhuwngga minghuwmaa.
Lolhienaching hangpege, mensaing abaa siinge, chona adeen, amana aanrachuw hungviese.
Changgechuw aanrachuw mhinge chona thaangki abetthumpe, ajiegachiinche, saangkuumphachuw avietaanaga.”
Amaing avonhie arhier, “ajieching Thangnhang Eruwng lepaachuw mindeengteruw. Changmaanieche ajie ttongttiimchuw ikanavate?
Amahie inttamamhuw engkhe lolhiena vorge, amhuwhekaarna isiingseh amhuwgejenie.
Vorge chovechuw hanglhuwngse engkhejege thingsiinghe kaarna elhuwngseh hungeenshuwhse, engkhejege abaahechuw enjaamse, engkhejege minventena vatiheching adeliimna enruwvuw ahuwpe.”
Hangchiehie emmemie ing arongechenaching ttongttiim enhimpaa ennhingna ttong arhierpihe;
Amaing ttongttiimmaaniege innhingna ttongmaa, changgechuw sepohhe enthenenpangna amindangpiga.
Ama inie kholhiena amaing innhingna arhier, “Enieng raarkhete elenteruw.”
Engkhejege mi ruhpuwchuw mahege sepohheching Jesu ongna ruwkuwngsungte karhege engkhejege aeongje Jesuchuw arhiepehe amana lintaang ruwkuwngje emvehe.
Eperpaa khuwthie rhaangse, ruwkuwngje mimverge chiiching siikangrong atepe.
Changgechuw Jesuche ruwkuwngsungna ideje ing aejaar engkhejege emmenieng amachuw bethiehege enrhier, “Thiimpuw, therong etehie tho nasamaaga?”
Amaing hangthiege thiechuw arukuhpe, engkhejege rimchii chuw arokuhpe, “Mindere, dereng!” Chona thierhaangchuw aminchinpe, engkhejege ethietho enghaajeh dese.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajietuna enttiigechuw? Ate ephaing ninthacha aeuwmmaaga?”
Engkhejege emmenieng ethiseh aettehege, engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “chogeniebe thiele rimchii ing attong aminjiehie achuwga?”
Emmenieing rimchii paangkhete Gerasene raarkhete huwngsehe.
Engkhejege amaing ruwkuwngtena ajungttumche then kaartena pesar engkhe ebuwr chipi ing atoungchuw eentuhseh.
Amaing then Kaarna paarge atebe achuwdong ing thiirrhuwjeng phierchemaahe.
Ajiegachinche aphabekhena thiirrhuw ing akih akhichuw aphiergehe changgechuw amabekhe ipehcherge achuwdong ing bethechemaahe.
Aphabekhena yennaje thenkaarna engkhejege bounglina uwngge athienening lhung ing emvar.
Jesuchuw raarkhena avimhuwtaana vatenge aruwmsaape;
Engkhejege achebekhe uwngge arhier, “Ajii tugete entegechii, Jesu, Engkaangseh Thangnhang Sapa? Thangnhangchuw sursa ingge ajiedong imin ja saamaare.”
Chonaching Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Ebuwr chipi nang, anhingtena jungshuw!”
Chona Jesu ing anhingna asii, “Naromhing ajiega?” Amaing abesang, “Keromhingchuwbe Legionga; ajiegachiinche kinnuw enhimpaagung.”
Amaing paam lintaangte ichiirsamaare tege anhiesaape.
Ate ama boungpaangna voh aarupuw engkhe mhaarhege euwm.
Engkhejege ebuwr chipiheching anhingna anhiisahe, “vohkaarnahing ichiir ing valhuwsaginte.”
Changching amaing arhupipe. Engkhejege ebour chipiheching jungsuwhege vohkaarte valhuwsehe; ama rupuwchuw chiing ennhiebekhegehe, aangkheng ouwngkhona jungtenhege rimchiisungte bowsehe.
Voh aaserhechin tenhege apaam khupuwhekhena atongpehe. Chonaching mibekheing ajie ishuwga ichii aabiirnaing thengsehe.
Emmenie ing Jesu nhingna avaaheche ibuwr chipi ing atoung miching mitatahkhangkhing pien serge aeong, mi enhimpaa romhing arin legionchuw mhuwhege attiepehe.
Ebuwr chipi ing atoungpa chuw engkhejege voh ruhpuw aamhuwheching ishuwbekhechuw atongpehe.
Chonaching emmenieing Jesunhingna ama arovechuw ebethinpisare tehege anhiihe.
Hanghing amaing ruwkuwngsungte ahangkarle ebuwr chipi atouung miching amatho enrhii sagete tege arhier.
Changgechuw Jesu ing rhumaage anhingna arhier, “Engke, naalhanghenhingnte, engkhejege Thangpa ing ijehmeh elhuwng nong eentupi, engkhejege ajie lungsii immindangbekhechuw.”
Engkhejege ama ing Jesu ing ejemeh atupibekhechuw Decapolisna aminjaam che mibekhe ouwngluw liimsehe.
Jesu ing avonhie ruwkuwng ing paangkhete aalenle mi aruhpuwching akurna ouwngkonghe, engkhejege amaing rimchiikurna aeong.
Chale khuwngsang auwpa engkhe, aromhing Tairus ate khuwngsangtenaching etheng engkhejege, amhuwche Thangpa nhingna aluw beluge,
engkhejege minchinluing anhiisahpe, “Kesanuw nepangchuw therong atena, ethengpi ing naki ing iperpiteniebe damniege rhiingvate.”
Changching amatho wasehe, engkhejege mi ruhpuwheching aanhuw jiihege aalhuwmpehe.
Chaleching nepenuw engkhe kum suwmmalhii ennhiimeh thie iche ing ejachaam aphachuw aeheong.
Amaing ithiemhenhingna adeenbekhe minlhuhge amimbiir Jeching tthachemaase, changgechuw minhisesehse.
Amaing Jesu khu thiege, engkhejege atuhnhuwngte mi ruhpuw kaarna wage apienbetha aperpe.
Amaing arhier, “Kieing apienbethapaangchuw perningbe damvanggete.”
Chaleraaching athie ichechuw aminchinpe, engkhejege ataajeng inachuw damsing atechuw aminghuwpe.
Chaleraaching anhingna atuche paangkarchuw jungshuwse ate amaing minghuwge, miruwpuw nhingte vaanlege ahinrhier, “Achuwingche kepien aperga?”
Engkhejege sepohheching anhingna arhier, “Mi khangjeing elhuwmhege namhuwchin; ajiikhangkhing amahie rhierchechiige, ‘Achuw ing imperga natega?’ ”
Amaing achuw ing atuga tege arovehechuw aabiirpe.
Changgechuw nepenuwching ataalina ishuwchuw minghuwge enttiipaaing enchiimsage thengge amhekungna aluw abelupe, engkhejege ishuwbekheje ahimphuwngpe.
Amaing anhingna arhier, “Kesanuw, nathachaching kemintthaapechii; belung ingam ing engke, engkhejege nanaana bekheje damresie.”
Amaing hanghing attongle upa eentena mi ethengchin wahege enrhier, “Nasanuwkha thise. Ajietunaching Thiimpuwchuw aminjaga?”
Changechuw ama ttongchuw rongeluing, Jesu ing khuwngsang upanhingna arhier, “Ittemaare, thachajethaa.”
Amaing Piter, Jakob engkhejege Jakob anepa Johon maaniege aanhuw ejie rhumaase.
Khuwngsang upa eenna emvalhuwle entochochor, mi aettaa, engkhejege, belung ijaapaahechuw amhuw.
Amaing avalhuwle, amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajietuna entochorchorchuwge ittaagechuw? Nepanghie ithiemaaga aejaarga.”
Engkhejege miheching ameniehe. Chona mihechuw taangte beshuwge, engkhejege amapale amanuw, amana aarhiiphuwhetho nepang ongtaate valhuwsehe.
Amaing abenna bechuwge nepenuwti nhingna arhier, “Talitha cum,” amachuw “lunghaati hangthie” atenaga.
Chaleraaching lunghaachuw hangthiege hungsi vasishe ama kum suwmmalhie ennhiega. Amalinahing emmeniebekhe enhimpaa ouwngluw liimsehe.
Amaing hevehie achuwdong aminghuwnamaaing eperpa ttong apipehe engkhejege aesaaphuw peruw tege ennhingna arhier.
Amaing amhinchuw bethinge aeen khuwpuwte engkege asepohheching aanhuw ajiehe.

Eongna eniena khuwngsangna valhuwge aminchuwhe, engkhejege amaing arhier aathiebekheching owngluw rhiige arhierhe, “Hevebekhehie heve mihing ajiekhang aphachega? Hangchie eviernahie anhingna apihie? Amaing hangchie etuchemaa nong aki ing atuchehie ajiekhangkhinga?
Amahie thing thapaa, nong atu, Mary sapa, engkhejege Jokoble Joses auwpa engkhejege Judas amana Simon, engkhejege asarhechuw aeonghaamaagemie khang?” Engkhejege hanghin emmenieng anhingna rhumaasehe.
Chona Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Laarchangpahechuw amhin lintaangte maaniege arammiheching engkhejege, auwnehejeng, engkhejege aeengkuwheching ijasamaahe, rukuwm tumaahe.
Engkhejege mi ina iki tepiihe lina akibaangge amintthaa chuwmaaniege atuche nong ajiedong tuchemaa.
Engkhejege emmenieing enthachamaataana aluw rhiise. Chona amaing khuwbekhete sige aminchuwhe.
Amaing suwmmalhie ennhiehechuw eenge, mi ennhie ennhie mintthehege achiir, engkhejege ebour chipihechuw athorchena apipehe.
Emmenieing romhor engkhepang maaniege, aesaaphuw tal, thuwng, sheer thaarna khapaa, engkhedong ramkhiena rinmaaruw,
Changgechuw khikhuwn nienung longoh ennhie mingkhiimaaruw tege ttong apipehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Akhukhuna een nimvalhuwle nengingkemaataang amana cheengruw.
Achuw engkhe amhin engkhena rukuwm itumaaniebe, engkhejege ninttong rongening temaaniebe, nimbethinphana ennhingna saarkhii aanshuwnaing ningkhibejana sirbaarkha betthiirruw.”
Chonaching emmenieing vasihege mibekheing embelung amintenaing ttongjiir aminjaampehe.
Emmenieng ronham atoung enhimpaa thorhege, engkhejege aenabekhe chuw thou itehhege amintthaapehe.

Herod Eruwng ing amachuw athie, ajiegachiinche Jesu romhingchuw aminghuwchertanagehe. Lintaangheching arhier, “Johon Baptist chuw ithietena hangrhingse; engkhejege hevelinahing hangchie etuchehnahie anhingna aeuwmga.”
Changgechuw lintaangheching enrhier, “Amahie Elijahga.” Engkhejege lintaang ing enrhier, “Amahie ajenna laarchangpahe khangchie laarchang engkhega.”
Changgechuw Herod ing athieche, amaing arhier, “Alose ketinbesa Johonkha ehangrhingga.”
Ajiegachiinche Herod ching anepa Philip lumhichuw apaarphuwtaana, ama khunaching mi vibethinge, Johon chuw suwrge, engkhejege phierge mikhumsungte athaarga.
Ajiegachiinche Johon ing Herod nhingna arhier, “nang ing nanepa lumhi nabiehie waajiir ing arhumaaga.”
Engkhejege Herodiaching amachuw aeenthiemaaga, engkhejege thehjening atega. Changgechuw amaing tuchemaa,
Herod ing Johonchuw dhormo icherpaga engkhejege inthiing pesarga tege engkhjege akarga. Amaing amakhuchuw athieche enhimpaa abelung jase, changgechuw amaing arhierchuw rongening atega.
Changgechuw, Herod ing aatuche upahe, raarmi elhuwnghe engkhejege Galilitena upahenhingna auwmna aemhaarna inie ahimpha taanchachuw aphape.

Herodia asanuwching valhuwge valaamse, Herodle ethengbekheching enhimpaa embelung ningchimse engkhejege eruwngching lunghaa nhingnachin arhier, “Enhesare nang ing naadiebekhechuw, engkhejege pevanggechie.”
Attongchuw anhingna adeenpe, “Ajiejiegejenie ennhichiechuw pevanggechie, kelepaa alhebekheje.”
Amaing amanuw nhingna huwngge arhier, “Ajie nhevang ketega?” Amaing abesang, “Chiiluhpa Johon lose chuw nhe.”
Nepenuwtiching hungeenliverge eruwngnhingna anhiipe, “Kieing atelerah nanhingtena Johon losechuw kamsengsungna epesare.”
Eruwngchuw enhimpaa abelung jase chogejenie alepaa elhuwnghe kaarna ttong adeenbesageke, anhingna dachemaase.
Chaleraaching aarhunghe kaarna raarmi engkhe vicheerge Johon losechuw ahinchinaing arhierpe, Amaing vage Johon losechuw mikhumsungna avatinpe,
Alosechuw kamsengsungna hinchige lunghaanhingna apipe. Chona lunghaaching amanuwchuw apipe.
Ama khuchuw asepohheching athieheche, vahege ahumchuw vaadumhege thensungna arhiepehe.
Ttongjiirpaheching Jesu akurna engkonghege, engkhejege atubekhe amana imminchuw bekhehechuw atonghe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “huwngruw, ninthenen ing aedejeh amhinna amongna ninja minderuw.” Ajiegachiinche mi enhimpaa eongheching hungsi vasihege, engkhejege isahphuw aphanaje uwmmaase.
Chona emmenieng ruwkuwnglina aedepaa amhinte engkesehe.
Ate miheching engkehechuw aminghuwpehe, engkhejege emmenieing khuwpuw bekhetena ingkhi ing vasihege emmana vatungsehe.
Hanghing siphiena ahungsile amaing mi ruwpuwhechuw mhuwge; engkhejege emmeniechuw aasher aeuwmmaa Zouhekhangkhing amhuwtaana amaing aning aminsiihpehe; engkhejege amaing alham enhimpaa aminchuwhe.
Hanghing atherlamthitaana, asepohheching vahege anhingna enhier, “Hevehie idepaa amhinga, engkhejege aphaje therse.
Bethinhere amaching emmenieing paam arovena engkhejege khuwbekhena entaasaa aesaaphuw iliesaheresie.”
Changgechuw amaing abesang, “Ninnuw ing aesaaphuw pesaruw.” Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “Kinnuwng vanungge dinari roza engkheing vaalienungge pevang kintega?”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Tal ejeh nindeense? vanung ebeerruw.” Emmenie ing vatuhhege enhier, “Ronga, amana Nga ennhie.”
Chona Jesu ing mi bekhechuw aruh aruh ing eaer phuwrlina mengongruw atepe,
hanghing mibekhechuw roza rozaing engkhejege sumnga suwmngaing aruh aruh ing ongsehe.
Tal rongale nga ennhiichuw viliege, minvente hingeebeerge engkhejege bor pege talhechuw abekhiipe, engkhejege sepohhe ching emmana shehege; engkhejege nga ennhiichuw mibekhena asimpe.
Emmenieng sahege imvin vase;
