engkhejege atheh akier ngajechuw emveng beluwh summalhie ennhie siikang aachumpehe.
Tal aesana emvehechuw pesarpang chiing rongagehe.
Aanhuwdehna mihechuw abethinleching asepohhechuw ruwkuwng taalina raarkhete mensaing Bethsaidate aminsipe.
Engngeentthena ttong arhiernhuwte, Jesu ing bounglite ahinnhiena hangkarse.
Kholhie ahimphache ruwkuwngchuw chiilina uwmjehge ataache athienen taangna aeong.
Thieching maangsohte avarhaang taanaching ruwkuwng aahurheching ejapahechuw amhuwche, yiingphihin ennhingte chiilina vasige, emmeniechuw khirgetehe ate.
Changgechuw emmenieing chiitaalina evasichuw emmhuwche irega tehege uwngsehe;
ajiegachiinche emmenie bekheching mhuwhege piingsehe. Changgechuw chaleraaching amaing ennhingna ttongge arhier, “nimbelung mengamruw, kieging; ittemaaruw,”
Chona emmenietho ruwkuwngte karhege thie aerhaangje dese. Engkhejege amana inhimpaa luw liimsehe,
ajiegachiinche emmenieng tallina ishuwchuw minghuwchemaahe, changgechuw embelungriir anheh taanachingga.
Chona emmenieing elenhege, Genesaret paamte huwnghege taangte ruwkuwngchuw ameniirpehe.
Emmenieing ruwkuwngtena enttumle, miheching amaga ichie minghuwhege,
Arovebekhetena vatenhege, ama aongna enthie tahna amhin amhinnaching aenahechuw enyaarna idumhege vathengsehe.
Engkhejege amaing avalhuwna khuwna changmanieche khuwpuwbekhena, lheletena, emmenieing keethiir kaarnaje aenahechuw mintorhege, apienmhur apernaing anhiipehe; engkhejege aaperbekheching tthaasehe.
Ate Jerusalem tena etheng Pharisihe engkhejege thiimdeeheching Jesu nhingna ouwngkongsehe,
Emmenieng sepohheching ingkih etthiiluing theh asaahechuw amhuwpehe.
Ajiegachiinche Pharisihe engkhejege Jehudihe tiena upahe intu enlhiingna chuw jiehege, ingkih itthiemaaheniebe theh samaahe;

engkhejege kithiirtena hungkeheniebe kih intthieluwng theh asaamaagehe; engkhejege emmenieing aminjie lintaang enhimpaaje uwmne, amachuwbe, kamseng, biir, engkhejege thiir, pithrai bekam jekhi aatthie.
Hanghing Pharisihele thiimdeehching anhingna asiehe, “Ajietuna nasepohheching Tiena upahe atuhie minjiimaahege, changgechuw ebuwr kihching theh asaagehe?”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Isaiah ing itthachaang etu ninnuw khuna atataa arhierbesaga, hanghing abejiise,
‘Miheching ennherpang ing immimpaanaahe,
Changgechew embelungriir ching kenhingtena endaapaanehe;
Engkhejege emmenieng tienana arhier ttong thoh chuw dhormo ttong khangkhing minchuwhege,
kiechuw ajiedongma khangkhing enrumnaahe.’
“Ninnuw ing Thangnhang ttongthohchuw minchinchuwge, tienana upaheching aminjiechuw inhehpaa nimbechuw.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “nintaaing kintuthiega ichii tahlina aminjiena Thangnhang ing arhierchuw itthajeing rhumaasechuw.
Ajiegachiinche Mosi ing arhier, ‘nangnuw nangpaing arhier minjie, achuw engkheing amapa amanuwlina ichamaa rhierniebe theresie.’
Changgechuw ninnuw ing rhierchuwge, Achuw engkheing amapa changmaanieche amanuw nhingna, kenhingtena aekana phavang nintechuw ‘Korbanga’ (Thangnhangtenaga) tetenuwche,
ninnuw ing nangpa changmaanieche nangnuw rutum tupivang atechuw arhupimaaga.
Engkhejege ninnuw ing nintu anongching mi lintaangheje nimbelung minlhuwchuwge Thangnhang ttongchuw ningeethinape, hanghing echieng nintu anong lintaang enhimpaaje nintuga.”
Ama enhuwna Jesu ing mi ruwpuwhechuw abuwmte eenge avonhie ennhingna arhier, “rongeruw engkhejege minghuwruw.
Taangtena besungte ivalhuwching amachuw memaang chevang ate uwmmaa; changechuw mi amemaangchuwbe anhingtena ihungshuwching atuga.”
Aana aeuwmching rongeresie.
Jesu ing mi ruhpuwchuw mage een engkhete avalhuwche asepohheching ttongttimchuw imindangpire atehe.
“Jesu ing ennhingna arhier,” ninnuwjeng amachuw nimminghuwchemaaga? “Taangtena sungte ivalhuwching michuw mimbuwrmaa;
ajiegachiinche amachuw valhuwge, abelungte valhuwluing apibuwrtega, engkhejege amahechuw aturshuhte isiga?” Hanghin ichiin aesaaphuwbekheje enthiingga.
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “mi sungtena ehungshuwching atahchuw amemaangga.
Ajiegachiinche asungtenachuw, mi belungriirtena ching echaamaa vaakar, nepenuw lina ka avalaar, ouwngruw, mitheh,
naamaa itu, Kaaraam, itthamaa, namthak atuhe, nepenuw pesarlina ichuwmaa, amhibeer itthamaa, echaamaa ttongpang ittong, elhuwngttittu, enhuwr,
Hevebekhe ichamaahie sungtena ehuwngshuwga, engkhejege michuw aminbuwrga.”
Ama amhinchuw bethinge Tye paamte vasise. Amaing een engkhete achuwdong ing amhuwnamaaing valhuwse. Changgechuw inthur chemaase.
Chaleching nepenuw engkhe, asanuchuw ibuwr chipi ing atoungchuw thengge akhibuwmna vatiehse.
nepenuwchuw Syrophoeni tena Greek miga. Engkhejege amaing asanuwnhingtena ebuwr chipichuw ethorpire tege arhier,
Amaing anhingna arhier, “mensaing nepangheching imvin valahresie, nepanghe saaphuwchuw utihenhingna evalhien rhumaanie.”
Changechuw nepenuwching abesang, “Aanchungpa” “utihejeching nepanghe asaana alheh-akiir asaaga.”
Chonaching nepenuwnhingna arhier, “Heve narhiertahnahing engke, ebuwr chipiching nasanuw chuw abethinpe.”
Amana nepenuwchuw aeente engkese, ebuwr chipiching asanuwchuw bethingge, atah ihejaarchuw aphape.
Chona amaing Tyre paamtena hungeenlige Sidon attimpangtena Galili rimchii ouwngtongte Decapoliram aliehna huwngse.
Emmenieing anhingte aana isih, engkhejege abelie ouwngtong virhiihege amaing aki ebaangpiresie tehege anhiisaahe.
Amaing mikaartena ouwngruw ing rhiege aana aannhiichuw akimhuwr ing perge engkhejege becherge abeliechuw apar.
Chona minvente hingeebeerge, aaphuwh kige anhingna arhier, “Ephphatha,” atenachuwbe “aemhongre.”
Chaleraaching aanahechuw emmhongse, abelie asuwrjechuw enjohse, engkhejege aetthajehing ttongse.
Chona Jesu ing achuwnhingnadong atongnamaaing ttong apipe; changgechuw emmenieng changjehmeh ttongmaaruw atele enhiimseseh aminjaam pehe.
Emmenieing enhimpaa ouwngluw liimge, enrhier, “Amaing aangkheng ithapaing atupe; amaing aana isihje aminthiechepe amana abelie asuwrje aminttongpe.”
Chove eniebekhesungna avonhie mi ruhpuwhechuw ensaaphuw uwmmaage, asepohhechuw eenge ennhingna arhier,
“Heve mi ruhpuwhehie kening keminsiinaahe, ajiegachienche emmenie thoh inie nethum onghaamiege ensaaphuw uwmmaase, engkhejege ennhingna arhier,
Kieing emmeniehie eente bethinningbe lhamlena tievatehe-engkhejege lintaanghehie endaapaatenaje ethenggehe.”
Asepohhechin abesang, “Ajiekhang heve rampakaarna achuw ing mibekhehie imvin mimvachevang atega?”
Amaing asiehe, “Tal ijeh nindeense?” Emmenieing arhier, “Aseh sarii.”
Chona amaing mi ruhpuwchuw lolhielina mengongruw tege arhier, engkhejege tal sariichuw viliege, ahinnhienhuwte amahechuw bekhiege asepohhenhingna vipege, emmenieing ruhpuwhenhingna asimpehe.
Nga tepieje emmenieing ashie; engkhejege bor ahinnhienhuwte amaing amajechuw simruw tege arhier.
Emmenieing sahege emvin vase; engkhejege akiirbekhechuw amingkongheche beluh sarii siikangse.
Amana ouwngkonghechuw mi chiing minliegehe hanghing emmeniechuw abethinpehe.
Engkhejege, chaleraachin Jesu ing asepoh hethoh ruwkuwnglite Karhege Dalmanutha ramte hungkarsehe.
Pharisiheching thenghege engkhejege ttong ensanghege, chaang embeernaing mimventena bietimnalina asiehe.
Amaing abelungrier chipina aaphuw kige arhier, “Ajietuna heve misiinheching bietimnachuw ajonggehe? Atataa kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, ajie bietimnadong heve misiinhe nhingna pemaaning.”
Amaing emmeniechuw abethinpe, engkhejege ruwkuwngte hangkarrige, araarte elenge engkese.
Sepohheching tal irin beherhege; engkhejege ennhingna tal engkhepangchuw rinhege rukuwngte karsehe.
Engkhejege enriimna ttong ennhingna arhier, “abeerruw Pharisihele Herod chorlina enriimsaruw.”
Emmenieing engkhele engkhe enrhiirhe, “hevehie tal ideenmaataanaga.”
Amachuw aminghuwtaanaching Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Ajietuna ninnuw ing tal auwmaataana aettonggechuw? Ninnuw ing atelephaing nimmhuwmaaga changmaanieche nimminghuwmaaga? Nimbelungriir inhehpaaga?
Nimmhiche uwmge nimmhuw ninchemaaga? Ningeenache uwmge ninthiemaaga? Engkhejege ningeenthiemaaga?
Kieing tal rongaching mi chiing ronga rotum kebekhiele alheh akeer beluh ijeh nimmingkong?”
Engkhejege emmenieng abesang, “Suwmmalhie ennhiega.”
“Engkhejege tal sarii ing mi chiing millie, alheh akiir ejemeh nimmingkong?” Engkhejege emmenieing anhingna abasang, “Sarii.”
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ateleje nimminghuwmaalhiega?”
Emmenieng Bethsaidate vasehe, miheching mhichuw pesar engkhe virhiihege engkhejege iperpire tehege anhiepehe.
Amaing mhichuwpachuw abenna bechuwge khuwtena arhriedohpe, athienening aki baangge, asie, “ajiejie che namhuwchese?”
Pesarpaching hingeeebeerge arhier, “Mihechuw kemhuwse changgechuw thingbourhethoh enghaajeng bevenehe.”
Chona Jesu ing akichuw amhinaching avonhie aparpe; engkhejege amaing aabiirche, tthage aeuwmbekhe enthiengjehing emhuw achepe.
Chona amachuw aeente mingkege, arhier, “khuwsungte valhuwmaa.”
Jesu ing asepohhetho Kasarea Phillipi khuwbekhena hungsisehe; lhamlena Jesu ing asepoh henhingna asiehe, “miheching kiehie achuwga entenaahe?”
Emmenieing anhingna abesang, “Johon Baptisga,” lintaang ing, Laarchangpa engkhega.
Amaing ennhingna asie, “Chogenieche ninnuw ing achuwga entenaachuw?” Piter ing anhingna abesang, “nanghie Aantinpagechie.”
Chona Jesu ing amachuw achuwnhingnadong rhiermaaruw tege eperpaaing arhier.
Chona amaing ennhingna minchuwhege arhier, Mi Sapaching ijachaam phaniege, engkhejege upaheng, Pharisi elhuwngheng amana Thiimpuwheng rhumaaheniege thehvatehe, engkhejege anieminthumna hangrhingvate.
Amaing hevebekhehie endangjohing arhierga. Engkhejege Piter ing apaangte rhiege arukupe.
Changgechuw amaing vaanlege sepohhechuw ibeerge, Piterchuw rukuhge arhier, “kepaangna ongmaare Saitan! Ajiegachinche nang ing Thangnhang amindeenchuw kharmaachiege tepang ing amindeenhechuw natepe.”
Amaing mi ruwpuwhele sepohhechuw eenge ennhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing kinhuw jiegete teniebe enthenening ouwngrhumaaresie,” “engkhejege inthingkherchuw rinheniege ejieresie.
Ajiegachiinche enchipi karning ateheching maangsavate, chona achuw engkheing enchipichuw aettha ttongjiirlina maangsaniebe ikarpi phasavate.
Ajiegachiinche lolhiepaamna aadiebekhe phacherniege, achipichuw maangnieche ajieche kanasavate?
Aataahie amamiching achipitho ajieing mintechevate?

Heve misien ichuwmaahe, isiikha aatuheching kerotumna engkhejege kettonglina aning aminjaahechuw Mi sapajeching enthiing Thanven michierhetho enrhieheniege Amapa athang alaar elengtho athengleching aning minjaa navate.”
Engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “Atatah ninnhingna kerhiirga, heve eniir emmenie Kaarna alhe tepiechuwbe Thangnhang lepaa atuchenatho enrhiing ethengchuw amhuwmaataang ithiechuw mintinmaahenie.”
Enie nethum inhuwte Jesu ing aanrhiiphuwhe Piter, Jakob engkhejege Johon chuw rhiehege engkaangpaa bounglite enthienenpang arhiepehe; engkhejege amaing emmhekungna amasaa avurpe.
Engkhejege apienheje aevaarjehing inlimge, amachuwbe lolhiepaamna pien arushuh achuwdong ing hanghing aminvaar chemaa.
Engkhejege Mositho enrhii Elijah emmeniethoh emphuwngsehe, engkhejege emmenieng Jesutho ttong ensiehe.
Chona Peter ing Jesunhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, amhin henahing eong tthavate, amana eniehing thaam eenthum, narotum engkhe, Mosi rotum engkhe, engkhejege Elijah rotum engkhe kharteruw.”
Ajie rhiervanggete ate minghuwmaase, ajiegachienche emmenieing enhimpaa ittisehe.
Chona ruduhching amingkhumpehe, engkhejege ruduhsungtena, erur etheng, “Amahie keningkeminsiipaa kesapaga, amaing arhier rongeruw.”
Minghuw minghaluing aabiirheche emmenietho enrhie Jesuchuw maaniege achuwdong avonhie mhuwmaasehe.
Emmenieng boungtena enjungttumle, Mi Sapahcing ethiehekaartena ehangrhing aphachuw aviemaataang, “mi lintaangna nimmhuwhie rhiermaadehruw tege ttong eperpa apipehe.”
Engkhejege ethiehekaartena ihangrhinghie ajiekhangga tehege ennajir ing enrhierhege, ama arhierchuw inning morsehe.
Chona emmenieing anhingna asie, “Ajietuna Elijah ing mensa thengvate tege thiimdeeheching arhierga?”

Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Elijaching thengge pee bekhechuw amintharcherga, atataaga; engkhejege ajiekhang Mi Sapachuw aenhimpaa ijachaam khaangniege, engkhejege ajiedongmaa beshuw vatehe ate ama khuhie ajiekhang abejiise?
Changgechuw kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, amachuwbe Elijahchuw thengse, engkhejege ama akhulina abejiitho enghaaing, emmenieng aadiehechuw anhiingna atupehe.”
Sepohhenhingna emmenieing enghuwngle, enrovena miruhpuw inhimpaa amana thiimdee heching emmenietho ttong ensiehechuw amhuwpe.
Mi ruhpuwheching amachuw emmhuwche ouwngluw liimsehe, engkhejege anhingte vahege arumpehe.
Amaing ennhingna asie, “Ajielina emmenie tho ensanggechuw?”
Engkaarna engkheing anhingna abesang, “Thiimpuw, attong isuwmaa ebuwr chipi ing atoung kesapahie nanhingte kevirhiega;
engkhejege amaing sourge amhinbekhena abethiehga; engkhejege abecher phuwrge aha irhiirge enlaachemaa; engkhejege amahie ithorpisare tesaingge nasepoh henhingna kerhierche tuchemaahe.”
Amaing ennhingna abesang, “thacha iuwmmaa misienhe, kieing ninnuwtho eyehme isih ing onghaavang etega? Kieing ninnuwchuw ejemeh isih ing deervang ketegechuw: Kenhingte virhieruw.”
Engkhejege amaing amhuwche chipiching amachuw aamheriepe; engkhejege lolhiena tiege abecher khentho ouwnglujojohse.
Jesu ing amapachuw asie, “anhingna ishuwhie ejemeh sihse?” Amana amaing arhier, “anepanglenaga.”
“Amahing amemaangnaing mhisungnaje chiisungteje aphabekhena alhin; changgechuw nang ing etupi cheteniebe naning eminsiisaing ebumsare.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing cheteniebe athacha nhingna aangkheng atuchega.”
Chaleraaching amapaching uwngge ahinrhier, “Kethachase; kethachamaahie ebumsare!”
Jesu ing mi ruhpuwheching evatenchuw amhuwche ebuwr chipichuw isehge arhier, “Nang attong nabesuwmaa, enhuwr chipi, anhingtena jungshuw, engkhejege avonhie valhuwmaare!”
Uwngrongrongge amachuw imhehriige jungshuhse; nepangchuw ethiethoh enghaajeng uwmse, chonaching miheching arhier, “thise.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing aki bechuwge abethiepe, engkhejege eneer achepe.
Amaing eensungte avalhuwleching sepohhechin ouwngruw ing asie, “Ajietuna kinnuw ing hevehie kintuchemaaga?”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “hevehangchiehie ahinnhiemaaniege ajiedong besuw chemaa.”
Emmenieing ama amhintena vasihege Galili attimpangna aalenpehe; Amaing hangchiehie achuwdong ing emhuw chuw idemaa;
ajiegachienche sepohhechuw minchuwhege ennhingna arhier, “Mi Sapachuw mi kihlite peheniege, emmenieng thehvatehe; engkhejege amachuw thehheniege, enie anieminthumna hangrhingvate.”
Changgechuw, arhierchuw emmenieing minghuwmaa, engkhejege anhingna isieje attiepehe.
Chona emmenieing Kapernaumte houngsehe, eensungna aongle ennhingna asiehe, “Ajielina lhamlena ensanggechuw?”
Changgechuw derengsehe, ajiegachienche lhamlena achuwche elhuwngsehga tehege ennher ing ensanghe.
Amaing ongge, summalhie ennhiechuw eenge, ennhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing mensachuw ideniebe, amaing anhungkurvate engkhejege amine ouwngshuwvate.
Chona amaing nepanghechuw bechuwge engkaarna mengongge, engkhejege ennhingna arhier,”

“Achuw engkheing hangchie esiing nepanghe kaartena engkhechuw keromhingna rukuum tuniebe, kiechuw rukuum entuga; engkhejege achuw engkheing rukuum ituniebe, kiechuw rukuum entumaaga, changgechuw kie eenjinchier amachuw atuga.”
Johon ing anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, achuw engkheing naromhingna ibuwr chipi athor mhuw ungge, kinnuw ing amachuw kingkhaamga, ajiegachienche amaing kingeenhuw ijiemaa.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing arhier, “amachuw khaammaaruw; ajiegachienche, keromhingna etuchemaa nongchuw tuniege kie khuchuw itthamaa tuchevang ate achuwdong uwmmaa.
ajiegachienche eniehie enrhuma atumaa amachuw aerotumga.
Ajiegachiinche atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, ninnhingna Khristaga teniege ama romhingna achuw engkheing ninnhingna chii kuri engkhepang epeniebe, amaing atu manachuw maangmaanie.
“Achuw engkheing athacha nepang esiinghe engkhechuw akhiminsiena atusaru ching, ariingna chakri lhung bikhihniege rimchiisungte alhinching aetthasega.
Naki ing nangchuw nakhi minsiina tuniebe, amachuw tinbong; nakih ennhiing noroh ithiemaadeh mhisungte elhuw saruh ing naki paangkhe uwmluing irhingtaate elhuwhching aetthasega.
Engkhejege nakhi ing nakhi minsiinavang nategeniebe, amachuw tinbong,” naki ennhiing norohte ilhin saruh ching, nakhi ebong ing irhingnate evalhuwching tthasene.
Engkhejege namhi ing nakhi minsienavang nategeniebe, lhinvor, namhi ennhie eemveing norohte elhuw saruching, paangkhepang ing Thangnhang lepaate elhuwching narotum tthasene.
Chonaching arongechechuw themaa, engkhejege amhije aethiemaadehga.
“Ajiegachiinche mibekhechuw mhiching bechii aearkhangkhing ebesuwvate.
“Bechiihie aetthaga; changgechuw bechii ing achiinachuw maangniebe, ninnuw ing amachuw minchii chervangninte? Ninnuw ningkaarna bechii meuwmruw, engkhejege ninnuw engkhele engkhe dejiim ing paarruw.”
Amaing amhinchuw bethinge Judea paamte engkhejege Jordon araarte vasise. Engkhejege mi ruhpuwheching avonhie ruwkuwrhege ouwngkongsehe, anunuung amaing aminchuwhe.
Pharisiheching thenghege chaang embeernaing asie, “pesar ing nepenuw aantthephuwhie waajir ttongching arhuga?”
Amaing emmeniechuw abesang, “Mosi ing ajii ttongthoh apisehe?”
Emmenieing arhier, “Entthena leriih ingeenrhunachuw bejiiniebe Mosi ing arhupigehe.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Ajiegachiinche nimbelungriir abeche lamthi ing amaing heve ttongthoh abejiiga.
Changgechuw lolhiepaam asempehle Thangnhang ing emmeniechuw pesar engkhejege nepenuw asemgehe.
Hevelinahing pesar ing amapa amanuw bethinniege anepenuw nhingte kaavang atega,
engkhejege emmenie ennhiechuw sabechie engkhe eenshuwvang ategehe.
Chonaching Thangnhang ing aminchum besachuw mee ing mintthemaaheresie.”
Chona eengsungnaching sepohheching heve khunahing anhingna asiehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing alumheechuw entthephuwniege, lintaang engkhechuw paarphuwniebe anepenuwlina naamaa atuga;
Engkhejege nepenuw ing athienening apuwsarchuw entthephuwniege, lintaang engkhetho paarheniebe amajeng naamaa atuga.”
Miheching isiing nepanghechuw Jesuching aki ing aparnaing avirhiihe; engkhejege sepohheching aasehe.

Changgechuw Jesu ing amachuw amhuwtaanaching, enhimpaa nongemaage ennhingna arhier, “isiing nepanghekha kenhingte vaheresie, khaammaaruw; ajiegachienche Thangnhang Eruwngpaamchuw emmenie hangchiihe taga.
Atatah, isiing nepanghe khangkhing Thangnhang lepaa aalhaangmaa heching lhuwchemaanie.”
Engkhejege amaing aben ing ikorhege, entaalina aki baangge, engkhejege bor apihe.
Hanghing amaing lham ahinjiele, pesar engkhe vatenge akhiruwkhuw phinge, engkhejege anhingna asie, “Ittha Thiimpuw, kieng ettiim enemaa irhingnachuw aphana ajii tuvang ketega?”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Ajietunaching kiechuw ittha entegechie? Achuwdong ittha uwmmaa Thangnanggetha.
Nang ing ttongthohhechuw naminghuwga: Mi thehmaa, nang ing naamaa tumaa, nang beromaa; nang ing amamaa saarkhii pemaa, namphuw ing minchemaa; nangpa nangnuwchuw aejare!”
Amaing anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, hevebekhehie kilerle betthiimge keminjiega.”

Jesu ing amachuw ibeerge, aning minsiige arhier, “nang ing nong engkhe nasamse, engkeing, nang ing nadeenbekhe chuw juwr ing sarahechuw pere, engkhejege amaching mimvenna nalernachii chuw uwmvate; chona huwng ing ejiere.”
Amachuw athietaanaching abelung minthimge jase engkhejege engkese, ajiegachienche amaing lerchii adeenpohga.
Chona Jesu ing arovechuw ibeerge asepohhenhingna arhier, “savangheching Thangnhang lepaate ijehmeh ejaing valhuwvang atega!
Engkhegege sepohheching amachuw arhier lina ouwngluw rhiisehe, changgechuw Jesu ing avonhii ennhingna arhier, “Nepanghe, lerchiina abelungrier apiheching Thangnhang lepaate aevalhuw ijehmeh eluga!
Savangheching Thangnhang lepaate elhuwhie sariingsii saing tthimphie khorna aevalhuwching elesehga.
Emmenieing enhimpaa ouwngluw liimse, engkhejege ennajir ing enrhierhe, “Chogenieche achuw ing ikarpi phachevate?”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw ibeerge arhier, “Mi nhingnabe hevehie shuwchemaanie, changgechuw Thangnhangnhingnabe amachuwmaaga amabekhehie ishuwhchega.”
Piter ing anhingna ittong abetthiimpe, “Ibeer, kinnuw ing kindeenbekhe bethinuwngge kinjiegechuw.”
Jesu ing arhier, “Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga,” “kie rotumna, engkhejege aettha ttongjiirlina, aeen, auw ane, asar ajuwr, amanuw amapa, sitibaasien, lhiebaargejenie bethinniebe,

amaing atele aphanaing aejachaam phaniege, aeen alhie, auw ane, asar ajuwr, amanuwhe, asitihe engkhejege lhiebaar saruh roza engkhe, amana thengvang ate lolhiepaamna ittiim aenemaa irhingchuw phavate.
Changgechuw mensahe enhimpaheching nhungkurvate, engkhejege nhungkurheching men savatehe.”

Emmenieng Jerusalemte enghangsile, engkhejege Jesu ing emmana hesige ouwngluw rhiihse, lintaang aanhuw aajiiheching ittisehe. Amaing sepohhechuw avonhie himbesuwge ennhingna shuwvang atebekhechuw minchuwhege arhier,

hanghing arhier, “Ebeerruw, enieing Jerusalemte hangsinemie, engkhejege Mi sapachuw khorpuw elhuwnghe, engkhejege thiimdeehe nhingna vipeheniege, engkhejege athehnaing amaraar meuwmvatehe; chona lintaang yaatihenhingte pevatehe.
emmenieng siimnaheniege, becherheniege, binheniege, engkhejege thehvatehe; engkhejege inie nethum aanhuwna avonhie hangrhingvate.”
Zebedee sapa ennhie Jakoble Johon heching anhingte thenghege arhier, “Thiimpuw,” “nanhingna kinnhiisaahie itupivangniete kintesaana.”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing ninrotum ajie etupiresie nintega?”
Engkhejege emmening anhingna arhier, “nathangnalaar paangna kinnuwchuw engkheing tachangte, engkhejege engkheing talite emengongsare.”

Changgechuw Jesu ing innhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing ninnhiihie ajiega minghwmaachuw. Ninnuw ing eenvang kete belinchuw ninnuw ing een chevangninte changmaanieche chii keluchuw ninnuw ing aelhaang chehvang ninte?”
Emmenieing abesanghe, “chevanggung,” chotahnaching Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Kieng eenvang kete belinchuw eenchuwbe eenvangninte, engkhejege chii keluchuw ninnuwjeng luhchevangninte;
changgechuw kie ketachangna engkhejege Ketalina ongvang nintechuw kieing pevang ketemaagechuw changgechuw amachuwbe enrotumna abethongbesa mihe rotumga.”
Sepoh suumching ama ttongchuw enthieche emmenieing Jakoble Johon taalina embelung siisehe.

Chonaching Jesu ing eenhege arhier, “Lintaang yaatihelina elhuwng miheching emminghuw ateembesaheching entaalina aapuw ouwngshuwga, engkhejege ingeelhuwngheching entaalina apuw anongchuw atuga echii nimminghuwga.
Changgechuw ningkaarnabe changching uwmmaachuw; changgechuw, ningkaarna lhuwngning ateching nimminechuw eensuwrimvang atega.
engkhejege ningkaarna elhuwngseh aadieching mibekhe shuw eensuwvang atega.
Ajiegachiinche Mi sapaching ataachuw sepa atupinaing tege ethengmaaga, changgechuw mi sepa atunaing engkhejege mihechuw aatinpinaching engkhejege rhingrie apina ijuwngga.”
Emmenieng Jerikote huwnghege. Jesu ing Jerikotena sepohhethoh mi ruhpuwhethoh enrhiihege enghuwngle, Timaeus sapa amhi echu buw aanhiepaching lhampuwkurna aeheong.
Amaing Nazarettena Jesuga ate aminghuwtaana, uwngge ahinrhierpe, “David sapa Jesu, naning eminsiisare.
Miheching derengre tehege arukuhe, changgechuw epersesehing uwngge, “David sapa, naning eminsiisare!”
Jesu ing neerjehge ahinrhier, “amamichuw vaeenruw,” engkhejege emmenieing mhichu nhingna vahege, anhingna arhier, “nabelung mengam,” “hangneerre nangchuw eengeennaa,”
Chonaching apien lhinverge, inchuwmge Jesu paangte vase.
Chona Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “ajie etupiresie natega?” Mhichuching anhingna arhier, ‘Kethimpuw,’ “avonhie mhuwsagete.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Engke, nathachaching immintthaape.” Chaleraaching amhi emhuw aphape, engkhejege alham jiege Jesu enhuw ajiepe.
Emmenieng Jerusalem himpharong atele, Olive boung apaangna Bethphagena, engkhejege Bethaniate Jesu ing sepoh ennhie chiirge arhier,
“vasinung nimmana euwm khuwna nimvalhuwle, achuwdong ing atoungmaalhie sekursiing engkhiichuw mhuwvangninte; amachuw bejohnung hinrhiiruw.
Achuw engkhe ing ninnhingna rhierniege, ajietuna hevehie nintuga? ‘hanghing rhierruw, Thangpa ing tunavang ate uwmne engkhejege enrang ing vibilivate’ ”
Emmenieng vahege eengkhaarkungna akhii sekursiingchuw avatuhpehe; engkhejege abejohpehe.
Apaangna eneerheching ennhingna arhier, “ajietuna sekursiinghie nimbejohga?”
Emmenieing Jesu ing arhierchuw atonghe; engkhejege embejohchuw arhupipehe.
Chona sekursiingchuw Jesu nhingna hinrhiehege ataalina pien thahege Thangpa ing ataalite hangkarse.
Mi enhimpaheching lhampuwna empien bejarhege, engkhejege lintangheching phelhietena thingbaa sehhege lhamna athahe.
Amana aanhuw ijiihele maangsohna isiheching uwnghege ennhier, “Hosanna! Thangpa romhingna etheng arasii aethaga!
Emapa aemapuw David Eruwng lepaa chuw rasii tthaane! Hosanna thangven ithi ing engkaangpaa!”
Chona amaing Jerusalem Thangnhang eensuwngte valhuwge, arovebekhechuw ebeerge, athertaanaching, amaing suwmalhie ennhii thoh Bethanite huwngsehe.
Ama enie atuhnie inienaching Bethanitena ahungsile Jesuchuw avin ttaamse.
Raarkhena anha aeuwm thechangbor vimhuwge, amaing aanrah euwmgumtah tege avaabeer. Abuwmte avaache anhamaaniege ajiedong tuehmaase; ajiegachienche amachuw aanraphamaaga.
Amaing arhier, “achuwdong ing apha hevenahing betthiimniege aphabekhena naanrah samaaresie.” Engkhejege amachuw sepohheching athiehe.
Chona Jerusalemte thengge Thangnhang eensungte valhuwse, engkhejege asungna aajuwr aaliehechuw ethor abetthiimpe, engkhejege, sheer amintehe ongnaheje, eenvatthuw aajuwrhe aeongnabekhe abelehcherpe;
engkhejege Thangnhang eensungna bekam jekhie pih arinbekheheje rhupimaase.
Amaing minchuwhege arhier, “Amahie enjiibesamaakhang,
‘kie keenhie yaatibekhe rotum hinnhiinavang ate eenchuwvang atega?’
changgechuw ninnuw ing amachuw eenruwhe akhor nimbesuwpe.”

Elhuwng khorpuwhele Thiimdeeheching thiehege emmenieing Jesuchuw ajiekhang thehteruw tehege alham ajonghe; ajiegachienche emmenieching aettisehe, ajiiga ateinche mi ruhpuwhe aminchuwhe ttonglina eenluw aeliimhe.
Engkhejege kholhie ahimphache, Jesule asepoh heching ama khuwpuw tena engkesehe.
Yiengna hanghing enghungsile, thechang borchuw arojung ephaing aettongchuw amhuwhe.
Chona Piter ing eenthiege anhingna arhier, “Rabbi, ibeer! Nang ing naasher thechangborkha ttongse.”
Jesu ing abesang, “Thangnhangchuw thachare,
Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, achuw engkheing heve boungnhingna, nang impimjoh ing rimchiite bore, teteniebe, engkhejege nabelungriirna thachateniebe, amachuw ninnhingna shuwvate.
Chonaching ninnhingna kerhierga, ninnuw ing hinnhetenuwge ninnhii pihbekhe kimphape tenung thacharuw, engkhejege ninnhingna shuwvate.
Ninnuw ing enhiina ninghangneer aphana Thangvenna aeong nimmapajeng ninlaarbekheje ekuhpinaing, achuw tahlina belungrier nongemaa uwmniebe, emmeniechuw kuhpiruw.”
Changgechuw ninnuw ing kuhpimaatenuwbe, Thangvenna aeong nimmapajeng ninlaarchuw ikuh pimaanie.
Avonhie Jerusalemte houngsehe. Amaing Thangnhang eensungna hungsi vasige auwmle Khorpuw elhuwnghe, Thiimdeehe engkhejege upaheching anhingte thenghege,
engkhejege enrhier, “nang ing ajie nachehna uwmge hevehehie natuga? Achuw ing heve natuchehhie immintuga?”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing ninnhingna ttong engkhe siigechuw; amachuw ebesangruw, engkhejege kieing ajie kechehna uwmge ketuga atechuw rhiervangete.
Johon Baptist ing chii aluhie Thangventenagemo, changmaanieche mihetenaga? Ebesangruw.”
Emmenieing engkhele engkhe ensanghege, “Enieng Thangventenaga temeniebe, amaing teniege, ‘Ajietuna ninnuw ing enthachamaagechuw?’
Changgechuw, enieng ‘mitenaga teteruw?’”– emmenieing mi ruhpuwhechuw attiepehe, ajiegachienche emmenieching Johonhie atataa Thangnhang ttongthangpa engkhega tehege arhugehe.
Chonaching Jesu chuw abesanghe, “Minghuwmaaung.” Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Ajie ketuchena uwmge kieing hevebekhehie ketuga, amachuw ninnhingna rhiermaaning,”

Chona amaing ttongttiimhehie ennhingna arhier, “pesar enkheing darkhaber engkhe thiege, akurna roper mingjiige, phinge, darkha asungna khor chiige, engkhejege saakeh himmeneerge aathiehenhingna saarge paam engkhete sise.
Ate ama aphachuw viege, darkhaber aathiehe nhingte ashuwchuw chiibaar akuumhe nhingna arotumchuw akhuwmnaing avicheerpe.
Changgechuw, emmenieng amachuw suwrhege, engkhejege binhege, engkhejege ajiedong peluing abethinpehe.
Engkhejege avonhie lintaang shuwh engkhe achiirche, emmenieing alose bekhiehege ningjaa apipehe.
Chona amaing lintaang engkhe avibethinje athepehe; Engkhejege lintaangheje binhege athehhe.
Amana engkhe aeuwm, amaing aning aminsiipah asapa chuw rukuwm tuvatehe tege amaing nhungkurrehte avibethinpe.
Changgechuw athieheching ennajir enrhierhege, ‘amahie aerii ekuumpaga, huwngruw, thehteruw, amaching aeriichuw aerotum eenshuwvate.’
Changching emmenieing suwrhege, thehhege engkhejege darkhaber taangte alhinpehe.
“Darkhaber aapuwching ajie tuvate?” Amaing “thengniege lhiethiehechuw memaangniege engkhejege lintaanghenhingte darkhaberchuw pevate.
Ninnuw ing aettha ttongjiirna hevehie pamaachuw:
‘En aatuheching aadiemaa lhungchuw,
choverarahching ariikieng lhung aaluwngpuw eensuwse;
Hevehie Thangnhang ing atuga,
engkhejege amahie imhihnabe ittiisuwhga?’ ”
Heve ttongttimhie entaalinaga ichii imminghuwheche, suwrning atepehe, changgechuw emmenieng mi ruhpuwhechuw attiepehe. Chonaching mahege engkesehe.
Chona emmenieing Pharisihe engkhejege Herod mihechuw vicheerhege attonglina shuwrte atepehe.

Engkhejege emmenieing thengheqe anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, nang belung enthienggechie, engkhejege achuwdong bethiengmaachii, ajiegachienche mihenhingna michang mikheje tumaachie, changgechuw Thangnhang lham ajiinachuw atataa naminchuwgehe. Lepaa apuwpanhingte khachana iteemhie waajiir ttong ing arhuga?”

Kinnuw ing pevang kintegemo changmaanieche pemaavang kintega? Aetthachang atuhechuw minghuwge ennhingna arhier, “Ajietunaching kenhingna chaang ningeebeerga? Kenhingna dinar engkhe vichinung eminthieruw.”
Amachuw avichipehe. Chona Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Achuw losega, engkhejege aromhinghie achuwga? Chonaching anhingna tehege,” “Lepaa aapuw pa taga.”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Lepaa aapuwpa tachuw lepaa aapuwpanhingte peruw, engkhejege Thangnhangtena bekhechuw Thangnhangte peruw.” Engkhejege emmenieng eenluw inhim pah liimsehe.
Avonhie ihangrhing hie uwmmaanie ate Sadduseheching anhingna vahege asiehe,
“Thiimpuw, Mosi ing kinrotumna abejii, achuwengkhe auwne engkhe theniege, alumhichuw maniege asiti mamaaniebe, au-aneching alumheechuw beniege auwanerotum sihti, achie mavang atega.
Auwane eriih aeuwm; engkheching nepenuwchuw vabege, achii maluing thihse,
Amenhienaching amachuw vaberihge, achii uwmluing thihse, aminthumnajeching changching tihse,
Engkhejege asariinajeching achii engkhedong mamaase. Enhuwteche nepenuwjechuw vathihse.
Ihangrhing aenienaching engkaarna achuw lumhivang atega? Ajiegachiinche, sariiheching amachuw abiehgehe.”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing itthaa ttongjiir lerii engkhejege Thangnhang ing atuchechuw minghuw maachuw, amanaching ninnuw ing ninlaar maakhang?
Ajiegachiinche, emmenieng ithiehekaartena inghangrhingle emmenieching een niemaahe, engkhejege emmenie ing saangram aanshuwnachuw pemaahe, changgechuw Thangvenna Minven michierhekhangkhing aeuwmgehe.
Engkhejege ithieheching ihangrhing khuna Mosi leriina anha epung thing ittung themin kha nimpamaaga, ajiekhang Thangnhang ing anhingna arhier, ‘Kiehie Abraham, Isak, engkhejege Jakob Thangnhang ing
Thangnhanghie ithiehe Thangnhangmaaga, changgechuw irhinghetaga; ninnuw ing enhimpaa ninlaarse.”
Thiimpuw engkheing emmenieng engkhele engkhe ensanghechuw athietaana, Thangpaing ennhingna ichapaa abesangpe atechuw minghuwge, empaangna thengge asie, “Ajie chaadinching men aesaga?”
Jesu ing abesang, “Mensachuw, ‘ronge, O Israel; enie a Thangnhang chuwbe engkhepangga.
Nang ing Thangnhangchuw nabelungriirna, nachipibekheing, nawaakhar bekheing, engkhejege nacheh bekheing naningminsiivang natega.
Amenhienachuw hevehiega, ‘nang ing vimchaang hechuw natahngengeing naning minsiiwang natega.’ Heve ennhie ithi ing elhuwng chaadin uwmmaa.”
Thiimdeeching anhingna arhier, “nang chuwmnechie, Thiimpuw, nang ing atataa narhierse, ‘amabe engkhepangga, engkhejege amamaaniege lintaang uwmmaa.’

Engkhejege belungriirbekheing, eminghuwchebekheing, engkhejege ‘aepaangkarbekheing, engkhejege, engkhele engkhe vimchaanghechuw aetahngengeing ichiin aening minsiivang etega,’ — hevebekhehing mhihsungna enlhenna apih engkhejege enlhenpee apibekhelina athicherga.”
Jesu ing evierpaaing abesangchuw amhuwche, anhingna arhier, “Nanghie Thangnhanglepahthoh endaapaamaachie.” Amana betthiimge achuwdong ing ttong esie chemaasehe.
Jesu ing Thangnhang eensungna aminchuwle, arhier, “Ajiekhangkhing Thiimdeeheching Aantinpa (Mesiah) hie David sapaga ategehe?
David rarahching chipi enthiingna ahimphuwng:
‘Thangnhangching kie kethangnhangna arhier,
“Ketachangna ong, kie eenrhumaa mihechuw nakhibejana kisiimaataang’ ”
David atahraraing amachuw Thangnhang atega, amaching ajiekhang asapachuwvang atega?” Engkhejege mibekheching attongchuw rotharhohing arongehe.
Amaing aminchuwleching arhier, “Thiimdeehelina enriimsaruw emmenieng pien ouwngsuwr viehege, mi aangkongnakithierna enrum aadiegehe,
engkhejege khuwngsangbekhena, buwsah aemhaar Kaarna aeongna itthaseh aadiegehe.
Mhikhuwnuwhe eenlhie asii, aminramhe engkhejege aetthachaang atuhechuw aandangnaing isihpa ahinnhiihe. Emmenieing elhuwngseh emmaraarchuw phavatehe.
Amaing Lerchii asiina amhin maangsohnaching ongge miheching ajiekhang sheer athaargehe atechuw aabiir. Sawangheching inhimpapah athaarhe.
Sarapaa mhikhuwnuw thengge Kori sheer ennhii, pesa engkhetho inttim athaarpe.
Amanaching sepohhechuw eenge, ennhingna arhier, “Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, lerchiibuwrna athaarhe mibekhena Sarapah nepenuw ing atharching athiga.
Ajiegachiinche, emmenieng abelhieh-abeve adeenhechuw athaargehe; changechuw nepenuw hevehing amaing adeensamaa aeuwmbekhe, arhingna adeensaachuw athaarga.”
Amaing Thangnhang eensungtena ahoungle, asepoh engkheing anhingna arhier, “Ebeer Thiimpuw, elhuwngpapaa lhuwnghe engkhejege hangjehmeh itthapaahehie!”
Chotaanaching Jesu ing anhingna asie, “Nang ing heve elhuwngpaa eenhie namhuwse? Hevenahing lhuwng engkhechuw, engkhe tahlina ttiircherluing uwmmaanie.”
Thangnhang eenthoh raar indeeng Olive boungna aongle, Piter, Jakob, Johon engkhejege Andrew heching ouwngruwruwh anhingna vahege asiehe.
“Amachuw atihle shuhvang atega irhierpire, engkhejege amabekhechuw ashuhphana ajie bietimna uwmvate?”
Chonaching Jesu ing ennhingna irhier abetthiimpe, “Ninnuwchuw achuwdong ing amamaate enrhiinamaaing enriimsaruw.
Mi enhimpaa Keromhingna thengheniege engkhejege rhierheniege, ‘Kieging!’ Engkhejege mi enhimpaa amamaate rhievatehe.
Ninnuw ing raar-sah engkhejege raar rosaa ninthiele piengmaaruw; hevebekhehie suwrimvang atega, changgechuw attuhnachuw atelemaaga.

Ajiegachiinche, yaati engkheing, yaati engkhe taalina, engkhejege Eruwng lepaa engkheing eruwng lepaa engkhe taalina betthiimvate, amana lienglaangje amhin amhingna shuhvate, vinttaam chiihaar shuhvate; hevebekhe chin ijachaamchuw abetthiimnaga.

“Ninnuw evierching ongruw; ajiega ateinche emmenieing waajiir ongtaana irhiivatehe, engkhejege khuwngsang sungna ebinvatehe, engkhejege emmenieing lepaa aapuwhenhingna engkhejege eruwnghe mhekungna kiekhuna emeniirvatehe.
Engkhejege yaatibekhena aettha ttongjiirchuw mensaing minjaamvangninte.

Ninnuwchuw irhiiheniege waajiir tuna emmeniir taanchana, ninnuw ing ajie besang vangginte ichiilina piengmaaruw; changgechuw ama aphanaching ensiebekhehechuw besangruw; ajiegachienche nimbesangchuw ninnuwmaagechuw, changgechuw Chipi Enthiingchinga.
Auw aneching auwnechuw, engkhejege amapaing asiti athenaing pevate, engkhejege asitiheching amanuw amapa taalina hangniirheniege emmeniechuw minthehvatehe.
Angkhejege mibekheing Keromhinglina ninnuwchuw ebetervatehe; changgechuw attuhna ephaing aekhaang acheching ekarpi phasavate.
“Oungtthuhcherniege maangvang ate entershuw chuw shuwmaavang ate aapaheching minhuwruw, chona Judeana aeongheching boungte tenheresie;
Eenchungna aeongching eensungte api aseh thuwhgete teniege ttummaaheresie;
Lhelena aeongching apien ajongnaing vaanleh maaheresie.
Ne irinhe engkhejege nedoung amhaarheching ejachaam phasavate.
Engkhejege amachuw pherbiena ashuwnamaaing hinnhesaruw.
Ajiega ate inche Thangnhang ing lolhiepaam asempehlenaing betthiimge ate aphana ishuwmaalhie, engkhejege avonhie shuw maavang ate ittiishuwpa aejanachuw thengvate.
Engkhejege Thangnhang ing eniehechuw himmemongmaaniebe achuwdong ing ikar phamaanie, changgechuw aatourbesa he rotum eniehechuw amemongpe.
Engkhejege achuw engkheing chaleching nanhingna teniege, “Ebeer!” amanahing amachuw ongne!– amachuw thachamaare.
Atatahmaa Aantinpahe engkhejege atataamaa laarchangpahe uwmphuwngvate engkhejege bietimna engkhejege ettiisuwpapaa mindang niege amamaate irhiivatehe, rhuniebe aatourbesahe nhingnaje shuwvate.
Changqechuw ninnuw ing enriimsaruw; kieing mensaninnhingna kerhierpe.
“Changqechuw chove enienaheching, eja chaam aanhuwnaching; eniechuw minthimvate, engkhejege thaing alengwaar pemaanie,
engkhejege aarsiiheng minventena jungbovate, engkhejege minvenna aeuwm atuchenabekheje ennuhvate.
Chaleching Mi sapaching ruduwlina ijiuwng mhuwvangninte.
Chona amaing minven micheerhe jibethinniege, amaing aatourbesahechuw ariikieng millietena, lolhiepaam avatangnatena minven atangna ipha aeongbekhe khuwmchervate.
“Thechangborlina bietimnachuw tamruw; abaaching ehangdoung anhah hangpiniebe tthaar viese ate eminghuwga.
Khangkhing ichiing hangchiebekhe nimmhuwle, ninnuw ing ama thengvang atechuw eengkhaarkung ahimphape ate minghuwruw.
Atatah ninhingna Kerhierga, hevebekhehie aviemaataang heve misienhie chimaalhienie,
Minven engkhejege simriipaam maangchervate, changqechuw kettonghehiebe maangmaadehnie.
“Changgechuw ama iniechuw changmaanieche aphachuw achuwdong ing minghuwmaa, Thangventena Michiirjeng, Asapajeng, changgechuw Amapapanggetha.
Enriimsaruw, rhiingsaruw; ajiegachiinche aphachuw ninnuw ing minghuwmaachuw.
Amahie mi engkheing aeen bethinge paam engkhete ramkhie sige ashuwhenhingna anong tuna engkheter pehege, engkhejege eenkhaar aarhuwngpachuw mimbierge isitho enghaaga.
Chonaching irhiing ing ongruw, ajiegachienche een apuwching kholhiena changmaanieche yenttimna, changmaanieche aar akhuwngle, changmaanieche yiengna thengvang ate aaniechuw minghuwmaachuw;
Changmaanieche minghuw minghaluing athengle hejaarvangninte.
Engkhejege kieing kerhierhie mibekhena kerhierga, irhiing ongruw.”

Enie nenhie aanhuwna Aminlenna mhaarsana engkhejege chor emvemaa tal asaana aaniechuw hungviese. Khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege Thiimdeeheching Jesuchuw ouwngruwjeing suwrheniege athehnaing alham aabiirpehe;
emmenieing arhier, “Mharsasungna, tumaamenie chalechingbe mi pinchorvate.”

Bethania khuwna enchor ing epen Simon eenshungna, buw saataana avaongle, nepenuw engkheing enthiing nard tena asuwng amin elupaa riichie thou abeer aevaar vichige thengse, engkhejege amaing beerchuw bekhiege Jesu loshelina ajilhiepe.
Changgechuw lintaang aeongheching embelung isii engkhele engkhe enrhierhege, “Ajietunaching heve riichiehie hanghing amimpaamga?
Ajiegachiinche heve riechiehie lopa roza engkhe sumngana ethi ing juwrmeniege sheerchuw sarahenhingna epiching tthavate.” Engkhejege emmenieching nepinuwchuw arukupehe.
Changqechuw Jesu ing arhier, “athienening onsaresie; amachuw ajietuna ninrukuga? Amaing kenhiingna aettha nong eentupise.

Ajiegaateinche sarahechuwbe aanasiir ninnuwthoh eonghaagechuw, engkhejege ninnuw ing tuning ninte aphabekhena emmenienhingna aettha etu arhuwga; changqechuw kieche aphabekhena ninnuwthoh onghaamaamie.
Heve nepinuw ing achehsaachuw atupe; amaing irhivang ate kehuwmchuw mensang riichii aatepe.
Atatah ninnhingna kerhierga, simriipaam aangkhengna aettha ttongjiir minjaamvang ate amhinbekhena heve nepenuw ing entupihie mibekheing aanthienaing tongvatehe.”
Chona suwmmalhie ennhiekaarna engkhe, Judas Iskariotching khorpuw elhuwnghenhingte Jesuchuw alhinnaing jungshuwse.
Amachuw enthie taanaching, enhimpaa enrotha rhohge anhingna sheer apinaching ouwngrhusehe. Hanghing amaching aminsuwrna taancha aabiirpe.
Chor emvemaa tal aemhaarna aaniena, Aminlenna Zou ati atheh aphanaching, asepohheching anhingna arhier, “Akhuna Aminlenna aenie aemhaarnachuw kinnuw ing vanungge abethongnachuw naadiega?”
Amaing asepoh ennhiechuw cheerge, arhier, “Khuwpuwte vasinung, engkhejege mi engkheing chaphor rinniege ninnuwchuw aehaavate; aanhuw jieruw,
engkhejege nimvalhuwle aapuw nhingna rhieruw, Thiimpuw ing arhier, ‘Akhunakhinga aemhaarna adeenchuw amana kesepohhethoh Aminlenna buw saanachuw?’
Amaing elhuwngpaa eenchung amenhienachuw minlhiem cherniege eminthievate, amana aeongna erotum chuw bethongruw.”
Chona sepohheching jungshuwhege khupuwte valhuhhege amaing ennhingna arhierkhangkhing atupehe, engkhejege emmenieing Aminlenna aemhaarnachuw abethongpehe.
Kholhiechuw ahungvieche asepohhetho thengsehe.
Buw ensaaleching, Jesu ing arhier, “Atatah ninnhingna kehierga, ningkaarna engkhe, kiethoh kesaahaa engkheching kiechuw ilhin vate.”
Emmenieing anhingna embelung ijapaaing entah entahing rhierhege, “kiegingmo?” entehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “kiethoh bekamsungna tal kebechuwhaa suwmmalhie ennhie kaarna engkhega.
Ajiegachiinche Mi sapaching ama khu abejii khangkhing shuwvate, changqechuw Mi sapa chuw aalhin milinaching jasavate! Ama michuw berhingmaaniebe arotum tthasehvang atega.”
Emmenieing ensaaleching amaing talchuw viliege bor pege engkhejege bekhiege ennhingna vipege arhier, “ninnuw ing lieruw; hevehie kebechiiga.”
Chona amaing belinchuw viliege amimpaa nhuwte ennhingna vipege, engkhejege emmeniebekheing aeenpehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Hevehie ttongdeenlina mi aenhimpaa rotumna icheh kethiega.
Kieing ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, Thangnhang lepaa aetharnaching eenvang kete aaniechuw aviemaataang kieing darkha chiihie eenmaaning.”
Emmenieing lha entusuwnhuwte, Olive boungte engkesehe.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “ninnuwbekheing aemavangninte; ajiegachienche abejiibesaga,
‘Kieing Zou, aasserpachuw binningqe tievate,
engkhejege Zouhechuw enjehchervatehe.’
Changqechuw, kieing hangrhingningge Galilite mensaing hesivangqete.
Changqechuw Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Mibekheing aebethinkhangjenie kiebe bethinmaaning chie.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Atatah nanhingna kerhierga, Atenie yenna aarkhuwngpaching vonhie akhuwngmaalhiele nang ing kiechuw vothum erhumaatenie.”
Changqechuw eperseseh avirhier, “Kieing nangthoh ithiephanagejenie kieing nangchuw irhumaa tumaaningchie, engkhejege emmeniebekhejeching changngenge arhierhe.”
Emmenieing Gethsemane ate amhinteching vahege, engkhejege asepohhenhingna arhier, “Kieing kehinnhiele hena heongruw.”
Amaing Piter, Jakob engkhejege Johon hechuw arhiipe, engkhejege amaing belung ijaapaaing ongthie jaarthiemaase.
Engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “kechipihie enhimpaa ithienapha jasaning, ninnuw ing hevena ongnung mengjeruw.”
Engkhejege amaing maangsohte vaansinge, lolhielina vatiehge, rhuwniebe aphahie anhingtena aalennaing ahinnhiepe.
Amaing arhier, “Abba, Epa, nanhingna etuchecher nachega; heve belinhie kenhingtena eliepisare; changgechuw kieing kemindeen eenshuw maaresie nang ing namindeenchuw eenshuwresie.”
Amaing ahungngeenliche aehejaar aphapehe, engkhejege innhingna arhier, “Simon aejaargechie? Nang ing hirring apha engkhedong aemeng nachehmaga?
Ningnuw ing, itthamaate nimbunamaaing enriimnung hinnheruw, chipichinbe tuning atena changgechuw huwmchinbe chehma.”
Engkhejege avonhie vage ahinnhiepe, angengeching ahinrhier,
Engkhejege avonhie ahungngeenliche aejaarhechuw aphapehe, ajiega ate inche immhih ikhuwpa onghege ajiedong arhierna minghuwmaasehe.
Amaing avominthumna huwngge enhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing ate ephaing aejaargechuw? Enshuwse! aphachuw viese; Mi sapachuw esiicher aatuhenhingte apipehe.
Hangthieruw, engketeruw. Ebeerruw, inlhinhe mihechuw thengsehe.”

Chalerahching amaing attongleching Judas, suwmmalhie ennhie kaarna engkhechuw vatungse, engkhejege amathoh enrhii mi ruhpuw heching chimsie amana romhorthoh, khorpuw elhuwnghe, thiimdeehe engkhejege upaheching ahinjiehe.
Ate aalhinpaching bietimna pehege, arhier, “kieng ahimbeeng kebejuhchuwvang atega, suwrnung engkhejege rhiidohnung rhungruw.”
Amaching huwngge anhingte vaverge arhier, “Rabbi!” tege abejuh pe.
Chona emmenieing suwrhege arhiepehe.
Apaangna ineer engkheching, chimsiechuw ijuhge khorpuw elhuwng shuwh aanachuw aavehbongpe.
Chonaching Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “nang ing ouwngruw suwrvang achiekhangkhing chimsiethoh engkhejege romhorthoh ethenggechuw?
Aanasiir Thangnhang eenna minchuw ingchuwge isuwrmaachuw. Changgechuw aettha ttongjirchuw alir ashuwnaga.”
Emmeniebekheing mahege tenchersehe.
Achuw engkhe eler engkheching piendeer emveluwng limon pien serge Jesu inhuw ajii; emmenieing amajechuw asuwrpehe.
Changechuw apienchuw mage aseh ing tense.
Ate Jesuchuw khorpuw elhuwnghenhingte ahinrhiepehe; engkhejege khorpuw elhuwngbekhe, upahe amana Thiimdeehe oungkongsehe.
Piter ing khorpuw elhuwng ongna atebu asung ipha endalhalhaaing aanhuw ajie, amana aarhunghekaarna mhi auwpe.
Ate khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege bichaar upabekheching Jesuchuw athehnaing saarkhii enjongjeng teuhmaasehe.
Ajiegachiinche mi enhimheching ataalina amamaa saarkhie pehejenie enlehmaasehe.
Mi alhehheching hangniirhege Jesutaalina amamaa saarkhii pehege enrhier,
“Kinnuw ing arhier kinthiega, ‘Kieing Thangnhang een, keehing atuhie memaangningge, enie nethumna lintaang engkhe himmeniirvanggie, amachuw kee ing atuchuw maaga.’ ”
Changqechuw emmenieing saarkhii apihechuw enlemaasehe.
Khorpuw elhuwngching aliehna niirge Jesuchuw ashie, “nang ing engkhedong besangmaatenie? Natahlina mihehing saarkhii apihie ajiega?”
Changqechuw amaing derengqe ajiedong besangmaase. Avonhie khorpuw elhuwngching ashiepe, “Nang Aantinpa repah Aetthapaa aapuw sapa Khristagechie?”
Jesu ing arhier, “Kieging; engkhejege ‘Mi Sapaching athang alaar elhuwng ing atachangna eong engkhejege Thangven ruduwhkaarna ijungchuw mhuwvangninte.’ ”
Chonaching khorpuw elhuwngching apien itthiihge arhier, “heve ithi ing aenieing Saarkhii elie ajie aekana euwmga?
Thangnhang tahlina itthaamaing ittonghie ninthiese; ajie ningkharse?” Emmeniebekheing Jesuchuw ithie arhuga tehege amaraar apipehe.
Mi alhehheching atahlina becherhege amhih abeluwpehe engkhejege abinhe, “engkhejege achuw ing imbinga, vimindang!” atehe. Engkhejege aarhunghejeching ingkibejaing ibeenghege arhiepehe.
Piter ing tebuh paangna aongle khorpuw elhuwng nepenuw amine engkheing thengge;
Piter ing mhi auwleching mhuwge ibeerge arhier, nangje Nazarettena mi Jesuthoh enrhiihaagechie maa khang.
Changgechuw amaing rhuwmaage arhier, “Kieing narhierhie minghuwmaadehing.” Engkhejege amaing tebute jungshuwse; amana aarkhuwngchuw khuwngse.
Engkhejege mine lunghaaching mhuwge apaangna iniirhenhingnaching rhierge, “mi hevehie engkaarna emvega.”
Changqechuw amaing rhumaase, uwmphege apaangna iniir heching Piternhingna avonhie arhier, “Atatah nanghie engkaarna engkhegechie, ajiegachienche Galiltena migechie.”
Changgechuw, ninnuw ing ninrhier michuw kieing minghuwmaang tege seraap empesage, engkhejege ttongnier ahinjongpe.

Chalerahching aarkhuwngpaing avonhiena khuwngse. Engkhejege “Aarkhuwng ing vonhie akhuwngmaalhiele nang ing vothum irhumaatenie, tege Jesu ing arhierchuw Piterching aanthiepe.” Engkhejege amachuw amindeentahna ttaase.
Akhowaar yiengna khorpuw elhuwngheching upahethoh engkhejege Thiimdeehethoh, bichaar apuwhethoh entanahege Jesuchuw phierhege Pilatnhingte avipeepehe.
Pilat ing Jesuchuw asie, “nang Jehudihe eruwnggechie?” Amaing besangge, “nang narhierchuwga.”
Chona khorpuw elhuwngheching atahlina inhimpaa aminlaarhe.
Pilat ing avonhii asie, “besangmaatenie? Ebeer emmenieng natahlina ijehmeh maraar impigehe.”
Changqechuw Jesu ing ama ithi ing besangmaase, chonaching Pilat alu liimse.
Ate imhaar kummhena emmenieing anhii mikhumsungna akhumhe mi engkhe bethinvang ate hechuw amaing atuchaaga.
Ateche Barabbas ate lepaa aminjahe mithehhe thoh mikhumsungna akhumhe.
Engkhejege miheching thenghege enrotumna amaing anunu atuchuw anhiipehe.
Engkhejege Pilat ing ennhingna abesang, “ninnuw ing ninrotumna Jehudihe Eruwngchuw bethingete?”
Ajiegachiinche, emmenieing kallaahege jesuchuw khorpuw elhuwngheching alhingehe atechuw amaing aminghuwga.
Changqechuw amachuwmaage Barabbaschuw enrotumna abethinnaing, khorpuw elhuwngheching mihechuw abetthohhe.
Pilat ing ennhingna avonhie arhier, “Ninnuw ing Jehudihe Eruwng atechuw kieing ajie turesie nintega?”
Emmenieing evauwnghe, “Thingkherna theh!”
Pilate ing asiehe, “ajietunaching, amaing ajie itthamaa atuga?” Changgechuw uwngsesehhege, “Thingkherna theh! atehe.”
Engkhejege Pilat ing mihechuw ning abethungnaing Barabbaschuw enrotumna abethinpe, engkhejege Jesuchuw abinrii nhuwte thingkherlina athehnaing apipehe.
Ate raarmiheching Jesuchuw bichaartuna kurnungte (amachuwbe lepaa aapuw kurnung) rhiihege raarmi ruhpuw hechuw aeenpehe.
Engkhejege emmenieing eaerle isin longoh ouwngsuwr meniehege, elhing lukhum ittiihege aluna amingkhumpehe.
Engkhejege emmenieing Jesuchuw, “He Jehudihe Eruwng” tehege erum abetthiimpehe.
Emmenieing thingbaaing alosena binhege enkhejege abecherhe, engkhejege ingkhiruwkhuw phinhege arumhe.
Engkhejege, meniehege easin pienchuw ataalitena liejohhege alongohchuw ameniepehe. Chona emmenieing thingkherlina athehnaing arhiepehe.
Amana ivatheng paam engkhetena, Alexanderle Rufus ammapa Simon ate kurenetena mi engkhechuw menamhege Jesu thingkherchuw amingkihe.
Chona emmenieing Jesuchuw Golgotha ate amhin, amachuwbe ruh loseh amhintechin ahinrhiepehe.
Engkhejege Jesuchuw Myrrhchuw darkha chiithoh mimvehege amingeenhe, changqechuw amaing aelhaangmaa.
Engkhejege thingkherlina athehpehe, engkhejege alongohchuw emmenieing achuw tavang atega tehege enrasie embierhege asimpehe.
Thangpachuw thingkherlina jopithahege aben ajamhechuw yieng apha ouwngthum rovenaga.
Engkhejege imminlaarnahe romhing phuwhege “Jehudihe Eruwng” tehege abejiipehe.
Amathoh enrhiing ouwngruw ennhiehechuw Jesu atachangte engkhe, engkhejege engkhechuw talite thingkherlina athehhe.
(aethaa ttongjiirna arhier enhuw ejieing, Thangpahie isiicher Kaarna amimvepehe ate alir ashuwnaga.)
Apaangna ehungsi evasi heching eenluw elehege arhierhe, “Aro! Thangnhang een amemaang engkhejege inie nethumna aatuche nang,
nathienening engkarsaing thingkhertaalitena jungttum!”
Khangnge ngeching khorpuw elhuwnghe amana Thiimdeeheching ennajeer ing meniehege arhierhe, “amaing lintaangheche karge atahchuwbe karchemaase,
Kinnuw ing mhuwnungge kinthachanaing, Israelhe Eruwng Aantinpa, thingkherlitena jungttum” atehe. Engkhejege Amathoh thingkherlina ithiehejeching anhingna aechohnattong ing abiehe.
Siim apha hirringna bettiimge aenie ijungbuw apha hirring ouwngthum phanaing minthimpohse.
Hirring apha eenthumna Jesu ing engkaangpahing uwngqe, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachthani?” ama minghuwnachuwbe, “Epa, Thangnhang, Epa Thangnhang, ajietuna emmaagechie?”
Apaangna eneerheching athie heche, emmenieing arhier, “Rongeruw, amaing Elijah aeenna.”
Engkhejege achuw engkheing vatenhege chii abejuna ithuwr darkha chii luhhege thinkier engkhena khiehhege eenresie tehege pehege, arhier, “Haajehruw, Elijah thengniege amachuw bettuwmvatemo.”
Chale Jesu ing engkaangpah irur ing uwngqe achipi abethinpe.
Engkhejege Thangnhang eenna enthiing pien adeenhechuw achungna betthiimge aderphana alheh ennieng entthiise,
Ate Thangpathoh raar indeenghe aeniir raarmi elhuwngching Thangpaing hanghing ithiechuw amhuwche, arhier, “Atatah heve pesarhie Thangnhang sapaga!”
Raarkhena nepenuwhejeng aabiirche, engkaarnaching Mary Macdalene, engkhejege nepanglhah Jakob manuw Mary, amana Joses engkhejege Salome emvehe.
Emmeniehing Galilina Jesu aongle aanhuw jiehege anong atupigehe; engkhejege amathoh enhriehe Jerusalemte ihang lintaang nepenuwheje emvehe.
Kholhie hungviege Eongnanie inie ahungviemaalhiele anong rothangna inie ehungviegekhake,
Upahekaarna enjashuw mi, atahjeng Thangnhang lepaa ahehaajeh Arimathea Joseph chuw vage; amaing enttii uwmluing Pilatnhingte vage Jesu humchuw avanhiipe.
Chona jesuchuw thihse ate Pilat ing athietaana aning dongge, amaing raarmi roza engkhe aapuwchuw vaeenge Jesu ithiehchuw sihsemo tege anhingna asie.
Engkhejege amaing raarmi roza engkhe aapuwnhingtena aminghuwtaanaching, ithie humchuw Josephnhingte apipe.
Chona Joseph ing ennaar limon pien iliege Jesuchuw betthumge, pienching ilhumge, lhungpuw viihge iuwm thensungna arhipe; engkhejege then eengkhaarchuw lhung ing akampe.
Mary Madalenele amana Joses amanuw mary ing ahum amintornachuw akhunaga ate aminghuwhe.
Eongna iniechuw attuhche Mary makdalene, Jakob amanuw Mary engkhejege Salome, emmenieing vahege Jesu aatehna riechii aaliehe.
Engkhejege hapta amensa inie emenphi, inie ehangshuw taanchana thenpaangte vasehe.
Emmenie ennajir ing ensiihege, “then ivalhuwna akhumchuw achuw ing aebelangpivate?”
Emmenieing aabiirheche elhuwngpaa lhungchuw abelejoh amhuwpehe.
emvalhuwleching eler engkhe pien iwaarje serge tachangna eongchuw mhuwhege eenluw liimsehe.
Changqechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “ninluwliimmaaresie; thingkherlina athehhe Nazareth Jesuchuw ningjongga. Ama hangrhingse, hena ongmaase. Ebeerruw, emmenieing amintorna amhin.
Changgechuw siruw, asepohhele Piternhingna rhierpiruw, ama nimmana Galilite hesise; Jesu ing arhierngenge ninnuw ing mhuwvangninte.”
Chonaching thensungtena hungsuwhege tensehe; ajiegachienche ennhingna ettiishuwpa, enningdongna aanshuwtanaching; engkhejege aettehege achuw nhingnadong tongmaashehe.

“Engkhegege ennhingna rhierruw arhierbekhechuw Piterle apaangna eongbekhenhingna imongpaaing atonghe. Engkhejege ama enhuwna Jesu ataa rarahing chieti amana chienhate enthiing ithie enemaa engkhejege ittiim enemaa ikarpina ttongjiirchuw aminjaamnaing acheerpehe.”
Hapta amensa inie yiengna anhingtena ronham sarie athorpi Mary macdalene nhingna mensa aantuwphuwpe.
Amaing engkege Jesu envarhiele belung ejaing ittaahe aalhanghenhingna atongpe.
Changgechuw Jesuchuw hangrhingse engkhejege ataaing amhuwga atechuw thiehejenie thachamaasehe.
Hevebekhe enhuwna amasaa uwmvurge paam engkhete aevasihe ennhingna uwmphuwngse.
Engkhejege emmenieing hungeen-lihege iheonghenhingna atonghe, changqechuw emmenieing thachamaahe.
Ama enhuwna suwmmalhie engkheching theh sahege engongle Jesu ing emphuwngge, emmenieing enthachamaa, embelung enhehpaalina arukuhhe, ajiegachienche, ihanghring amhuwhe chuw emmenieng thachamaahe.
Engkhejege Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing lolhiepaambekhena sinuung mibekhe nhingna aettha ttongjiirhie minjaamruw.
Thachaniege chii aluhbekhechuw karpivate; changechuw athachamaahechuw minlaarvate.
Engkhejege hevebekhe bietimnahing enthachathoh enrhievate, amachuwbe, kie keromhingna ronhamhechuw thorchevatehe; ethar ethar ttongching ttongvatehe;
Aembenching beruwr suwrhejenie, engkhejege irhuw chii eenkhanghejenie choveching ajiedongminluchemaahenie emmenieing aenahe taalina ingkih baanghejenie damvate.”
Hanghing ennhingna arhiernhuwte Jesuchuw minvente ajikipe, engkhejege Thangnhang atachangna ongse.

Engkhejege, emmenieing amhinbekhena sihege aettha ttongjiirchuw aminjaampehe; Thangpajeng emmeniechuw enrhiiphuwhege nong atuhaapihe, engkhejege, aanrhiiphuw bietimnabekheching ama ttongchuw amenehpe.
Aekaarna ishuwbesa bekhechuw abejiihe mi inhimpah heching hintuhege,
Abetthiimpehlema immhirarahching immhuw emmenie miheching inie inhingna atonghechuw abejiigehe.
Chotaanaching enjaphuw arhu Theophilus, nataaing naminghuwbesa atataa ttongchuw aminghuwnaing,
kiejeng aborna bettiimge hevebekhe vajiicher ingge, mapung ephaing nanhingte enjii tthavate tesaingge kemindeenga.
Judia paamna eruwng Herod apaarle Abejah ate khorpuwhekaarna Zekaria ate khorpuw engkhe aeong, aalhangnuwhie khorpuw Aaron eengkuwtena ehungsuw Elizabeth chuwga.
Thangnhang mhekungna aannhieing dhormo echergehe, engkhejege Thangnhang ttongthohbekhena engkhejege isiicherlina ajiidong ibourmagehe.
Changqechuw insiti auwmaataana, ajiegachienche Elizabethchuw akhongtaana, engkhejege ungkumje ishihpaagehe.
Hanghin hungviege, ama aruhe nongtuna ehungsi inhuw ejiing khorpuw nong atuleching,
Khorpuw ing atuhe inhuw ejieing Thangnhang een enthiingsungna valhuwge berim ichie bethuvang atenongchuw ataalite thengse.
Ate aberim ichie chuw bethuvang ichii aphana mibekhe taangna hinthamhege aeonghe.
Chona Thangnhang minven michier engkhe thengge abethuna tachang hebekoungna niirse.
Zekariaching amachuw amhuwche piengge pumtti ittehge.
Changqechuw minven michier ing thenge anhingna arhier, “Ittemaare, Zekaria ajiegachienche athiepe. Nalumhie ing neh rinniege engkhejege aromhing Johon teteniege phuwvangniete.
Naning silungriir nonge engkhejege rotharhona phawangnie, engkhejege ama naberhingtaana mi enhimpaaing rotharhovate;
Ajiegachiinche, ama Thangnhang mhibeerna lhuwngvate, darkha chiije eenmaanie Zuwje beruwmaanie, engkhejege amanuw vinsungna betthiemniege Chipi Enthiing ing siihkangvate.
Amaing Israel sitihe aanhim Thangnhang boumte hinrhievate.

Elijah chipi engkhejege pirthangching Thangpa amate siniege, amapahe belungrierchuw asitihenhingte engkhejege irhier aminjiemaa chuw atataa eviernate himbiliniege, miheching Thangpa rotum enthongvatehe.”
Zakariaing thangven michiernhingna arhier, “Ajiikhang suwvang atehie minghuwvang ketega? Ajiegachiinche kieje tarsing Kilhumhije akum nhimse.”
Minven michierchin abesang, “Kie Gabrielging, Thangnhang mhekungna eneerging; engkhejege nangtho ittongnaing engkhejege aettha ttongjiirchuw nanhingna arhiernaing injihchierga.
Changqechuw ate, nang ing nathachamaataana ama inieehuw aviemaataang dereng ongteniege, nattongje shuw maanie.”
Chaleching miheching Zekariachuw haahjehege, engkhejege enthiing dinsungna esihpaa aongtaanaching eenluw liimsehe.
Amatena ajungshuwche attong suwhmaase, engkhejege amaing enthiing dinsungna ajiegemo amhuwpe tehege aminghuwpehe; Amaing ennhingna aandangna akichin mintige, engkhejege attongje suwhmaase.
Amaing anong tuvang ichiechuw abetthuche aeente engkese.
Chona eniesungna alumhi Elizabeth ing neh arinpe, engkhejege thah ronga eenthurse Amaing arhier,
“Hevehie Thangnhang ing Kerotumna atu, amaing kemihekaarna kening injaavang ate akuhnaing ijiibeerge ama inienachin hanghin embesuwpipe.”
Thah koru avieche Galili khuwpuw Nazarethnachin Thangven michier Gabrialchuw Thangnhang ing ajinchiirpe,
David eengkuwtena Joseph ate pesar engkhena ttong ouwngrhubesa lunghaa enthiingnhingna thengse, engkhejege ama lunghaachuw Maryga.
Engkhejege amaing anhingna thengge arhier, “Rasieittha, lungsii apha! Thangnhang nanhingna cheengse.”
Changqechuw ama ttongching aning morge, heve rasiettha ate ttonghing enhimpaa awaakhar akipe.
Thangven michier ing anhingna arhier, “Ittemaa, Mary, ajiegachienche nang ing Thangnhang lungsiichuw naphape.
engkhejege, ebeer, nang ing neh rinteniege sapa engkhe berhingvangniete, engkhejege Jesu teteniege aromhing phuwvangniete.
Ama lhuwngvate, engkhejege Engkaangseh, engkhejege Thangnhang ing anhingna amapa David eruwng ongtaana mengongvate.
Amaing Jakob eengkuw taalina ittiim enemaaing paarvate, engkhejege ama aruwng lepaachuw ittiim nemaanie.”
Mary ing Thangven michiernhingna arhier, “hevehie ajiekhang shuwvang atega, kieche pesartho entuhmalhiing?”

Thangven michier ing anhingna arhier, “Chipi Enthiingchuw nataalina thengvate, engkhejege Engkaangseh pirthang amaching ekhuwmvate; chonachin nedoung naberhing chuw enthiing; engkhejege Thangnhang sapa enshuwvate.
Engkhejege ebeer, nasungkhortena Elizabethjeng atarnhuwte neh arinpe; Neh arinmaa nepenuwga atehe ching neh ringe thah kuru aphape.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangnhingna ishuwchemaa ajiidong uwmmaa.
Chona Mary ing arhier, “hena ongsaning, Thangnhang mine; Thangnhang amine, kie hena ongsaning; nang ing narhierchuw kenhingna shuwresie.” Chona Thangven michierchuw anhingtena engkese.
Heve iniehesungna Maryching hangthiege boungpaamna euwm Judiate akar minjaangge engkese.
Amaing Zekaria eensungte valhuwge Elizabethchuw aberhiimpe.
Elizabeth ing Mary aberhiim ttongchuw athieche asungna nedoungchuw eenchuwmse, engkhejege Elizabeth ing Chipi Enthiing ing deemge,
engkhejege engkaangpaa erur ing uwngse, “nepenuwhe kaarna repaa ittha, engkhejege, nasungna narin nedounghie arepaa itthaga.
Engkhejege ajiikhang kenhingna hevehie isuwga, amachuwbe ke-Thangnhang amanuw ing kenhingte ethengchieche?
ajiegachiinche nang ing emberhim chuw kavithieche nedoung kesungnachuw arotha rhohge eenchuumne.
Engkhejege Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw shuwchervate atehie ijehmeh rotha rhohnavang ichie alir ashuwnaga.”
Engkhejege Mary ing arhier,
“Kechipi ing Thangnhangchuw keminlhuwngsaana engkhejege ingkarpee Thangnhangchuw kechipi ing rotha keminrhohse,
Ajiegachiinche ama ing isur mine nepenuw kiechuw irhupeechiege injihbeerchie.
Atataa, ate misienhechin repaa ittha etevatehe.
Ajiegachiinche Aatuche Engkhechin kerotumna elhuwngpaa atupe,
engkhejege aromhingchuw enthiingga.
Ama aningsiihie ama attiehenhingna misienbekhenhingna ethengga.
Ama abenchin pirthangchuw imminthiepe;
Amaing emmenie belungrierna aminghuwlina elhuwngttittu hechuw aajecherpe.
Ama-ing atuchehe eruwng hechuw betthumge,
engkhejege esienghechuw aathohpe,
Amaing avin aettaamhechuw aetha paa pee ing aminsiepe,
engkhejege savanghechuw aaruh ing abethinpe.
amaing aminehe Israelhechuw buwmge,
aningsiichuw aanthie jehna ing,
Imapa imapuwhenhingna ttongneer apee.
Abraham engkhejege asiti baasienhenhingna.”
Engkhejege Mary ing tha eenthum amathoh onghege aeente inlise.
Ate Elizabethchin akum atha viege, engkhejege pesar nedoung aberhingpe.
Thangnhang ing ijehmeh aning aminsiiga atechuw veemchanghe, auw aneheching athietaana enrotha rhohsehe.
Hanghin inie neeriih ahimphale nepangchuw vin atinna ing ethenghe; engkhejege amapa romhing enhuw ejie-ing Zekaria teheniege phuwrong atepehe.
Changqechuw amanuw ing arhier, “Changmaaga; Johon tevang aetega.”
Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “nang naeengkuw sungkhorsungna hangchie romhing uwmaalhie.”
Chonachin aromhing achuwtevang aetega atechuw amapanhingte amindangna pehege asiehhe.
Amaing abejiina lhuwngpee nhege, “Aromhinghie Johonga tege abejiipe.” chonaching aeongbekheching eenlu liimse.
Chaleraaching abe emmhongse, abelieje enjohse engkhejege Thangnhangchuw mimpaage vattongse.
Arovena aeogbekhehechuw ittihsehe, engkhejege, heve ttonghie Judia boungpaang paambekhena aminjaampehe.
Aathiebekheing emblungriirna sejehhege arhierhe, “heve nepanghie ajii eensuwvang atega?” Ajiegachiinche, Thangnhang kihching atataaing aanrhiiphuwga.
Chona amapa Zekaria chuw Chipi Engthiing ing siihge Thangnhang ttong ahimphuwngpe.
“Israelhe Thangnhang mimpasateruw,
Amaing thengqe amihechuw boumge ningvesangna apeepe.
Amaing amine David eengkuwna isiichertena eniechuw aminlenaing aachehpa ikarpi aapuwchuw ahimbesuwpe.
Amaing ayen Thangnhang laarchangpa enthiinghe nherna arhierkhangkhing,
Iraarhe kihtena amana embeterhekaaartena eniechuw engkarpeepe,
Emapa emapuwhenhingna ningsii amindangnaing ama enthiing ttongneerchuw aanthienaing,
Engkhejege emapuw Abrahamnhingna ttongneer adeenkhangkhin,
Aeraarsa keelitena ekarsage,
anong etule itteluing
enthiing ing engkhejege dhormo icher ing irhingsihna,
anong tuna eenrhupeenaing eentupeepe.
Engkhejege, nepang nangchuwbe Engkaangseh laarchangpa itevatehe,
ajiegachienche nang ing emmana hesiteniege Thangpa lhamchuw bethongvangniete,
amihenhingna isiicher eentubekhe akuhpeena ikarpi aphanachuw apinaing,
Thangnhang lungsii chona belung ittha yaarna inthimpakaarna aeonghe,
engkhejege ithie rothaing amingkhumhechuw aminlennaing,
Engkhejege dejiim lhamte ikhichuw aminjiena,
ithie deliimna aeonghechuw ajihthennaing eebeerpeeniege elengchuw impeepe.”
Chona nepangchuw humnaje chipinaje hanglhuwngge, amaing mikaarna aamphuwngmaataang rampakaarna ongse.
Chove aphanaching lolhiepaam bekhetena mitimnachuw himphage, ataa ataaing enromhing amingkongnaing Eruwng Augustusing ttongper aminsipe.
Quiriniasing Siria lepaa apuhleching romhing enjiihie men aesaga.
Mibekheching ama ama akhupuwte romhing acharnaing sise.
Josephje Galili Nazareth khuwpuw tena Judia Bethlehem ate David khuwpuwte hangsise, ajiegachienche ama David sungkhor engkhejege eengkuwtenaga;
Amathoh ttong ameniirbesha neh arin Marytho enromhing acharna lina chinga.
Emmenieng amana engongle nedoung berhingvang ichii iniechuw viese.
Amaing mensa pesarti engkhe berhingge, amachuw pien ing aelhumge, sah ing theh asaana rokuwngsungna aminjaarpe, ajiegachienche mitungtaana enrotum amhin auwmmaataanaga.
Ama ramnaching phena zou aasherheching yenna enzou aruhhechuw rhunghege,
Chale Thangnhang Michierchin emmhekungna nierge, engkhejege Thangnhang attheh alaarchuw arovebekhena lengge, chonaching enhimpaa ittisehe.
Changqechuw Thangven michier chin ennhingna arhier, “Ettemaaruw; ajiegachienche, ebeerruw kie ing aettha ttongjiir rotha rhohnapaa mibekhe rotum kejihreenga:
ninnhingna atenie David khuwpuwna ekarpi Aapuwchuw aberhingpe, amabe Aaantinpa Thangpaga.
Ninrotumna hevehie bietimnaga, ninnuw ing pien ing aalhum nedoung engkhe sah ing chii aeenna rokuwng na aminyaar phavangninte.
Engkhejege minghuw minghaluing Thaventena michier ruwpuwhetho enrhiing Thangnhangchuw mimpaahege arhier,
Engkaangsehna Thangnhangchuw mimpaana,
engkhejege simriipaamna amaing aadiehelina dejiim belungrierchuw!”

Minven michierheching emmeniechuw mahege minvente akarnhuwtehe Zou aaserhechin engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “ateche inieng Bethlehemte vameniige, Thangnhang ing imminthie aeshuw ttongchuw vaabeerteruw.”
Chonachin emmenieing kar minjaanghege avaaheche Mary amana Josephje amana sah thehsaataana aminjaar nedoungjechuw aphapehe.
Emmenieing amachuw emmhuwche nedoung khuchuw ennhingna arhier ttong bekhechuw aminthangpehe.
engkhejege Zou aaserheching arhierbekhechuw aathieheching inhimpah; eenluw liimse.
Changgechuw Mary ing abelungrierna hingkhar vikharge arhierbekhehe ttongchuw asiehjepe.
Zou aaserheching enthiebekhe engkhejege emmhuw bekhelina Thangnhang athang alaarchuw mimpaahege inlisehe.
Inie neeriih ttohge vintinvang ate hungviege, Mary ing neh arinmaalhiele Thangven michier ing aphuw khangkhing aromhing Jesu tehege aphuwpehe.
Mosi wajiirttong enhuw ejieng emmenieing aminlhiemna eniechuw viege Thangnhangte aminlhennaing Jerusalemte ahinrhiepehe.
(Thangnhang wajiir ttongna abejiibesakhangkhing, mensa aberhing pesarbekhechuw Thangnhangte minthiingvang atega,)
engkhejege emmenieing Thangnhang waajiir ttongna abejii enhuw ejieing een vatthuw siihkhe changmaanieche edoung een vatthuw achihe.
Ate Simon ate pesar engkhe amana eong; amahie dhormo icher Thangnhang amindeenpah, Israelhechuw ittha ipaarnaing ahaajeh miga, engkhejege Chipi Enthiing ing anhingna icheengga.
Amaing Aantinpa Jesuchuw amhuwmaatang ing, ithiechuw mhuwmaanie tege Chipi Enthiing ing anhingna amindangpiga,
Chipiching enrhiephuwge Thangnhang eente valhuwse, engkhejege waajiir ttong enhuw ejieng amapale amanuwching avirhiile,
Simon ing aben ing vilhaangge engkhejege Thangnhangchuw mimpaage, arhier,
“Aanchungpa, ate nang ing namine kiechuw belung idejeh ing narhier enhuw ejieing ebethinpichiege;
ajiegachienche kemhihching Ikarpi Aapuw chuw kemhuwpe,
nang ing mibekhe mhekungna
nabethongbesachuw,
Yaati lintaanghe nhingna lengwaarchuw,
engkhejege Israelhenhingna attheh alaarchuw namindangpe.”
Engkhejege Thangpa amapale amanuwching heve ttonglinaching eenluw liimsehe.

Chona Simonching emmeniechuw bor pehege engkhejege amanuw Mary nhingna arhier, “heve nedounghie Israelhechuw aathohna abuhna engkhejege aborna Thangnhanging aaturbesa engkhejege arhuma bietimnaing asiiga;
Hanghin nabelungriirna namindeenbekheje mindangvate engkhejege chimsieching nachipije ithiirvate.”
Asher Yaatitena Phanuel sanuw Anna ate Thangnhang ttong aphuwng laarchang engkhe aeong. Ama akum isihpaa apuwsarthoh kum sarie paarhege,
Kum sumeeriih mhikhuwnuw ing ongge, akum esihpaaga, amaing siimyen bethinluing vinttaamtongge, hinnhege Thangnhang een abethinmaaga.
Chaleraaching amaing thengge Thangnhangchuw mimpaage, Jerusalem hingeetin vang ate hehaage nedoung khuchuw arhier.
Emmenieing Thangnhang waajiir ttong anonghechuw embetthunhuwte, Galile ouwngkhuwpuw Nazarethte hungeenlisehe.
Nedoungchuw hanglhuwngge, hangperge, engkhejege evierching siihge; engkhejege Thangnhang ningsiechuw ataalina cheengse.
Ateche amapale amanuwching akum akumna Aminlenpi aeriimna Jerusalemte thenghege.
Engkhejege Jesu ing akum summalhie ennhie ahimphale emmenieing ama aeriimnachin ethenghe.
Aeriimchuw attuhnhuwte, inghungeenlile, nepang Jesuchuw Jerusalemna amaapehe, changgechuw amapa amanuw ing amachuw minghuwmaa.
Mi aru ramkhie isihaahethoh engkegehe tehege inie engkhe lham ajiidohpehe. Emmenieing ensungkhor engkhejege aalhanghe kaarna ajonghe;
Changgechuw, eentuhmaataanaheching, hinjong hinjonghege Jerusalem ephaing hungeenlisehe.
Inie nethum aanhuwte Thangnhang eenna thiimpuwhetho ttong ensihege, engkhejege emmeniechuw sihege aliehna aeong ateupehe.
Engkhejege attong ahe asingna, abesang hechuw aathieheching eenluw liimsehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng Jesuchuw amhuwheche enning morge, amanuw ing arhier, “Nepang, ajietuna kinnuwhie hanghin entugechie? Ebeer, nangpale kieing belung ijapaaing kinjonggechie.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajiitunaching kiechuw enjonggechuw? kiebe Ipa eenna ongrimvang ketega echiihie minghuwmaachuw?”
Changgechuw emmenieing ajie atenaga ichii minghuw maahe.
Chona emmeniethoh Nazarethte engkesehe, engkhejege emmenieing arhier minjiege uwmse. Amanuw ing amabekhechuw abelungrierna atharjepe.
Engkhejege Jesuchuw aviernale, akum akumna humnaje hanglhuwnge mihejeng engkhjege Thangngnhang ing aadie hungeenshuwse.

Tiberias Eruwng ing apaar kum summalhieronga sungna Pontus Pilat ing Judiana paam aapuw eenshuwge apaarle Herod ing Galilina eruwng tuge, anepa Philip ing Iturea engkhejege Trakonitis paam apuwhle, engkhejege Lysanias-ing Abilenena eruwng viege,
Annas le Kaiaphas heching khorpuw elhuwng atulehechin rampakaarna Zekaria sapa Johon nhingna Thangnhang ttongchuw thengse.
Amaing ama rambekhena aeong isiikhatena akarpina belungrier amintena chii aluhchuw amaing minjaamge Jordon arove paambekhena vathengse;
Thangnhang ttongthangpa Isaiah leriina abejiikhangkhing, amachuwbe:
“Rampana euwng engkhe erurchuw,
‘ninnuw ing Thangnhang lham bethongruw,
alhamchuw minteumruw.
Ouwngkuwngbekhe minchieruw,
boungpuw amana boungbekhe mimpheruw,
engkhejege ouwngkuurbekheje minteumruw engkhejege itthamaa lhambekhe mintthaaruw:
Engkhejege mibekheching Thangnhang ekarpinachuw mhuwvate.’ ”
Johon ing anhingna chii luhvang atehe mi ruwpuwhenhingna arhier, “Berur misienhe! Thangveng belungsii tena tenruw tege achuwngche ninnhingna arhierga?

Belungriir amintena arhu nongchuw minraruw; engkhejege emapuw Abraham uwmne techuwge nimblungriirna irhier betthiimmaaruw, ajiegachienche ninnhingna kerhierga, Thangnhang ing lhuwng hevebekhetena Abraham asitihe abesuwchega.
Ateleje thingbour arojungna rhii phinge uwmne, chonaching ittha aanrah inuwmmaa thingbekhechuw phuwrniege mhisungte thaavate.”
Engkhejege mi ruwpuwheching anhingna asiihe, “Chogenieche ajietuvang kintega?”
Ennhingna amaing besangge, “longoh ennhie adeenching euwmmaanhingna peresie; engkhejege aesaaphuw adeenching khangkhin turesie.”
Khachana itthe hejeching chii alunaing thenghege anhingna asiehe, “Aanchungpa ajie tusaginte?”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Nimmeneerbesha amintahlina minthinung tthiingmaaruw.”

Raarmihejeng anhingna asiehe, “kinnuwje, ajie tuvang kintega?” amaing ennhingna arhier, “achuw chuw nhingtena ninnuw ing minttiinung siemaaruw, nataa natahing naphasah ching eenshuwsing tenung belung mengamruw.”
Engkhejege miheching ebeerhege, engkhejege emmenieing Johonhie Aantinpa chuvang atega tehege embelung riirna engkharleching,

Johon ing ennhiingna abesanghe, “Kieing ninnuwchuw chiina keluhgechuw; changgechuw kie ithieng aatuche engkhe thengne; kieing akhihkhum enjohje rovaar maaing; amachin ninnuwchuw Chipi Enthiingna engkhejege mhihna chii eluhwate,
Asaang vuhna amhin minlhiemniege gehu saang asehchuw aetumte thaarniege, amaing achi saangjaachin arhuw hechuw javate, changgechuw arhuwhechuw ittiim inemaa mhihna thaavate.”
Hanghing abetthohnahe ttong ing mihenhingna aettha ttongjiirje aminjaamga.
Changgechuw Herod Eruwng ing anepa lumhee Herodiaslina engkhejege aetthamaa atubekhelina arukuhche,
Herod ing atubekhelina hinthinge Johonchuw mikhumsungte akhumpe.
Mibekhechuw ate chii luhge, engkhejege Jesuje chii luhge ahinnhie aphanaching Thangven emmhongse,
Chipi Enthiingching een vatthuw khangkhin ataalina jottumse, engkhejege mimventena erur thengge, “Nang kening keminsiipaa kesapagechie, nanhingna kening chimpaane.”
Jesu ing kum sumthuwm ahungviephana anong betthimge. ama sapa (miing amindeen khangkhin) Heli sapa Joseph asapaga.
Helihie Matthat sapaga, Matthathie Levi sapaga, Levichuw Melki sapaga, Melkichuw Jonnai sapaga, Jannaichuw Joseph sapaga
Joseph ing Mattathias sapaga, ama amos sapaga, amoschuw Nahum sapaga, Nahumchuw Esli, Naggai sapaga,
Maath sapaga, Mathias sapaga, Semeain sapaga, Josech sapaga, Joda sapaga.
Jonan sapaga, Rehsa sapaga, Zerubbabel sapaga, Shealtiel sapaga, Heri sapaga,
Melki sapaga, Addi sapaga, Kosam sapaga, Elmadam sapaga, Er sapaga,
Joshua sapaga, Eleazar sapaga, Jorim sapaga, Matthat sapaga, Levi sapaga,
Semion sapaga, Judas sapaga, Joseph sapaga, Jonam sapaga, Eliakim sapaga.
Melea sapaga, Menna sapaga, Mattatha sapaga, Nathan sapaga, David sapaga,
Jesse sapaga, Abed sapaga, Boaz sapaga, Sala sapaga, Nahson sapaga,
Amminadab sapaga, Adin sapaga, Arni sapaga, Hezron sapaga, Perez sapaga, Judas sapaga,
Jakob sapaga, Issak sapaga, Abraham sapaga, Zerah sapaga, Nahor sapaga,
Serug sapaga, Reu sapaga, Peleg sapaga, Eber sapaga, Shelah sapaga,
Kainan sapaga, Arphaxad sapaga, Shem sapaga, Noah sapaga, Lamech sapaga,
Methuselah sapaga, Enoch sapaga, Jared sapaga, Mahalalel sapaga, Kainan sapaga.
Enos sapaga, Seth sapaga, Adam sapaga, Thangnhang sapaga.
Chona Jesuchuw Chipi Enthiing ing siihge, Jordontena hungeenlige rampate arhiipe,
Amana inie summillie Saitan ing abetheem. Ama aenie sungnaching ajiidong salu ing, engkhejege amachuw abetthuhche avin ttaamse.
Saitanching anhingna arhier, “Thangnhang sapagetenieche heve lhunghie tal ouwngshuwre ting rhierre.”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Talpang ing mi rhingmaanie, tege bejiige uwmne.”
Chona saitaanching engkaangpaate rhiege, lolhiepaam eruwng lepaa aangkheng mheechaah engkhepangna aminthiepe,
Saitanchin anhingna arhier, “hevebekhe tahlina nangchuw aapuw engkhejege athang alaarbekhe pevanggechie; ajiegachiinche hevebekhehie kenhingte imminsernaga, amana kieing kerhu michuw pevanggete.
Chonaching kemhekungna aerumteniebe, nata eensuwchervate.
Jesu ing amachuw abesang, “hevehie enjiibesaga, ‘Nang ing Thangnhangchuw rumvang natega engkhejege amapangchuw asepa tuvang natega.’”
Chona saitaanching Jerusalemte rhiege Thangnhang een abesurte mingkarge anhingna arhier, “Nang Thangnhang sepagetenieche jungkhoungre,
ajiegachienche hevehie engjiiga, ‘nangchuw engkarnaing amaing minven michierhechuw ttongtho peniege,’
Engkhejege nakhichuw lhunglina aamvarnamaaing ingkichin eedumvatehe.
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Hevehie arhierbesaga, ‘nang ing Thangnhang, na Thangnhangchuw chaang ebeermaa.’ ”
Saitanching chaang aabiirbekhechuw abetthuhche apha taancha aphamaataang abethinpe.
Chona Jesuchuw Chipi paangkarchuw phage Galilite hungeenlise, engkhejege arove rambekhena akhuchuw emvorse.
Amaing khuwngsangbekhena minchuwhege mibekheing amimpaahe.
Ama ahinjuhna Nazarethte huwngge, amaing Eongna eniena anunu ing khuwngsangna valhuwge, hangniirge lerii apape,
engkhejege, Laarchangpa Isaiah lerii alhuchuw anhingte apihe. Amaing alhuchuw bejohge, heve ttonghie enjiih ateupe,
Thangnhang Chipichuw ketaalina ongne,
amalinaching amaing sarahe nhingna aettha ttongjiir aminjaamnaing thou ingeetehpe.
Amaing akhumhechuw abethinna engkhejege mhihchuheching amhuwchena,
amenanghechuw ningvesang apinaing,
Thangnhang ing arhu amihechuw aminthangna,
kiechuw injihchierga.
Engkhejege leriichuw ijuwrrige anong atu nhingna vipege ongse; engkhejege khuwngsangna aeongbekheching amachuw aabeertihpehe.
Chona Jesu ing ennhingna irhier abetthiimpe, “Atenie ninthie leriina inthinhie alir asuwpe.”
Amaing ahinrhier engkhejege lungsii aeuwm ttongbekhe chuw enthie taana eenluw liimhege, emmenieing arhier, “Amahie Joseph sapamaakhang?”

Amaing ennhingna arhier, “ninning morluing kenhingna ttongtaahie ephervangninte, ‘Ethiem, nathenening damsare!’ Engkhejege ninnuw ing rhiervangninte, ‘Kapernaumna natubekhe kinthiekha nakhuwnaje tu.’ ”
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “Atatah ninnhiengna kerhierga, Thangnhang Laarchangpa achuw chuwgejenie ama arammi ing rhumaa.
Changgechuw atataachuwbe, Elijah apaarle Israelkaarna mhikhuwnuw aeonghe, minvenchuw kumthum tha kuru akamtaana, ama paamnaching esa-een isah-eenphuw uwmmage;
Changechuw Elijahchuw achuwnhingnadong Vicheerlung, changgechuw Sidonna euwm Zarephath mhihkhuwnuwnhingna avicheer.
Engkhejege Laarchangpa Elisha apaarle Israelhe kaarna enchor ing ipen enhimpaa aeuwm; engkhejege engkaarna achuwdong mintthaamaa, changgechuw Siriatene Naaman chuwgethaa.”
Heve ttonghie enthietaanaching khuwngsangna aeongheching embelung aenhimpah isiehe.
Emmenieng hangneerhege khuwpuwtena athorpehe, bekhohna aminluhnaing, engkhuwpuw aneerna bounglite akipehe.
Changgechuw Jesuching engkaartena ensiijohge engkedohse.
Amaing Kapernauwm khuwpuw Galili paamte vage iongna inie na aminchuwhe.
Emmenieing amaing aatuche engkhe khangkhin aminchuwtaanahe eenluw liimsehe.
Engkhejege ama khuwngsangna ebour chipi ing atoung mi engkhe aeheong; engkhejege eperpaaing uwngge,
“kinthenen ongsagungte, nangle kinnuwtho tuvang echii ajii uwmnekhang, Nazareth Jesu? Kinnuwhie memaanggete techiege ithenggechie? Nanghie Thangnhangtena Enthiing Engkhegechie.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing aesehge, arhier, “Derengre, anhingtena jungshuw.”
Emmeniebekheing eenluw liimge engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “ajiekhang ichii ttongrhierga? Ajii atuchena uwmge amaing ebour chipihenhingna rhierge etenhehie!”
Ama khuw arovena iuwm paam bekhena athiepehe.
Khuwngsangchuw abethinnhuwte Simon eensungte valhuwse, amana Simon amapichuw arhiih eperpaaing etheng, engkhejege emmenieng arotumna anhingna anhiihe.
Chona Jesu ing apaangna neerge arhii ethengchuw akhaampe, engkhejege aenaching abethinpe. Chalerahching amaing hangneerge sepa atupipehe.
Inie ajungbuwphana, lintaang lintaang aenahe enhimpaa anhingna virhiehege, engkhejege engkhe engkhe taalina aki baangge aminthaapehe.
Engkhejege ronhamhejeching “Thangnhang sapagechie,” tehege uwnghege mikaartena shuwhsehe. Changgechuw emmeniechuw ishehhege minttongmaasehe, ajiegachienche emmenieing Aantinpaga ate aminghuwgehe.
Khuw ahungvaarche Jesu ing jungshuwge, idepaa amhinte vase. Engkhejege mi ruwpuwheching amachuw jonghege; avatuheche, engkaartena aangkenamaa ing akhaamhe.
Changgechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing Thangnhang lepaa aetha ttongjiirchuw khuwpuwbekhena vatongrimvang ketega; ajiegachiinche hevelinahing injii cherga.”
Amaing Judia paamna euwm khuwngsang bekhena ttongjiirchuw aminjaampe.
Vokhe hangchie aphanaching Jesuchuw miruhpuwheching Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw arongenaing aanheengleheching Genesaret chiiting kurna ineer.
Jesu ing chiiting kurna ruwkuwng ennhie aminkarchuw avihmhuw; changgechuw ngaalaheching ruwkuwngtena ttumhege aechaa aminlhiemhe.
Amana Jesu ing Simon ruwkuwng engkhena, hangkarge siiphietena tepie vinhure ate. Chona ruwkuwngsungna ongge mi aruhechuw aminchuwhe.
Attongchuw aminchinhuwte, Simon ing nhingna arhier, “Eethute vihur ing nga asuwrnaing ichaa videengruw.”
Simon ing abesang, “Thangpa yensi deenguwngge ajiidong suwrmaaung.” Changechuw narhier enhuw ejiing deenggete.
Amachuw entutanaching, nga enhimpaa khumhege aechaachuw entthierong atepe.
Emmenieing lintaang ruwkuwngtena aalhanghechuw ebumruw tehege ingki ing aviminthiehe. Engkhejege thenghege ruwkuwnghechuw aminsietohpehe, chonaching ruwkuwngchuw luhrong atepe.
Changgechuw Simon Piterching amhuwche Jesu khiboumna vatiege, arhier, “Kepaangtena insinre, Thangpa, ajiegachiinche kie isiicher etu miging!”
Ajiegachiinche, emmenieing asuwrbesa ngahechuw amhuwheche aalhanghejeng eenluw liimsehe;
Changching echiing, Simon aalhanghe, Zebedee sapahe, Jakoble Johonjeng eenluw eliimhe. Chona Jesu ing Simonnhingna arhier, “ettemaa; ate betthiimteniege mi suwrvangniete.”
