Siiphiete ruwkuwnghechuw hinchihege, aeuwmbekhe pihchuw macherhege, aanhuw ajiepehe.
Apha engkhena khuwpuw engkhena avaale enchor ing ipenpoh pesar engkheing Jesuchuw amhuwche lolhietaalina amhe beluwge anhii, “Thangpa, nang ing irhupeeteniebe emindam chehvangniete.”
Chona Jesu ing akih vijamge parge arhier, “Kieing kerhuga minthiingsare.” Chalerahching enchor epenchin amaape.

Engkhejege, achuw nhingnadong rhiermaa tege ttongtho apeepe. “Engke” tege amaing arhier, “engkhejege, vaing khorpuwchuw vaminthie engkhejege, minthiingsechie ichielina Mosi ing ttongtho impeekhangkhing ennhingna saarkhie aanshuwaing epihphuw vapere.”
Changechuw, Thangpa khuchuw aminjaamsesehpe; engkhejege inahechuw adamnaing mi aruh aruhing thenghege arongehe.
Changgechuw ide amhinte pierge ahinthampe.

Inie engkhena, amaing aminchuwleheching Pharisihe, engkhejege waajiir ttongtho Thiimpuwheching apaangna eonghe emeniehie Galile, Judia amana Jerusalem khuwtena ethenggehe, engkhejege Thangpalina inahe amindam chenachuw euwm.
Chalerahchin, miheching akih akhih ithiechuw ijaartaana avidumhe. Emmenieing abuwmte vihrhienungge minjaargungte ategehe;
Changgechuw mee aruh kaarna emvalhuwna lham teumaahege, phechungte hangkarhege, chehlhung ipherhege ajaarnathoh enrhiing aliehna Jesu amhekungna ajihbebuhe.
Enthachachuw amhuwtaana, amaing arhier, “Kilhang, isiicher natubekhe kekuhpeepechie.”
Amalinaching Pharisihe amana thiimdeeheching siening atepehe, “Achuwga Thangnhanglina ittonghie? Thangnhang maaniege isii cher akuhpihie?”
Jesu ing emvaakharna akharhechuw minghuwge, ennhingna abesang, “Ajietunache nimblungriirna hangchie siegungte techuwge ningkharga?
Nataalina ‘isiicher natuchuw akuhpe’ atele, ‘hangneer ing hungsi vasire.’ atethoh achuwkha ilelhaaga?

Changgechuw, Mi Sapaching simriipaamna isiicherchuw ikuhpi achese ate ninnuw ing nimminghuwnaing amaing akih akhih ithienhingna arhier– “Kieing kerhierga hangniir ing najaarna eduum ing naeente engkere.”
Chalerahching immhekungna hangneerge aantornachuw valiege, Thangnhangchuw mimpaage aeente engkese.
Luliimching emmenie bekhechuw phahege, engkhejege Thangnhangchuw mimpaahege enttiipaaing arhierhe, “Atenie ittiishuwpaa emhuwpe.”
Heve enhuwna avasile khachana ekhuwmpa, aromhing Levi ateching khachana khuwmna amhinna mhuwge; engkhejege anhingna arhier, “Ijiire.”
Engkhejege hangneerge iuwmbekhechuw mage aanhuw ajiepe.
Leviching elhuwngpaa aemhaarnachuw aeenna bethongge amana inhimpah khachana ikhuwmhetho, lintaanghethoh the saataana aeonghe.
Pharisihele Thiimdeeheching asepohhenhingna inning ichiemaa ttonghege, arhier, “Ajietunache ninnuw ing khachana ekhuwmhetho engkhejege isiicherhetho ninsaahaaga?”
Jesu ing abesanghe, “aenamaahenhingna ithiem Kanamaa, changgechuw aenahe nhingnabe ikanaga.
Kieing dhormo icherhechuw eengete tengge ethengmaaging, changechuw embelungriir mintehvang ichii isiicher rutum ethengging.”
Chonaching emmenieing anhingna arhier, “Johon asepohheje, Parisihe ensepohejeng aphabekhena vinttaam tonghege ahinnhiegehe, changgechuw nasepoh hechinbe isah een atunaahe.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “riekhie ouwngchum lerpaching aongleching amharhe ethengchin vinttaam tongvatekhang?
Aaniechuw hungvieniege lerpachuw aangkenhuw inienachin emmenieing vinttaamtongvatehe.”

Amajing ennhingna ttongttiim arhier: “Achuwdong ing aethar pientena alheh itthiiniege beluw pienlina ebermaa; changmaaniebe aetharchuw entthieniege, engkhejege, aethartena alhehje beluwthoh enchum maanie.
Engkhejege achuwdong ing aethar darkha chiichuw beluw Savinthoungna atharmaaga; changmaaniebe aethar darkha chiichuw puhlihniege entavate, engkhejege savinhechuw maangvate.
Changgechuw aethar darkha chiichuw aethar savinsungna thaarimvang atega.
Engkhejege beluchuw eenniege aethar darkhachiichuw bedeumaa; ajiegachienche ‘beluchin echiesehga.’ ”
Eongna inie engkhena Jesu ing phelhie saangkaarna ahungsile, asepohheching saang bejiihhege ingki ing inorhege asaahe.
Changgechuw Pharisi alhehheching enrhier, “Ajietuna waajiir ttong ing arhumaa Eongna iniena nintuga?”
Jesu ing abesang, “David ing aalhanghetho imvin attamle ajie atuhe,
Amaing Thangnhang eenna ajiekhang valhuwge, khorpuwhemaaniege isah arhumaa Iuwmjeh talchuw viliege, sage engkhejege alhehchuw aalhangheje apikhache?”
Chona ennhingna arhier, “Mi Sapachuw Eongna inielinaje aapuwga.”
Lintaang Eongna inie engkhena khuwngsangna valhuwge aminchuwhe, engkhejege amana akih tachang ithie pesar engkhe aeong.
Thiimdeehe amana Pharisiheching atubekhechuw aeriimhege Eongna iniena ina mintthaavatemo ichiin, engkhejege ataalina aminlaarnaing ajonghe.
Emmenieing amindeenhechuw minghuwjege, amaing akih ithienhingna arhier, “houng, hena vaniir.” Amaing vage amana vaniirse.
Chona Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “kieing kesiegechuw, Eongna iniena aettha itu changmaamiche amaangna etu, chipi akarpina, changmaanieche amemaangna ituhie waajiir ttong ing arhuga?”
Emmeniechuw hingeebeer vibeerhege anhingna arhier, “naben vihjam.” Amaing atuche, engkhejege akichuw thaase.
Changgechuw emmenieing enther phuwrge engkhejege engkhele engkhe entanahege Jesuchuw ajie mintevang etaga atehe.
Chove inienaheching boungte hangkarge ahinthampe; engkhejege Thangnhang nhingna yenkhe ahinnhie.
Khuw ahungwaarche, amaing asepohhechuw eenhege summalhieennhiechuw aatourpe, emmenie romhinghechuwbe.
Aromhing Piterje ate Simon, anepa Andria, Jokoble Johon, Philip, engkhejege Bartholomew,
Mathi engkhejege Thomas, engkhejege Alphaus sapa Jakob, amana Zealot ate Simon,
engkhejege Jakob sapa Judas, amana Jesu aalhin Judas Iskariot gehe.
Amaing asepohhetho vahege daamna vaniirse. amanachin sepohhe, miruhpuwhe engkhejege Judia tena, Jerusalemtena, amana tyrele Sidon chiiting kurtena thengsehe.
Emmenieing attong arongenaing, engkhejege aena-iki adamnaing, engkhejege ebour chipibekhe amindamnaing ethenghe.
Engkhejege mi ruwpuwhekaartena hejeching apernaing ajonghe, ajiegachienche atuche pirthang anhingtena shuwge emmeniehechuw amindam pipehe.
Chona asepohhechuw ibeerge ahinrhier:
“Sarahechuw enrasie itthaga,
Thangnhang lepaachuw entaga.
Atele avin ittaamhechuw enrasie itthaga,
ajiegachiinche emvin vavate.
“Atele ittahe ninrasii itthaga,
ajiegachienche ningnuw menievang ningte.
“Mi Sapa khuna miheching embeterhe, immintthehe, ingeesehe engkhejege ninromhing tthamaa teheniege enthor lina ninrasii aetthaga.
Ama inienachin ninrotha minrhonung ouwngchuumruw; ajiegachiinche, ibeerruw, Thangvenna nintumin lhuwngne; ajiegachiinche ayen imapa imapuw Thangnhang Laarchangpahe nhingna atugehe.
“Changgechuw sawanghechuw jasavatehe!
ajiiegachiinche ninnuw ing nongechuw nimphabesaga.
Atele avin ivabesahe jasavangninte,
ajiegachiinche nimvin ttaamvate.
“Atele meniege aeonghe jasaruw,
ajiegachiinche nimbelung ijapaaing ttaavangninte.
“Nintaalina mibekheing itthapaaing ittonghe jasavangninte, ajiegachiinche, hanghin ichiing imapa imapuwheching laarchangpahe nhingna atugehe.
“Changgechuw enrongehenhingna kerhierga, ninraar ninsahechuw ninning minsiiruw, engharhenhingna aettha tupeeruw.
Ninnuwchuw seraap impeehechuw bor peruw, ninnuwchuw amamaaing ingngeesehe rotum hinnhepeeruw.
Nahim beeng engkhena eebeengniebe paangkheje beduure; engkhejege napien isihniebe nalongoje epeeh damaare.
Nanhingna ennhiebekhe nhingna pere; napee naseh aliechuw avonhie belimaa.
Ninnhingna mintuning nintekha ennhingnaje khangkhin tupeeruw.
“Ninnuwchuw aning imminsiipangchuw ninning minsiitenuwche ajii empaana phavangninte? Ajiegachiinche isii cherhejeng aning aminsiipangchuw inning aminsiigehe.
Ninnhingna aetha eentupihepangchuw ninnuw ing tupeehtenuwche ajie empaana phawangninte? Ajiegachiinche isiicher aatuhejeng changching atugehe.
Ninnuw ing phavanggete techuwge nimmindeenhe nhingnapang mimpuh tenuwbe ajie empaana phawangninte? Isiicherhejeching isiicher atuhenhingtena aphanaing apeegehe.

Changgechuw naraar nasaa hechuw ninning minsiiruw, aethaa tupeeruw, amaching nintumin lhuwngvate, engkhejege Engkaangseh thanglaar sitihe eenshuwvangninte; ajiegachiinche atupi aminghuwmaahe itthamaahe nhingnaje amaing aning aminsiiga.
Nimmapaing ningsie ihekhangkhin ningsie hesaruw.
“Mitaalina wajiir tumaa, amaching ninnuwje waajiir itumaanie, engkhejege mije minlaarmaa, amaching nangje eminlaarmaanie; ekuhpi hesare, nangje ekuhpivate.

Pere, amana ninnhingnaje epevate; aetthajeh mintinuwng, inhukang, inhunung minlhiejornung, amaching emmenieing nabelung ichim ing ithinpihvate. Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing nimminti chaangnaching ninnhingna avonhie mintivate.”
Amajing ttongttiim ennhingna atong: “Mheechuching mheechuchuw arhiichaaga? Emmenie aanhiing oungkuwngte bomaaniekhang?
Asepohching aapuw taalitena elhuwngmaaga, changgechuw ahintucher ahenhuwte aapuwthoh enghaavang atega.
Namhihna ibouwr euwmchuw minghuwluching nauw, nanehe mheena ibour iuwmchuw naabeerga?

Namheesungnaraa ibour mhumaachiege, ajiekhangche nauw-nanehnhingna, keuw kenehe, namheena aeum ibourchuw liepeegechie ate nachega? Aetthachang ituhe, mensa nang ing namheetena ibour liejohre, engkhejege, ama enhuwna nauw-nanehe mheena aeoum ibourchuw aliejohna achehnachuw mhuw vang niete.
“Itthamaa aanra iuwm aettha thing, engkhejege aettha aanra euwm aetthamaa thing uwmmaa.
Ajiegachiinche ama ama athinglina aanraching aminghuwga, ajiegachienche michin ilhing thingtena thechang, engkhejege aalhing euwm thingkaartena darkha enra irhiimaa.
Aettha michin abelungriertena aettha lerchii abesuwga, engkhejege aetthamaaching etthamaachuw ahimhesuwga, Ajiegachinche aselungsungna adeenbekhechin anherna ahimhesuwga.
“Ajietuna Kerhierche tuluchung ‘Thangpa, Thangpa,’ aetechuwge ingeengechuw?
Kenhingna thengniege, kettongchuw rongeniege aatubekhechuw achuwthoh minghahgete minthiegechuw.

Amachuwbe eenmhinchuw eenthupaa toniege, lhungpuw taalina eenmhin thurniege aatu mikhangchiega; chii jungliim jenie chiibesuwrching mingverjenie amachuw minlaachemaa, ajiegachiinche amachuw itthajeh atuga.
Changgechuw thieniege atumaa michuwbe eenmhin uwmluing lolhielina aatu michuwga; ataalina chiibesuwr mingverniebe, pumtieh tiehniege, engkhejege een itiehchuw eensipaane.”
Jesu ing mihechuw enthienaing arhier abethunhuwte Kapernaumte valhuwse.
Amana sepe rozaengkhe aapuw ashuwh amindeensaapah engkhechuw nage aethie oungthongse.
Amaing Jesu ethengchuw athietaanaching, amaing Jehudihe upahe anhingte vihcheerge ashuwchuw akarpinaing ethengpisaresie ate.
Emmenieing Jesunhingna nhesahege enrhier, “Amahie natupi arhu engkhega,
Ajiegachiinche amaing kimmichuw aning aminsiiga engkhejege amaing khuwngsang eenje eentupiga.”

Engkhejege Jesu ing emmenietho vasehe, changgechuw eenchuw vatungrong entele sepe roza aapuwching aalhanghe vihcheerge anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, ijapisamaare; ajiegachienche nang ing kieensungna aetheng kemati uwmsamaa.
Hevelinahin kieraraaje nanhingte eva mati chasamaaing ichiin kemindeenga; changgechuw nattongpangching irhierpire, engkhejege keshuwchuw damvate.

Ajiegachiinche, kieje aapuwhederna aeong miging, kedernaje sepehe uwmne; engkhejege kieing heve minhingna ‘vah’ teningbe ivaga; engkhenhingna, ‘houng’ teningbe aehoungga; engkhejege Keshuw nhingna, ‘hevehie tu,’ teningbe atuga.”
Jesu ing amachuw athieche aluwliimge aanhuw ijiihe mi ruwpuwhenhingna vaanlehge arhier, “Kieng ninnhingna kerhierga, kieing Israelhe Kaarnarahje hanghin athacha aeuwm tuemaalhieng.”
Avi cheerheching eente ahungeenliheche, ashuwchuw pumttha tthase.
Heve enhuwdehna Nain ichii khuwte vase, enkhejege asepohhetho mi ruwpuwhetho evahe.
Ama khuwpu sungkoungchuw vipharong atelehe, pesar engkhe ithiechuw avidumhe. Ama amanuw mhikhuwnuw ing engkhepang aberhingga, amana, aeong mi ruwpuwheching avijiihe.
Thangpaching nepenuwchuw amhuwche, aning minsiige anhingna arhier, “Ttaamaa,”
Chona amaing eloungchuw aparche aaduumhechuw neersehe. Engkhejege amaing arhier, “Elerpa, kerhierga, hangthie!”
Ethie pesarchuw hangthiege ttongse, engkhejege Jesu ing amanuw nhingte apeepe.
Mibekheching ingeentti lamthieng, Thangnhangchuw mimpaahege, arhierhe, “Elhuwngpa Laarchangpachuw aekaarna hungshuwse!” Engkhejege “Thangnhang ing amihechuw ajibeerpeepe!”
Amaing atu akhu ttongchuw Judia paam bekhena engkhejege paam arovebekhena enjaamse.
Johon asepohheching amabekhechuw anhingna atongpehe. Chonaching Johon ing asepoh enhiechuw eenge
engkhejege Thangpanhingte vicheerge, “thengvang ate engkhechuw nanggechiemo, changmaanieche lintaang kinnuw ing haavang kintega?” atehie avasiepehe.
Emmenie pesarheching anhingna vahege, asiehe, “thengvang atechuw nanggechiemo, changmaanieche kinnuw ing lintaang haavang kintega?”
Chaleching Jesu ing aena enhimpaa, aetthamaa rhiire, engkhejege aethamaa ronham arin hechuw aminthaahe, amana amhih echuw enhimpaaje emhuw aminchepe.

Engkhejege Jesu ing abesang, “Engkenung ninthiebekhe, engkhejege nimmhuwbekhechuw Johonhingna tongruw: Mhichuchin amhuwhe, akhih ebong ing isi ache, enchor ipenheching enthiing apha, aana esihechin athie, aethiehechin ehangrhing, sarahenhingna aettha ttongjiir ajinrinchuw.
Engkhejege kenhingna akhih aminsiimaahechuw enrasie aetthaga.”
Johon sepoh milaheching aangkenhuwte, Jesu ing Johon khuchuw mi ruhpuw henhingna atong: “Ninnuw ing rampakaarna ajii imbeer evagechuw? thieing aseem phuwrnha enlaachuwga?
Chogenieche ajii ebeerte techuwge avagechuw? Achuw engkheing ennaarje piedeer ing enthong michuwga? Ebeerruw, elengchechor ing enthongge nongepaa aepaar emmeniechuwbe eruwnghe kurnungna aeonggehe.
Ajiiche ibeerte techuwge evagechuw? Laarchangpachuwga? Uwng, kieng ninnhingna kerhierga, ama Laarchangpachuw athiga.
Ama khuhie bejiige euwmga, amachuwbe,
‘Ebeer, kieing namana ttongthangpa kecheerga,
amaing namana lhamchuw bethongvate!
Nanhingna kerhierga, nepenuwhechin aberhing kaarna Johon ethi ing elhuwng achuwdong uwmmaa; changgechuw Thangven lepaana isiingsehching ama ethi ing lhuwngne.”
Engkhejege amachuw aathiebekheching, khachana ekhuwmhetho, anhingna chii luhhege Thangnhangchuw atataaga tehege arhugehe,
Changgechuw amaing chii aluh arhu maahechuw, Pharisihe, engkhejege waajiir ehepaheching Thangnhang ing enrotum atupeehechuw rhumaahege Johon ing chii aluhchuw rhumaahe.
“Chogenieche heve misienhe mihechuw kieing ajiethoh minttimvanggete, engkhejege ajiethoh enghaavatehe?
Emmeniechuwbe keethierna nepanghetho enghaagehe, engkhele engkhe ingeenhege, ‘Kinnuw ing tumla tumnungge, ninnuw ing laammaachuw; kinnuw ing kinttaale, ttaamaachuw.’
Ajiegachiinche, chii aaluhpa Johon ing talje samaa, darkha chiije eenluing itheng, engkhejege ninnuw ing ninrhier, ‘ama ronham adeenga.’
Mi Sapaching sage eenge itheng; engkhejege ninnuw ing ninrhier, ‘Ebeerruw, apeebour ilhuwngga engkhejege Zuw aaeenpaga, Khachana aatthiinghele isiicher etuhe aalhangga!’
Changgejenie evier asitiheching atataaga tehege amindanggehe.”
Pharisihekaarne engkheing Jesuchuw anhingna buwsha aeen, engkhejege amaing Pharisi eensungna buw isa ongse.
Engkhejege ama khuwpuwna eong isiicherpaa nepenuwching Pharisi eensungna buw asachuw thiege amaing riechii ethar lhuwngbeer vichige,
Thangpa khiboumna atuunghuwngte vaneerge engkhejege ttaage amhihriechieng akhihchuw menhumge asamching anhuwrpe. Changching minchinluing bejuhge akhihchuw riechie thouching aatehpe.
Jesuchuw aaeen Pharasiching amhuwche abelungrierna arhier, “heve mihin Laarchangpageniebe heve nepenuwhie ajiekhang ichii nepinuwga ate minghuwvang atega, amabe isiicher nepenuwga.”
Jesu ing hangttongge anhingna arhier, “Simon kieing nanhingna rhierning kete uwmne! “Thiimpuw,” “irhierpee.” ate,
Achuw engkhe sheer amimpuwpee sheer atour mi ennhie aeong; engkheing denarie charonga aatour, engkhejege engkheing sumnga aatour.
Emmenieng abilichemaataanaching aannhiing enletourchuw akuhpipehe. Ate engkaarna achuw ing enhimseh aning minsiivate?”
Simon ing abesang, “kieing kemindeentaana aenhimseh aatourpa akuhpi chinvate.” Engkhejege Jesu anhingna arhier, “nang ing atataa waajiir natuse.”

Chona nepenuw nhingte vaanlehge Simon nhingna arhier, “heve nepenuwhie namhuwse? Kieing naeenna kevalhuwle kikhina chiije lhiemaachii, changgechuw nepenuwhing amhiriechiing kikhi itthiege asam ing aminttong.
Nang ing ibejuhmaachie, changgechuw heve nepenuwhing minchinluing kikhije abejuhse.
nang ing keluwje thou eetehpimaachie, changgechuw amaing kikhije thou aatehpe.
Chonaching nanhingna kerhierga, heve nepenuw ing isii cherpaagejenie kekuhpeepe; amanaching enhimpaa ningsiichuw amindangga. Changgechuw tepiipang akuhpichin tepiepang aning imminsiiga.”
Chona amaing nepenuwnhingna arhier, “isiicher natubekhe kekuhpeepechie.”
Changgechuw, buw saataana aeongheching ennajeer enrhierhe, “isiicherje akuhpiche hie achuwga!”
Engkhejege Jesu ing nepenuwnhingna arhier, “nathachaching engkarpe, belung aengam ing engkesare.”
Ama enhuwdehna Jesu ing khuw bekhena engkhejege khuwpuw bekhena Thangnhang lepaa aetta ttongjiirchuw minjaamge, engkhejege ahungsi avasile suwmmalhie ennhiehethoh enrhiihe.
Engkhejege aetthamaa chipitena, isur aethaang aminttha nepenuwhe; satan sarii athorpi Mary ate Makdalene,
engkhejege Herod lerchii apana Kuza ennepenuw Joanna, Susanna, engkhejege nepenuw enhimpaa emvehe; emmenieing inler-enchii pesahege asepa atupihe.
Khuwpu khuwpubekhetena mi ruhpuw engkonghege anhingna athengle amaing ennhingna ttongtiim arhier,
“sachii aavorpaching sachii evor vasige; engkhejege avorpe, tepieching lhampuwna boge, khijing achiennapehe, engkhejege minventena vatiheching aachuum cherpe.
Tepieching lhungkaarna bouse; engkhejege hangmhuwngse, rode abumaatana juwrcherse,
Tepieching elhingkaarna boge, elhingthoching mhuwng haahege athehpe.
Tepieching aettha lolhiena boge, hangsiinge, roza ithi ing aanra oumse,” hevehie arhierle, amaing uwnge, “Thievang ichii aana aeuwmching thiesaresie!”
Chona asepohheching ttongttiimchuw ajie atenaga tehege anhingna asiehe.
Amaing arhier, “Thangnhang lepaa ttong riirtenachuw nimminghuwnaing ninnhingna kepigechuw; changgechuw lintaanghenhingnabe ttongttiim ing kerhierga, amaching
‘ebeerhejenie mhuwmaahenie,
engkhejege rongehejenie minghuwmaahenie.’
“Ttongttiim hechuwbe hevehiega; sachiechuw Thangnhang ttongga.
Lhampuwna ibuwchin ttongchuw thiehege; sataanching thengge enthachaching ikarpi aphana maaing embelungriir na inthin ttongchuw aliepipe.
Lhung taalina ebouhechuw, thiehege rotharhoing aelhaanghege, changgechuw arojung auwmmaataana amongna thachahege chaang embeer taanchana abethinpehe.
Ilhingkaarna ebouhechuwbe, thiehege, emmenieing inrhingna humlina, lerchii, engkhejege kummhepalana belung minlhuwhege aanra pechemaase.
Engkhejege lolhie aetthana ebouching enthiing aettha belungrier ing ttongchuw thiehege, bechuwtihhege, khaanghege aanra iuwmchuw-emmeniehiega
“Achuwdong ing thoumhi belengniege bir ing mingkhum maa, changmaanieche aejaartah derna semaa, changgechuw ethenghechin elengchuw amhuwnaing thoumhi siihta engkaangna asiihga.
“Ajiegachiinche emphuwngmaavang aechii ajiidong uwmmaa, engkhejege minghuwmaavang aechii, engkhejege uwmphuwngmaavang aechii riirna enthur ajiidong uwmmaa.
“Chonaching ajiekhang ninthiega amachuw enriimsaruw; ajiegachienche aadeenhe nhingtechin pevate, engkhejege aadeenmaa nhingtena kedeenga atebekheje liechervate.”
Ama enhuwna amanuw engkhejege auw aneheching anhingna ethenghe, changgechuw mi anhim lamtheeng eenteuchemaasehe.
Engkhejege anhingna arhier, “nangnuwle nauw naneheching taangna eenteuhte tehege enghaanaahe.”
Changgechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “kemanuw engkhejege keuw kenehechuwbe Thangnhang ttong rongehege aatuhechuwga.”
Aenie nekhena Jesu ing asepohhetho ruwkuwngte hangkarhege, engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “Enieing aeding raarkhete ilenteruw.” hanghin ruwkuwngchuw ahinghurpehe.
Engkhejege ahinghurleheching amache jaarse. Khuwsuwr thierhaangchin aedingte varhaangse, engkhejege ruwkuwngchuw chii siihtohge ettiisuw ing uwmse.
Emmenieing vahege uwnghege abethiepehe, “Aanchungpa, Aanchungpa, therong aetena!” Engkhejege amaing hangthiege thierhaang evaanlhuwchuw arukupe; aannhieng depohhege aminchinpehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ninthacha akhutega?” Emmenieng eenluw liimhege aettisehe, engkhejege ennajeer ing enrhierhe, “thiele chiijeng attongrhier aminjihie achuwga?”
Emmenieng Galili tho endeeng Gerasenes paamchuw hungtungsehe.
Amaing siiphiete attumle ibour ronham ing apuh mi engkhe khuwpuwtena thengge eenteuhsehe, ama isihpaa piendeerje sermaa, eennaje ongmaa, changgechuw then kaarna aeongga.
Amaing Jesuchuw amhuwche, uwngge amhekungna vatiege engkaangpaa erur ing ahinrhier, “Kenhingna ajie tugete natega, engkaangseh Thangnhang Sapa Jesu? Kenhiisaagechie, eminja samaare”

Jesu ing ibour ronhamchuw anhingtena jungshuw tege arhier. (Ajiegachiinche ibour ronhamching apha inhimpah asuwrga; engkhejege miheching rhunghege thierrhuw ing phierjenie, kongkhiing minluhejenie, aphierhechuw ipehcherge amachuw rampa kaarte athorga.)
Jesu ing anhingna asie, “Naromhing achuwga?” amaing arhier, “Legion; ‘inhimpah’ ” ajiegahiinche ronhamching asungte aelhuwhga.
Amana ronhamheching edong enemaa khorte icheersamaaruw tehege anhiihe.
Changgechuw ate boungpaangna woh ruwpuhhechuw amhaarhe, engkhejege ronhamheching Jesunhingna amate avalhuwna anhiihe.
Chono ronhamheching ama pesartena jungshuwhege vohkaarna valhuwsehe, engkhejege voh ruwpuhching bekhohna ouwngluhege aedingtechin lhuwhchersehe.
Voh ruwpuh aaserheching amachuw emmhuwtaana khuwpuw ama paamtechin vatenhege atongpehe.
Miheching ishuwchuw aabiirnaing thenghege, engkhejege Jesunhingna avaaheche ashungtena ronham isuwpaching Jesu khiboumna onge, mitatah khangkhing pien sherge ateupehe. Engkhejege ittisehe.
Ronham ing apuh michuw ajiekhang aetthaga ate amhuwheching ennhingna arhierpeehe.
Chona Geraseneing arokuwr paamna aeongbekheching empaamtena aangkenaing Jesunhingna anhiipe; ajiegachienche enhimpaa enttiiching achepehe. chonaching amaing ruwkuwngte karge hungeenlise.
Ronham athorpi pesarching Jesu aanhuw jiigete tege anhiisa; changgechuw amachuw mingkege, arhier,
“Naeente eenlire; engkhejege Thangnhang ing ijehmeh eentupeega ichiechuw mindangre” changchin engkege, khuwpuw sungbekhena Jesu ing ejemeh atupeega atechuw aminjaampe.
Ate Jesu ing ahungeenliche ahehaajeh miheching rukuum ahetuhe.
Chalerahching Jairus ate khuwngsang upa engkhe etheng, amaing Jesu khiboumna vatiege aeente ithengpeesare tege anhii.
Ajiegachiinche amaing nepenuwti kum suwmmalhie ennhii aphachuw ithie enthonge euwm. Amaing avalhuwche mi enhimpaaing aalhoumpe.
Ate amana nepenuw engkhe kum summalhie ennhii thie icheh, ithiimhenhingna adeen ejemeh minlhuwjenie,
achuw engkhedong ing amintthaachemaa nepenuw engkheing atunhuwngte vage, Jesu apienbetha apar, engkhejege athie ichehchuw chalerahching dese.
Jesu ing asiehe, “achuw ing emparga?” mibekheching permaauwng ateheche, Piterle aalhangheching arhier, “Aanchungpa, mi hangjehing eelhuwmge ennhugehesiete.”
Changgechuw Jesus ing arhier, “Achuw engkheing emparpe, ajiegachienche kenhingtena paangkar ejungshuw keminghuwse.”
Nepinuwching eenthur rhumaase atetaanaching, enchiimse; engkhejege amhekungna vatiege, amaing mibekhe mhekungna ajietuna aparga atechuw ahimmindangpe.
Jesu ing nepenuwnhingna arhier, “Kesanuw, nathachaching idamgechie; belung minjaluing engke.”
Amaing attongnajehlechin upa engkhe aeentena mi vathengge arhier, “nasanuw thihse; Aanchungpachuw minjamaathaare.”
Jesu ing amachuw athieche, abesang, “Ittemaa, Thachajetha, engkhejege ama karpivate.
Amaing eensungte avalhuwle, Piterle, Johon engkhejege Jakob, engkhejege nepang amapale amanuw maaniege achuwdong minlhuwmaa.
Emmeniechuw ttaahege, embelung ibeenghege aettaahe; changgechuw amaing arhier, “Ttamaaruw, ajiegachienche ama ithiemaaga aejaarga.”
Chonaching emmenieng ithiechuw minghuwluing tehege enniehe.
changgechuw nepenuwtichuw abenna bechuwge, aeen, “Nepang, hangthie!”
Achipi hungeenlige chaleraaching hangthiese. Chona amaing aesaaphuw peruw tege arhierpipe.
Amapa amanuwching eenluw liimse; changgechuw Jesu ing ama ishuwbekhechuw tongmaaruw tege eperpaaing arhier.
Chona Jesu ing summalhie ennhiehechuw epor ing eenge engkhejege ibour chipi bekhe achehna, amana aena ikibekhe amintthahna paangkar, engkhejege atuchenachuw apeehe.
Engkhejege emmenieching Thangnhang alepaa engkhejege aenaiki amindamnachuw aminjaamnaing achiirpehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ramkhie ninsile romhorgejenie, thuwng gejenie, tal gejenie, sheergejenie, ajiidong rinmaaruw longohje ennhii mingkhiimaaruw,
Een nimvalhuw bekhena, amanachin cheengruw, engkhejege bethinruw.
Emmenieing rukuum etumaaheniebe ama khupuwchuw nimbethinle entaalina saarkhie apinaing ningkhibejana perkhuwkha aethiihruw.”
Emmenieing engkehege khuwbekhena valhuwhege, amhinbekhena aenahe amana aettha ttongjiirchuw aminjaampehe.
Ate lepaa aapuw Herod ing amabekhechuw athieche aning emor, ajiegachiinche miheching Johonhie avonhie aethietena ehangrhinga entetaanaga.
Lintaang ing Elijah uwmphuwngse, engkhejege lintaangheching tiena laarchangpahekaarna engkhega atehe.
Herod ing arhier, “Kieing alose ketinbesaga; changgechuw hevebekhe kethiehie achuwvate?” Engkhejege amhuwnaing enthongse.
Ttongjiirpaheching hungeenlihege eentubekhechuw Jesunhingna atongpehe. Amaing emmeniechuw rhiege Bethsaida ate khuwpuwte enthenen ing piersehe.
Mi ruwpuwheching aminghuwtaana, aanhuw jiihege, rukuum tuhege, engkhejege Thangnhang lepaa khuchuw atongpipehe, engkhejege ina damsaning atemibekhechuw amintthaape.

Inie ajungbuwphana summalhie ennhieching anhingna thenghege asiehe, “Mi ruwpuwhehie arovena aeuwm khuw, engkhejege paam akurnahin vaheniege, aesaana injaarna jongsaheresie; ajienachiinche hevehie idepaa amhinga.”
Changgechuw ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing aesaaphuw peheruw.” Emmenieing arhier, “kinnuw ing vanungge heve mibekhe aesaaphuw vaaliemaanungbe kinnhingna tal rongale nga ennhiipang uwmthane.”
Ajiegachiinche emmeniechuw pesar chiing ronga mehgehe. Engkhejege amaing sepohhenhingna arhier, “Emmeniehie aruh sumnga sumnga ing mengongruw.”
Emmenieing chanching tuhege amengongpehe.
Engkhejege tal rongale nga ennhiechuw viliege, minven hingeebeerge, bor pege abekhiipe, engkhejege sepohhenhingna vipege emmhekungna asiihpe.
Engkhejege imvin vachersehe. Abelhiebekhechuw amingkong heche beluh summalhie ennhiese.
Vokhe Jesu ing athienen ing ahinthamleehin sepohhechuw amathoh enrhiehe, amaing asiehe, “Mi ruwpuwhehin kiehie achuwga entenaahe?”
Emmenieing abesang, “Johon Baptisga, lintaangheching Elijahga, engkhejege lintaangheching rhierhege, tienana Laarchangpahekaarna engkhe ihangrhinga.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Chogenieche ninnuw ing achuwga entenaachuw?” Piter ing besangge, “Thangnhangtena Aantinpagechie.”
Amaing emmeniechuw iperpaa rukuhege achuwnhingnadong rhiermaaruw ate,
Amaing arhier, “Mi Sapachin ijachaam phaniege, engkhejege upaheching rhuwmaaheniege, khorpuw elhuwnghe, thiimdeehechin, theheniege, engkhejege inie aminthumna hangthievate.”
Chona emmeniebekhenhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing kinhuw jiening teniebe, athienening eenrhumaaresie, ataaing athingkherchuw aanasiir rinniege, engkhejege kinhuw ejieresie.
Ajiegachiinche achipi karsaning ateching maangsavate, engkhejege kiekhuna achipi abethinching ikarpi phavate.
Ajiegachiinche mi engkheching lolhiepaam aadiebekhe phakhangjeie ataarah maangniege, changmaanieche amaing ajiiche kanavatekhang?
Kiekhuna engkhejege kettongrhierhie aning aminjaa emmeniechuwbe Mi Sapaching engkhejege Amapa athang aalaarthoh, engkhejege enthiing minven michierhetho ajuwngle aning minjaapeevatehe.
Changgechuw atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, hevena eneer mi tepie hin Thangnhang lepaa amhuwmaataang ethie achii mintinmaalhienie.”
Ate hevehehie atongnhuwte inie neerie aanhuwte Jesu ing Piter, Johon engkhejege Jakob hethoh bounglite ahinthamnaing arhiehe.
Engkhejege ahinnhieleching amasaachuw uwmvurse, engkhejege apienheje aewaarjehing lengse.
Minghuw minghaluing mi ennhie amhuwhe, Mosi engkhejege Elijah hetho aettonghechuw.
Emmeniechuw athang aalaarthoh mindangge, Jerusalemna hungsuwvang ichii athina khuchuw atonghe.
Chale Piterle aalhangheching immhi ikhuwchin eengnguwsehe; changgechuw emmhi ahimbelengheche, emmenieng athang aalaar engkhejege Thangpatho ineer mi ennhiechuw amhuwpehe.

Amhinchuw emmaaphale Piter ing Jesunhingna arhier, “Aanchungpa, inieje hevenahing paarmeniebe tthavate; inieing aepaarnamhin eenthum tuteruw, engkhe narotum, engkhechuw Mosi rotum, engkhechuw Elijah rotum”– ajie arhierga echii amaing aminghuwmaaga.
Amachuw arhierle, rudu juttumge abelupehe; engkhejege rudu kaarna alhuwlehechin ittisehe.
Chona rudu kaartena irur engkheching arhier, “Amahie kiteurbesa kesapaga; amaing arhier rongeruw!”
Ama ttongchuw arhierle Jesuchuw athienen ongse. Engkhejege emmenieng derenghege, chale emmenieing emmhuwbekhechuw achuw nhingnadong tongmaahe.
Amenhie iniena boungtena enjungttumle mi ruwpuwhechin aantuwphuwhe.
Chaleraaching mi ruwpuwhekaartena pesar engkheing uwngge, “Aanchungpa, Kesapahie eebeerpisare tege anhii, ajiegachienche amapanghie kesapaga,
Minghuw minghaluing ebour chipiching asuwrche uwngjaarse; abecherkhenje besuwge aamheh riipe, engkhejege jungsuwning teluing abethinpe.
Hevehie ithorpisaruw tesaingge nasepohhenhingna kerhierche tuchemasehe.
Jesu ing abesang, “ninthacha aeaummaa amamaate isi misienhe, kieing ijehme isi ninnuwtho onghaameniege ninnuwchuw bedaarvang ketegechuw? nasapachuw virhie.”
Chaleching ebour chipiching vituurge aamhehriepe. Changgechuw Jesu ing ibour chipichuw isehge pesartichuw amintthaape, engkhejege amapanhingte avipeepe.
Engkhejege emmeniebekheing Thangnhang alhuwngna chuw mhuwhege eenluw liimsehe.
Atubekhechuw mhuwhege eenluw liimhege amaing asepohhenhingna arhier,
“Heve ttonghehie ningeenana lhuwresie! Mi Sapachuw mihe kihte viperong atenaahe.”
Changgechuw heve arhierhie minghuwmaasehe, engkhejege; amachuw aminghuwnachuw ennhingtena ouwngthurse, chonaching emmenieing mhuwchemaase. Engkhejege hevelinahing emmenieing anhingna isie ittisehe.
Engkaarnaching achuw elhuwnglhaaga tehege engkhele engkhe ensangsehe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing riirna amindeenhechuw minghuwge nepang engkhechuw vikige apaangna mengongge,

Engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing heve nepanghie keromhingna rukuum tuniebe kiechuw ouwngrhuga, engkhejege kiechuw rukuum etuniebe kie injicheerchuw atuga; ajiegachienche ningkaarna isiingseh chin elhuwngsehga.”
Johon ing besangge, “Aanchungpa, kinnuw ing achuw engkheing naromhingna ibour chipi thorge, engkhejege tumaare teuwngge kindeerga, ajiegachiinche amaing kingngeenhuw jiemaa.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Deermaaruw ajiega chienche ninnuwchuw eenrhumaa atumaahechuw ninrotumga.”
Jesuchuw thangvente hungkarvang atechuw ennheengge, amaing Jerusalem entongte amheh abelehpe.
Engkhejege ttongjiirpahechuw amana ahincheer, emmenieing vahege abethongna Samaria khuw engkhena valhuwsehe;
Changgechuw Jesu ing Jerusalemte hangsivang atetaanaching rukuum tumaasehe,
Asepohhe, Jakoble Johon ing emmhuwche, emmenieing arhier, “Thangpa, minventena mhee bebomeniege emmeniihie amemaangna kinnuw ing ttongtho penungche rhuvangniete?”
Changgechuw amaing vaanlehge arokuhpehe.
Chona khuw enkhete vasehe.
Hanghin lhampuw inghinjiele achuw mi engkheching anhingna arhier, “Nasitaa bekhena naanhuw jiesagete.”
Engkhejege Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Imhiheje engkhor uwmne, engkhejege minvenna vatiheje enruvuw uwmne; changgechuw Mi Sapachuwbe aluw mingkamnadong uwmmaa.”
Engkhenhingna amaing arhier, “Ijiire.” Changgechuw amaing arhier, “Thangpa, mensa aepa varhisagete.”
Changgechuw Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Ithieheching ithiehechuw inrhi heresie,” Changgechuw, nangbe vasi ing Thangnhang lepaachuw vaminjaam.”
Engkhechin arhier, “Naanhuw jievanggechie, Thangpa, changgechuw keensungna eonghechuw mensa lhamsuw thengetehe.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Laangkon aki ing bechuwniege atunhuungte aabiir mi achuwdong ing Thangnhang lepaamichuw eenshuwchemaanie.”
Thangpa ing mi sumsariechuw aaturnhuwte emmeniechuw atahching sivang ate khuwteching mensaing ennhie ennhie khuwpuw amhinbekhena acheerpehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Saang kuumvang ichii nhimne, changgechuw aakuum chuwbe toumne, amanaching Thangpa alhiena anong ituna mi ajibethinnaing lhiepuw nhingna hinnhesaruw.
Siruw, ebeerruw, imhikaarna Zou atihekhangkhin kecheergechuw.
Sheerthoung evamaaruw, thuwng rinmaaruw, khikhumje; engkhejege lhampuwna achuwdong rukuum tumaaruw.
Een nimvalhuwbekhena, mensa rhierruw, ‘heve eennahin dejiim cheengresie!’
Engkhejege achuw engkheching dejiim iuwmchuw irhuheniebe, dejiimchuw anhingna cheengresie; changgechuw aelhaangmaaheniebe, ninnhingte inliresie.
Aeennaching cheengnung emmenieing impee isa-eenchuw turuw, ajiegachiinche nong aatuheching atumin epha arhuga. Een engkhe engkhete impimmaaruw,
Khuwpuwna nimvalhuwle miheching rukuum etuhenieche, nimmhekungna impeechuw saruw;
Amana Inachuw mintthaaruw, engkhejege ennhingna rhierruw; ‘Thangnhang lepaachuw ninnhingna innhingse.’
Changgechuw, ninnuw ing khuwpuwna nimvalhuwle ninnuwchuw rukuwm itumaaniebe ama lhampuw bekhena engkenung rhierruw,
‘Khuwpuwtena ningkhina perkhuw ikaachuw saarkhie aanshuwnaing erhumaa enhuw ejieing ittiehcheerruw, changgechuw hevehie minghuwruw. Thangnhang lepaachuw innheengse.’
Ninnhingna kerhierrga, ama inienaching ama khuwpuw ethi ing Sodomching ijachaam phamaanie.

“He Korazin jasaruw! He Bethsaida jasaruw! Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing nintuchemaa nintu nonghechuw Tire le Sidon taalina shuwniebe, emmenieing chalena bora rhuwpien vietenuwge lungvuwlina ongtenuwge belung huwngvang nintega.
Changgechuw waajiir iniena ninnuw ithi eng Tirele Sidonching khangchevate.
Engkhejege he, Kapernauwm ninnuw,
Nangche minven phana hing eethohvatekhang?
Changmaaga, nangbe longkong phana jungbovang niete.
Ninttong arongeching Kettong arongega,
engkhejege ninnuwchuw eenrhumaa ching kie eenrhumaaga,
engkhejege kie eenrhumaaching kiechuw enjicheerchuw arhumaaga.”
Suwmsarie heching rotharhoing hungeenlihege, enrhier, “Thangpa, naromhingna ibour chipi hejeng kinttong aminjiegehe!”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing Sataanchuw Thangventena bittih ejungbuw khangkhin ijungbou kemhuw.
Ebeerruw, ninnuw ing beruwr engkhejege nousehhelina achiinachena, engkhejege ichamaahe paangkarbekhechin nintaalina ajiidong ing eminliimchemaanie.
Changgejenie ebour chipiching ninrhier aminjietahna rotha minrho maaruw; changgechuw ninromhingchuw Thangvenna abejiipe ichiin ninrotha minrhoruw.”

Ama aphanaraaching Jesu ing Chipi Enthiingyaarna rotha rhohsage, arhier, “Epa, kemimpaanachie, Thangven engkhejege simriipaam Thangnhang! ajiegachiinche aesinghe amana evierhenhingna ouwngthur amindangmaa hechuw nedounghenhingna mimphuwngchiege; uwng, Epa, hevehing nanhingna naning ichiega.

“Euwmbekhelina kenhingte eminserna chiege, engkhejege, amapachuwmaaniege Asapachuw achuwga atehie achuwdong ing minghuwmaa; changmaanieche asapachuw, engkhejege asapaching anhingna mimphuwngning ate chuw achuwnhingna amapa chuw achuwga ataje achuwdong ing minghuwmaa.”
Chona sepohhenhingna vaanlehge, Jesu ing enthenenna arhier, “ninnuw ing nimmhuw nimmhuwlina ijehmeh ninrasii aetthaga.

Ajiega chiinche kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, laarchangpahe engkhejege eruwngheching nimmhuwchuw mhuwning ategehe, changgechuw mhuwchemaahe, engkhejege ninthiebekhechuw thiening ategehe, changgechuw thiechemaahe.”
Chalechin waajiir aapuw engkheing Jesuchuw chaang embeerna ihangniir, “Thiimpuw,” tege arhier, “Ajii tuningche ittiim inemaa irhingnachuw phavang ketega?”
Amaing anhingna arhier, “Waajiir ttongna ajii enjiine? Amana ajii napase?”

Amaing abesang, “Nang ing Thangnhang, na Thangnhangchuw nabelungriir hekheing, nachipibekheing natuchebekhe ing engkhejege namindeenche bekheing naning minsiivang natega; engkhejege veemchaanghechuw nataa khangkhin naning minsiivang natega.”
Engkhejege amaing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing atataaing nabesangse; amachuw tu, engkhejege nang rhingvangniete.”
Ataaing aetthaging echiin mindeensage amaing Jesunhingna asie, “Achuwkhache keveemchaanggehe?”
Jesu ing abesang, “Achuw mi engkheing Jerusalemtena Jerikote ajungsile ouwngruwheng suwrhege. Emmenieing apiendiirbekhe asihpehe, engkhejege binriihege ithietho enghaang amaapehe.
Arasii aetthaing khorpuw engkheng alhamchuw ahinjiele amhuwtaanaching lhampuw lige sise.
Engkhejege khangngenge Levi engkheing amana avasiche mhuwge lhampuw engkhete pierse.
Changgechuw Samariatena mi enkheching ramkhie avasiche ama amhinnachin avasiche amachuw mhuwge aning aminsiipe.
Engkhejege apaangna thengge romhorbiehechuw thou itepeege darkha chiije lhiepeege ahinrhiepe. Chona atoungna sikurlina mengongge een engkhena vaminjaarge asepa atu.
Anhingna denarie ennhii isuwge een aapuwchuw pege arhier, “Amahie ebeerthiere; engkhejege kehung ngeenlile naminlhuwbekhe pesavanggechie?
Heve enthumkaarna achuwching ouwngruwheng asour veemchaang eensuwgehe?”
Amaing arhier, “Ama aning aminsiipachuwga,” Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nangje khangkhin vatu.”
Ate emmenieng vasihege khuw engkhete valhuwsehe. Amana Martha ate nepenuw ing aeenna rukuum ahetu.
Ama anenuw Mary ateching Thangpa khibouwmna ongge amaing arhierchuw aronge.

Changgechuw Marthaing sepa tuvang ichii nonglina echerpaaing euwm; chonaching amaing vage Jesunhingna asie, “Thangpa, Kenenuw ing hevebekhe ituphuwhie kenhingte immintuhie imminghuwpeesechie?, irhierpeere, ebuwmsaresie.”
Changgechuw Thangpaing abesang, “Martha, Martha, nang ing natuphuw anhimtaana nabelungriir jane;
Changgechuw nong engkhechuwbe turimvang nate uwmne. Ajiegachiinche Mary chuwbe anhingtena aeliejoh arhumaa aphaphuwchuw aatursaape.”
Jesu ing amhiin engkhena hinthamsage abetthunhuwte asepohhe engkheing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, Johon ing asepohhe aminchuw khangkhing ithamnachuw kinnuwje eminchuwsare.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ninghinnhiele, hanghin rhierruw:
‘Epa, naromhing enthiing eensuwresie Nalepaachuw thengresie.
Enie eniena aesaaphuw aanasiir epesare.
Engkhejege isiicher kintubekhe ekuhpisare,
ajiegachiinche kinnuwjeng kinnhingna lerchii ouwngturbekhechuw kingkuhpeehega,
Engkhejege kinnuwchuw chaang eebeerteching iminlhuwsamaare.’ ”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Langlam achuw engkheing aalhang engkhe nhingna yenttimna vaniege, ‘kelhu, tal eenthumpang emimpuwsare;
Kelhu engkhe vatungge, engkhejege ajiidong ipeephuw dinsamaasing.’
Engkhejege sungtenachin abesang, ‘veh minchersamaa, ingkhaar kekamdohpe, engkhejege kisitihetho aejaartaana jaarsung; hangthieningge ipi chesamaangchii.’
Ninnhingna kieing kerhierga, amaing alhupa rarahchuw hangthie niege pechemaa, ajiegachienche amaing nuh nuhge anhietaanaching, amaing hangthieniege akanabekhechuw pesavate.
“Chonaching ninnhingna kerhierga, Nheh, engkhejege ninnhingna ipevate; jong, engkhejege teuhvangniete; Enuhre, engkhejege eengkhaarchuw eemhongpivate.
Ajiegachiinche ahinnhie michin aphaga, engkhejege ajongbekhechin avatuwga, engkhejege aanuhbekhechin eengkhaarchuw aamhongpiga.
Achuw engkhe ningkaarna ajiekhangchie amapanhingna asapaing tal nheniege, lhung pevatekhang? Changmaanieche nga nhenieche, nga peluing beruwr pevatekhang?
Changmaanieche amaing aarchii nhenieche, Nouseh pevatekhang?
Chonaching ninnuw ing tthamaahejetenuw, ninsitinhingna aettha kithur ipe hetenuwche, Thangvenna aeong nimmapaching ahinnhie bekhe mi nhingna ejemeh aettaseh chipi Enthiingchuw ipemaanie khang!”
Ate Jesu ing attong ishuwma ronham ing apuh engkhe thorge ronhamchuw atennhuwte, attong ishuw maaching attongtaana mi ruwpuwhechuw ouwngluw liimsehe.
Changgechuw mi alheheching arhier, “Amaing Beelzebul paangkarna ronhamchuw athorga, ama ronhamhe auwpaga.”
Lintaangching Thangpachuw chaang ebeerhege minventena bietimna ajonghe.
Changgechuw immindeenchuw minghuwge Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Eruwng lepaa bekheng ennajeerna enleh maaheniebe entthenehe, engkhejege eengkuw engkheing asungna enleh maaheniebe kiinehe.
Sataangjeng engkaarna enleh maahenieche, alepaachuw ajiekhang paarchevate? Ajiegachiinche kieing Beelzebul ing bumge ronhamhechuw athorga entenaachuw.
Ate kieing ronhamhechuw Beelzebulching ebumniege kethorgenieche aathor hechuw achuwgehe? Chogeniebe emmeniechuw nimwaajiir aapuwgehe.
Changgechuw kieing Thangnhang kimhurching ronham hechuw kethorgeniebe, Thangnhang lepaachuw ninnhingna ethengga.
“Eper michin raar aanthongna pihse vieniege aeen-aatumchuw rhungniebe, apih asechuw maangmaa;
Changgechuw ama ithi ing eperseh amachin thengniege ataachuw eentouphuwniege cheniebe, aanthongna pih bekhechuw sihge amaing asih pihchuw simvate.
Kiethoh enrhie haamaaching kie enjehnaga, engkhejege kietho kingkhuumhaamaa amachuw enjehne.
“Ebour chipiching mi engkhetena ajungsuwle ajabetthumna amhin jongge chii euwmmaa paamte hungsi vasige, amana ajiidong avatuh maache, amaing arhier, ‘Kieing kijungsuwtaa eente avonhie vaanligete.’
Ahungeenliche amhinchuw rhuwcherge engkhejege aminreherchuw amhuwpe.
Chona amaing aetthamaaseh aalhang sarii ahinrhiehethoh valhuwhege paarsehe; chona nhungkurtenaching mensatena ithi ing tthamaase.”
Amaing ttongchuw arhierle nepenuw engkheing uwngge anhingna arhier, “Thangpachuw avinna arin engkhejege amhaar nepenuwchuw arasii aetthaga!”
Changgechuw amaing arhier, “Thangnhang ttongchuw rongege aminjiechuw arasii aetthaga!”
Mi ruhpuwhe ahang nhimsesehlechin, amaing ahinrhier, “Heve misienhie ichamaa misiengehe; bietimna ajongnaahe, engkhejege Jona nhingna ishuw bietimna chuwmaaniege bietimna pemaanie.
Ajiegachiinche, Jona ing Nineveh mihenhingna bietimna ouwngshuwkhangkhing. Mi sapajeching heve misienna enshuwvate.

Chiititena Ruwngnuw ching waajiir etu aphana misien heve pesarhetho hangneerheniege emmeniechuw alaarpe teniege mindangvate, ajiegachiinche amaing lolhiepaam attuhna ariitena Solomon aviernachuw thiegete tege itheng; engkhejege ebeer, hevena Solomon ithieing elhuwng engkhe ongne.

Nineveh pesarheching waajiir iniena heve misienhethoh hangneerniege, amachuw alaarga teheniege nimdangvatehe; ajiegachiinche, Jona ttongjiirna emmenieing belungriir amintegehe, engkhejege ebeer, hevena Jona ithieing elhuwng engkhe ongne!
“Achuwdong ing thoumhi belengniege amachuw thuwrge ader adeenna semaa, changgechuw, thoumhi ashietaalina sege evalhuwhechin elengchuw amhuwga.
Nahum thoumhichuw namheega; namheeching naabeerchuw aetthageniebe nahumbekheje elengga; changgechuw tthamaaniebe nahumbekhe inthimcherga.
Chonaching nanhingna euwm elengchuw minthimnemo ebeerruw.
Nahumbekhechuw, inthim ing uwmmaaniebe, aetthajeing lengniebe thoumhi elengching aminleng khangkhing, pumleng lengvate.”
Amaing attongleching Pharisi engkheing kholhie buwsana aeen; chonaching buw sahtaa naching vaongse.
Pharisiching akih aatthiemaachuw amhuwche aning rhiihse.
Thangpaing anhingna arhier, “Pharisi ninnuw ing aelang amana kamseng taangchuw nimminlhiemga, changgechuw ninsungnache hemmemu veminmuchuwge engkhejege aetthamaaching siikangnechuw.
Aenhuwrhe, taangchuw ouwngtupeeching asungtenaje asemmaakhang?
Changgechuw asungtena pihchuw sarahenhingna pesaruw; engkhejege ebeerruw, pihbekhe ninrotumna minthiingne.

“Changgechuw ninnuw Pharisi ninnuw jasavangninte! Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing thingnhahethaa mint maro saruh engkhe Thangnhangte pechuwge, hangchie sheer engkhejege thingnha lhuwngna nimphabekhe suwmna engkhe pechuwge, atataa Thangnhang ningsiechuw nimbethinpe.
“Pharisihe jasaruw! Ajiegachiinche khuwngsang khuwngsangna engkaangseh ongna, mi aangkongle enrumchuw ningeediega.
Ninnuw jasaruw! Ajiegachiinche ninnuwbe imhuwmaa then khangchiegechuw, engkhejege ama taalina ehungsivasi miheching minghuwmaa.”
Waajiir aapuw engkheing abesang, “Thiimpuw hevehie narhier taana ningjaa impeepechuw.”

Engkhejege amaing arhier, “Waajiir aapuw ninnuwjeng jasavangninte! Ajiegachiinche, ejanapah pihrhiichuw ninnuw ing mi minrinchuwge, engkhejege nintaachinche pihrhiichuw ningkichar engkhedong ing permaachuw.
Ninnuw jaasaruw! Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing Thangnhang ttongjiirpahe then tohchuwge, engkhejege nimmapuw nimmapahechin emmeniechuw athehhe.
Chonaching ninnuw ing saarkhiegechuw engkhejege nimmapuw nimmapaheching atuchuw ninrhupeega, ajiegachiinche, entahrarahing emmeniechuw athehhe, engkhejege ninnuw ing enthenchuw ninchie.
Chonaching Thangnhang losingjechin arhier, ‘Kieing ningkaarna Thangnhang ttongjiirpahe, engkheje ttongthangpahechuw cheerningge, alhehechuw thehvatehe, engkhejege lintaangchuw minjavatehe,’
Amaching heve misienhelina Laarchangpahe thiechuw lolhiepaam atupelena betthiimge esuwhbekhe nintaalina ttumvate.

Abel thie iche iniena betthiimniege Zekaria thie iche ama iphang, emmeniechuw Thangnhang hebekoungna engkhejege enthiing een lolaana ishuw phanaching minjongvate. Uwng, ninnhingna kerhierga, amabekhechuw heve isienhetaalina ttumvate.
Waajiir aapuwhe jaasaruw! Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing evierna chapibekhe thurchuwge nintaajeng valhuwmaachuw, engkhejege valhuwgete tege enthongheje ningdourpe.”
Amaing taangte asuwhle thiimdeehe engkhejege Pharisiheching Jesuchuw ebeerthiemaahege attonglina asuwrnaing aariimpehe,
amachuw haajehege rhiervang atelina asuwrna aminjongpehe.

Chalechin, mi ruhpuw lising lising ing, engkheing engkhetaalina enchiinnahege aengeengkongtah naheching, Thangpaing mensarim asepohhenhingna irhier abettiimpe, “Pharisihe chor, amachuwbe, aetthachaang atulina enriimsaruw.
Phuwngmaavang ichii akhuwmjeh ajiidong uwmmaa, engkhejege minghuwmaavang ichii athur ajiidong uwmmaa.
Amanaching ninnuw ing inthimpakaarna ninrhierkha elengna thievate, engkhejege ideh adeenna ouwngruwh ing ninrhierkha phechung phechungna uwngvate.
“Kilhanghe, ninnhingna kieing kerhierga, humchuw thehniege, ama enhuwna ajiidong atuchemaa emmeniechuw ttiemaaruw.
Changgechuw ninnuw ing achuwche ttiivang nintega kieng rhierpigechuw; athihnhuwte norohte abebouchechuw ttiiruw. Uwng, kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, amachuw ttiiruw.”
Pesa ennhiena berii ronga juwrmaachuwkhang? Engkhejege emmenie engkhepangchuw Thangnhang mhihna behermaadeh.
Changgechuw nalosena nasam bekhejechuw ateembesaga. Ettemaaruw; ninnuwbe berii enhimpaa ithieng amin eluwgechuw.
“Engkhejege ninnhingna kerhierga, achuwgejenie mi lintaang mhekungna ouwngrhuching Mi Sapajeching Thangnhang michierhe mhekungna rhuvate;
changgechuw mi mhekungna ouwngrhumaa chuw Thangnhang michierhe mhekungna rhumaanie.
Engkhejege Mi Sapa taalina aettongbekhechuw kuhpeevate; changgechuw achuw chuwgejenie Chipi Enthiing taalina aettongchuwbe kuhpeemaanie.
Khuwngsangkaarna ninnuwchuw irhieheniege, upahe amana aatuchehe mhekungna irhieheniege, ninnuw ing ajiekhang besangwangnungte changmaamieche ajii rhiervanggete tenuwng belung minjamaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche Chipi Enthiing ing ama aphanaching rhiervang nintechuw iminchuwate.”
Mi ruwpuwhekaarna engkheing anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, phawang kete lerchiichuw aseemnaing keupanhingna irhierpeesare.”
Changgechuw amaing anhingna arhier, “Kilhang, ninnuw nintaalina waajiir aapuw changmaaniche iseempiwang ate aapuw kiechuw inthinga?”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Enriimsaruw! Kaaraam belungrier irinlina: ajiegachiinche mi arhingnachuw amaing adeenpoh lina euwmmaaga.
Chona amaing ttongttiim atongpeehe; “Sawangpaa mi engkhe apaamna saangbaar inhimpah akuwm;
Engkhejege amaing abelungrierna akhar, ‘Kieing ajie tugete? Ajiegachiinche chiibaar kemingkongna amhin deen maaing?’
Chona amaing arhier, ‘Kieing hevehie tugete: Kieing keetum ittheningge elhuwnglhaa engkhe tugete, engkhejege amana saangbaar, pihseh bekhe thaargete.’
Engkhejege kichipina rhier ingge, ‘Kechipi, nang ing pih ouwngsuwjor ing kum enhimpaa rotum ketharpe; naja mindesare, sasare, eenre, nongesare.’
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing anhingna arhier, ‘Inhuwr nang! Atenie yenna nachipi nanhingtena liewanggete; amana nang ing nabethongbesa pihbekhechuw achuwta ouwngshuwvate.’
Thangnhang entongte sawang shuwluing athienen rotum amingkong amachuw hangchiega.”
Amaing asepohhenhingna arhier, “Chotaanaching kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, ninrhingnalina ajie Sawang ketega, amana ninghumlina ajie Servang ketega tenuwng belung minjamaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche rhingriechin aesaaphuw ethi ing chipiching, engkhejege piendeer ithi eng ehum ing athiga.
Waaahechuw kharruw; emmenieng sachieje vormaahe, ekoumje koummaahe, etouwmje deenmaahe, changgechuw Thangnhang ing apigehe. Ninnuwbe vatihe ithi eng elusehgechuw!
Engkhejege ninnuw ing belung minjatenuwge rhingriechuw apha engkhe ninthinchese?
Ninnuw ing isiingseh nong etu cheh maatenuwche lintaangbekhelina belung nimminjaga?

Phena riepaar ajiekhang imhuwngga kharruw, emmenieng nongje tumaahe, lhieje thiimaahe; changgechuw kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, Solomon raraajeng athang alaarbekhejeching hevehe khangkhin piendeer ouwngthongchemaa.

Changgechuw atenieche rhingniege atuhnieche mhihsungte bethuvang ate phena phuwrchuw Thangnhang ing changjemeh bethongniebe thacha euwmmaa ninnuw! Thangnhang ing ninnuwchuw heve ithi eng piendeer ibethongmaaniekhang!
Engkhejege ninnuw ing ajie savanggete, ajie eenvanggete belung minjamaaruw, engkhejege ninning mormaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche lolhiepaam yaatiheching hevelinahing ijasagehe; engkhejege nimmapaching hevebekhehie ninrotumchuw aminghuwga.
Ama ninjongsaruhching Eruwnglepaachuw mensang jongnung chonaching amakhangchie bekhechuw ipevate.
“Ittemaaruw, Zou esiing aruhe, ajiegachiinche ninnhingna eruwng lepaachuw nimmapaing apina aning ichiiga.
Nindeenchuw juwrnung simpiruw; ninler ninchie emmo maavang ichii thuwngchuw ninrotum bethongruw; amachuwbe ouwngruw ing aanheengchemaa engkhejege sadiejeng amemaang chemaaga.
Ajiegachiinche naler nachii uwmtaana nabelungriirje uwmvate.
“Anongtunaing enthangcherruw engkhejege ninthoumhih chuw belengruw;
Riekhii ouwngchum aemhaarnaching aapuwchuw ahungeenli aphana eengkhaar aanuhle, emmenieng enrang eengkhaar aamhongna ahehaahe khangkhin ninnuwjeng turuw.
Aapuwching ahungtungle asuwhhe emmhi irhiingje aeheuwmchuw arasii aetthaga.
Ama ithengchuw yenttimna vatemo changmaanieche khuuwaar phanagemo engkhejege hanghin aanhuwrhechuw, arasii aettha suwhgehe.
“Changgechuw hevehie minghuwruw: eenpuwching ajii aphana aeenchuw eenruwheching thengvang ate minghuwnieche aeenchuw bekhiemaahenie.
Khangkhin ichiin Me Sapajeching nimmindeenmaa aphana athengnamaaing enthongsaruw.”
Piter ing arhier, “Thangpa nang ing kinnhingna heve ttongttiimhie narhiergemo changmaanieche mibekhe linaga?”
Thangpaing anhingna arhier, “Apha taanchana ennhingna aesaaphuw apihchenaing aapuwching eengkuwhe rotum aminser aethacha arhu evier lerchii apanachuw achuwvate?
Aapuwpaching atheng taanchana changchin atu ahimpha shuwh chuw arepaa itthaga.
Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, amaing pihbekhelina amachuw minsernavate.
Changgechuw, kipuwpa hungtherwate teniege amindeen shuwh ching teniege aalhang shuwh pesarhe nepenuwhechuw binniege, saniege eenniege engkhejege Zuw heberuwnieche,
shuwh amachin amindeenmaa enie engkhejege aminghuwmaa aphana aapuwching hungkeniege, ataachuw atum ennhii besuwniege tinvate, engkhejege aethacha arhumaahethoh asaruhchuw phahaavatehe.
“Aapuw ing amindeenchuw minghuwge enthongmaa engkhejege aapuwching aadie enhuw ejiing atumaa shuwh chuw mingverriivate.

Changgechuw aapuwching amindeenchuw minghuw maaniege, ibinphuw nong aatu shuwhchuw romhor tepie aesah phawate. Enhimseh apih mi bekhetena enhimseh vilieniege; inhimseh avipee mihenhingtena inhimlhaa vinhevate.
“Kieing simrii paamna mhee kejinringa, engkhejege amachuw atele minttoungningche, aejemeh kieing tuning katega!
Kieng chii aluhnaing chii aluhna engkhe chuw aviesuwmaataang kening chiirmaa.
Ninnuw ing simrii paamna dejiim ajinringa ichiing ningkharga? Amamaaga, ninnhingna kerhierga, changgechuw ithiseh aantthenaga.
Amachuwbe atele betthiimniege eengkuw engkhena mi ronga eonghechuw ennhiele eenthum, eenthumle ennhie entthevatehe.
Emmenieing amapale asapathoh, asapale amapa, amanuwle asanuw, asanuwle amanuwthoh, amapitho aaminuw, aaminuwthoh amapi entthevatehe.”
Amaing mi ruhpuwhe nhingnaje arhier, “Ninnuw ing tetaatena rudu ihangkar mhuwtenuwbe ‘Khuw suwrvate nintena,’ engkhejege changchin aesuwrga.
Engkhejege atitena thie hangrhaangniebe, ninnuwng ninrhier, ‘besapaavate,’ engkhejege changchin isuwhga.
Aetthachaang aatu ninnuw! Lolhiepaam engkhejege minvenna isuwhchuw nimminghuwse, changgechuw aphachuw ninnuwng minghuwmaa uwng nintechuw ajitunaga?
“Ajiituna ninthienening atataachuw waajiir nintuchemaaga?

Hanghing, nangchuw imminlaar mithoh waajiir aatuhe mhekungna ninneer maalhiele aanchamna heturu, changmaaniebe waajir aapuwching evikiniege amaing aalhuwnghe nhingna evipeniege, engkhejege aapuw elhuwngheching mikhumte aetharvate.
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, nang ing pevang nate sheerbekhe nabilimaataang ibesuwmaanie.”
Ama aphanarah chin amana eongheching Galili paamtena miheching Thangnhangte enlhen pih aviminserleching, avipeelechin Pilat ing athehe khuwchuw Jesunhingna arhierheche;
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Galilihe michin ijaachaam aphatana, Galili miheching inhimseh isiicher atugehe ichie ningkharga?
Changmaaga, kieing ninnhingna kerhierga; changgechuw ninnuw ing nimbelungriir houngmaatenuwbe, khangkhin ichiing ninnuwje maangvangninte.
Changmaajenie Siloamna euwm eenboung ichimching derhege ithie mi suwmmalhie iriiching Jerusalemna eongbekhelina ler aturga ichiin ningkharga?
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, changmaaga; changgechuw ninuw ing nimbelungriir houngmaatenuwbe, khangkhin ninnuwbekheje maangwangninte.”
Chona amaing ttongttiim ahinrhier: “Mi engkheing adarkhaberna thechangbor aphin; engkhejege aanra uwmnemo tege avavirche uwmmaase.
Chonaching darkhaber aathie nhingna arhier, ‘Ebeerre! Ajiegachiinche kumthummheh kieing thechangbornahin aanrah kevaabeerche phamaasing, phuwrre; lolhiehie ajietuna ekanamaa abesuwga?’
Amaing abesang, ‘Aanchungpa, ateniekumje uwmpheresie, heve akurna toningge siereeh thaargete.
Akumte aanra uwmniebe tthase, changgechuw enramaaniebe phuwrre.’ ”
Ate amaing khuwngsang engkhena Eongna eniena aminchuwhe.
Chaleching kum suwmalhieeeriihmeh arhingrieje aminsuwr aatthuwm ekum nepenuw engkhe evatheng. amaing eseepaa akouwmtaana athienening hangniirge, mintoumchemaa.
Jesu ing amachuw amhuwche, eenge anhingna arhier, “Nepenuw, nang ing inachiekha kemintthaapechie.”
Amaing ataalina akih abangche chalerahching ataa enthiense engkhejege Thangnhangchuw amimpaape.

Changgechuw khuwngsang aapuw upaching Jesu ing Eongna eniena aena amintthaataana nongemaage miruhpuw kaarna arhier, “Miheching nong atuna aenie kuru uwmne; ama aenienaching thengnung aenachuw damheresie, engkhejege Eongna aanienaching tumaaruw.”

Changgechuw Thangpaing besangge arhier, “Itthachaang atu ninnuw! Ninnuw ing Eongna eniena ataa ataaing adeen shier changmaanieche nindeen shikursieng akhiitaana bethinchuwge, chii apina nimbethinmaakhang?
Engkhejege Abraham sanuw eennsuwhhie, ebeerruw, kum suwmmalhie irii saitaan ing aphierhie Eongna aeniena imintthaana arhumaaga?”
Hevebekhehie rhierge, aarhumaabekhechuw ningjaa apipe; engkhejege amaing ittiishuwpaa atulina mibekhechin enrotha aerhohe.
Chonaching amaing arhier, “Thangnhang lepaachuw ajiethoh enghaaga? Engkhejege ajiethoh mindeengvangketega?
Amahie inttam amhuwthoh enghaaga, amachuw achuw engkheing aberna avorthoh enghaaga; amachuw hanglhuwngge thing bor engkhe ouwngsuwge, engkhejege vatiheching abaahelina enruwvuw ahuwhe.”
Engkhejege avonhie amaing arhier, “Thangnhang lepaachuw ajiethoh mindinggete?
Amachuwbe nepenuw engkheing jaam chaang enthumna chor mimvege apurmaataang athinthoh enghaaga.”
Jesu ing Jerusalemte hangsige khuwpuw khuwpuwna, khuw khuwna minchuwhege evasi.
Achuw engkheing asie, “Thangpa, karpiwang ichiehechuw etoumpaaga?” Amaing ennhingna arhier,
“Embeepaa eengkhaarna avalhuwna tusaruw; ajiegachiinche, ninnhingna kerhierga, mi enhimpaaing amana valhuwgete tevatehe engkhejege chemaahenie.

Eenpuwching hangthieniege eenkhaarchuw kamniege, ninnuw ing taangna neertenuwge enuhtenuwge, ‘Thangpa, eemhongpire,’ amana ebesangniege ninnhingna rhiervate, ‘akhutena ethenggechuw kieing minghuw maangchuw.’
Chona ninnuw ing irhier bettiimvang ninte, ‘Kinnuw ing nangtho sahaamiege engkhejege eenhaamiege, engkhejege lhambekhenaje iminchuwchie.’
Changgechuw amaing rhiervate, ‘Akhutena ethenggechuw kenhingtena engke, achamaa aatuhe ninnuw!’
Abraham, Isaak, Jakob, chona laarchangpaheching Eruwng paamna aeong mhuwvang ninte, nintaache taangna ongtenuwge, ama amhinnaching ttaatenuwge ninghaa iriirvangninte.
Chona emmenieng tetaale tehaangtena, engkhejege, chiti chiinhatena thengheniege Thangnhang Eruwng ongtaana ongvatehe.
Atatah, nhungkurching mensaniege engkhejege lintaang mensaheching nhung kurvatehe.”
Ama aphanaraaching Pharisihe thenghege anhingna arhier, “Engkebehre, ajiegachienche Herod ing thehning entena.”

Amaing ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw engkenung emhihenhingna varhierruw, ‘Rongeruw, atenieje, atuhnieje kieing ebour ronham thorningge, aenaheje mindamningge, engkhejege inie aminthumna kenongchuw betthowanggete.
Changechuw atenieje, atounieje engkhejege thiemnaje, sivang ketega ajiegachiinche laarchangpachuw Jerusalem taangte itheh arhumaaga.
“Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Laarchangpahechuw thehchuwge amana avichiir hechuw lhuwng ing deengchuwge! Aarnuwching atihechuw abethaderna auw khangkhing ninsitihechuw keuwgehe, changgechuw rhumaasechuw.
Atebe ning eenchuw aruwching nimmaape; kerhierpeegechuw, ‘Eruwng romhingna ithenghe enrasie itthaga’ atehie ninrhier maataang imhuw maatenuw.”
Inie taancha engkhena Pharisi upa engkhe eenna Jesu ing Eongna iniena buw savang ate athengle emmenieing aariimhe.
Chalechin, amhekungna avinna chii inthin aena engkhe aeong.
Engkhejege Jesu ing waajiir aapuwhe, engkhejege Pharisihe nhingna asie, “Eongna aeniena aena amindamhie arhuga arhumaaga?”
Changgechuw derengsehe. Chonaching jesu ing varhiege amintthaape, engkhejege amingkepe.
Chona ennhingna arhier, “achuw engkheing asapa changmaanieche ashiir ouwngkuwngte boniege, Eongna aeniena amachuw hingkipimaavang ichii achuw emvenechuw?”
Engkhejege hevelinaje besangchemaasehe.
Amaing mhar ethenghechuw elhuwnglhaa eongna aminjonghechuw amhuwche, amaing ennhingna ttongttiim engkhe atongpihe.
“Achuw engkheing riekhie eenchumna aeriimna nangchuw elanieche, enjaphuw ongtaa amhinna ongmaa; achuwng aminghuw, nang ethi ing enjaphuw mi engkhechuw alaje arhuse.
engkhejege nangchuw enlah minchin thengniege nanhingna teniege, ‘naongtaahie heve mi meongre,’ engkhejege chaleching nang naning enjaaniege adertena eongnachuw phavangniete.

Changgechuw nangchuw elaniebe adertena eongtaana vaing ong; amaching nangchuw enlah michin thengniege, ‘kilhang, engkaangte hangkar ing eongpire ate arhunaga,’ chonaching nataatho theh ninsaahaahe mhekungna empachuw phawangniete.
Ajiegachiinche ataachuw aminlhuwng mibekhechuw minsiingvate; engkhejege ataa ensiingsachuw minlhuwngvate.”

Amaing Aalapa minhingnaje arhier, “Nang ing yiengna changmaanieche kholhiena buw pevang nate naalhanghe, nau naneh, asuwngkhorhe engkhejege veemchaang sawanghechuw eenmaare; achuw ing aminghuw, emmeniejeng avonhie aelahniege nanhingna lertour iminthourvatehe.
Changgechuw aemhaarna buw napeele, sarahe, isuwrhe, akhih aebonghe, engkhejege amhih ichuhechuw lahere.
Amalina nonge rasie aetthachuw ouwngsuwvangniete, ajiegachiinche emmenieing lertour abilina ajiidong uwmmaa, ajiegachiinche dhormo icherheching ahangrhingle nalertourbekhechuw belivate.”
Buw engsaale aalahekaarna mi enkheing ama bekhe athieche, anhingna arhier, “Thangnhang lepaana isaah een phavang echii michuw repaa aetthaga!”
Chonaching Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing ilhuwngpaa aemhaarna engkhe bethongge mi enhimpaa alah.
Imhaarna aphanaching amaing asuwhchuw cheerge aalahechuw aaeenpe, ‘Thengruw, ajiegachiinche euwmbekhe kebethongpe,’
Changgechuw emmeniebekheing etheng chemaanung tehege anhiihe. Mensapaching anhingna arhier, ‘Kieing lhie engkhe kiliesaase, engkhejege kieing vaningge vaabeerlahgete kechemaachuw irhupeesare.’
Engkheching arhier, ‘kieing shier paapuw ronga Kilietaana amachuw itthamaa ittha vaabeergete, amaching, kieing kenhiisaahie irhupeesare.’
Lintaangching arhier, ‘Kie atelepeh lunghaa kebiiga, engkhejege amalinahing thengchemaaning.’

Chonaching asuwhching hungeenlige apuwnhingna aminthangpe. Chotaanaching een aapuwchuw abelung sege engkhejege suwhnhingnachin arhier, ‘vasing khuwpuw lhampuna, lhamlolaabekhetena sarahe, akhih aebonghe, isuwrhe, amhih ichuhe engkhejege akhih aebonghechuw hinrhie.’
Engkhejege suwhching arhier, ‘Thiimpuw nang narhierchuw ketusaape, engkhejege ateleje adeen uwmne.’
Chonaching aapuwching asuwhnhingna arhier, ‘vasi ing lhampuwbekhena, ariikiengna mihechuw thengruw tere; amaching keeenchuw siihkangvate.
Ajiegachiinche ninnhingna kerhierga, Imhaarna kelahmihe achuw engkhedong ing imhaar achii mintinmaahenie.’ ”
Ate inhimpah mi ruwpuwheching Jesutho enrhiehe; engkhejege Jesu ing vaanlehge ennhingna arhier,
“Achuw engkheing kenhingna thengniege amapa, engkhejege amanuw, aalhangnuw engkhejege asitihe, auwhe engkhejege asarhe, amana uwng, atararaaje betermaaniebe, amaing kesepoh ouwngshuwchemaanie.
Achuw engkheing atasa thingkher arinmaa engkhejege kinhuw ajiemaachin Kesepoh ouwngshuw chemaanie.
Ajiegachiinche ningkaarna achuw ing een engkaangpaa tuning teniege, amachuw abetthuna amin uwmne uwmmaa ichii alhuwnachuw ongniege jongmaanie khang?
Changmaniege, amaing eenmhin etu betthiimniege betthochemaanieche, aambiirheching,
‘Heve mihin een etu betthiimge betthochemaase tevatehe.’

Changmaanieche eruwng enkheing eruwng enkhetaalina raar etu avasile, amachuw aantuwphuwna mi ching sumnhiemeh araar mihechuw amaing chiing sumtho entuphuw chevanggetemo teniege mensaing entanamaaheniekhang?
Raarchuw chemaanieche, lintaangheching endaapaa engongle, amaing mi vicheerniege raar tuluing adena vinhevang atega.
Chonaching ningkaarna adeenbekhe bethin maaniebe kesepoh ouwngshuw chemaanie.
Bechiihie aetthaga; changgechuw achienachuw emmonieche, ajiekhang minchievang atega?
Amachuw lolhienaje haar apeenaje aekanamaaga; amachuw lhinwang ichiegethaa. Aana euwmching thiesaresie.
Ama enhuwna khachana aatthiinghe engkhejege isiicher etuhe bekheching ttong entanahege Jesu paangte aenheenghege.
Engkhejege Pharisihe, thiimdeehe chin entochorhege arhierhe, “heve mihin isii cherhechuw rukuum tuge theh asaanaahe.”
Chonaching amaing heve ttongttiimhie atong.
“Ningkaarna Zou roza engkhe deenniege engkhechuw emmoniege, rampakaarna suwm ekuwlhie ekuw chuw maniege, emmochuw atuhmaataang jongmaavang ate achuwga?
Engkhejege amachuw vateuhniege arotharhoing akina aedumvate.
Engkhejege aeente hungeenliniege, aalhang alope engkhejege veemchaang eenniege, ennhingna rhiervate, ‘Rotha minrhosateruw, ajiegchiinche kezou emmochuw ketupe.’
Hanghing, kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, abelungrier amintena eaummaa dhormo icher suwmeekuwlhie ikuwtena isiicher mi engkhe abelungrier ahoungtahna Thangvenna rotharho na uwmvate.
“Changmaaneiche achuw nepenuw engkheing sheersaam suwm, adeentahna engkhechuw emmoniege, thoumhi belengniege, eenchuw rhuwniege, engkhejege atuhmaataang jongmaaniekhang?
Amaing avatuhche, aalhang alope engkhejege veemchaanghechuw eenge arhier, ‘Rotha eminrhopisaruw, ajiegachiinche kememoh sheerkha keteuhpe.’
Khangkhing, ninnhingna kerhierga, abelungrier ahoung isiicher atu mi engkhe rotum Thangnhang michierhe mhekungna rotha aerhohgehe.”
Chona Jesu ing arhier, “Pesar engkheing asapa ennhii adeen.
Anepaching amapa nhingna arhier, ‘Ipa, nadeensaa lerchii kenhingte epevang nate kerotumchuw ipere.’ Hanghin aler achiichuw ennhingna asimpe.
Inie tepie enhuwte anepaching atabekhechuw reenge paam isihpaate ramkhie sise, engkhejege amana areenbekhechuw minlhuwge aajecherpe.
Amaing euwmbekhechuw aminlhuwchernhuwte, ama paamnaching ittiishuwhpaa vinttaam shuwse, engkhejege abethangcherpe.
Chonaching amaing vasige ama lepaana aeonghe engkhenhingna amineing ongge; amanaching avohhechuw aabeernaing alhelete acheerpe.
Amaing vohing asaa vohbuwching avin mimvaning ate, changgechuw achuwdong ing pemaase.
Changgechuw athienening ahimminghuwche ahinrhier, ‘Ipanhingna aeonghe amineheching belhiejorjor ing asaagehe, changgechuw kie-che kevin ittaam ing hena therong ketena!
Hangthieningge epanhingte vaningge, anhingna varhiergete, ‘Epa, kieing Minventeje engkhejege nanhingnaje isii cher ketupe,
nasapa aansuwna mati chamaasing; nang ing mine nasiih engkhekhangkhin isiesare.’
Chona amaing hanniirge, amapanhingte huwngse. Changgechuw raarkhena ahuwngle, amapachin mhuwge aning aminsiipe, engkhejege vatenge ariingna aekorge abejuhpe.
Chona asapaching anhingna arhier, ‘Epa, kieing Minven engkhejege nanhingna isiicher ketupe; kie nasapa engkhe aansuwna mati chamasing.’
Changgechuw amapaing ashuwhenhingna arhier, ‘Enrang pien aanthongna hinchiruw aetthaseh kha, engkhejege minserruw; akicharna kihchii menieruw, khikhumje menieruw.
Engkhejege imarseh shierti thehnuwng, engkhejege sameniige rotha minrhoteruw;

ajiegachiinche, kesapahie ithiebesatena ihangrhingga, emmobesaga engkhejege keteuhpe.’ Engkhejege-emmenieng rotha aminrhopipehe. Ajiegachiinche kesapahie ithietena hangrhingse; emmobesatena keteupe; rotha eminrhopisaruw
chaleching asapa upachuw lhelena aeong, engkhejege aeen ahungeenlile aeen ahimphamaalhiele, khuwng sohhege elaam hechuw athiepe.
Amaing ashuwh engkhechuw eenge ajii atugehe tege asii,
Amaing abesang, ‘nanepakha hungtungse, engkhejege nangpaing imarpaa sierti thehge amachuw aena iki uwmluing amhuwtaanaching atuga ate.
Chonaching auwpaching atherphuwrge lhuwning temaase. Amapaching jungshuwge ameneempe.

Changgechuw amaing taangtena ahimbesang, ‘Ronge! Ajiegachiinche kum hangchinmeh shuwh khangkhin nong ketupichie, engkhejege narhierbekheje keminjie; changgejenie nang ing kilanghethoh rothakurna keer ateedong ithehpimaachie.
Changgechuw nasapa ahungke hevehie, ichuwma nepenuwhetho enrhiehege alerchiibekhe bethangcherge nang ing arotum shier emar atichuw nathepise.’
Chonaching amapaing anhingna arhier, ‘Kesapa, nangche aanasiir kietho aeonghaagemie, engkhejege kedeenbekhehie nataga.
Changgechuw hevehie tumeniege rotha nimrhohvang etega, ajiegachiinche nane hevehie ithietena aehangrhingga; emmoh besatena aeteuga!’ ”
Sawang mee engkhe ing ama alerchie aminpana mee engkhe asiihching ama apih asehchuw amemohpe ichie ttong anhingte thengseh.
Chonaching amaing vaeenge arhier, ‘Kieing nakhu kithiehie ajietunaga? Nang ing lerchii napana naphaalhuwnachuw eminthie, ajiegachiinche nang ing atebe lerchii apana chemaatenie.
Chale lerchii aapanaching athenening akhar, ‘kipuwpahing lerchii epana phamhie aliepe, ate ajie tusagete? Kieing per evatoje kechena uwmmaa, mi inhiije kening enjaane.
Kiechuw lerchii apana phamhie ilhiejenie mibekheing ingeenna alhuw arhuna ajii tusagete ichii ate keminghuwpe.’
Chonaching aapuwpa ler aturbekhechuw eenge, mesanhingna arhier, ‘Ejehmeh kipuwpa ler naturse?’
Amaing arhier, ‘thou chaang roza engkhe’ Amaing anhingna arhier, ‘nang ing natour engjiichuw vilieng sumnga bejiih.’
Chona engkhechuw asii, ‘nang ing ijehmeh naturga?’ Amaing abesang. ‘Gehu saang chaang roza engkhe. Amaing anhingna arhier, nang ing natour enjiihie vilieng, sum eerii bejiih.’
Engkhejege dhormo ichermaa lerchii aapuwpaching ivierpaaing atuchuw amimpaape, ajiegachiinche elenghe kaarna aeong sitihe ithi ing atele lolhiepaam sitiheching emmenie misienhe rotum ivierlhahgehe.
Engkhejege ninnhingna kerhierga, dhormo arhumaa lerchiilina ningeelhang beshuwruw, amaching amachuw atangnhuwte ninnuwchuw emmenieing ittiim aenemaa eente rukuum etuvate.
Achuwgejenie tepie pangna belungriir minthiingniebe inhimpah linaje abelungrier minthiingvate, tepietina buwrniebe inhim atulinaje buwrvate.
Chonaching ninnuw ing aethacha arhuma lerchiina aethacha arhumaanhuwnabe achuw ing atataa lerchiilina ninnuwchuw ajiikhang iminsernavate?
Engkhejege ninnuw ing mi engkhe nonglina aethacha uwmmaatenieche achuw ing nintachuw ninnhingte aepevatekhang?

“Achuw engkhedong ing aapuw ennhii mine tuchemaa; ajiegachiinche shuwhching engkhechuw harniege engkhechuw aning minsiivate, changmaanieche engkhelina belung peniege engkhechuw abelung minlhuwmaanie. Ninnuw ing Thangnhang engkhejege lerchii sepa tuchemaatenuw.”
Sheerlina belung apih Pharisiheching amabekhechuw athieheche inning amintthuwmhe.

Amanaching amaing ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing mi mhekungna ataaga ichiin waajiir nintuna; changgechuw Thangnhang ing nimbelungriir aminghuwga; ajiegachiinche mi mhekungna aetthasehgung techuwge nintukha Thangnhang mhekungnabe entershuwhga.

“Waajiir ttongle Thangnhang laarchangpaheching abejiichuw Johon phanapang iheuwmga. amana betthiimge Thangnhang lepaa aettha ttongjiirhie aminjaamga, engkhejege mibekheing amana alhuwnaing eperpaa ajonggehe.
Changgechuw waajir ttong attieti engkhe amintthiirtaana Thangven engkhejege lolhiepaam aemaangching ilesehga.
“Achuw engkheing anepenuw entthephuwniege, lintaang nepenuw beniebe naamaa atuga, engkhejege apuwsarthoh entthebesachuw beniebe amaing nepenuwlina naamaa atuga.
“Apha engkhena sawangpaa mi engkhe euwm, amaing isinsier engkhejege ennaarje piendier ing enthongge, aanasiir rotha minrhoge ipaar.
Engkhejege ipenn ing atah akhumpoh sarapa Lazarus ateching aeenkhaarkungna aejaar.
Amaing sawang ching abuw alheh akiir abebuwchuw avin amimvanaing amindeen, utihejeng thenghege aapenchuw abeliehe.
Sarapachuw thege thangven michierheching rhiihege Abraham buwmna ongse; engkhejege sawangjechuw thege arhiepehe,
engkhejege amaing Norohna ijaapaaing ongge ahingeebierche raarkhena Abraham apaangna Lazarusje amhuw.
Amaing ahingeen, ‘Epa Abraham, naning eminsiisare, engkhejege Lazarus ing akimhurna chii luhsing kebelie amindenaing ijichierpisare; ajiegachienche kieing mheebesuwrlina jasapaaning!

Changgechuw Abraham ing arhier, ‘Nepang, nang ing narhingle nanongna bekhe napha, amana Lazarus ing aetthamaachuw apha; changgechuw ama hena edehchuw aphape, engkhejege nang ing ejaa naphase; amachuw enthiesare.
Heve amhintena ninnhingte avipeena arhunamaaing, engkhejege ningongnamhin lolaana achuwdong ing ahingeelennamaang, kinnuwle ninnuw lolaana elhuwngpaa ungkuwng enlaaluing uwmne!
amaing arhier, “Chogenieche, epa, nang ing epa eente amachuw icheerpi sare–
ajiegachiinche keukene ronga uwmne erukupiresie, hevenahing entheng, namaang amaing ennhingna aethajeng saarkhie epipeeresie.
Changgechuw Abraham ing arhier, ennhingna Mosi engkhejege Thangnhang ttongjiirpahe ongne; emmenie ttongchuw rongeheresie.”
Amaing arhier, ‘Maa, epa Abraham; changgechuw ithietena michuw ennhingna thengniebe embelung huwngvatehe.’
Amaing anhingna arhier, ‘emmenieing Mosile Laarchangpahe ttong rongemaaheniebe, ithietena achuw engkhe hangrhingjenie emmeniechuw irhierpee rhumaanie.’ ”
Jesu ing asepohhenhingna arhier, “khihminsiena isuwmaa rhumaa; changgechuw khih minsiina atu milina jaasawate!
Amaing edoung nepanghekaarna engkhe khih minsiina tuvang ategeniebe ariingna saangsuhna lhung bekhiniege rimchiete elhinchin anhingna aetthasehga.
Enriimsaruw! Nau nane engkheing walaarniebe, amachuw rukuruw; engkhejege amaing abelung huwngniebe, kuhpeeruw.
Engkhejege atahraraaing nanhingna vosarie aetthamaa tuniebe, nanhingte vosariemeh thengniege kelaarpe teniebe amachuw kuhpeeruw.”
Thangpanhingna Ttongjiirpaheching rhierhege, “kinthacha eminlhuwngpisare.”
Thangpaing abesang, “ninnuw ing eenttammhuw engkhepang ninthacha uwmniebe, heve thingnhabourhie ‘arojungthoh rimchiete mhuwngsare? teteniebe, amachuw ninttong minjievate.’
“Achuw engkheing asuwh lhiethiepachuw changmaanieche Zou aaserpachuw lheletena ahuwngle, ‘atelerah huwng ing thesaatahna ong, teniege rhiervang ate ningkaarna achuw gechuw?’
Ama narhier saruh ing, ‘kholhiena kesaaphuw bethongre; kieing aesa een kebetthumaataang nadeerhiin phier ing kenong tu; ama enhuwte nang ing theh sare teteniege anhingna temaa teniekhang?’
Suwhching nattongchuw aminjietaana nang ing namimpaase?
Chonaching nanhingte ture tege arhier besabekhechuw tuteniege, ‘kinnuwbe aekanama suwhgung, kinnuw ing tuvang kintechuw kintusaape,’ tenung ninnuwjeng rhierruw!”
Jerusalemte ahangsile Samaria engkhejege Galili ram lolaana ehuwngsi.
Amaing khuw engkhe avalhuwche, enchor ing ipen pesar suwm anhingna endapaatena ahimpuwhe.
Emmenieng uwnghege, ahinrhierhe, “Jesu, Thiimpuw, naning eminsiisaruw!”
Amaing emmeniechuw amhuwheche, ennhingna arhier, “engkenuwng nintaachuw khorpuwhenhingna minthieruw.” Engkhejege emvasile tthasehe.
Engkaarna engkheching aenachuw tthasing ate amhuwche, vaanlige Thangnhangchuw amimpaape;
Engkhejege Jesu khibouwmna vatiege khuge arumpe; Engkhejege ama Samariatenaga.
Chona Jesu ing asii, “Suwm kemintthaachuw khache? Ikuwhche akhutega?
Paam lintaangtena mi hevehiemaaniege Thangnhang chuw aminpaana evaanlihe teuvateruw?
Chona amaing anhingna arhier, “Hangthieing engkesare; nathachaching tthasechie.”
Vokhe Jesunhingna Pharisiheching Thangnhang lepaa thengvate entetaana asiiheche amaing abesang, “Thangnhang lepaahie imhi ing mhuwmeniege ethengmaaga;
engkhejege ‘ebeerruw, hena uwmne!’ Changmaanieche ‘amana uwmne?’ Ajiegchiinche atataaing Thangnhang Eruwng lepaachuw ningkaarna aeuwmga.”
Chona asepohhe nhingna arhier, “Mi sapa aenie chuw ninnuw ing emhuw enhimpaa idejetenuw mhuwmaavang ichie aeniehechuw hungvievate.
Emmenieing ninnhingna rhierniege, ‘Amana ebeerruw!’ Changmaanieche ‘hena ebeerruw!’ itejenie vamaaruw, ingeenhuwje jiemaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche bitti ing enlehge minven derna amhin engkhetena lintaang minvender engkhete elengkhangkhing, Mi Sapaching changching juwngvate.
Changgechuw mensaing ijaachaam enhimpaa phaniege engkhejege heve misien hehing rhumaahenie.
Noah hanthaana ishuwkhangkhin Mi Sapa aenienaje changching shuwhvate.
Noah ing rukuwngsungte alhuwmaalhiele, emmenieing sahege, eenhege, een niehege, een meniehege aeonghe; engkhejege chiipuw liimge aangkheng amemaangpe.
Khangkhin ichiing Lot hanthaanaje ishuwga; sahege, eenhege, aeliehege, juwrhege chii betthehege, chiibaar betthehege, engkhejege een tuhege aeonghe;
changgechuw Lot ing Sodomtena atennhuwte mimventena mhee engkhejege gundhuk minsuwrge amemaangcherhe.
Mi Sapaching aamphuwng aeniena changngengechin shuwhvate.
“Ama inienaching achuw engkheing phechung na ongniebe engkhejege apeesechuw eensungna uwmmiege amachuw aelie ttummaaresie; engkhejege phelhiena iongching khangkhin ichiin hungeenlimaaresie.
Lot anepenuwchuw enthiesaruw.
Achipi akarna aajong achuw engkheching maangsavate, changgechuw achipi amemaangsaa ama michin rhingvate.
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, ama yennaching aejaartaana mi ennhii jaarheniebe; engkhechuw lieniege, engkhechuw mavate.
nepenuw ennhiing chakri beherniebe, engkhechuw lieniege, engkhechuw mavate.
Pesar ennhieng phelhiena ongheniebe, engkhechuw lieniege engkhechuw mavate.
Chona emmenieng anhingna asie, “Akhutemo, Thangpa.” Amaing ennhingna arhier, “ithiehe aantorna amhinna laangtaheje aepor ing ongvatehe.”
Apha bekhena ahinthamna engkhejege aning ikie uwmludeh ing auwmnaing Jesu ing ttongttiim engkhe ennhingna atong.
Amaing arhier, “Khuwpuw engkhena Thangnhang attiimaa engkhejege mi thoasamaa waajiir aapuw engkhe aeong.
Ama khupuwnaching mhihkhuwnuw engkhe ching anhingna thengge arhier, ‘ketaalina aechamaa atuhechuw phuw iliepisare,’
Changgechuw amaing apha amongna rhupeemaa; changgechuw enhuwte amaing abelungrierna akhar, ‘Kieing Thangnhangchuw ttiemaajening engkhejege mihechuw juumhejening,
heve nepenuwhing kiehie veh imminchertaana, aphabekhena thengniege imminjanamaaing, aphuwchuw liepeegete.’
Engkhejege Thangpaing arhier, “Waajiir echummaa aapuwchin arhierchuw rongeruw.
Engkhejege yen siim neluing Thangnhang ing aateurbesahe rotum amaing aphuw liepeemaanie khang? Engkhejege Thangnhang ing erotum abumna haapeemaaheniekhang?
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, amaing enrangpaa waajiir echumchuw itupeevate. Engkhejege Mi Sapaching athengle lolhiepaamna athacha mi mhuwvatemo?
Entah ing dhormo icherging entehe engkhejege lintaanghechuwbe ajii dongmaaga tehege amindeenhelina heve ttongttiimhie arhier,
“Mi ennhiing ahinthamnaing Thangnhang eenna ethenghe; engkhechuwbe Pharisiga, engkhechuw khachana itthiing miga.

Pharisiching athienening hangniirge hanghin ahinnhie, ‘Thangnhang, kemimpaasaanaachie, kiebe mi lintaanghethoh enghaamaaging! Ouwngruhe, dhormo ichermaa, naamaa ituhe, changmaanieche hangchie khachana ekhuwmhe khangchiemaaging.
Kie haptana vonhie buw kehiega, Kephasaa saruh suwmna engkhe kepiga.
“Changgechuw khachana etthiingpaching raarkhena hangniirge, minvente amhih hangeenlehlu ing, changgechuw abelung ibeengge ahinnhie, ‘Thangnhang, isiicherpaa kiehie naning eminsiisare!’
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, hevehiemaa engkhe michin kie ichumsehging tege aeente engkese. Ajiegachiinche athenening aathoh michuw minsiingniege, athienening isiingsachuw aethohvate.”
Miheching nedounghechuw anhingte virhiehege akih ebaangpiresie atehe, engkhejege amachuw sepohheching amhuwheche atunamaaing arukuhhe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing eenhege arhier, “Kenhingte nedounghekha vaheresie, deermaaruw; ajiegachienche Thangnhang lepaachuw emmenie hangchiehie rotumga.
Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, nedounghekhangkhing Thangnhang lepaachuw aliechema achuw engkheching amate lhuwchemaanie.”
Achuw engkhe lepaa aapuw engkheing anhingna asie, “Ittha Thiimpuw, ajii tuningge ettiim inemaa erhingnachuw phachewang ketega?”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Ajiituna kiechuw ittha entegechie? Achuwdong ing ittha uwmmaa changgechuw Thangnhanggetha.
Nang ing Thangnhang ttongthohchuw naminghuwga; ‘nang ing naamaa tumaa, nanging mi thehmaa, nang ing vaberomaa; nang ing amamaa saarkii pemaa; nangpa engkhejege nangnuwchuw aejare.’
Amaing abesang, “Kieing amabekhechuw kenepangle betthiim ingge ketubesaga.”

Jesu ing amachuw athieche, anhingna arhier, “Ateleje aseh engkhe nasamse. Nadeenbekhe juwr cher ing sarahe chuw pe, engkhejege nang ing mimvenna naler nachii minghuwngvangniete, chona huwng ing, keenhuw ijiire.”
Amaing amachuw athieche, abelung jase, ajiegachiinche ama sawangpaaga.
Jesu ing amachuw ebeerge arhier, “sawangheching Thangnhang lepaana ivalhuwna elupaaga!
Ajiegachiinche sawang mee ing Thangnhang lepaate evalhuwnahie sariingsie sah ing tthimphii khorna elhuwching elesehga.”
Amachuw aathiehechin arhierhe, “chogenieche achuwche ekarpi phawang atega?”
Amaing abesang, “hum ing atuchemaachuw Thangnhangnhingna esuwhcher achega.”
Chona Piter ing arhier, “Ebeer, kinnuw ing kingeen bethincher uwngge kinjiegechuw.”
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, “Thangnhang lepaa rotumna aeen, aalhangnuw, auw-ane, amapa amanuw, asitihegejenie bethinniebe,
Amaing heve aphana saruh enhimpaa ithi ing, engkhejege thengvang ate lolhie paamna ettiim inemaa irhingchuw phawate.”

Chona suwmmalhie ennhiehechuw rhiihege ennhingna arhier, “Ebeerruw, inieng Jerusalemte hangsinemie, engkhejege Thangnhang ttongjiirpaheng abejiicher khangkhin Mi Sapa lina shuwhvang atechuw aleer suwvate.
Ajiegachiinche amachuw thachamaahe keelite peheniege; engkhejege amachuw siimnaheniege, ningjaa peheniege engkhejege ataalina becherwatehe.
Emmenieng imbinrii enhuwna thehvatehe, engkhejege anie aminthumna avonhie hangrhingvate.”
Changgechuw emmenieing amabekhechuw minghuwchemaahe; atataaing amaing arhierchuw ennhingtena ouwngthurse, engkhejege arhierchuw minghuwmaasehe.
Amaing Jeriko ahingeennheengle lhampuwpaangna amhi echuw buw anhiichaa pesar enkhe iheong.
Mi ruwpuw ing ivasichuw athieche, ajii ichiega tega asiepe,
Emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Nazareth Jesu evasiga.”
Chona amaing euwng, “Jesu, David sapa naning eminsiisare!”
Amana isiheching amachuw tumaare tehege eperpaa arukuhhe. Changgechuw eperseh uwngge, “David sapa, naning eminsiisare!”
Jesu ing, ama michuw anhingte vihrhieruw tege arhier; engkhejege apaangte athengche, anhingna asie,
Ajii itupeeresie natega? Amaing arhier, “Thangpa avonhii kemhimhuwsagete.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Namhihmhuwsare, nathachaching engkarpeepe.”
Chalerahching amhih amhuwchepe engkhejege aanhuw ajiepe, Thangnhangchuw mimpaage; mibekhejeching amachuw emmhuwtaana Thangnhangchuw amimpaahe.
Chona amaing Zerikona valhuwge aalenpe.
Pesar engkhe Zakaius ate khachana itthiing uwpa sawang engkhe aeheong.
amaing Jesuchuw achuwga atechuw ibeersaning tejenie aruwng amongtaana michin elhuwmge mhuwmaase
Chonachin mimate vatenge thechangborlina hangkarge, ajiegachiinche Jesu ing ama lhamchuw hinjiewang atetaanachinga.
Jesu ing ama amhinchuw himphage hingeebiirge anhingna arhier, “Zakaius, enrang jungttum; ajiegachiinche atenie naeenna riihvang ketega.”
Changchin enrang ttumge rotharho ing rokuwm atupe.
Aamhuwbekhechin ttongchorhege enrhier, “amaing isiikha atunhingna mhar ouwngshuwse.”
