Zakaius ing hangniirge Thangpanhingna arhier, “Ebeer, kieing kedeenbekhe attimpang sarahechuw kipi; engkhejege kieing achuw engkhe ta alham amamaaing lieningbe saruh milliing biliwanggii
chona Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Atenie heve eenna aekarpichuw thengse, ajiegachienche amaje Abraham sapaga;
ajiegachiinche Mi Sapaching emmobesachuw ajongna engkhejege akarpinaing thengse.”
Hanghing emmenieing arongele amaing ttongttiim engkhe arhier, ajiegachiinche amaing Jerusalem ahing ngeen nheengpe, engkhejege Thangnhang lepaachuw hangrarah mhuwrong kintega tehege amindeenhe.
Chonaching amaing arhier, “Ilhuwngpaa mi engkheing ataasah Eruwng lepaa engkhe paangkar phaniege ahungeenlinaing, isihpaa lepaate sise.
Amaing ashuwh mi suwm chuw vaeenge, ennhingna talent suwm pehege, ‘Hevehin kehungeenli maataang sheerbaar taarnaruw ate.’
Changgechuw ama alepaa miheching aeenthiemaataana ttongjiir ireenhe vibethinhege, ‘Kinnuw ing heve mihie kintaalina ipuhwang ichii rhuwmaaung’ atehe.
“Eruwng paangkarchuw phage ahungeenliche amaing sheer apihe shuwhheching wataarhege ijeh aminthigehe ichiechuw aminghuw naing emmeniechuw aeenna ttongtho apihe.
Mensapaching amhekungna wage arhier, ‘Erwung, naseerkhin sheer suwm keminthisaase,’
Amaing anhingna arhier, ‘aetthapaa natuse, ittha shuwh! Ajienachiinche nang ing esiing nonglinaje aethacha arhuing natuge khake, khuwpuw suwmlina aapuw eensuwhsare.’
Chona amenhienachin thengge, arhier, ‘Eruwng, nang ing impeechiekha ronga ketoungsaase.’
Amaing anhingna arhier, ‘nangje khuwpuw rongalina aapuw eenshuwsare.’
“Chona lintaangching thengge arhier, ‘Eruwng, hena naseer kehinchise, kieing pien ing ilhuwmpangingge kesiiga,
Ajiegachiinche nanghie kettiigechie; ajiegachiinche itthamaa migechie, nang ing nasiihmaa pihchuw nahinlie, engkhejege nabetthemaachuw nakumga.

Amaing anhingna arhier, ‘Kieing nattongtaalina waajiir tuvanggete, ichamaa shuwh nang! Kiehie belungrier ichamaa miga, kieing kesiihmaa keliega, engkhejege kebetthemaachuw kekuumga ate naminghuw cherbesagana!
Chogeniebe keseerchuw ajietuna sheer siihtaana navipimaaga. Amachuwgeniebe kehungeenlile athithoh phasawang ketega.’
“Amaing apaangna eniirhenhingna arhier, ‘Keseerkha anhingtena valieruw engkhejege suwm adeennhingte peruw.’
(Engkhejege emmenieing anhingna arhier, ‘Eruwng, amaing sheer suwm adeense!’)
Kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, ‘aadeenhe mibekhena pewate, changgechuw euwmmaa anhingtena adeenbekhe sihchervate.
Changgechuw entaalina eruwng eenshuw, enrhuwmaahechuw hena virhienung kemhekungna thehcherruw.’ ”
Hevehie arhiernhuwte amaing emmana Jerusalemte hangsise.
Hanghin enghungsile, amaing Oliv bounglina aeuwm Bethphage engkhejege Bethani ahingeen nheengle asepoh ennhiichuw avichier,
“nimmana euwm khuwna waruw; amana ninnuw ing ninwalhuwle mi ing atoungmaalhie sikursiing atithoh aphierhe eentuhphuwngninte; amachuw bejohnung hinrhieruw.
Achuw engkheing ajietuna nimbejohga? tehenieche, hanghin rhierruw, ‘Thangpaing kanavang ate uwmne.’ ”
Achierheching wahege amaing arhier khangkhin awatuhpehe.
Emmenieing sikursiingchuw embejohle, aapuwheching arhier, “Ajiituna sikursiinghie nimbejohga?”
Emmenieng arhier, “Thangpaing kanavang ate uwmne,”
chona Jesunhingte ahinrhiepehe; engkhejege sikursiing taalina empien thahege Jesuchuw amengongpehe.
Hanghin ahungsile emmenieing empien chuw lhamna athahe.
Ate hanghin ahungeen nheengle Oliv bouwngtena ajungttumphana sepohhele mi enhimpahheching mi ing atu chemaa nong bekhe emmhuw taana. Thangnhangchuw erur engkaangpanging mimpaahege enrhier,
“Thangpa romhingna itheng Eruwng arepaa aetthaga!
Thangvenna dejiim engkhejege thanglaar engkaangsehna eong!”
Mi ruhpuw kaarna Pharisi heching anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, nasepoheching rukuheresie.”
Amaing abesang, “kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, emmeniein derengheniebe, lhuwngbekhehin uwngvatehe.”
Hanghin ahingeennheengle khupuwchuw vimhuwge, amaing ittaa.
arhier, “nang ing heve iniena, nataararaaing, dejiim auwmna nongchuw heminghuwteniebe! Changgechuw atebe namhihin naabeerchuw ouwngkhumpe.
Ajiegachiinche nataalina hangchie iniehe thengvate, amachuwbe, nang ouwngrhumaaheching nakur liheniege ropar mingkurheniege ariikieng bekhena ikamcherwate;

Amana ninnuwchuw ninsitihetho lolhiena imin jiin vatehe, engkhejege nasuwngna lhuwng engkheching engkhe taalina entaang chehmaanie; ajienachiinche ikarpeevang ichii Thangnhang ing imveer iniechuw minghuw maasechie.”
Ama enhuwna Jesu ing Thangnhang eente walhuwge aajuwrhe pihbekhethoh athorpehe;
engkhejege amaing arhier,
“Hevehie enjiihbesaga,
‘Kie keeenhie ahinthamna eenwang atega;’
Changgechuw ninnuw ing amahie ouwngruw khor nimbesuwpe.”
Aanasier amaing Thangnhang eenna aminchuwhe. Changgechuw khorpuw elhuwnghe, thiimdeehe engkhejege upaheching Thangpachuw athehnaing ajonghe;
changgechuw ajie tuvang ategehe minghuw maasehe, ajiegachiinche mibekheing belung elhuwpaaing arongehe.
Inie engkhena mihechuw Thangnhang eenna aettha ttongjiir aminchuwleching, khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege thiimdeehe amana upaheching minghuw minghaluing thenghege.
Anhingna arhierhe, “Irhierpire, ajii natuchena uwmge hevehehie natuga?”
Amaing ennhingna abesang, “kiejeng ninnhingna engkhe siegechuw, engkhejege ebesangruw.”
Johon chiilupahie Thangventena ethenggemo, changmaanieche humtenaga?
Ennajeer ing ensiehege arhierhe, “Enieng Thangventenaga temeniebe, amaing teniege, ‘ajietuna amachuw ninthachamaaga?’
Changgechuw enieng temeniege, ‘humtenaga’ temeniebe mi bekheing lhuwng ing ideengvate; ajiegachiinche emmenieing Johonhie Thangnhang ttongjiirpa engkhega tehege enthachaga.”
Chonaching emmenieing akhutenaga minghuw maauwng tehege embesang.
Chotaanaching Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Ajii kituchena uwmge kieing hevebekhehie ketuga ichii ninnhingna rhiermaaning.”
Amaing heve ttongttiimhie mihenhingna atong! “Pesar engkheing darkhaber engkhe thiege, aathiehenhingna saarge, paam lintaang isipaate sise.
Aphachuw ahungvieche amaing ashuwh engkhe lhiethiehenhingte chiibaar amaing phawang atechuw apinaing avicheer; changgechuw lhiethieheching binhege ajiidong peluing abethinpehe.
Avonhie lintaang shuwh engkhe avicheer; amaje binhege, ningjaa pehege aruh ing abethingpehe.
Engkhejege amintthumna avonhie avicheer; amaje binriihege alhinpehe.
Chonaching darkhaber aapuwching arhier, ‘Ajie kieing tugete? kening keminsiipa kesapachuw cheergete; amachuw emmenieng ijavatehe.’
Changgechuw lhiethieheching amachuw amhuwheche, enthenening tanahege enrhier, ‘amahie irii ekuwmpaga; enieing amahie thehmeniebe lerchii bekhehie aeta eensuwhvate.’
Chonaching emmenieing darkhabertena lhinhege athehpehe. Darkhaber aapuwchin ennhingna ajie tuvate?
Amaing waniege aathehechuw memaangriiniege, darkhabeerchuw mi lintaangte pewate.” Amachuw enthieche, emmenieing arhier, “Minven ing rhumaanie!”
Changgechuw amaing emmeniechuw ibeerge arhier, “Heve enjiihie ajii atenaga?!
‘Een etuheching arhumaa lhuwngching,
amararahing bangriekiing abour eenshuwhse?’
Amalhuwnglina itiehbekhe alhe akiir ing kievate, changgechuw amahin ataalina iboh achuw engkhechuw perkhuw khangkhin jinwate.”
Thiimdeehele khorpuw ilhuwngheching ama ttongttiimchuw entaalina arhierga ichii aminghuwpehe, emmenieing chove aphanaraaching suwrte atehe, changgechuw mihechuw attiepehe.
Chonaching emmenieng Jesuchuw aeriimhege ataapa etuchaanghe vicheerhege amaing arhierlinaching asuwrnaing lepaa aapuw nhingte apinaing atupehe.

Chonaching emmenieng anhingna asiehe, “Thiimpuw, nang ing narhierhie atataaga ichii kimminghuwse, engkhejege achuwnhingnadong aanthiirna mindangmaachie, changgechuw atataalina Thangnhang lhamchuw iminchuwsare.
Eruwngnhingte khachana ipihie waajiir ing arhuga arhumaaga?
Embelungriir ichamaachuw minghuwge ennhingna arhier,
“Kenhingna sheer chuw eminthieruw, achuw lose engkhejege aromhing ariinga?” Emmenieng arhier, “Eruwngpataga.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Chogenieche eruwngpa tachuw eruwngnhingte peruw, engkhejege Thangnhangtachuw Thangnhangte peruw.”
Emmenieng mibekhe mhekungna amaing arhier ttonglina isuwr chemaasehe; engkhejege amaing abesanglina eenluw liimge derengsehe.
Avonhie ehangrhing uwmmaa ate Saddusi heching anhingna etheng
engkhejege ttong asiehe, “Thiimpuw, Mosi ing kinnhingna ahebejiibesa uwmne, achuw pesar engkhechuw asiti berhingluing theniebe, auw anehing nepenuwchuw bege, auwneh rotum sitisene mavang atega.
Ate, auw aneh sariemeh euwm, mensapaching lunghaa vabege, asiti uwmluing thise;
Amenhienaje aminthuwmnajeng nepenuwchuw abiehe;
Changchin ichiin sariimehching siti uwmluing thisehe.
Anhungkurna nepenuwjechuw vathise.
Chogenieche avonhie ihangrhing inienache achuw lumheevang atega?”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Heve lolhiepaamna eongheng enlumhee abiihe engkhejege riekhie aanchumnaje atunaahe.
Changgechuw heve lolhiepaamhie engkhejege ithietena ihangrhing aphana chinbe lumhee shaangram, een inieje uwmmaanie.
Ajiegachiinche avonhie ithieje themaahenie, emmeniebekhe Thangven michierhetho enghaavatehe, engkhejege ihangrhing sitigehekhage emmeniechuw Thangnhang sitigehe.
Engkhejege Mosi ing Thangnhangchuw Abraham, Issak, engkhejege Jakob Thangnhang ateleching, ethiehe ihangrhingga tehege thingnha ikaang themin amindangga.
Ate ama ithie Thangnhangmaaga, changgechuw irhinghetaga; ajiegachiinche anhingna mibekhe irhingga.”
Chona thiimdeehe alhehheching abesanghe, “Thiimpuw nang ing etthajeh ttongsechii.”
Ajiegachiinche emmenieing vonu anhingna ttong siechemaasehe.
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajiikhang emmenieng Khrista hie David sapaga ategehe?
Ajiegachiinche David atararaing aalhana arhier,
‘Thangnhang ing kie ke Thangnhang nhingna arhier,
Kieng nang eenrhumaa hechuw kikhiderna Kesiih maataang ketachangna ong.’
David ing amachuw Thangnhangga tege arhier, chonaching ajiekhang asapachuw enshuwvang atega?”
Miheching enrongele amaing asepoh henhingna arhier,

“Thiimdee helina enriimsaruw, emmenieng ouwngsuwr pien viehege bevening atehe, mi engkongna kithiirkaarna irumheresie atechuw aadiegehe, khuwngsangbekhena engkhejege aemhaar auwmle itthaseh eongna aadienaahe.
Emmenieng mhikhuwnuwhe een sihhege engkhejege aetthachang tuhege esihpaa ahinnhiegehe. Emmenieng ittiishuwpaa enlaarchuw phawatehe.”
Amaing aabiirle sawangheching sheerbourna sheer abebuhechuw amhuwpe,
Engkhejege saraapah mhikhuwjeng pesa ennhiepang abebuje amhuw.
Amaing arhier, “Aatatah ninnhingna kerhierga, heve saraapah mhikhuwnuwhin emmeniebekhekaarna enhimseh athaarse.
Ajiegachiinche lintaangbekheing abelhiechuw apeegehe, changgechuw heve nepenuwhing amaing adeenmaa arhingna adeenpangchuw apeesaaga.”
Miheching Thangnhang een lhuwng aetthapah engkhejege miheching apihe peeseching ahintuhe chuw insirhege chotahnaching amaing arhier,
“Ninnuw ing atele ningeebier pihhetaalina hangchie aeniechuw thengvate, lhung engkheing engkhe taalina chimcherluing mamaanie.”
Emmenieing asiehe. “Thiimpuw, Amabekhechuw atihle shuhvang atega? Amabekhechuw aashuhphana ajie aandangna uwmne?”
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “Ninnuwchuw aamamaate ingkinamaa ing enriimsaruw, ajiegachienche keromhingna mi enhimpaa thengniege rhiervatehe, ‘Kie amaging!’ ‘Aphachuw ennhingse’ inngee nhuw jiemaaruw.
Ninnuw ing raarkhu engkhejege belung inlehmaa ilaang ashuwhle enchiimmaaruw; ajiegachienche hevebekhehie mensang shuwhvate, changgechuw attuhnachuw chaleraching thengvang atemaaga.
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “yaati engkheing yaati engkhelina, engkhejege eruwnglepaa engkheing eruwng lepaa engkhelina;
amana eperpaa lienglaang thengvate, engkhejege vinttam chiihaar amhinbekhena; engkhejege aena iki rhii lintaang lintaang shuwhvate; engkhejege ittiishuwpapah minventena mindangvate.

“Changgechuw hevebekhe ashuwhmaalhiele emmenieing ninnuwchuw isuwrheniege aejachaam epeheniege khuwngsangte engkhejege mikhumsungte, engkhejege eruwnghe amana lepaa apuhenhingte keromhinglina ithaarwatehe.
Hevehin ninnuw ing saarkhie ipina aphachuw iviega.
Chonaching ninnuw ing besangvang nintechuw mensang kharmaaung tenung nimblungriirna neersaruw.
Ajiegachiinche ninnuwchuw eenrhumaa bekheching nintaalina inlhin changmaanieche aettong achenamaa nher engkhejege evierna kieing pewanggechuw.
Ninnuwchuw amanuw amapa, engkhejege nauw nanehe, nasungkhorheching, nalhang nalopeherarah ching elhinvatehe, engkaarna achuw engkhechuwbe thehvatehe;
kikhulina mibekheing aeharwatehe.
Changgechuw ninluwhna sam engkhedong maangmaanie.
Ekhaang nin chehchin ninchipichuw irhing phasawangninte.
“Ninnuw ing Jerusalemchuw raarmiheng arokuur nimmhuwle, chaleching kiiwang ichii iniechuw ennhingse ichii minghuwruw.
Chale Judiana aeongheching boungte tenheresie, engkhejege khuwpuw sungtenahe chin taangte tenheresie, engkhejege khuwpuwtaangte eongheching valhuwmaaheresie;
ajiegachiinche ama aeniehechuw phuw aliena aeniechuwga, amabekhechuw alir asuwhna enjiibesaga.
Nepenuw neh arinhe engkhejege nedoung aamhaarheching chale jasavatehe! Ajiegachiinche lolhie paamna ittiishuwpaa aejanapah engkhejege heve mihe lina belung esiichuw ttumvate;
Emmenieng chiimsie lina thevatehe, lintaanghe chuwbe mi paamte suwh enshuwwatehe engkhejege Jerusalemchuw lintaang yaatiheng aphachuw attuhmaataang ingkhi ing chiennawatehe.
“Inie tha, aarsiihenhingna aandangnachuw shuwhvate; engkhejege lolhiepaamna rimchieing arosaa erurching belung kiheniege ijachaamchuw hungsuwvate.
Enttiitaana engkhejege lolhiepaamna isuwhechuw engkhartaana miheching inning morniege tiehvatehe, ajiegachiinche minvenna pirthang bekhechuw ennuhvate.
Chaleching Mi Sapaching ruwngpirtho elhuwngpaa athang alaarthoh rudulina ijungttum mhuwvang ninte.
Ate hevebekhehie ehungsuw abetthiimle ninluw mingkennuwng ebeerruw, ajiegachienche ninnuwchuw ekarpiwang ichiechuw innheengga.”
Chona amaing ttongttiim ennhingna arhier, “Thingbourle thingbekhelina ibeerruw;
Anhah edoung hangsieniebe suwrkhuw ennheengse ate nimminghuwga.
Khangkhin ichiin ninnuw ing amabekhechuw mhuwtenuwbe Thangnhang Eruwng lepaa innheengga ate minghuwruw.
Aatatah ninnhingna kerhierga, hevebekhehie aviemaataang heve misienhie viemaalhienie.
Minvenle lolhiepaam maangchervate changgechuw kerhierbekhe ttonghie maangmaadehnie.
“Ithijor aemhaar engkhejege Zuw ouwngruw engkhejege ipaarna lina belungrier ningum namaaing, engkhejege ama inieching chaang khangkhin minghuw minhaluing ningngunamaaing enriimsaruw,
Ajiegachiinche ama iniechuw lolhiepaam amhinbekhena irhingbekhe taalina thengvate.
Shuwhvang ichiebekhe tena aansihnaing, engkhejege Mi Sapa mhekungna ineer ninchenaing aphahekhena hinnhenuwng enriimsaruw.”
Aanasiir amaing Thangnhang eena aminchuwhe, engkhejege yen yennaje Oliv boung teching yensih ahinnhie.
Engkhejege mibekheing attong arongenaing yiengphi Thangnhang eenna ivathenghe.
Ate Chor emvemaa tal isaa aeriim, Aminlenna iniechuw innheengge,
khorpuw ilhuwnghe engkhejege thiimdee heching Jesuchuw ajiekhang thehteruw atechuw aminjonghe; ajiegachiinche emmenieng mihechuw attiehe.
Ate suwmmalhie ennhiikaarna Judas Iskariot sungna saitan lhuwse.
Amaing engkege ilhuwng khorpuwhetho amana Thangnhang een aarhuwng upa hetho Jesuchuw lhinnnawang ichielina entanasehe.
Emmenieing enrotha rhohge sheer apeenaing eenrhusehe.
Hanghin amaing rhuge, mi enhim athengmaa taanchana Jesuchuw ennhingte alhinna aabiirpe.
Chona ate chor emvemaa tal imhaarna aeriim inie, Aminlennie buwsah, Zou ati thehvang ichie eniechuw huwngviese.
Chonaching Jesu ing Piter engkhejege Johon cheerhege arhier, “Vanung inieng sawang ichii Aminlennie buwsachuw aerotumna bethongruw.”
Emmenieng asiehe, “Akhuna nang ing abethongna amhiin naadiechuw akhunaga?”
“Rongeruw,” tege ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw ing khuwpuna nimvalhuwle, mi engkheing chiiphor reenniege ninnuwchuw eenteuhphuvate; aanhuw jienung alhuwtaa eenna valhuwruw.
Engkhejege eenpuwnhingna rhierruw! Thimpuw ing nanhingna ennhiega, ‘kieing kesepohhetho Aminlennie buwsana adeenchuw akhunaga?’
Amaing chungtena amhinchuw iminthiewate. Amana irotum ing bethongruw.”
Changching emmenieng vahege amaing arhierkhang ngenge avateuhpehe, amana Aminlennie buw sanawang ichiechuw abethongpehe.
Aphachuw ahungvieche amaing sawang atehe amhinnachin ttongjiirpahetho ongsehe.
Amaing ennhiingna arhier, “Kieing ninnuwtho Aalennie buwsahie ijachaam kephamaalhiele sahaamenie ketega,
ajiegachiinche ninnhingna kerhierga, kieing Thangnhang Eruwng lepaachuw alir asuwmaataang hevehie samaaning.”
Chona amaing belinchuw viliege, engkhejege amimpaanhuwte arhier, “Hevehie vilienung ningkaarna simruw;
ajiegachienche ninnhingna kerhierga, Thangnhang eruwng lepaa athengmaataang, atele betthiimniege kieing darkha chii eenmaaning.
Chona amaing talchuw viliege engkhejege ahimmimpaanhuwte, bekhiege ennhingna vipege arhier, “hevehie kebechiiga, ninrotumna kepibesaga, kiechuw embehernamaaing hevehie turuw.”
Engkhejege ensaanhuwte, khangkhin echiin belinchuw viliege arhier, heve belinhie ninrotumna iche kethietena isuwh aethar ttongneerchuwga.
Changgechuw ebeerruw, kiechuw inlhin mi akihie aesaatalina kinsiihaase.
Ajiegachiinche hungshuwvang ichii enhuw ijii ing sapalina shuwhvate, changgechuw aalhinpa amachuw jasavate!”
Chona emmenieng, hevehie tuvang ichiechuw engkaarna achuuwate tehege ennajeer ensiesehe.
Engkhejege engkaarna achuwchin elhuwngsehga ichielina ennajeer ennasehe.
Changgechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “Lintaang yaati eruwngheching emmenie taalina aapuw aanshuwna nong atuhe. Engkhejege entaalina aapuw eenshuwh hechuw mirotum aettha aatugehe atehe.
Changgechuw ninnuwbe amachuw maaga; ningkaarna elhuwngsehching esiingseh eenshuwhvang atega, engkhejege sepa etu upa jungeenshuwhvang atega,
Ajiegachiinche elhuwngsehchuw achuwga, thesahtahna aeongchuwgemo, sepa aatupachuwgemo? The saa na taalina aeongchuw maakhang? Changgechuw kiebe ningkaarna sepa aatupachuwging.
“Ninnuwbe kie chaang ingeebeerbekhena kietho aeonghaabesagemie,
engkhejege Ipaing kiechuw Eruwng lepaa engkhe imminserna khangkhin,
Ningnuw ing kiruwng lepaa buw kesaataana isaa-een arhunaing, engkhejege Israel sungkhor suwmmalhie ennhii chuw waajiir etu Eruwng aongchenaing, kieing ninnhingna keminserna gechuw.
“Simon, Simon, ebeer, Saitan ing ninnuwhie saang abetthaakhangkhin ennhiina,
changgechuw nathacha amaangnamaaing narotumna kehinnhiega; engkhejege nang ing avonhie nabelungriir namintehnhuwte naunanehechuw enthacha menhehhere.
Engkhejege amaing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, kieing mikhumsungna ithie iphang nangtho enthongsaning!”
Jesu ing arhier, “Kieing nanhingna kerhierga, Piter, nang ing kiechuw vothummeh irhumaavang natechuw ashuwh maataang, atenie aarkhuung ing khuwngmaanie.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kieng sheerthuung, thuung, engkhejege khikhum emvelung kecheerlechuw nimvehna ajii iuwm? Emmenieng abesanghe, “ajiidong vehmaaung.”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Changgechuw ate, sheerthuung adeenchin amachuw reenresie, thuungje reenresie, engkhejege chiimsie adeenmaaching alongoh juwrsing engkhe ilieresie.

Ajiegachiinche ninnhingna kerhierga, heve aetha ttongjiirhie kenhingna alir suwvate, ‘Engkhejege amaing waajiir aeuwmmaahe kaarna ateempehe; engkhejege atataa kikhu abejiibesachuw hanghing alir asuwpe.’ ”
Emmenieing arhier, “Ebeer, Thangpa, hena chiimsie ennhie uwmne.” Amaing abesang, “Amahie ensuwse.”
Amaing jungsuwge anunu ing Oliv boungte wage engkhejege asepohheching ajiihe.
Amaing amhinchuw vatungge ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing aetthamaate nimbuwnamaang hinnhesaruw.”
Chona amaing lhung vokhepang ideeng endaana emmeniechuw mahege, akhiruwkhuw phinge ahinnhiepe.
“Epa, nang ing erhupiteniebe heve belinhie kenhingtena iliepidohre; changgechuw kieing kemindeen eensuwmaasing nang namindeeng chuw eensuwresie.”
Chona minventena michier thengge apaangkar apipe.
Abelung ajalamtheeng eperseh ahinnhierihpe, engkhejege arothinchuw thie enrhorpaa iche khangkhin lolhiena chese.
Amaing ahinnhietahna hangthiege asepohhenhingte ahuwngche embelung ijang hejaarsehe.
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajiituna aejaargechuw? Hangthienung itthamaate nimbuwnamaaing hinnheruw.”
Amaing hanghin attongnajele, minghuw minghaluing summalhiekaarna Judasching mi ruhpuw virhiege Jesuchuw ahimbeeng abejuhna aanhiipe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Judas, nang ing Mi Sapachuw bejuhteniege lhinvang natega?”
akurna aeongheching amabekhechuw uwmmhuwtaana, emmenieing asiehe, “Thangpa kinnuw ing chiimsii ing togungte?”
Engkaarna engkheing khorpuw elhuwng amine aana atachang atinbongpe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing abesang, “Hevehie menuhmaaruw!” Engkhejege aanachuw viperge amindampe.

Chona Jesu ing khorpuw elhuwngnhingna, Thangnhang een aarhunghe engkhejege upaheching Jesuchuw asuwrnaing ethenghe nhingna arhier, “ouwngruw suwrvang nintetaana, chiimsiele romhor chichuwge ithenggechuw?
Aanasiir ninnuwtho Thangnhang eensungna aeongle ninnuw ing suwrte itemaachuw. Changgechuw hevehie ninnuw ing nimmindeen aphachuwga engkhejege inthim pirthang apung phachuwge!”
Chona emmenieing Jesuchuw suwrhege, engkhejege khorpuw elhuwng eensuuwngte arhiepehe. Changgechuw Piter ing endaana, raarkhena aanhuw ajiihe.
Emmenieng tebouh nachin mhee mintthehege enngule Piterje engkaarna aeong.
Chale mhee elengnaching nepenuw mine engkheching amhuwche, ibeerge anhingna arhier, “Heve pesarhie amathoh enrhiega.”
Changgechuw amaing rhumaage arhier, “nepenuw, kieing amachuw minghuwmaang.”
Uwmphege lintaang mi engkheing mhuwge arhier, “Nangje engkaarna engkhegechie.” Changgechuw Piter ing arhier, “Pesar nang, kiemaaging!”
Chona hirring engkhevaa enhuwte mi engkheing iperpaaing arhier, “Atatah heve pesarhie amathoh enrhiegehe, attongje Galili tenaga.”
Changgechuw Piterching arhier, “Pesar nang, nang ing narhierhie kieing minghuwmaaing!”
Thangpa ing vaanlehge Piterchuw aabiir. Chona Piter ing Thangpa ing arhier ttongchuw aanthiepe, “Atenie aarkhuwng ing akhuwngmaataang vothum irhumaatenie.”
Engkhejege jungshuwge belung ikiipachin ttaase.
Ate Jesuchuw abechuwhe pesarheching meniehege abeengpehe;
emmenieng amhih ilhuwmhege asiehe, “HINRHIER.” Imbeenhie achuwga?”
Emmenieing lintaang enhimpaa aechamapaa ttongjeng abiihe.
Khuw ahungvaarche, lepaa aapuwhe, khorpuw elhuwnghe, Thiimdeehechin ouwngkonghege waajiir tuvang ichii upahe nhingte arhiepehe.
Emmenieing arhier, “Nang Aantinpa geteniebe, kinnhingna rhier,” Amaing abesang, “kieing ninnhingna rhierjening aethachamaatenuw;
engkhejege kieing siejeningchuw, ninnuw ing ebesangmaatenuw.
Changgechuw Mi Sapachuw ate bettiimniege Thangnhang pirthang atachangna ongvate.”
Emmeniebekheing asiehe, “Chogenieche nang Thangnhang Sapagechie?” Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw ing ninrhierchuwga.”
Chonaching emmenieing arhier, “Enieing heve ithi ing ajii saarkhie lieriivateruw? Enieing anherna aethiecherpe!”
Chonache mibekheching hangniirhege Jesuchuw Pilat mhekungna ahinrhiepehe.
Emmenieng Jesu chuw minlaarhege ahinrhier, “Heve persarhing kinyatihie amamaate kige, eruwngnhingte khachana ipi dage, engkhejege ataaing Aantinpa, Eruwngging atese.”
Chona Pilat ing anhingna asie, “Nang Jehudihe eruwnggechie?” Amaing abesang, “Nang narhierchuwga.”
Chona Pilat ing khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege mi ruwpuwhenhiingna arhier, “Kieing heve mi nhingtena alaar ajiedong tuemaaing.”
Changgechuw emmenieing vihnamhege arhierhe, “heve mihin Galilina betthiimge atenie iphang Judia paambekhena mihechuw minchuwhege iraang abesuwga.”
Changgechuw Pilat ing athieche amahie Galilitenagechie tege asie.
Ate Jesuhie Herod ing apuh ramtenaga atetaanaheching Herodnhingte ahim bethinpehe, chale ama Jerusalemna aeongga.
Herod ing Jesuchuw amhuwche, enhimpaa arotha rhohse, ajiegachiinche amaing apha isihpaa mhuwning atega, ajiegachiinche amaing mee ing atuchemaa bietimna atu mhuwning ate.
Amaing siening ate inhimpah asie; changgechuw ajiidong besangmaase.
Khorpuw elhuwnghe amana thiimdeeheching ataalina eperpaa lhinhege ineerhe.
Engkhejege Herodle raarmiheching siimnahege ameniehe; chona Jesuchuw eruwng pien minserhege Pilatnhingte avonhie avibethinpehe.
Ama enienarahching Herodle Pilatchuw enchaarsehe; ajiegachiinche ayen emmenieje eenrhumaahege aeuwmga.
Chona Pilat ing khorpuw elhuwnghe, upahe engkhejege mihechuw aeenhe,

engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “Mihechuw amamaate aakipa engkhekhangkhin ninnuw ing heve mihie kenhingte virhiechuwge, nimmhekungna atubekhe kibeertaana, nimminlaar bekhehie anhingna ajiidong tumaasing;
Herod jing tuwchemaage kenhingte avibiliga. Atatah ama ithie arhuna ajiidong tuwmaang,
kieing amachuw binningge bethingete.”
Chona emmenieing engkhepang ing uwnghege, “heve mihie besuwruw, kinrotumna Barabbas chuw bethinre!”
(Amabe khuwpuna iraang tuge enkhejege mi atheh taana mikhumna asiihgehe.)
Pilat ing Jesuchuw bethinning atetaana ennhingna ttong arhier;
Changgechuw emmenieng uwnghege, “thingkherlina theh, thingkherlina theh!”
Avaminthumna ennhingna arhier, “Ajiituna chin, ajii aechamaa amaing atuga? Ama mihie thevang echii alham engkhedong teuhmaaing; chonaching binningge bethingete.
Changgechuw thingkherlina athehnaing eperpaa uwnghege aminrangna anhiipehe, engkhejege emmenie euwngheching achepehe.
Hanghin emmenieng anhii enhuw ijiing Pilat ing arhuna ttongtho apipehe.
Iraang abesuwpa mitheh mikhumsungna asiihe emmenieng anhiihe michuw abethinpe, engkhejege emmenieing aadie enhuw ijiing Jesuchuw ennhingte avipeepe.
Hanghin Jesuchuw arhielehe paam engkhetena itheng Sirenetena Simonchuw suwrhege Jesu aanhuw minjiehege thingkherchuw amindumpehe.
Mi enhimpahing embelung ibeeng hege nepenuwheching ttahege aanhuw ajiihe.
Changgechuw Jesu ing vaanlehge ennhingna arhier, “Jerusalem kesanuwhe, kerotumna ttaamaaruw, changgechuw ninrotumna engkhejege ninsitihe rotumna ttaasaruw.
Ajiegachiinche emmenieng rhiervang ichii aeniehechuw thengrimvate, amachuwbe– ‘aekhonghe engkhejege neh reenmaasung atehe engkhejege nedoung amhaarmaalhiedeh nepenuwhechuw enrasie aetthaga,’
Chaleching boungpuwhenhingna irhier betthiimvatehe, ‘Kintaalina jungbou,’ bounghechuw teheniege, ‘emingkhumsaruw.’
Ajiegachiinche emmenieing iaer thinghelina hangchiehie tuhenieche, aettongnache ajiirimche suwvate?”
Engkhejege ichamaa aatu lintaang mi ennhieje inthehnaing amatho enrhiing arhiehe.
Emmenieing losebour ate amhinnaching vatunghege amana Jesuchuw ichamaa aalhanghejechuw engkheing tachangte, engkheing talite, thingkherlina mingkarhege athehpehe.
Chona Jesu ing arhier, “Ikuhpeesa emmeniehie; ajienachiinche ajii atugehe minghuw samaahe”
Engkhejege engkaarna apienchuw seemhege repaa aabiirche.
Engkhejege ineerheching aabiirche, Jehudihe upaheching ennher mingkumhege, siimnahege, enrhier, “Amaing lintaangche karpige; ama Thangnhang Aantinpachuwgenieche athienening engkarsaresie!”
Sepehejechin Jesuchuw siimnahege vahege darkha itheur chii amengeenhe,
engkhejege arhierhe, “Nang Jehudihe eruwnggetenieche nathienening engkarsare!”
Aluchungna hanghin abejiihe, “Hevehie Jehudihe Eruwngga.”
Thingkherlina ithiehaa aechamaa atu engkheing Thangpachuw ejuumpahing arhier, “Nang Aantinpamaagechiekhang? Nataaje engkar ing kinnuwje ikarre!”
Changgechuw engkheching rukuge abesang, “Nangje enghaajeh aelaarchuw iphaga ichii minghuwchiege Thangnhangchuw nattiimaaga?
Engkhejege aeniebe atataa itulina iphaga; ajiegachiinche itubekhelina ipha arhuwchuw iphaga, changgechuw heve mihiebe alaar iuwmmaadehga.”
Chona amaing arhier, “Jesu, nang ing eruwng lepaana natungle eenthiesare.”
Amaing abesang, “Atatah nanhingna kerhierga, atenierah Paradisna kietho onghaavate.”
Amachuw siim rovenaga, engkhejege apaambekhena kholhie pungpha enthum aphamaataang minthimse,
inie elengching lengchemaase engkhejege Thangnhang eenna akharhe pienchuw attimpangna ennhie beshuwge enttiise.
Chale Jesu ing eperpaaing uowngge, arhier, “Epa nanhingte kechipi keminsernapechie.” Hevehie rhierge, achipi abethinpe.
Raarmi elhuwngching amabekhechuw amhuwche, Thangnhangchuw mimpaage arhier, “Atatah heve mihie amaraarchaaga.”
Engkhejege ishuw bekhechuw aambier miruhpuw aeongbekheching amhuwtaanaheching embelung ibeenghege engkesehe.
Changgechuw Thangpatho ouwnghuwbekhe engkhejege Galilitena aanhuw ahinjiihe nepenuwhechin raarkhena nerhege aabiirhe.
Chonaching Joseph ate waajiir aapuwhekaarna upa engkhe, aettha engkhejege dhormo icher pesar engkhe aeong:
amachinbe entubekhechuw arhumaaga. Amaing Jehudihe khupuw Arimatheatena etheng, Thangnhang lepaa ahaajeh engkhega.
heve mihin Pilatnhingte vage Jesu humchuw avanhii.
Ahumchuw amaing aedumge limon ennaarje piening ilhumge, achuwdong arheemaalhie, lhuwng viihge asiih thenna avasiepe.
Ama inie chuw Abethongna iniega, engkhejege Eongnanie abettiimnaga,
Thangpatho enrhiehaa Galilitena etheng nepenuwheching jiihege Thangpachuw ajiekhang arheegehe ate aabiirche.
Chona emmenieing inlihege, abrim ichii pih engkhejege entehphuw thou abethongpehe.
Eongna inienachinbe chaadin enhuw ijiing enja amindepehe.
Hapta amhuwrsuw iniena, yiengphi emmenieng thente vahege abethongbesa abrim ichii pihchuw vichihege thengsehe.
Emmenieng then akhum lhung enlehjohchuw amhuwhe.
Emmenieing emvalhuwche Jesu humchuw teumaasehe.
Hanghin embelung ajalechin mi ennhii elengjeh pien ing enthong minghuw minghaluing empaangna neerse.
Ingeenttiilamtheeng, lolhiete emmhe beluwhhege, chale pesar ennhiiching ennhingna arhier, “Ajietunaching irhingchuw ithiehekaarna ninjongga? Ama hena ongmaa, hangrhingse.
Amaing Galilina aongle ninnhingna arhierkha enthieruw,
‘Mi Sapachuw isiicher aatuhe nhingte peheniege, engkhejege thingkherlina thehvatehe, engkhejege inie anie minthumna hangrhingvate.’ ”
Chona emmenieing arhierbekhechuw aanthiepehe.
Emmenieng thentena inlihege amabekhechuw suwmmalhie engkhehe nhingna engkhejege lintaanghenhingna atongpehe.
Emmeniechuwbe Mary Makdalene, Joanna, Jakob amanuw Mary, engkhejege emmenietho enrhie nepenuw lintaanghe nhingnaje engkhejege aanrhiiphuwhe ttongjiirpahenhingna atonghe.
Changgechuw hevebekhe ttonghie enrhier thathaang ga ichiin aliehe, engkhejege emmenieching thachamaasehe.
Changgechuw Piter ing hangniirjohge then entongte vatense; amaing aluw beluwge aabiirche, limon pienpangchuw amhuw; chona amaing aeente engkege ajii isuwga ichielina aluw liimse.
Ama inienarahching ennhiehechin Jerusalemtena mail sariibekhe endah Emmaus ate khuwte ivasihe.
Emmenieing isuwhbekhelina engkele engkhe ensiehe.
Hanghing entonglechin engkhejege enngeentanale, Jesu ataararah ennhinghege isihaahe.
Changgechuw immhiching aminghuwnamaaing akhumpehe
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw ing hanghin ninsile engkhele engkhe nintonghie ajielinaga?” Emmenieing embelung ijaing nierjehsehe.
Engkaarna engkhe Cleopas ateching anhingna abesang, “heve aeniesungna Jerusalemna ishuwbekhe minghuwluwching nathienening ramkhie isigechie?”

Amaing ennhingna asie, “Ajiijiiga?” Emmenieng abesang, “Nazareth tena Jesulinaga, amabe Thangnhang engkhejege mibekhe mhekungna anong, engkhejege attongna atuche Thangnhang Laarchangpa, Nazareth Jesu khuga,
engkhejege khorpuw ilhuwnghe amana upaheching ajietunaching ithie arhunaing pehege thingkherlina athehhe khuchuwga.
Changgechuw Israelhechuw itinpiwang ichiechuw amaga teungge kimmindeenga. Uwng, hevebekhe taalinaje hangchiehe ishuwhie anieminthumnaga.
Avonhie kingkaarna nepenuw alhehejeng thente enrangpaa wahege kinluw aminliemgehe,
engkhejege emmenieng thenna ahumje teumaasehe, hanghin emmenieng hungkehege humchuw teumaahege Thangpachuw hangrhingse tehege Thangven michierheje immhihrovaamna emmhuwjechuw atonghe.
Kingkaarna alhehheching thente wahege nepenuwhechin arhier ngenge amhuwhe, changgechuw ataachuwbe mhuwmaahe.”
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “Aro; enhuwrhe, Thangnhang laarchangpaheching arhierbekhe ninthachachemaa isur mihe!
Aantinpa in ijachaam hehie khaangniege athanglaarte valhuwwate ate ninthiemaaga?”
Amana Mosinhingna betthiimge engkhejege Thangnhang Laarchangpaheching arhierbekhe aettha ttongjiirbekhena euwmchuw amaing ninnhingna amindangbesaga.
Emmenieing vatungvang ate khuwchuw aannheengle, amaing avonhii sirihvang ichiin atupe.
Changgechuw emmenieng iperpaaing khaamhege, arhierhe, “Kinnuwthoh riihhaateruw, ate kholhieje viese engkhejege therse.” Hanghin vasihege emmeniethoh riihsehe.
Emmenieing theh saana engongleching, amaing talchuw viliege bor pege, amachuw bekhiege ennhingna avipeehe,
Chale immhihchuw lengge Thangpachuw ahimminghuwpehe; chona ataachuw embuwmtena emmose.
Emmenieng engkhele engkhe ensiehe, “amaing inietho isihaale arhierbekhechuw ebelung kaangmaakhang?”
Ama aphanaraaching hangniirhege Jerusalemte inlihege, amana aalhanghe suwmmalhie engkhe hetho ouwngteupohhege,
Emmenieng arhier, “Atataa Thangpachuw hangrhingse engkhejege Simonnhingnaje emphuwngga!” atehe.
Engkhejege lhampuwna ishuwbekhe amana tal bekhiege emmenieing Thangpachuw aminghuwpehgehe atejechuw atonghe.
Hanghin enttongleching Jesu ataararah engkaarna neerge ennhingna arhier “ningkaarna dejiim uwmresie.”
Emmenieing pienghege enttiipaaing ereh kimmhuwga atehe.
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ajiituna enttiigechuw, engkhejege nimbelungriir emmhaaga?
Kikih engkhejege kikhi ebeerruw, kieraraaging, iparnung ebeerruw; ajiegachiinche kebechii engkhejege saruw nimmhuw khangkhin erehhechuw be aeuwmmaaga.”
Amahechuw arhiernhuwte amaing akile akhihhechuw aminthiehe.
Emmenieng enrotha irhohing enthachamaale inning amorle, amaing ennhingna arhier, “aesaaphuw ajii nindeense!?”
Emmenieng enrubesa nga alheh apihe.
Engkhejege viliege emmhekungna asaape.
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “kieing ninnuwtho aeonghaale, ketongbekhekha amahiega, Mosi waajiir ttongthona, Laarchangpahe engkhejege lhah leriina kikhu abejii bekhe shuwh rimvate.”
Chona embelungriirchuw aemhongpeehege aettha ttongjiirtenachuw aminghuwpehe.
engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “Hevehie abejiibesaga, amachuwbe Aantinpaching ijachaam khaangniege, engkhejege anieminthumna ithiehekaartena hangrhingvate,
engkhejege Jerusalemna betthiimniege yaati bekhena ama aromhingna belungrier ahuwng engkhejege isiicher ekupinachuw minjaamvate atechuw abejiibesaga.
Hevebekhe rotumnahing ninnuwhie saarkhiegechuw.
Engkhejege ibeerruw, kieing ninnuwchuw Epa attongneerlina kecheergechuw; chonaching chungtena pirthangching pien imminsermaatang khuwpuwna heongruw.”
Chona amaing Bethani apaang ipha rhiihege, akih aethoge bor apihe.
Emmeniechuw bor apileheching engkaartena, thanvente ajuhduwmpe.
Engkhejege emmenieng Jesuchuw rumhege enrotha aerhohpaaing Jerusalemte hungeenlisehe,
engkhejege emmenieng Thangnhang eensungna aanasiir Thangnhangchuw mimpaahege aeonghe.
Abetthiimpelechin Zelhachuw euwmga, engkhejege Zelhachuw Thangnhangtho eonghaahe, engkhejege Zelhachuw Thangnhangga.
Ama raraachuw abetthiimpele chin Thangnhangtho eongga.
Euwm peebekheje amaing asemga, engkhejege esembesa peese-hechuw ama emveluung asemmaaga.
Anhingnaching irhingchuw euwm, engkhejege irhingchuw mihe lengwaarga.
Lengwaarching enthimna eleng, engkhejege enthimching chovechuw khumchemaa.
Thangnhang nhingtena ajinchiir mi engkhe euwm, aromhingchuwbe Johonga.
Lengwaarchuw mihenhingna saarkhie apeenaing, amabekhechuw ama yaarna ithacha arhunaing ethengga.
Ataachuwbe lengwaar chuw maaga, changgechuw chove lengwaarchuw saarkhie ipeenaing ethengga.
Mibekhechuw amimwaar atataachuw simriipaamna juungge mibekhechuw aminwaarnaga.
Amachuw lolhiepaamna ongne, lolhiepaamhie ama ayaarna asemga, changgechuw simrii ing amachuw minghuwmaahe.
Amaching amihenhingna ijuwngga, changechuw amihechin amachuw ilhaang maahe.
Changgechuw, ama arhuhe bekheching, engkhejege aromhingna athachahe nhingna Thangnhang sapahe engeensuwna pirthangchuw apeepe.
Emmeniechuwbe thiitena inrhingmaagehe changmaanieche sabechietena changmaanieche mi ing amindeentena maaga, changgechuw Thangnhangtenaga.
Engkhejege, Zelhaching lungsiile echumching isiikang ing hum jungeensuwge aekaarna rhingge; engkhejege Amapatena engkhepang asapa athang alaar khangkhing, athang alaarchuw emhuwpe.
Johonching Thangpa khuchuw saarkhie pege hanghin ioung, “Akhu kerhierkha amahiega, amabe kemana aeheongbesaga.”
Anhingtena isiikang lungsiitaalina lungsiichuw iniebekheing iphape.
Ajiinachiinche Mosi yaarna wajiir thongthohchuw pege, Khrista yaarna lungsiile echumchuw ithengga.
Thangnhangchuw achuwdong ing mhuwmaalhie. Amapa silungriirtena ishuw asapa engkhepang ching Amachuw amindangpe.
Engkhejege “nang achuw geehii” ate ashienaing Jehudiheching Jerusalemtena khorpuw hetho Levi heching innhingna avicheerlehing Johon ing abesangnachuw heve hiiga.
Amaing, “Khristachuw maaging,” tege amindang.
Emmenieching anhingna shiehege, “Achuwgechie? Elijah gechie?” Amaing, “Amamaaging” tege arhier.
Aanhuwna emmenieng anhingna arhierhe, “chogenieche, achuwgechii. Encheerhenhingna abesang naing irhierpire. Nataa raraahie achuwging natega?”
Amaing besangge, “Laarchang Isaiah ing arhierkhangkhing ichiin ‘Thangpa lhamchuw mintuwmruw’ tege rampakaarna erur engkhe euwngchuw kieging.”
Ate Pharisi lintaanghechuw cheerhege,
Chona emmenieng anhingna shiehege, “chogenieche, Khrista maagetenieche, Elijah maagetenieche engkhejege laarchangpa maagetenieche ajietunaching chii naluhga?”
Johonching besanghege, “Kieching chiichin chii Keluhgehe, changgechuw ningnuw ing ninmeen huwmaa engkhe ongne.
Kinhuwna thengvang ichiechuw amaga. Ama michuwbe kieing akhikhum rhuw chuw enjoh kie kerowaar uwmmaa.”
Jordon araartena Johon chiiluhna Bethani khuwna heve nonghehie isuwhga.
Akhowaarna amaontongtena Jesu ethengchuw amhuwche anhingna arhier, “ibeerruw, lolhiepaam isiicher irinpivang ichie Thangnhang zousitihie!
Keenhuwna mi engkhechuw thengvate, amaching kiehie inthisehga, ajiegachienche, ama michuw Kemana aeuwmbesaga Ketechuw amahiega.
Engkhejege kii amachuw heminghuw maaing, changgechuw Thangpachuw Israelhe nhingna amindang naing chiite luheingge ithengsaging.”
Engkhejege Johon ing saarkhie pege arhier, “Chipiching vatthuw khangkhin ichiin thangventena ijungttuwm kemhuw, engkhejege choveching ataalina ichuw.

Engkhejege kie amachuw minghuw maaing, changgechuw chii aluhnaing enjinchiir michin kenhingna arhier, ‘Chipiching jungttumniege ataalina ichuw mhuwvang niete, Chipi Enthieng tho chii iluhwang ate chuw ama mihiega.’
Engkhejege mhuw ingge amachuw Thangnhang Sapaga teingge saarkhie kepeega.”
Akhowaarna Johon ing asepoh ennhiitho ihenierhe.
Engkhejege amaing Jesu ashile ibeerge arhier, “Ibiirruw, Thangnhang zousiti hie!”
Engkhejege sepoh ennhie heching attongrhierchuw thiehege Jesu inhuw ajiepehe.

Chona chin Jesu ing avaanlehche emmenieng aanhuw ajiehechuw mhuwge ennhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing ajii ninjongga?” Emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Rabbi, (ama atenachuwbe thiimpuw atenaga,) akhuna nangche eonggechii?”
Amaing ennhingna arhier, “hungruw, engkhejege ibierruw,” Emmenieing vahege aongnachuw amhuwhe, engkhejege chove iniena chin amathoh icheenghaahe; ajiega chiinche chovechuw kholhie pung millie itaga.
Johon ttongrhier thiehege aanhuw ijii mi ennhiena engkhechuwbe Simon Piter anepa Andrewga.
Mensarimna auwpa Simon chuw vateuhge anhingna arhier, “Ingeetinpi Messiah chuw kinteupe.”
(Amachuw Khrista atenaga.) Chona Jesu nhingte hinrhiege, Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nangbe Johon sapa Simongechii, amana Keipha romhing rinvangniete,” (“hevehie Piter atenaga”).
Chove inie aanhuwna Jesu ing Galili sungte shivang ichiin eenthongse. Philipching Andrewthoh Piter ongtaa Bethsaida khuwtenaga. Philipchuw enteuhege anhingna arhier, “Kinhuw ijii.”
Philipkha chove Andrewle Piter ongna Bethsaida khuwtenaga.
Philip ing Nathanael teuhge anhingna arhier, “Mosile laarchangpahe waajiir ttongtho sungna embejiih Joseph sapa, Nazareth Jesukha kinteupe.”
Nathanael ching anhingna arhier, “Nazareth tena ajii ettha isuwh achena aeuwmga? Philip ing anhingna arhier,” “huwng ing ibiir.”
Jesuching anhingte Nathanael ivathengchuw mhuwge akhuchuw arhier, “Ibiirruw Israel tataa hii, anhingna aalaar iuwmmaaga.”
Nathanaelching Thangpa nhingna arhier, “ajiekhang emminghuwgechii?” Jesu ing besangge anhingna arhier, “Philip ing nangchuw ingeen maalhiele nang ing thechang borna naongle kemhuwgechie.”
Nathanael ing besangge arhier, “Thiimpuw, nangbe Thangnhang Sapa gechie; nangbe Israelhe Eruwnggechie.”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, kieing nangchuw thechangborna naongle kemhuwtaanachii nathachaga? Heve ithi eng elhuwngpapaa mhuwvangniete.
Engkhejege Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Kieing atataa kerhierga, heve inhuwna thangven enlangniege Thangnhang michierhe ching Mi Sapa taalina ihangkar ijungttum chuw ningnuw ing mhuwvangninte.”
Aminthumna iniena Galili sung Kanana riekhie ouwngchumna engkhe euwm, chovenaching Jesu amanuwje emve.
Jesule asepohheje riekhie inienaching alaahe.
Engkhejege darkha chii engeenshuwmaa taana Jesu amanuw ing anhingna arhier, “darkha chii uwmmaase.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nepenuw, kieing nangtho ajii ituphuw uwmnekhang? Kerotumna kepungphachuw viemaalhie.”
Amanuwching asepohhe nhingna arhier, “ajiejiegejenie amaing ninnhingna arhierchuw tujehthaaruw.”
Jehudihe ennunu inhuw ijiin minthiingnavang ichii rotumna mon ennhii maanieche enthuwm ikhoh lhuwng aesur kuru chove amhinna chin sehege aeuwm.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “aesurhechuw chii minsiiruw.” Engkhejege emmenieng aesurhechuw awe phanaing chii emminsiikangpehe.
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ateche suwhnung aeriim aapuw nhingte vitharuw.” Engkhejege emmenieng chove chuw imvihthaapehe.
Aeriim aapuwching drakhachii ensuwbesa chiichuw amintinche chovechuw akhu tenaga ichii minghuwmaage, (changgechuw chii aasuwh manehe chingbe emminghuwga,) amaing lerpachuw aeenpe.

Engkhejege anhingna arhier, “mibekhe chinbe abetthiimpehle aettha darkha chii simge miheching engeensuwna aetthamaaseh chuw asimna, changechuw nangbe atele iphang aettha darkha chii kha nasiih jehse.”
Heve abetthiimna amhuwr luwrhiena hehie Jesu ing Galili sung Kanana atu, engkhejege athang alaar amindang, amana asepoh hechin athachasehpehe.
Heve inhuwna amanuw, auw ane, engkhejege asepohhetho, Kapernaumte jungsihege amana inie tepie cheengsehe.
Engkhejege Jehudihe enlennadoh aeriimchuw aannheengtaana, Jesu ing Jerusalemte hangsise.
Engkhejege amaing Thangnhang irumna eenna Sheer, Zou, vatthuwhe, engkhejege sheer aangkhiihe ateuhe.
Engkhejege amaing sherhuw ing ouwnghur romhor chige Zouje, sheerje, aangkheng Thangnhang irumna eentena athor, sheer aangkhiihe sheerjechuw lhiege ashinahechuw chungthii abelupe.
Engkhejege vatthuw ijuwrhe nhingna arhier, “peesehehie lieperuw, Aepa eenhii lerchii taarna een besuw maaruw.”
Engkhejege asepohheching hevehie enjiihbesaga ichii aanthiepehe, “Naeen belung keminlhuw taana kiechuw ememaangvatehe.”
Chona Jehudiheching besanghege ennhingna arhier, “Nang ing heve nonghehie natutaana kinnhingna ajii bietimna emmin thiese chii.”
Jesu ing besanghege ennhingna arhier, “heve Thangnhang eenhii memaangruw, kieing hevehie inie nethumna meniervanggete.”
Aanhuwna Jehudihing enrhier, “heve Thangnhang eenhii aantutaana kum summillie lhie kuru ilhuwchuw nang ing nethumpangna meniervang natega?”
Changgechuw amainche ahum eenlina ittongga.
Ithietena ahangrhingnhuwte heve ttonghie asepohheching aanthiepehe, Thangnhang aettha ttongenjiirle Jesu aettha ttongjiirchuw athachapehe.
Ate amaing minlenna aeriim iniena Jerusalemna aongle lurhiina nong atuhe chuw emmhuw taanaching mi aenhim ing aromhingna enthachape.
Changgechuw Jesuataaing ataachuw ennhingte abelungrier mengam maahe, ajiena ichiinche amaing mibekhechuw aminghuwgehe.
Engkhejege achuw engkheing mi khuna saarkhie apeechuw anhingna ikana uwmaa, ajiegachiinche amaing mi belungrierna ajii uwmme ichii aminghuwga.
Ate Pharisihe kaarna aromhing Nikodemus ate Jehudihe aapuw engkhe aeuwm.

Amamiching Jesu nhingna yenna thengge anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, nang Thangnhangtena itheng aanchuwpa engkhegechie ichii kinnuw ing kimminghuwse; ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing enrhiephuw maaniebe nang ing natu luhrhiinahe hii achuw engkhedong ing itu chemaanie.”
Jesu ing besangge anhingna arhier, “Atataa nanhingna kerhiernaa, mi engkheing vonu enrhingmaa niebe amaing Thangnhang Eruwng lepaa chuw imhuw chemaanie.”
Nikodemas ing anhingna arhier, “Ajiekhang mi engkheing atarnhuwte enrhingvang atega? Amaing avomenhie amanuw vinsungte lhuwniege enrhing chevate?”
Jesu ing abesang, “nanhingna atataaing kerhierga, mi engkheing chiile Chipina enrhingmaa niebe amaing Thangnhang eruwng lepaa sungte ilhuw chemaanie.
Houmtena enrhingchuw houmga; engkhejege Chipitena enrhingchuw Chipitaga.
Nang vonu enrhingvang natega teingge nanhingna kieing kerhiertaanahing naning memormaa.

Thieing arhaang nonumtaate rhaangne, engkhejege nang ing chove ahuwchuw nathiese, changgechuw chove chuw akhu tena ethengga engkhejege akhute ishiga ichie rhierchemaachie, changching Chipina enrhing bekhechuw ichiega.”
Nikodemas ing anhingna arhier, “Heve hehie ajiekhang ensuwh chevate?”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Nangche Israelhe thiimpuw engkhe ensuwh chiige hevehehie naminghuwmaaga?
Kieing atataa nanhingna kehrierga, iminghuwchuw inieng irhiernaa, engkhejege inieng imhuwbesa chuw saarkhie ipeenaa, changgechuw ningnuw ing kinsaarkhii ilhaangmaachuw.
Kieing lolhiepaamta nong nanhingna kerhiergeniege engkhejege nang ing thachamaa tenieche, ajiekhang Thangnhangta nong rhierningche nang ing thachavang natega?
Thangventena ijungttum Mi Sapa chuwmaaniege achuw engkhedong ing thangvente karmaalhie.”
Mosi ing rampana beruwr aathoh khangkhin Mi Sapachuw ithohvang nintega.
Achuw chuwgejenie anhingna athacha michin ittiim inemaa irhingnachuw phavate.

Ajienachiinche Thangnhang ing simriipaamhie changjehmeh aning aminsiise, ichiinche asapa engkhepangchuw apeepe, achuw chuwgejenie anhingna athacha michuw maangmaanie, changgechuw ittiim inemna irhingchuw pasavate.
Atataa Thangnhang ing asapachuw simriipaamchuw waajiir atunaing Simriipaamna ajincheermaaga, changgechuw ama yaarna simriipaamhie ikar arhunaga.
Anhingna athacha michuwbe waajiir tupeemaa, changgechuw athachamaa michuwbe awaajiir ttuhse; ajienachiinche Thangnhang sapa engkhepang romhingna chin amaing thachamaase.
engkhejege waajiirchuw hevehiega, amachuwbe, lengwaarchuw simriipaamna ethengbesaga, engkhejege ama lengwaartenaching inthimchuw aadiesehe gehe, ajiegachiinche ennongtubekhe itthamaaga.
Ajiegachiinche itthamaa atubekheching lengwaarchuw abeternaahe, engkhejege amaing atu enlaarnachuw uwmphuwngvate tehege, lengwaar paangna thengmaahe.
Changgechuw echum atu michin anong atuchuw Thangnhangte ketuga tege aamphuwng naing, lengwaar boumte thengne.
Heve hehie aanhuwna Jesule asepohheching Judia paamte ijuwnghe; engkhejege amanaching Jesu ing emmenietho cheenghege chii aluhhe.
Engkhejege Johon ing Salimapaang Aenonna chii aluhpehe, ajiena chiinche chove amhinna chii inhimpah euwmga.
chaleching Johonchuw rhingkhum sungte thaarmaalhiehe.
Ate Johon sepoh hele Jehudi engkhetho aminthiengna khuna ensiisehe.

Engkhejege emmenieng Johon nhingte thenghege anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, Jordon raarna naanrhiiphuw ama khuna nang ing saarkhie napee mikha ibiir, ama michin mi chii aluhna engkhejege mibekhe anhingte thengnehe.”
Johon ing besangge arhier, “Thangventena anhingna apeemaaniege mi engkheing ajiidong enlhaang chemaa.
Kiehie ‘Khrista chuwmaaging, changgechuw kiehie ama men ing enjicherbesaga’ ketetaa nakhin ninnuw nintaa raraa kha kesaarkhii ensuwgechuw.
Lernuw apha michuw lerpaga, changgechuw niirge attong aronge lerpa aalhangching lerpa irurchuw athietaana arotha enhimpaa rhohsage, chotaanaching kerotha irhoh hie ning chimse.
Amabe hinthivate, changgechuw kiebe jungtavanggete.”
Chungtena ijungtheng amaing aeuwmbekhe taalina achungga; lolhietena amachuwbe lolhietaga, engkhejege lolhietena ttong ing ttongne, Thangventena ijungttum amachuwbe aeuwmbekhelina achungga.
Amaing amhuwbesa engkhejege athiebesachuw saarkhie apeenaa, engkhejege achuw engkhedong ing ama saarkhiechuw liepeemaa.
Thangpa ttongchuw arhuhe miheching Thangnhangchuw atataaga tege chum anamga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing ajicheerchin Thangnhang ttongrhier ittongga, ajiegachiinche anhingna chipichuw eensuwjor apeega.
Amapaching asapachuw aning minsiige euwmbekhe akina aminsernaga.

Achuwchuwgejenie asapachuw athachaheching ittiim inemaa irhing aphape, changgechuw, achuw chuwgejenie asapa ttongrhier aminjiemaa michuw irhingnachuw phamaanie, Thangnhang belung ishie ataalina uwmrimvate.
Jesu ing Johon ithi ing sepoh inhimlhaa semge chii aluhnaa ichiechuw Pharisiheching thiehege
Jesu ataa rarahchingbe chii luhmaa, changgechuw asepohheching aluhgehe.
Thangpaching amachuw athieche Judia ramchuw mage Gelili paamte avonhie engkese.
Changching ichiin Samaria paam ilenniege sivang atega.
Jakob ing asapa Josephnhingna paam alheh abekhiipee apaang Sukhar ate Samaria khuw engkhete vatungse.
Chovenaching Jakob nangkhum aeuwm, Jesu ing ramkhie shige ajahoh taana chove nangkhuwm boumnachin aeong, engkhejege chove chuw pung kuru rovenaga.
Chovenaching Samaria nepenuw engkhe chiithaar itheng. Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Eenphuw chii ipe.”
(Asepohhechuw khupuwte ishahphuw enlie shisehe.)
Samaria nepenuwching anhingna arhier, “nangbe Jehudi engkhe ensuwchiige ajiekhang Samaria nepenuw kenhingna eenphuw chii ennhiigechie? (Ajiigachiinche Jehudi hebe Samaria mihetho ouwngteumaagehe.)

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nang ing Thangnhang kithurchuw minghuwteniebe, eenphuw chii aepere tege nanhingna arhier amachuw achuwga ichii minghuwteniege nang ing anhingna pevang natega, engkhejege amaing nanhingna irhingna chii ipevang atega.”
Nepenuwching anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, ishuwna ajiidong deenmaachie, nangkhuwmhie minthuhpaane, chogeniiche irhingna chiichuw akhutena lievang natega.
Nang kimmapa Jakob chungna elhuwng lhaagechii? Amaing nangkhuwmhie empeega, ataa rarahjeng, asitihejeng, ashierhejeng henahing chii engeenchaaga.”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “heve chii aeen mibekheching avonhii enchii haarvate,

changgechuw kieng pevang kete chiichuw aeen mi bekheching enchii haar uwmmaadehnie; changgechuw kieing pevang kete chiichuw ittiim inemaa irhingna rotum iphuwr chiitaangchuw anhingna hungeensuwhvate.”
Nepenuwching anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, kening ahaarnamaaing engkhejege hevenahing chiithaar avaanamaa ing ama chiichuw ipesare.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “napuwsar vaeening henahing thengruw.”
Nepenuwching besangge, “kepusardong uwmmaa.” Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Kepuwsardong uwmmaa natechuw aetthapaaing narhierse;
ajiegachiinche napuwsar rongameh suwhse, engkhejege atele aeuwmhiebe napuwsar maaga, nang ing chove narhierchuw echumga.”
Nepenuwching anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw nanghie laarchangpa engkhegechie ichiin kemindeen naachii!
Kimmapaheng heve boungnahing Thangnhangchuw arumgehe, changgechuw Jehudi ninnuwbe ‘Mi ing rumvang ate amhinchuw Jerusalem sungnaga nintega.’
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nepenuw, amahie behermaare, heve boungnaje, changmaanieche, Jerusalem khuwsungnaje amapa Thangnhang chuw arum namaa aphachuw viese.
Ninnuwbe nimminghuwmaa chuw ninrumnaa, kinnuwbe kimminghuwchuw kinrumga, amachuwbe Jehudihe nhingtena ikarpichuw aeuwmga.
Changgechuw echum ing arum miheching Mapachuw Chipina engkhejege echumlina rumvang ichii aphachuw ethengje thengse, atelejega.
Thangnhangbe Chipiga, engkhejege ama irum emmenieheching amachuw Chipina engkhejege echumna rumvang entega.”
Nepenuwching anhingna arhier, “Kieing Messiah chuw thengvate ate keminghuwse” amachuw Khrista atega, amaing athengle aangkheng ijiirpeevate.
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nanhingna ttong arhier kiehie amachuwging.”

Chove aphanaching asepohhechuw thengsehe, engkhejege nepenuwthoh enttongtaanaching inning imorhe, changgechuw achuwdong ing amaing ajii ajongga, changmaanieche amathoh ajietunaching aettonggehe ate achuwdong ing temaahe.
Chonaching nepenuwching achii beer mage khuwsungte hungkege mibekhenhingna arhier,
“Hungruw engkhejege kieing ketu ketubekhe kenhingna arhier mi pesar chuw ibiirruw, amahie Khrista chuwmaagekhang?”
Chona emmenieng khuwtena jungsuwhege anhingte ivahe.
Apha chaleching asepohhing anhingna thamsahege enrhier, “Thiimpuw, theh isahpee.”
Changgechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing nimminghuwmaa isahphuw kedeense.”
Chotaanachin sepoh heching ensiehege, “achuw engkheing anhingte isahphuw avehchipeegeloummo?”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier “Kieing saavang ketechuwbe kie injiicheer amaing amindeen chuw itu, engkhejege ama anong abetthuw nachuwga.
Ninnuw ing temaa chuwkhang, ‘tha millie inhuwna shaang kumpha vievate,’ ibiirruw, kieing ninnhingna kerhiernaa, ninrovehhie ibiirruw, engkhejege lhelete ibiirnung shaangchuw mhinge ikuum arhupe.
Amana amhuw avorhetho aaeh miching rotha min aalhaangnaa, engkhejege ittiim inemaa irhingte aanra amingkongnaa, changchin aavorle aaehheching enrotha rhohaavatehe.
Ajiegachiinche henahing, engkheching amhuw avor, engkheching akuumnaa atehie echumga.
Ningnuw ing ninnuummaalina akuumnaing kieng ninnuwchuw kecheergechuw; lintaangheching ijapaaing inuwmhe, engkhejege ninnuwchinbe emmenie nongtulina nimphaga.”
“Kieing kehetu aangkheng amaing kenhingna arhiercherpe” tege nepenuwching saarkhie apee taanaching Samariatena enhimpaa miheching Jesu chuw enthachape.
Chotaanaching Samariana aeongheching anhingna enthengle emmenothoh cheenghaateruw tehege anhingna enthamsaa, engkhejege amaing chove amhinna chin inie nenhie icheeng.
Engkhejege mi inhimseh heching attonglinaching athachapehe.

Emmenieng nepenuw nhingna arhier, “atebe kinthachape, nang ing natongtaana maaga, ajiena i chiinche kinnuw kintaararah ing attong kinthiepe, engkhejege amahie simriipaam Ikarpee Aapuw Khrista taataa chuwga ichii kimminghuwpe.”
Ate nenhie aanhuwna amaing chove mhin chuw abethin, engkhejege Galilite valhuwse.
Ajiegachiinche laarchangpa engkhechuw ataasah alepaa sungna enjasuw phamaase tege Jesu ataa rarahing saarkhie apeepe.
Aanhuwna amaing Galili sungte ahoungle Galilina eong mihin amachuw rukuum enghetuhe; ajienachiinche emmenieje aeriimte thenghege Jerusalemna amaing aeriimna atubekhechuw emhuw.
Chotaanaching amaing chiichuw drakhachii amimvurtaa Galile sungte Jesu ing avonhii ihuwng. Chovenaching Kapernaumna asapa ina phamne engkhe iheong.
Judiatena Jesu ing hunsuwhge Galili sungte hunglhuwse ichii athietaana amaing anhingte itheng, engkhejege Kesapa imindampisare tege Jesu nhingna atham, ajienachiinche asapachuw therong atetaanaga.
Chonaching Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing bietimnahele lurhiinahechuw mhuwmaatenuwbe thachamaatenuw.”
Enjasuw phamnepaching anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, Kesitihie athihmaalhiele ithengpeesare.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Engkesare, nasapa rhingvate,” engkhejege ama pesarching anhingna Jesu ing arhier ttongchuw thachage aeenlham ajongpe.
Amaing ate hanghin ajuwngleching asepohheching aanteuphuwpehe, engkhejege anhingna arhier, “Nasapa rhingse.”
Aanhuwna amaing asapachuw ajii pungphana idam abetthiimga tege ennhingna ashiehe. Emmenieng anhingna enrhier, “ajennie pungpha siimna arhiithengching abethinga.”
Chotaanaching chovechuw Jesu ing anhingna “nasapa rhingse” tege arhier pungphanarim chinga ichii amapa ching aminghuwpe, engkhejege ata rarahing, aeengkuw apum ing athachapehe.
Amahie Jesu ing Judia paamtena engkege bietimna amenhiena atuchuwga.
Chove inhuwna Jehudihe aeriim engkhe uwmge Jerusalemte ihangshi.
Ate Jerusalemna Zou eengkhaar ate boumna phum engkhe aeuwm. Hebru ttong ing amachuw Bethesda atega. Amachuw ittumna rongameh aeuwmga.
Ama amhinnaching inahe, khibonghe, suwr ing akihe inhimpah hechuw ithenggehe.
Apha engkhe engkhe naching thangven michier juttumge aachohleching mensang chiite embuwrniebe inahechuw idamga.
Chove mhinnaching kum sumthum malhie eriihmeh isuwr mi engkhe emve.
Ama michuw apha ishipaa entorga atechuw Jesu ing mhuwge, chale amaing anhingna arhier, “idamdoh naadiega?”
Inaching besangge, “Thiimpuw, chii aanlaale phumte irhievang ichii mi uwmmaage, engkhejege ttumning keteche kemana milintaanging ikhin chaaga.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Hangniir ing najaarna idum ing shi.”
Engkhejege sinsohna chove pesarchuw damse, engkhejege ajaarna idumge ishi; ama iniechuwbe eongna iniega.
Chotaanaching Jehudi hing idam minhingnaching enhier, “hevehie eongna iniega, najaarna naadumhie waajiir ing rhumaa.”
Changgechuw amaing anhingna abesang, emmindam amaching, “najaarna idum ing shire” tege kenhingna arhierga.
Chonaching emmenieng anhingna asiehe, “najaarna idum ing nakhi ing shire entemichuw achuwga?”
Engkhejege idam michin ama aandam michuw achuwga ichii minghuw chemaase; ajiegachiinche chove mhinnachin mi aenhim aongpohtaana Jesube empimdohse.
Aanhuwte Jesu ing amachuw Thangnhang irumna eenna teuhge anhingna arhier, “Ibiir, nang damsechie, isiicher nong tureemaa, changmaaniebe aettha maaseh engkhe nataalina shuhvate.”
Amaing engkege, amindampeechuw Jesuga tege Jehudihenhingna arhierpe.
Heve linahing Jehudiheching Jesuchuw ijachaam apina atupehe, ajiegachiinche hevehie eongna iniena atutaanaga.
Changgechuw Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “Kemapaing atele phana nong atunaa, engkhejege kiejeng ketuna.”
Chotaanaching Jehudihing Jesuchuw thehte tehege enjong sesehpe, ajiegachiinche amaing eongna iniepangchuw bekhiemaage Thangnhangchuw ama amapaga tege ataachuw aminttimtaahnaga.

Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Kieng ninnhingna atataaing kerhierga, Amapaing atuchuw amhuw maaniege Asapa ataa saaing ajiidong itu chehmaa; ajienachiinche Amapaching atuchuw mhuwge Amapaing atubekhechuw Asapajeching chang ngengeh atunaa.
Ajienachiinche a Mapaching A Sapachuw aning minsiige, amaing atubekhe mindangge, ningnuw ing ninluw rhiinavang ate heve hehie ithiseh Amapaching nonghechuw anhingna minthievate.
Ajiegachiinche ithiehechuw A Mapaching minrhingge, aminrhing khangkhin ichiin asapajeching pening atehenhingna rhingriechuw apeega.
A Mapaching achuwdong waajiir tumaa, changgechuw waajiirtuvang ichiibekhe asapachuw pege waajiir amintuga.
Amapachuw engeeja khangkhing A Sapajechuw mi bekheching ijavang ategehe. Achuw engkheing A Sapachuw ijamaa niebe A Machuw ajinchiir Amapaje aajamaagehe.

Kieng ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, kettong aronge, engkhejege kiechuw injincheer ama athacha michin ittiim inemaa irhingchuw phasavate, amaing waajiirna emvemaanie, changgechuw ithie tena irhingte enlense.
Aatataa ninnhingna kerhierga, ithieheching Thangnhang A Sapa iruwr thievang ate aphachuw eviega, engkhejege aathie emmeniechuwbe rhingvatehe.
Ajiigachiinche A Mapa nhingna irhing aeuwm khangkhing; Amapaching A Sapa nhingteje irhingchuw uwmresie tege apeepe.
Chona Mi Sapa aansuwtaana waajiir itunachuw apeega.
Hevenahing ning memour maaruw, ajiegachiinche then sungna aeonghe ching aarur thievang ente aphachuw ahimphaga; chaleching athen athenna aeongbekheching aarur thieniege,
ittha atuheching irhingnate ahangrhing leheching, itthamaa atucheching waajiir itunaching envevatehe.

“Kii Kethienening ajiidong itu chehmaang, kethie inhuw ijiin waajeer ketuga, kii kewaajiirhie ata taaga, kie kethienening kemindeen inhuw ijiin tumaaing, changgechuw enjinchiir Ke Mapaing amindeen inhuw ijiin ketuga.
“Kieng ketaasaa rotum saarkhie peningbe, kesaarkhiihie echummaaga.
Kie kekhuhie saarkhie apee lintaang engkhe uwmne, engkhejege amaing kekhulina apee saarkhiechuw atataa ga ichii keminghuwse.
Ningnuw ing Johon nhingte mi nincheer, engkhejege amaing atataa khuna saarkhie apeega.
Kieng minhingtena saarkhie ilhaangmaaing, engkhejege ninnuw ing ikarpeenachuw nimphanaing kieng hevehehie ninnhingna kerhierga.
Amabe elengjeh engkhejege ittuwngjeh lengwaar engkhega, ninnuw ing apha amongti rotumna alengwaarna chin rotha erhoh ningeediega.
Changgechuw Johonchuw itheeng elhuwng kettong aminjaam uwmne. Abetthuhna nong kepee amaching kiechuw Ipaing enjicheerga atechuw saarkhie kepeega.
Engkhejege enjicheer Mapajeng kekhuhie saarkhie apese. Ningnuw ingche atihledong aarurje thiemaalhiechuw,
Ama attongje nimbelungriirna cheengchehmaa, ajiegachiinche amaing ajincheerchuw ninthachamaaga.
Ningnuw ing enthiing thiimjiina ninjongnaa, ajiegachiinche chove sungnaching ittiim inemaa irhing uwmne ichiin nimmindeenna, chovehechuw kekhulina saarkhie empeeechuwga.
Ningnuw ing irhing iphana rotum kenhingte thengning temaachuw.
“Kieing mihenhingtena enjasuwh ilhaangmaaing,
changgechuw ninrierna Thangnhang ningsie inthinmaa ichii keminghuwse.
Kieng Ipa romhingna ithengging, engkhejge ningnuw ing kiechuw eelhaangmaa chuw; leentaang engkheing ataasah romhingna thengniebe ningnuw ing amachuw ilhaangvangninte.
Thangnhang nhingtena engkhepang itheng empaanachuw jongmaachuwge, engkhele engkhe empaana ningeediechuw ajiekhang ninnuwng ithachacheh vang nintega?
Kieng ninnuwchuw Ipa nhingna aeminlaarvate ichiin mindeenmaaruw, ningnuw ing ninthacha Mosi khing ninnuwchuw emminlaarpe.
Ajiegachiinche, ningnuw ing Mosi chuw ninthacha geniebe kieje ithachavang nintega, ajiegachiinche amaing kekhuhie abejiibesaga.
Changgechuw amaing abejiichuw ninnuwng thacha maade tenuwche ajiekhang ninnuwng kettong rhierhechuw thachavangninte?”
Heve aanhuwna Jesu ing Tiberia rimchieje ate Galili rimchie araarte hungsise.
Mi inhimpah aruhpuw ing aanhuw ajiihe, ajienai chiinche amaing inahe taalina lurhiina atu chuw amhugehe.
Jesu ing boung taalite hangkarge, engkhejege chove taalinaching asepohhetho ongsehe.
Chaleching Jehudihe enlennadoh aeriimchuw innheengtongga.
Engkhejege Jesu ing amhe mingkenge aabiirche mi inhimpahching anhingte ivachuw mhuwge, chonaching Philip nhingna arhier, “Emmeniehing shavang ente ishahphuw akhutena inieng ilievang aetega?”
Ama ttongchuw ama minsiemnaing arhierga, ajienachiinche amaing ajii tuvang atega ichii chuw ataasaaing aminghuwga.
Philip ing anhingna abesang, emmenie bekheing tepieter shahejenie tha kuru ashuwmin sheerching ishahphuw eelietaana ouwngsuwhmaanie.
Asepohhe Kaarna engkhe, Simon Piter nepa Andrew ing anhingna arhier,
“Gehutal ronga engkhejege nga ennhie ideen pesarti hena ongne; changgechuw mi hangjehmeh ching ajii tunavate?”
Jesu ing arhier, “Mihehie mengongruw.” Amhinnaching phuwr inhimpah imhuwng engkhejege ongsehe. Pesarpang mi chiing rongagehe.
Engkhejege Jesu ing talchuw vihliege amaing Thangnhangte amimpaa nhuwna aeonghe bekhena aansuwnaing asepohheching asim pehe. Ama khangkhing ngajechuw asimpeepehe.
Emmenie emvin emva aanhuwna amaing asepohhe nhingna arhier, “Abelhie akiir ahaar bekhekha mingkongruw, ajiidong emmomaaresie.”
Engkhejege Gehu tal ronga ensaahna abelhie akiirahaarchuw beluh summalhie ennhii aminsiipehe.
Aanhuwna Jesu ing atu bietimna chuw aamhuwhe pesarheching enrhier, “Hevehii simriipaamna juwngvang ate laarchangpa chuw rarahga.”
Chaleching emmenieing thengheniege amachuw hareer ing eruwng mimvierong atena ichii aminghutaana Jesu athienenpang ing impeemse.
Ate kholhie ahungvieche asepohhing rimchie entongte ttumsehe.
Ruwkuwngsungte karhege Kapernauwm entongte rimchie, engkhejege jungminthimge, chaleching Jesu ennhingte hungthengmaase.
Thie iperpaa arhaangtaana rimchiechuw ennuhse.
Chotaanaching emmenieng mail ouwngthum changmaanieche milliebekhe ruwkuwng enghinghurle Jesu ing rimchie taalina akhi ing hungshige ruwkuwngching engeenheeng sesehchuw emmhuwche ittisehe.
Changgechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “kieging ittemaaruw.”
Aanhuwna emmenieng Jesuchuw belung aengam ing ruwkuwng sungte emminlhuwpe, engkhejege aniekungna emmenieng vatungnavang ente ramnaching ruwkuwngchuw tungse.

Akhowaar iniena rimchie araarna iniir miheching sepohheching entuung ruwkuwng engkhepangchuw maaniege lintaang ruwkuwng uwmmaase, engkhejege sepohheching Jesutho ruwkuwngchuw tuungmaahe, changgechuw sepohhepang shisehe ichii aminghuw.
Changgejenie Thangpa ing amimpaa aanhuwna tal enshaa chove mhin akurna Tiberias tena lintaang ruwkuwng hechuw itheng.
Chotaa nachin Jesu ing asepohhechuw chove mhinnachin ongmaasehe ichii chuw miheching amhuwtaana emmenieje ruwkuwng tounghege Kapernaumte Jesu ijong ishihe.
Emmenieing Thangpachuw rimchie araarna vaphahege anhingna arhierhe, “Thiimpuw, ateele heve nahin ithenggechie?”
Jesu ing ennhingna abesang, “Atataaing ninnhingna kerhierga, ningnuw ing bietimna hechuw nimmhuw taana enjongmaagechuw, talchuw shachuwge nimvin avataanachin enjonggechuw.

Maangvang ichii aeshaa een rotumma nuwmmaaruw, changgechuw Mi Sapaching ninnhingna aepevang ate ittiim inemaa irhing imimphavang ate ishahphuw rotumna chin nuwmruw, ajienachiinche Amapa Thangnhang ing ataalina chum anampe.”
Chonaching emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Thangnhang nonghechuw itu arhunaing kinnuw ing ajii tuvang kintega?”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “Thangnhang ing ajinchiir ama ninthachachuw Thangnhang nongga.”
Chotaanaching emmenieng anhingna arhier, “changgenieche kinnuw ing mhuwnungge ithacha arhuna ajii bietimna mindangvang niete? Ajii nong nang ing tuvang natega?
Kimmapa kimmapuw ing rampana mana enshaahe; hevehie hanghin enjiibesaga, Amaing thangventena ishahphuw tal apeegehe.
Chona Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Kii ing ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, Mosi ing ninnuchuw thangventena ishahphuw chuw impeemaaga, changgechuw kemapaching thangventena atataa talchuw impeega.
Ajiegachiinche thangventena chuw simriipaamna irhingna injipee amachuw Thangnhang tal chuwga.”
Emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, aphabekhena heve talchuw ipesare.”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “kiehie irhingna talchuwging, kenhingte itheng amachuw avin ttaammaadehnie, engkhejege kie enthacha bekheching ateeledong achii haarmaanie.
Changgechuw kieing ninnhingna kerhierga, ningnuw ing kiechuw emmhuw pechuw, engkhejege ithachamaasechuw.
Epaching empee bekhechuw kenhingte thengvate, engkhejege kenhingte itheng amachuw kiing thourmaaning.
Ajienachiinche kieing kemindeenchuw itunaing ethengmaaging, changgechuw kiechuw injiicheer amaing amindeen itunaing ijungttumging.
Engkhejege hevehie kiechuw enjinchiir Aepaching amindeenchuwga, amachuwbe amaing impeebesa bekhechuw attuhna iniena chove chuw avonhie minrhingvanggete.

Engkhejege hevehie kii enjinchiir amaching amindeenchuwga, ichiinche Asapachuw amhuwbekhe, engkhejege anhingna athacha bekheching ittiim inemaa irhing phavate, engkhejege attuhna inienaching amachuw minrhingvanggete.”
Chona Jehudihing ataalina ttong embelumpe. Ajienachiinche amaing arhier, “Kiehii thangventena ijungttum tal chuwging.”
Emmenieng arhier, “Amahie inieng amapa amanuw iminghuw Joseph sapa Jesu khamaagekhang? Ajiikhang ateche amaing arhierga, ‘Kii thangventena ijuwngging.’ ”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “Ninnajeer sungna beloum bourmaaruw.
Kie enjichiir Amapaching avikimaaniege mi engkhedong ing kenhingte itheng chehmaanie, engkhejege attuhna iniena kieng ama chuw minrhingvanggete.
Hevehii laarchangpahe thiimjiina enjiiga, engkhejege emmeniechuw Thangnhang ing minchuwvatehe. Achuw chuwgejenie Amapatena thiege aminchuw michin kenhingte ithengga.
Thangnhangtena ijuwngmaaniege achuwdong ing Ipachuw mhuwmaalhie, Amapang ing Ipachuw aminghuwgethah.
Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, athacha minhingna ittiimmaa irhingchuw aphaga.
Kii irhingna talging.
Nimmapa nimmapuw heching rampana mana shahege, changgechuw thisehe.
Miheching shaheniege themaavang ate, thangventena ijuwngttum tal uwmne.
Thangventena ijuwngttum irhingna tal chuw kieging, achuw engkhe ching ama talchuw shasaniebe itiim inemaaing rhingvate. Ama tal chuw simriipaam rotum impee kii kehumhiega.”
“Ama mihin ataa abechiichuw isaaphuw ing ipethievang atega?” Hanghin Jehudi heching eluwpaaing inseersehe.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, ninnhingna atataaing kerhierga, “Mi Sapa asabechiichuw shatenuwge athiehchuw eenmaatenuwbe ninsungna irhingnachuw inthinmaa.
Maangsavang ichii isha een rotum ing. Kebechii isha engkhejege kethie aeen michin ittiim inemaa irhingchuw aphape, engkhejege kieng attuhna iniena minrhingvanggete.
Ajienachiinche kebechii hii atataa ishaphuwga, kethieje atataa eenphuwga.
Kesabechii asha aaeen amaching kenhingna ongne, engkhejege kieng anhingna aeongging.
Irhingjeh Amapaching kiechuw injicheerga engkhejege kieng Ipa yaarna irhing kephakhang khin kie ensha chonaching itiim neluing rhingvate.
Thangventena ijuwngttum ishaphuwchuw hevehiege; Imapa imapuwheching shahege ithiehhechuwmaaga, heve ishaphuw hie asha michin ittiim inemaa ing rhingvate.”
Amaing Kapernaumna aongle hevehie khuwngsangna arhierga.
Chotaanaching asepohhe engkaarna aannhimching amachuw thiehege arhier, “hevehie iluwpaa ttongga, achuw ing hevehie ilie chehvate?”
Heve linahing asepohheching aettonggehe atechuw Jesu ing aminghuwtaanaching amaing ennhingna arhier, “hevehing nimbelung nimminsiihga?” ennhingna arhier,
Chogenieche, Mi Sapaching mensaa aongna mhinna ihangkar mhuw tenuwche ajii rhiervateruw?
Irhing apeechuw chipichinga, humchingbe ajiidong tuchehmaa; kieng ninnhingna kerhier ttonghie chipiga engkhejege irhingchuwga.
Changgechuw ningkaarna athachamaa emvenechuw. Ajienachiinche athachamaahechuw achuw chuwgehe, engkhejege Thangpachuw pedohvang ichiechuw achuwga ate Jesu ing abetthiimpehle aminghuw.
Engkhejege amaing arhier, “chotaanaching kiing ninnhingna kerhierpe, Ipaching anhingna pemaaniebe, achuwdong ing kenhingte itheng chehmaa.”
Chove aphana betthiimge asepoh aannhiming aanhuw avonhii jieluing inlisehe.
Chonaching Jesu ing summalhie ennhii henhingna arhier, “Ninnuwje impeemning nintega?
Simon Piter ing anhingna abesang, “Thangpa, kinnuw ing achuw nhingte impeemvang kintega? Nanhingna ittiim inemaa ttong aeuwmga.
Kinnuw ing thachaungge Kimminghuwse, Nanghie Thangnhangtena Enthiing Engkhe chuwgechii.”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “Kieng ninnuw summa-lhie ennhii kiteur maagechuw khang, engkhejege ningkaarna engkhehbe saitaanmaagekhang?”
Amaing Simon sapa Judas Iskariot khuna arhierga, ajienachiinche amachuw summalhie ennhie kaarna engkheing juwrvang ate taanaga.
Heve inhuwna Jesu ing Galilite hungbevese Amaing Jehudi heching thehte tehege enjongtaana Judiasungna siningtemaase.
Ate Jehudihe khampaa aeriimchuw innhingse.
Chotaanaching auw anehing anhingna arhier, “nang ing natu nonghie nasepohhejeng amhuwnaing heve mhinhie bethining Judia sungte sithaare.
Ajienachiinche atahsaaing endanggete tege aadie mi achuw engkhedong ing ouwngruwruw ajiidongtumaa. Nang ing heve nonghehie tuteniebe lolhiepaamna nataa nathienen mindangsare.”
Ajiegachiinche auw anehe rarahching amachuw thachamaahe.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Keta pungphachuw viemaalhie, changgechuw ninta pungpha chuw viese.
Lolhie paam ing ninnuwchuw ibeterchemaa, changgechuw kiechuwbe embeternaahe, ajienachiinche heve nonghie tthamaa tehege kieng lolhiepaam khuna saarkhie kepitaana kiechuwbe embeternaahe.
Ninnuw aeriimnaching vaamveruw; kiibe aeriim hevenahing atele vamaaning, ajienachiinche kepungpha viemaalhie.”
Engkhejege ennhingna hevehehie rhierge Galilina entaangse.
Changgechuw auw aneheching inghangnhuwdehna amaje enruwruw khangkhin endangludehing aeriimteching ihang,
Aanhuwna Jehudiheching ama aeriimnaching ajonghe, amana arhierhe, “Ama akhutega?”
Engkhejege chove mhinna ama khuna miheching engkaarna ttong embelum, ajienachiinche alhehing arhier, “Ama mihie aettha miga,” lintaangheching arhier, “Changmaaga, amaing mihechuw amamaate arhiega.”
Changjenie Jehudi hechuw enttiitaana achuwdong ing ama khuna endang ing rhiermaasehe.
Ate aeriim attiim rovena chin Jesu ing Thangnhang erumna eensungte valhuwge aminchuwhnaing abetthiimpe.
Engkhejege Jehudihechuw ouwngluw rhiehege enrhier, “Ajiikhang heve mihin tamludehing thimjii aminghuwga?”
Chona Jesu ing ennhingna abesang, “Kieing keminchuwhie ketamaaga, changgechuw kiechuw enjichiir amataga.
Achuw engkheing Thangnhang amindeen tuning teniebe, kieng keminchuw hehie Thangnhang nhingtenagemo, ketaasaaing ittonggingmo ichii minghuwvang atega.
Entaasah tena ittong emmenieng entaasaa empaana ajonggehe, changgechuw ama ajinchiir amachuw amimpaana ajong amachuw echumga, engkhejege anhingna amamaa uwmmaadeh.
Mosi ing ninnhingna waajiir ttongtho impeebesa maakhang? Changgechuw ninnuw engkhedong ing waajiir ttongthohchuw minjiemaachuw. ningnuw ing ajietunaching thehte techuwge enjonggechuw?”
Mi ruwhpuw heching abesanghe, “Nanghie ronham ing entungga! Achuwngche thehte entegehe?”
Jesu ing emmeniechuw abesang, “Kieng nong engkhe ketupe, engkhejege ninnuwbekheng ninluw nimminrhiipe.
Mosiching vintinchuw impeepe, (Hevehie Mositena maaga, changgechuw imapa imapuwtenaga) engkhejege aeongna iniena michuw vin nintinnaahe.
Mosi waajiir ttongthohchuw abekhiina maang aeongna iniena vin tinchuwge, aeongna iniena mi engkhe kemindampeetaana ningnuw ing ketaalina nimbelung isiiga?
Mimhe ibiirnung waajiir tumaaruw, changgechuw atataa waajiir ing waajiir turuw.”
Ate Jerusalemtena mi tepieching arhierhe, “Amahiemaagekhang emmenieng thehte tehege ajongkha?
Ibiirruw, hevena amaing endang ing ttongne, changechuw achuwdong ing rhierchehmaahe, Amahie Khrista raraaga ichii nong aapuh heching aminghuwgehena?
Chang gekhangjenie aenieng heve mihie akhutenaga ichii iminghuwse. Khristaing athengle chingbe akhutena ithengga ichii chuw achuwdong ing minghuwmaanie.”

Amachuw Jesu ing Thangnhang eensungna aminchuwlehe uwngge arhier, “Kiehii ningnuw ing imminghuwsechuw, engkhejege kiebe ketaasaaing ijuwngmaaging, changgechuw ningnuw ing nimminghuwmaa enjinchiir amachuwbe echumga.
Kieing amachuw keminghuwse, ajiena chiinche kiebe ama nhingtenaging, amaing kiechuw enjinchiirga.”
Chonaching emmenieng suwrte tehege enjongpe; engkhejege achuwdong ing ingkeeching permaahe, ajiegachiinche pungphachuw chaleching viemaalhie.
Mi aanhimheching anhingna athachahe, engkhejege enrhier, “Khristaching ajuwngle heve mihin atu atubekhe bietimna hie minthiniege tulhaa vatemona?”
Mi ruwpuwheching Jesu khuna inseerhechuw Pharisi heching thiehege, chonaching Pharisihele khorpuw elhuwng heching Jesuchuw asuwrnaing phamne hechuw enchiirpe.
Chona Jesu ing arhier, “Apha amongnapang ningkaarna aeongging, ama inhuwnabe injicheernhingte engkevanggete.
Ningnuw ing aejongvangninte changgechuw iteumaatenuw, engkhejege kie keongtaate ninnuw itheng chehmaatenuw.”
Jehudi heching engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “heve mihieche iminghuwmaa akhuw mhinte engkevang atega? Greek he kaarna entthehnohhege aeonghe kaarna thengniege Greekhechuw minchuwvang atega?
Ningnuw ing aejong vangninte, changgechuw iteumaatenuw, engkhejege kie keong taate itheng chehmaatenuw,” atehieche ajie atenaga?
Chove aeriim aaluwngpuw attuhna iniena Jesu ing hangneerge uwngge arhier, “Achuw mi engkheing achii haarniebe kenhingte thengresie,
engkhejege achuw engkheing enthachaching eenresie. Thiimjii ing arhier, ‘Kiichuw enthacha asilungriirna irhingna chiiwahechuw luwngvate.”
Changgechuw ama athacha emmenieheching phavang ente Chipi khuna amaing arhierga, ajienachiinche Chipi Enthiingchuw pedohmaalhie, engkhejege Jesuchuw athang alaar endangmaalhie.
Chove arhierchuw enthieche mi ruwhpuwheching enrhier, “Hevehie atataaing laarchangpachuwga.”
Lintaangheching arhier, “Amahie Khristachuwga” changgechuw achuw engkheheching asiihe, “Khristachuw Galilitena thengvatekhang?
Khristachuw David dharatena engkhejege David ing apaarna Bethlehem khuwna thengne tege enthieng thiimjii ing rhiermaakhang?”
Hanghing ama khuna mi ruwpuwhechuw entthenohsehe.
Engkaarna alhehheching suwrte atehe, changgechuw achuwdong ing ataalina kee khiingmaahe.
Thangnhang irumna aarhungheching vaanlihege chale khorpuw elhuwnghele Pharisiheching ennhingna asiihe, “Ajiituna amachuw ninsuwrmaaga?”
Emmenieng besanghege, “amaing atongkhangkhing achuwdong ing tongmaalhie.”
Pharisi heching abesanghe, “ninnuwjeng atataa immemunaching emvesechuw na?
Achuw lepaa aapuh engkhe maaniege Pharisi hing ama nhingna athacha aeuwmgehe?
Changgechuw waajiir ttongtho aminghuwmaa mi ruwhpuwhehie seraap emphape.”
Khrista nhingna mamen ithengbesa engkaarna mi engkhe, Nikodemus ateching rhierge,
“Achuw mi engkhechuw anhingtena ttong ithiemaalhiele ajii atuga ichieje minghuwluing amachuw waajiir ttong ing arhuga?”
Emmenieng embesang, “Nangje Galilitenagechie? Jongruw, engkhejege Galilitena laarchangpa hungsuwh maanie ate mhuwvangninte.”
Chona ingeen eengeente engkesehe.
Jesu ing Oliv boungte ahungsile,
Ama yiengnaching Thangnhang erumna eensungna thengreege, miheching anhingna ithenghe; amaing ongge emmeniechuw aminchuwhe.
Engkhejege thiimpuw hele Pharisi heching naamaa atule aasuwr nepenuw engkhe anhingna enghinrhiehe,
Jesu nhingna emmenieng arhier, “Thiimpuw heve nepenuwhii naamaa atuleching kinsuwrga.
Ate hangchie hie lhung ing deengvang nintege tege waajiir ttongthona Mosi ing kinnhingna chaa adeense; changgechuw nang ing ajii narhierna?”
Emmenieng hevehie minsimhege alaarna ajongnagehe, chonaching hevehie arhiergehe, changgechuw Jesu ing juukuumge, akichar ing lolhiena enjii abetthimpe.
Emmenieing enshiebourtaana amaing hangeenlehge ennhingna arhier, “Ningkaarna isii cher atumaa amaching mensarim lhuwng ing deengresie.
amaing avonhii juw kuwmge lolhie taalina abejii.
Chona emmenieng amachuw enthietaana, upana betthimge engkhe engkheing engke embetthiimpehe; engkhehjege Jesuchuw athienen nepenuwchuw amhekungna iniir ing amaapehe.
Jesu ing hangeenlehge nepenuw nhingnaching arhier, “Nepenuw, akhutegehe? Achuwingche imminlaarsemo?”
Amaing abesang, “achuwdong ing iminlaarmaa, Aanchungpa.” Engkhejege Jesu ing arhier, “Kiejeng nangchuw minlaarmaasingchii; engke, engkhejege isii nong ate betthiim ing tumaah.”
Avonhie Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Kii lolhiepaam Lengwaarchuw ging; keenhuw enjii amaching enthimna shimaanie, changgechuw irhing Lengwaarchuw phavate.”
Chonaching Pharisihing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing nataasahing saarkhie napeena; nasaarkhii hie chummaa.”

Jesu ing abesang, “Kieing ketaasaa saarkhie pekhangjening kesaarkhii hie echumga; ajienachiinche kie akhutena ethengging, engkhejege kie akhute ishiging ichii kieing keminghuwse; changgechuw ningnuw ingbe kie akhutena ithengging, amana kie akhute ishiging minghuwmaachuw.
Ningnuw ing hum inhuw ijiin waajiir nintuga; kiebe achuwdong waajiir tumaaing.
Kieing waajiir tujening kewaajiirhie echumga; ajienachiinche kiehie kethienen maaging, changgechuw kiebe enjichiir Mapatho ging.
Mi ennhie saarkhiehie echumga tege ninwaajiir ttongnaje enjiine.
Kieing ketaasaa saarkhie ipee engkheging, engkhejege kiechuw enjichiir Epaching kekhuna saarkhie impeese.”
Aanhuwna emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Nangpache akhutega?” Jesu ing abesang, “ningnuw ing kieje kemapaje minghuwmaachuw, Ninnuw ing kie aeminghuw tenuwbe Aepaje minghuwvang nintega.”
Amaing Thangnhang eenna aminchuwlehe, heve ttonghehie lerchii anheengna mhinna arhierga, engkhejege mi engkhedong ing ataalina kee khiingmaa, ajienachiinche apungphachuw chale viemaalhie.
Jesu ing ennhingna avonhie arhier, “Kiebe engkevang ketega, engkhejege ningnuw ing ijongvangninte, engkhejege ninnuwbe isiicher nintulina thevangninte. Kieing kinkena mhinte itheng cheh maatenuw.”
Chonaching Jehudi heching rhierhege, “kinkena amhinte itheng chehmaatenuw atehieche athienening enthehgete ategana?”
Changgechuw amaing abesanghe, “ninnuwbe adertenagechuw, kiibe achungtenaging. Ninnuwbe heve simriipaamtenagechuw. Kiibe heve simriipaamtena maaging.
Isiicher nintusungna thesavang ninte teingge ninnhingna kerhierga; ajienachiinche ninnuw ing kiehie amaga ichii thachamaa tenuwbe ninnuw isii cher nintunaching thevangninte.”
Emmenieng shiehege, “nangche achuwgechii?” Jesu ing innhingna arhier, “Aborna betthiimge ninnhingna Kerhier amachuwging.”
Ninnuw khuna rhiervang kete engkhejege waajiir tuvang kete aenhimpaa uwmne, changgechuw kii enjichiir ama hii echumga; kieing ama nhingtena kethiehechuw simriipaamna kerhierga.”
Amaing Amapa khulina ennhingna arhierga atega atechuw emmenieng minghuwmaahe.

Chonaching Jesu ing arhier, “Mi Sapachuw ninnuw ing ningeetho nhuwna kii amaging ketehie minghuwvang ninte engkhejege kethienening ajiidong tumaaing, changgechuw Aepaching kenhingna imminchuw khangkhing kiing heve ttonghie aettongging.
Engkhejege kii injinchier amaing ingeenrhiipuwse; amaing kethienening imamaa, ajienachiinche amaing amindeen nongchuw kieing ketusaaborga.”
Amaing heve ttonghehie arhiertaana, mi inhimpahing athachapehe.
Anhingna athachahe Jehudihenhingna Jesu ing arhier, “ningnuw ing kettonghie thachariim tenuwbe atataa kesepohgechuw.
Engkhejege ningnuw ing atataachuw minghuwvangninte, engkhejege atataaching ninnuwchuw ningvesang ipevate.”
Emmenieng anhingna abesang, “Kinnuwbe Abraham tuti baasiengung, engkhejege achuwnhingnadong mine ouwngsuwhmaa lhieung. Amachuwgeniebe nang ing kinnuwchuw ajiekhang ningvesang ipethievang natega?”
Jesu ing besanghege, “Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, achuw chuwgejenie isiicher nintu ama minegechuw.
Engkuwsungna suwhchuwbe aphabekhena eensungna aeongmaaga, Asapachuwbe ittiim inemaaing aeongga.
Chonaching Asapaching ningvesangchuw ipeniebe, ningnuw ing atataa ningvesang phavangninte.
