Ninnuwhie Abraham tuti baasien gechuw ichii keminghuwsechuw; changgechuw kiechuw thehte techuwge enjongnaachuw, ajienachiinche ninsungna kettong acheengna mhin uwmmaa.
Aepanhingtena kieing kemhuwbekhechuw kemindangga, engkhejege ninnuwjeng nimmapatena ninthiehechuw nintuna.”
Emmenieing embesang, “Abrahamhii kimmapaga.” Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing Abraham sitigetenuwbe ningnuw ing Abraham anong tuvang nintega.
Changgechuw Thangnhangtena ninthiebesa echum arhier kiechuw ate thehte techuwge engjongnaachuw; hangchiehie Abraham ing tumaah.
Nimmapaing atuchuw ningnuw ing nintuna.” Emmenieing anhingna arhier “Kinnuw salam sitimaagung, kimmapa engkhepang uwmne, amachuwbe Thangnhangga.”

Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Thangnhangchuw nimmapageniebe, ninning iminsiihvang nintega. Ajiegachiinche, kii Thangnhangnhingtena jungsuw ingge ithengging, kie kethienensaa ijuwngmaaging; changgechuw amaing kii enjinchiirga.
Ajiituna ningnuw ing kettongrhier mimminghuwchemaaga? Ajienachiinche ningnuw ing kettonghie liemaasechuw.

Ninnuwhie nimmapa diabol tenagechuw engkhejege nimmapaing aadiehchuw ningnuw ing tuning nintenaa. Aborna betthiimge amabe mithega, engkhejege ichumlina niirmaa, ajienachiinche anhingna echumchuw uwmmaa, amaing attongle aadietepang mi amimmunaga, ajienachiinche, amabe mi amimmuga engkhejege mi mimmuna mapaga.
Engkhejege atataa ttong kerhier inhuw ijiing kiehie aethachamaachuw.
Ningkaarna achuwingche kiechuw isiicher atuga techuwge mindangche vangninte? Atataa ttong kerhiergenieche, ajietuna enthachamaa gechuw?
Thangnhang michin Thangnhang ttongchuw arongega. Thangnhang mi ningeensuwh maataana attongchuw ninthie maaga.”
Jehudi heching besanghege, “Nang Samariatena migechie engkhejege ronham nadeense teungge kinrhiermaa gekhang?”
Jesu ing abesanghe, “Ronham ing empuhmaaga, changgechuw Aepa athang alaar chuw keejaga, changgechuw ninnuwchinbe ijamaachuw.
Kethienening empaana kejongmaaga, aajong engkhejege waajiir aatu engkhe uwmne.
Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, achuw engkheing kettonghie minjieniebe ithiechuw mhuwmaadehnie.”

Amalinaching Jehudiheching arhierhe, “Ronham nadeense ichii atebe kimminghuwpe. Abrahamje laarchangpaheje ithiechergehe, changgechuw nang ing rhierchiege, Achuw engkheching kettongchuw minjieniebe ithienachuw mhuw maadehnie.
Amachuw suwhchenieche nang ing Abraham ithii ing elhuwnggechii? Amabe theese engkhejege laarchangpaheje thechersehe; chogenieche nang achuwging natega?”
Jesu ing abesang, “kiing ketaasaa enjaphuw ketugeniebe, kii ing ama ketuchuw ngarhega, Kie Kethang immimpaachuwbe Aepaga. Amachuw ninthangnhangga nintese.
Ningnuw ing amachuw mhuw maajetenuw kiechingbe keminghuwga. Amachuw minghuw maang teningbe ninnuwtho enghaajeng mi kememunaga. Changgechuw kiechingbe amachuw kemhuwse, engkhejege attongje keminjiega.
Nimmapa Abrahamching kii keeniechuw amhuwnaing arotha rhohge, engkhejege imhuwchuw aphataana inhimpah arotha irhohga.”
Chonaching Jehudiheching anhingna arhier, “Nangche nakum sumnga phamaalhiechie, engkhejege nang ing Abrahamchuw mhuwtataa vang niite?”
Jesu ing besangge, “Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, Abraham auwm maalhiele aeuwmbesaging.”
Amachuw arhiertaanaching deengte tehege lhuwng aachuwmpehe; changgechuw Jesu athienen enthurge, Thangnhang irumna eentena taang suwhse.
Amaing hang ahungsiche aberhingle amhee ichubesa pesar engkhe amhuw,
Engkhejege asepohheching anhingna shiehege, “Thiimpuw amanuw ing aberhingle amhee ichuw pesarhieche amaing isii cher atutaanagemo amanuw amapaing atutaanaga?”
Jesuching emmeniechuw abesang, “hevehie ataaing isiicher atu changmaanieche amanuw amapaing isiicher auwmtaanamaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang nongtuchuw ataalina aandangna chinga.
Inie auwmlentaang injiicher ama nongchuw tuvang aetega. yen viedoh niebe achuwdong ing nong itu chehmaanie.
Kiing simriipaamna keonglebekhe kii simriipaam lengwaarchuwging.”
Ama inhuwna lolhiena becherge inuung besuwge amachuw amheena aatehpe.
Chovenhuwna anhingna arhier, “Siloam phoumna vah, namhee vaphiere.” (Siloam atenachuwbe ichiir atenaga) chotaanaching amaing avaphiepe, engkhejege imhuw achebesaing hungeenlise.
Chotaanaching veemchaangna amachuw amhee ichu besaga ichii mamen ing emminghuwheching enrhier, “ongjehge buw anhii kha heve mihiemaaga?”
Lintaang alhehheching enrhier, “Amararaaga” atehe. Lintaangheching be “ama maaga, enghaajehgehe.” atepehe. Changechuw atahching rhierge, “Kieraraaging.”
Emmenieing shiehege, “namheechuw ajiekhangche itthaga?”
Amaing besanghege, “Jesu ate pesarching inuung ing kemheena itege chona Siloamte va ing chaamre itege chonaching amate washi ingge kechaamche itthaga.”
Emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Ama akhutega?”
Amaing arhier, “minghuw maaing.”
Emmenieng mamenna amhee ichu chuw Pharisihe nhingte ahinrhiehe.
Jesu ing inuung ing amhee aminlengna iniechuw aeongna iniega.
Ajiekhangrimche amhee ichuchuw aminthaaga ichiechuw Pharisiheching ashiepehe, chonaching amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kemheena inuung itege amana kechaamche elengga.”

Pharisihe engkaarna lintaangheching enrhier, “Ama michuw Thangnhangtena maaga, ajienachiinche amaing aeongna iniechuw ngaamaa.” Changgechuw lintaangheching enrhier, “Ajiikhang isii cher mi engkheing hangchie luwrhiinahechuw tuchehvang atega.” Engkhehjege engkaarna entthe nohsehe.
Emmenieng amhee ichu minhingnaching avonhii arhier, “Nang ing ama khuna ajii rhierning natena?” Amaing besangge, “Amabe laarchang engkhega.”
Jehudiheching amhee amintthaa amanuw amapahechuw ingeenmaataang pesarchuw amhee chuge idamdohga atechuw thachamaasehe.
Chonaching emmeniechuw shiehege, “Amhee ichubesaing aberhingga ninte ninsapachuw hevehiega? Ate amhee elenghiiche ajiikhangchiinaga?”
Amanuwle amapaching besanghege, “Ama mihie kinsapa raraaga, amhee ichubesaing kimberhingga ichiehie kimminghuwse.
Changgechuw ateche ajiekhang amhee elengga atehie minghuwmaauwng. Amhee aminlengpee mijechuw minghuwmaaung. Ama hangvierse, anhingna shieruw, amaing rhiersavate.”
Amanuw amapaheching Jehudihechuw enttiitaana amahie arhiergehe. Ajienachiinche, Jesuhie Khristaga ichii mi uwmniebe amachuw khuwngsangtena thorvate ichiin Jehudihing enrhuw besagehe.
Chotaanaching aanrhingheching, “vierse, ataa nhingte shiesaruw” ategehe.
Chonaching amhee ichuchuw avonhiena eenhege, “Thangnhangchuw mimpaasare, heve mihie isii cher engkhega ichii kinnuw ing kimminghuwse.”
Amaing besanghege, “Isii cher aatu engkhega ateje minghuwmaaing; kieing keminghuw chuwbe mamen kemhee ichukha atebe kii kemhuwsaape.”
Emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Amaing nanhingna ajii ahetuga? Namhuwchuw ajiekhangche emminlengpeega?”
“Ninnhingna ketongbesaga, engkhejege ningnuw ing amachuw rongening temaachuw. Ajiituna ningnuw ing avonhii thiening nintega? Ninnuwje asepoh eensuhning nintega?”
Chonaching emmenieing ishehege enrhier, “nanghie asepohgechii, changgechuw kinnuwbe Mosi sepohgung.
Thangnhangching Mosi nhingna rhierge, changgechuw heve pesarnhingnabe akhutena ithengga ate chuw minghuw maaoung.”
Chove pesarching abesang, “ningnuw ing amachuw akhutenaga ichii minghuw maajetenu, amaing kemhee imminlengpeepe, hevehie lurhiinapaachuwga!
Thangnhang ing isiicher atuhechuw rongepimaahe ate inieing eminghuwse, changgechuw achuw engkheing Thangnhangchuw amindeen migeniebe amachuw arongepeega.
Simriipaam abetthiimpele betthiimge achuw mi engkheing aberhingle amhee ichubesa mi amhee aminlengpee thiemaalhiemie.
Heve mihie Thangnhang tena maageniebe amaing ajiidong tuchehmaanie.”
Emmenieing anhingna abesang, “Nangbe isiicher ing eelhuwmge emberhingga, engkhejege kinnuwchuw imminchuwgechie?” Engkhejege emmenieing athorpehe.
Amachuw athorpehe ichii Jesu ing athie, engkhejege amamichuw teuge anhingna arhier, “Nang Thangnhang sapachuw nathachape?”
Amaing abesang, “Engkhejege amachuw achuwga Aanchungpa?” Irhierpeere, kieing amachuw thacha gete.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing namhuwpe, engkhejege nanhingna aettongkha amaga.”
Amaing arhier, “Thangpa, kieng kethachana,” Engkhejege arumpe.
Jesu ing arhier, “Amhuwmaa heching amhuwnaing, engkhejege amhuwheching mheechu aansuwnaing, kieing waajiir ketunaing simriipaamtehing ijuwngging.”
Pharisi lintaanghe apaangna aeongheching thiehege anhingna arhier, “Atataa kinnuw hii mheechuhegung?”
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw mheechu getenuwbe isiicher tumaavang nintega, changgechuw ningnuw ing atele ninrhiernaa, ‘Kimmhuwse’ isiicher nintukha uwmjene.”
“Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga eengkhaarte valhuwluing lintaang lhamte hangkarniege Zou riehiin soungte ivalhuw amachuwbe enruwga engkhejege pih aberu michuwga.
Eengkhaarna ivalhuw michuwbe Zou isherchuwga.
Amanhingna eengkhaar aarhungpaching eengkhaar amhongpina; engkhejege ama Zouheching aarur athienaahe, engkhejege amaing ataasah Zouhechuw atah aromhingna eenge taagnte arhienaa.
Amaing atasaa Zouhechuw taang abeshuwle emmana shine, engkhejege Zouheching aanhuw ajiinaahe, ajienachiinche emmenieng aarur emminghuwse.
Emmenieng milintaang aanhuwchuw jiemaadehhenie, milintaanghe irurchuw emminghuwmaa taanaching anhingtena tenpeevatehe.”
Jesu ing heve aminttimna ttonghie tongpihege, engkhejege ajii enrhierpeega atechuw emmenieng minghuw maasehe.
Chonaching asepohhenhingna arhier, “Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, kii Zouhe eengkhaarging.
Kemana ihetheng bekhe hekha ouwngruwgehe engkhejege pih eenruw migehe. Chonaching Zouheching eengeerur thiemaahe.
Kii eengkhaarchuwging, achuw engkheing kenhingte valhuwniebe ikarpi phavate, hunglhuw vasuwniege amana isah een phasavate.
Ouwngruwhechuwbe aberuwnaing amana athehnaing engkhejege amemaangnaing ithenggehe. Kiibe emmenieing irhing aphanaing engkhejege eeveh uwmludehing emphana ijuwngging.
“Kii aettha zou isherchuwging; aettha Zou isherching Zouhe rotumna achipi abethinnaa.
Sheer itaar, Zou isherchuwmaa, zouhechuw atasaamaa amaching imhee ithengchuw mhuwniege bethinge tenne; engkhejege imheeching Zouhechuw suwrge amimpinnaa.
Sheer itaarching tenne, ajienachiinche amabe sheer itaar engkhega, Zouhe rotum ajiidong ing mindeenluing Zouhechuw mage tenne.
Aettha Zou esher chuwging, kezouhechuw kieing keminghuwsehe engkhejege kezouhejeng kiechuw imminghuwgehe.
Ipaching kiechuw imminghuw khangkhin kieing Ipachuw keminghuwse engkhejege kezouhe rotumna kechipichuw kebethinga.
Heve Zou aruh hevehiemaa kezouhe lintaang uwmne; emmeniejechuw kieing hinrhievanggete, engkhejege emmenieng kirur thievatehe; engkhejege emmenieng Zou aruh engkhe, Zou aasher engkhe ouwngsuwhvatehe.
“Heve khuna hin Kemapaing kie aning emminsiihga, ajienachiinche kechipi avonhii aliena ing kechipi kebethinga.

Achuwdong ing kenhingtena iliejoh chehmaa, changgechuw kie kethienening kebethinga; kieing ithinna pirthangje kedeenga, engkhehjege kieing avonhii ilieje kechega. Heve itu kechena kemapa nhingtena keelhaangga.”
Heve ttonghelinahing avonhii entthehlhohsehe.
Mi enhimheching enrhier, “Ama ronham, engkhe adeense, engkhejege aruwthuwh bevihse, ajietuna attong ninrongega?”
Lintaangheching enrhier, “hevehehie ronham adeen mi ttongmaaga, ronham ing mee mhee aminlengkhang?”
Chale aphanaching Jerusalemna Minlhenna aeriim viese. Amachuw pharbiega.
Engkhejege Jesuchuw Solomon tebuh ate Thangnhang irumna eensungna aamverle.
Chale Jehudiheching iherpohhege hanghing arhierhe, “Nang ing kinnuchuw apha achinchaa kinning memorvang natega? Khristagechiimo Khrista maagechie kinnhingna atataaing irhierpeere.”
Jesu ing arhier, “Kiichinbe kerhierpeesagechuw, changgechuw ningnuw ing ithachamaasechuw. Kemapa romhingna ketu nonghehing kesaarkhii apeega.
Changgechuw ningnuw ing thachamaachuw, ajienachiinche ninnuw kezouhe kaarna emvemaachuw.
Kezouheching kirur athiegehe, kieing emmeniechuw keminghuwgehe, engkhejege emmenieing kinhuw ajiegehe.
Engkhejege kiing ittiim inemaa irhingnachuw kepeegehe, emmenie atihledong maangmaahenie, engkhejege achuwdong ing kekihtena emmeniechuw ishihmaadehnie.
Kenhingte impeesaa kemapaga amachin aeuwmbekhe taalina elhuwnga, engkhejege kemapa kihtena emmeniechuw ishihjoh chehmaanie.
Kemapale kii engkhepanggung.”
Jehudiheching Jesuchuw deengte tehege lhung aachuwmreepehe.
Jesu ing abesanghe, “Kemapa nhingtena aetha nong aenhimpaa ninnhingna kemindangpe. Chove nonghe khunaching ideengvang nintega?”

Jehudiheching embesang, “nong aettha namindangtaana deenggechii kintemaaga, changgechuw Thangnhanglina ichaamaa ing nattongtaanaga; engkhejege nang ing mee engkheing uwmchiige nataasaaing Thangnhang naansuwtaanaga.”
Jesu ing abesang, “Ninnuw nimwaajiir ttongtho sungnaching inthin, kieing kerhierga, ninnuwhie legechuw, tege enjiimaakhang?
Thangnhang ttong ithengbesa nhingna emmeniechuw legehe tenieche, aettha ttongjiirchuw bekhiechemaa.
Kiehii Thangnhang sapaging ketetaana, Mapaching aminthiengbesa simriipaamna ajinchiir amachuw ninnuwnhingna Thangnhangsapaging ketetaana nintongga?
Kieing kemapa nong tumaaningbe aethachamaaruw,
Changgechuw anongchuw tuningbe, kiechuw aethachamaajetenuw, ketu nonghechuw thacharuw, amaching Ipachuw kenhingna ongne, kieje Ipanhingna aeong ing ichiechuw minghuwvang ninte.”
Chotaanaching Jesuchuw avonhii suwrte atepehe, changgechuw eengkihlitena enshiehjohge empeemse.
Johon ing ayen chii aluhna Jordon araarte engkege amana vacheengse.
Engkhejege mee inhimpah anhingte thenghege enrhier, “Johon ing bietimna hetumaa; changgechuw heve mi khuna Johon ing ahetong bekhekha atataaga.”
Engkhejege chove mhinnaching mee inhimpahing enthachapehe.
Maryle auwnuw Martha aongna Bethani khuwsungnaching Lazarus ate pesar mi engkhechuw nage,
Thangpachuw riechie thouing itege asam ing akhi aanourpee Mary attapa Lazarus ina khave Mary chuwga.
Chotaanaching asarheng Jesu nhingte ttong bethahege enrhier, “Thangpa, nang ing naning naminsiipaakha naane.”
Jesu ing amachuw athieche hanghin arhier, “Ama inahie ethienamaaga, changechuw Thangnhang amimpaana, amaching Thangnhang Sapa athanglaar auwmna rotumga.”
Jesu ing Martha, engkhejege anenuw, Lazarus hechuw aning aminsiipaagehe.
Lazaruschuw naane ichii athienhuwte amhin aongtaanaching inie nenhii cheengse.
Chove inhuwna amaing asepohhe nhingna arhier, “aenie Judiate avonhie siteruw.”
Asepoh hechin anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, atele raraa Jehudihing nangchuw lhung ing deengte itehege enjonggehe, nang ing amate vonu vasiniete?”
Jesu ing abesang, “Shiem engkhena thang sum alhie ennhii uwmmaakhang? Achuw engkheing shiemna enlhien niebe akhi minsiemaa, ajienachiinche amaing simriipaam lengwaarhie amhuwse.
Changgechuw mi engkheing yenna enlhien niebe akhi aminsiina, ajienachiinche anhingna lengwaarchuw uwmmaa.”
Hevehie arhiernhuwte ennhingna arhier, “eelhang Lazarus jaarse, changgechuw ijaartena abethienaing kii vagete.”
Chonaching sepohheching anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, ama jaarniebe, tthathate.”
Jesuchingbe ama ithie khuna arhierga, changgechuw emmeniechinbe ijaarchuw abethienaing arhierga ichiin amindeenhe.
Chona Jesu ing enthiingkiir ing arhier, “Lazarus theese,
ajienachiinche ningnuw ing ninthachanaing kii khavena eongmaaingkha ninrotumna kerotha rhone, changgejenie aenie anhingte vateruw.”
Thomas ate Didymus amaing aalhang sepohhe nhingna arhier, “aenieje siteruw, atheetaanaching amathoh thehaateruw.”
Jesu ing avatungche Lazaruschuw thensungna nemillie ontorse ichiehie aphape.
Ate Bethanichuw Jerusalemtho ennheengga, mile ennhiebekhe endaaga.
Engkhejege Jehudi inhimpahing Martha nhingte thenghege enttapa ithie khuna embelung ngamnaing emmeneem.
Jesu thengne ichiechuw Martha ing athieche, ama aanteuhphuwnaing taangte jungsuwhse, changgechuw Mary chuwbe sungna ongjehse.
Martha ing Jesunhingna arhier, “Thangpa, henahing aeonggeteniebe kinttapahie themaavang atega.
Changgechuw kieing keminghuwse, ichiinche ateleje nang ing ajii jiigejenie Thangnhang nhingte nahinnhiehchuw Thangnhang ing ipesavate.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Nattapa avonhie rhingvate.”
Martha ing anhingna arhier, “Kii ing keminghuwse, ama-chuwbe attuhna iniena avonhie ama hangrhing reevate.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “kii avonhie ihangrhing engkhejege irhingchuwging, kii enthacha mibekheching, thekhanghejenie hangrhingvatehe.
Engkhejege rhingniege kii enthacha mi bekheing themaadehnie. Hevehii nang ing nathachanaa?”
Amaing anhingna arhier, “Uwng, Thangpa, kieing nanghie juwngvang ichii Thangnhang Sapa Khristagechii ichii kethachanaachie.”
Ama ttongchuw abetthunhuwte engkege anenuw Marychuw eenge arhier, “Thiimpuwkha henahing ongna, nanghie eengeennaa.”
Engkhejege amaing amachuw athietaanaching enrang ing hangneerge anhingte vase.
Chaleching Jesuhie khuwsungte valhuwmaalhie. Martha ing aantuwphuw mhinnaching aeongjega.
Eensungnaching belung mengamna aarhunghe Jehudihe aeongheching Marychuw hangneerjohge ijungsuwjohchuw amhuwheche then korte ittaa ivaga tehege emmeniejeng ajiepehe.
Chonache Maryching Jesu ongtaa amhinchuw vatungge, Thangpachuw amhuwche akhiboumna jotiehge anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, nang ing hevenahing aeonggeteniebe kettapahie themaavang atega.”
Mary ittale aanhuw ijiihe Jehudihe ittachuw Jesu ing amhuwche aenhimpaa anhaar khamge achipi jage aning isie.
Amaing arhier, “Lazaruschuw akhuna nimmintorga?” emmenieing anhingna arhier, “vatheng ing eebierpeesare.”
Jesu ing ittaa.
Aanhuwna Jehudihing enrhier, “Ibiirruw amaing ajehchaa aning aminsiihga!”
Changgechuw alhehheching enrhier, “Mheechu amhee aminlengpee heve mihin heve mihie athinamaa itupee achehmaaga?”
Chona Jesuching abelung suhge thenkungte ivatheng, chovechuw lhoungkuw engkhega, amana ataalina lhungpeeing akamga.
Jesu ing arhier, “lhunghie liejohruw,” ithie asarnuw Marthaching anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, heve aphanahinbe ataachuw menhamsiete, ajienachiinche ama athina inie neminliese.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nang ing thachateniebe Thangnhang athang alaar mhuwrim vangniete teingge nanhingna kerhiermaaga?”
Chonaching emmenieing lhungchuw enliejohpehe. Engkhejege Jesu ing amhee chungte mingngenge arhier, “Aepa nang ing kiechuw erongeteniebe,
nang ing aphabekhena enronge pee naachii, changgechuw nang ing kiehie enjinchiirgechie atehie kebuwmna ruhpuw aeniir hehing kiehie nang ing injinchiirga atehie thachaheresie.”
Amaing hevehie arhiernhuwna engkaangpaa irur ing iuwng, “Lazarus jungsuw.”
Engkhejege ithiechuw akee akhi pien ing ingeelhuwmnathoh jungsuwhse, engkhejege amhena lokhaang ing emveem. Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “bejohpinung siresie.”
Chonaching Marynhingte thenghege, Thangpa ing atupeehechuw ibiirhege Jehudi inhimpahheching athachapehe;
changgechuw lintaangheching Pharisihenhingte thenghege Jesu anongtuchuw atongpehe.
Chonaching khorpuw aalhuwnghele Pharisihing laaluh engkonghege enrhier, “Ajii tuvang aetega? Heve mihin bietimna nong aenhimpaa atunaa.
Anieng amahii athienen bethinmeniebe mibekhehing amahii thacharong atena, engkhehjege Rom miheng thengheniege aepaamle aeyaati aannhim memaangchervatehe.”
Chove kumnaching kourpuw elhuwng ensuwh aromhing Kaiaphas ate engkaarna engkheching ennhingna arhier, “ninnuw ajiidong minghuw maachuw!
Mi engkheing mi aenhimpa rotum aachang deenniege aethie chin yaati apumhii maangmaavang atechuw tthalhaane ichiehie ningnuw ing minghuwmaachuw.”

Changgechuw heve ttonghie ataasah rotumna arhiermaaga, changgechuw amahii chove kumnaching khorpuw aalhuwng avieche; Jesu ing yaati apum rotoumna thevang atechuw amaing asuw maalhiele aminthangbesaga.
engkhehjege ama zaati rotumna pangmaage, changechuw entthehnongbesahe Thangnhang sitihechuw engkhepang ing amingkongnaga.
Changtaanaching ama iniena betthiimge emmenieng Jesuchuw athehnaing entanasehe.
Changtaanaching Jesu ing Jehudihe Kaarna endang ing bevemaase, changgechuw amaing Ephraim ate apaam rampathoh ennheeng naching asepohhetho cheengsehe.
Ate Jehudihe Enlennadoh aeriimchuw ennheengge, engkhejege mee aenhimpaaing entaa imminthiengnaing Enlennadoh aeriim atumaalhiele empaamtena Jerusalemte hangsehe.
Emmenieing Jesuchuw jonghege engkhele engkhe ensiehege Thangnhang irumna eenna enniir belham ing aettonghe, “ajii nimmindeenna? Ama aeriimna hing thengvatemo?”

Ayen khorpuw ilhuwnghe engkhejege Pharisi heching ttongthoh apeebesagehe, amachuwbe, Thangpachuw akhuna aeongga atechuw engkheing minghuwniebe, emmenieing Jesuchuw asuwrnaing ama miching minthiepeevang atega.
Aanhuwna Jesu ing Aminlenna aeriim vievang ate inie neruh avehle amaing ithietena aminrhing Lazarus ongna khuw Bethani te thengse.
Chove amhinnaching emmenieing kholhie imhaar enrothangpe, engkhejege Martha ing sepa atu, engkhejege Lazaruschuw amathoh aeonghaahe kaarna engkhega.
Aanhuwna Mary ing amin aenhimpaa nark ate entehphuw riechie thou sher tangkhe vihchige Jesu khichuw aatehpeepe, engkhejege riechie thou aberimching chove eenchuw siihse.
Chaleching asepohhekaarna amachuw juwrvang ate Simon sapa, Judas Iskariot ing arhier,
“Ajiituna heve entehphuw thouhie dinnaar chathumbekhena juwrmeniege sharahe nhingte ipeemaaga?”
Amaing hevehie sarahe rotum mindeenge arhier changchiemaaga, changgechuw amabe enruw engkhega, amaing sheerthuwng rokeengge ama sungna athaarhechuw alie chaataanaga.
Jesu ing arhier, “Amindeenhie tusaresie kie indimna inie rotumna amaing hevehehie aaumnaing atuga.
Ajienachiinche sarahechuwbe aanasiir aeonghaagechuw; changgechuw kiebe ninnuwtho aanasiir aeonghaa maagemie.”
Jehudihe mi ruhpuwhe chin Jesuchuw amana ongne ate minghuwhege, Jesu khunapangmaage, amaing ithietena aminrhing Lazarus jechuw ibiirte tehege ethenghe.
Chonaching khorpuw elhuwngheching Lazarusjechuw athenaing ttong entanasehe;
Ajienachiinche ama khuna Jehudihe aannhim ing madohhege Jesuchuw athachapehe.
Akhowaarna chove aeriimna itheng mi aenhimpaaheching Jesu Jerusalemte hangse ichii enthietaana,
emmenieing aenhuw thingbaa chisamhege aanteuhphuwnaing vasihege, uwnghege enrhier, “Hosana! Thangpa romhingna itheng Israelhe Eruwngchuw repaa aetthaga!”
Jesu ing sikursiing ati ataalina aeonghie; hevehie enjiibesaga:
“Ittemaa, Zion sanuw, ibiirre, naaruwng ing sikursiing atitaalina ongge thengne!”

Hevehii amuwrnabe asepohheching aminghuw maagehe; changgechuw. Jesu athang alaar aandangnhuwte hevehehie ama khuna enjiiga, engkhejege heve nonghehie miheching anhingna entuga ichii, engkhejege enjiibesaga atechuw aanthiepehe.
Chotaanaching Jesu ing thensungtena Lazaruschuw eenge aminrhingleching aanrhiiphuwhe ruwpuwheching saarkhie apeehe.
Heve linajehing amaing atu bietimna nong atuga ate enthietaanaching mi ruhpuw hejeching ahehaagehe.
Chonaching Pharisiheching engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “Nimmhuwse, ningnuw ing ajiidong tuchemachuw, ibiirruw, simriipaamching aanhuw ajiepehe.”
Aeriim inienaching Thangnhang erumnaing ithenghe kaarnaching Greek mi tepieje emvehe.
Emmenieching Galili paamna aeuwm Bethsaida ate khuwtena Philipnhingna thenghege, anhingna enrhier, “Thiimpuw, Jesuchuw mhuwsaning kintenaa.”
Philipching Andrewnhingna vage atong, engkhejege Andrewle Philip ing vahege Jesunhingna atonghe.
Jesu ing besangge arhier, “Mi Sapa ing athang alaar lhuwngvang ate pungphachuw thengse,
Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, Gehu amhuwchuw lolhiena boniege ithiega chona hangmhuwngge aanrah inhimpah aeuwm. Changgechuw amachuw themaaniebe ama amhuwchuw engkhepang ing aeuwmjehga.
Achuw engkheing arhingriehie aning minsiiniebe chovechuw maangsavate, simriipaam arhingriehie aning aminsiimaa michin ittiim inemaa rhingrie deensavate.
Achuw chuwgejenie kedur lieniebe kinhuw ijiiresie; engkhejege kii keongtaanaching kii kemaneje ongvate. Achuw chuwgejenie kedur lieniebe Epaching amachuw athang ijasavate.
“Ate kerhingrier jase; engkhejege kieing ajii rhiervanggete! Aepa, heve poungphatena ikarsare, Maa hevelinahing heve poungpha phanahing kehimphasaga.
Aepa, naromhing lhuwngresie.”
Aanhuwna thangventena irur engkhe thengge arhier, “kieing athang alaarje keminlhuwngpe, engkhejege avonhie minlhuwng vanggete.”
Chonaching apaangna iniirheching thiehege mi ruwpuwheching enrhier, “Hevehii khuw enrega.” Lintaangheching enrhier, “Thangventena michier engkheing anhingna ittongga.”
Jesu ing abesanghe, “heve irurhie kii kekhuna ithengmaaga, changgechuw ninnuw khunaga,
Simriipaamhie waajiir ituna aphachuw atelega, heve simriipaam eruwngchuw thorvate,
Engkhejege kii, ate lolhietena eethohniebe kiing mibekhe chuw kekurte jikivanggete.”
Amaing heve arhiernahie ataaing thevang ichiechuw ajiekhang thevang atega ate amindangnaga.

Chonaching mi ruwpuwheching Thangpachuw embesanghe, “Kinnuw ing waajiir ttongtena kinthiega, amachuwbe Khrista chuwbe ittiim neluing aeongga, ajiekhang Mi Sapachuw ithoh rimvang atega? Achuwche Mi Sapachuwga?”

Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “Lengwaarchuw ninnuwtho amongpang aeongga, Lengwaarchuw aongleching bevesaruw, amaching inthim ching, ibeluw maanie. ningnuw ing inthimna bevetenuwbe ninnuw ing akhute isigung minghuw maatenuw.
Ningnuw ing lengwaar nindeenle, lengwaarchuw thacharuw, amaching lengwaar sitihe eensuwhvang ninte.”
Jesu ing hevehie arhiernhuwte, engkaartena enthurse.
Changjehmeh emmhekungna bietimna inhimpah tukhangjenie Thangpachuw thachamaahe.
Amahie laarchang Isaiah ing arhierchuw alir asuwnaga. Amachuwbe:
“Thangpa, achuwingche aettongjiir athachagehe,
Engkhejege Thangpa changben chuw achuwnhingna aphuwngpeega?”
Engkhejege hevelinahing emmenieing thachamaasehe, ajienachiinche Isaiah ing avonhie arhier,
“Amaing emmhee hechuw aminchugehe, embelungriirchuw amenhehpehe, Chonaching emmheeing emhuw chehmaahege, embelungriirna minghuwche maahege, Kenhingte hungeen hirmaahege, chonaching kemindammaagehe.”
Isaiahching Jesu athang alaarchuw aminghuwtaanaching hevehie arhierga.
Changjepang suwhjenie mi inhimpahheching, amapangmaage, lepaa aapuheching amachuw athachapehe; changgechuw Pharisihe aamvetahnaching emmenie chuw khuwngsangtena aethourvate tehege rhierjohmaasehe,
ajienachiinche emmenieing Thangnhangtena mimpaana ithi ing miheching emmimpaachuw engeediilhaape.
Jesu ing uwngge arhier, “kii enthacha michin kiechuw enthachamaaga. Changgechuw kii enjichiir amachuw athachaga.
Engkhejege kii emmhuwching kiechuw enjichiir amachuw amhuwga.
Kieing lengwaar engkheing simriipaamna ijuwngging, achuw chuwgejenie kiechuw ithachaniebe enthimna ongmaanie.
Achuw engkhehching kettongchuw thieniege aminjiemaa michuw waajiir tumaaing. Ajienachiinche simriipaamlina waajiir itu ijuwngmaaging, changgechuw simriipam ing ikarpi aphanaing ijuwngging.
Kiichuw enrhumaa engkheje kettongrhier arhumaa minhingna waajiir aatu mi uwmne, amachuwbe kettongrhier raraaheching attuhna inienaching ataalina waajiir tuvate.
Ajienachiinche kii ketaasaa rotumna ittongmaaging, changgechuw kii enjinchiir Ipaching rhiervang kete, engkhejege ttongvang ketechuw ama ing kenhingna ttongtho impeepe.
Engkhejege amaing impee ttongthohie ittiim inemaa irhingjehchuwga ate kieing keminghuwse; amanaching kieing kerhierbekhehie Ipaing kenhingna arhier khangkhing ittongging.”

Ate Aminlenna aeriim ahimphale Jesu ing simriipaamhie bethinniege a Mapa boumte shivang ate poungphachuw viese ichii aminghuwtaana simriipaamna aeong aning aminsiih mihechuw attuhna ipha aning aminsiihga.
Engkhejege kholhie mhaarna auwmleching Simon sapa Judas Iskariot silung sungte Jesu chuw apeenadoh naing diabolching mensarim athinpe.
Amapaching pee bekheh akilite apeega, engkhejege amaing Thangnhangtena ijuwngging, angkhejege Thangnhang boumte shirong ketega ichii Jesu ing minghuwge,
Kholhie imhaarnaching amaing hangniirge apiendier shega, aanhourna pien jiliege adierrhiinna mimveemge,
chona khotengsungna chii jittiirge asepohhe khihechuw aathiina ing enthongse, engkhejege aanhournapien emveemching aanhourpeepehe.
Amaing Simon Piter nhingte ihuwng, Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, nang ing kekhi naatthiiga?”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Kieing ajii ketuga nang ing atele minghuwmaachie, changgechuw heve inhuwna nang ing minghuwvangniete.”
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “nang ing kekhi itthiimaadehvang natega.” Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Kieing nangchuw itthiimaa ningchiibe, nang kietho ajiidong ensuwmaamie.”
Simon Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa kekhipangmaaga, changgechuw kekije kelosehje etthiipeere!”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “entthiebesa miching akhimaaniege itthievang ichii uwmmaa, changgechuw enthiingcherga, Engkhejege, ninnuwbekhe minthiingmaaje tenuw, ninnuwchuwbe minthiingnechuw.”
Ajienachiinche amachuw juwrvang ate michuw aminghuwjehga, engkhejege “ninnuwbekhechuwbe minthiingmaachuw, atega.
Changching ingkhichuw aatthiinhuwte apiendier sherge, enthesaataate hungeenlige ennhingna arhier, “kieing ninnhingna ketuhie nimminghuwse?
Ningnuw ing kiechuw Thiimpuw engkhejege Thangpa entenaachuw ningnuw ing ninrhierhie atataaga, ajiegachiinche kie amachuw rimging.
Hanghin, ninnuw Thangpa engkhejege Thiimpuw kieing ningkhi itthiiningbe ninnuwjeng engkheing engkhe khi itthie peevang nintega.
Ajienachiinche kieing ninnhingna ketukhangkhing ninnuwjeng nintunaing aandangnachuw ketuga.
Atataaing ninnhingna kerhierga, Mineing aapuw chungna elhuwngseh maaga, ttongjiirpaheching emmeniechuw ajinchiirlina elhuwnglhaa maagehe.
Ningnuw ing hevehehie minghuwtenuwge, amachuw tutenuwbe, ninnuw ninrasii tthavate,
Kieing ninnuw bekhe khuchuw kerhiermaaga; kieing achuwhechuw keeteurgehe kieing keminghuwga, changgechuw Ketal asa amaching ketaalina akhibekhong amingkenpe atehie Enthieng thiimjii chuw atungnaga.
Suwhvang ichiibekhe asuwhmaa lhiele ninnhingna kerhierga, engkhejege asuwhjoh leching amaga ichiechuw thacha vangninte.
Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, kieing kechiir michuw arhuching kiechuw ouwngrhuga, engkhejege kie ouwngrhu miching kiechuw enjinchiir chuw arhuga.”
Hevehehii arhiernhuwte Jesuchuw achipi jase engkhejege aphuwng, “Atataa ninnhingna kerhierga, ningkhaarna engkheing ilhinsavate.”
Thangpa ing achuw khuna arhierga ichiechuw sepohheching inning mourhege engkhele engkhe embiirsehe.
Sepohhekaarna engkhe, Jesu ing aning aminsiihpaaching Jesu paangna ivaandii,
Simon Piter ing anhingna achuw chuw atenaga ichii shiere tege anhingna arhier.
Chonaching apaangna ivaandii amamiching anhingna ashie, “Thangpa, amachuwche achuwga?”
Jesu ing besangge, “Kii ing tal lhehkheh pakaanna phuwmningge perong kete amachuwga.
Engkhejege talchuw aphuwmsuwdehna Simon Iskariot sapa Judas nhingna vipege aalhaangche Saitan ing asungte lhuwhse. Aanhuwna Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing tuvang natechuw enrang ing tu.”
Changgechuw Thangpa ing hevehie ajii khuna anhingna arhierga atechuw tebollina aeongheching minghuwmaahe.

Ajienachiinche Juda ing sheerthoung adeengekhage aemhaarlina ikanavang ichii pee iliere, changmaanieche amaing sarahe nhingte ajiekhangchie tepii pevang atega tehege Jesu ing anhingna arhierga ichiin emmenie lintaang heching amindeenhe.
Chona amaing tal alhehchuw phage asaadohpe; engkhejege chove aphachuw yennaga.
Amaing taang asuwhdehnhuwna Jesu ing arhier, “Atelehin Mi Sapa thanglaarchuw endangse, engkhejege Thangnhang thanglaarchuw anhingna endangse.
Anhingna Thangnhang thanglaarchuw endangniebe Thangnhang ing anhingna ataasah thanglaar mindangvate.
Esieng nepanghe, apha amongpang ninnuwtho onghaanemie, ningnuw ing kiechuw ijongvangninte, engkhejege kesitahte thengchehmaachuw teingge Jehudihe nhingna kerhierkhangkhin atele ninnhingna kerhierga.
Kieing ninnhingna aethar ttongtho engkhe kepeenaachuw, ninnuw engkhele engkhe ning ensiihruw. Kieing kening keminsiichuw khangkhin ninnuwjeng engkhele engkhe ning ensiihruw.
Ninnuw engkhele engkhe ningsii uwmtenuwbe havehing ninnuw Kesepohgechuw ichii mibekheing eminghuwvate.”
Simon Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, akhute ishigechii?” Jesu ing abesang,
“Kieing kesitah amhinte nang ing ijiichemaa tenie, changgechuw avaanhuw nang ing keenhuw ijiipehvangniete.”
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, kieing nangchuw atele ajietuna ijii chehmaavang ketegechie? Kiing narotumna kerhingrie bethinvang ketega.”
Jesu ing abesang, “Nang kerotumna narhingrie bethinrarahvang natega? Nanhingna atataaing kerhierga, nang ing kiehie vothummeh ouwngrhu maataang ing aarkhuwng ing khuwngmaanie.”
“Nimbelungriir minjamaaruw Thangnhangchuw thacharuw,” kieje ithacharuw.
Aepa eensungna eongna amhin uwmne, amachuw maageniebe ninnhingna rhierpeevang ketegechuw. Kieing ninrotumna amhin aeongna rothang itunaing ishiging.
Engkhejege kieing shiningge ninrotumna amhin rothang tuningge, keongtaa amhinnaching ninnuwjeng ningongnaing, kie vonu thengningge ninnuwchuw kebumte rhiehvanggechuw.
Engkhejege kieing akhute ishiging ningnuw ing lhamchuw nim minghuwga.
Thomas ing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, nang ing akhute ishigechii ichiehie minghuwmaa oung; ajiekhang kinnuw ing alhamchuw minghuwvang kintega?”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Alhamjechuw, echumjechuw, irhingjechuw kieging; kie yaarna maaniege mee achuwdong ing Ipa boumte tungmaanie.
Ningnuw ing kiechuw eminghuwtenuwbe kemapaje minghuwvang nintega; atebe ninnuw ing amachuw nimminghuwpe engkhejege nimmhuwpe.”
Philip ing Thangpanhingna arhier, “Thangpa, Ipachuw kinnuw nhingna iminthiepeere, amaching kinnuw ing kinning chimsavate.”

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Apha ishihpaa ninnuwtho aeonghaagemie, engkhejege ate ephaing imminghuw maalhiegechii, Philip? Kiechuw emmhuw ama miching Ipachuw amhuwga; nang ing ajiekhangkhing kenhingna Ipachuw eminthiere natega?

Kieing Ipanhingna ongning, engkhejege Ipaching kenhingna ongne ate nang ing nathacha maaga? Kieing ninnhingna kettongrhier bekhehie kii ketaasaa rotumna ittongmaaging,” changgechuw kenhingna aeong Ipaching nonghechuw atuga;
Kie Ipanhingna eonging engkhejege Ipaing kenhingna aeongga kete kettongrhierhie thacharuw; changmaanieche kiing ketu nong bekhelina thacharuw;

Kieng ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, Kiechuw enthacha ama miching kieing ketu ketubekhe nonghechuw amaing tuvate; engkhejege hevehehie ithi ing elhuwng nong amaing tuvate; ajienachiinche kieing Ipanhingte ishiging.
Amapaching a Sapa nhingna athang alaar aphanaing, ningnuw ing keromhingna ninghinnhie bekheh chuw kieing tupeevanggechuw.
Kie keromhingna ningnuw ing ajii jiigejenie ihinnhehtenuwbe, kieing amachuw tupeevanggechuw.
“Ningnuw ing kie chuw ninning eminsii tenuwbe, kie kettongtho bekhe minjie vangninte.
Chona kieing Ipanhingte hinnheh vanggete, engkhejege amaing lintaang ibumpeevang ichii engkhe,

amachuwbe echum Chipi lintaang Aaboumpa engkhe ninnhingna ipevate, simrii ing amachuw enlhaang chehmaa, imhuwje mhuwmaa, ouwnghuwje minghuwmaa. Ningnuw ingbe amachuw nimminghuwse, ajienachiinche ama ninnuwtho onghaanechuw engkhejege ninsungna ongvate.
“Kieing ninnuwchuw sara rera ing mamaa ningchuw; kie ninnhingte thengvanggete.
Apha tepie uwmniege simriipaam ing kiehie eminghuwmaanie, changgechuw ninnuwingbe emhuwvangninte, ajienachiinche kii kerhingtaanaching ninnuwjeng rhingvangninte.
Kieing Ipanhingna ongning, ningnuw ing kenhingna ongnechuw, engkhejege kieing ninnhingna aeongging atehie ningnuw ing aaniena ching minghuwvang ninte.

“Kie kettongtho ipha engkhejege aminjie ama miching kiechuw aning imminsiiga; engkhejege kiehie aningimminsiih ama michuw Ipajeng aning minsiivate, engkhejege kieing amachuw kening minsiiningge anhingna ketaa raraa emphuwngvanggete.”
Iskariotmaa Jehudas ing Thangpa nhingna arhier, “Thangpa nang nataasaaching kinnhingna emphuwngvanggete engkhejege simriipaamna maaga nate ttonghie ajii asuwhtaanaga?”

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Achuw engkheing kiehie aning iminsiiniebe, kettongrhier minjievate, engkhejege kie kemapaing amachuw aning minsiivate, engkhejege kinnuw ing anhingna thengnuwngge amathoh ennhingna kingongna amhin tuvangginte.
Kiechuw aning imminsiimaa ama miching kettongrhier minjiemaa; engkhejege ningnuw ing ninthie ttonghie kieng kerhiermaaga, changgechuw kie injincheer Ipatenaga.
“Hevehehii kieing ninnuwtho aeonghaale ninnhingna ketongpe.
Changgechuw, engeeboumpee Enthieng Chipi chuw Ipaching keromhingna jincheervate, amaing ninnhingna suwhvang ichiibekhe iminchuwniege kieing kerhierbekhe chuw ningeenthienaing ongvate.
“Ninnhingna dejiim kemaasaana, kedejiimhie kepeegechuw, simriipaam ing impee khangchie kha kepeemaagechuw. Nimbelungriirje jamaaresie, engkhejege ittemaaruw,

‘Kie engkevanggete ketehie enthiepeepechuw, engkhejege ninnhingna juwngvanggete.’ Ninning iminsiitenuwbe kieing ke Mapa nhingte ishiging kete taanahing ninrotha minrhovang nintega, ajienachiinche kemapabe kienhingtena elhuwngsehga.
Hevehie asuwhleching ninthachanaing, asuwhmaa lhiele ninnhingna kieing kerhierpeepechuw.
Kieing ninnuwtho vonu enhimpaa ttongmaaning, ajienachiinche simriipaam aapuchuw thengse, engkhejege kenhingna amaing atuche uwmaadeh.
Changgechuw kieing Ipa ttongtho impeechuw ketuga, chonaching simriipaam ing Ipachuw kening keminsiihie minghuwvatehe. hangthieruw, aenie engketeruw.
“Kie echum darkhabour chuwging, engkhejege kemapahii darkhaber aathiepachuwga.
Kenhingna aanrah aeuwmmaa abaa bekhechuw amaing shehge alhinga engkhejege aanrah aeuwm abaabekhechuw aanrasesehnaing amaing aminlhiemga.
Kieing ninnhingna kerhier ttong yaarna atebe imminthiengpe.
Kenhingna ongjeruw, engkhejege kieje ninnhingna ongjehgete. Drakha baaching drakha rhuwlina aphabekhena kaamaaniebe athienening enra achehmaa khangkhin kenhingna ongmaatenuwbe enra chehmaatenuw.

“Kie drakha bourchuwging, ninnuwbe abaagechuw. Kenhingna aphabekhena aeong engkhejege kieing anhingna aphabekhena aeong ama miching aanra inhimpah enraga; ajienachiinche kii emvelung ningnuw ing ajiidong tuchehmaachuw.
Achuw engkheing kenhingna aanasiir ongmaaniebe, ataachuw abaa engkhe khangkhin alhinnaa, ittongje ttongne; engkhejege mingkongniege mheesungte bethuwvate.
Ningnuw ing kenhingna aanasiir ongtenuwbe, engkhejege kettongrhierhechuw ninnhingna aanasiir uwmniebe ninnuw ing hinnhiening nintechuw hinnheruw, engkhejege amachuw ninrotum itupeevate.
Ningnuw ing aanra inhim enratenuwbe, hanghing Kesepoh ouwngsuwhtenuwge chonaching Ipaching athang alaar uwmvate.
Kiichuw Ipaing aning imminsii khangkhing kiejeng ninnuwchuw kening keminsiigechuw; ninnuw ing kening keminsiilina ongjeh ruw.
Kieing Ipa ttongtho bekhe minjieingge aningsii naching aanasiir keongkhangkhing, ningnuw ing kettongtho bekhechuw minjie tenuwbe ningnuw ing kii ningsiena ongjeh vang ninte.
“Kerotha rhoh ninnhingna uwmresie, engkhejege ninrotha erhohchuw aruwng abesunaching hevehehie ninnhingna kerhierga.
Kieing ninnuwchuw kening keminsii khangkhing ninnuwjeng engkhele engkhe ningsie emperuw ketehie kii kettongthoga.
Achuw engkheching aalhanghe rotumna arhingrie abethin chungnahin elhuwngseh ningsie mi engkhedong ing aeuwmmaaga.
Kieing ninnhingna kettongtho kepeechuw hii ningnuw ing tutenuwbe ninnuw keelhanggechuw.

Kieing ninnuwchuw mine temaaningchuw, ajienachiinche aapuw ing atuchuw mineching minghuwmaa; changgechuw kieing ninnuwchuw kilhanghe ketepechuw, ajienachiinche kieing ke Mapatena kethiebekhe chuw kieing kerhierpeepechuw.

Ningnuw ing kiechuw engeeturmaa gechuw, changgechuw kieing ninnuwchuw kiiturpechuw, engkhejege ningnuw ing vashinung aanra auwmnaing, engkhejege ningeenrachuw auwnjehnaing, ninnuw ing keromhingna Ipanhingna ninghinnhie chuw amaing amachuw ninnhingna impeenaing kieing pham kethingechuw.
Ningnuw ing engkhele engkhe ninning enshiihruw teingge heve hehie kiing ninnhingna ttongtho kepeegechuw.
“Simriipaam ing ninnuwchuw iharniebe, ninnuwchuw eharmaalhiele kiehie enghargehe atehie minghuwruw.

Ninnuwhie simriipaamtena getenuwbe, simriipaam ing ama ataasaachuw aning minsii vang atega; changgechuw ninnuwbe simriipaam tena maagechuw, changgechuw kieing ninnuwchuw simriipaamtena keeturpechuw, heve linahing simriipaam hin ninnuwchuw engharga.

Mineching aapuw ithi ing elhuwngmaaga teingge ninnhingna kerhier ttonghie enthieruw. Emmeniing kiechuw eechoh eechii heniebe ninnuwjechuw eechoh eechii vatehe, emmenieng kie kettong minjie heniebe nintaje minjie vatehe.
Changgechuw kie keromhing khu rotumna emmenieing hevebekhe ninnhingna tuvate, ajienachiinche kiechuw injincheer amachuw emmenieng minghuwmaa.
Kieing thengningge ennhingna tongmaa ningbe, emmenie isiicher nongte bomaavang entega, changgechuw atebe emmenie isiicher chuw abeluwna uwmmaa.
Kiichuw enghar miching kemapajechuw aharga.
Achuw engkhedong ing atumaalhie nongchuw kieing engkaarna tumaalhieningbe, emmenie isiicher uwmmaalhievang atega; changgechuw atebe emmenieng kieje Ipaje emmhuwpe, eharje engharpe.
‘Emmenieng abieh uwmluing kiechuw engharpehe’ ate emmenie waajiir ttongtho thiimjiisungna abejii ttongchuw alir asuwnaga.
“Changgechuw ke Mapatena ninnhingte jincheervang kete emboumpee amachuw, Ipanhingtena ijuwng echum Chipichuw athengle amaing kie kekhuna saarkhie pevate.
Engkhejege ninnuwjeng saarkhie pevangninte, ajiinaichiinche aborna bettiimge ningnuw ing kietho ihungeenrhiegemie.
“Ninthacha lina ningkhi minsiina embesuw namaaing, kieing hevehie ninnhingna kerhierga.
Emmenieng ninnuwchuw khuwngsangtena ithorvatehe; atataaching, ama aphachuw thengse, ichiinche, achuw chuwgejenie ninnuw enthehheching Thangnhang nong tunaing kepeega teheniege mindeenvate.
Engkhejege emmenieng Ipaje, kieje emming huwmaataana heve nonghehie tuvatehe.
Changgechuw emmenie pungphachuw athengleching kieing ninnhingna amachuw ningeenthienaing kerhierpeegechuw ichie kieing heve ttonghehie kerhierbesaga.
“Kieing ninnuwtho aeonghaagemiekhage abetthiimpele betthiimge ninnhingna heve ttonghehie rhiermaang.
Changgechuw ate kiechuw injicheer amanhingte shirong ketenaa; engkhejege ninnuw ningkaarna achuwdong ing akhute shivang natega ichii ishiimaachuw.
Changgechuw kieing ninnhingna heve ttonghehie kerhiergekhage nimbelungriir japaanechuw.

Changkhanggejenie kieing ninnhingna echumchuw kerhierga; kii enkeinghii ninnuw rotumna aatthaanaga, ajienachiinche kii engkemaa ningbe Engeebumching nimbuumte thengmaadehnie; changgechuw kii engkeningbe amachuw ninnhingte jincheervanggete.
Engkhejege atah athengleching, isii khuna, dharmo icher khuna engkhejege waajiir itu khuna simriipaam ching enlaarnachuw joungmindangvate.
Isiicher khuchuwbe, kenhingna ithachamaahe;
Dharmo icher khunaching, Ipanhingte shirong ketenaa, engkhejege ningnuw ing kiechuw ate imhuw maatenuw.
Engkhejege waajiir itu khuchuwbe, heve simriipaam aapuwchuw waajiir entuse.
“Kieing rhiervang kete inhimpah uwmreene, changgechuw ningnuw ing amahechuw atele liecheh maatenuw.

Changgechuw ama echum Chipiching athengle amaing ninnuwchuw echumbekhe teching irhievate, ajienachiinche amaing ataasah rotumna ttongmaanie; changgechuw ajiejiigejenie amaing ninthiebekhelina rhiervate engkhejege hungthengvang ichii bekhe chuw mindangvate.
Amaing kethang kelaar minlhuwngvate, ajienachiinche amaing kenhingtena aelhaangniege amachuw ninnhingna iminthiewate.
Ke Mapa ing adeenbekhechuw ketaga; chotaanaching amaing kenhingtena lieniege ninnhingna amachuw iminthang vate ketega.
“Apha tepie uwmniege ningnuw ing kiechuw aemhuw maatenuw; engkhejege vonu apha tepie uwmniege aemhuwvangninte.”

Chotaanaching asepohhe kaarna alhehheching engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “apha tepie uwmniege kiechuw imhuwmaatenuw, engkhejege avonhie apha tepie uwmniege ningnuw ing imhuwvangninte; engkhejege kieing kemapa nhingte shirong ketenaa atehie ajii arhiernaga?
Chotaanaching emmenieng enrhier, Apha amongna tege amaing arhierhie ajiiga? Amaing ajii arhierga echiihie aenieing irhier chehmaamie.”

Emmenieing shiening atechuw Jesuching minghuwge ennhingna arhier, “Apha amongna ningnuw ing kii imhuwmaatenuw, engkhejege avonhie apha amongna ningnuw ing imhuwvangninte teingge kerhier heve khunahing ninnejeer ing ensiiggechuw?

Kieing ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, ningnuw ing ttaahvangninte, engkhejege tacham lievangninte changgechuw simriipaam ing rotha rhohvate; engkhejege ninnuwbe nimbelungriir javate, changgechuw nimbelungriir ijachuw rotha irhohte emvurvate.

Nepenuw ing nedoung aberhingphana jane, ajienachiinche ama poungpha ennhingse; changgechuw nedoungchuw aberhingche, mi engkhe simriipaamna uwmse atetaana arotha rhohne, ijachaam aphachuw amaing vonu enthiemaase.

Changching ichiing ninnuwjeng atelebe nimbelungriir jane, changgechuw kieing ninnuwtho vonu enteuvateruw, engkhejege nimbelungriir rotha rhohnachuw phavangninte, engkhejege ninrotha arhohnachuw achuwdong ing ishihchemaanie.

“Ama inienaching ningnuw ing ajiidong kenhingtena inhemaatenuw. Kieing ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, ninnuw ing Ipanhingtena ajiejiegejenie hinnhe tenuwbe, amaing kii keromhingna amachuw ninnhingna ipevate.
Atele iphang ningnuw ing keromhingna ajiidong ing inhehmaalhiechuw; hinnheruw, ningnuw ing phatenuwge ninrotha irhohchuw aruwng suwvate.
“Kieing hevehehie ninnhingna bietimna ttong ing kerhierga; ninnhingna vonu bietimna chin rhierluung ke Mapa khuna endang ing ninnhingna mindangvanggete pungphachuw houngviese.
Ama inie naching ningnuw ing keromhingna hinnhehvangninte; engkhejege kiing ninnuw rotumna Ipanhingte hinnhevanggete ketehie kieing ninnhingna rhiermaaing;
Ajienachiinche Ipa ataa raraaing ninnuwchuw aning imminsiihga; ajienachiinche ningnuw ing kiechuw ninning iminsiihchuwge; engkhejege kieing Ipa nhingtena ethengging atechuw ningnuw ing ninthachape.
Kie Ipanhingtena ijuwngging engkhejege simriipaamna itheng ging; ate vokhe simriipaam maningge Ipanhingte engkerong ketenaa.”
Asepohheching arhier, “Uwng, ate nang ing endangjohing rhierchiege bietimna ttong ajiidong rhiermaachie.
Thangpa nang ing naminghuwcherga, achuw engkheing nanhingna eshievang ichii uwmmaanie ichii atebe kimminghuwpe; hevehehing Thangnhangtena ijungsuwgechii ichii kinthachape.”
Jesu ing ennhingna abesang, “Ateche ningnuw ing ninthachape?

Pungphachuw houngviesa atataaing thengse, ninnuw bekheing kiehie ibethintenuwge ningeen ningeente entthenongvangninte, engkhejege kii kethienening imavangninte, changgechuw kii kethienen maaging Ipathoh enrhiegung.
Kieing ninnhingna kerhier chuwga, hanghin simriipaamna ijachaam phawangninte, changechuw rotha irhoh uwmjehruw kiing simriipaamhie kechepe.”
Jesu ing heve ttonghehie arhiernhuwte thangvente amhee mingngenge arhier, “Ipa apungphahii viese;
Nasapa nhingte thanglaarchuw pesare amaching Nasapaing nathanglaarchuw mindangvate, nang ing anhingna mibekhe tahlina atuchena pechiige amaing ettiim inemaa rhingrie ipee achenachuw napeepe.
Engkhejege emmenieing echum Thangnhang nangpangchuw engkhejege nang ing najinchiir Jesu Khristachuw emmenieing emminghuwhie ittiim inemaa rhingriechuwga.
Nang ing ture techiige impee nongchuw tuingge nathang nalaar keminlhuwngsaape.
Chonaching ate, Ipa, simriipaam auwmmaalhiele nangtho aeuwm thanglaar thokhing nang ing kethanglaarchuw iminlhuwngpeesare.
“Nang ing simriipaamtena kenhingna impeechie mihenhingna kieing naromhing kemindangsaape; emmeniechuw natagehe, engkhejege nang ing emmeniechuw ipechiege, emmenieng nattongrhierchuw aminjienaahe.
Nang ing kenhingte impee bekhe amachuw nanhingtenaga ichii ate keminghuwse;

Ajiegachiinche nang ing kenhingna impee ttonghechuw kieing ennhingte kepeepe, engkhejege emmenieing amachuw aelhaanghege kieing nanhingtena ijungsuwging ichii hii emmenieing aminghuwpehe, engkhejege nang ing injinchiirgechii ichiejehie enthachape.
“Kieing enrotumna kethamsaaga, simriipaam rotumna kehinthammaaga; changgechuw nang ing kenhingna impee emmenie rotumnaga, ajienachiinche emmeniehie natagehe.
Kieing kedeenbekhehie nataga, engkhejege natabekhejechuw ketaga, engkhejege emmenie yaarna kii kethanglaar kephasaape.

Kii ate simriipaamna ongjehmaaning, changgechuw emmeniebe simriipaamna ongnehe, engkhejege kii nanhingte thengsaning. Enthiing Ipa, enieing engkhepang uwmmiege, emmenieje enguwmnaing kenhingte impeebesa emmenie hie naromhingna rukuum itupeere.

Kieing emmenietho kingonghaale, nang ing impeechie emmeniehie naromhingna kieing rukuum ketugehe engkhejege kieing emmemichuw kerhunggehe, engkhejege enthiing thiimjii ttongchuw alir asuwh naing maangvang ichii sapa chuwmaaniege achuw engkhedong emmomaa.
Changgechuw ate kii nanhingte thengsaning, engkhejege ennhingna rotha rhohna ketachuw alir asuwnaing kieing simriipaamna heve ttonghehie kerhierga.
Kieing narhier ttonghie ennhingte kepeepe; engkhejege simriipaam ing emmeniechuw aharnaahe, ajienachiinche kieing simriipaamtena kinsuwhmaa khangkhin emmenieje simriipaam tenamaagehe.
Kieing emmenie hii simriipaamtena liejohhere ketemaagehe, changgechuw nang ing emmeniechuw etthamaatena erhuwngpeesare tengge kethamsaagechie.
Kii simriipaam tenamaa gingke emmenieje simriipaamtena maagehe.
Emmeniehie echumnaching eminthieng peesare, nang nattongrhierchuwbe echumchuwga.
Nang ing kiechuw simriipaamna injincheerchie khangkhing kiejing emmeniechuw simriipaamte kechiirgehe.
Engkhejege entaaje echumching aminthiing naing, emmenie khuna kii kethienening enthiingsaging.
“Kieing hevehe rotumnapang kethammaaga, changgechuw enttongrhier khuna kenhingna thachavang ente emmenie rotumnaje kethamsaagechie.
Emmeniebekhe engkhepang ingeensuwnaing, Ipa, nangje kesuwngna, engkhejege kieje nanhingna aeuwmmie khangkhing, emmenieje aenhingna engongnaing kieing kethamsaagechie.
Aenieje engkhepang eensuwh khangkhing, emmenieng engkhepang ing inguwmnaing nang ing impeechie thanglaarchuw kieing ennhingna kepeega;

kieing ennhingte, engkhejege nang ing kenhingna aeong amahing emmenieing changrier poumkheh aansuwnaga amahing nang ing injincheergechie engkhejege nang ing naning imminsii khangkhing emmenie chuw naning naminsiiga atehie simriipaam ing aminghuwnaga.
“Ipa, nang ing simriipaam abetthiimmaalhiele naning imminsiitaanaching, kenhingna impeechie kethanglaarchuw emmenieing ibeerniege kii keongtaa nachin emmenieje aeong keediega.
Dramho icher Aepa, simriipaam ing nangchuw iminghuwmaase, changgechuw kieingbe keminghuwsechie; engkhejege nang ing kii enjinchiirgechie ichii emmenieing aminghuwpehe.
Engkhejege nang ing kii naning imminsiichie ningsiechuw ennhingna auwmnaing, engkhejege kieing ennhingna keongnaing naromhingchuw keminthiepehe, engkhejege minthie vanggetehe.”
Jesu ing heve ttonghehie arhiernhuwte amaing asepohhetho Kidron pheh araarte shise, chove chiiber amhinnaching asepohhetho valhuwsehe.
Ate ama aajuwr Judasjeching chove amhinchuw aminghuwpe, ajienachiinche Jesu ing chove amhinnaching asepohhetho enrhiehege, ouwngteu lalah chaagehe.
Chotaanachin Judas ing khorpuw aalhuwnghele Pharisihe chin imvichiir nong aapuwhe engkhejege sepe ruhkhehhechuw rhiege chove mhintechin thoumhi, mheeleng, engkhejege keeletho enrhieng ivathenghe.
Chotaanaching Jesu ing anhingna suwhvang ate bekhechuw minghuwge vaanseenge ennhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing achuw ninjongga?”
Emmenieng embesang, “Nazareth tena Jesuga” Jesu ing abesang, “Kiiging.” Ama aajuwr Judasje emmenietho iniirhaa.
Amaing kiehie amaging ateche entuhnhuwngte ensheenhege lolhiete itiehhe.
Jesu ing vonu ennhingna ashiehe, “ningnuw ing achuw ninjongga?” Engkhejege emmenieng enrhier, “Nazarethtena Jesuchuwga.”
Jesu ing abesang, “Kiiging teingge ninnhingna kerhierpe, ningnuw ing kiechuw aejongtenuwbe emmeniehie mingkeheruw.”
Heve amaing arhier ttongchuw alir asuwnaga, “nang ing kenhingna empeechii emmenie kaarna kieing achuw engkhedong memomaaning.”
Chotaanaching Simon Piter ing chimshii achichuw ijuwhge khorpuw elhuwng amane aana atachangna chuw aavehbongpe. Ama mine romhingchuw Malkusga.
Jesu ing Piternhingna arhier, “Nachimshiikha akhumsungte thin. Kemapa ing empee kamseng sungnahie eenmaavang kete gekhang?”
Chang ichiin raarmi ruhkhehle sepehe aalhuwng engkhejege Jehudihe nong aapuh heching Jesuchuw suwrhege aphierpehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng Annas nhingte amhuwr rimna arhiehe; ajienachiinche amabe chove kumna khorpuw elhuwng ensuwh Kaiaphas chuw amapuwga.
Kaiaphaschuwbe, mee engkheing mibekhe chang deenniege ithieching tthasehne tege Jehudihenhingna aarhier amachuwga.
Simon Piterle lintaang asepoh engkheing Jesuchuw ajiihe. Lintaang asepoh engkhechuwbe khorpuw elhuwngthoh ouwnghuwgekhage, khorpuw elhuwng atebuw sungte Jesu tho enrhiehege valhuwse.

Changgechuw Piterche taangna eengkhaarkungna niirjehge aeong. Chonaching khorpuw elhuwngthoh ouwnghuw lintaang sepoh engkheching jungsuwge, eengkhaar aarhuwng nepenuw nhingna rhierge Piterchuw sungte aminlhuwpe.
Chonaching eengkhaar aarhuwng nepenuwching Piternhingna arhier, “nangje heve sepohhe kaarnagechii?” Amaing arhier, “Kiimaaging.”
Adelamthitaana minehetho nong aapuheching rohor mhi mintthehege niirhege auwhe, engkhejege Piterje emmenietho niirhege mhi auwhe.
Chonaching kbourpuw elhuwngching Jesuchuw asepohhe khu engkhejege aminchuwhelina ashie.

Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “kieing simriipaamna endangjohing kerhierpe, aphabekhena Jehudihe aangkongna amhin, khuwngsangnaje, Thangnhang irumna eennaje keminchuwhe; engkhejege, kieing ouwngruwh ing rhiermaaing,
Ajiituna ensiegechii? Kerhier aathiehe nhingna shieruw, emmenieng minghuwvatehe.”
Amachuw arhiertaanaching, aarhuwng nong aapuh engkheing Jesuchuw amhena ibeengge arhier, “nang ing khorpuw elhuwngchuw changching ichiin nabesangga?”
Jesu ing abesang, “kieing echummaaing aettong geningbe, echum maachuw saarkhie ipere, changgechuw echumgeniebe nang ing kiechuw ajietuna ingngee beengechii.”
Ate Annas ing amachuw emphier ing khorpuw elhuwng Kaiaphas nhingte avibethinpe.
Ate Simon Piter ing mhi uwhge iniir. Chonaching emmenieng anhingna arhier, “nangje asepohhe kaarna engkhegechie?” Amaing rhumaage arhier, “kiemaaging.”
Khourpuw elhuwng aminehe engkhe, Piter ing aana atin aeengkuw eensuwchin arhier, “Kieing chiiberna nanghie amathoh enrhie kemhuwmaa gechiekhang?”
Vonuh Piter ing rhumaase, engkhejege aniekungna aarkhuungchuw khuwngse.
Chona emmenieng Jesuchuw Kaiaphastena Pilat akurnungte arhiepehe. Amachuw yieng enrangga. Emmenieing Aminlenna aeriim thehsaana embournamaaing akurnungtechin entaachuw valhuw maahe.
Pilat ing jungsuwge ennhingna arhier, “ajii alaar nimmingseenna ninghin rhiiga?”
Emmenieng embesang, “Ama aetthamaa itu mimaa geniebe kinnuw ing amachuw nanhingte minlhenmaavang kintegechie.
Chonaching Pilat ing ennhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing amachuw rhienung ninnuw nimwaajiir ttong inhuw ijiin waajiir tusaruw.” Jehudiheching abesang,“Mi engkhe itheh ichiehie kimwaajiir ttongna rhumaa.”
Ichiinche ajiekhangchie ithieing ama thevang atega ichii mindangge arhier ttongchuw atungnaga.
Chona Pilat ing vonu akurnungsungte lhuwge, Jesuchuw eenge arhier, “nangche Jehudihe Eruwnggechii?”
Jesu ing abesang, “Hevehii nathienen saaing narhierga, changmaage lintaangheng nanhingna kekhu atonggehe?”
Pilat ing abesang, “kii Jehudimaaging, kii amagingkhang? Nataasah nayaatihe engkhejege khorpuw aalhuwng hin nangchuw kenhingna imminlhengehe nang ing ajiiche natutaanaga?”

Jesu ing abesang, “keeruwng lepaahie heve simriipaam tenamaaga; keeruwng lepaahie simriipaamtena geniebe, kiechuw Jehudihenhingte apeedohnamaing kesepohching raar eentuhphuwvang ategehe, changgechuw ateleche kii kelepaa heve mhintena maaga.”
Chotaanaching Pilat ing anhingna arhier, “Chogenieche nang eruwnggechii?”

Jesu ing abesang, “Eruwnggechii nate nang ing narhierchuwga; Hevelinahing enrhingging, engkhejege echum saarkhie apeenaing, hevelinahing simrii paamna ijuwngging. Echumta mi ensuwbekheching keerur arongegehe.”
Pilat ing anhingna ashie, “Echumchuw ajiiga?”
Heviehie arhiernhuwte vonu jungsuwge Jehudihe nhingna atong, “kieing anhingna alaarna ajiidong teuhmaaing.”
Changgechuw Aminlennadoh aeriim kieing ninrotumna mi engkhe abethinnaing ninsina nunu uwmne, Ama inienaching Jehudi Eruwnghie kieing ninrotumna enthin ningeediega?
Chonahing emmeniebekheching vonu uwnghege embesang, “ama mihiemaaga, Barabbas kintega.” Barabbaschuw daaku engkhega.
Chona Pilat ing Jesuchuw rhiege abinriipehe.
Engkhejege sepeheching elhing luhu phinhege aloselina mingkhumhege, aesin pien aminserhe;
Engkhejege emmenieing thenghege enrhier, “Jehudihe Eruwng, kinrumnachii!” Engkhejege ingkeeing aabeenghe.
Pilat ing vonu jungsuwge ennhingna arhier, “Ebierruw, kieing anhingna alaar ajiidong teuhmaaing ichii nimminghuwnaing, nimmhekungna kebesuwse.”
Hanghing Jesu ing elhing luhu khumge aesin pien sherge taangte jungsuwhse; engkhejege Pilat ing anhingna arhier, “Ebierruw heve mi hiega.”
Khourpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege nong aapuheching Jesuchuw emmhuwche uwnghege enrhier, “Thingkherlina thehruw, thingkherlina thehruw!” Pilat ing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing amaraar teuhmaaing.”
Jehudiheching anhingna arhier, “Kinta waajiir ttongtho uwmne, ama waajiir ttongtho inhuw ijiing ama ithie arhuga, ajienachiinche ataasaaing Thangnhang Sapa ging atena.”
Ate Pilat ing amachuw athie che ithiseh ittihse:
Engkhejege amaing kurnung sungte avonhie valhuwge Jesunhingna arhier, “Nang akhutenagechii?” Changgechuw Jesu ing ajiidong besangmaase.
Chonaching Pilat ing Jesunhingna arhier, “Kenhingna ittong nadaga? nanghie abethinna kecheh engkhejege thingkherna itheh ketuchena aeuwmga atehie minghuwmaachie?”
Jesu ing anhingna abesang, “Chungtenaing chovechuw ipemaaniebe nang ing ketaalina natuchena uwmmaavang atega; chotaanaching kiechuw nanhingte empee ama michuw isiicherlhaane.

Chona betthiimge Pilat ing Jesuchuw abethin naing atupe, changgechuw Jehudiheching aeuwnghe, “Nang ing heve mihie bethinteniebe, nangbe Eruwng aelhangmaagechii, ataasah eruwngging ate mi bekheching Eruwng Kasaar taalina ittongga.”
Pilat ing chove ttonghechuw athieche Jesuchuw jimbesuwge lhung ing enchar Hebru ttongna Gabbatha ate tebuh mhin nachin, waajiir ituna taalinaching ongse.
Engkhejege amachuw aminlenna aeriim buwsha rothangna inie siim rovenaga. Amaing Jehudihenhingna arhier, “Ningeeruwng hevehie!”

Chona emmenieng uwnghege enrhier, “Amahie rhiedohruw, Amahie rhiedohruw!” thingkherlina thehruw! Pilat ing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing ningeeruwngchuw thingkherlina thehvang ketega?” Khourpuw elhuwngheching embesang, “Kingeeruwng uwmmaa, Kasaar getha.”
Chona amaing thingkherlina athehnaing ennhingte apeepe.
Hanghing Jesuchuw arhiepehe.
engkhejege amaing ataasah thingkher rinsage, Hebru ttong ing Golgotha ate loshe ruw mhin engkheteching hungshise.
Ama amhinnaching thingkherlina athehpehe, engkhejege amathoh enrhiing lintaang mi ennhiichuw paangkheh lichang, amana Jesuchuw aliehna thingkherlina enjampe.
Pilat jing romhing engkhe bejiige chovechuw thingkher taalina ataarpe, abejiichuwbe, “Nazarethtena Jesu, Jehudihe Eruwng,” atega.
Jehudi aanhim ing heve enjiihie apahe; ajienachiinche Jesuchuw thingkhertaalina athehhe amhinchuw khupuwtho endaamaaga; amachuw enjiih ttonghechuwbe Hebru, Greek engkhejege Latin ttong ing enjiiga.

Chonaching Jehudihe khorpuw elhuwngheching Pilat nhingna enrhier, “ ‘Jehudihe Eruwngga ichiin bejiihmaa’ changgechuw ‘Heve mihin arhier, kii Jehudihe Eruwngging, tege amaing arhierkhangkhing ibejiihpeeruw.’ ”
Pilat ing abesang, “Kieing kebejii besachuw kebejiipe.”

Sepeheching Jesuchuw thingkherlina enthehle emmenieng apiendiirhechuw liehege, sepeheching engkheter emphanaing alheh millie abesuwhe; alongohjechuw aliehe. Engkhejege longohchuwbe aattiina lolang aantuena aeuwmmaaga, abesuwrna betthiimge pumkhuwnga.

Chotaanaching emmenieng ennajeer ing enrhier, “Inieng hevehie itthiimaa menie, changgechuw achuw ing phavang atega reepaa ibeerteruw.” hevehie Enthieng thiimjii chuw atungnaga, “Emmenieng kepiendierchuw engkaarna asimpehe, engkhejege kelongohlina repaa engeebiirnape.”
Engkhejege sepeheching amabkhechuw entupe. Changgechuw Jesu thingkher abuumnaching amanuw, amanuwthoh enrhinghaa Klopas lumhee Mary, engkhejege Makdalene Mary iniirhe.
Chotaanaching Jesu ing amanuw engkhejege aning aminsiihpah sepohching abuumna inirrhechuw amhuwtaana amanuw nhingna arhier, “Nepenuw, nasapahie.”
Chonaching Jesu ing sepoh nhingnaching arhier, “hena nangnuw ongne.” Engkhejege chove aphana betthiimge sepohching aeente arhiepe.
Heve inhuwna, Jesu ing nong aangkheng ttuhse ichii minghuwge amaing arhier, Enthieng thiimjiihechuw atungna ing, “kechii haarne.”
Amana ithuwr drakha chii isiikang aesuwr engkhe aeaum. Amanaching emmenieng ithuwr chiichuw luhhege hyssop romhor besuwrna itherhege abesungte enghinror.
Jesu ing ama drakha chiichuw aphanhuwte amaing arhier, “Hevehii ttuhse.” Chona aluw beluge achipi abethinpe.

Amachuw rothangna iniegekhage Jehudiheching hum hechuw Eongnaniena thingkher taalina auwm namaa ing emmenie ingkhihechuw khiehcherheniege emmenie chuw alienadohnaing Jehudiheching Pilatnhingte anhiipehe.
Ama inhuwna sepeheching thenghege Jesutho enrhieng thingkherlina entheh amensah engkhejege lintaang engkhe ingkhichuw akhiehcherpehe.
Changgechuw emmenieing Jesu buwmna thenghege theese ichii emmhuwche akhichuw khiehmaasehe.
Changgechuw sepehekaarna engkhehching adeehna ishiing ashin, engkhejege chaleraaching thiile chiithoh ijungsuw.
Engkhejege ninnuwjeng ninthachanaing, amahie amhu amaching saarkhie apee, engkhejege ama asaarkhiichuw echumga, engkhejege amaing echumchuw arhierga ate amaing aminghuwse.
Ajienachiinche thiimjiina, “aruw engkhedong engkhiemaanie atechuw atungnaing hevehehie isuwhga.”
Engkhejege enthiing thiimjii lintaang engkhena arhier, “Emmenieing ishii ing enshin amachuw emmenieing ibiirvatehe.”

Hevehehii ashuwnhuwte Arimathea Joseph ate Jesu sepoh ensuwching Jehudihechuw attietaana amaing Jesu humchuw ilie arhunaing enruwruwh ing Pilat nhingte thengge anhiih; engkhejege Pilat ing amachuw arhupeepe, engkhejege amaing thengge humchuw aliepe.
Engkhejege yenna Jesunhingna mamenna etheng Nicodimusjeching myrrhle alose enchum kelograme sumngabekhe irhie vechige itheng.
Emmenieng Jesu humchuw valiehege adimna Jehudihe endimna ennunu inhuw ijiing aberim ichiipaa peethoh enrhieng ennarpaa limon pien ing engeelhuwmpe.
Engkhejege amachuw thingkher taalina enthena mhinnaching chiiber engkhe aeuwm, ama chiiber asungna mi engkhedong adimmaalhie aethar then engkhe aeuwm.
Chotaanaching Jehudihe rothangna inie aansuwtaana emmenieing Jesuchuw arhiepehe, ajienachiinche ama thenchuw ennheengna aeuwmga.
Hapta amhuwr iniena, aminthimle Mary Makdaleni ing thenteching enrang ing iva, engkhejege thenlina lhungchuw enliejoh amhuw.

Chotaanaching amaing hungtenge Simon Piter nhingna engkhejege Jesu ing aning aminsiih lintaang sepoh engkhehnhingna huwngge ennhingna arhier, “Thangpachuw enliepehe, engkhejege emmenieng akhute enrhiepehe ouwnghuwmaase.”
Chotaanaching Piter amana lintaang sepoh engkheching jungsuwge then ouwngtongte shise.
Emmenie ennhieching vatenhege lintaang sepoh engkheching Piterchuw hingkhirge thenteching mensa vatungse.
Amaing vakuwmge aabiirche amaing ennaarje limon pien amaachuw amhuw; changgechuw amaing sungte valhuwmaa;
Simon Piter jing aanhuw vijiege vage asungte valhuwse; engkhejege ennaar limon pienchuw ama amhuw,
engkhejege Thangpa aluwchungna aeuwm lokhaang engkhejege limon pienthoh chin mahge amachuwpang aantorna amhin engkhenaching amaachuw amhuwpe.
Chotaanaching thenteching mensa ivatung lintaang sepoh engkhejeching asungte valhuwge amhuwche athachape.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa ing ithiehekaartena hangrhingvate ate enthiing thiimjiina arhierchuw chaleching minghuw maa lhiehe.
Chona sepohheching eengeen engngeente engkesehe.
Changgechuw Mary ing ttaage then taangna iniir, hanghin attaa belham lham ing ajuwkuwmche;
Jesu hum aantorna mhinnaching iwaar pien asher minven michier eenhie, engkheing lochungte engkheing akhibuwmna aeonghechuw amhuwpe.
Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “Nepenuw, ajiituna ing ittaagechii?” Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Emmenieng kethangpachuw aliepehe, engkhejege akhute emmintorgehe kii minghuwmaaing.
Amaing hevehie rhierge avaanlehche, Jesu iniirchuw amhuwpe, engkhejege amachuw Jesuga atechuw amaing minghuwmaa.

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “nepenuw, ajietuna ittaagechii? Achuw najongga?” Amaing amachuw chiiber aathiipaga ichiin mindeenge anhingna arhier, “Thiimpuw, nang ing amachuw naliegenieche akhuna namintorga, engkhejege kieing liesagete.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Mary!” Amaing vaanlehge Hebru ttong ing arhier, “Rabboni!” Amachuwbe thiimpuw atenaga.

Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Iparmaare; ajienachiinche kie Ipanhingte karmaalhieng; changgechuw keuw kenehe nhingte engke, engkhejege ennhingna hungrhierhere, kieing ke Mapa, ninnuwjeng nim Mapa; kie ke Thangnhang, ninnuw nin Thangnhang ouwngsuwh ama nhingte hungkarrong ketenaa.”
Mary Makdalene ing hunthengge sepohhenhingna arhierpe, “Kieing Thangpachuw kemhuwpe,” engkhejege amaing kenhingna heve ttonghie enrhierpeega.

Chotaanaching ahapta amhuwr inie kholhie viege, Jehudihechuw enttiitaana ingongna amhin eengkhaarbekhe kamcherhege, amana Jesuchuw thengge engkaarna niirge, ennhingna arhier, “ninnhingna dejiim uwmresie.”
Thangpa ing hevehie rhierge, akeeje, adeeje aminthiepehe. Sepohhechin Thangpachuw emmhuwche enrotha rhohsehe.
Jesu ing ennhingna vonu arhier, “Dejiim ninnhingna uwmresie. Ipaing kiechuw injincheer khangkhing, kieing ninnuwje kechiirgechuw.”
Amaing hevehie arhiernhuwte entaalina aahuwh, engkhejege ennhingna arhier, “Chipi Enthiingchuw ilhaangruw,
Ningnuw ing achuw chuwgejenie isii cher kuhpee tenuwbe ennhingna isii cher intuchuw kuvate ningnuw ing achuw chuwgejenie isii cher mintaang tenuwbe ennhingna entaangjehvate.”
Changgechuw summalhie ennhie kaarna engkhe. Emphier ate Thomaschuw Jesu athengle engkaarna ongmaa.

Chotaanaching lintaang sepohheching anhingna arhier, “Thangpachuw kimmhuwpe.” Changgechuw amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing akeebejana yopi abie kemhuwmaataang, engkhejege yopi bielina kekeechar ing kesin maataang, engkhejege adeetaalina kekeeing kesinmaataang thachamaaning.”
Inie niriih aanhuwna asepohheching eensuwngna aeonghe, Thomasje emmenietho aeong. Engkhaarbekhe engkamjenie Jesu ing engkaarna valhuwge niirge arhier, “ninnhingna dejiim uwmresie.”
Chona Thangpa ing Thomasnhingna arhier, “Hevenahing nakeechar veesin ing kekeehehie ibier, nakee vijam ing kedeenahin vihparre. Nabelungriir memmhaamaa changgechuw thachare.”
Thomas ing abesang, “Kethangpa engkhejege Ke Thangnhang.”
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Nang ing kiechuw imhuwchiege nathachape; mhuwmaajenie athacha mihechuw enrepaa aetthaga.”
Engkhejege heve leriisungna enjiimaa lintaang bietimna inhimpahje sepohhemhekungna Jesu ing atu;
Changgechuw Jesuhie Thangnhang Sapa Aantinpaga ichii ninnuw ing ninthachanaing, engkhejege thachatenuwge ningnuw ing Thangpa romhingna irhing nimphanaing, bietimnahehii enjiiga.
Heve inhuwna Jesu athienen ing Tiberia rimchie kurna sepoh henhingna amindang; engkhejege ataasah chuw Thangpaging ichiin amindang.
Simon Piter, Emphier Didima ate Thomas, Galilisung Kanatena Nathanael, Zebedee sapahe, engkhejege lintaang asepohhe ennhiihetho chove mhin nachin engkonghe.

Simon Piter ing ennhingna arhier, “Kii ngaala sigete.” Emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Kinnuwje nangtho enrhieng sigungte.” Emmenieng vashihege ruwkuwngsungna ongsehe; engkhejege chove yennaching ajiidong suwrmaasehe.
Changgechuw khuw ahungwaarche, Jesuching rimchie akurnaching ihenier; changgechuw amachuw Jesuga atehie minghuwmaahe.
Chonaching Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “nepanghe ninsaaphuw uwmne?” Emmenieing uwmmaa tehege abesang.

Amaing ennhingna arhier, “Aechaakha ruwkuwng tachang entongtekhin deengruw, amana tepie teuhvangninte.” Changching emmenieng endeengpe, engkhejege ate emmenieing nga anhim lamthi taana iki chehmaasehe.

Jesu ing aning aminsiihpah sepohching Piternhingna arhier, “Hevehii Thangpaga.” Ate Simon Piter ing chovechuw Thangpaga ichii athie taana alongoh lintaangchuw aniepe ajiegachienche ama asehphuluga, engkhejege rimchieteching juwkhuwngse.
Changgechuw lintaang sepohheching ruwkuwngsungte vahege, nga ishiikang aachaachuw ahingkeepehe ajienachiinche emmenie ramthingthoh endaamaahe, khutuh roza ennhii rove pangga.
Hanghin emmenieing siiphiete hungkarhege, amana rohor mhee, engkhejege mhee taalina nga tepiele, tal emmhuw.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “ningnuw ing atele ninsuwr nga tepie kha vichiruw.”

Chotaanaching Simon Piter ing ruwkuwngte hangkarge nga elhuwngpaa roza engkhe sumngalhie ouwngthum isiikang aechaachuw siihphiete ahingkeepe; engkhejege nga changjemeh nhimjenie aachaachuw entthiemaa.
Jesu ing ennhingna arhier, “huwngnung sharuw.” Amachuw Thangpaga ate minghuwhege sepoh achuwdong ing nang achuwgechii ichii anhingna thona aethaing siehmaasehe.
Jesu ing vathengge talchuw valiege ennhingna apeepehe, khangkhing ichiin ngajechuw apeehe.
Jesu ing ithiehekaartena ahangrhing inhuwna sepohhenhingna aminthie hevehing avominthumnaga.

Hanghin yiengbuw ensaanhuwte, Jesu ing Simon Piternhingna arhier, Johon sapa Simon, “nang ing kiechuw hevehe ithi ing naning imminsii naachii?” Amaing arhier, “Ung, Thangpa, kieing nangchuw kening keminsiinaachie ichii nang ing naminghuwse.” Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “kezouhechuw mhaar.”
Avonhiena anhingna arhier, “Johon sapa Simon, naning imminsiinaachii?” Amaing abesang, “Ung, Thangpa, kening keminsiichiehie naminghuwse” Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Kezouhechuw sher.”

Amaing avominthumna anhingna arhier, “Johon sapa, naning imminsiinaachii?” “Nang ing naning imminsiinaachii” tege vothummeh Jesu ing arhiertaana chin Piter abelungrier jase. Engkhejege amaing anhingna arhier, “Thangpa, nang ing naminghuwcherga, kening keminsiihsechii ichii naminghuwga.” jesu ing anhingna arhier, “Kezouhechuw mhaar.

Atataa nanhingna kerhierga nang ing nanedeungle, nataa nathienen nadeerhiinna enchiim chiege shining natetaate ishichii; changgechuw nang ing itar nahangsuwhche nakee jamvangniete, engkhejege lintaang mi engkheching nang ing nadier rhiin enchiimteniege shining natemaateching irhievate.
Amaing ajii khangchie ithieching Thangnhang athang alaar alhuwngnachuw aminthienaing hevehie arhierga. Hevehie arhiernhuwte amaing hevehie anhingna arhier, “keenhuw ijii.”
Piter ing avaanlehche Jesuchuw aning aminsiih sepohching aanhuw ajiechuw amhuw; ama mihie kholhie emmhaarle Thangpa belung taalina endiege, Thangpa, nangchuw impeedoh michuw achuwga atechuwga.
Chotaanaching Piter ing amachuw mhuwge Jesunhingna arhier, Thangpa, heve mihieche ajii eensuwhvang atega?
Jesu ing anhingna arhier, “kieing kejungtheng maataang amaing enghaa hii kieing Kemindeen enshuwniebe choveching nanhingna ajii tevate? Nangbe keenhuw ijii.

Hanghin sepohchuw themaanie ate ttonghie apaamnaching thangse, changgechuw ama themaanie ate Jesu ing anhingna arhiermaaga, changkhangjenie, “kieing kejuwngmaataang amaing enghaahie kieing kemindeengeniebe, amaching nanhingna ajie khangvangniete? atenaga.”
Hevebekhe arhier ttonglina saarkhie apee engkhejege heve ttonghehie aanjiih sepohchuw hevehiega; engkhejege amaing saarkhie apeehie echumga ichiehie inieing iminghuwse.
Engkhejege Jesu ing atu nong inhimpah lintaangje uwmne; Amachuw engkhekheh bejiimeniebe, enjiibesa lerii aangkhengchuw simriipaamhie khohmaanie teingge kemindeennaa.
Heve amhuwr leriinahing, Theophilus, kieing abourna betthiimge Jesu ing atubekhe engkhejege aminchuwbekhe
amaing minvente ahungkar eniephanaing amaing aaturbesa ttongjiirpahechuw Chipi Enthiinglina aminchuwhe.
Ijaachaam apha aanhuwna inie summinliesungna arhingle ennhingna mindangge engkhejege Thangnhang eruwng lepaa khu atong.
Emmeniethoh engonghaale, Jerusalemchuw bethinmaaruw tege ttongtho apihe, changgechuw Amapa ttongniir hehaaruw ate. “Hevehie,” amaing arhier, “amahie ninnuw ing kenhingna ninthiega;
Ajiegachiinche Johon ing chiina aluhgehe, changgechuw ninnuwbe aenie tepie aanhuwna Chipi Enthiingna chii eluhwate.”
Hanghing ouwngkongpohege, emmenii eng ashiihe, “Thangpa, heve aphanaing Israelhe eruwnglepaachuw avonhie mintharwang natega?”
Amaing abesang, “ama apha aaniechuw Epapang ing atuche enhuw ejieing ninnuw ing minghuwmaatenuw.

Changgechuw Chipi Enthiingching nintaalina ajungttumle Ruwngper phawangninte, engkhejege Jerusalemna betthiimtenuwge Judia paambekhena engkhejege Samaria, engkhejege lolhiepaam atangna iphang kesaarkhii ouwngsuw vangninte.”
Hevebekhe arhiernhuwte engkhejege ingeebeerle ruduwching emmhekungtena ajoliepe.
Hanghing amaing ahungkarle emmenieing minvente eebeerhege, chale pien aewaarjeh asher mi ennhie empaangna aeniir;
Emmenii eng arhier, “Galili mihe, ninnuwng ajietuna minven eebeerchuwge aeneergechuw? Heve Jesuhie, ningkaartena minvente arhie, nimmhuwngenge juwngrih vate.”
Chona emmenieing Jerusalem tho innheeng eongna nie inie engkhe lham endah, Oliv ate boungtena Jerusalemte hungeenlisehe.

Chove khupuwna emvalhuwle emmenii eng achung adeen engkhete karhege, Piter engkhejege Johon, Jakob engkhejege Andrew, Philip engkhejege Thomas, Bartholomew engkhejege Mathi, Alphaeus sapa Jakob Zealot ate Simon, Jakob sapa Judas aeonghe.
Emmeniebekheing nepenuwhetho, Jesu amanuw Mary, amana anehethoh enrhieng belungrier engkhepang ing mindeluwng ahinthamhe.
Chove enienaheching Piter ing auw anehekaarna niirge arhier, (amana ouwngkonghechuw mi roza engkhele sumnhie vaahgehe.)
“Kilhanghe, Jesuchuw asuwrlehe mensapa Judas khu David anherna Chipi Enthiing ing ayen arhierbesa aettha ttongjiir alir ahinsuwnaga–
Ajiegachiinche ama aekaarna emvega, engkhejege nong etusungna amaing asaru aphape.
Ate pesar hevehing alaarna atumin lhie engkhe aalie; engkhejege aluw ing boge avin puwlige aariirbekhe ekhuwngcherga;
hevehie Jerusalemna aeongbekheing minghuwge; amanaching phelhiechuw enttong ing Hakeldama, amachuwbe thielhie atehe.
“Ajiegachiinche David lha leriina abejiichuwga,
‘Ama aeenmhinchuw maangcherresie,
engkhejege amana achuwdong ing paarmaaresie.
engkhejege aphamhie mi lintaang engkheing ilhaangresie.’
“Chonaching Thangpa Jesuchuw engkaarna aongle,
Johon ing chii aluhlena betthiimge aekaartena Jesu ing minvente ehangkar inie ipha phanaing aekaarna emve mi engkhechuw Krista ahangrhingna Saarkhii eenshuvate.”
Chonaching emmenieing mi ennhiehechuw, Barsabbas ate Joseph, amahie Jutus tehege aminghuwhe, engkhejege Mathias chuw ajingbesuwhe.
Chona emmeniing hinthamhege engkhejege enrhier, “Thangpa, nang ing mibelungriirbekhe naminghuwga, heve ennhiehe kaarna achuwkha achuwkhaga iminthiesaruw,
heve ttongjiirpa anong tuna Judas ing engkhete ataaing amindeenlite asitaana ama pham aminsernaing.”
Engkhejege emmenieing repaa aebeerhege, engkhejege amachuw Matthias lina boge engkhejege ttongjiirpa summalhie engkhekaarna amimvepehe.
Pentikos aenie ahungviele emmeniebekheing amhin engkhena engkongsehe.
Engkhejege minghuw minghaluing minventena erur eperpaa thie khangkhing, engongtaa eensungchuw siihtohse.
Lintaang lintaang ttonghechuw mhikhangkhing enttong engkaarna uwmphuwngge, engkhejege mibekhetaalina jouchuwse.
Emmeniebekhechuw Chipi Enthiing ing siihhege Chipiching aminttong enhuw ijiing lintaang lintaang ttong ing aettong abetthiimpehe.
Ate chona minven derna aeong yaati bekhe Jehudihe enthacha inhehpaahe Jerusalemna eonghe.
Engkhejege irurchuw enthietaana, mibekheching ouwngkongpohege inning morsehe, ajiegachienche enrhier ttongbekhechuw entaa entaa ttongkhangkhing athiepehe.
Inning edongthoh ouwngluw eliimthohching, emmenieng asiihe, “Aettonghehie Galilitena mimaage hekhang?
Engkhejege entaa entaa paamtena ttong ing aeniebekheing aethiemaakhang?
Parthiahe, Medes, Elamitehe, engkhejege Mesopotamia, Jehuditena engkhejege Kappadocia, Pontus engkhejege Asiatena,
Phrygia engkhejege pamphilia, Egypt engkhejege Libya paam arovena aeong Libyahe, Romtena ramkhie evasihe, Jehudihe engkhejege Jehudi dhormo isihe proselites gehe,
Cretena mihe engkhejege Arabhe emmenieing Thangnhang atu paangkarchuw kinttong nge nge kinthiehe.”
Chona emmeniebekheching ouwngluw liimhege ongthie yaarthieluing engkhele engkhe enrhierhe, “Hevehie ajiekhangchiega?”
Changgechuw lintaangheching siimnahege enrhier, “Emmeniehie darkha chii aethar ing ouwngruwgehe.”
Changgechuw Piter ing summalhie engkhehetho, erur eperpaaing ennhingna ahinrhier, “Judia mihe engkhejege Jerusalemna aeongbekhe, heve isuwhhie minghuwruw, engkhejege kerhierhie rongeruw,
Atataa emmeniehie ninnuw ing nimmindin khangkhing juw ouwngruw maagehe, ajiegachienche hevehie siimttimga, hirring ikuw viepehne.
Amachuwmaaga, hevehie laarchangpa Joel arhierbesaga:
Thangnhang ing arhier, attuhna iniena hanghing suwhwate,
tepang bekhe taalina kechipi jilhiewanggete,
engkhejege ninsapahe engkhejege ninsanuwheching kettong phuwngvatehe,
engkhejege ilerheching suwhwang ichiechuw mhuwchevatehe,
engkhejege itarheching enromhang sehwatehe.
Kie keshuwh pesarhe engkhejege nepenuwhe taalina,
chaleching kechipi jilhieningge ttongvatehe.
Engkhejege kieing minvenna luliimnapapaa engkhejege lolhiepaamna bietimna,
thie, engkhejege mhi,
engkhejege mhikhuw ikhuw mindangvanggete.
Thangnhang tena ilhuwngpaa engkhejege athang alaar aviemaalhiele inieing minthim niege engkhejege thaing thie uwmvurvate.
Chona Thangnhang romhing
aeenbekheching ekarpichuw phawatehe.

“Israelhe ninnuw Kieing rhiervang ketehie rongeruw: Nazareth Jesuhie, Thangnhang ing ningkaarna Thangnhang romhingna tepang ing atuchemaa, ittiisuwh nongbekhe engkhejege bietimna atubekheching anhingna Thangnhang ing arhuga nintaa raraaing nimminghuwga;
heve mihie Thangnhang ing mensarim aminghuw engkhejege shuwrimvang ichii abethong nonghie ningkilina im pibesaga, ninnuw ing waajeer tuvang ichii amamaate ningki ing thingkherlina ninthehga.
Changechuw Thangnhang ing ithiena ija chaamtena bethinpige aminrhingpe, ajiegachienche Thangpachuw ithieching khumchemaase.
Ajiegachiinche David ing akhu hanghing arhier,
‘Kieng Thangpachuw aphabekhena kemhuw,
ajiegachienche kieing enlaaluing ama ketachangna ongne;
changtaanaching kebelungriirje ngamsane,
engkhejege kebelieching kerotha aminrho;
Ajienaateinche nang ing kechipichuw longkongna aemamaatenie,
changmaanieche nata Enthiing Engkhechuw emaangnate eminlhuwmaatenie.
Nang ing irhingna lhamchuw iminthiechiege;
nang ing kebuwmna rotharhonapaaing eentupipechie!’
“Kilhang Israelhe, aesungkhor pipa David khuna, ama aethieje thihse, ideemje adeempehe, engkhejege athenchuw atenie ipha ikaarna uwmne ichiehie kieing atataa aerhiir kechese.
Amabe laarchangpageke, ama achiina, dhara na ehungsuw engkhe ching Eruwng ongtaana meongvate tege Thangnhang ing anhingna ttongneer apihechuw aminghuwga.
Hevehie mensah mhuwge Aantinpa hangrhingvang ichiechuw arhierbesaga, arhierchuwbe,
‘Amachuw norohnaje bethin maanie,
abechii, ahumje emaangchuw phamaanie.’
Heve Jesuhie Thangnhang ing aminrhingpe, engkhejege kinnuwbekheing saarkhiechuwgung.
Changtanaching Thangnhang kih tachangna minlhuwngge engkhejege Chipi Enthiing jihpewang ichii ttongneer Amapatena phuwngge, ninnuw ing nimmhuw engkhejege ninthiehie amaing ajihbetthumga.
Ajiegachiinche Davidche thangvente ikarmaaga, changgechuw atararaing arhier,
‘Thangnhangching kethangnhang nhingna arhier,
Ketachangna ongre,
kieing enjehnahechuw kikheederna kesiimaataang.’
“Changtaanaching ninnuw ing thingkherlina nintheh Jesuhie Thangnhang ing Thangpaje Aantinpaje abesuwhga atehie Israel ingkuwbekheing atataa minghuwresie.”
Ate emmenieing enthietaanaching imbelung enhimpaalhuwhege Piterle ttongjirpahenhingna enrhier, “Keu kenehe, ajie tuteruw?”
Piter ing ennhingna arhier, “Belung huwngruw engkhejege Jesu Khrista romhingna isiicher nintubekhe akuhnaing chii luhruw; amaching Chipi Enthiingchuw phawangninte.
Ajiegachiinche ninnhingna, ninsitihenhingna engkhejege endahpaana aeonghe Thangnhangching anhingte aeenbekheching ttongneerchuw phawang nintega.”
Engkhejege lintaang lintaang saarkhie enhimpaa apithoh enrhieing betthohpihege arhier, “Heve ebour misienhetena ninnuw ing engkarsaruw.”
Hanghing attongrhier aliehehing chii aluhpe, engkhejege ama aenienaching mi chiing ouwngthum athinpehe.
Emmenieng ttongjiirpahe imminchuwlina engkhejege engkhepang ouwngteuhhege theh ensaataana, engkhejege hinthamsahege aanasiir belung aminlhuwpehe.
Ttongjiirpaheching luwliimna engkhejege bietimna enhimpah entuchetaanaheching ittisehe.
Thacha mi bekheching ouwngkonghege indeenbekhe engkhepanging entuhaahe.
Emmenieng indeenbekhe juwrhege achuw chuw ing engkana enhuw ijieng asimpihe.
Aanasiir ing Thangnhang eenna belungrier engkhepang ing ouwngkonghege, aeen aeena tal bekhiehege rotha aerhohpaaing belung nongepahing theh ensaahaape,
emmenieng Thangnhangchuw mimpaasahege mibekhetena lungsiichuw aphasaahe. Engkhejege ikarpi aphahechuw Thangnhang ing aanasiir aminchumpipehe.
Aenie engkhena Piterle Johon ing pungpha ouwngthum siim rovena athamnaing Thangnhang eente ithenghe.
Engkhejege amanuw ing aberhingle bettiimge akhih aebong pesar engkhe virhiehege Thangnhang eenna evabekhenhingna ajiegemo kanavang ichii aphanaing Aetthapa Eengkhaarkungna aanasiir asiehhe.
Amaing Piterle Johon ing valhuwrong atechuw amhuwtaana aephaphuw anhiisaape.
Piterle Johon ing eebeertihhege engkhejege arhierhe, “Kinnuwhie eebeer,”
Engkhejege ajie phasawang ketega tege belung ilhuwpaaing aabiirche.
Changgechuw Piter ing arhier, “Kieing sana lopachuw deensaamaang, changgechuw kedeenchuw nanhingte pesagechie; Nazareth Jesu romhingna hangniir ing beve.”
