Engkhejege amaing akih tachang bechuwge abethiepe; engkhejege chalerahching akhiruwkhuwle akhih hangperse.
Hangkhuwngge engkhejege hangniirge, bevege emmenietho Thangnhang eente valhuwsehe, hungsi vasige Thangnhangchuw amimpaape.
Mibekheching isichuw amhuwheche Thangnhangchuw amimpaapehe.
Thangnhang een Aethapaa Engkhaarkungna enhienaing mi aeong amachuwga atechuw emmenieng minghuwhege emmenieching ittiishuw nong anhingna atulinaching ouwngluwliimsehe.
Engkhejege amaing Piterle Johonchuw abechuwleching, mibekheing ouwngluw liimhege Solomontaga ate atebuna emmeniebekhe vatensehe.

Amachuw Piter ing amhuwheche, ennhingna ahintong, “Israelhe ninnuw ajietuna ninluw irhiiga changmaanieche ajietuna ingeebeergechuw, amaing isi achehie kinnuw ing kintuchetaana, changmaanieche kinning aminttuh taana isi kimminchega nintega?

Amahie Abraham Thangnhang, Issak Thangnhang engkhejege Jakob Thangnhang, imapuw imapahe Thangnhang amine Jesuchuw atteh alaar minlhuwngge Pilat mhekungna lhinchuwge amaing bethinning tejenie ninrhu maaga.
Changgechuw ninnuwche Enthiing engkhejege dhormo aecher amachuw rhumaachuwge, mitheh engkhechuw ninrotumna abethinnaing ninnhie.
Engkhejege irhing aapuwchuw thehchuwge. Amabekhechuw kinnuw saarkhiegung.
Engkhejege ama romhing athachalina ninnuw ing nimmhuw engkhejege nimminghuw pesarhie perse abechiije nimmhekungna pumttha tthase;
“Engkhejege, atebe, keukenehe, ningeelhuwnghe aapuwheching entubekhechuw ningnuw ing minghuwmaachuwge nintu keminghuwga.
Hanghing Thangnhang ing laarchangpahenhingna arhierbesa Aantinpaching ijachaam phawang atechuw alir ashuwnaga.
Chonaching, nimbelungriir huwngruw, engkhejege Thangnhangte vaanlehnung isiicher nintubekhe irhupichervate,
Amana ninnuw ing amachuw aphanaching Thangnhang mhekungna belungrier chona iniechuw thengvate; engkhejege ninrotumna aaturbesa Aantinpa, Jesuchuw jincheerwate,
simriipaam aangkheng amintharmaataang Thangvenna ongniege atehie Thangnhang ing enthiing laarchangpahenhingna aphuwng besaga.
Mosi ing arhier, ‘Nin Thangnhang Thangnhangching nimmihe kaartena ninrotum laarchangpa kiehangchie himbesuwniege, Amaing arhier bekhechuw rongewangninte.
Engkhejege, amalina arongemaa mibekhechuw engkaartena iphichervate.’
Engkhejege Samuelna betthiimge Thangnhang ttongjiirpaheching engkhejege lintaang lintaangheng aatongbekhejeng ama aeniehechuw aminthangbesagehe.

Ninnuwbe Thangnhang ttongjiirpahelina engkhejege Thangnhang ing nimmapuw nimmapahe nhingna ttongdeen atulina ihungsuwgechuw, hanghing Abraham nhingna arhier, ‘Engkhejege tuti baasien lolhiepaamna aeong eengkuhhekhing rasie aetthachuw phawate.’
Thangnhang ing aminechuw ahimbesuwle, ninnhingna mensarim ichaama nintuchuw matenuwge rasie aettha apinaching aminrhingga.”
Piterle Johon ing mihenhingna enttongle, khorpuwhe, Thangnhang een aalhuwngheching, engkhejege Saddukiheching thenghege.
Jesuhie ithietena hangrhingse ate aminchuwhe engkhejege aminthanghelina nongemaasehe.
Amalinaching emmeniechuw suwrhege kholhie avietaanaching mikhumsungte akhowaar iphang athaarpehe.
Changgechuw ttongchuw aathiebekheching athachahe, engkhejege emmemichuw mi chiing rongabekhegehe.
Amenhie aeniena paam aapuwhe, upahe engkhejege Thiimdeeheching Jerusalemna engkongsehe,
chona khorpuw elhuwng Hanna, Kaiaphas, Johon engkhejege Alexander, engkhejege elhuwng khorpuwhe eengkuwheje emvehe.
Chona mikhumna aeongbekhechuw meneerhege asiehe, “Ajie nintuche uwmge achuw romhingna hevehie nintuga?”
Chaleching Piter ing Chipi Enthiing ing siehge, ennhingna arhier, “paam aapuhe, engkhejege upahe,
kinnuw ing heve aeniena engkhenhingna aettha nong kintubekhelina, ajiekhangkhing heve mihie kimmintthaga ate isietenuwbe,

ninnuwbekhe engkhejege Israelhe mi bekhena hevehie kimminthangsaaga, ninnuw ing thingkherlina nintheh, Thangnhang ing ithiekaartena aminrhing Nazareth Jesu Khrista romhingna, engkhejege ama romhingna, heve mihie pumttha tthage nimmhekungna neerne.
Heve Jesuhie,
‘Een aatuhe ninnuw ing ekanama lhung ga ningtekhing ariikieng lhuwngchuw ensuwhse.’
Achuwnhingtenadong isiikhatena aminlenpivang ichii uwmmaa; ajiegachienche ama apaarna iniechuw ikarpiwangechii mihenhingna apih lintaang romhing minven derna uwmmaa.”
Ate emmenieng Piterle Johon thona chuw emmhuwche engkhejege lerii ihemaahe michamgehe ate minghuwhege ouwngluw liimsehe, engkhejege Jesutho enrhiegehe atejechuw aminghuwpehe.
Aena aminttha pesarching empaangna ineerchuw immhuwche emmenieng amalina ajiedong rhierchemaasehe.
Changgechuw emmenieng mihechuw upahe ouwngkonghe kaartena/taangte asuwnaing rhierhege amalina ennajeer ing entanasehe.
Emmenieing arhier, “Enieng entaalina ajie tuteruw?” “Ajiegachiinche emmenieng eluwpapaa bietimna atataa atuhechuw Bethlehemna aeonghe nhingna amindangsehe, amachuw inieng irhumaa chemaamie.
Changgechuw hevehangchiehie mikaarna entunamaaing, emmenieng ate bettiimniege achuw nhingnadong heve romhinghie enrhiernamaaing minttiiteruw.”
Hanghing emmeniechuw eenhege, Jesu romhingna enttongnamaadeh, engkhejege emminchuwnamaaing ttongper apipehe.
Changgechuw Piterle Johon ing abesanghe, “Thangnhang entongtena ithi eng ninttong kinrongeching Thangnhang mhekungna aetthagemo, aetthamaaga ninnuw ing waajiir turuw.
Ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing kimmhuw engkhejege kinthiechuw itongmaa chemaauwng.”
Avonhie imminttiinhuwteching amingkepehe, ajiegachienche mibekheching ishuwbekhelina Thangnhangchuw immimpaa tahnaching emmaraar jongchemaasehe.
Ajiegachiinche kuwm summillie aphabesa pesarlina aena aminttha bietimnalina chinga.
Emmeniechuw embethinnhuwte ingeelhanghenhingte vahege khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejge upaheching ennhingna arhierbekhechuw atongpehe.

Emmenieing amachuw enthieche belungriier engkhepang ing Thangnhangnhingte erur engkaangpahing arhierhe, “Aatuchecher Thangnhang, Thangven engkhejege simriipaam aatu, rimchie engkhejege asungna euwmbekhe,
amahie Chipi Enthiing apaarna kimmapa namine David nherna nang ing narhier besaga;
‘Ajietuna lintaang yaatihe
ching enther iphuwrga?
engkhejege ajietuna miheching ouwngsuwmavang ichii engkharga?
Lolhiepaam eruwngheching hangneerhege engkhejege aapuwheching engkongpohhege Aantinpa engkhejege Thangpatalina hangneersehe.’
Ajiegachiinche heve khuwpuwna nang ing thou natehbesa enthiing namine Jesulina lintaang yaatihetho Israelhe mitho engkhejege Herodjeng, Pontus Pilat jeching,
nakihing engkhejege amaing amindeen enhuw ijieng suwhwang ate, mensa abethongbesachuw atunaing, atataa heve khuwpuwna aangkheng engkongposehe.
Engkhejege atebe, Thangnhang, emmenieing imminttiihie eebeerpisare, engkhejege ina-iki amintthahna, engkhejege enthiing namine Jesu romhing apaarna bietimnabekhe engkhejege luliimna atuchenaing,
Nang ing naki najamlehing thona itthaing Thangpa ttongchuw atongchenaing namine kinnuwchuw ipesare.
Hanghing inghinthamle, enngeengkongna amhinchuw ouwngnuhse; engkhejege Chipi Enthiingching siekanghege, thona aetthapahing Thangnhang ttong aettonghe.”

Ate thachabekhe aruh aruh ing belungrier engkhepang engkhejege rhingrier engkhepang ing uwmhege achuw engkhedong ing enta entaaching indin pihsehechuw enrinnega ichiin mindeenmaahe, changgechuw indinbekhe emmeniebekheing aphasaagehe.
Emmenieng Thangpa Jesu ihangrhinglina entuchepaa tho enrhiing ttongjiirpaheching saarkhie apihe, engkhejege mibekhe ing lungsiichuw aphahe.
Engkaarna achuwdong iveh uwmaahe, ajiegachienche ama ram, een adinbekheching juwrhege ama aminbekhechuw vichihege.
Ttongjiirpahe nhingna sehege, achuw engkheing kanavang ichie uwniebe amachuw asimpihe.
Chonaching Kuprustena mi, Levit he sungkhortena Ttongjiirpaheching Barnabas romhing aphuw (ama aminghuwna chuwbe “belung aminlhuwng sapa”) atenaga.
Amaing adin lhiechuw juwrge, sheerchuw vichige ttongjiirpahe buwmna avasiepe.
Changgechuw Ananias ate mi engkheching anepenuw Sapphirathoh ram engkhe juwrhege, anepenuwjeng aminghuwga,
amaing aminchuw saruh engkhe ttheege saruh engkhe vichige ttongjiirpahe nhingna asiehpe.
Changgechuw Piter ing arhier, “Ananias, ajietunaching Chipi Enthiingchuw minchechiege, engkhejege ram najuwr amin saruh engkhe ttheechiege, Saitaan ing nabelungriir minsiihkangchiege natuga?

Najuwrmaalhiele chingbe nareenne maakhang? Engkhejege najuwrnhuwtechingbe aminchuw namindeen ing tuvangnate maakhang? Nang ing natuhie nabelung riirna ajietunaching namindeenga? Nang ing mihechuw naminchemaaga, Thangnhangchuwga.”
Ananiasching amabekhechuw athieche tiehge vathise. Engkhejege amachuw athiebekheching aettepohsehe.
Chona elerheching aedumhege pien ing ilhuwmhege chihege arhiepehe.
Uwmphege pungpha ouwngthuwm aanhuwna anepenuwching amachuw minghuwluing valhuwse.
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “ninnuw ing ramchuw hangjehmehna kinjuwrga nintechuw irhierpee.” Engkhejege amaing arhier, “Uwng, ama aminchuwga.”
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “ajiekhangche ninnuw ing Thangnhang Chipichuw chaang ningibeerga? Ebeer, napuwsar aarhihe akhihechuw eengkhaarkungna uwmne, engkhejege emmenieng nangje irhievatehe.”
Chalerahching amaing Piter khibuwmna vatiege achipi abethinpe. Elerhechuw avalhuwheche ithiechuw amhuwpehe, engkhejege emmenieing aedumhege apuwsar paangna adimpehe.
Chonaching ruwhchangsungbekhena engkhejege amabekhe ishuwchuw aathiebekheching ittisehe.
Ate ttongjiirpaheching ittiisuwhpapaa bietimna mihenhingna tuhege. Engkhejege emmeniebekheing Solomon atebouna belungrier engkhepang ing aeuwmhe.
Changgechuw lintaangheching engkaarna thona aetthapaaing vaanve chemaahe, changgumpachuw miheching aajahe.
Changgechuw pesarheje, nepenuwheje inhimpah thachahege inhimseseh engkongsehe.
Chonaching Piter ing avasile arothaasii panggejenie engtaalina abouhnaing aenahechuw lhampuw bekhena vihrhiehege aejaartaalina aminjaarpehe.
Amana Jerusalem akurna aeongbekhe khuwpuwtena mi enhimpaaheching aenahe engkhejege ebour chipi ing tuunghege aminjahechuw vihrhiehege engkhejege ouwngkongbekhechuw amintthaahe.
Chona khorpuw elhuwngching engkhejege amathoh enrhiehe Saddusihe aruhethoh entaalina kallaasehe,
Ttongjiirpahechuw suwrhege mikhum sungte athaarpehe.
Changgechuw yenna Thangven michierching mikhumsungtena eenkhaarbekhe aemhong cherge engkhejege bethinhege arhier,
“Engkeruw, Thangnhang eenna vaneernung mihenhingna heve ninrhingna ttongbekhehie tongruw.”

Amachuw enthietaanaching khuw ahungwaarle Thangnhang eenna valhuwhege aminchuwhe. Changgechuw khorpuw elhuwngle aanrhiiphuwheching vahege, Upahe amana Israel sitihe upabekhe eenhege, emmeniechuw avirhiina ing mikhum amhinte achiirpehe.
Changgechuw evahe phamneheching emmeniechuw mikhumsungna teuhmaahege hungeenlihege aminthangpehe.
“Kinnuw ing mikhum eenchuw aetthajeh ingkam engkhejege eenkhaar aarhuwngheching eneerje kimmhuw, changgechuw kingeemhongche asungna mi engkhedong teumaasung.”
Ate Thangnhang een uwpale khorpuw elhuwngheching ttongchuw athieheche, emmenieing inning dongpohsehe.
Chona achuw engkheching thengge ennhingna atong, “Ebeerruw, ninnuw ing mikhumsungna ninthaarhekhing Thangnhang eenna mihechuw aminchuwnaahe.”
Chona een aarhuwng auwpa amana upahetho vahege ahinrhiepehe, changgechuw ajiedong minlumaahe, ajiegachienche miheching lhuwng ing ideengvate tehege enttiihe.
Emmeniechuw hinrhiehege upahekaarna ameneerpehe. Engkhejege khorpuw elhuwngching ennhingna ttong asiehe,
rhierhege, “kinnuw ing ama romhingchuw tongmaaruwteuwnge ttongper kimpigechuw, ninnuw ing heve ttonghie Jerusalem ipha vorphohchuwge, amana heve mi thiehie kintaalina betthumte nintega.”
Changgechuw Piterle ttongjiirpaheching abesanghe, “Kinnuw ing mihenhingtena ithi ing Thangnhang ttongchuw minjiewang kintega,
kimmapuw kimmapa Thangnhang ing Jesuchuw minrhingrihge, amachuw ninnuw ing thingtaalina bikhichuwge ninthehga.
Israelhe nhingna belungrier ahuwngna engkhejege isiicher ikuhpinaing amachuw auwpa ikarpi aapuw besuwge Thangnhang ing akih tachangching aathohpe.
Kinnuw ing hevebekhelina saarkhiegung, engkhejege Thangnhang ing arhier aminjiehenhingna ajipih Chipi Enthiingjeching saarkhiega.”
Changgechuw emmenieng amachuw enthietaana enther phuwrhege thehning atepehe.
Changgechuw Pharisi engkhe upahekaartena Gamaliel ate waajiir Thiimpuw mibekheing aajaahe amaching hangneerge pesarhechuw amongna taangte ameongna ttongper apipehe.
Chona amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kilhang Israelhe, ninnuw ing emmenietaalina ajie khangchie tuvang nintega ehrierpisaruw.

Ajiegachiinche heve iniehie aviemaalhiele athienening mi kieging ate Theudas hangneerge anhingna pesar mi roza chamilliebekhe lhuwsehe, changgechuw amachuw thehege aanhuw aajiebekhechuw kiecherhege emmochersehe.
Heve mi enhuwna mi romhing ateemlehe Galilitena Judas hangsuwge, aanhuw ijie mi alhehheje kiicheerge, ataaje vathise.
Ate ninnhingna kerhierga, heve mihehie mahenung bethinruw; ajiegachienche hevehie tepangtenageniebe mangchervate;
Changgumpachuw Thangnhangtenageniebe, ninnuw ing memaangche maatenuw; Thangnhanglina nintuga ichiechuw endangvate!”
Emmenieching amaing arhierchuw arhupehe,
engkhejege emmenieing ttongjiirpahechuw eenhege binhege, Jesu romhingna enttongnamaaing ttongper pehege abethinpehe.
Chonaching heve romhinglina aejanang imphabekhe engkhaanghie matichane tehege rotharoh ing uphahe kaartena engkesehe.
Engkhejege aanasiir Thangnhang eenna engkhejege Aeen aeenna emmenieng Jesuhie Aantinpaga tehege minjaamhege minchinluing atuhe.

Heve iniesungnahing sepohhe immasing ahinthithoh amana Greek ttong aettonghe Hellenists engkaarna eengnge ichiemaa Hebruhe taalina aettong abethiimpehe, ajiegachienche immhekhuwnuwhechuw aanasiir na sinpimaasehe entetaanachingga.
Chonaching summalhie ennhieheching sepohbekhechuw eenhege enrhier, “aesaaphuw eenphuw nonglinahing inieng Thangnhang ttong aminjiemaahie tumaamenie.
Chonaching kilhanghe, romhing ibourma, Chipi Enthiinglina iviir pesar sarie ningkaarna jongruw; heve nonglina emmeniechuw minsernateruw.
Changgechuw aeniechuwbe ahinnhiena engkhejege ttongchuw aminjienaching ebelung minlhuwteruw.”

Emmenieng arhierhechuw aangkheng ing rhuhege, engkhejege Chipi Enthiing ing isiikang athacha eperpaa pesar Stiphen, Philip, Prokharus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas engkhejege, Antioch tena Jehudi dhormo alie Nikolas hechuw eeteurhege,
emmeniechuw ttongjiirpahe mhekungna meneerhege, engkhejege emmenieng hinthamhege entaalina eengki abangpipehe.
Chona Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw hanglhuwngge, Jerusalemna sepohhe hangnhimse, engkhejege khorpuwhe enhimpahejeng thachahege ajiihe.
Engkhejege Stiphen ing lungsiile atucheching siihge, mikaarna elhuwngpaa lurhiina amana bietimna atu.
Changgechuw Freedmen (hanghing aminghuwhe) khuwngsangtena alhehheching, Sirenetenahe, Alexandriatenahe engkhejege Siliale Asiatena heching hangneerhege Stiphenthoh ouwngrhumaasehe
Changgechuw amaing ivierle Chipi Enthiing ing enrhieng ahangttongtahnaching besangchemaasehe.
Chona pesar alhechuw sinhege aminrhierhe, “Kinnuw ing amang Mosile Thangnhang taalina iechaamaa ttongne.”
Emmenieching mihechuw, engkhejege upahechuw engkhejege Thiimdeehechuw betthohege, engkhejege minghuw minghaluing namhege engkhejege suwrhege upahenhingte ahinrhiepehe;
Emmenieing amamaa saarkhie pehege ennhier “Heve pesar ing enthiing amhinlina engkhejege waajiir ttongtholina aettong minchinmaa;
Ajiegachiinche Nazareth Jesu ing heve amhinhie ittheniege engkhejege Mosi ing impee anongchuw mintehchervanggie tege arhier kinthie.”
Engkhejege upahe aeonghe bekheing amachuw ebeertihhege amhechuw minven michier mhesuw khangkhing amhuwhe.
Chonaching khorpuw elhuwng ing anhingna asie, “Heve ttonghehie atataaga?”
Engkhejege Stiphen ing abesang; “keu kenehe, kemapahe, aerongepiruw, athang alaar aeuwm Thangnhangching kimmapuw Abraham nhingna, amaing Haranna athengmaalhiele Mesopotomiana aongle
anhingna arhier, ‘Napaam engkhejege uwnepasahe bethin ing nanhingna minthievang kete paamte sire ate.’
Chona amaing Chaldean paamtena joungge Haranna paarse. Amapa athinhuwte amatena atele ninnuw ing ningongna paam hevena hungthengse;
amaing hevena lerchii aphaphuwchuw pemaa; akhih siihnadong pemaa, changgechuw anhingna engkhejege enhuwte siti baasienhenhingna aapuw aanshuwnaing asiti auwmmaalhiele ttong adeenbesaga.
Engkhejege Thangnhang ing hanghin arhier, ama asitibaasien ing mipaamte mhar khangkhin thengniege ama lepaaching emmeniechuw suwh besuwheniege kum chamilliephana sewatehe.
‘Changgechuw emmenieing sepa atu mihechuw kieing waajiir tuvanggie,’ tege Thangnhang ing arhier, ‘engkhejege ama aanhuwna emmenieng hungsuw heniege hevenahing erumvatehe.’

Chona amaing vintinna ttongtho apihe, Engkhejege hanghin Abrahamching Issak amapa ouwngsuwge, engkhejege aenie neeriihna vin atin; engkhejege Isakching Jakob mapa, amana Jakob ing imapa emapuw summalhie ennhiejechuw hanghin atu.
“Kimmapa kimmapuwheching Joseph taalina kallaahege emmenieng Egypte ajuwrpehe; changgechuw Thangnhang ing aanrhiiphuw.
Engkhejege ijachaam aphabekhelina karpige Egypt Eruwng Pharaoh mhekungna lungsii engkhejege ivier apha, engkhejege amaing Josephchuw Egypt engkhejege eenkuwbekhelina aapuw abesuwpe.
Chona Egypt engkhejege Kanaan apum alaang vinttaam engkhejege ijachaam aphapehe, engkhejege imapaheching aesaaphuw uwmmaase.
Changgechuw Jakob ing Egyptna saangbaar uwmne ate thiege, mensang emapahechuw acheerpehe.
Amenhiena eenjusile Joseph ing auw anehe nhingna ataachuw amindangpe, engkhejege Joseph eenkuwhejechuw Pharoahnhingna aminthiepe.
Chona Joseph ing cheerhege, emmapa Jakob amana auwanebekhe mi sum sarielhie rongachuw anhingte ajirhiepehe;
Hanghing Jakob ing Egypte yuwngse. Amaje kimmapaheje amana ithiegehe.
Emmenie humbekhechuw Shekemte rhinhege Abraham ing Shekemna aeong Haamor sapahe nhingtena sheer ing aalie thensungna adimhe.
“Changgechuw Thangnhang ing Abrahamthoh eenrhuhege ttongdeen aphachuw innheengge, Josephchuw aminghuwmaa Egypt eruwng lintaang engkhe ahimbesuw phana,
miheching Egyptna hangpungsehe, ithije ahinthipehe.
Eruwng hevehing iyaatihechuw amamaa amamaa tupeehege, nedounghechuw arhingnamaa bethinheniege, imapa imapuwhechuw ichamaapaaing atuhe.
Chaleching Mosichuw aberhingpe, Thangnhang mhesuwna enhimpaa aettha; hanghin amapa eenna tha ouwngthum ajuhhe.
Aamachuw alhinnuwte Pharaoh sanuwching icheumge asapa besuwge ahinjuh.
Hanghing Mosichuw Egypthe aehe asingna bekhe minchuwge engkhejege ama attongnaje anongnaje pirthang ehungvie.
“Kum summillie ahimphache, auwnehe Israel sitihechuw abelungrierna mhuwning atepe.
Achuw engkhe ingkaarna aechama tuheniebe amaing buwmpihege Egypt michuw thehge aminjapachuw abetheerpihe.
Amaing Thangnhang auw anehechuw akarpipe ate emmenieng aminghuwpehe tege amindeen, changgechuw emmenieing minghuwmaahe.
Amenhie iniena ennajeer ing ennahechuw mhuwge, emmenie nhingna enchamruw ate, ‘Kilhang mihe, ninnuw uwnegechuw; ajietuna engkhele engkhe ennagechuw?’
Changgechuw amathoh aeonghaa aettamaa amachuw aatupaching Mosichuw nhuvungge arhier, ‘Achuw ing nanghie kintaalina aapuw waajiir atuna embeshuwga?’
‘Nang ing ayennie Egypt mi nathekhangkhing, kieje ithehniete?’
Hevehie arhiertaanaching Mosi tenge Midian paamte ongse; amaing asapa ennhie aberhing.
“Kum summillie aphanhuwte Sinai boung rampana minven michier engkheing thing anhaakaarna mhi ettuwngsungna aminthie.
Amachuw Mosi ing amhuw pihchuw amhuwche aluw liimse; engkhejege aetthajeh ebeergete tege aanheengche Thangnhang ttong thengse.
‘Kie namapa namapuwhe Abraham Thangnhang, Issak, engkhejege Jakob Thangnhangging,’ chotaanaching Mosi ing enchiimge embier chemaase.
Chona Thangnhang ing anhingna arhier, ‘Nakhikhumkha siih, ajiegachienche naniertah amhin hie enthiing lolhiega.
Egypt paamna kemihe ijanang aphahechuw kieing kemhuwpe, engkhejege aeja erurchuw kethiepe, chotaanaching kieing kargetehe tengge ithengging; ate houng, kieing Egypt te chierwanggechie.’

“Achuw ing nangchuw aapuw engkhejege waajiir tuna embesuwga tehege arhumaahe Mosihie anhah ipungkaarna anhingna aminthie minven michier apaarna aapuw engkhejege Aantinpi aansuwnaing Thangnhang ing achierpe.
Heve mihin Egyptna, iseen rimchiena, engkhejege rampakaarna kum summillie ittiishuwpapa nong engkhejege bietimna tuge emmeniechuw ahinrhiepehe.
Thangnhang ing ninguw ninnehekaarna, ninrotumna kiehangchie ttongjiirpa engkhe besuw vanggie ate Israelhe sitihenhingna arhier Mosichuw hevehiega.
Sinai boungna anhingna ttong arhier Thangven michier, engkhejege imapa imapuw hetho rampana, ruwhchanghekaarna aeheongchuw amahiega, ataaing kinnhingna ipevang ichii irhingna ttong aphanachuw impipe.
“Emapa emapuwheching attongchuw minjienummaahege amachuw engkaartena lhinhege, embelungriirchuw Egypte inghirhege,
Aaron nhingna rhierhege, ‘Kimmana sinavang ichii rotum leh rothaasie etupeeruw, ajiegachienche kinnuwchuw Egyptena inghinrhie Mosi hevena ajie ishuwga minghuwmaauwng.’
Ama aphanaching shiirtee engkhe khangchie rotha tuhege inthiphuw pih hinchihege ingki ing atu pihselina kummhe atuhe.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing mahege emmeniechuw mimvenna euwmbekhechuw arumnaing abethinpehe; Thangnhang Laarchangpahe leriina abejiebesachuwga:
‘Israelhe eengkuwhe,
rampakaarna kum summillie ninnuw ing ninthikha engkhejege inthina sah kinhingna impee magechuw.
Engkhejege ninnuw ing Moloch pienthaam chichuwge engkhejege Rephan leh aarsii chuw erum na ro tha ningmin suwh;
chotaanaching kieing ninnuwchuw Babilon araarte lhinwanggechuw.’
“Emapa emapuw henhingna rampana saarkhie pienthaamchuw aeuwmbesaga, amachuwbe imhuwche endang enhuw ijieng tuvang nintega tege Mosithoh aettong Thangnhang ing aminchuwhe khangchiega.
Emapa Emapuwheching Thangnhang ing athorbesa yaatihe paamna emvalhuwle ama pienthaamchuw Joshuathoh arinhe. Amachuw David ing apaarlena iphang aeuwm.
David ing Thangnhang mhekungna lungsii phasage Jakob Thangnhang rotum ipaarna amhin anhiesah.
Changgechuw Solomon ing Thangnhang rotum eenchuw atupe.
“Changgejenie Engkaangseh Aapuwching mee ing, aki ing atu eenchuu idemaa; Laarchangpahe arhierbesachuw hevehiega:
‘Thangvenhie keongnaga,
Lolhiepaamhie kikhisiihnaga;
Thangnhang ing arhier,
Kerotumna ajie khangchie een tuvangniete?
Changmaanieche keja betthumna amhin akhukhaga?
Kie keki ing hevebekhehie kitumaakhang?’
“He arieng iperhe, belungriernaje ningeenaje vin atinmaahe, ninnuw ing apha bekhena Chipi Enthiinglina rhumaachuw. Nimmapa nimmapuw heching atukhangkhing ninnuwjeng nintuse.

Nimmapa nimmapuw heching laarchangpahe kaarna achuwche ijanang nimpimaa uwmnechuw? Engkhejege emmenieng Dhormo Icher thengvang ate khu aattonghechuw thehchuwge, engkhejege ninnuw ing aalhinhe engkhejege aathehechuw eensuwsechuw.
Ninnuwbe Thangven michierhe apaarna Waajiir ttongtho chuw nimphaga, changgechuw amachuw minjiemaachuw.”
Hevebekhehie enthie taanaching enther iphuwrching eengha iriirhege eonghe.
Changgechuw amache Chipi Enthiing ing siihge minvente ahingeebierche, Thangnhang athang alaar engkhejege Jesu ing Thangnhang atachangna inierchuw mhuwge arhier,
“Ebierruw!” “Thangven emmhongge engkhejege Mi Sapaching Thangnhang atachangna aeong kemhuwse!”
Changgechuw ingeena sienghege erur engkaangpaaing uwnghege avithorpehe.
Chona emmenieing khuwpuwtaangte vikihege lhung ing ideeng abetthiim pehe; engkhejege ama saarkhieching empienhechuw Saul ate eler engkhe akhibuwmna asiihe.
Engkhejege Stiphen ing Thangnhangchuw eensage, engkhejege “Thangpa Jesu kichipi iliepisare” atele ching lhung ing adeengpehe.
Chona amaing akhiruwkhuw phinge engkaangpahing euwng, “Thangnhang, emmenie taalina isiicher ebeboupimaare.” Amachuw rhierge rhaangchinse.
Engkhejege ama athehhechuw Sauljeng arhupigehe.
Chove aenienaching Jerusalemna euwm ruwhchanglina enhimpaa ijachaam suwhse; chonaching ttongjiirpahechuw emveluung emmeniebekhe Judia engkhejege Samaria paamte tenchersehe.
Chipilina belung ilhuwhpaaheching rhiihege enhimpaa inning isiepaaing ttaasehe.
Changgechuw Saul ing een eenna valhuwge, nepenuw pesar hechuw vikige mikhumsungte athaartaanaching ruwhchangchuw abekhiecherpe.
Ate itenheching aettha ttongjiirchuw bevehege atongpehe.
Philip ing Samaria khuwpuwna ttumge ennhingna Aantinpa Jesu khu aminjaampe.
Mi ruwpuwheching Philip ttong amana bietimna atu mhuwhege belungrier engkhepang ing arongepehe.
Ajiegachiinche ebour chipiheching erur engkaangpaaing uwnghege jungshuwhege; engkhejege aki akhih aethiehe akhih aebonghe amintthaape.
Chonaching ama khuwpuwna aeongheching enhimpaa enrotha rhosehe.
Ate ama khuwpuwna ayen ittiishuwpapa atuche Simon ate pesar engkhe aeong, amaing elhuwngpaa engkheging tesage Samaria mihechuw ningrhiena apigehe.
Anhingna esiingsehna betthiimge apuw ephaing eongbekheching belungrier elhuwpaaing enrhier, “Heve mihie Thangnhangtena pirthangga amahie elhuwngpaaga.”
Engkhejege belung elhuwpaaing arongehe, ajiegachienche apha isipaaing amaing hevehie tuge ouwngluw aminliemgehe.
Changgechuw Philip ing Thangnhang lepaa engkhejege Jesu Khrista romhingna aettha ttongjiir aminjaamchuw emmenieing enthachataana pesarheje nepenuwheje chii alupehe.
Chona Simon ataajeng thachage, chii luhge Phliptho aphabekhena enrhiehe, engkhejege bietimna elhuwngpaa nong mi ing ituchemaa abesuwchuw mhuwge amaje alu liimse.
Ate Samariana Thangnhang ttongjiir aalhaangpe atechuw Jerusalemna aeong ttongjiirpaheching athietaanahe Piterle Johonchuw ennhingna avichierpehe.
Emmenie ennhieching vattumhege, emmenieng Chipi Enthiing aphanaing athampipehe.
Ajiegachiinche Chipi Enthiing ing entaalina ettummaa lhiegehe, changgechuw Thangpa Jesu romhingna chii aluhgethaahe.
Chaleching entaalina ingki baanghege, engkhejege chipi Enthiingchuw aphapehe.
Ttongjiirpaheching kih abaangtaanahe, Chipi Enthiingchuw apipehe atechuw Simon ing amhuwche amaing sheer pehege,
arhier, “Kieje heve pirthanghie ipesanung mitaalina kikih kebaangle emmenieing Chipi Engthiing aphanaing epesare.”
Changgechuw Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Nasheerhie nangtho maanghaaruw, ajiegachienche Thangnhang kihthurchuw sheer ing enlie achega techiige namindeenpe.
Hevelinahing phawang nate nasaruh alhehdong uwmmaa, ajiegachienche nabelungriir chummaase,
Chonaching natthaanamaalinahing nabelung minteh, chona rhunieche, nang ing namindeen eengkuhpinaing Thangnhangte hinthamsare.
Ajiegachiinche nanghie nather eechamaa dhormo arhumaaching emphierga ichii kemhuwsechie.”
Chona Simon ing abesang, “Thangnhangte ithampeeruw, amabekhe kenhingna suwhmaaresie.”
Ate Piterle Johon ing saarkhie apinhuwte engkhejege Thangnhang ttongchuw atongnhuwtehe Jerusalemte eenlihege Samaria khuw enhimpaakaarna aettha ttongjiir aminjaampehe.
Chona Thangnhang minven michierching Philipnhingna arhier, “Hangniir ing chiitite vasi ing Jerusalemtena Gaza lham vijie.” Amahie rampakaar lhamga.
Amana amaing hangnierge vasise. Ate chonaching Ethiopiatena abechii uwmvuwr pesar Ethiopia ruwngpi Kandaee lerchiibekhe apana, apham elhuwng michin Jerusalemte Thangnhang arumnaing evasiga;
Amaing ajungeenlile ama ahawa lina Thangnhang laarchangpa Isaiah leriichuw page aeong.
Chona chipiching Philipnhingna arhier, “apaangna theng ing ahawana enrhiehaaruw.”
Philip ing vatenge, amaing Thangnhang ttong aminthangna Isaiah lerii apachuw thiege arhier, “Nang ing napahie naminghuwchese?”
Amaing abesang, “achuw engkheing eminchuwmaanieche ajiekhang minghuw chevanggetekhang?” Engkhejege amaing Philipchuw eenge kepaangna ongre ate.
Ate amaing apa ttongjiirchuw hevehiega:
“Zouchuw athehnaing aathehhenhingte arhiepehe,
engkhejege Zou atiching amhuwr atinhenhingna,
amaing anher aemhongmaa.
Amachuw echoh amin phahe engkhejege echum wajeerchuw anhing na rhupimahe achuw engkhejege ama amisieng lina rhiirma.
ajienachienche ama ahring riirchuw lolhiepaamtena aliedohpehe.”
Chona abechii uwmvur pesarching Philipnhingna ahinsie, “Thangnhang Laarchangpa ching hevehie achuwlina arhierga? Ataasaalina arhiergemo, changmaanieche lintaanghelina arhierga?”
Chonaching Philip ing aetong betthimge aettha ttongjiirna inthin Jesuchuw aminthangpe.
Hanghing emmenieng lhamna emvasile chii inting amhin engkhena vatungsehe, engkhejege abechii uwmvur pesarching arhier, “Ebeer chii uwmse! Kiehie chii luvang ichielina ajie arhunamaa uwmne?”
Philip ing arhier, “nang ing nabelungriirbekhe ing thachateniebe arhuse.” Chona amaing abesang, “Thangnhang sapa Jesuchuw Aantinpaga ate kethachase.”
Chonaching amaing ahawachuw ameniernaing rhierge, chona Philipje abechii uwmvurpathoh aannhiing chiite ttumhege amaing chii aluhpe.
Emmenieing chiisungtena hungkarhege, chale Thangnhang Chipi ching Philipchuw arhiedohpe, engkhejege abechii uwmvur pesarching mhuwmaase, hanghin arotha aerhopaaing engkese.
Changgechuw Philipchuw Azotusna vatungse, engkhejege amaing Kaesaria atungmaataang khuwpuwbekhena vasige aettha ttongjiirchuw aminthangpe.
Chale aphanaje Thangpa sepohhechuw minttiigetehe engkhejege thegetehe tege Saul ing aaphuw kige khorpuw elhuwngnhingte sise.
Engkhejege ama lhamna pesarje nepenuwje aantuwphuwbekhechuw phierniege Jerusalemte ahinrhie arhunaing Damaskasna khuwngsangbekhete apina ttongtho lerii ipere tege ennhingna anhiipe.
Ate amaing vasige Damaskas tungrong atele minghuw minghaluing minventena lengwaar ing akhumpe.
Amaing lolhiena tiese engkhejege erur engkheing anhingna arhier, “Saul, Saul, ajietuna ijanang impeegechie?”
Amaing asie, “Achuwgechii Thangpa?” Himbesangge, “Kie Jesuging, nang ing ijanang impichiekha.”
“Changgechuw hangthieing khuwpuwte vare, engkhejege ajie tuvang natega atechuw nanhingna iminchuwvate.”
Amathoh isihaa pesarheching erurche thiehege mi achuwdong emmhuwmaa taana, ttongcheluing nierjehsehe.
Ate Saul ing lolhietena hangthiege amhi abelengche ajiedong mhuwmaase; chotaanaching akina bechuwhege Damaskaste ahinrhiepehe.
Amaing inie nethum ephaing ajiedong mhuwmaase, engkhejege ajiedong sa eenlu ing ongse.
Ate Damaskasna sepoh engkhe Anania ate aeong; Thangnhang ing mhihrovaam romhangna minthiege arhier, “Annania.”
Amaing abesang, “Thangnhang hena ongning.”
Thangnhang ing anhingna arhier, “Hangthieng, atataa ate lhamchuw vijieng Judas eenna Saul ate Tarsustena pesarchuw vajong. Ama heve aphanahing amaing ahinthamse,
engkhejege aromhing Annania ate pesar engkheing valhuwge amaing amhi amhuwnaing ataalina akih abaangchuw mhirovaam ing amhuwpe.”
Changgechuw Ananiaing abesang, “Thangnhang, kieing heve pesar khuhie Jerusalemna aeong enthiing mihechuw aminjapaa mibekhenhingtena kethiega;
Hevena naromhingchuw athachahe belung elhuwhechuw aphierna ing khorpuw elhuwnghenhingtena etuchenachuw aphaga.”
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing anhingna arhier,“vare, ajiegachienche lintaang yaatihe, eruwnghe engkhejege Israel sitihe mhekungna keromhing aminjaamnaing heve pesarhie kieing kitourbesah kebenga;
keromhinglina ijehmeh ijachaam khaangvang atechuw anhingna kieing mindangvanggete.”

Chonaching Annaniaing vage aeente valhuwse, engkhejege ataalina akih baangge arhier, “Keu kena Saul,” nang ing imhuw nachenaing, engkhejege Chipi Enthiingching nasiihnaing Thangnhang ing, nawasina lhamna nanhingna imminthie Jesuching kiehie imvibethinga.
Engkhejege chalerahching amhitena akohkhangchie jungbouse, engkhejege emhuwje achepe. Chona amaing hangthiege chii aluhpe,
engkhejege buw sage hangperse.
Inie enhimpaa amaing sepohhetho Damaskasna aeonghaahe,
engkhejege therluung amaing khuwngsangbekhena minjaamge arhier, Amahie Thangnhang Sapaga.

Attong aathiebekheing eenluw liimhege enrhier, “heve mihiemaagemo Jerusalemna heve romhing amindeenhechuw amemaangna atumaakhang? Engkhejege amaing mihechuw phierge khorpuw elhuwnghe nhingna heve lina ethengkhabe.”
Ate Saul ing hangpersesehge, Jesuhie Aantinpaga tege amindangtaana Damaskasna aeong Jehudihechuw inning morsehe.
Inie tepie ahungvienhuwte Jehudiheching amachuw athenaing enthongsehe,
changgechuw hanghin enthonghechuw Saul ing aminghuwpe. Emmenieng yen siim neluing sungkuwngbekhena aariimhe.
Changgechuw asepohheching yenna rhiihege beluna thaarhege roparkurna ajibeboupehe.
Amaing Jerusalemte ahoungle atahin sepohhetho aanteunaing atu; engkhejege ama ate sepoh eensuwse atechuw thachamaahege emmenieing attiepehe.

Changgechuw Barnabas ing hinrhiege laarchangpahe nhingte atahin lhamna Thangnhang chuw ajiekhang amhuwga, engkhejege arhierttong, engkhejege Jesu romhingna Damaskasna thona aetthapaaing aminjaam chuw atongpipehe.
Hanghing Jesu romhingna thona aetthapaaing ttongjiirchuw minjaamge jerusalemna hungsi wasige emmenietho enrhiehe.
Amaing Hellentena mihetho Greek ttong aettonghetho ensanghege, amalina emmenieing athenaing enthongsehe.
Thacha miheching amachuw athieheche Kaisariate rhiihege Tarsuste achierpehe.
Chaleching Judia, Galile, engkhejege Samaria paambekhena ruwhchanghe himminlhuwngge belung ideh aphasaape; Amana Thangnhang ittiilina engkhejege Chipi Enthiing apaarna hintuge mi hangnhimse.
Ate Piter ing hungsi wasige Liddana aeonghe thachahenhingte thengse.
Amana amaing Aeneas ate pesar, kum eeriih aejaartaana eentor alheh ithiechuw aantouphuwpe.
Piter ing anhingna arhier, “Aeneas,” “Jesu Khristaing immindampe; hangthieng najaarnahie bethong!” Engkhejege chalerahching hangthiese.
Engkhejege Liddana, sharonna aeongheching amachuw mhuwhege Thangnhangte inghirsehe.
Ate Joppa khuwna Tabitha, Greek ing Dorkas ate sepoh engkhe aeong. Heve nepenuwching belung ilhuwpaaing aettha nong engkhejege mee apithie nong tuge ipaarga.
Chove aphanaching ama nepenuchuw nage thihse. Emmenieing itthiihege chiingdeen achung engkhena amintorpehe.
Lidda khuwhie Joppa tho endaapaamaaga, chotaanaching amanaching, sepohheching Piterchuw amana ongne ate thiehege avarhienaing pesar ennhii chierhege awajongpehe, “Therluing ethengpisare atehe.”

Chona Piter ing hangnierge emmenietho evahe; engkhejege emvatungche chungtena chiingdeente arhiepehe. Amhinnaching mhekhuwnuwbekhe ttaahege Dorka ing emmenietho ingongle longoh engkhejege piendier aatthiehechuw minthiehege apaangna inierhe.

Changgechuw Piter ing aeongbekhechuw taang besuwhege akhiruwkhuw phinge ahinnhiepe; engkhejege ithiechuw ebierge arhier, “Tabitha, hangthiere,” chona amaing amhi abelengpe, engkhejege Piterchuw amhuwche hangthiege ongse.
Amaing akichuw anhingte vijamge abethiepe; chona mhekhuwnuwhele thachabekhechuw eenge aehangrhingchuw aminthiepehe.
Hevehie Joppana aeongbekheing aminghuwtaanaching mi enhimpaa Thangpachuw athachapehe.
Hanghing atihle amaing Simon ate Savin aatehpathoh enrhiege Joppana inie isiihpa aeonghaahe.
Kesariana Itali raarmi roza engkhe ruhkhelina aapuw aromhing Kornelius ate pesar engkhe aeong.
Amaing aeengkuwbekhetho belungriir aminlhuwpaa, Thangnhang attie, mibekhe apithie, engkhejege aphabekhena Thangnhangte ahintham mi engkhega.
Inie siim engkhena hirring ouwngthum rovena Thangnhang michier engkheching amhi rovaamna minthiege, apaangna valhuwge engkhejege anhingna arhier, “Kornelius.”
Amaing ebiertihge enttii ing arhier, “Hevehie ajiega, Thangnhang?” Amaing abesang, “Nang ing nahintham engkhejege ningsii ipi nahe nongbekhe Thangnhang nabehermaachuw hangtungse.
Ate Joppana aeong Piter ate Simon nhingte mi vibethin ing;
rimchiekurna sawin aatehpa Simon eenna aeongchuw varhiiheresie.”
Chona anhingna ttong aarhier thangven michier aangkether amaing asuwhhekaarna ennhie engkhejege Thangnhang amindeenpah raarmi aalhanghechuw eenge,
engkhejege ennhingna atongchernhuwna Joppate avichierpehe.
Akhowaar siim rovena hanghin emvasile khuwpuwchuw ahimphaphana Piter ing phechungte hangkarge ahintham.
Chale ama inhimpaa avinttaamge buw saning atepe; changgechuw aesaaphuw embethongleching anhingna romhangkhangkhing isie;
Chaleching thangven immhongge, engkhejege elhuwngpah eenlhum pih athinna engkhe jottumge, amachuw ariikieng milliena mingkige lolhiete ajebethin amhuw.
Ama asungna euwmbekhe akhi millie aepaar sahe, lolhiena ilinhe engkhejege minventena vatihe emvecherga.
Chona erur engkhe athieching ajirhier, “Hangthie, Piter; theh ing sare.”
Changgechuw Piter ing arhier, “Amachuw etupimaare, Thangnhang; ajiegachienche hangchie aemaanghe engkhejege ibour kieing kesaamaadehga.”
Erurching avonhie amenhietaana arhier, “Thangnhang ing aminthiingbesachuw nang ing aemaanggehe temaare.”
Hevehie vothummeh minthiege, engkhejege pihechuw minvente ajoliepe.
Hanghing Piter ing amhuwbekhechuw ajiega tege athienening abelungrier ajale, minghuw minghaluing Kornelius ing avichierhechuw thengsehe. Emmenieing Simon eenchuw hinjonghege soung paangna enierhe.
Aromhing Piter ate Simonchuw hena ongne ongmaa tehege asiehe.
Piter ing amhuwbekhechuw akharleching, Chipi ing anhingna arhier, “Ebier, pesar eenthum ing nanghie enjongnaahe.
Hangthieng jungttum, engkhejege nabelungriir emmhaaluing emmenietho enrhienung sire, ajiegachienche kieing kivichiergehe.”
Chonaching Piter ing ttumge ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw ing ninjonghie kieging; ninnuwng ajie tuna ethenggechuw?”

Emmenieng abesanghe, “Kornolius ate raarmi roza engkhe aapuw, dhormo icher Thangnhang attieh engkhejege Jehudi yaatibekheing ajaapaa amang nangchuw ahinrhienaing, engkhejege nanhingtena aettha ttongjiir athienaing Enthiing Minven michierching arhierpiga.”
Amanaching Piter ing emmeniechuw eenhege abethungpehe.
Akhowaar eniena hangthiege emmenietho enrhiehege vasisehe, engkhejege Joppatena thacha lintaanghejeng emmenietho enrhiehe.
Amenhii eniena emmenieng Kesariana vatungsehe, Korneliusjing emmeniechuw tungvatehe tege auw anehe, aalhang alopehe mingkongge ahehaahe.
Piterching avatungle Kornelius ing aantouphuwpe, engkhejege akhibuwmna vakuwmge arumpe.
Changgechuw Piter ing himbekhaage arhier, “Hangniir; kie tepanggethaang.”
Engkhejege enttongleching emvalhuwche mi enhimpaa ouwngkong aphape.

Engkhejege ennhingna amaing arhier, “Jehudi engkheing lintaang yaati mithoh eenteu amana evier waajiir ing arhumaaga ichii nimminghuwga; changgejenie kieng achuw engkhechuw enthiingmaaga ichiehehie rhumaa tege Thangnhang ing kenhingna amindangpe.
Chovelinaching emvarhiichuwhie kieing irhumaa ketumaaga. Ate ninnuw ing ajietuna imvaeengechuw tengge kesiisaagechuw?”
Kornelius ing abesang, “inie nemillie aphape, heve aphanarah hirring ouwngthumna kieenna kehinthamsaale, minghuw minghaluing pesar engkhe elengjeh piendier ing enthongge kepaangna enier.
Amaing arhier, ‘Kornelius, nahinthamhie kethiepe engkhejege nang ing mee ningsie napeesaabekhe Thangnhang ing abehermaaga.
Chonaching Joppate mee chiir ing aromhing Piter ate Simonchuw vaeen; ama riimchie kurna sawin aateh Simon eenna ongne.’

Chonaching kieing therluing nanhingte kevichiergehe, engkhejege enthengpichiehie tthapaane. Chonaching Thangnhang ing nanhingna ttongtho impibekhechuw arongenaing kinnuw hena Thangnhang mhekungna ongsanung.”
Chona Piter ing ennhingna ittong abetthiimpe, “Atataa Thangnhang ing michang mikhe tumah atehie keminghuwpe,
Changgechuw yaatibekhe Thangnhang attie engkhejege dhormo icher nong etubekhena Thangnhang ing arhupeegehe.
Jesu Khrista apaarna belung dejiim aettha ttongjiir Israelhenhingna minjaamniege– amabe mibekhe Thangnhangga.
Ama ttongjiirhie Johon chiilupaing minjaamge Galilina betthiimge Judia paam bekhena aminthangga:

Amachuwbe ajiekhang Thangnhang ing Nazareth Jesuchuw Chipi Enthiing ing thou aatehbesa engkhejege pirthang apih; ajiekhang amaing engkhe engkhete sige Thangnhang ing arhii enhuw ijieng ebour chipiheng amenanghechuw mintthaage,
Chovebekhe atuchuw Judiana engkhejege Jerusalemna atubekhechuw kinnuw ing saarkhiegung. Emmenieing amachuw thingkherlina bikhihege athegehe;
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing inie aminthumna minrhingge mikaarna amindangpe,
Mibekhe nhingnamaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang ing ayen aatourbesahe nhingnaga, engkhejege amathoh ahangrhingnhuwte aesaa een atu enhingnaga.
Chona mikaarna ttongjiir aminjaamna, engkhejege ithiele irhing waajeer itu aapuw Thangnhang ing abesuwchuw Thangpahiega ate saarkhie apinaing, amaing kinnhingna ttongtho impipe.
Ama khuna laarchangpabekhejeng saarkhie apiga, amachuwbe Thangpachuw athacha mibekheing aromhingna isiicher ikupi phasavatehe.”
Piterching ama ttongchuw arhierleching attong arongebekhetalina Chipi Enthiingchuw jottumse.
Chona Yaati lintaang taalinajeching Chipi Enthiing ajottumtahna vin atinhe Piter inhuw ajieheching eenluw liimsehe.
Ajiegachiinche emmenieng lintaang lintaanghe ttong ing ttonghege Thangnhang emmimpahechuw athiehe. Chona Piter ing ahinrhier,
“Emmenieje inieing Chipi Enthiing ephakhangkhing aphagehe, emmeniehie chii aluhnaing achuwching amahie khaamchewang atega?”
Hanghing amaing emmeniechuw chii alunaing ttongtho apipehe. Ama inhuwna amaing inie tepie acheengnaing anhiipehe.
Ate ttongjiirpahe engkhejege Judiana thacha aeongheching yaati lintaanghejeng Thangnhang ttongchuw arhupehe atechuw athiepehe.
Ate Piter ing Jerusalemte ahangche vintinhe thachaheching nongemaahege anhingna arhierhe,
“Ajietunache nang ing vintinmaahenhingna thengchiege theh ninsaahaaga?”
Ate Piter ing ennhingna amabekhechuw ihintong abettiimpe.

“Kieing Joppa khuwpuwna kehinthamle, amana romhang mhirovaamna eminthiege, engkhejege iserphuw pien khangchiena athin pih jottumge, ama ariikieng milliena khiihge thangventena ajihbebow kemhuw; amaching kepaangna thengse.
Amachuw kibeertihche ajiega tengge kekharle, lolhiepaamna akhi minlie ipaar sahe, rampa sahe, avin ing linge ishi engkhejege minventena vatihechuw kemhuwpe.
Chaleching erur engkheing kenhingna ajirhier, ‘Hangthiere, Piter; theh ing sare.’
Changgechuw kieing kebesang, ‘Amachuwmaaresie, Thangnhang, ajiegachienche hangchie aemaang changmaanieche arhumaa pih kenherna thaarmaalhieng.’
Changgechuw avomenhie mimventena erur ing ajibesang ‘Thangnhang ing aminlhiembesachuw, nang ing arhumaaga temaare.’
Hanghing vothummeh ishuw, chona amabekhechuw avonhii minvente ajukicherpe.
Chaleraraaching pesar eenthum Kesariatena kenhingna vihcheerge kinnuw ing kingongna tebouhna niersehe.
Chipi Enthiingching kiechuw ningrhii uwmluing emmenietho vare tege arhier. Heve kuru uneheje kietho enrhieungge ama pesar eente valhuwsung.
Amaing ajiekhang thangven michier aeensungna nierge tege atong, engkhejege rhierge, ‘Joppate chier, engkhejege, Piter atehe Simonchuw hinrhie,
Amaing nanhingna tongvate; ama ttong apaarna nangjeng naeengkuwbekhejeng isiichertena eminlenpivate.’
Engkhejege hanghin ittong kebetthiimle Chipi Enthiingching entaalina abetthiimpelena khangkhing jottumse.
Engkhejege kieing Thangnhang ing arhierttongchuw kinthiepe, hanghing arhierbesaga, ‘Johon ing chiina eenluhga, changgechuw ninnuwchuwbe Chipi Enthiingna iluhvate.’

Chonaching enieng Thangpa Jesu Khristachuw thachameniebe, Thangnhang ing aenhingnaje, emmenienhingnaje enghaajeh kithur ipeniebe, kieching ajii ketuche uwmniege Thangnhangching aminchinnaing ruku chevang ketega?”
Chona emmenieing hevebekhehie athieheche, derenghege, Thangnhang amimpaapehe, emmenieing enrhier “Chogeniebe lintaang yaatihenhingnaje irhingna belungriir amintena arhupipe.”

Ate Stephenchuw athehhe khulina ijanangchuw emphataanaheching entthe cherhege emmenieng Jehudihepangna, lintaangte tongluing ttongjiirchuw vatonghege Phoenicia, Kuprus, engkhejege Antiok phana vasisehe.
Changgechuw engkaarna alhehheche Kuprus amana Kurene pesargehe. Emmenieng Antiokna athengheche Hellen mihenhingna Thangpa Jesu khu atongpihe.
Thangnhang kihchuw emmenietho enrhiehe, engkhejege mi enhimpaaing thachahege Thangnhangte inghirsehe.
Heve Zelhahie Jerusalemna aeonghe inana thiehege Barnabaschuw achierpehe.
Amaing Antiokte avatungche Thangnhang lungsiichuw amhuwche arotha rhohse; engkhejege emmeniebekhechuw Thangnhangte enthacha anierjehnaing engkhejege aphabekhena embelung anhehnaing abetthohhe,
Ajiegachiinche ama aetthapaa, engkhejege Chipi Enthiingna, athacha eperpaa pesar engkhega. Engkhejege mi enhimpaa Thangnhangte ahinrhiepe.
Chona amaing Saulchuw amhuwnaing Tarsuste sise.

Engkhejege amachuw ateuche Antiokte ahinrhiepe; engkhejege hanghing kum engkhe phanaing ruwhchangsungna aruh aruh ouwngkonghege, mi enhimpaa aminchuwpihe; engkhejege Antiokna sepohhechuw mensarim Khristian tege eenromhing aphuwpehe.
Chaleching laarchangpaheching Jerusalemtena Antiokte ijuwnghe.
Engkaarna Agabus ate romhing arinching hangnierge hungvievang ate vinttaam lolhiepaamna shuwvate tege ahimphuwng, amachuw Klaudia apaarle ishuwga.
Amana sepohheching, Judiana aeong thachahe abuumnaing ttong amenierpehe.
Changching emmenieing tuhege; engkhejege Barnabasle Saul ing upahenhingte amahechuw avithaapehe.
Ama apha rovena Herod eruwng ing ruwhchang mi achuw engkhehechuw aminjaanaing akhi akhiingpe.
Amaing Johon auwpa Jakobchuw chimsiing aminthehpe.
Jehudiheching enningchiese ate aminghuwche Piterje ahinsuwrnang atupe. (hevehie chor emvemaa kummhe aphanaga.)
Engkhejege amaing asuwrtaanaching mikhumsungte athaarpe. Engkhejege raarmi aruh milliehechuw aminrhungpe; ajiegachienche Aminlen inie aanhuwna mihe mhekungna meniergete echieng amindeen.
Hanghing Piterchuw mikhumna arhunggehe; changgechuw arotumna ruwhchangching Thangnhangte belung elhuwhpaaing anhiepihe.
Herod ing amachuw himbesuwvang ate yennaching Piterchuw thiirrhuw ing phierhege raarmi ennhie lolaana aeyaar; engkhejege aarhungheching mikhum eengkhaar kungna arhunghe.

Minghuw minghaluing Thangnhang minven michierching apaangna nierge, ama aongna amhinchuw aminlengpe, chona minven michierching Piterchuw viperge bethiege arhier, “enrang hangthie.” Hanghing adierhiinna engkhie thiirrhuwchuw engjohse.
Thangven michierching anhingna arhier, “Nadierhiin rhuw mimvim engkhejege nakhikhum nie.” Amaing amachuw atupe.
Chona anhingna arhier, “napien ser ing keenhuw ijie.” Amaing jungsuwge aanhuw jiige, Thangven michierching atataa atupiga atechuw minghuwmaage, ireh kemhuwga ichiin amindeen.

Emmenieing amensa engkhejege amenhiena aarhunghechuw kheerhege, khuwpuwte alhuwna thiir ing atu sungchuw emvatungle, eenkhaarchuw enrotumna athienen emmhongse. Chona emmenieng jungsuwhege lham engkhete vasihege, chale Thangven michierchuw anhingtena engkedohse.

Ate Piter ing ataaing ahimminghuwnhuwte arhier, “Ate kieing atataa Thangnhang ing Thangven michier jinchierge kiehie Herod kihtena engkhejege Jehudiheching amindeen taalina embethinpe tege athachape.”
Hevehie ajiekhangga ate ahimminghuwnhuwte, amaing aromhing Mark ate Johon amanuw Mary eente huwngse; Amana aalhanghe enhimpaa ouwngkonghege ahinthamhe.
Amaing taangna eengkhaar aminvarche Rhoda ate mine lunghaaching aemhonggete ateche.
Piter erurga ate minghuwge arotha arhohlamthi ing eengkhaar aemhongluing inliverge, Piter eenkhaarkungna ongne tege aminthangpe.
Emmenieing anhingna arhier, “nang bevisechii!” Changgechuw amaing amararaaga tege rhumaase. Emmenieng arhier, “Amachuw Thangven michierga.”
Changgejenie, Piter ing eengkhaarchuw minchinluing aminvarpe, chona emmenieing aamhongheche ataachuw mhuwhege eenluw liimse.
Amang akihing derengruw tege aaleh chona mikhumtena ajiekhang ijungshuwga atechuw atongpe. Amaing arhierri, “Hevehie Jakoble une thachahenhingna vatong.” Chona amaing amhin engkhete impimse.
Khuw ahungwaarche Piternhingna ajie ishuwga tehege raarmihe kaarna ouwngtochorsehe.
Herod ing amachuw jongge ateumaache, aarhunghechuw waajiirtuge emmeniechuw athehnaing ttongtho apipe. Chona Piter ing Judiatena Kaesareate ttumge amana ongse.

Ate Herod ing Tirele Sidonna aeonghe taalina abelung isie. Chonaching emmenieng belung engkhepang ing thenghege eruwng kurnung apana Blastuschuw inchaarphuwhege, enchamna ttong aminteupehe, ajiegachienche empaam miheching aesah eenphuw eruwng paamtena aminigehe.
Inie amenier aphanaching Herod ing eruwng piendeer ing enthongge, eruwng ongtaana ongge ennhingna themin atong.
Chale miheching aeuwnghe, “Leh erurga tepangtenamaaga!”
Thangnhang athang alaarchuw aminlhuwng maataana, chalerahching Thangnhang michierching ajihmingvarpe, engkhejege arungeeching sage achipi abethinpe.
Chonaching Thangnhang zelhachuw hangeenjaamshe.
Chona Barnabasle Saul ing ennongchuw betthohege aromhing Mark ate Johonchuw emmenietho hungeenrhiihege Jerusalemte hungeenlisehe.

Ate Antiokna euwm ruwhchangte Thangnhang laarchangpahe engkhejege aanchuwpahe: Barnabas, Niger ate Simeon, Kurenetena Lukius, Herod eruwng waajiir een apuw Manaen engkhe eenshuw, engkhejege Saul eonghe.
Emmenieng vinttaam tonghege ahinnhiilehe Chipi Enthiing ing arhier, “Barnabasle Saulhie kenong tuna kieenpe.”
Vinttaam tonghege ahinnhiechuw embetthuche emmenieng entaalina ingki baanghege achiirpehe.
Hanghing emmeniechuw Chipi Enthiing ing chiirhege Seleusiate ttumsehe; engkhejege amanaching Kupruste ruwkuwnglina vasisehe.
Salamisna ingongle Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw Jehudihe khuwngsangbekhena aminjaampehe, chona Johonje emmeniechuw aabum engkheing inrhiehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng paam attiittii hechuw elenhege Paphoste vatungsehe, amana luwliimna nong aatupa Thangnhang ttongjiir aminjaam chang atu, aromhing Bar-Jesu ate Jehudi pesar engkhe eenteusehe.
Amaing ama paamttii aapuw Sergius Paulus ate ivierpaa amathoh enrhiehe. Apaam aapuwching Barnabasle Saulchuw eenge Thangnhang ttongjiir arongenaing atuhe.
Changgechuw Elymas ate mantro ihepaching (aromhinghie hanghing aminghuwnaga) emmeniechuw rhumaahege paam aapuwchuw athachatena aanlina aminjongpe.
Changgechuw Paulje atehe Saulchuw Chipi Enthiing ing siihge amachuw eebiertihge arhier,
“He, etthama engkhejege ichum ma losing irin, nong ing mee minchechiege, dhormo icher nong rhumaachiege diabol sapa nang ing Thangnhang lham atataachuw amamaate nakihie minchinmaatenie?

Engkhejege Thangnhang kiching nataalina ttumse, engkhejege amongna namhi chuniege iniechuw mhuwche maatenie.” Chalerahching ruduh engkhejege inthimching amingkhumpe, engkhejege achuw engkheing akih bechuw niege arhiinaing ajongtumtumpe.
Paam aapuwching amachuw amhuwche Thangnhang ing aminchuwlina aluw liimge athachape.
Chona Paulle aanrhiiphuwtho Paphosna ruwkuwng tounghege phamphiliasung Pergate hangkarsehe; engkhejege Johon ing emmenietho entthehege Jerusalemte hungeenlise;
Changgechuw emmenieng Pergachuw elenhege Pesidia sung Antiokna vatungsehe; Engkhejege Eongna inie na khuwngsangna valhuwhege aeonghe.
Thangnhang waajiirttong engkhejege laarchangpahe lerii empanhuwte khuwngsang aapuwheching ennhingna ttongjiir vithahege arhier, “Keu kenehe ninnuw ing ttongthona irhierphuw uwmnieche irhierpisaruw.”
Chonaching Paul ing hangniirge akih ilehge ahinrhier.
“Israelhe ninnuw engkhejege Thangnhang aattiihe, rongeruw.
Israelhe Thangnhang, emapa emapuwhechuw eeteurpisage, emmenieing Egypt lepaana mhar eensuwhege, heve mihehie aminlhuwnghe, engkhejege heve amhintena aben vijamge ahinrhiepehe.
Engkhejege kum summillie sungna Thangnhang ing rampasungna amapa khangkhing ahinjuhe.
Chona Thangnhangching Kanaanna aeong yaati sariichuw memaangge enramchuw enrotum aansuwnaing,
kum chamillie sumnga bekhe apipehe.
“Ama enhuwna Thangnhang laarchangpa Samuel epha waajiir ituna aapuwhe apihe.
Chona emmenieing eruwng anhiepehe, chotaanaching Thangnhang ing Benjamin sungkhortena mi Kish sapa Saul chuw kum summillie rotum apihe.

Amachuw aliejoh enhuwte Davidchuw aansuwnaing abesuwpipehe; amalina Thangnhang ing anhingna saarkhieje pege arhier, ‘Kieing Jesse sapa David, kebelungna arhupaa pesar engkhe keteuhpe, amaing kemindeenbekhe tuvate.’
Heve pesartena ajimberhinglina Thangnhang ing ttongneer apibesa enhuw ijiing Israelhenhingna karpiwang ate Jesuchuw pewatehe.
Ataa athengmaalhiele Johon chiilupaing Israelhenhingna belungrier ahoungna chiiluna ttongjiirhie aminjaam.
Engkhejege Johon ing anong abetthuphana arhier, ‘Kiehie achuwga techuwge nimmindeenga? Kie amamaaging. Maa, changgechuw kinhuwna thengvang ate ama akhikhum rhuw bejohwang kete ketuchemaaga.’
“Keu kenehe, Abraham eengkuw sitihe, engkhejege ningkaarna lintaang Thangnhang ittiihe isiichertena imminlenna ttongjiirhie ennhingna ajibethinpe.
Ajiegachiinche Jerusalemna eonghethoh emmenieing amachuw minghuwmaasehe changmaanieche Eongna iniebekhena emapa Thangnhang ttongjiirpahe erurchuw imminghuw maataana amachuw rhumaahege alir asuwpehe.
Emmenieng itheh arhuna amaraar teumaahejenie athehnaing Pilat nhingte anhiihe.
Ama khu lina abejiibekhe emmenieing alir asuwnhuwte thing taalina jimbettumhege thenna adeempehe.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing inie aminthumna aminrhingpe;
engkhejege amathoh enrhiehaa Galilitena Jerusalemphana aehangsihaahe inie enhimpaa atahching emphuwngge, ate emmenieing mihenhingna saarkhie eenshuwhgehe.
Engkhejege ama aettha ttongjiir emapa emapuwhe nhingna ttongnierchuw ninnhingna kinvireenga.
Amachuwbe, Thangnhang ing Jesuchuw minrhingge isitihenhingna alir ahimbesuwpe; hanghing amenhiena lha leriina abejiise,
‘Nang Kesapagechie,
atenie kieng keberhingpechie.’
Thangnhang ing amachuw minrhingge, engkhejege maangvang atetaate avonhie enlimaamie atelina hanghin arhier,
‘Kieng ninnhingna Davidta Enthiing ttongneerchuw pevang gechuw.’
Ajiegachiinche amaing lintaang lhanaje arhier,
‘Nami nata Enthiing Engkhechuw aemangchuw minthiemaanie.’
Ajiegachiinche David ing apaarle Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijieng nongbekhechuw tuge, thihse, amapahepaangna dimhege aemangchuw aminghuwpe;
changgechuw Thangnhang ing aminrhing amachuwbe aemangchuw minghuwmaa.
Chovelinaching, keu kenehe, hevehie eminghuwpiruw, ateche heve mi apaarna isiichertena akuhpinachuw ninnhingna kintongga.
Engkhejege Mosi wajiir ttongtho apaarna ninnuwchuw ningvesang impichemaabekhetena ama apaarna athacha mibekhe ningvesang apipe.
Amanaching laarchangpaheching arhier ttonghechuw nintaalina attumnamaaing enriimsaruw, amachuwbe:
‘Ebeerruw, ninnuw belungrier apimaahe!
Ninluw liimsing engkhejege thesaruw,
ajiegachienche ninnuw ing nimpaarle kieng nong kitu,
achuw engkheing ninnhingna chovechuw tongkhangjenie thachamaadehtenuw.’ ”
Paulle Barnabas ing aangkeheche miheching atevokhe Eongna eniena itongpiruw tehege arhierhe.
Khuwngsangtena injungkieleching Jehudihe amana Jehudi dhormo isihebekheching Paulle Barnabas inhuw ajiehe, emmenieing ennhingna Thangnhang lungsiilina aanasiir aongnaing arhierpihe.
Amenhiena Eongna eniena khuwpuwna aeongbekhe ouwngkonghege Thangnhang ttong arongehe.
Changgechuw Jehudiheching miruwpuwhechuw amhuwheche inhimpah kallaasehe; engkhejege Paul ing atongbekhechuw minlaarhege, amamaa arhierpehe.

Chotaanaching Paulle Barnabas engngeenhieng thona aetthaing tonghege arhier, “ninnhingna Thangnhang ttonghie tongra-rahvang ichiega. Amachuw ninnhingtenaga, changgechuw rhumaachuwge ittiim inemaa irhingna phawang ninte ninthachamaa tahnaching, ate kinnuw ing yaati lintaangte enlehsung.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing kinnhingte ttongtho impipe,
‘Kieing ninnuwchuw simriipaam attuhna iphang isiichertena aminlen naing lintaang yaatihenhingna lengwaar aansuwnaing kesiihpechuw.’”
Yaati lintaangheching amachuw athieheche enrothaje rhohge Thangnhang ttongjiirhie amimpahhe; engkhejege ittiim enemaate aaturbekheing athachapehe.
Hanghing Thangnhang ttongjiir apaambekhena enjaamse.
Changgechuw Jehudiheching belung elhuwpaa Thangnhang amindeen nepenuwhechuw engkhejege pesarhechuw bettohhege Paulle Barnabas taalina emvecherna ttong besuwhege empaamtena athorpehe.
Chotaanaching emmenieng ingkhilitena perkhuw rukhuwnghege enrhunamaachuw saarkhie mindanghege Ikoniumte thengsehe.
Changching sepohhechuw enrotha aerhothoh enrhiing Chipi Engthieng ing esiihe.
Ikoniumnaje hangngenge ishuw, Paulle Barnabas ing Jehudihe khuwngsangna valhuwhege hanghing atongtaanahe Jehudihe, Greekhe enhimpaaing thachate ilhuwhe.
Changgechuw thachamaa Jehudiheching yaati lintaanghechuw belung bekhaahege ouwngnguw ennehe taalina irhuw athaarpehe.
Chotaanaching emmenieng Thangnhang apaarna thona eatthapaa ing ttonghege apha isiipaa aeonghe; emmenieing Thangnhang lungsii apha ttonghechuw saarkhie pehege engkhejege bietimna ittiishuwpapa atuhe.
Changgechuw ama khuwpuw miheching entthehege, alheh hechin Jehudihe engkhejege alhehing Thangnhang ttongjiirpahenhingte kaasehe.
Engkhejege emmenieing waajiir aapuwhethoh enrhiehege yaati lintaang heching, engkhejege Jehudiheching emmeniechuw aechamaa entutaana, amana lhung ing deengte tehege entutaanaching,
thiehege Likaonia khuwpuwhe Listra engkhejege Derbite amana arove paamte tensehe;
engkhejege amana aettha ttongjiirchuw aminjaampehe.
Engkhejege Listrana akhi isi achemaa, emverje achemaa aberhingpele betthiimge ibong engkhe aeong.
heve pesar ing Paul ing ittongchuw rongege, Paul ing amachuw eebeertihniege amintthaana athachachuw amhuwche,
uwngge ahinrhier, “Nakhi ithien ing iteum ing hangnier.” Engkhejege pesarching hangkhuwngge bevese.
Paul ing atuchuw miruhpuwheching emmhuwche, emmenieng Likaonihe ttong ing uwnghege, “lehechig mi uwmvurge aenhingte thengsehe atehe.”
Barnabaschuw Zeusga tehege, engkhejege Paulchuw Hermesga, atehe ajienachiinche amaing aettongtaana ihesheh aaluwngpuwga atetanagehe.
Zeus khorpuw aeenchuw khuwpuw kurna euwm, amanaching shierchar engkhechuw rii aetherhege sungkuwngna virhiehege mi ruwpuwheching minlhente atepehe.
Changgechuw ttongjiirpahe Paulle Barnabas ing amachuw athieheche, emmenieng impien itthiihege mi ruwpuwhekaarna vatenhege euwnghe.

“Kilhanghe, ajietuna hevehie nintuga? Kinnuwje tepang, ninnuw hangchiegung, engkhejege aettha ttongjiir kimviringethah, ninnuw ing nintubekhe ikanamaahie irhing Thangnhangnhingte hungeenlehruw, amaing Thangven, simriipaam, rimchie engkhejege hevebekhe asungna euwmbekhe eentupipe.
Isibesa misienhenhingna amaing yaatibekhena entunumnum itu arhupigehe.

Changkhangjenie amaing saarkhie uwmluing mamaa, amachuwbe amaing aettha itupeege minventena khuw minsuwrge engkhejege saangchiibaar akoumna kum tha impeega, amaching isahphuwthoh rotharhonaching nimbelung anongena impeega.”
Hevebekhe ttonghing emmenieing thehte tehege atu miruhpuwhechuw mintumaasehe.
Changgechuw Antiok engkhejege Ikoniumtena ivahe Jehudi heching miruhpuwhechuw minchehege, emmenieng Paulchuw lhung ing deenghege khuwpuwtena akipehe amana thihse tehege amindeenhe.
Changgechuw sepoheching ruwkurwhege inneerle amaing hangthiege khuwpuwte valhuwse. Amenhie iniena amaing Barnabasthoh Derbite vasehe.
Ama khuwpuwna ttongjiirchuw imminjaamnhuwte sepoh enhimpaa kharhege, Listrate. Chona Ikoniumle Antiokte hungeenlisehe.
Amana aengongle shepohhe inchipi minlhuwnghege engkhejege enthachalina betthohpihege, arhier, “Ijanangbekhetho enrhiing aenieing Thangnhang lepaate valhuwrong aetega.”
Engkhejege ruwhchangbekhena upahe kharpihege, vinttaam tonghege, hinthamhege immenieng enthacha Thangpate emmeniechuw aminsernapehe.
Chona Pisidia elenhege Pamphiliate huwngsehe.
Pergamosna ttongjiirchuw tongpihege Attaliate ttumsehe.
Amana emmenieng embetthu nonglina Thangnhang lungsiichuw aminsernahe amhin Antiok entongte ruwkuwng ahintuonghe.
Emmenieng emvatungche ruwhchangbekhe mingkonghege Thangnhang ing emmeniethoh atupihe nongbekhe engkhejege lintaang yaatihenhingna Thangnhang ing eengkhaar aamhongpipe ate ennhingna atongpipehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng sepohhetho enrhiing apha isihpaa aeonghaahe.
Chona Judiatena ethenghe achuw engkheching auw anehenhingna minchuwhege enrhier, “Mosi ing asina nunu enhuw ijieng vintin tumaatenuwbe ikarpichuw phamaatenuw.”

Engkhejege Paulle Barnabas ing emmenietho eenrhumaahege engkhejege ennahege chovelinaching Jerusalemte ttongjiirpahele upahenhingte ttong entana rotumna Paulle Barnabas engkhejege lintaang upahechuw akharpehe.
Chonaching ruwhchangching lhamna vithahege, lintaang yaatiheching enthachachuw hintonghege Phoeniciale Samaria hingeelenhege amana aeong thacha unebekhe enhimpaa enrotha aerhohe.
Engkhejege Jerusalem vatunghege ttongjiirpahe engkhejege upaheching rotha akurpihe, engkhejege Thangnhang ing ennhingna atupi nongbekhe atonghe.
Changgechuw Pharisihekaarna thachaheching hangniirhege enrhier, “Mosi ing ttongtho apihe nunuchuw minjievang ategehe.”
Chonaching ttongjiirpahetho upahetho ttongchuw tanavang ichiing ouwngkongsehe.

Engkhejege enhimpaa aanrhunamaahelina, Piter ing hangnierge ennhingna arhier, “Keu kenehe, lintaang yaatiheching kenherna aettha ttongjiir thieheniege enthachanaing ayen Thangnhang ing ningkaartena kiechuw eenngeteurga ate nimminghuwga.
Engkhejege belungrier aminghuw Thangnhang ing enhingna entupi khangkhing ichiing emmenie nhingnaje Chipi Enthiing pehege, emmenieng saarkhie apihe.
Engkhejege thacha apaarna embelungriir minlhiempihege, Thangnhang ing aenieje emmenietho ajiidong aantthiirna meuwm maase.
Chonaching ate imapa imapuwhejeng ireen achemaa pih sepohhe enringna ninnuw ing minrinchuwge, Thangnhangchuw chaang ningngeebeerga?
Engkhetongte Thangpa Jesu lungsiina emmenietho enghaa aenieje isiichertena eengkupee phawateruw ate iniejeng aethachaga.”
Chotaanaching eongbekheching derenghege; Barnabasle Paul apaarna lintaang yaatihenhingna Thangnhang ing bietimna engkhejege luliimna atuhechuw emmenie ennhingna atongchuw arongehe.
Aettongchuw aminchinhuwtehe Jakob ing abeseng, “keu kenehe, aerongepiruw.
Thangnhang ing aromhinglina lintaang yaatihe nhingtena mi aruh engkhe aliena aabiirpihechuw Simeonjeng atongpe.
Heve ttonghie laarchangpaheching arhier ttongtho ouwngrhune, hanghin abejiise,
‘Hevebekhe aanhuwna kie hungeenliningge,
David ing atu itiehbesa pienthaamchuw avonhie meniervanggie,
Aemaangbesatena hinturihvanggete;
chonaching lintaang miheching Thangnhangchuw jongwatehe yaati lintaangbekhe keromhing aeenbekheje.
Hevebekhe aatu Thangnhang ing arhier.
Ayen hevebekhehie kimminthiegechuw.’
“Chonaching kieing kerhuchuwbe lintaang yaatihe kaartena Thangnhangte ihoung eenlihechuw aenieing minjamaamenii,
Changgechuw emmenieng lehte inthipih, naamaa atu, enraah sah, engkhejege thie isah hevebekhehie eentunamaaing enieng ennhingte vibejiiteruw.
Ajiegachiinche ayen betthiimge khuwpuw khuwpuwna Mosi leriisuwngna ahimminjaam miheching Eongnanie iniebekhena khungsangbekhena apagehe.”

Chotaanaching ttongjiirpahele upaheching ruwhchang ing arhu enhuw ijieng engkaarna mi iturheniege achiirnaing eenrhuhege Paulle Barnabaschuw Antiokte ichiirching tthavate tehege amindeenpehe. Emmenieng Barsabas ate Judas engkhejege Silas ate engkaarna upahechuw
leriithoh enrhieng achiirpehe: “Unepasahe, ttongjiirpahele upaheching Antiok, Siria engkhejege Silisiana aeong lintaang yaatihenhingna kinrumsaanaachuw.
Kinnuw ing ttongtho kimpimaa mi alheheching kinnhingte vahege nimbelungriir iminjahege amamaa atonghelina,
kinnuw ing belungrier engkhepang ing mi khar ungge ninnhingte kinning kimminsii Barnabasle Paul kimvichiirga,
emmeniehie Thangpa Jesu romhinglina inchipi apibesagehe.
Kinnuw ing, chonaching Judasle Silashie vichiir ungge enher ing amabekhechuw tongvatehe,
Ajiegachiinche ithiseh aekana heve pihehiemaa irhiihpaa pih nintaalina abetthumnamaaing tthavate teungge Chipi Enthiingjeng kinnuwjeng kimmindeenna;
amachuwbe lehte akaapee, thie isah, rhuw ing enra ithie sah, engkhejege naamaa itubekhetena ninnuw ing nintumaa tthavate, hevehie ninnuw tthanaga, entthena ttong ing Keusanachuw.”
Hanghing emmeniechuw chiirhege Antiokte vattumsehe. Emmeniebekhe ingeengkongle ama leriichuw apipehe.
Emmenieng amachuw pahege embelung abetthohna ttonglina enrotha rhosehe.
Judasle Silas, emmeniehie laarchanggehe chonaching thachahechuw enthona atthaana amana apernase arhierpihe.
Apha tepie emmenietho onghaahege ate unehe thachaheching belung ingam ing emmenie avichiirheningte amingkepehe.
Changgechuw Silas ing amana aeonghie tthavate tege amindeen.
Changgechuw Paulle Barnabasjeng lintaanghethoh enrhieing Antiokna Thangnhang ttongchuw minchuwhege aminjaamhe.
Inie tepie anhuwte Paul ing Barnabas nhingna arhier, “Huwng, ate inieing eenlimeniege thacha mibekhe khuwpuwbekhena eonghechuw virmeniege Thangnhang ttong iminjaamnaing ajii atusehe vaabeertehe.”
Barnabasing Mark ate romhing Johon atechuw rhiening atepe.
Changgechuw emmeniechuw Pamphiliana mahege emmenietho enrhiemaahe, engkhejege emmenietho isihaa tthamaanie tege Paul ing amindeen.
Hanghing eenrhumaahege entthesehe, chona Barnabas ing aanrhiiphuw Mark chuw rhiige Kupruste ruwkuwnglina sise.
Changgechuw Paul ing Silaschuw eteurge thacha uneheching Thangnhang ningsie anonghechuw minsernahege sisehe.
Amaing Siriale Silisia paam hingeehurge ruwhchanghechuw amenhepipehe.
Ate Paul ing Derbi engkhejege Listrate vatungge, amana thacha Jehudi nepenuw engkhe asapa Timothi ate sepoh engkhe aeong; amapache Greekga.
Listra engkhejege Ikoniumna aeong thachaheching ama khuwna itthapaa saarkhie apigehe.
Paul ing Timothitho sihaanung ate; engkhejege ama aramnaching Jehudiheching amapachuw Greek miga ate aminghuw taanaheching Paul ing vintin atupipe.
Emmenieng khuwpuw khuwpuwbekhena emvasile Jerusalemna eong ttongjiirpaheching aanrhunahe ttongbekhe aminjienaing atongpihe.
Hanghing ruwhchangheching enthacha perhege aanasiir mi ahinthipe.
Chipi Enthiing ing Asiapaamna ttongjiir aetong arhupimaataana emmenieng Phrigia engkhejege Galatia ahingeelenpehe.
Emmenieng Misiathoh indeeng Bithiniate valhuwgungte atehe, amanaje Jesu Chipi ing rhupeemaasehe.
Amanaching Misia ilenhege Troste vattumsehe.
Engkhejege yenna mhihrovaam ing Paulnhingna aminthie; Makedoniatena persar engkheing neerge anhingna anhiisaa, “Makedoniate ethengpisang ebumsaruw.”
Amaing mhirovaamchuw amhuwche, Thangnhang ing aettha ttongjiir aminjaamna kinnuwchuw ingeenga ate minghuwge chalerahching Makedoniate asina enthongsehe.
Ate kinnuw ing Troastena ruwkuwnglina vasiuwngge iteumjeh Samathracete engkhejege, amenhiena iniena Neapolis kimphape,
engkhejege amatenaching Phillipite thengsung. Amhin amahie Makedonia paamna elhuwngseh khuwpuw Romhe derna epaar ramga; engkhejege kinnuw ing heve khuwpuwna inie enhimpaa icheeng gung.
Eongna nie iniena sung ataangte aevakurna ithamna amhin aeuwmga teungge, ama phana ivasiung; chona ongungge nepenuw engkonghechuw kimminchuwhe.

Engkhejege Thiatira khuwpuwtena aromhing Lidia ate Thangnhang amindin amaing pien isin juwrge emmenieng aminchuwhechuw aronge; Paul ing atongchuw itthajehing arongechenaching Thangnhang ing aamhongpipe.
Chona ataaje engkhejege aeengkuwheje chii luhhege, amaing anhiisah, “Ninnuw ing kiehie Thangnhang athachaga ate erhupitenuwbe keeensungte echeengpisaruw.” Hanghing elupaaing anhiisaape.
Inie engkhena aethamna amhinte kimvasile atuche chipi ing atoung mine lunghaa engkhe thengge, amaing enhuwte shuwvang ate arhierchega, ama aapuw miching hevelina sheer enhimpaa aphaga.
Amaing Paulle kinnuwchuw ijiege uwngge arhier, “Hevehehie engkaangseh Thangnhang mine, isiichertena aminlenpi lham mihenhingna aminjaamgehe.”

Ama nepenuwhing apha isihpaa hanghin ahintu. Changgechuw Paul ing nongemaage vaanlege achipinhingna arhier, “Jesu Khrista romhingna anhingtena jungsuw” tege ttongtho apipe. Ama aphanaraaching jungsuwse.
Changgechuw ama aapuwheching sheer phanawang ichii alham uwmaase ichiehie amhuwheche, Paulle Silas chuw suwrhege kitheersungna Aapuwhe mhekungna ahingkipehe.
Ate emmenieng waajiir aapuwhe nhingna virhiehege enrhier, “heve mihehing heve khuwpuwnahing iraang abesuwnaahe; emmeniehie Jehudigehe,
engkhejege Romtena ensina nong changmaanieche iminjie waajiir bekhiehege aminjaamnaahe.”
Mi aruheching emmenietho enlehhege hangneersehe; engkhejege waajiir aapuwheching empien bejoh cherhege romhor ing abinna ttongtho apipehe.
Emmenieng entaalina romhor ing mingvernumhege, mikhumsungna phierhege aarhunghe nhingna itthajeh arhungnaing ttongtho apipehe.
Amaing hanghin eperpaa ttongtho aphataana mikhumsung aliina thing ing ingkhichuw minsuwrhege asiihpehe.
Changgechuw yenttimna Paulle Silas ing hinthamhege lha tuhege amachuw mikhumna aeongheching arongehe;
Amana minghuw minghaluing lienglaang thengge mikhumna eenchuw eennuhse; chalerarahching eengkhaarbekhe emmhongse, mee aphierheje enjohchershe.
Mikhumna een aarhungchuw hangthiejohge eengkhaarbekhe emmhong amhuwche mikhumna aeonghechuw tenchersehe ichiing mindeenge athienening enthehgete tege achimsii aasuwpe.
Changgechuw Paul ing uwngge ahinrhier, “Nathienen ing amaangna tumaare, ajiegachienche kinnuw ongjehnung.”
Chona aarhungpaching thoumhi vajongge asungte valhuwse, engkhejege aanttiitaana enchiimge Paulle Silas buwmna vatiese;
chona emmeniechuw taang besuwhege arhier, “Aanchungpahe, kieng isiichertena aminlenna ajie tusavang ketega?”
Emmenieng abesang, “Jesu Khristachuw thachare, amaching nangje naeengkuwbekheje ekarpi phawangninte.”
Emmenieng ataaje engkhejege aeengkuw henhingna atongpipehe.
Engkhejege ama yennarahching emmeniechuw rhiihege romhorbiehechuw aatthiipipehe, engkhejege chalerahching amaje aeengkuwbekheje chii aluhpehe.
Amaing emmeniechuw aeente rhiihege isa eenphuwje apihe, engkhejege Thangnhangchuw thachage aeengkuwhethoh enhimpaa enrotha rhohsehe.
Changgechuw khuw ahungvaarche waajiir aapuwheching aasuwrhechuw vicheerhege arhier, “Emmeniehie engkeheresie.”
Mikhum aarhungpaching Paulnhingna minthangge arhier, “Waajiir aapuw ing ninnuwhie engkeheresie atena, chotanaaching belung idejehing engkeruw.”

Changgechuw Paul ing abesang, “Emmenieng mikaarna ebinhege waajiir tuludehing Romtena kinnuwhie mikhumsungte aethaarhege, ate emmenieng eenruwruw ing ibethinvang ategehe? Amachuw rhumanung; changgechuw emmenieing thenghesing ibesuwheresie.”
Chona wajiir aatupahe nhingna aasuwr thanaheching atongheche, Rom migehe ate athieheche ittisehe; engkhejege emmenieing thenghege emmenimpehe.
Emmenieng emmeniechuw besuwhege khuwpuwtena aangkenaing arhierhe.
Chonaching emmenieng mikhumsungtena jungsuwhege Lidia eente wasehe; engkhejege emmenieng unehe asarhechuw emmhuwheche bettohpihege engkesehe.
Paulle Silas ing Amphipolis engkhejege Apollonia elenhege Jehudihe khuwngsang uwmna Thessolonikate vatungsehe.
Engkhejege Paul ing anunu khangkhing valhuwge Eongna inie vothum aettha ttongjiirlina ttong ensanghe.
Amachuw engkaarna Khristaing ijachaam khaangniege ithiehekaartena hangrhingvate, engkhejege “kieng ninnhingna keminjaam Jesuhie Khristachuwga” tege aminchuwhe.
Engkhejege engkaarna Thangnhang athacha Greek enhimpaa amana nepenuw upaheching thachahege Paulle Silastho ouwngchumsehe.

Changgechuw Jehudiheching kallaahege, engkhejege intuphuw aeuwmmaa kithiirna aeongjehhethoh ouwngkongpohege khuwpuwchuw berhaamchorse; engkhejege Paulle Silaschuw jonghege mi aangkongtaana ahinrhienaing Jason een avanamhe.
Emmenieng emvateu maataana Jasonchuw thachahe aalhanghethoh hingkihege khupuw aapuwhenhingna virhiehege euwnghe, “Lolhiepaam abour aleer aminluhhe mihehie henaje thengsehe,
engkhejege jason ing emmeniechuw rukuwm atupihe. Emmenieng Jesu ate eruwng engkhe uwmne tehege emmenieng eruwng ttongtho belehhege atunahe.”
Chonaching mibekhe engkhege khupuw aapuheching enthietaana embelung kiisehe.
Engkhejege Jasonle lintaanghechuw jaminna abethinpehe.
Ama yennarah ching Paulle Sailas chuw thacha auw aneheching Beroeate achiirpehe, engkhejege emmenieing vatunghege Jehudihe khuwngsangna valhuwsehe.
Emmeniechuwbe Thessolonika mihekaarna aetthasehgehe, ajiegachienche emmenieng aettha ttongjiirchuw minghuwnung atehe engkhejege aettha ttongjiirhechuw ibeerhege aanasiir ajonghe.
Engkaarna mi enhimpaa engkhejege enjaasuw Greek nepenuwhetho pesar enhimpaaing athachapehe.
Changgechuw Thessolonikana Jehudiheching Paul ing Beroeana Thangnhang ttongjiir enjaamse atechuw minghuwhege engkhejege thenghege amanaje mi ruwpuwhechuw betthohhege mihe belungsiena abesuwpehe.
Chalerarahching therluing Paulchuw rimchie kurte achiirpehe changgechuw Silasle Timothi amana amaapehe.
Changgechuw avithaaheching Paulchuw Athen epha ahinrhiehe; engkhejege Silasle Timothiching amathoh aanteunaing ennhingna ttongtho phahege amaapehe.
Paul ing emmeniechuw Athenna ahaaleching ama khupuwna leh rotha amhinbekhena euwm amhuwtaanaching abelungrier nongemaase.
Chonaching amaing Jehudihe khuwngsangna, Thangnhangte belung ilhuwhetho engkhejege mi aangkongna keethierna aanasiir ensanghe.

Avonhie Epikuria mihetho engkhejege Stoniktena ihe isinghe tho ensanghe, Alheheching enrhier, “Heve aettongtha-thaang mihin ajie rhierning atega?” Lintaang ing enrhier, “Ama mihin mipaamtena leh khu atonggemo.” ajiegachienche amaing Jesu engkhejege ehangrhing ttongjiir aminjaamtaanaga.
Chotaanaching amachuw virhiehege Areopagusna asiehe. “Nang ing ithar ttongjiir naminchuwhie kinnuwjeng uwnghuw rhuvate?
Nang ing narhierhehie kimminghuwmaa lhie rosa ngenge tihne.”
Ate Athenna aeong engkhejege mipaamtena thenghege ipaarheching itharchechor ttong aettong changmaanieche athienaing, lintaang nong tuludehing aeonghe.
Paul ing Areopagus aliehna niirge arhier, “Athenna eonghe, alhambekhena dhormo icherpaaing kimhuw naachuw.

Ajiegachiinche hanghing kebevele ninnuw ing ninrumna amhinbekhe kibeerche, ‘nimminghuwmaa leh, ningeenthina amhinlina enjii kemhuwpe.’ Amanaching ninnuw ing nimminghuwmaa anhingna inthichuwge kieing keminjaamga.
Lolhiepaam engkhejege asungna aeuwmbekhe aatu Thangnhangching Thangvenle simriipaam aapuwgekhage keeing atu leh eensungna ongmaa;
Engkhejege amaing ajiekhangchie iveh uwmne teniege tepang ing atu anong atunaje uwmmaa, ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing chipibekhe, iphuw iki engkhejege peebekhe impeega.
Engkhejege amaing aemapuwhe engkhepangtena yaatibekhena lolhiepaam aangkhengna apaarnaing eentupiga, amaing aniirna apha engkhejege aeongna aram arii insempiga.
Chonaching emmenieng Thangnhangchuw ateunaing jongnavang ategehe; changgechuw ama endaapaana aeongmaaga.
Ajiegachiinche ‘anhingna irhinggemie, enlaa chesamiege engkhejege erhing iphanaga;’ ninnajirna lha lerii aanjiiheching hanghing arhier,
‘ajiegachienche enieje Thangnhang sapa sanuwgemie.’
Iniebekhe Thangnhang siti baasien eensuwtaanaching enieng hangchie leh, sanale lopaing changmaanieche lhung ing atu rothaasie hie thevang ate tepang ing abesuwga.
Ate hangchiehie Thangnhang ing emhuwmaa khangkhing iheuwmga, atebe amhin bekhena ttongthochuw pege mibekheing embelung mintehvang ategehe,
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing aateurbesa pesar engkheching lolhiepaamhie waajiir tuvang ichii inie ensiipeepe. amaing ithiehe kaartena hangrhingge mibekheing athachanaing impipe.”
Emmenieng ithietena ihangrhingchuw athiehe alhehheching ameniehe; changgechuw lintaangheching enrhier, “Kinnuw ing avonhii rongewanggungte.”
Chaleching Paul ing amaapehe.
Changgechuw lintaangheching thachahege emmeniethoh enrhiesehe; engkaarna Areopagitena mi Dionisiustho engkhejege Damaris ate nepenuw, amana lintaanghe emvehe.
Heve enhuwna Paul ing Athen bethinge Korinthte huwngse.

Amana Jehudi mi engkhe Aquila ate Pontustenachuw ouwngteusehe, amahie idina Italitena aalhangnuw Prissillatho ethengehe, ajiegachienche Klaudias ing Jehudibekhe enthurruw tege ttongtho apitaanagehe. Paul ing emmeniechuw avaabeerhe;
engkhejege ennongchuw aanghaajetaana emmenietho onghaahege nong entuhaapehe; ajiegachienche emmenieng thaampien tuhege ajuwrgehe.
Eongna iniebekhena ttong ensanghege Jehudihele Greekhechuw thachate ahingkina atuhe.
Silasle Timothi ing Makedoniatena tunghege, chale Paul ing Jesuhie Khristaga, Aantinpaga tege Jehudihenhingna saarkhii pege ttongjiirchuw aminthangpihe.

Emmenieng amachuw dahege, aetthamaaing enttongtaana amaing apientena perkhuw rukhuwngge ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw thie hie ninlosena ttumsaresie! Kie minghuwmaing. Ate betthiimniege, yaati lintaangte sithaagete.”
Chona khuwngsangchuw bethinge Titus ate pesar Justus, Thangnhang amindinpah eente valhuwse; aeenhie khuwngsangtho enthenga.
Engkhejege Krispus, khuwngsang aapuwpaching aeenkuwhethoh Thangnhangchuw athachapehe, engkhejege Korinthtena mee enhimpaaheching enthietaana emmeniejeng thachate lhuwsehe, chiije aluhpehe.
Yen engkhena Paulnhingna Thangnhang ing mhiromhangna arhier, “Ittemaare, changgechuw warhierre engkhejege derengmaare;
Ajiegachiinche kieng enrhiephuwvanggechie, achuw kidong ing nataalina iminliemmaanie, ajiegachienche heve khupuwna kemi enhimpaa ongnehe.”
Amaing kum engkhe tha kuru amana cheengge ennhingna Thangnhang ttongjiir aminchuwhe.
Changgechuw Gallio ing Akhaiana aapuw aansuwle Jehudiheching engkhepang ing Paultaalina hangniirhege waajiir amhinna avirhiihe.
Emmenieng arhier, “heve pesar ing waajiir ttongtholina ttongge mihehie Thangnhang ruwmruw atenaahe.”
Paul ing hangttonggete atele, Gallio ing Jehudihenhingna arhier, “Ajiekhangchie alaar changmaanieche ichamaapaa migeniebe, heve ninrhier inhuw ijieng kieing ninnuwchuw diirpivanggechuw;
changgechuw ensiephuw ttongheniege romhinghelina engkhejege waajiir ttongtho lina eenrhumaatenuwbe amachuw ninnajeer embeersaruw; hevehe ttonglina waajiir etu eensuwning temaang.”
Engkhejege emmeniechuw waajiir tuna amhintena abethinpehe.
Chotaanaching emmenieing khuwngsang aapuw sostheneschuw suwrhege waajiir tuna amhinna abinpehe. Engkhejege Gallio ing hevelina ajiedong tupeemaasehe.
Apha isihpaa amana aongnhuwte thacha unehechuw lhamsuw thenge Prissilla engkhejege Aquilathoh Siriate ruwkuwnglina huwngsehe. Kenkrea na awasaana engkhe auwmtaana aluw amingkorpe.
Emmenieing Ephesia vatunghege aalhanghechuw amaapehe, changgechuw amaing khuwngsangna valhuwge Jehudihetho ensangsehe.
Engkhejege emmenieing apha amongna cheengre atehechuw rhumaase;
changgechuw entthehege, Thangnhang ing rhunieche avonhii thengvanggie tege Ephesustena ruwkuwngna siseh.
Amaing Kesaria avatungle Jerusalemte hangge ruwhchang mihechuw lhamsuw thenhege Antiokte vattumse.
Engkhejege amaing apha amongpang cheengge engkege Galatia chona Phyrgia lepaabekhe elenge sepohbekhechuw enthacha amenhehpihe.
Ate amana Apollo ate Alexandriatena Jehudichuw Ephesusna etheng; amahie aettha ttongjiirlina evierpaa engkhega.
Pesar hevehing Thangnhang khulina atataa aminchuwthiega; engkhejege ebelungriir elhuwpaaing Jesu khuchuw aminchuwhe, changgechuw amaing Johon ing chii aluh amapangchuw aminghuwgethah.
Amaing khuwngsangna thona aetthapaa ittong; changgechuw Prissillale Aquilaing amachuw enthietaana rhiihege Thangnhang lhamchuw atataa atunaing aminchuwpihe.
Ate amaing Akaia elenning ateche thacha uneheching betthopihege sepohheching engkaarna amimvenaing abejiipihe. Engkhejege awatungche lungsii apaarna thachahechuw enhimpaa abumpipe,
Ajiegachiinche Jesu Khristachuw aettha ttongjiir apaarna minthiehege mikaarna Jehudihe aettonghechuw enthiingkiir enlaarna chuw aminthiehe.
Apollo ing Korinthna aongle Paul ing asung rambekhe hingeehurge Ephesuste huwngge amana sepoh alhehhe eenteusehe.
Engkhejege amaing ennhingna arhier, “Ninnuw ing thachachuwge Chipi Enthiing nimphabesaga?” Emmenieng besanghege, “Phamaauwng, Chipi Enthiing uwmne atejechuw thiemaauwng.”
“Chotaanaching amaing arhier, Chogenieche ajiekhang chii ninluhga?” Emmenieng abesanghe, “Johon chiiluna.”
Engkhejege Paul ing arhier, “kinhuwna etheng Thangpa Jesuchuw thaachawang nintega tege Johon ing mihenhingna rhierge, belung huwngna chii aluhpigehe.”
Emmenieng amachuw athieheche Thangpa Jesu romhingna chii aluhpehe.
Engkhejege Paul ing entaalina akih baangpi hege Chipi Enthiingchuw entaalina juwttumse; engkhejege emmenieng lintaang lintaang ttong ing ttonghege Thangnhang ttong aphuwngpehe.
Emmeniebekhechuw pesar summalhie ennhiigehe.
Hanghing amaing khuwngsangna valhuwge Thangnhang Eruwnglepaa khu tha ouwngthum thona itthapaaing ensanghege, minchuwhege aeong.

Changgechuw mi alheheching mi enhimpaakaarna ama lhamlina ichamaaing ttonghege embelung enchepaa, ttong imminjiemaa taanaheching emmeniechuw mahege sepohetho aanasiir Tirannas eenna ttonghege ensanghe.
Hanghing kum ennhiisungna onghege Asiana eongbekhe Jehudiheje, Greekheje, Thangnhang ttongchuw arongehe.
Thangnhangching mi ing atuchemaa ittiishuw nong Paulnhingna amintu.
Chona akih aanhuwrna piensii engkhejege apieng chuw eemvirhie aenahe buumte emvichi chona aenahechuw tthachersehe engkhejege ebour chipiheje itenhe.

Chona emvettuwttuw Jehudihe, mantro iheheching Paul ing aminjaam ttong Jesuchuw minjiehege ebour chipi atunghelina Jesu romhing surpihege, arhierhe, “Kieing Paul ing aminjaam ttonglina ttongtho kepigechie.”
Jehudi khorpuw elhuwng asapa sariiching amachuw atugehe.
Changgechuw ebour chipiheching ennhingna besanghege arhier, “Jesuchuw keminghuwse engkhejege Paulje keminghuwse; changgechuw ninnuw achuwgechuw?”
Chonaching ebour chipi aatuungching entaalina vakhuwngge emmeniechuw chehcherhege, empiendier uwmluing liemhege tensehe.
Engkhejege Ephesusna aeonghe Jehudihe engkhejege Greekheching aminghuwtaanaching ttiihege Thangpa Jesu romhing hanglhuwngse.
Thachahejeching embelungriirna enlaarbekhe rhierhege intubekheje aphuwngpehe.
Engkhejege mantro ihe mihejeng enleriibekhe mingkonghege mibekhe mhekungna abethupehe; amabekhe aminchuw ateemheche, lupa chiing rongamehse.
Chonaching Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw iperpaa enjaamge hanglhuwngse.
Hevebekhe nonghehie abetthu nhuwte Paul ing Makedonia engkhejege Akaia hingeelenge Jerusalemte asina achipi ing mindinge arhier, “Kieng amachuw vatungningge Romje phavanggie.”
Chonaching anong aabuwmhe. Timothi engkhejege Erustuschuw Makedoniate cheerhege, ataache Asiana apha amongna cheengse.
Apha chaleching Thangpa alham khuna enhimpaa laangsehe.
