Ajiegachiinche Dometrias ate sana atupa engkheing Artemis leh een arotha lopaing tuge akih akhi aehehenhingna nong amimphahe.
Amaing emmeniechuw engkhejege khangchie aatuhethoching mi mingkongge arhier, “Pesarhe, heve nonglina aenieng sheer aetaarga ichii nimming huwga.
Ninnuw ing kih ing etuhehie lehmaaga tege Paul ing Ephesia pangmaage Asia amhinbekhena mihechuw menimge insina amintepicherpe ateje nimmhuwga engkhejege ninthiega.

Chonaching inieing etubekhe romhinghie jungmaangvate aechiipangmaage, Asiana amana lolhiepaam mibekheing amindeen elhuwngpaa lehnuw Artemis (Diana) leh eenje aechamaa besuwvate, engkhejege athang alaar jongummaanie ichii ittiishuw uwmse.”
Ama ttongchuw emmenieng athieheche, enther phuwrge uwngsehe, “Artemis (Diana) elhuwngpaa Ephesustaga!”
Ama khupuwchuw enna ouwngkuching siihse; engkhejege ramkhiena Paultho enrhie Makedoniatena mi, Gaius engkhejege Aristarkus hechuw suwrhege vikihege kummhe eente avikipehe.
Chonaching Paul ing engkaarna valhuwning ateche sepoheching rhumaase.
Engkhejege aalhanghe Asiana aatuchehekaarna achuw engkheing mi vicheerge kummhe-eenna amhe besuwmaaresie atehe.
Chaleching mi alhehing ttong engkhe, alheheching uwnghege, hanghing ajie isuwga ichii ouwnghuwmaasehe, engkonghe mihejeng minghuwmaasehe.
Engkhejege mi ruhpuwhe alheheching Alexanderchuw bettohhege Jehudiheching maangsohte anhupehe. Engkhejege Alexander ing akih ilehge entunamaaing mihenhingna ahinrhierpe.
Changgechuw Jehudiga ichii imminghuwtaana, mibekheing hirring ennhiiphana euwnghe, “Ephesia mihe nhingna Diana elhuwngpaaga.”

Changgechuw khupuw lerii enjiipaching mi ruwpuwhechuw minderenghege arhier, “Ephesusna aeonghe,” “Ephesia khupuwna Diana (Artemis) ing elhuwngga engkhejege minventena ijunbuw rotha een aarhuwnggehe ate aminghuwmaa achuw aeuwmga?
Chonaching heve ttonghehie irhumaa ichehmaataana ninnuw ing belung aedeh aeong engkhejege belung isieing avanamnaing nong tumaavang nintega.
Ajiegachiinche leh eentena aberu engkhejege elehchuw thoh asama atumaa pesarhehie nimvirhiipe.
Chonaching Demetrias amana aalhanghe kenong ihehe taalina ittong achuw engkhe uwmmniebe, waajiir amhin emmhongne, engkhejege lepaa aapuwheje ongnehe; emmenieng ennajir inlhinheresie.
Changgechuw ninnuw ing lintaang lintaang ttonglina jongtenuwbe, waajiir enhuw ejieng lepaa aangkongle betthovang aetega.
Ajiegachiinche atenie alham aenemaa isuwlina eenlhinmeniebe khi minsienaga engkhejege hevelina oungkongbormeniege alham amindangna chehmaamenie.”
Engkhejege hevehie varhierge mi oungkonghechuw kiisehe.
Huwjaarchuw adenhuwte Paul ing sepohhechuw eenge ennonglina betthohege Makedoniate asinaing enthongse.
Amaing ama rambekhenaching avasile, thachahechuw betthohege Greecete thengse,
Ama amhinna tha eenthum cheengge Siriate ruwkuwng tuungge isi aanthongle Jehudiheching enrhumaalina ttong besuwte tehege athengheche Makedoniate inligete tege amindeenpe.
Amathoh Pirrhes sapa Sopater, Thessolonikatena Aristarkus engkhejege Sekundus Derbitena Gaius, engkhejege Timothi, Asiatena Tikikas, engkhejege Trophimus hetho enrhiehe.
Changgechuw emmenieng men sahege Troasna enghaahe;
changgechuw chor emvemaa aeriim inie aanhuwna kinnuw ing Philippitena ruwkuwng tounguwngge aenie anerongana Troasna vatungsuwng; amana inie nesarie icheengung.
Mensa hapta aeniena kinnuw ing tal bekhiena ingeenteuhle Paul ing ateunie sivang atetaana emmeniechuw minchuwhege yenttim ahimphape.
Emmenieng aangkongna chung adeennaching thoumhi enhimpaa abelenghe.

Amana aromhing Eutikus ate elerching mihuthong lina aeong; amaing amhi ikhuwching chehge. Engkhejege Paul ing aminchuwheleching jaardohge aminthumna adeentena jungbose, amana ithiebesaching ahingeedumpehe.
Chonaching Paul ing jungttumge, jukuumge aekorge arhier, “Ninning dongmaaresie, anhingna arhingrie uwmne.”
Chona Paul ing achungte hangkarse, engkhejege tal abekhiinhuwte sasuwhege amaing emmeniethoh khuw avaarmaataang ensiehege, amaapehe.
Engkhejege pesartichuw irhing ing arhiepehe, engkhejege enrotha aerhohchuw tepiepangmaaga.
Kinnuw ing men hesauwngge Assosphana ruwkuwng teung uwngge amana Paulje imveresii kintega, ajiegachienche ataaing akhi ing sivanggete tege ennhiingna aminthanggehe.
Engkhejege amaing kinnuwtho Assosna eenteu nungge amaje mimve uwngge Mitilenate vatungsuwng.
Amatena ruwkuwng hinghur uwngge amenhiena iniena Kaios paang aberanaching vatungsung, akhovaarna Samos vatung owngge Trogillian na cheeng owngge amenhie iniena Miletas na thengsung.
Ajiegachiinche Paul ing Asiana apha inhim acheengnamaaing Ephesia elenniege ruwkuwngna asina abelung neerse; ajiegachienche Pentikost iniena Jerusalemna aongnaing atetaana ahimminthupe.
Ate Miletustena Ephesuste mi vicheerge, ruwhchang upahechuw avame eenpe.
Emmenieing emvatungche amaing ennhingna arhier, “Kieing Asiatena kehuungle amensa aeniena betthiimge aphabekhena ninnuwtho enrhiemiege ajiekhang ipaarging ichiehie ninnuw ing nimminghuwga,
kieing kemhi riechietho belung edepaaing Thangnhang nong tusaingge Jehudiheching aetthamaa ouwngruwhing enthonghege chaang embier ethenghe chuw kekhaangsaape.
Kieing ekanaphuw ttong minnhingna minjaamsaingge mikaarnaje, een eennaje kiminchuw nonglina kerotha keminsiimaa nimminghuwga.
Thangnhangnhingte belung ehuwng engkhejege Thangpa Jesuchuw enthacha Jehudihe Greekhe nhingnaje saarkhii pesaingge.
Engkhejege ate Chipi ing ouwngkhum taana Jerusalemte; ama amhinnaching kenhingna ajie suwhvate minghuwchemaang.
Hevepanghie keminghuwsaga, iphiervang atehe ijachaam kemana enghaajese tege Chipi Enthiing ing khupuwbekhena saarkhii impeega.
Changgechuw kenong etuphuw engkhejege Thangnhang lungsii aettha ttongjiirhie saarkhie kepinaing Thangpa Jesutena kepha nongchuw kebetthuwchenaing kie kechipihie amin elupaaing timsamaang.
“Ate keminghuwchuwbe ningkaarna ketaaching Thangnhang lepaa minjaam ingge emvesaging, changgechuw ninnuw ing kemhe avonhii mhuwmaatenuw ichiin ketaaing keminghuwpe.
Chonaching atenie ninnhingna keminthangsaa amachuwbe ninnuw achuw chuw tahlinagejenie thie ichelina (ithie) kethu uwmmaa
ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing amindeenbekhe ninnhingna ephuwng kening ichiemaa uwmmaa.

Thangpa thieing amin ateembesa Thangnhang ruwhchang ahinjuhchena, ninnajir engkhejege arubekhe he tahlina belung minlhuwruw; amana Chipi Enthiing ing ninnuwchuw ruwhchanghe aabiirna upachuw embesuwpiga.
Kieing kingkenhuwtebe Zouaruhhechuw entthieluing ningsie aeuwmmaa rhimpuwheching ningkaarna valhuwvate ichie keminghuwse,
engkhejege ninnajirsungnaje ingeenhuw aejie sepohhechuw akijohna amamaa ttong irhier thengvatehe.
Chonaching kumthum phana yen siim kemhi riechie iboung mibekhenhingna kebetthosaaga ichii ebeherpiluing enriimsaruw.

“Engkhejege atebe kieng ninnuwchuw Thangnhangte engkhejege Thangpa lungsiichuw keminsernagechuw; heve ttonghing ninnuw bekhe chuw ahimminlhuwngna engkhejege aminlhiembesakaarna phawang nintebekhe impee achega.
Kieing achuw nhingnadong lopa, sana changmaanieche piendeerlina enner suwhmaaing.
Kikih ennhiihing kesaru engkhejege kilhangheching kanavang ichie nong ketusaahie nintaaing nimminghuwga.

Alham bekhena kieng ninnhingna kenunu ketu kesina keminthiegechuw, amachuwbe hanghin nong tusameniege ninnuw ing isurhe, aenanghe chuw eboum engkhejege Thangpa Jesu ttongchuw enthiesateruw, ‘iphakhah ipeehing bor aphaga.’”
Amaing attongrhier abetthuwnhuwte emmenietho khiruwkhuw phinhege athamsaahe.
Chale enhimpaa ittaaje emveing Paulchuw aekorhege abejuhhe.
Amhe avonhii mhuwmaanung tege arhier ttonglina enhimpaa embelung ijahe. Chona emmenieng ruwkuwng umtaa phanaing avithaapehe.
Kinnuw ing emmenietho enttheuwngge ruwkuwnglina hungsiuwngge Kos ephaing iteumje huwngsiuwngge amenhiena aeniena Rhodes, engkhejege amatenaing Patarana tungsuwng;
Phoenicia vatungvang ate ruwkuwng phauwngge amachuw tounguwngge ahinghurpe
Kupruschuw kimvimhuwche amachuw talite maungge Siriate hinghur uwngge Tirete ttumsung.
Amana sepohhechuw eenteuungge inie nesarie echeenguwng; Chipi Enthiing ing arhier enhuw ijieng emmenieng Paul nhingna Jerusalemte asinamaaing arhierhe.

Aeniechuw ahungtangche kinnuw ing amhinchuw mauwngge ramkhie kinghungsile, emmenieing enlumhih ensitihetho enrhiing kinnuwchuw khupuw kur phana imvithaahe, engkhejege rimchie kurna kingkhiruwkhuw phin uwngge hinthamuwngge engkhele engkhe aantthena ttong rhiersaungge chona kinnuw ing Zahaajsungte kar owngge engkhejege emmenie engkesehe.
Chona kinnuw ing Zahaajsungte kar owngge engkhejege emmenie engkesehe.
Kinnuw ing rimchie ramkhie Tiretena kimbetthule Ptolemas vatunguwngge une thachaheching rotha ekurhege inie nekhe echeengung.
Akhowaarna kinnuw ing mauwngge Kaesareate thengsung; engkhejege mi sarii kaarna aettha ttongjiirpa Philip eente vauwngge onghaasung.
Heve pesar ing asanuw lunghaa millie adeen; emmeniechuw Thangnhang ttong aphuwnggehe.
Kinnuw ing amana aenie aenhimpa kincheengle laarchangpa aromhing Agabus ateching Judiatena itheng.

Amaing kinnhingna thengge Paul adierhiin phiernachuw viliege, akhi akih phiersage arhier, “Hanghing Chipi Enthiing ing arhierse, ‘Jerusalemna aeong Jehudihe ching hangngenge phierheniege heve aapuwhie yaati lintaanghe kihna pewate.’”
Kinnuw ing amabekhechuw kinthieche, kinnuwjeng engkhejege amana eong mihejeng Jerusalemte ahangnamaaing arhierhe.
Chona Paul ing abesang, “Ninnuwng ajie nintuga, ajietunaching ttaachuwge kebelung nimminjaga? Ajiegachiinche Thangpa Jesu romhingna Jerusalemna kie emphierpangmaage ithieje enthongging.”
Engkhejege anhingna kimmenimchuw arhumaataana derenguwngge kinrhierchuwbe “Thangnhang amindeenchuw eensuwresie.”
Heve iniebekhe aanhuwna Jerusalemte ehang enthongsung.
Engkhejege kinnuwtho enrhiing Kesariatena sepohheje isihaauwng, emmenieng kinnuwchuw embethung ayenna sepoh, Kuprustena Mnason eente enrhiepehe.
Jerusalem kimvatungche thacha unehheching rotha ouwngkurhe.
Akhowaar iniena Paultho enrhieuwngge Jakobchuw kimvavir; engkhejege upabekheje ithenghe.
Emmeniechuw rotha akurhe aanhuwna amaing nong atutaana Thagnhang ing yaati lintaanghekaarna atupih nongbekhe ahintongpe.

Emmenieng amachuw enthietaana Thangnhangchuw amimpaahe. Chona emmenieing anhingna arhier, “Uneh, nang ing namhuwse, Jehudihe kaarna thacha mi chiing ijehmeh ongnehe; emmeniebekheching waajiir ttongtholina embelung lhuwpaane.

Engkhejege ennhingna nakhuhie arhier, amachuwbe nang ing yaati lintaanghekaarna aeong Jehudibekhena insitihechuw vintin tumaaruw engkhejege nunu isikhangkhing tumaaruw techuwge emmenieng Mosichuw abethinna aminchuw.
Chonaching ajieche tuvateruw? Emmenieng thengsechie ate thiechersietehe.
Chonaching kinnuwng kinrhierhie itupeere; entaaing ttongneer atubesa pesar mllie kindeense.

Heve pesarhehie rhie ing emmenietho nataa minthiingsare, engkhejege emmenieing emmeniechuw luw amingkorna, lhuwvangaechii sheer pere. Hanghing mibekheing nakhu atonghie atataamaaga, changgechuw nataajeng waajiir ttongthohchuw minjiechiege isigechie ate immenieng minghuwvate.

Changgechuw thacha ilhuwbesa lintaang yaatihe khu, lehna aminlhen pihse, thie asaa, rhuw ing enraah ithie sah engkhejege naamaa etu, hevebekhetena emmenieng ataaing aminjiechenang, kinnuw ing bichaar tuuwngge enjiise.”

Chona Paul ing pesarhechuw rhiehege amenhie iniena emmenietho ensa minlhiemhege, emmeniebekhe rotum ikaaphuw pih apina ephang, aminlhiemna aeniebekhena abetthuwna aminthienaching Thangnhang eente valhuwse.
Aenie nesariechuw attuhphana Asiatena Jehudiching ataachuw Thangnhang eenna amhuwheche mi ruwpuwchuw belung bekhaahege, emmenieing suwrhege

euwnghe, “Israel pesarhe ebuwmruw!” Amhinbekhena aemihechuw waajiir ttongtholina engkhejege heve amhinlina amamaaing aminchuw hie amahiega; heve ithi ing Greekheje Thangnhang eenna virhiege enthiing eenje amimbourpe.
Ajiegachiinche ayen emmenieing Ephesustena Trophimustho enrhiehege khupuwnahing kimmhuwga, engkhejege amahie Paul ing Thangnhang eenna ahinrhiega tehege amindeenhe.
Chona khupuwsungna aeongbekhe betthohege, engkhejege ouwngchumpohhege avinampehe, Paulchuw suwrhege Thangnhang eensungtena abesuwpehe, engkhejege chalerahching eengkhaarbekhe akampehe.
Thehte tehege eentuleching Jerusalem aangkheng iraang suwhse tehege raarmi elhuwnghenhingna ttong apipehe.
Therluing amaing raarmi roza engkhe engkhetena aapuwhechuw rhiihege jotensehe; emmenieng upahe elhuwng amana raarmihechuw emmhuwche Paul abinhechuw aminchinpehe.
Chale aapuw elhuwngching apaangna thengge amachuw suwrge bangna thierhuw ennhiiching phierruw tege ttongtho apipehe; engkhejege amaing ajieche tuge, engkhejege achuwga tege asiihe.

Engkaarna alhehing ttong engkhe, alheching lintaang engkhe changching aeuwnghe; engkhejege mibekhe aantohchortaanaching atataachuw aminghuw chemaataana atahchuw sepehe engkongna amhinte rhieruw tege ttongtho apipe.
Chona kaattumnaching ahangkarche miheching avinamtahnaheching raarmiheching idumniege arhiete thengse;
Ajiegachiinche miruhpuwheching, “rhiidohruw!” Tehege uwnghege ajiehe.

Engkhejege Paulchuw sepehe engkongna amhinte minlhuwrong ateleching, amaing elhuwng upanhingna arhier, “Nanhingna ttong engkhe irhier rhuvate?” Sepe upa apuwching abesang, “Nang Greek ttong naminghuwse?
Chogeniebe, heve aeniehie asuwhmaalhiele mitheh pesar chiing milliechuw betthohchiege rampate rhiechiege Egyptena mihechuw nahinrhii chuw nangmaagechie?”
Changgechuw Paul ing arhier, “Kie Jehudiging, cilicia paam Tarsustenaging, engkhejege aromhing isi khupuw miging; chonaching irhupeeteniebe heve mihenhingna ttongsagete.”
Amachuw arhupi taanaching, Paul ing kaattumlina neerge mihechuw akih aelehge derengruw ate; engkhejege miheching dereng auwmheche, amaing Hebru ttong ing ttongge ennhingna ahinrhierpe.
“Keukene, ipa ouwngsuwbekhe, kieing ate ninnhingna ketaalina suwvang ichiehie rhiersagete aerongepisaruw.”
Amaing Ibria ttong ing attongtaanaching derenghege, amaing arhier:

“Kie Jehudiging Silisia ate Tarsusna enrhingging, changgechuw heve khupuwna Gamaliel derna ihangvierging, imapa Imapuwhe waajiir ttongtho hechuw ittha jeing kehintamga, engkhejege ninnuwbekheing atenie nintukhangkhing, kiejeng Thangnhanglina kebelungriir elhuwhga.
Kieing pesarheje nepenuwheje phier ingnge mikhum sungte vipehengge emmeniehechuw aethie ipha arhuna keminjagehe.

Hevelinahing khorpuw elhuwngheje khupuw chiipuw upaheje kesaarkhiegehe. Ennhingtena ttong phaingge Damaskasna eonghejechuw tantie apinaing, engkhejege phierheningnge Jerusalemte ahinrhiena kie amate evaseeng.
“Kieing vasi ingge Damaskas kevatungphana lhamlena elengpah minventena minghuw minghaluing enthenpe.
Kie lolhiete tieh ingge kintorle erur engkheing kenhingna arhier, ‘Saul, Saul, ajietuna kiehie hangjehmeh imminjagechie?’
Kieing kebesang, ‘Achuwgechii Thangnhang?’ Chona amaing kenhingna arhier, ‘Kiehie nang ing ijaachaam impee Nazareth Jesuchuwging.’
Chale kietho enrhiehaauwngge isiheching elengchuw amhuwhe changgechuw kenhingna ajirhier erurchuwbe thiemaahe.
Kieing kesii, ‘Kieing ajie tuvang ketega, Thangnhang?’ Thangnhangching kenhingna arhier, ‘hangthieing Damaskaste wah, engkhejege amana nang ing tuvang nate nongbekhelina nanhingna iminthiewate.’
Chalena elengjor elengching ajiidong mhuwchemaasing, chonaching kilhangheching kekihna ebechuwhege Damaskaste enrhiepehe.
“Engkhejege amana aeong Jehudihejeching aajah, akhu aetthapaa atonghe, waajiir ttongtho enhuw ijieng dhormo icher Anania ate achuw engkhe pesarching,
kenhingna thengge; engkhejege kepaangna neerge, arhier, ‘une Saul, namhee mhuwchere!’ Chalerahching kemhee emhuw chesa ingge ataaje kemhuw.
Chona amaing arhier, ‘Imapa Imapuwhe Thangnhangching nangchuw amaing amindeen naminghuwnaing Dhormo icher Engkhechuw namhuwnaing, engkhejege anhertena erur nathienaing ingngeeturpe;
Chonaching nang ing mibekhe mhekungna Thangpa rotum namhuwbesa engkhejege nathiebesalina saarkhie owungsuwwangniete.
Engkhejege ajietuna nang ing namintherga? Hangneer, Thangpa romhingchuw sur ing chii valuhre, isiicher natubekhetena enlhiemsare.’
“Kieing Jerusalemtena kehungeenlinhuwte kehinthamleching, mhiromhang kemhuwpe.
Engkhejege Jesuchuw mhuw ingge kenhingna arhier, ‘Minthure, Jerusalemtena engkere, ajiegachienche emmenieing kesaarkhii napeekha iliepimaahenie.’
Engkhejege kieng kerhier, ‘Thangpa,’ kieing khuwngsang bekhena nang enthachahechuw mikhumsungna kethaar amana ibinje kebinhe amahie aminghuwgehe.
Engkhejege nang enthacha Stephenlina saarkhie thie abesuwleching, ketaarahing apaangna ineerging, erhuje kerhu, engkhejege ama aathehe empiendier aarhungchuwging.
Chona amaing kenhingna arhier, ‘Wah, ajiegachienche kieing nanghie isihpaate yaati lintaangte cheergechie.’ ”
Heve phanahing emmenieng rongehege, changgechuw avonhii uwnghege, “hangchie mihie simriipaamtena thorruw? Ajiegachiinche, ama irhingna mati chamaa.”
Engkhejege enguwngleching, empiendier lie cherhege engkhejege mimvente perkhuwhje vorhege,
elhuwng upaching emmenieng hanjehme auwngtaanaheching, Paulchuw binheniege ttong asienaing sepehe ongtaate minlhuwruw tege ttongtho apipehe.
Changgechuw emmenieng sawin rhuwing emphierle, Paul ing apaangna eneer raarmi roza engkhe upanhingna arhier, “Rom michuw waajiir tuludehing ebinhie ninnuw waajiirga?”
Amachuw raarmi upaching athieche, amaing bichaar aapuwnhingna wage atong, “nang ing ataalina ajietugete natega? Amahie Rom miga.”
Chotaanaching elhuwng waajiir etupaching thengge anhingna arhier, “Nang Rom migechie, kenhingna rhierre?” Engkhejege amaing arhier, “uwng.”
Pichaar upaching abesang, “amin enhimpaa minlhuw ingge kie Rom mi eensuwging.” Paul ing arhier, “Changgechuw kiebe Rom mi ing emberhingga.”
Chalerahching anhingna siewang ate miheching ensinsehe; engkhejege elhuwng pichaar aapuwjeching Rom miga ate aminghuwche, ama aphiertaanajeching ittihse.

Changgechuw amenhie iniena Jehudiheching ataalina ajiekhang minlaargungte atehechuw minghuwning entetahna abethinpe, engkhejege elhuwng khorpuwhele upahe bekhechuw engkongruw tege ttongtho pege, Paulchuw virhiege emmhekungna ameneerpe.
Paul ing upahe laaluhchuw eebeertihge ahinrhier, “keu kenehe, Kieing atenie ipha belungrier enthiing ing Thangnhang mhekungna epaarsaging.”
Chona khorpuw elhuwng Ananiaing apaangna ineerhechuw anherna ebingruw tege ttongtho apihe.

Chaleching Paul ing anhingna arhier, “Thangnhang ing eebeengwate Thangnhang ing emingverwate, ivaar ing aateh bangnanghie! Waajiir ttongtho lina waajiir atuna ongchiige waajiir ttongtholina entehjejohing binre techiege ttongtho napiga.”
Apaangna aeneerheching arhier, “nang ing Thangnhang khorpuw elhuwngchuw naasehga?”
Engkhejege Paul ing arhier, “Kieing khorpuw elhuwngga ichiehie minghuwsamaaing; ajiegachienche hevehie bejiihge uwmne, ‘nang ing nami aapuwhelina aetthamaaing ttongmaa.’ ”

Changgechuw Paul ing alhehe, Saddukihe, paangkheheching Pharisigehe ichiing aminghuwtaanaching upa laaluhhenhingna ahinrhier, “keu kenehe, kie Pharisiging, Pharisi sapaging; ithieheching hangrhingvate ichielina waajiir entugechuw.”
Hevehie arhierche Pharisihe engkhejege Saddukihekaarna enlehmaahege upa laaluhheje kiesehe.
Ajiegachiinche ihangrhingje, Thangven michierhe, engkhejege chipije uwmmaa tehege Saddukiheng arhier, changgechuw Pharisihechinbe hevehehie aeuwmga ategehe.

Chotaanaching huwjaar tamse, engkhejege Pharisi hetho enlehhe Thiimdeehe alheheching hangneerhege eenrhunaing entupe; “Kinnuw ing heve pesarlina amaraar teumauwng, achuw ing aminghuw, anhingna Chipi engkheing changmaanieche Thangven michier engkheing aettongje arhuse.”

Enlehmaahechuw ahinthiche, emmenieing Paulchuw alheh lheh ing itthiiheniege tehege elhuwng khorpuwheching ittihsehe amana sepehe jungsuwhege engkaartena Paulchuw sihenung sepehe ongtaate rhieruw tehege ttongtho apipe.
Ama yennaching Thangpaing aboumna neerge arhier, “Nathona mintthaa, ajiegachienche nang ing Jerusalemna saarkhie napeekhangkhing, Romnaje nang ing khang ngenge perong natega.”
Khuw ahungwaarche Jehudiheching amemaangna engthonghege Paulchuw enthehmaataang buw saluing ajiedong mintinmaamenie tehege ttong ameneerpehe.
Heve ttongneer atuhechuw misummillie athigehe.
Emmenieing khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege upahenhingna thenghege arhierhe, “kinnuw ing Paulhie kinthehmaataang ajiidong mintinmaanung teuwngge waasaa kintupe.

Chonaching ate ninnuw ing heve ttonglina aetthajeing ajongchaang itupeenung ama ahinrhienaing upahetho enrhieing khorpuw elhuwnghe nhingna iminthangpiruw; engkhejege awatungmaalhiele athehnaing enthongsuwng.”
Ate Paul asarnuw sapaching emmenieng aariimhechuw thiege, wage sepehe ongtaana valhuwge Paulnhingna atongpe.
Chotaanaching Paul ing raarmi roza engkhe aapuw eenge arhier, “heve elerhie upahenhingte irhiepisaruw; amaing anhingna atongphuw uwmne.”
Hanghing amaing rhiege upahe nhingte hinrhiege arhier, “mikhumna aeong Paul ing kiechuw eenge heve pesartihie nanhingte irhiipire, arhierphuw uwmne ate.”
Pichaar etu aapuwching abenna bechuwge, engkhete rhiege, eenruwruwng asie, “Ajie siegechie techiige ethenggechie?”
Amaing abesang, “Jehudiheching Paul lina itthajehing ttong asienaing mintechaanghege ateunie upa laaluhhe nhingna ajinrhienaing nanhingte arhiernaing eenrhusehe.
Chonaching nang ing enttong eminjiepimaare; ajiegachienche engkaarna pesar summillieing vinttaam tonghege ama athehmaataang waasaa tuhege aariimnaahe; nanhingtenapang ahaajehgehe.”
Chona amaing pesarti nhingna heve ttonghie keminthangga temaadehre tege ttongtho pege amingkepe.
Amaing raarmi aapuwhe ennhiichuw eenhege arhier, “enthongruw, yen hirring ikuwna Kesariate raarmi chanhie, sikur eteung mi sumsarie, engkhejege ishie ichie mi chanhie bethong.
Engkhejege Paulhie sikurlina meongnung lepaa aapuw Felix buwmte iliem uwmludehing bethungruw.”
Amaing hanghing lerii abejii:
“Klaudia Lisias, nagul nathang elhuwng lepaa aapuw nanhingna kerumsanaachie.
Heve pesarhie Jehudiheching surgete atenaahe, enthephana kieing ataahie Rom miga ate minghuwingge raarmihetho enrhiing apha aettha taanchana amachuw kekarpe.
Engkhejege emmenieng amahie ajielina aminlaargehe ate minghuwning tengge, kieing upahenhingte kerhiiga.
Emmenie waajiir ttongtholina amachuw minlaarhege, changgechuw ithehna changmaanieche aphierna mati aecha ttong uwmmaadeh tengge keteupe.
Heve pesarlina enthonghege ichamaa tuvang entetaanaching heve khulina ttong isuwhie vatongsare tengge ttongtho peingge nanhingte therluing kevicheerga.”
Chotaanaching raarmiheching ttongtho inhuw ijieng Paulchuw besuwhege yenna Antipatriste ahinrhiepehe.
Changgechuw atunnie hangchiina emmenieng sikur aathuhechuw amathoh enrhiing insinaing mahege sepehe ongtaate hungeenlise.
Emmnieng Kaesaria awatungheche, leriichuw lepaa aapuwnhingna apipehe, Paulje amhekungna aminthiehe.
Engkhejege leriichuw page, amamihie ajie paamtena miga tege asiehe; engkhejege Silisiatenaga ate aminghuwche;
Ataahie aarhu maahejeching thengheniege kieing nattong rongewanggete tege amaing arhier. Engkhejege Herod khupuwsungna rhuwngnung seruw tehege ttongtho apipehe.
Inie neronga enhuwna khorpuw elhuwng Ananiasching upa tiepietho engkhejege enrotumna rhiervang ate ihepaa Tertullushetho thenghege, Paullina lepaa aapuwpa buwmna ttong amingkarhe.
Chona Paulchuw eenge Tertullus ing amaraar chuw ahimpipe.
“Athang alaar aeuwm napaarna kinnuw ing idepaa paarsauwngge engkhejege namindeen enhuw ijieing heve yaati rotumna namhuwche enhuw ijieng himmintharchiege.
Kinnuw ing hevebekhetho enrhiing kimmimpaa alhambekhena, amhinbekhena kinrhusaaga.
Changgechuw kieng apha isihing alhuwnamaang, naningsiina kinttong aerongepire tengge kenhiisaanaachie.
Ajiegachiinche pesar hevehing memaangvang ichii nong tuge lolhiepaam aangkhengna aeong Jehudibekhe kaarna lepaa ttong amamaa himbesuwge, engkhejge Nazarethhe aruh aaching engkhega ate kinteupe.
Amaing Thangnhang eenje amemaangna ahintu; engkhejge ate kinsuwrpe. Engkhejege waajiir ttongtho enhuw ejieing ataalina waajiir tuning kintega.
Changgechuw elhuwng aaching Lisias thengge amaing kingkitena ensipe.
Engkhejege aalhinhechuw naboumte siresie tege ttongtho apipe. Kinnuw ing ataalina kinlhinna ttongbekhelina nang ing isiepisang anhingtena minghuwchevangniete.”
Engkhejege Jehudiheje heve ttonghehie hanghin ichiega ate atataaga ichie ouwngteusehe.
Lepaa aapuwching minttonggete tege ahintuleching, Paul ing abesang:
“Kum hangjeh nataaing waajiir aapuw ouwngshuwchiege atehie minghuwsaingge, kie kerotumna rotha aerhoing kerumsagechie.
Kieing Jerusalemte Thangnhang ahinthamna kehangna inie summalhie ennhii thimaalhie ate imminghuwpeegechie;
engkhejege kieing achuw engkhetho Kingeen sungna, changmaanieche mibekhechuw ttong kebesuwna Thangnhang eennaje, khuwngsang bekhenaje, khupuwnaje emmenieng emhuwmaahe.
Emmenieing ate kenhingna imminlaar ttonghie nanhingna aandangna pichemaang.

Changgechuw hevehie nanhingna kerhiersaana, amachuwbe waajiir ttongtho enhuw ijiing engkhejege laarchangpahe leriina abejiibekhechuw thachaingge, emmenieng aruhing enthacha Lham enhuw ijieng kieing kemapa kemapuwhe Thangnhangchuw kemindeensaaga.
Dhormo aecherje aechermaaheje hangrhingvate tege arhier mihejeng arhuchuw kieing Thangnhang entongte atataa minghuwingge eongsaging.
Heve khuwnahing kiejeng Thangnhangtena engkhejege mihenhingna aphabekhena kemindeenhie atataaga tengge ketusaaga.
“Ate kum tepie sungna keyaatihenhingte daan ketusaa engkhejege enlhen, inthi atuna pih kevirinsaaga.
Chaleching mi ruwpuwhetho enrhieluing, aettongchorje uwmluing Thangnhang eenna ketaa enlhiemsasing ichii emmenieng amhuwgehe. Changgechuw Asiatena Jehudihe alhehheje aeonghe.
Kenhingna iminlaarnawang ichii uwmheniebe, hevenahing namhekungna neerheniege kenhingna aeminlaarvang ategehe.
Amachuwmaa kekhage heve mihehing kieing upahe mhekungna keneerle kelaarnachuw teuhenieche rhierheresie.
Ithieheching aehangrhinglina heve aenienahing nimmhekungna kiechuw waajiir eentugehe ketetaanaching heve erur ing kieing engkaarna niir ingge euwnging.”
Changgechuw Felix ing Lhampuw akhulina aetthajeh aminghuwtaana bichaarchuw bethinge ahimminjong, “Lisias elhuwng upaching athengtaanchana nimwaajiir tuvanggie.”
Engkhejege ama vesang ing asiinaing engkhejege rhungheniege anong atuhe aalhanghe engkhedong khaamluing abuwmnaing raarmi aapuw nhingna ttongtho apipe.
Inie tepie aanhuwna Felix ing alumheethoh Jehudi nepenuw Drasillathoh enrhiehege etheng, Paulchuw vaeenhege Khrista Jesu athachana khulina anhingtena ttong athiehe.
Engkhejege dhormo icherlina, ataa enriimchena engkhejege hungsuwvang ate waajiirhelina ahinrhierche, Felix ing ittege abesang, “atenieche engkere, taancha auwmle kieing eenvanggechie.”
Heve apha auwmle Paul ing anhingna sheer epevate ateje amindeenga; ama linajeching aphabekhena eenge amathoh aettonghe.
Changgechuw kum ennhii ahungvieche Porkius Festus Felix aphamchuw aminserpe; engkhejege Felix ing Jehudihenhingtena ningsie phaning tege Paulchuw bethinluing amaape.
Inie nethum aanhuwna Festus ing aramte tungge Kesariatena Jerusalemte hangse.
Ate khorpuw elhuwnghe engkhejege Jehudihe upaheching Paul taalina ttong amingkarpehe. Emmenieng avonhii nhehege,
engkhejege Paul taalina eentuchuw Jerusalemte ahimpimna ing anhiigehe. Emmenieng enturimchuwbe lhamlena hehaaheniege athehnaing asergehe.
Changgechuw Paulhie Kesariana rhuwnghege aeongga, engkhejege ataajeng apha tepie uwmniege amate sivate tege Festus ing abesanghe.
“Chonaching,” amaing arhier, “ningkaarna aatuche miheching kietho sihaamenuwge, heve pesar ing alaarna uwmniebe emmenieng anhingte minlaarheresie.”
Chona amaing engkaarna inie irii changmaanieche sum minthiluing onghaahege, Kesariate wage ateuniehangchiena waajiir tuna amhinna ongge Paulchuw ahinrhienaing ttongtho apipe.
Amaing awathengche Jerusalemtena etheng Jehudiheching arovena neerhege, atataa abie eawmchuwche peluing eluwpapaaing ataalina alhinpehe.
Paul ing arotumna angahna arhier, “Kieing Jehudihe waajiir ttongtholina ajiedong tusamaaing, Thangnhang eentaalinaje, lepaa aapuw Eruwngtalinaje isiicher tumaang.”
Changgechuw Festus ing Jehudihe nhingtena aekana aphanaing Paulnhingna ahinsii, “Nang ing Jerusalemte hangteniege heve ttong isuwh taalina kemhekungna waajiir etu narhuna?”
Paul ing abesang, “Kieing lepaa Eruwng waajiir aatunhingna rhiersaingge neersaning, Jehudihe nhingna kelaarna ajiidong uwmmaa, amahie nataajeng aetthajeng imminghuwpeegechie.

Changkhangjenie kieing kelaarna uwmniebe, ithie arhuna ketugeniebe ithieje kechese; changgechuw heve mihehing kenhingna inlhinbekhe kaarna atataa engkhedong uwmmaaniebe achuw engkhedong kiehie ennhingte ipi chemaanie. Kieng lepaa Eruwngnhingte kenhiisaaga.”
Chona Festus ing pham ireen upahetho entanahege abesang, “nang ing lepaa Eruwngnhingte nabelipe; Eruwngnhingte sivang natega.”
Inie tepie enhuwte, Eruwng Agripa engkhejege Bernie hechuw Kesariate vatungsehe, engkhejege Festuschuw rukuum atuhe.
Amana inie enhimpaa cheenghege encheengleching Festus ing Eruwngnhingna Paul ttongchuw minthangge, arhier, “Heva Felix ing mikhumna khumge amaah pesar engkhe ongne.
Kieing Jerusalemna keongle heve pesarlina khorpuw elhuwngheching engkhejege Jehudihe upaheching atahlina amaraar ebebupiruw tehege kenhingna amingkarhe.

Kieng ennhingna kebesanghe, alheen he michuw aalhinhethoching mhele mhe eenteuheniege ataalina ebuw ttonglina ataaing angahsaana taancha aphamaalhiele, ama michuw ipidohhie Romna eongmihe anunu maaga.
Chovelinaching emmenieng ipor ing enthengle therluing inie nekhesungna waajiir amhinna ongingge pesar amachuw ahinrhiena ttongtho kepihe.
Aalhinheching hangneerhege ataalina kemindeen khangkhing emmenieng aetthamaa ttong mindangche maasehe.
Changgechuw entasaa dhormolina, ithie Jesuchuw rhingse tege Paul ing aneerna Jesu lina, emmenieng ataalina ttong abesuwhe.
Chovelinaching kieing ajiekhang siiwang kete kening morge, ataaing Jerusalemte waniege heve ttonglina waajiir etu naadienaa tengge kesii.
Changching atihtaanaching Paul ing Eruwng waajiir atataa alienaing amaing ahimbilitaana, kieing amachuw Eruwngnhingte kevibethinmaataang rhuwngruw tengge ttongtho kepigehe.”
Chotaanaching Agripaing Festus nhingna arhier, “kie ketaraaing ama minhingtena ttong thiening ketena.”
“Atunie”, “nang ing attong thievangniete,” tege arhier.
Amenhiina iniena Agripale Bernice agulthang aeuwm ing, raarmi upahetho khupuwtena elhuwnghethoh enrhiehege ttong entanawang amhinna valhuwhege, Festus ing arhier enhuw ijieng Paulchuw avirhiipehe.

Engkhejege Festus ing arhier, “Eruwng Agripa engkhejege kinnuwtho aeonghaamie pesar bekhena, ninnuw ing pesar hevehie nimmhuwse. Chovelinahing, amahie avonhie rhingresie ichie mati chama tehege uwnghege Jerusalemnaje henaje Jehudi mibekhejeng kenhingna ahinnhiegehe.
Changgechuw amaing ithie arhuna nong ajiedong tumaa ate keteupe, engkhejege ataaing Eruwng nhingna waajiirhie ahimbilitaana amachuw acheerna ttong kedeenga.

Ama pesarlina aapuw elhuwngseh nanhingna kieng keminjie keneerna uwmmaa. Amanaching hevehie sieteniege kieing enjiih arhu kechenaing, nimmhekungna engkhejege, Eruwng Agripa, namhekungna elupaaing kehinrhiise.
Ajiegachiinche mikhuwmsungna aeong engkhechuw waajiir etuna echeerle, ataalina alhinna ttonghechuw amindangmaahie awaakhar iuwmmaaga ichiin kemindeense.”
Agripaing Paulnhingna arhier, “narotumna aettong arhuna kepigechie.” Chona Paul ing akih vijamge angahna ttong ahinrhier.
“Eruwng Agripa, Jehudihing kenhingna inlhinbekhelinaching atenie namhekungna kieing ketaa kengahna ttong rhiervang ketehie kerasii aetthapaaga.
Ajiega chiingche Jehudihe eennunu atuhe engkhejege ttong isuw bekhehie imminghuwpeegechie; chonaching aekhaangpisaing aerongepisare tengge kenhiisaagechie.
“Ate amabekhechuw aborna betthiimge keyaatihekaarna engkhejege Jerusalemna keongna kesiimnalena kie kepaarnachuw Jehudibekheing aminghuwga.
Emmenieng saarkhie pening teheniebe, kinnuw dhormo kinsinalina aminghuwcherhe aruh mihe enhuw ijieng kieing Pharisi engkheing ehungpaarging ate mensaing imminghuwgehe.
Atebe kimmapa kimmapuwhenhingna Thangnhang ing pewanggete ate ttongdeenchuw chiihaar khangkhing kemindeentaana kieing waajiir etuna niirsaning.

Amachuw aphanaing kinsungkhor suwmmalhie ennhiing yen siim neluing Thangnhang nhingte belung elhuwhpaaing anong tusauwngge chiihaar khangkhing kemindeensaana. Heve kemindeenlina, He! Eruwng, kenhingna Jehudiheching inlhinsaagehe.
Thangnhang ing ithiehechuw avonhie minrhingniebe amachuw aethacha arhumaaga ate ajie tunaching nimmin deenga?
“Nazareth Jesu romhingna entehjejoh nongbekhe tuvang aetega tengge kieing enthiingkiir ketaaing mensang kemindeensaaga.

Engkhejege Jerusalemna ketuga; engkhejege elhuwng khorpuwhe ttongtho liesaingge, kieng enthiinghe (thachahe) inhimpah Mikhum sungna kethaar, engkhejege emmeniechuw kinthehleching entaalina kerhuna enjiih ttong kepigehe.

Engkhejege khuwngsangbekhena emmeniechuw minjahengge, ama dhormochuw enthachanamaaing kieing kehintuga; engkhejege entaalina eperpaa imvihkhangkhing mipaamtena khupuw khupuw naje emmeniechuw kejiigehe.
“Hanghing ichiing kieing khorpuw elhuwnghenhingtena ketuchena ttongtho leriitho Damaskaste kewasile,
inie siimttiimna, enjasuwpah Eruwng, aenie lengwaar ithi ing elengpah Thangventena lengwaar engkheing kenhingna engkhejege isihaauwng kilhanghe nhingnaje eeherge elengchuw lhampuwnaching kemhuw.
Engkhejege kinnuwbekhe lolhiete tiehsuwng, amana erurching Ebria ttong ing ajihrhier, ‘Saul, Saul, ajietunaching kiehie ijaachaam impeegechie? Ilhingchuw nakhi ing nahehie ishuwate!’
Chona kieng kerhier, ‘Thangnhang achuwgechie?’ Thangnhang ing embesang, ‘kiehie nang ing ijaachaam napeechuwging.

Changgechuw hangneer ing nakhi ing neer; ajiegachienche hevelinahing kieng minthievanggechie, amachuwbe, nataaing imhuwchiege engkhejege nanhingna minthievang ketelina anong etu saarkhie ipichuw besuwvanggechie.
Kieng nangje nayaatihe kaarna engkhejege yaati lintaang tena karpiwanggechie;
Emmenieng inthimpakhaartena elengte engkhejege satan keetena aminlhiembesa engkaarna amhin emphanaing, kieing nangchuw emmhee aamhongna ennhingte kecheergechie.’
“Ama enhuwna, Eruwng Agripa, Thangventena imminthiechuw aminjiemaa ketusaamaaga.

Changgechuw mensang Damaskas mihenhingte, aanhuwna Jerusalem mihenhingna, Jehudi ongtaa bekhena engkhejege yaati lintaanghenhingna emmenieng belungrier huwngheniege Thangnhangte ahungeenlinaing, engkhejege belungrier huwngna amati euwm nongchuw tuvang ategehe tengge keminjaamga.
Heve linahing Jehudi heching isuwrhege thehte entegehe.
Chonaching Thangnhang embumpichuw aphanaing, henahing niirsaingge elhuwng, amana isenghekaarna, lintaang rhierluing laarchangpahe engkhejege Mosi ing arhierbekhe suwhwang ichiehechuw ketongga.

Amachuwbe Aantinpipa chuw ijaanang phaniege engkhejege Thangpa ing mensang ihangrhing ouwngsuwniege, Thangpa ing inie aeyaatihenhingnaje amana lintaang yaatihenhingnaje lengwaar ttongchuw minthangvang atelinaga.”
Amaing ataa angahsaanaing ttong ahinrhierche, Festus ing eperpaa erur ing ahinrhier, “nang bewisechie Paul! Naminghuwlamthitaana emmimvipe!”
Changgechuw Paul ing arhier, “Kie imvimaaging, enjashuwpah Festus, changgechuw atataalina evier ing ittongging.

Eruwng nang ing hevebekhe khuhie naminghuwga, kieng nanhingna ningvesang ing aettongsaging, ajiegachienche nanhingna heve khuhie ajiidong thursamaang ichii kemindeensaaga, engkhejege ariikieng engkhena ketujehmaaga.
Eruwng Agripa, nang ing Thangnhang laarchang pahechuw nathachana? Nang ing thachasieng niete ate keminghuwse.”
Agripaing Paulnhingna arhier, “nang ing kiechuw engrangpaaing Khristian mimviegechie entegechie?”

Chona Paul ing abesang, “enranggejenie, enrangmaagejenie nangje engkhejege atenie kettong athie bekhenhingna,” bang thiirhuwhie maaniege, kenhingna ninghintuhanghing Thangnhangnhingte kehinthamsaa kidiesaaga.
Chonaching Eruwngje, lepaa aapuwpaje Bernice engkhejege aeonghaahe mibekhe hangneersehe;
chona emmenieng jungsuwhege engkhele engkhe aettonghe, “mi hevehing athihna amana aphierna amaraar arhu ajiedong tumaang.”
Engkhejege Agripaing Festus nhingna arhier, “heve mihie eruwngnhingte himbethinmaaheniebe inthin rhuvang atega.”
Kinnuw ing Itali atungnaing zahaajna isi kingeenthongleching emmenieng Paulle lintaang mikhumna ashiehechuw Eruwng raarmi roza aapuwpa Julius nhingna aminsernapehe.
Engkhejege Asia akurna euwm amhinte hinghurvang ate Adramyttium zahaaj engkhena teunguwngge rimchiete wasisuwng, engkhejege Thessolonikana aeong Makedoniatena mi Aristarkas ing kinnuwtho enrhieuwng.
Atuniehangchie kinnuw ing Sidonna bettumuwngge, Julia ing Paulchuw ningsiepaaing ebeersage aalhanghekaarna waniege aja abetthumnaing abethinpe.
Engkhejege ama amhintena rimchiete hungsiuwngge, thieing kimmate arhaangtaana Kuprus akurna ahinghurpe.
Chona Silisiale Pamphilia maangsohna iuwm rimchie elenuwngge kinnuw ing Lisiana euwm Mirana vatungsuwng.
Ama amhin naching raarmi roza engkhe aapuwching Italite hurvang ichii Alexandriatena zahaaj phage amana kinnuwchuw immingkarpe.
Kinnuw ing inie isiipaa taaneneng zahaaj hintuung uwngge Knidas maangsohna ijapaaing vatunguwngge, thieching kimma akhinmaataana Salmone maangsoh Kret apaang apaangte ahinghur.
Engkhejege ama amhin Fair Havena ateteching ijapaaing Lasea khupuwte tungsuwng.
Apha enhimpaa alhuwtaanaching engkhejege vinttaam kintongje avienhuwte, zahaaj ehurchuw ittiesuw ing auwmtaana,
Paul ing mibekhechuw mhee irhing ing auwmnaing arhier, “Aanchungpahe, heve zahaajna pihbekhe, engkhejege, zahaajpanghie maangluing eniebekhe ichipije maangvang ichii kemhuwse.”
Changgechuw raarmi roza aapuwchinche zahaaj aathupa engkhejege zahaaj aapuwnhingna abelungrier amengampe.

Ama zahaaj athaangnachuw pherbiena iriihna achamaataana ajie engkhe entu chenaing Phoenix atungnaing, engkhejege pherbie atongnaing tehege mibekheching rimchiete ahurnaing ttong entanasehe; Phoenix ader Tetaa ati eentongte aeuwm Kret he zahaaj athaangna engkhega.
Ate chiititena thie ahanghraangche, emmenieng amindeenhechuw hungviese tehege enrotha rhohge, zahaaj meneerhege Kret eentong siiphiekurte ahinghurpehe.
Changgechuw apha amongtina anhatena eperpaa thie khuw jorhaangse;
chonaching zahaajchuw Kret eentongtena aejorhaangching suwrge thie eentongte amhe bihircheluing zahaajchuw ahhupe.
Engkhejege Kauda ate isieng paam adeliimna junguwngge ijaapaaing zahaajchuw kinsuwrpe;
amachuw hinthaanguwngge zahaajchuw phier uwngge anhehna alham kimminjongpe; chona emmeniechuw Sirtiste himmingvarniege teuwngge zahaaj pienhechuw betthum uwngge kinghurpe.
Khuwthieching imminjalamtheeng amenhiena iniena pihsebekhe elhin kimbetthiimpe;
Avominthum iniena ingki ing pihsebekhe alhinpehe.
Engkhejege inie isihpaa aarsiijeng iniejeng kintaalina alengmaataana, engkhejege khuwthiejeng kinnuwchuw aekhumge rhingvanggungte ate ajiedong mindeen maasung.

Engkhejege vinttaam kintong silamthige, chale Paul ing enliehna neerge arhier, “pesarhe, ninnuw ing kerhier eminjie tenuwbe Krettena hinghurmaameniege heve alunahie engkhejege aemaangnahie phamaavang aetega.
Changgechuw atebe ninchipi ajanamaaing kebetthogechuw; ajiegachienche zahajmaaniege ningkaarna chipi aemaang uwmmaanie.
Ajiengachiinche kieing Thangnhang mi kinsuw taana, ama anong ketusaataana Thangnhang michier engkheing heve yenna kepaangna neerge arhier,
‘Ittemaare, Paul; nang ing Eruwng mhekungna neervang natega; engkhejege ibeer, nangtho enrhie zahaajna ninteunghaa bekhechuw Thangnhang ing nanhingte impipe.’
Chovelinaching, aanchungpahe, ninchipi minjamaaruw, ajiegachienche kenhingna arhierkhangkhing suwhwate tesaingge Thangnhangchuw kethachaga.
Changgechuw paam engkhena ttumvang ichiite thengse.”
Inie nesummalhie millie aphache, Adria ate rimchiete thieing inghurleching yenttiim rovena zahaaj aahurheching siiphie ram engkhe aanheengpe ichiin ameendeenhe.
Emmenieng eenthuchuw amintiheche lham sumnhie eenthuchuw aphapehe.
Engkhejege lhungpuw tahlina bowate ichiin ttiihege emmenieng zahaajtena thiirpum millie jibebohege khuw awaarnaing ahinthamsaahe.
engkhejege zahaaj aahurheching zahaaj tena atennaing zahaaj isiinghechuw betthumhege aanthongleheching,
Paul ing raarmi roza engkhe aapuw engkhejege asepehenhingna arhier, “emmeniehing Zahazsungna ongjemaaheniebe rhingmaahenie.”
Chotaanaching sepeheching rhuhechuw tinhege abethinpe.
Engkhejege khuwwaarphana Paul ing emmeniechuw buw amintinnaing arhier, “Atenie inie summalhie milliemeh haajehchuwge vinttaam nintongpe.
Chonaching tepie saruw tengge kerhiersaaga; ajiegachienche hevehie ninchipi aekarnaga, ajiegachienche ninluwtena sam engkhedong ttiirmaanie.”
Hanghing rhierge talchuw viliege emmhekungna Thangnhangchuw himminpaage, bekhiege isah abettiimpehe.
Ate inchipihechuw rhohege emmeniebekheching asaapehe.
Asungna aeongbekhechuw mi chanhii sumsarielhie kuruhgehe.
Emmenieng imvin vahege rimchiete Gehu saang hechuw lhinhege zahaajchuw minrhiehmaasehe.
Khuw ahungwaarche ramchuw akhutega ichii minghuwmaasehe changgechuw chiing avakhur chii inting amhuwpehe; amana Zahajchuw ikar rhuvatemo tehege ttong entanasehe.

Hanghing Zahaj abetthumna thiirchuw liehege rimchiena amaapehe; chalerarahching emmenieng arhuwjechuw bejohhege; engkhejege amatena pienje thie aerhaang eentongte mingkenhege, taang siiphiete atungnaing atupehe.
Changgechuw rimchie ennhie aanteuhna amhin aansuwtaanaching, zahaajchuw siikaarte anhupe. Engkhejege zahaaj atuunnhuwngchuw chii ouwngluhching ahinnhutaana enlaah rhuluing uwmse.
Sepeheching mikhum mibekhechuw chii thaaheniege atennamaaing thecherte atepehe:
Changgechuw sepe roza engkhe upaching Paulchuw karning atetaana enthonghechuw akhaampe. Amaing chii thaa ihehheching chiite jukhuwngsing siiphiete vatungresie,
engkhejege aeongheching thingttuwnglina, lintaangheching zahaaj pih ajiejiegejenie ataalina aalenna tuheresie tege ttongtho apipehe. Hanghing mibekhe siiphie tunghege rhingsehe.
Kinnuw ing irhing ing kimvatungnachuw Maltaga tege kimminghuwpe.
Amana aeongheching ningsie nong ouwngtupihechuw elesiisaamaaga; ajiegachienche khuw isuwrthoh pharbie auwmtaanaching, emmenieng mhi mintthehege auwnaing rukoum ouwngtupihe.
Changgechuw Paul ing thing alhuhchuw hinchige mhite arorche, mhi ensaaching berur engkhe jungsuwge akichuw aakhertipe.

Chotaanaching apaam miheching abenna aarhuw eperpaa berurching aakherchuw amhuwheche, engkhele engkhe ensiehege, “heve mihie mithehga; amaing rimchietena ensiihjenie atataa waajiirlina rhingchehmaase.”
Amaing amachuw aathihche mhisungte boge ajiidong temaase.

Changgechuw ataahie hangpurvate changmaanieche minghuw minghaluing theniege tiehvate tehege amindeenhe; changgechuw isipah ebeerhege anhingna ajiedong ija aemaang emmhuwmaataanaching, embelungriir mintehege lehga atepehe.
Ama veemchaang arovena Publius ate paamttii aapuw engkhe aeong; emmenieng ekursahege, inie nethum embethunghe.
Engkhejege hanghing hungviege, Publius amapachuw arhii thengge nungsang thie ichehching phage aehejaar. Paul ing valhuwge hinthampige, akih baangpige amintthaape.
Engkhejege hevehie asuwhtaanaching ama paamttiina aeong aenaheching thenghege amintthaapipehe.
Emmeniejeng enjasuwpaaing elupah ouwngtupihehie kinnuw ing Zahaajte kinghangkarche, kinnuw ing kanasawang kinte pih bekheje impisaahe.
Thah eenthum inhuwte pharbie kintonghah apaamtena emphier ing aberhing unenhe romhing enjie, Alexandriatena Zahaj engkhena kinghintoung.
Engkhejege Syrakusna Zahajchuw menier uwngge inie nethum icheengung.
Ateche amachuw himbethin uwngge Rhegiumte vatungsung; nekhe aanhuwna. Chiititena thie hangrhaangge amenhiena iniena Puteolite thengsung.
Ama amhinnaching unepasa thachahechuw eenteuuwngge emmenietho inie nesarie echeengpiruw tehege; hanghin kinnuw ing Rom vatungsung.
Amana aeong une thachaheching kingkhu athieheche, Appius kihtheer engkhejege eentungna ouwngthum ate Three Taverns phana evahaa hege ethenghe, Paulchuw amhuheche Thangnhang mimpaahege hangpersehe.
Romte kimvalhuwche raarmi aapuwching athienening sepehethoh aeong arhupipe.

Inie nethum enhuwna Paul ing amana aeonghe Jehudi upahechuw eenge amingkonghe; Ama ouwngkong taanchana ennhingna arhier, “unehe, kieng keyaati engkhejege emapa emapuwhe eennununa ajiedong ichamaa tusamaajening Jerusalemna mikhumsungna aethaarhege Rommihe imminsuwrhe.
Romtena miheching isiehege kiehie kethihna ajiedong auwmmaataana bethinpining ategehe.
Changgechuw Jehudiheching arhunamaa enrhiertaana, keyaatilina kelhinsaa auwmmaa taanaching Eruwngnhingte kehinnhiinamaa rhumaage kibelipe.
Hevelinaching kieng ninnuwchuw aanteunaing, kerhierna auwmtaana kemingkong saagechuw; ajiegachienche Israel heching ahaajeh Thangpa khulina kiehie bangthiir rhuw ing empheergehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng anhingna arhier, “Kinnuw ing ajie leriidong Judiatena phamaauwng, engkhejege itthamaa ttongje thenghege entongje uwmmaa.
Changgechuw kinnuw ing ajie namindeenga ichii thiening kintenaa; ajiegachienche emmenie aruhe taalina amhin bekhena attonghe kimminghuwga.”

Emmenieng inie engkhe mindeenhege, aanienaching mi enhimpaa atungtaa eenna ethenghe. Ennhingna Mosi waajiir ttongtho tena engkhejege laarchangpahe leriitena Thangnhang lepaa khuna saarkhie pege, engkhejege Jesu khuchuw enthachanaing menimhege yiengna betthiimge kholhie ipha aminchuwpihe.
Alhehheching aminchuwhe ttongjiirchuw athachahe, changgechuw alheheching thachamaasehe.

Amana engkaarna ennajeer unrhumaahege entthesehe. Emmeniechuw engkerong entele Paul ing ennhingna ttong engkhe arhier, “Chipi Enthiingching emapa emapuwhe nhingna Thangnhang laarchangpa Isaiah nhingna aetthajeng arhierpichuwbe:
‘Nang ing heve yaatihenhingna vatong,
ninnuw ing ithieche thietenuwge,
minghuwmaa dehtenuw,
imhuwje mhuw vangninte,
nimwaakharna thengmaanie.
Ajiegachiinche heve mihe belungriirhii dorse, ,
engkhejege kehningte huung nginleheniege kiiching emmeniechuw mindam na embelungriirna aminghuw,
engnginaching eng thie engkhejege emmhiching mhuw heniege emmin hmuwna emmhi engngisiengpe engkhejege ingeenaje aminsihpehe,’ ”
“Chonaching Thangnhang ing isiichertena aminlenpi ningsiehie lintaang yaatihenhingte ajipiga ate ninnuw ing iminghuwpisaruw; Emmeniejeng thievatehe.”
Engkhejege ataaing avesah eenna kum ennhie ongge anhingna itheng bekhechuw rukuwm atuhe.
Atahchuw achuwdong ing rukuluing, thona itthapaaing Thangnhang lepaa khu minjaamge, engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista khuchuw minchuwhege paarse.
Jesu Khrista amine Thangnhang ttongjiirpa engkheing engngiturbesa Paul kieing,
aettha ttongjiirhie asapalina enthiing ttongjiirna laarchangpahe nhingna ayen pewanggete ate attongnierchuwga.
Heve asapahie humlinache Davidtena tutibaasienna aberhingga;
Chipi Enthiingtena chinbe amaing ithietena ihangrhing apaarna pirthangtho enrhieing Thangnhang sapaga ate amindangpe; amachuw Thangpa Jesu Khristaga;
Ama apaarna iniejeng aromhingna yaatibekhe kaarna attongrhier aminjiena lungsii iphasaape engkhejege ttongjiirpa nongchuw iphape.
Ama kaarnaching Jesu Khristata aansuwna ninnuwje ingeenpe.
Romna aeong Thangnhang ningsiena enthiinghe aansuwna aaturbesa mibekhena;
Emapa Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii engkhejege selungsungna dejiim uwmsaruw.
Mensariimna, kieng Thangnhang chuw Jesu Khrista apaarna kimimpasaaga, ajiegachienche ninthachahie simriipaam amhinbekhena enjaamse.
Ajiegachiinche apha bekhena kehinthamsaa ninnuwrotumna kinthiesaase ate Thangnhang sapa aettha ttongjiir lina belungrier elhuwpah anong ketusaahie Thangnhang ing kesaarkhiiga.
Thangnhang ing ameendin geniebe, ketucheh engkhelina ninnhingte athengchenaing kenhiisaaga.
Ajiegachiinche ninnuwchuw ninthacha anhehnaing chipitena keethur ninnuwchuw kepichena mhuwsaningchuw ketena.
Changmaanieche inie engkhele engkhe aethachaching ninrotumje, kerotumje aekaarna embetthohpee ouwngsuwresie.

Keuw kenehe, iminghuwpisaruw, amachuwbe ninnhingte thengsaning ketega changgechuw atelehinbe vachehmaaning amaching yaati lintaanghenhingtena aanra kepha khangkhin ningkaarna aphanaing kemindeensaana.
Kiihie Greekhenhingteje yaati lintaanghe nhingnaje, evierhenhingnaje, enhuwrhenhingnaje ler aaturpachuwging.
Chovelinaching kieng kechebekheing Romna aeong ninnhingnaje aettha ttongjiirhie aminjaam naing kemindeensaaga.
Ajiegachiinche aettha ttongjiirlina kening enjaamaa; ajienachiinche amahie athacha mi bekheching aminlenpi aphana Thangnhang pirthangga; mensarimna Jehudihe nhingnaga, engkhejege Greekhenhingnajega.
Ajienachiinche amachuw athachalina engkhejege athacha apaarna Thangnhangtena dhormo icherchuw amimphuwngga; hevehie abejiibesaga, “dhormo icher miching athachalina rhingvate.”
Ajiegachiinche dhormo icher aeuwmmaahe, enthiing lham akam mihetaalina Thangnhang belung isiichuw Thangventena ajimindangga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangchuw aminghuwnaing atupigehe ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing ennhingnaching aminthiepigehe.
Simriipaam ahintupele betthiimge emhuw ichemaa, atubesa pihbekhelina enthiingkiir emhuwga; engkhejege emmeniehechuw ikuhpina uwmmaa.

Ajiegachiinche emmenieng Thangnhangchuw minghuwhejenie Thangnhangga teheniege mimpaamaahe, aatupeeheje minghuwmaahe, changgechuw emmindeenna ihungsuw bekhe ngarhete ithengga amana immindeen aenhuwrching minthimsehe.
Entaaing iviersagung tesahege atuheching enhuwrchuw eensuhsehe;
engkhejege aemaang nemaavang ichii Thangnhang athang alaarchuw maangvang ichii tepangtena, vatihe, akhi millie ipaar sahhe engkhejege avin ing ilinhethoh enghaa chuw abesuwhpehe.
Chotaanaching ennajirna inghumhechuw enjaphuw auwmnamaaing Thangnhang ing emmeniechuw ingeedielinaching enthiingchuw aansuw namaaing aminlhenpehe.

Ajiegachiinche emmenieng Thangnhangtena atataachuw amamaate himbesuwhege, emmeniechuw asempee aapuw aachang kih ing atu peehechuw arumpehe, anongje atuhe; Thangnhang aapuwchuwbe ittiim inemaaing mimpaavang ategehe. Amen.
Heve linahing Thangnhang ing emmeniechuw eensi ingeediete abethinpehe, Ennepenuwheje anunu entu chuw ennunu aansuw namaate minjiehege amintepehe.

Engkhejege apesarheje nepenuwthoh anunu ouwngtu minchinhege emmenieing ingeedie lintaang lintaangte mhi aekaangngenge, pesarnajeer ichuwmaa entupehe, engkhejege emmenieng alaar entutahlina phawang ichii aanraahechuw enta entaaing aphagehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng imminghuwlina Thangnhangchuw amhin ipi arhumaa khangchie, aechaamaa nong entunaing Thangnhang ing arhuna maa belungrierte apimpehe.
Dhormo ichermaa, aetthamaa, kaaraam, kallaa, hevebekhehing siikanghege enner, mitheh, enna ouwngku, amamaa aettong, maremaraa etu, thethie ttong ing ittong,
Mikhu itthamaapang atong, Thangnhang aeenthiemaa, ningjaa aminghuwmaa, elhuwngttittuh, enthachaseh belung areen, itthamaa nong abisuw, amapa amanuw ttong aminjiemaa,
awaakhar eauwmmaa, ttongneer abekhii, anunu ningsie adeenmaa, lungsii aeuwmmaa;
heve mihehing Thangnhang waajiirlina hangchie atuhechuw ithie mati aechaga ente minghuwhejenie amachuwpang tumaahege, changchiechuw aatuhethoh ouwngrhusehe.

Ajienachiinche, mitaalina waajiir etubekhe, nangchuw ikuhpina uwmmaa; ajiegachienche nang ing mitaalina waajiir natuching nataachuw naminlaarsaagethaa, ajienachienche waajiir etu nang ing amararaa chin anunung nataa eentusaagechie.
Nang ing narhier, “hangchie anunu ing atuhelina Thangnhang waajiirchuwbe echum inhuw ajiiga ate eminghuwse.”
Hangchie nang ing anunu atuhechuw waajiir natu, amararaa aatuhe ninnuwching Thangnhang waajiir etulina rhingwanggete ichii nemmindeenga?
Changmaanieche Thangnhang ing aettha atuching nabelungriir amintena teching enrhiega ichii minghuwluing Thangnhang aetthaching, enghaajeh, engkhaangpee acheh hangjehmehhie thou nasaamaaga?
Changgechuw nabelungriir enche, namintehnummaa ama enhuw ejiing Thangnhang belung isii engkhejege echum waajiir amimphuwng iniena belung isiichuw narotumna naminghuwngsaaga.
Ajiegachiinche amaing mibekhena ataa ataa ing atu enhuw ijieing.
Ittha etulina aekhaang, athang alaar, enjaphuw, engkhejege imaang aenemaa aajonghe nhingna ittiim inemaa irhingchuw pewatehe;
Changgechuw arinnepang ajong, atataalham aminjiemaa, dhormo echummaachuw aminjiehe nhingna, amachuwbe, mensaing Jehudihenhingna engkhejege Greekhenhingna,
aetthamaa etu mibekhetalina izachaam engkhejeke, ija-inang shuwvate.
Changgechuw mensang Jehudihenhingna engkhejege Greekhenhingnaje aettha nong etu mibekhena, athang alaar, enjaphuw engkhejege dejiimchuw phavate.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing mimhe aabiirmaaga.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongthohchuw emveluung isiicher aatubekhe waajiir ttongtho emveluung thesavatehe, engkhejege waajiir ttongtho sungna isiicher aatuhechuw waajiir ttongthohching waajiir tuvate.
Ajienachiinche waajiir ttongthohchuw arongeheching Thangnhang mhekungna dhormo ichermaagehe, changechuw waajiir ttongthochuw aminjiehenhingna atthaana tupeevate.
Waajiir ttongthohchuw adeenmaa lintaang yaatiheching waajiir ttongthohing mintuning atechuw tuniege, waajiir ttongthohchuw deenmaahejenie entaalina ttongthohchuw iuwmjehga;

Ajiegachiinche embelungriirna abejiibesageke waajiir ttongtho nongchuw amindanggehe, engkhejege echum alaar aminghuwna belungrierna euwmching saarkhie apiga, engkhejege emvaakharna engkhele engkhe ensanghege emmaraar empehege, changmaanieche akuhpigehe;
waajiir iniena Thangnhang ing, kieng ketong aettha ttongjiir enhuw ijieing, Jesu Khrista apaarna mibekheing oungruw nong atubekhelina waajiir tuvate.
Changgechuw nang ing Jehudi geteniege, waajiir ttongtholina endieteniebe, Thangnhang nhingna lhuwngsateniege,
engkhejege amindeenchuw minghuwteniege, waajiir ttongthotena tamsachiige, amaching aetthaseh nongga ichii mindeenteniebe;
nang ing mhichuw hechuw kerhiipichega ateje minghuwteniege, enthimna eonghe lengwaar ouwngshuwteniege,
enhuwrhechuw itthate kehinrhiega, engkhejege nepanghe aanchuwpagung tetenuwge waajiir ttongthochuw aetthajeng eviernate atataa lham mindang cheteniebe,
Changenieche, mi lintaang naminchuw nang, nataasahche minchuw maa chie? Beromaa techiege naminjaam nang ouwngruwgechie?
Nepenuwnhingna walaarmaa nate nang, nepenuwlina nawalaar uwmne? Leh rothachuw nabeter nang ing, Thangnhang eentena pih naberuga?
Waajiir ttongtholina elhuwngttittuh nang ing waajiir ttongthohchuw walaarchiege Thangnhang aajaanamaa natuga?
Ajienachiinche abejiibesaga, “Ninnuw khuna Thangnhang romhing chuw lintaang yaatihe Kaarna aetthamaa na attongnahe.”
Ajiegachiinche nangching waajiir ttongthohchuw aminjie migeteniebe vintinchuw nakanase; changgechuw nang ing waajiir ttongthohchuw awalaar migeteniebe, nang ing vintinmaa mi oungsuwsechie.
Chonaching vintinmaa miching waajiir ttongthohing arhier minjiecheniebe, ataaing vin atinmaachuw vintinteching amindangmaagekhang?

Chogenieche vintinmaa miching waajir ttongtho chuw minjiecherniebe, leriina abejiibesa waajiir ttongtho engkhejege vintinbesa gejetenie waajiir ttongthohchuw nawalaar nangching waajiir tumaateniekhang?
Ajienachiinche taangna Jehudi ouwngsuwchuw Jehudimaaga, engkhejege humnapang vintinching vintinchuw maaga.

Changgechuw sungnaching Jehudi ouwngsuwching Jehudiga, enjiilina miniluing, chipiching belungriertena vintinhechuw vintintatahgehe. Hangchii miching impaana aphahie lintaangmihetenamaaga changgechuw Thangnhangtenaga.
Chogenieche Jehudi aansuwna ajie aekana uwmne? Engkhejege vin intintaana ajiiche aatthana uwmne?
Alham euwmbekhena aekanaga. Mensarim ennhingna Thangnhang ttonghie aminsernagehe.
Ajiegachiinche engkaarna thachamaahenieche, ajie suwvate? Enthacha ivehchin Thangnhang mindeenvang ichiechuw ajiedongmaa besuwvang atega?
Amachuw ouwngsuw maadehresie, mibekheing amamaa aettonggehejenie, Thangnhangchuwbe atataa ouwngsuwresie; hang ing bejiige uwmne:
“Chontanaaching nang ing nattongle ichum chuw mindang vangnate engkhejege natalina waajiirchuw nang ing chevangnate.”

Changgechuw amamaa waajiir natuching Thangnhang atataa waajiir chuw rhunieche, enieng ajieche rhiervateruw? Belung isii ing lholhaa ethur Thangnhanghie echuwmaagena? (Kieing tepang ing asina enhuw ijieing aettongsaging.)
Amachuw ouwngsuwmaadehresie! Amachuwgenieche Thangnhang ing lolhiepaamchuw ajiekhang waajiir tuvate?
Changgechuw kieing amamaa kerhierching Thangnhang atataachuw mimphuwngningge athang alaar minlhuwngningche, kiejeche ajiekhang ate iphang isiicher aatupaging ichiin waajiir ketuga?
Engkhejege, ajietuna rhiermaawateruw (hanghing achuw engkheching amamaaing iminshinheniege,) “aechamaa tuteruw amaching eattha thengvate?” hangchie miheching alaarchuw emindang itthaga.
Chogenieche ajiekhang? Inieche aetthasehgemie! Maa, ajienachiinche Jehudiheje, Greekheje aangkheng isiicher pirthang derna imminlaarbesaga.
Hanghin abejiibesaga:
“Dhormo icher achuwdong uwmmaa,
engkhedong uwmmaa;
aminmhuw achuwdong uwmmaa,
Thangnhang aajong achuwdong uwmmaa.
Emmeniebekhe bevechersehe,
aangkheng ing aekanamaa ouwngsuwcherse;
aettha atu achuwdong uwmmaa, uwmmaa,
achuwdong uwmmaa.
Eengeerurhii emmhong thenga,
Embelieing amamaa ttongnehe.
Berur huchuw embelii derna uwmne.
Ennherje seraap ipina engkhejege ikhaaching siekangse.
Thii bebonavang atelina engkhi yaangne.
Imaang engkhejege ijana emmana uwmne,
Engkhejege dejiim uwmna lham minghuwmaahe.
Emmheena Thangnhang ittii uwmmaa.”

Ate waajiir ttongthona arhierbekhe ching nherbekhe amingkhumnaing, engkhejege lolhiepaam aangkheng Thangnhang mhekungna waajiir atunaing, waajiir ttongtho derna aeonghenhingna arhierga ichiin enieng eminghuwse.
Ajienachiinche waajiir ttongtho anong ing Thangnhang mhekungna achuwdong minchummaanie; ajiegachienche waajiir ttongtho apaarna isiicher enghimminghuwga.
Atebe waajiir ttongtho emveluung Thangnhangtena dhormo icher amindangpe, amahie waajiir ttongtho engkhejege laarchangpaheching saarkhie apigehe,
Thangnhang dhormo icher ing Jesu Khrista athacha apaarna athacha mibekhenaga. Ajiegachiinche ajiidong aantthiirna uwmmaa;
Ajiegachiinche mibekhe isiicher atupe, engkhejege Thangnhang thanglaarchuw waphamaase.
Khrista Jesunhingna aeuwm aatinpi apaarna Thangnhang lungsii kithurching aminchumpeepe.
Thangnhang ing amachuw jihpege ama athieching isiicher etubekhechuw aathachaching akuhpipe.
Hanghing Thangnhang ing jituge dhormo icher chuw jimindangge Jesuchuw athacha mibekhechuw aminchumpe.
Chogenieche ibelungriir lhuwngna akhuna uwmne? Amachuw emvemaa. Ajiekhangchie wajiir ttongthoga? Ajii nong etutaanaga? Amamaaga, changgechuw aethacha waajiir ttongthochinga.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongtho nong emveluung athachaching mihechuw aminchumga temiege imindeense.
Changmaanieche Jehudihe rotumpang Thangnhangga? Lintaang Yaatihe Thangnhangje maakhang? Uwng lintaang yaatihe rotumjega,
Thangnhanghie engkhepanggekhake Thangnhangching vintinheje, vintinmaaheje enthacha apaarna aminchumpeegehe.
Chogenieche aethacha apaarna waajiir ttongthohchuw ajiidong maa besuwteruw? Amachuw ensuwmaadehresie! Inieng ttongthohchuw imenhehga.
Chogenieche hum enhuw ijieng imapuw Abraham ing aphataana enieng ajiiche rhiervateruw?
Ajiegachiinche Abrahamchuw anongching minchumnieche amaing alhuwngna ajii aeuwmga, changgechuw Thangnhang mhekungnabe amachuwmaaga.
Aettha ttongjiir ing ajii arhierse? Engkhejege Abraham ing Thangnangchuw athachape, engkhejege anhingna dhormo icher abesuwpe.
Nong aatupaching atuminchuw lungsiilina kihthur besuwluing, atunong khangchielina aphasaaga.
Changechuw nong atumaa, athachalina endie, anongtu emveluung, engkhejege Thangnhangchuw thachaniege alaarchuw aminghuwsaamaa ama hangchie athachachuw Thangnhang ing anhingte aminchumpeega.
Anong emveluwng Thangnhang ing dhormo icherte arhuhechuw enrasie aetthaga, Davidjeng arhierbesaga.
“Emmalaarchuw akupi engkhejege eng ngisiih icherchuw aminkhum pi emminiichuw enrasiih ettaga.
Thangnhang ing isiicher atuchuw ateempima emmeniechuw enrasie aetthaga.”
Chogenieche heve rasie tthana aphahehie vintinhe rotumpangga? Vintinmaahe nhingnajegana? Ajiegachiinche enieng irhierna, “Abraham nhingna amaing athacha chuw dhormo icherte ateempeepe.”
Chogenieche amachuw ajietege arhupiga? Amachuw vintin atumaalhielenagemo, aanhuwtega? Vintinnhuwtemaaga, vintin atumaalhielenaga.
Amaing vin atinmaalhiele, anhingna athacha dhormo icher ichum, vintinna aandangnachuw aphaga. Chonaching ennhingna dhormo icherte arhupinaing, vin atinmaalhiele thachabekhe amapachuw aansuwnaga;
Engkhejege vin atin chuwpangmaaga, imapu Abrahamching vintin atumaalhiele athacha kar akhiingtaanaje khiinge isihenhingna ama vintin amapachuw aansuwnaga.
Amachuwbe, Abraham ing simriipaam aerii aakuumpa eensuwvate atechuw anhingnaje ama sitibaasiennaje ttongdeenchuw waajiir ttongtho apaarnamaaga, changgechuw athacha dhormo echer apaarnaga.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongtho aminjie miheching aerii aakumchuw ouwngsuwniebe, athachachuw ngarhe eensuwhse, engkhejege ttongdeenchuw ajiidongmaa abesuwga.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongtho chin belung isii abesuwpe, changgechuw waajiir ttongtho iuwmmaanaching khih mingsiinaje uwmmaa.

Ajienachiinche ttongneerchuw athachalinaching thengge lungsii auwmtaana attongnierchuw Abraham sitibaasien bekhena, arhupeenaing engkhejege wajiir ttongtho aphahe nhingna pangmaage Abraham ing athacha ajiihe mibekhenhingnaje arhupeega.
Hanghing abejiibesaga, “yaati inhimpahlina amapa kebesuwpechie.” Amachuw Abraham ing athacha, ithiehechuw aminrhing iuwmmaa pih ameuwm Thangnhang nhingna imapachuw ouwngsuwga.
“Khangkhing ichiing sitibaasien hechuw changjehmeh nhimvate.
Atahching kum roza engkhe tungrong ateche, ahumje ithietho enghaaga, engkhejege Sarahje nerinpha khirge, changgechuw athachabe asurna uwmmaa.
Thangnhang ttongneer lina ithachamaa uwmluing Thangnhangchuw mimpaage.
Thangnhangching attongnier abesuwnaing abelung riirna athacha hangperse.
Ajiina chiinche ama athacha auwmlinaching “dhormo icherga tege ateempe.”
Ate heve ttonghehie, “amachuw thachate ateempe” atehie ama athienen pangna maaga
changgechuw aenhingnajega; amahie ithie tena ihangrhing Jesu apaarnaga.
Inieng isiicher itutaana aminlhenga engkhejege inieje dhormo icher aansuwnaing hangrhingse.
Changtaanaching ithachalinaching echumchuw phasamiege inieje Thangpa Jesu Khrista apaarna Thangnhangtho belungrier idechuw iphape.
Thangpa apaarna eneerna lungsii sungna aethachaching ivalhuwnachuw iphape, engkhejege Thangnhang athang alaartena iphaphuwchuw phavateruw ichiin rotha minrhosateruw.
Hevehie pangmaaga, changgechuw ijaachaam sungnaje aerotha minrhosateruw, amaching aekhaangchenachuw ihungsuwga,
engkhejege ikhaang icheching aettha nong etuna, engkhejege aettha etucheching asaa elhuwng,
asaa etulinaching aning ikii uwmmaa, ajiegachienche Thangnhang injihpee Chipi Enthiing apaarna ibelungriirsungna Thangnhang ningsiechuw ajilhiepe.
Ajiegachiinche inieng eembaangmaale raraaching Khristaching Thangnhang aminghuwhe rotumna ithiega.
Atataaing dhormo icher engkhelina achuw engkhe ithiehie eluwpaaga, changgechuw aettha mi rotum ing achuw engkheing ithie ache athona aetthaje arhuse.
Changgechuw inieng isiicher etuleraaching, Khristaing aerotumna thege Thangnhang ningsiechuw amindangpe.
Ama ithi ing Thangpa thieching ate imminchumpeesage ama apaarna iniebekhechuw Thangnhang belungsietena engkarpeepe.
Amachuwbe inieng aarhumaa eensuwleching ama asapa ithie apaarna iniechuw Thangnhangtho imminteupeepe, imminteupeetaanaching amachuw ithi ing Thangpa ihangrhingching inieje engkarpeepe.
Changgechuw hevehiepangmaaga, Thangpa Jesu Khrista apaarna inieng Thangnhangte rotharoh ing ongsanemie, ajiegachienche ama apaarna inieng ate aanteunachuw iphape.
Chotaanaching mi engkhelina isiicher athengtaana ithiechuw simriipaamna engkhejaarna lhuwhse, engkhejege ithiechuw isiicher atubekhelina enjaamse.
Isiicherhie lolhiepaamna waajiir ttongtho athengmaalhiele aeheuwmbesaga, changgechuw waajiir ttongthoh auwmmaalhiele isiicherchuw ateemmaaga.
Changgechuw ithieching Adamtena Mosi iphang eruwngkhangkhing paarse; Adam ing waajiir ttongtho enghaa isiicher atuhe taalinajega; Adamhiebe hungsuwvang ate Thangpa rothaga.

Changgechuw ngarhe ajipih kithurchuwbe isiicher atuhe ka alaarthoh enghaamaaga. Ajiegachiinche mi engkheching isiicher atuching mi enhim theniebe, Thangnhang lungsii engkhejege Jesu Khrista lungsiiching apih kithurchuw mi inhimtaalina ithiseh enlhiejorga.

Engkhejege ngarhe kihthur lungsiihie mi enkheing isiicher atulina apih changchiemaaga, ajiegachienche isiicher atu engkhena waajiirching alaarchuw abebouga, changgechuw isiicher anhimtaana lungsii kihthurching dhormo icherteching aminchumpeega.

Ajiegachiinche mi engkheing isiicher atutaana ithieching aapuw eensuwge, amanaching lungsii engkhejege dhormo icher kihthur isiikang aphaheching ama mi engkhe, Jesu Khrista apaarna irhingnaing avonhie ithiseh aapuw khangkhin paarvate.
Hanghing ichiin isiicher engkheching atutaana mibekhe isiicher abebouhkhangkhing, mi engkheing dhormo icher nong atu apaarna mibekhe erhing aminchumna lhamte ahinrhiega.
Ajienachiinche mi engkheing ttong aminjiemaataana mi enhimpaa isiicher abesuwkhangkhin, engkheing ttong aminjietaana mi enhimpaa dhormo icher ahimbesuwpe.
Changgechuw isiicher etu anhimnaing waajiir ttongthoje valhuwse;

Changgechuw ithieching isiicher etu eruwngkhangkhing apaar taana, lungsiijeching Thangpa Jesu Khrista apaarna ittiim inemaa irhingna aphanaching dhormo icher apaarna eruwngkhangkhin apaarnaing isiicher inhim auwmta amhinna lungsiije ahinthipe.
Changgenieche ajie rhierteruw? Lungsiih anhimnaing inieng isiicher tujehmeniege ongvang aetega?
Chovechuw suwhmaadeh resie! Isii cherna ithiebesa inieing amana ijehmeh isih ing paarvateruw?
Khrista Jesu nhingte chii eluhbesa iniebekheing Thangpa ithienaching chii eluhga ichii hie nimminghuw maaga?
Chonaching amapa athanglaar apaarna Khristaching ithiehekaartena aehangrhingtho enghaaing, inieje irhing itharteching isi achenaing, ithiete chii eluh khangkhin inieje amathoh inrhiesemie.
Ajiegachiinche inieng Thangpa ithietho enghaa amathoh enchum meniebe, ama ihangrhingtho enghaaing inie ouwngchumvateruw;
Bechiitena isiicher maangcherniege, isiicherte isihpaaing mine aansuw namaang, itaalina beluw michuw Thangpatho enrhieing thingkherlina ithiehaagemie ichiehie eminghuwse.
Ajienachiinche achuw chuwgejenie hanghing ithie eching isiichertena ningvesang aphaga.
Changgechuw inieng Khristatho themeniebe, inieng amathoh enrhieing rhingwateruw atehie aethachaga;
Ajiegachiinche ithietena ihangrhing Khrista avonhii themaanie, ithieching ataalina avonhii aapuw ouwngshuwmaanie atechuw eminghuwga.
Thangpaing aerotumna thege ama ithieching isiicherte vokhepang ithiega, changgechuw ama ihangrhingching Thangnhang eentongte ihangrhinggemie.
Khangkhing ichiing ninnuwjeng ninthienening isiicherte ithiegechuw, changgechuw Thangnhangte Khrista Jesu nhingna ihangrhing ing tenuung mindeensaruw.
Chonaching ninnuw ing isiicher atuna aadiehenong jieluing, thevang ichii humna isiicherching aapuwkhangkhing paarmaaresie;

Engkhejege humna euwmbekhe abaaheching dhormo ichermaa nongtuna keele khangkhing isiicherte ipee minchinruw; changgechuw nintahraraachuw Thangnhangte ithiehekaartena irhinghe khangkhing, nintaalina iuwm humbekheching Thangnhangte dhormo icher nongtunaing minlhenruw.
Ajienachiinche isii cherching nintaalina anong imintumaavang atega, ajiegachienche ninnuwhie waajiir ttongtho aderna aeongmaagechuw, changgechuw lungsii derna aeonggechuw.
Chogenieche ajiiga? Inieng waajiir ttongtho aderna ongluing lungsii derna aeongtaanaching isiicher nongchuw turivang aetega? Amachuwmaaresie.

Ithie arhu isiichertena gejenie dhormo icher ahimbesuw ttong aminjiena gejenie, irhier aminjienaing nintaachin mine khangkhin nimpihdoh nhuwnabe, attongrhier nimminjie ama mineging ichii minghuwmaachuw?
Mamenna ninnuw ing isiicher mine ouwngshuwchuwge amachin aeshuwrge iuwmgechuw; changgechuw ninnuw ing nimphasahlinaching Thangnhangchuw mimpaasaruw.

Ninnuw ing humna uwmchuwge ninsurtahnaching humtena khangkhin ittongging. Ajienachiinche tumaavang ichie nong enthiingmaa engkhejege ichuwmaa mine khangkhin ninnuw ninghumbekhechuw nimpeedoh khangkhin, atebe enthiing aanshuwnaing dhormo icher mine khangkhin ninghumna aeuwmbekhechuw minlhenruw.

Ninnuw ing humlina ninsur taana kieng ninnhingna tepantenakhangkhing ettongsaging. Ajiegachiinche ithiseh tumaavang ichii ninghumte pechuwge mine ouwngshuwchuwge ebourteching elhuwngseseh ichamaa nintutena, atebe ninghumching dhormo icherteching mine eenshuwruw.
Ajiena ate inche isiicher mine ningeenshuwle dhormo icher eentongtebe ningvesang ing aeoggeechuw.
Chogenieche chalechinche ajii aanrah nimphase? ama nintulinaching ate ninning enjaamaa?
Changgechuw atebe isiichertena ningvesangchuw phachuwge, Thangnhang mine imbesuwpeepe, enthiing lham ninjiina aanrah engkhejege ittiim inemaa irhingchuw nimphape.
Ajienachiinche isiicher atu arotha minchuwbe ithiechuwga, changgechuw Thangnhang lungsii keethurchuwbe Thangpa Jesu Khrista nhingna ittiim inemaa irhingchuwga.
Keu kenehe, tepang ing arhinglebekhena waajiir ttongtho ching enchega ate nimminghuwmaaga? Waajiir ttongtho aminghuwhe nhingna ittongging.
Ajiegachiinche apuwsar euwm nepenuw chuw irhing apuwsarnhingna waajiir ttongtho ching aphierga; changgechuw apuwsarchuw theniebe amaing apuwsartena waajiir ttongthohing aphierchuw abethinpeepe.

Chogeniebe apuwsar ing arhingle lintaang pesar engkhete een vanieniebe amaing naamaa atuga. Changgechuw apuwsarchuw theniebe ama waajiir ttongtho dertena ningvesang aphape, changmaaniege lintaang pesar engkhete een vanieniebe ama naamaa atuga.

Hanghing ichiing, keu kenehe, ninnuwng lintaang engkhe, ithiehekaartena ihangrhing Thangpa nhingna auwmnaing Khrista hum apaarna waajiir ttongtho lhamte aethiegechuw, amahin Thangnhang entongte aanra auwmnaga.
Ajiegachiinche aenieng hum nongna aeongleching, ithiena alhamte aanrah aumnaing waajiir ttongthohching himbekhaage hum ing aadie hechuw ituga.
Changgechuw ate changchieching emphierbekhechuw ithiegekhage waajiir ttongtho dertena embejohpeepe; chonaching ayenna beluw ahebejii nununa uwmluing chipi ithartechin inieng ongsateruw.

Chogenieche ajii rhierteruw? Waajiir ttongthohie isiicherga? Amachuwmaadehresie. Changgechuw waajiir ttongtho apaarna maageniebe isiicher ketuchuw minghuwmaavang ketega; “kaaraammaaruw” teniege waajiir ttongthohching rhiermaanieche kieng karaam nongchuw minghuwmaavang ketega.

Changgechuw, isii cherching taancha ibeerge lintaang lintaang isiicher aadietechin waajiir ttongthoching humna kidie lhamte imvihnhuga; ajiegachienche waajiir ttongthohie uwmmaaniebe isiicher chuwbe ithiega.
Engkhejege apha engkhena kie waajiir ttongtho emveluung irhingging, changgechuw heve ttongthohie athengtaanaching isiicherchuw rhingge kie ithieging;
engkhejege rhingnavang ichii heve ttongtho raraaing kethihnate thengse.
Ajiegachiinche isiicher ing taanchachuw phage, ttongtho apaarna iminchege amalina kiechuw enthepe.
Chonaching waajiir ttongtho chuwbe enthiingga, bourmaase, engkhejege ttongtho jechuw enthiingga, ichumga engkhejege itthaga.

Chogenieche aettha amaching kenhingte ithiena ehungeensuwga? Amachuw eensuwmaaresie. Changgechuw isiicherchuwbe isii cherga ate amindangna aetthachuw minseenge kiechuw isiicherching athehnaing ituge kenhingte ithiechuw eensuwhse. Hevehie waajiir ttongtho isiicherching ithiseh isiicher ahintunaga.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongtho chuwbe chipitenaga ate eminghuwse; changgechuw kieche humtenaging, isiicherte eenjuwrpe.
Ajiegachiinche ketaa ketuchuw kieng minghuw maasing, ajiegachienche kieing tuning kete embetthohchuw ketaaing ketumaaga, changgechuw ichaama entersuwchuw ketu.
Ate kieing tuning ketemaachuw ketaaing tuningche, waajiir ttongtho chuw aetthaga, teningbe waajiir ttongthohthoching ouwngrhugung.
Chonaching ama ketuhie ateche ketaaing ketumaaga, changgechuw kesungna euwm isii cherching atuga.
Ajiegachiinche kesungna aepaar aettha uwmmaase ate ketaaing keminghuwga. Kieng aetthachuw tugete ketenaa, changgechuw tuchemaang.
Ajiegachiinche tuning kete aetthachuw ketaaing tumaang, changgechuw tuning ketemaa aetthamaachuw kieng ketujese.
Ate kieing tuning ketemaachuw ketaaing tuning che, amajechuw kiemaaging; changgechuw kesungna euwm isii cherchingga.
Chogeniebe waajiir ttongthohchuw phaningge, ketaaing aettha tuning ketelina aetthamaatho enrhienung.
Ajiegachiinche sungna aeong enhuw ijieng Thangnhang waajiir ttongthoteching kerotha rhohse;
changgechuw kehumsungna lintaang ttongthohching kewaakharna kidie ttongtho lina raar ouwngtohege waajiir ttongtho isiicher kesungna irhingching isuwrge ouwngkhumga.
Enturpah miging kiehie! Achuw ing humna ithie kiehie ikarpeewang atega?
Thangpa Jesu Khrista apaarna getha ichiing Thangnhang kemimpaaga.
Chogenieche ketaaing kemindeenchuwbe Thangnhang waajiir ttongtho mineging ketega, changgechuw hum ing isiicher waajiir ttongthoh minechuw ouwngsuwsing.
Chonaching atebe Khrista Jesunhingna irhingheching emmaraar uwmmaase.
Ajiegachiinche Khrista Jesunhingna irhing chipi tena waajiir ttongthohching isiicher ithiena waajiir ttongthotena ningvesang impeepe.
Ajienachiinche hum ing aminsur waajiir ttongtho ching atu achemaachuw Thangnhang ing asapachuw isiicher aatupa khangkhing humna isiicherlina jibithinge, humna euwm isiicherchuw aminlaarpe.
Amanaching hum ing aadie enhuw jieluing, chipi ing aadie inhuw ijii aenhingna waajiir ttongthoching arhierchuw alir asuwnaga.
Ajienachiinche hum inhuw jiihege isiheching hum ing aadiechuw amindeenga, changgechuw Chipi inhuw ajieheching Chipi ing amindeenchuw aminjiega.
Ajienachiinche hum ing amindeenchuw ithiechuwga, changgechuw Chipi ing amindeenchuwbe rhingrie engkhejege dejiim iuwmga.
Ajienachiinche amindeen nongching Thangnhangchuw arhumaaga, choveching Thangnhang waajiir ttongtho sungna aeong ache maadehga,
engkhejege humna iuwmjeh miheching Thangnhangchuw aning bethungmaahe.
Changgechuw ninnuwbe humna eongmaagechuw; Chipi Enthiingna irhinggechuw, ajiegachienche Thangnhang Chipichuw ninsungna ipaarga. Achuw engkheing Khrista Chipichuw asungna ongmaaniebe Khrista tamaaga.
Changgechuw Khristaching nasungna ongniebe isiicher natutaana nahumchuw thejenie nachipichuwbe dhormo achertaana irhingga.

Changgejenie Jesuchuw ithiehekaartena ihangrhing ama chipiching ninnhingna ongniebe, Khrista Jesuchuw ithiehekaartena ihangrhing Thangpaching ninsungna aeong achipi apaarna thehvang ichii ninghumje eminrhingpiwate.
Chogeniebe keukenehe, kesarhe, hum inhuw ijii ing rhingvang ichie humna ler iturmaaga;
Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing hum ing aadiena rhingtenuwbe thehvang nintega, changgechuw Chipi apaarna ninghum nongbekhechuw thehtenuwbe, rhingwangninte.
Ajienachiinche Thangnhang Chipiching arhii mibekhechuw Thangnhang sitigehe.
Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing avonhie enttii suwh aansuwna chipi nimphamaaga, changgechuw ahinjuh asapa aansuwna chipi nimphape; chonaching inieng, “Abba! Epa!” Temiege euwnggemie.
Enieng Thangnhang sitigemie aetehie ama Chipiching enie ichipithoh enrhiing saarkhie apiga.

Engkhejege asitihechuw eensuwmeniebe aarii kuumpaje eensuwsemie; Thangpatho enrhiing enieje athang alaar aephasanaing, amathoh enrhiing ijachaam khaanghaameniebe Thangnhang iriikuumpa Thangpatho athanglaarchuw phasahwateruw.
Kieing atelena ijachaamhehie inhingna umphuwngvang ichie athang alaar thoh iminttimtahna ivehga ichiing kemindeenga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing asem pih irhingbekheing chiihaar khangkhing ahaa Thangnhang sitihechuw aamphuwngnachuw aehaaga.
Ajienachiinche amaing asem irhingheching Kanamaavang ichii aderna eonghehie atah ataaing aadie tenamaaga, changgechuw atataa amindeenlina Thangnhang ing aderna asiihie Thangpa khunaga;
Ajiegachiinche asembekhehechuw maangvang ichie minetena Thangnhang asitihe athang alaar ningvesangteching bethinpiwate.
Ajiegachiinche asembesa pihbekheching atele phanang engkiihege nedoung auwmphana ijakhangkhing neh arin ijaphahege iuwmga ichii iminghuwse.
Engkhejege amachuwjemaaga, changgechuw Chipita mensa aanraa apha iniejeching ihinjuh sapa, amachuwbe ehumchuw ingeetinpee amalina haajemiege isungna engkiimiege ongnemie.
Ajiegachiinche atataa imindeenching engkarpeepe changgechuw atataaching mhuwmiege emindeenchuwmaaga, Ajiegachiinche amaing amhuwlina atataa amindeen asa uwmnekhang?
Changgechuw inieing inchuwmaa rotumna atataa imindeen asa tumeniege enieng ama linaching khaangmiege aehaaga.

Khangkhing ichiin Chipijeching isurlina embumga; ajiegachienche enieng ajiekhang hinnhewang ete minghuwmaamie, changgechuw Chipi atararaaing aetaaing irhier ichemaa engkiimiege iuwm aerotumna ennhiipeega.
Engkhejege aebelungriir aajong Thangnhang Chipi ing amindeen ajiega ichii aminghuwga, ajienachiinche Thangpaing Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ejiing enthiinghe rotumna anuwmpeega.
Thangnhang ing aning aminsiihenhingna, amaing amindeen enhuw ijiing aeenbesa henhingna atthaanabekhe rotum nongbekhe atuhaagehe ichii eminghuwse.
Ajiegachiinche mensang aminghuw emmeniechuw asapa tho aanghaana mensang abethongbesaga, asapaching au aneh enhim kaarna amhuwr aberhing aansuwnaga.
Engkhejege Thangnhang ing mensang abethongbesa emmeniechuw eenje aeenpe, aeenbesahechuw echumje aminchumpeepe, engkhejege aminchum henhingna amaing athang alaarje apeepe.
Chogenieche hevebekhe linahing ajiiche rhierteruw? Thangnhangchuw aerotumgeniebe achuw ing aetaalina ajii tuchevatekhang?
Asaparahchuw menerluing inie rotumna hanghin impeedohga. Asapachuw ipeniebe amathoh enrhieng peebekhechuw ipemaaniekhang.
Thangnhang ing aaturbesahechuw achuw ing lhinchewate khang? Aminchum bekhechuw Thangnhangga.
Achuwche minlaarvang aetega? Ithiechuw Khrista Jesuga, engkhejege amabekhe ithii ing ithietena ihangrhing, Thangnhang atachangna ongge aerotumna ennhiipeega.

Khrista ningsiitena iniechuw achuw ing imintthe chewatekhang? Ijachaamchinggemo, belung ijachinggemo, vinttaam chiihaarchinggemo, piendeer avehtaanachinggemo, ittiishuwching ingkhintaanagemo changmaanieche chimsiechinggemo?
Hanghin bejiige aeuwmbesaga.
“Ajienachingche nang nakhuna kinnuwhie nekhechaa enthehe,
ithehphuw Zouhekhangkhing kinnuwchuw immindeenpehe.”
Maa! hanghing tekhangjenie hevebekhelina aning imminsii Thangpa apaarna inieng raar sah ichetahlina ichehhechuw enshuwsemie.

Ajiegachiinche kieng kethachape, amachuwbe ithienagejenie, changmaanieche irhing, Thangven michierhe, lepaa aapuwheching, atele iuwm peebekhe, hungshuwvang atelina, atuche pirthanggejenie, engkaangpatena gejenie,
Ouwngthuwpaa tenagejenie, enlah ache aeuwmbekejeng Thangpa Jesu Khristanhingna iuwm Thangnhang ningsiitena aeniechuw iminttheche maadehnie.
Kieng Khristanhingna atataachuw ittongging kieing amamaa kerhiermaaga, Chipi Enthiing apaarna kieng kitusaa ichum-ilaar aminghuwna kebelungriir ing chipina saarkhie apeese;
kie kebelungriirna enhimpaa belung ijana engkhejege inchin arhumaa kenaana uwmning.
Ajiegachiinche humna teningbe keyatihe, keu kenehe rotumna ketaaraa seraap kephanaing Khristatena entthe kieng chesavang ketega.
Emmeniechuw Israelgehe, ahinjuh sitigehe, athang alaar, ttongneer bekhe, waajiir ttongtho aphahe, Thangnhang nong atuna engkhejege ttongneerbekhe entaga;
Kimmapa kimmapuw hechuw entaga, engkhejege humlina Khristaje entaga; Thangpabe iuwmbekhe taalina aeuwm, ittiim inemaa mimpaavang ichii Thangnhangga. Amen.
Thangnhang ttonghie ajiidong achehmaa aetemaaga. Ajiegachiinche Israel mibekhehie atataa Israel hechuwmaaga,
Engkhejege Abraham siti aansuw taanahe asitihechuw eenshuwcher maahe, changgechuw “Issaktena ehungsuw ching sitibaasien romhing narotumna rinvatehe.”
Chonaching humtena sitiheching Thangnhang sitimaagehe, changgechuw ttongdeentena sitiheching sitibaasien gehe ichiin teemvate.
Ajiegachiinche ttongdeenchuw hevehiega, “hangchie iniena kieng jungeenliningge Sarah ing asapa berhingvate.”
Engkhejege hevepangmaaga, Rebekka nhingnaje isuwhga; amaing imapa Issak, apuwsar nhingtena neh rinvate.

Ajiegachiinche emmeniechuw aberhingmaalhiele ajiekhangchie aettha changmaaniehe aechamaa eentumaalhiele aaturbesa enhuw ijieing Thangnhang amindeen aneernaing, amachuwbe nong etutenamaaga, Thangnhang aaturbesa ihungsinachuwga,
Rebekka nhingna arhier, “Auwpaching anepachuw sepa tuvate.
Hevehie abejiibesaga, “Jakobchuw kening keminsiipe, changgechuw Esauchuw keharpe.”
Chogenieche enieng ajieche rhierteruw? Thangnhang ing waajiir echummaa atuga? Amachuwmaaga!
Ajiegachienche Mosi nhingna arhier,
“Kieng kening keminsiichuw kening minsiivanggie,
engkhejege kieng lungsii kepichuw,
lungsii pevanggie.”
Chogeniebe amaing tepang ing amindeentena maaga, changgechuw Thangnhangtena aminthie lungsiitenaga.
Ajiegachiinche aettha ttongjiirching Pharoahnhingna arhier, “Kieng nanhingna pirthang kemindang naing, engkhejege keromhing simriipaamna aanjaamnaing, nanhingna kebesuwga.”
Chonaching amaing amindeen nhingna aning aminsiiga, engkhejege amaing aaturhenhingna belungje aminchehga.
Chogenieche, nang ing kenhingna rhierteniege, “Ajietuna amang kemaraar ajongga? Ajiegachiinche amaing amindeenchuw achuw ing deerchewate?”
