Changgechuw tepang nang ing, Thangnhang taalina ittongchie nang achuwgechie? Aatubesapeehching aatupanhingna rhierniege, “ajietuna hanghin entugechie?”
Beer asempaching inuungchuw viliege beer engnhie engkhechuw iluwpah nong rotumna engkhejege engkhechuw ileh nongrotumna asem chemakhang?
Thangnhang ing abelung isiichuw minthiining teniege, engkhejege atuche pirthang aminghuwnaing atu pihlina maangvang atechuw khaangpige;
engkhejege athang alaar asawang rotumna mensang abethongbesa lungsii abeerna, amachuwbe–
inieje imimvesage eengeenpe, hevehie, Jehudihepangmaaga changgechuw lintaang yaatihe jemaakhang?
Amaing Hosea leriinaje arhier,
“Kemi eensuwmaalhiehechuw kemiga tevanggii,
engkhejege kening keminsiimaa nepenuw chuw kening ke minsiigah tevanggii.
Engkhejege ningnuw hii kemimagechuw tege emmenii mhinna ahrier,
na emmenie chuw ihring thanghnang sitiga tevanggii.
Engkhejege Isaiah ing Israelhe khuna uwngge arhier, “Israel sitiheching rimchie siiphiena aeuwm siih khangkhing nhimjenie, abelhiehepangchuw karpivate.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing simriipaam ing engrang ing entubekhe nong waajiirhie betthowate.”
Isaiah ing enhuwte suwhvang ate amindang,
“Thangnnang ing asieng tepii minrhingmaniebe inieje Sodom engkhejege Gomorrah khangkhin iminghaavang atega.”
Chonaching inieng ajii rhierteruw? Dhormo icher lham ajongmaa yaati lintaanheching dhormo icher lhamchuw enthachaching aphapehe;
changgechuw dhormo icher lham aajong Israelhechin waajiir ttongtho lina ching alir suwchemaasehe,
ajietunaching? Emmenieng enthacha enhuw ijieng amachuw jongmaahe, changgechuw nonglina amindanghe. Emmenieing khihminsiena lhunglina engkhi aminsiepehe
hanghing abejiibesaga,
“Ebeerruw Zionna khi minsiena lhung engkhejege itiehna lhungpuw kesiihse;
engkhejege achuw engkheing anhingna thachaniebe ningjaa mimphamaaning.”
Keu kene amana kesarhe, Emmenieng ikarpi aphanaing kebelungriirna kidie engkhejege enrotumna kehinthamsaaga.
Kieing kerhierchena chuwbe emmenieing Thangnhangte embelung elhuwsagehe, changgechuw imminghuw taalinamaaga ichiin kieng saarkhie kepeega.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangtena itheng dhormo icher thosamaahege, emmenieng entaasaa atuhelina jonghege Thangnhang dhormo icherte belung pemaasehe.
Ajiegachiinche Khristabe mi bekhena dhormo icher ahungeensuwnaing waajiir ttongtho attuhnaga.
Waajiir ttongthohing arhu enhuw ijieng dhormo icher nong atuheching ama apaarna rhingvatehe tege Mosi ing abejiibesaga.
Changgechuw athachana ihungsuw dhormo icherching arhier, “nabelungriirna rhiermaa, ‘achuw ing Thangvente karvate?’ ” (Amachuwbe Khristachuw ajimbetthuwmgehe.)
Changmaanieche, “achuwche longkongte jungbovate?” (amachuwbe Khristachuw aethie hekaartena aminghringga.)
Chogenieche amaching ajii arhier?
“Ttongchuw naboumna, nanherna engkhejege nabelungriirna uwmne.”
Amachuwbe, nathachalina naminjaam ttongchuwga.
Ajiegachiinche nang ing nanherching Thangpa Jesuga teteniege engkhejege nabelungriirna thachateniege Thangnhang ing ithietena aminrhingpe teteniebe ikarpiwate.
Ajiegachiinche miching dhormo icher aphanaing abelungrierna athachaga, engkhejege isiichertena aminlennaing anher ing aphuwngga.
Aettha ttongjiir ing arhier, “Thangpachuw athacha mibekhechuw ningjaa pemaanie.”
Ajiegachinche, Jehudinemaa Greek he nemaa aantthiirna uwmmaa; mibekhena Thangpachuw engkhepangga, engkhejege Thangpachuw aeen mibekhena adeenbekhe apeechehga.
Ajiegachiinche, “Thangpa romhing aeenhechuw karpivate.”
Chogenieche emmenieng enthachamaa Thangpachuw ajiekhang eenwatehe? Engkhejege ttong aminjaam uwmmaanieche ajiekhang thievatehe?
Engkhejege ennhingna vibethinpimaamenieche ajiekhang ttong minjaamvatehe? Hanghing abejiibesaga, “Rotharhohna aettha ttongjiir ahinrinhe akhi hechuw ijehmeh itthagehe!”
Changgechuw, emmenieheching aettha ttongjiirchuw rongemaahe. Ajiegachiinche Isaiah ing arhier, “Thangpa, kinttongjiirhie achuw ing thachavatehe?”
Chonaching, ttongjiirchuw aethietaanaheching aethachachuw ithengga, engkhejege Khrista ttong apaarna enieng ithie ichega.
Changgechuw kieng rhierningge, emmenieng athiebesamaagehe? Uwng, atataa athiebesagehe; Ajienachiinche
“engngeerurchuw simriipaam bekhena vasise,
engkhejege emmenie enttongchuw simriipaam attuhnaphanang enjaamse.”
Avonhie kieng kesiehe, Israelheching aminghuwmaagehena? mensang Mosi ing arhier,
“yaati ouwngsuwmaahe talina belungrier kallaa asuwnaing tuvanggete;
Inhuwr yaatihe talina belung isii besuwhwanggete.”
Engkhejege Isaiah ing thona itthapaang arhier,
“Kie enjongmaaheching ouwngteupehe,
kenhingna ennhii maaheching kieng keminthie pehe.”
Changgechuw Israelhe nhingna amaing arhier, “kettongrhier aminjiemaa engkhejege ouwngrhumaahe yaatihe engtongte kieng inie nekhe kekih kithope.”
Kieing kerhier, Thangnhang ing amihechuw alhingehena? Ajiegachiinche kieje Israelhe mi, Abrahamtena ehungsuw Benjamin sungkhorging.
Thangnhang ing ayen aminhuwbesa amihechuw lhinmaadeh. Changmaanieche Elijah khulina aettha ttongjiir ing ajie arhierga minghuwmaachuw? Amachuwbe amaing Israelhelina Thangnhangte anhiisa,
“Thangnhang, nattong aminjaam Laarchangpahechuw emmenieng athehpehe, emmenieng hebekoung amhinbekhe abekhiipehe, engkhejege, kethienening emmapehe, engkhejege emmenieng kechipi ajongnaahe.”
Changgechuw anhingna Thangnhang abesangching ajie arhierga? “Baalnhingna ingkhiruwkhuw aphinmaahe mi chiing sarii kerotumna ketthihse.
Khangkhin ichiing ateleje lungsiilina aateur enhuw ijieng abelhie aruh uwmne.
Changgechuw hevehie lungsii apaarna isuwgenieche anonglina ihungsuwmaaga, amaamaanieche lungsiichuw avonhie lungsii ouwngsuwmaase.
Chogenieche ajiega? Israelheching ajonghechuw teuhmaasehe; changgechuw aatourbesaheching aphapehe, engkhejege abelhieheching embelungriir persehe;
hevehie enjiibesaga,
“Thangnhang ing embelungriir een chipi aminchorpe,
atenii phanang emmenii emhuw changmage ithie chemahe.”
Engkhejege David ing arhier,
“engngiriim na emmeniechuw changching morheniige uheresii,
engkhi minsiiheresii engkhejege eentaasa tantii empeheresii.
Emmhuwnamaang immhi minthimresie,
engkhejege entthuwmchuw ittiim aenemaaing ouwngkuwhesersie.”

Chonaching kieng kerhier, emmenieng entienaing khih aminsiepehena? Amachuw ouwngsuwmaaresie! Changgechuw emmenieing kallaa asuwnaing emmenieng entietaanaching lintaang yaatihe rotum isiichertena aminlenchuw isuwhga.
Engkhejege emmenie (Jehudihe) itieheching simriipaamching sawang shuwniege engkhejege emmenieng amaangtahnahe lintaang yaatiheching sawang isuwgeheniebe emmeniechuw immimvehtahna ijehmeh hinthivate!
Ate kieng lintaang yaati ninnhingna kerhierga, ajienachiinche kieing lintaang yaatihe ttongjiirpa keensuw taana, kieing ketusaa kenonglina empaasaging;
Chesaningbe, ajiegemo alham engkhena humlina ketahechuw embelung kallaa besuwheningge alhehching ikarpichuw, irhingnachuw ipha arhunaga.
Ajiegachiinche emmeniechuw ilhintaana lolhiepaamhie minchumvang ategeniebe, emmeniechuw ivikitaanahe aethiehekaartena ihangrhing chuwmaaniege ajie suwhwate?
Engkhejege jaam buw atang apih amensachuw minthiingniebe jaambekheje enthiingga; engkhejege amhuwchuw minthiingniebe thing abaabekheje enthiingga.
Changgechuw abaa alhehechuw bethiehmeniebe, engkhejege rampa keeruwm thingbour ouwngsuwteniege engkaarna nangchuw imingkahniege ama arojungtena achiiching nang ing saruh nimphasaga;
Abaalinaching lhuwngttittumaaruw changgechuw lhuwngsateniebe arojung arin nangmaagechie, changgechuw arojungching imboumga.
Chonaching nang ing rhiervangniete, kieng kolom asemnaing abaachuw kekhiepe.
Tthaane; emmenieng enthachamaataana, emmeniechuw ikhiihcherpehe, engkhejege nangche nathachaching neernechie. Nabelungriir minlhuwngsamaa, changgechuw ittesare;
ajienachiinche Thangnhang ing anunu abaahechuw Karpimaaniebe, Thangnhangching nangje ikarmaanie.

Minghuwruw, chogenieche Thangnhangtena aettha engkhejege ensapaa chuw ibeerruw; itiehbesaahenhingte innhinpe, changgechuw Thangnhang tena aetthalina aanasiir ongteniebe, nanhingte aetthachuw phavangniete; amamaaniebe nangje itinwate.
Engkhejege Israelheching enthachamaalina ongjemaaheniebe, emmeniechuw amingkahna tupeevatehe; ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing emmeniechuw avonhii amingkhaarna itu achega.

Chonaching nang ing anunu rampa keruwm bourtena aetinniege, aettha keruwm bourma anunuthoh entejehjohching imingkahniebe, aettha keruwmbourna anunu entehjejohing imingkahnieche, anunu euwmbesa thingbaahehie entararaatena keruwm thingbourtena ijehmeh itthasehing tupeevang atega.

Chonaching keu kene, kesarhe, nintaaching elhuwngttittu evierpaaging ningkharnamaaing, heve enthuwpaa ttonghie ouwnghuwmaahie aedesamaaing, amachuwbe lintaang yaati isuwkiir alhuwmaataang alhehpang belung enche Israelhenhingna suwse;
engkhejege hanghing Israelbekheje karpivate; hevehie enjiibesaga,
Ikarpi aapuwching Ziontena thengvate,
amaing Jakobnhingtena Thangnhang amindeenmaachuw liejohwate;
“Engkhejege isiicher atuhechuw keliepijoh aphanaching,
Emmenietho enrhiing kettongnierchuw hevehiega.”
Aettha ttongjiirlina emmeniehiebe ninnuwkhuna Thangnhang aarhumaagehe; changgechuw aateurbesalinache emmeniehie imapa imapuhelina ningsienapaa migehe;
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ningsie kithurbekhe engkhejege aeenbesalina embelungriir huwngmaahe.
Ajiegachiinche ayen isibesana Thangnhang ing arhier nimminjiemaaga, changgechuw emmenieng ttong aminjiemaataana ninnuwng ningsiechuw nimphaga.
Amanaching ninnhingna amindang ningsieching emmeniejeng ate ningsienachuw aphanaing emmenieje ate ttong aminjiemaa ouwngsuwsehe.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing mibekhelina aningsii amindangnaing amaing mibekhechuw aerhier aminjiemaate akhumgehe.
Thangnhang asawangna engkhejege aminghuwchenachuw ijehmeh ouwngthuga! Ama awaajiir ijong aechemaa engkhejege alham akhihbie achuwching minghuwchevang atega!
“Ajienachiinche Thangnhang ing amindeenchuw achuw ing aminghuwse?
changmaanieche achuwche ttong entana ache achuwvate?”
“Changmaanieche achuwgingche kithur anhingte pege,
anhingtena avonhie phawang ate achuwga?”
Ajiegachiinche anhingtena, ama apaarna engkhejege arotumna pihbekhe ehungsuwcherga. Anhingna ittiim inemaa athang alaar ouwngsuwresie. Amen.

Chonaching, keu kene, kesarhe, ninnuw ing nintaa nintaa ninghumchuw irhing, enthiing engkhejege Thangnhang ningsiena enlhen pee khangkhing apina kieng Thangnhang lungsiibekhe apaarna kenhiesaagechuw; hevehie chipi rhingrier anongchuwga.

Engkhejege simriipaamlina belung penung ama enhuw ijieng uwmmaaruw, changechuw, Thangnhang ing amindeen, aettha, arhu engkhejege alir asuwnachuw ajiiga ichiin mindinnuwng ninbelungriir mintharnuwng entejohruw.
Ama alungshie iphaching itaahrahhii ittasehging mindinlu ing changgechuw Thangnhang ing empih thacha enhuw ijie ing eduurje ing kharniege ataahsachuw wajeer eenturesie.
Ajiegachiinche ihum engkhena asiesieh nong ituna aeuwmga, changgechuw ennong enghaa maagehe.
Aenieje Khristatho hum engkhepang gemie, engkhejege enieje khangkhing engkhele engkhe emboumgemie.
Engkhejege aenhingna impee lungsii inhuw ijieng asiesieh kithur phasamiege, Thangnhang ttong amimphuwngnagejenie inieng aethacha enhuw ijieng emimphuwngga;
Nong itunagejenie, ama enhuw ejieng tuteruw; aminchuwjeching minchuwresie;
Abetthohthieheching betthohpee heresie, aapijeching menerluing peresie; mi achinghejeching belung ilhuw ing chingheresie; ningsie nong atu amajeng rotha rhorhoh ing turesie.
Belungriir enthiing ing ningsie emperuw aetthamaachuw beterruw, itthachuw bechuwtherruw;
Engkhele engkhe belung inttim ningsie emperuw, engkheing engkhe athang enjasaruw.
Tarluing enuumchuw ouwngsuwruw; rotha rhoh belungrier ilhuw ing Thangpa nongchuw turuw.
Asa nintu lina rotha rhohsaruw, ijachaamchuw khaangcheruw, ninghinthamlina minchinmaaruw.
Enthiingmiheehing kanavang ichii hechuw pesaruw, ramkhie ethenghechuw itthang rukuwm tupeeruw,
Emminjahechuw bor peruw, seraap peluing bor peruw.
Rotha aerhohhethoh rotha rhohsaruw; aettaahetho ttaahaaruw.
Engkhele engkhe belung enlehnung paarruw. ehesehging teluing paarruw; elhuwngttihttuh ing eviersehging ichiin mindeenmaa.
Achuwnhingnadong aetthamaalina aetthamaaing thuwrmaa. Mibekhe mheebeerna aettha nong ituna kharpiruw.
Rhuwniebe ninchebekheching mi bekhetho edehjeh paarhaaruw.

Keningsiihe, engkhele engkhe lholhaa ouwngthuwrmaaruw, changgechuw Thangnhang belung esiete vipeemruw; Ajiegachiinche hevehie enjiibesaga, “lholhaa ethuwrhie ketaga, kieng vithuwrvanggie, tege Thangnhang ing arhier.”
Changmaaga, “nang inlhinhe miheching emvin ttamniebe aesaaphuw pesaruw; enchii haarniebe, eenphuw pesaruw, ajiegachienche hevehie nintu taana alosena rohor ittuwng nimminghuwngga.”
Aetthamaaching minchehmaaruw, changgechuw aetthaching aetthamaachuw mincheruw.
Mibekheing khuwpu chiipuhe derna ongheresie; ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing apimaaniege phamne upahehie aeuwmmaaga, engkhejege hangchie phamnehehie Thangnhang ing ajisercherga.
Chotaanaching phamnehechuw tho asamaa miching Thangnhang ajiserchuw arhumaaga, engkhejege emmeniechuw aathih mihechuw ataalina waajiir ttumvate.

Ajiegachiinche phamneheching aettha nonglina aminttiina tumaavang ategehe, changgechuw aetthamaahelina pangga. Engkhejege nang ing phamnehechuw ttieluing iuwm naadiehna? Aettha tu, engkhejege nang ing emmenie nhingtena empaana pasawangniete.

Ajiegachiinche amabe narotumna aettha nong atunaing Thangnhang anong atuga. Changgechuw nang ing aetthamaa tuteniebe ittesare; ajienachiinche aatu amaing ngarhe chimsie achimaaga; ajiegachienche ama Thangnhang nong itu aetthamaa aatuheching belung siina waajiir aatupaga.
Chonaching belung isiilina pangmaaga, aetthamaa ittha belungrier inhuw ijiing waajiir aapuhe derna ongrarahvang nintega
Ajiegachiinche hevelinahing ninnuw ing rampaar ninteemga; ajienachiinche phamneheching apha empehluing nong itu Thangnhang minegehe.
Pewang ichii ninturbekheje peruw rampaar ninturbekheje peruw, amin ipeephuwjechuw himperuw, enjaphuwhechuw aejasaruw, rukuwm tuvang ichiehechuw turuw.
Engkhele engkhe ningsie lina maaniege, achuw nhingnadong lerchii turmaaruw; ajiegachienche mi lintaang hechuw aning aminsiiching waajiir ttongthohchuw alir asuwga.

Ama ttongthohechuwbe, “nang ing naamaa tumaa; mi thehmaa, ram vaberomaa; mee ing adeen vamenermaa;” engkhejege heve ttongthohehie heve engkhenahin aminteucherga, amachuwbe “Veemchaanghechuw nata raraa khangkhin naning minsiire.”
Ningsieching veemchaanghelina aetthamaa tumaa; Ajiena ateinche, ningsiihing waajiir ttongthohchuw alir asuwga.
Hevehehie pangmaage, apha iniehie minghuwruw, amachuwbe atelehin aejaar ihangthiena aphachuwga; ajiegachienche mamenna ithacha ithi ing ate iniebekhe ingkarpeena iniechuw innhinse.
Yenchuw viese siimchuw ennheengse. Atebe inthim nongchuw mamenuwge lengwaar raarpihehing enthongteruw;
Enieng siimna isimie khangkhin simeniige echuwchaama nong, Zuw ouwngruw, kethow-keraang, enna ouwngku etu, kallah nong amabekhehie tumaaruw.
Changgechuw, Thangpa Jesu Khristachuw pien ninserkhangkhing serruw, engkhejege hum ing aadiete amhin apeena alhamteching enthongmaaruw.
Athacha isurhechuw rotha kurpiruw, changgechuw amain amindeen taalina enna ouwngkuh ensang tumaavang aetega.
Euwmbekhe isah arhuga ichiin achuw engkheing amindeenna changgechuw athacha isurheching inlhie chalhiepang asaaga.
Aasaa michin aasamaa michuw tho aesamaa tumaaresie, engkhejege asaamaa michin aasah michuw waajiir tumaaresie; ajienachiinche ama michuw Thangnhang ing arhupeega.
Lintaanghe minelina waajiir etu nang achuwgechie? Amaing aapuw mhekungna niirniege itthamaa ittha khesawate. Engkhejege amachuw hingeethohwate, ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing aminchum achega.

Achuw engkheing enie engkhechuw enie lintaangtena tthasehne tege waajiir atunaahe. Mi alhehheching iniebekhehie enghaacherga atenahe. Mi bekheing ataa ataaing amindeenchuw aetthaje minghuwsing niirsaresie.

Iniechuw angah ataaching Thangnhang rotum ing angahga; engkhejege asaa miching Thangnhanglina asaaga, ajiegachienche emmenieng Thangnhangchuw amimpaasagehe; engkhejege asaamaa miching. Thangnhanglina saluing amimpaanaga.
Achuwdong ing arotumpangna irhingmaaga, engkhejege achuwdong ing arotumpang ethiemaaga.
Enieng rhingjemenie Thangpanhingna irhinggemie; thejemenie Thangpanhingna ithiegemie. Chonaching inieng rhingjemenie thejemenie Thangpatagemie.
Ajiegachiinche Khristaching ithiehe engkhejege irhinghe aannhii rotum Thangpa aansuwnaing ithieje ithipeege, irhingje inrhingpeega.

Ajietunaching nang ing nau nanehelina changmaanieche nasarhelina waajiir natuga? Changmaanieche nangjeng ajiitunache nau nane amana nasarhechuw ningtthuwm naliega? Ajiegachiinche aeniebekheje Thangnhang waajiir mhekungna niirvang aetega.
Hevehie engjiibesaga,
“Thangnhang ing arhier, kie irhingging,
khihruwkhuw bekheing kenhingna erumvatehe,
engkhejege ttongbekheing Thangnhangchuw mimpaavatehe.”
Chogeniebe mibekheing Thangnhangte ataa ataa khu pesavang atega.
Chonaching inieng engkhele engkhelina avonhii waajiir tumaamenie; amaching lintaang unehe insina lhamna ingkhi minsiena changmaanieche atiehna atunamaaing mindeensateruw.
Isahphuw pihbekhe amimbour uwmmaa, amahie kiejeng keminghuwse, Thangpa Jesu apaarna kethachaga, changgechuw achuw engkheing ibourga ichiin kharniebe amachuw ebourga.
Theh savang ichii pihlina nau nane changmaanieche nasarhe belungrier minjatenuwbe, nang ing ningsie enhuw ejiing simaachii. Khristaing ama saruna ithie amachuw nang nathesaaching memaangmaare.
Chonaching ninnuw ing aettha nintulina itthamaaing ttongmaaheresie.
Thangnhang Eruwng lepaahiebe isaah eennaamaaga, changgechuw Chipi Enthiingna dhormo icher, belung ideh engkhejege rotharhoh chuwga.
Ajiegachiinche Khristanhingna hanghing amindeen ama anhingna Thangnhang aning ichiega, engkhejege mibekheing arhuga.
Chotanaching belung dejiim abesuwna engkhejege engkhele engkhe atthaana, nong atunachuw jiesateruw.
Isahphuw pihlina Thangnhang nongchuw mimbourmaaruw. Pihbekhehie atataa enthiingga, changgechuw mi khih minsienawang ichielina aasah mi rotumnabe itthamaaga.
Sah nasaataana, Zuw naeentaana nau nane nasarhechuw khih minsienawang atechuw itumaang tthane.
Nathacha euwmchuw Thangnhang mhekungna nathienen rotum ouwngsuwresie. Ataaing arhusaalina athienening waajiir entusamaa michuw arasii aetthaga.
Changgechuw abelungrierna itthaamaaga teniege saniebe alaarte aethengga, ajiegachienche amachuw athachatenamaaga; engkhejege athachatenamaah bekhe isiicher tenaga.
Athacha iperching athacha isurhechuw bowate tenung idumsaruw, engkhejege irotumpang mindeenmaamenie.
Iniebekheing veemchaanghechuw belung akinaing ittha nonglina veemchaanghechuw himmeniirteruw.
Ajiegachiinche Khristaje athenen ing atthana tumaa; changgechuw hevehie abejiibesaga, “Nangchuw ningjaa impee ningjaachuw ketaalina ttumse.”
Ittha ttongjiirtena ishuw ikhaang achena, rotha aminrho apaarna aetthaanasehna ing atataa aminghuwnaing ayen abejiihie inieng iminjienaching,
Khrista Jesu aanhuw ijiina itusungna ikhaang achenale rotharhona impee Thangnhangching belungrier aenlehna chipichuw ipesaheresie.
Amaching belungrier engkhepang; erur engkhepang ing Thangpa Jesu Khrista Thangnhangamapaje mimpaa chevangninte.
Ninnuwje engkhele engkhe rukuwm eentunung Khrista ing amapa Thangnhang athanglaar apaarna rotha ouwngkurruw.
Ajiegachiinche ninnhingna kerhierga amachuwbe imapa imapuw henhingna ttongneer apeehchuw anhehnaing, engkhejege Khrista ing vintinhe mine ouwngsuwge,
Engkhejege lintaang yaatiheching Thangnhang lungsiilina athang alaar amimpaanachinga. Hevehie abejiibesaga,
“Changtaanaching kieng lintaang yaatihekaarna mimpaasavanggie,
engkhejege naromhingchuw lhaing mimpaavanggechie,”
Engkhejege avonhii arhier,
“Rotha minrhoruw,”
Engkhejege avonhii,
“lintaang yaatibekhe,
Thangnhangchuw mimpaaruw,
engkhejege mibekhejeng amachuw mimpaaruw,”
Engkhejege avonhii Isaiah ing arhier,
“Jesse rojungchuw thengvate,
yaati lintaanghe Aapuw aanshuwnaing,
anhingnaching lintaang yaatiheching belungrier mengamsavatehe.”
Thangnhang nhingna belung ngamna ninthachaching rotha rhohna engkhejege belungna dejiimching nhimsing, chonaching Chipi Enthiing pirthangching belung ngamna nintusaachuw iminsiipiresie.
Keu kene kesarhe, ninnuw nintaaing aettha nonglina siihsechuw, iviernaje nimphape, engkhejege engkhele engkhe ouwngchuw ninchepe ichii ketaararahjeng kethachase.
Changgechuw alham engkhena thona itthaing avonhii ningeenthienaing ninnhingna kebejiihiega, amachuwbe Thangnhang ing impee lungsiiching,
Chipi Enthiing ing aminthiingbesa lintaang yaatihechuw Thangnhangte aminlhen ahungeenshuwna ing kieing khorpuw elhuwng khangkhin aettha ttongjiir anongchuw ketusaaga.
Chonaching Khrista Jesu nhingna Thangnhang anong ketuchuw belung alhuwngna kephasaaga.

Ajiegachiinche ttongle anongching, abietimna engkhejege ittiishuwpapa pirthanglina engkhejege Chipi Enthiing pirthanglina lintaang yaatiheching ttong aminjiehehie Khrista ing ketusaalinamaaniege, kieing ajii engkhedong aettongna thona etu chemaaning.
Hanghing ichiin Jerusalemna betthiimge Illirikum arovebekhena kieng Khrista aettha ttongjiir aphanacher keminjaamga;
Hanghin kieng mi lintaang engkhe eenmhinlina ahintunamaaing, Khrista romhing aminghuwmaa amhinnaching aettha ttongjiir aminjaamna kemindeensaa;
Hanghing abejiibesaga,
“Thangpa khu athiemaalhie heching mhuwsavatehe,
engkhejege aathiemaadeh heching himminghuw watehe.”
Heve isuwlinajehing thengvang ketehie arhumaaga.
Changgechuw ate heve arovenahing avonhii alhuwna amhin achamaataana kum enhimpaa ninnhingte thengning keteching,
Spainte kieing heve ramkhie kevasileching ninnuwje eenteusavateruw, engkhejege mamenna ninnuwtho amongna rotha rhoh onghaameniege wasivang ketelina eboumsavangninte tengge kemindeenga.
Changgechuw atelechinbe kieing enthiinghe, thachahe anong atunaing Jerusalemte sirong ketega,
Ajiegachiinche Makedonia engkhejege Akaiate thachaheching Jerusalemna aeong Sarahechuw aboumsaahehie amalinahing kening tungsane.

Emmenieng hevehie tuning entepaaga, engkhejege turarahvang ichii ithengga. Ajiegachiinche Jehudihe chipi nonglina borchuw yaati lintaanghe nhingna iboumheniebe yaati lintaanghe jeching pihse indeenching Jehudi hechuw boumvang ategehe Hanghing Jehudihe ler aturgehe.
Hevebekhehie betthoningge, peheningge, kie Spainte sivanggete,
engkhejege kieing ninnhingte kethengle Khristaing impee borthoh enrhiing thengsavanggete tengge kemindeensaana.
Keu kene, kesarhe kerotumnaje kehinthamsaalina ebumsanuwng Thangpa Jesu Khrista, engkhejege Chipi Enthiinglina kenhiisaagechuw.
Amaching kieing Judiana aeong thachamaahe kihtena eensiih kechena amana Jerusalemna ketusaa nonglina enthiingheching erhupisawatehe,
Chotaanaching Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijiing rotharho thengsaninge ninnuwtho nongesawateruw.
Thangnhangtena dejiim ninnhingna uwmresie. Amen.
Kenkerea ruwhchangna aeong kesar ouwngsuw deacon Phoebehie eliepisaruw tengge keminsersaa gechuw,
Chotaanaching ninnhingtena ajiekhangchie eboum ninchena uwmnieche boumsaruw, ajiegachienche atahrarahjeng kie kenonglina emboumsaaga.
Khrista Jesu nhingna nong kintuhaa Priskale Akuilachuw lhamsuw kethensaagehe,
engkhejege emmenieng kechipilina aejapahing endiirpigehe, kethienening kemimpaa chuw ouwngsuw luing yaati lintaanghe ruwhchanghejeng amimpaagehe.
Ennhingna engkongchaahe ruwhchanghejechuw lhamsuw kethensaanaahe. Khrista nhingna Asiatena mensa aanra ouwngsuw keningsii Epaenetusje lhamsuw kethensaana,
ninrotumna enuumpaa Maryje lhamsuw kethensaana.
Kesungkhortho enghaa kietho mikhumna aeonghaa Andronikusle Tunia lhamsuw kethensaana, emmeniehie ttongjiirpahe kaarna romhing isi kemana Khristanhingna eneer migehe.
Thangpanhingna keningsii Ampliatusje lhamsuw kethensaana.
Khrista nong etuhaa Urbanus engkhejege keningsii Stakisje lhamsuw kethensaana.
Khristalina arhupi Apellesje lhamsuw kethense, Aristobulus eengkuwna eongheje lhamsuw kethensaana.
Kesungkhor Herodjeng. Narcissushe eengkuw, Thangpanhingna eongheje lhamsuw kethennaahe.
Thangpa nong kintuhaa Triphaenale Triphosaheje lhamsuw kethennaahe. Thangpa tho enrhii enuwmpaa kening keminsiinuw Persia lhamsuw kethenna.
Thangpa nonglina aatourbesa Rufus, engkhejege amanuw kenhingnaje kemanuw ouwngsuwje lhamsuw kethenna.
Asinkritus, phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermas, engkhejege keu kene kesarhe emmenietho enrhiihaaheje lhamsuw kethennaahe.
Philologus, Julia, Nereus engkhejege asarnuw, engkhejege Alympas engkhejege thachabekhe eonghaaheje lhamsuw kethennaahe.
Enthiing himbeen ouwngjuthoh enrhiing engkhele enkhe lhamsuw enthenruw. Khrista ruwhchangbekheing lhamsuw enthensaanahe.

Keu kene, engkhejege kesarhe, kieng kenhiisaanachuw, ninnuw ing nimminghuwbesa ttongjiirchuw engkhena engkhete abeleh, alheh alheh abekhiihe engkhejege khih minsiena atuhechuw amasaa minghuwruw, engkhejege maheruw.

Ajiegachiinche changchie mihechuwbe Thangpa Khrista minemaagehe, changgechuw empeebour ataargehe, engkhejege emmenieng ichumchaang ennaarje aettong, amamaaing minchehege mi amimpaa nongching aeongsarierie mihe belungriir amemugehe.

Ajiegachiinche ninnuw ing ttong nimminjie bekhechuw mibekhe nhingna thangse. Chonaching kieng ninnuwlina kerotha rhosane, changgechuw ninnuw ing aetthalina evierna, engkhejege aetthamaalina tho ninsanamaaing kidiesaana,
engkhejege apha tepie uwmniege dejiim aapuw Thangnhang ing Sataanchuw ningkhiderna mimbeh chervate.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsiiching ninnuwchuw eenrhiephuwresie.
Kiethoh nong kintuhaa Timothy engkhejege kesungkhor ouwngsuw Lusius engkhejege Jason engkhejege Sosipater emmenieng lhamsuw enthennaahe.
Heve ttongjiir abejii Tertius kieng Thangpa romhingna lhamsuw kethennaachuw. Kie engkhejege ruwchangbekhe een embethungpi Gaiusing lhamsuw enthensaana.
Khupuw lerchii aapuhpa Erastus ing amana une Quartus ing lhamsuw enthensaana. Amen.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii ninnuwbekhechuw eenrhiephuwresie. (Hevehie beluw leriina mimvemaahe.)
Ate kettongjiir aettha ama enhuw ijieng eenthupaa ttong mimphuwng ingge Jesu Khrista khu keminjaam enhuw ijieng ninnuwchuw immenhehche Thangpa nhingna keminsersaagechuw.

Ouwngthupah ttonghehie abetthiimna aenemaa aphabekhena idejeh ing ahesiichuw ate amimphuwngpe, engkhejege Thangnhang Laarchangpaheching ttongjiir apaarna ettiim inemaa Thangnhang ttongtho enhuw ijieng, yaati bekhena enthachalina ttongrhier aminjienaing imminthiepe.
Engkhepang aeuwm ivier Thangnhangte Jesu Khrista apaarna, ittiim aenemaa empaana ouwngsuwresie. Amen.
Thangnhang amindeen enhuw ejiing Jesu Khrista ttongjiirpa engkhe ouwngsuwvang ichiin aeen Paulle une Sosthenes,
Korinthna eong ruwhchangtho Jesu Khrista nhingna aminthiingbesa, thachahe aeenbesahetho, aetaje ouwngshuwh Thangpa amhinbekhetena ama romhing aeenbekhehe nhingna:
Imapa Thangnhangle Thangpa Jesu Khristatena lungsii engkhejege dejiim shelung chuw ninnhingna uwmresie.
Aphabekhena Thangnhangchuw ninrotumna kemimpaasahna, ajiegachienche Thangnhang lungsiichuw Khrista apaarnaching impeepe.
Ajiegachiinche alhambekhena anhingna ihimminthiege, erhiertaanaje engkhejege aminghuwchetahlina.
Hanghing Khrista saarkhiechuw ningkaarna nhehlhalhahnechuw.
Chonaching aeta Thangpa Jesu Khrista aamphuwngna khu haameniege kithur phawang ichii ajiidong vehmaamenie.
Aeta Thangpa Jesu Khrista inienachin ibour auwmnamaang ninnuwchuw alir ephaing emenhehsawate.
Thangnhanghie aethacha arhuga, ama apaarna asapa Jesu Khrista, amachuwbe asapathoh aeong aalhanghe aansuwnaing ingeenpe.

Ate keu kenehe engkhejege kesarhe, ninnuwbekheing alham engkhepangna ouwngrhuwnung, ningkaarna ikii uwmluing belungrier engkhepang, nimmindeen engkhepangna aanchumnaing kieing Thangpa Jesu Khrista romhing sursaingge ninnhingna kerhiersaaga.
Ajiegachiinche, keu kene kesarhe, ningkaarna enna uwngku uwmne tege Khloe ingkuwhechin aminthangpehe.
Ninnhingna kieng rhierning ketehie hevehiega, “Kie Paultaging”, kie “Kephastaging”, kie “Khrista taging”, nintese.
Khristachuw ninseemga? Ninrotumna Paulchuw thingkherlina athegehe? Changmaanieche ninnuwng Paul romhingna chii ninluhgekhang?
Thangnhangchuw kemimpaa saana, amachuwbe Krispus engkhejege Gaius maaniege achuwdong ing chii luhmaauwng.
Kieing ninnuw engkhedong chii luhpimaachuwng tengge kerotha rhohsane.
Engkhejege kieng Stephanashe eengkuwpang chii keluhga, ama ethi eng kieng lintaang achuw engkhedong chii luhmaang.

Ajiegachiinche Khristaing chii aluhna encheermaaga. Changgechuw Khrista thingkher chuw ajiedongmaa aansuwnamaang, engkhejege tepang ihe isingna ttong emvelung, aettha ttongjiir chuw aminjaamna encheerga.
Ajiegachiinche Thingkher ttonghie aemaangbesahe nhingnabe aenhuwr ouwngsuwga, changgechuw akarpibesa mihenhingnabe Thangnhang pirthangga.
Ajiegachiinche hevehie abejiibesaga,
“Kieng esing evierhe memaangningge,
engkhejege riirtena aminghuwche evierhechuw ajiidongmaa besuw wanggie.”
Evierhechuwche akhutegehe? Thiimdeeheche akhutegehe? Lolhiepaamlina ttong aajethieheche akhote ongsehe? Lolhiepaamlina ising evierhehie Thangnhang ing inhuwr abesuwmaa gehekhang?

Thangnhang esing eviernalina lolhiepaamching emmenie enlosing evier apaarna Thangnhangchuw minghuwmaahege aettha ttongjiir aminjaamna enhuwr nong apaarna thachahechuw akarnaing Thangnhangching aetthaga tege amindeenpe.
Ajiegachiinche Jehudiheching bietimna jonghege, Greekheching losing eviernachuw ajonggehe.
Changgechuw aeniebe thingkherna athehbesa Khristachuw iminjaamga; Thingkherlina atheh Khristahie Jehudi henhingnabe khih minsiena engkhejege lintaang yaatihenhingna aenhuwr ouwngsuwnaga;
changgechuw aeenbesa Jehudihenhingnaje Greek henhingnaje Khristahie Thangnhang pirthang engkhejege Thangnhang esing eviernachuwga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangtena enhuwr ching minhingtena ithi eng esing evierchuwga, engkhejege Thangnhang isurching mihenhingtena ipersehga.
Ajiegachiinche keu kene kesarhe, ninnuw ingeennachuw kharsaruw, humna ising evier aenhim maagehe, mi aenhimheching ipermaagehe, elhuwng isiing enhimmaa gehe.
Changgechuw, esinghechuw ningjaa apinaing, lolhiepaamtena enhuwrchuw Thangnhang ing aatourpe; engkhejege eperhechuw ningjaa apinaing, lolhiepaamtena esurhechuw Thangnhang ing aatourga;
engkhejege michin amhuwtaana eluwpahechuw amemaangnaing lolhiepaam miheching ajuumpaahe, mee ing na asinmahechuw engkhejege ajiidongmaaga atehechuw Thangnhang ing aatourga.
Achuwdong ing Thangnhang amhekungna ouwngsuwh memohging atenamaachinga.
Changgechuw Thangnhang apaarna Khrista Jesunhingna irhingna abor chuwga, Thangpabe erotumna Thangnhangtena ivierna dhormo icher, aminthiingna engkhejege isiichertena imminlenpee hungeensuwse;
“Elhuwngttittuh iuwm amaching Thangpanhingte lhuwngresie” tege abejiibesaga.
Kieng ninnhingna kethengle, keu kene engkhejege kesarhe, Thangnhang ttong riirtenachuw ninnhingna ihepaa changmaanieche ithiseh evier ing aminjaamna ethengmaaging.
Amachuwbe Jesu Khristachuw engkhejege thingkherlina atheena chuw maaniege lintaang ajiidong atongnamaang kebelungriirna kemindeensaaga.
Engkhejege kieing ninnuwtho isurpaa, enttiing engkhejege enchiim ingge aeongsaging.
Kieng kehinrhier atheminchuw lolhiepaam ihe esingtena maaga changechuw Chipi Enthiingtena engkhejege pirthangchuw amindangnaga,
amaching ninthachachuw humna aviernamaaing, changgechuw Thangnhang pirthang lina iviernaseh ouwngshuwhvate.
Changgechuw ihang viirbesahe nhingnabe iviir ising ing ettonggung changgechuw lolhiepaamtena eviirnachuwmaaga, engkhejege maanvang ate lolhiepaamtena atele apuwhhetena eviirnachuwmaaga.
Changgechuw lolhiepaam atupehlehna riirna athurje athanglaar mamenna abethongbesha linaching ittonggung.
Heve eviernahie lolhiepaam aapuwheching aminghuwmaagehe; ajiegachienche emmenieng aheminghuw geheniebe, athang alaar iuwm Thangpachuw thingkherlina thehmaavang ategehe.
Changgechuw hanghin abejiebesaga,
“Mhi ing amhuwmaa, aanajeng athiemaa engkhejege mihe belungrierna evalhuwmaa,
Thangnhang ing Thangpachuw aning aminsiihe rotum abethong pipehe.”
Ajiegachiinche hevebekhehie aerotumna Chipi apaarna amimphuwngpe, ajienachiinche Chipiching alhambekhe, amachuwbe Thangnhangtena ouwngthuh ttongchuw ajongga.
Ajiegachiinche humna aeuwm chipichuwmaa, mi engkhe belungriertenachuw achuw ing minghuwchevate? Amakhangkhing Thangnhangtena jechuw Thangnhang Chipichuw maaniege achuwdong ing minghuwmaa.
Atebe inieng lolhiepaamtena chipichuw iphamaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang ching keethur impeehechuw aminghuw chenaing Thangnhangtena Chipichuw iphaga.
Mee tena ihe ising naching kimminchuwmaa gehe, changechuw chipiching imminchuw chuw Chipi aadeenhe nhingna kimminjaamga.

Chipi Enthiing emvemaa michinbe Thangnhang Chipi kithurchuw aalhaangmaaga, ajienachiinche, anhingnabe changchiichuw enhuwrte ethengga, chona amaing khangchiechuw minghuwchemaa, emmeniechuwbe Chipiching chaang aabiirnaga.
Changgechuw Chipitena michuwbe achuwdong ing ataalina chaang ibeermaa, changgechuw aeuwm bekhechuw chaang aabiirga.
“Ajienachiinche achuw ing Thangnhang belungrier aminghuwse? Anhingna arhierpiche achuw uwmne?” Changgechuw iniechinbe Khrista ing amindeenchuw eminmhuwse.

Chonaching keukene kesarhe ninnuwchuw Chipi Enthiingna euwmhenhingna kerhierkhangkhing kerhiermaaga changgechuw Khrista nhingna eenrhingmalhie mihe, engkhejege nedounghe nhingna kerhier khangkhing kerhierpeegechuw.
Kieng ninnuwchuw sangkhom ing kemhaargechuw, buw enche ching kemhaarmaagechuw; ajiegachienche ninnuw ing doungjehnechuw.

Ajiegachiinche ate ipha humna ongnechuw. Ajienachiinche ningkaarna ningtthuwmna enna ouwngku uwmborchuwge ate iphang humna paarmaachuw khang? Engkhejege lolhiepaam mee ing atu enhuw ejieng simaachuwkhang?
Ajiegachiinche achuw engkheing “Kie Paultaging, Kie Apollo taging” ninteching humna ipaarmaagechuwkhang?
Chogenieche Apollochuw achuwga, Paulche ajiega? Nong aatuchuwgehe, emmenie apaarna ninnuw ing ninthachaga, engkhejege Thangnhang ing ninnuw engkhe engkhelina impeebesa khangchiega.
Kieng kebetthega, Apolloching chii aathiga changgechuw Thangnhang ing ahimminlhuwngga.
Chogeniebe amhuw abetthe engkhejege chii aathipahechuw ajiidongmaagehe, changgechuw ahimminlhuwng Thangnhang chuwga.
Engkhejege amhuw abetthepale chii aathipahechuw engkhepangga, changgechuw emmenieng ataa ataaing nong atu enhuw ijieng ataa ataaing kithur phasawate.
Ajiegachiinche iniebe Thangnhang nong ituhaaga; ninnuwbe Thangnhang ing athie lhie, Thangnhang ing atu een gechuw.

Kenhingna impeebesa Thangnhang lungsii enhuw ijieng, evier een aatu engkhe khangkhing kieing eenmhin kehinthurga, engkhejege lintaang engkheching ataalina een ahintuga, changgechuw atthurbesa eenmhintaalinaching ajiekhang hintuvang ketega atechuw enriimsaresie.
Ajiegachiinche ahinthurbesa eenmhin amachuwbe Jesu Khristamaaniege achuwdong ing eenmhin lintaang ethur ache uwmmaa.
Changgechuw achuw engkheing eenmhin taalinaching sana ing, lupa ing, amin enhimpaa lhuwng ing, thingnhaing, phuwr ettong ing, savuw ing hintuniebe, mibekheing atuhechuw himphuwngwate;
Ajienachiinche aaniechuw ahimphale amachuw minthievate, amachuw mhihin mimphuwngvate, engkhejege mhiraraaching mibekhe nongchuw ajiekhangchiega ate mimphuwngvate.
Achuw engkhe miching atu anong, ama ataalina amaing ahintuchuw rhingniebe aatumin kithur phawate.
Achuw engkheing nong atuhechuw mheeching kaangcherniebe, aatupachuw maangsavate, changgechuw ataachuwbe karpivate, changgejenie mhihsungtenapang ekarchuw phasawate.
Ninnuwbe Thangnhang enthiing een gechuw engkhejege Thangnhang achipiching ninsungna eongga ichii nimminhuwmaaga?
Achuw engkheing enthiing eenchuw mimbourniebe, ama michuw Thangnhang ing memaangvate. Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang eenchuwbe enthiingga, engkhejege ninnuwbe amachuw gechuw.
Achuw engkhedong ing athienen ing enchemaaresie. Ningkaarna lolhiepaamnahing achuw engkheching evierpaaging entesaniebe, evierging atechuw aansuwnaing inhuwr ouwngsuwresie.
Ajiegachiinche lolhiepaamtena isinghie Thangnhang mhekungnabe inhuwrga. Ajiegachiinche hevehie enjiibesaga,
“Evierhe chin ihechaang tuhege aettong thaangthaang asuwrche Thangnhangga.”
Engkhejege avonhii evierheching emmindeenchuw ngarhega ate Thangnhang ing aminghuwga.”
Chonaching achuwdong ing humna upa entulina lhuwngttittu maaheresie. Ajiegachiinche iuwmbekhe nintachochorga,
Paulgejenie, Apollogejenie Kephasgejenie, changmaanieche lolhiepaamgejenie, changmaanieche irhinggejenie, ithiegejenie, atele isuw changmaanieche hungvievang echiichinggejenie amabekhe nintaga;
engkhejege ninnuwbe Khrista tagechuw; engkhejege Khristabe Thangnhangtaga.
Hanghing miheching Krista nong aatu migehe ichiin engkhejege Thangnhang ttong ouwngthu riirtenachuw aatong migehe atechuw aminghuwnaching ilieheresie.
Hevena ithi ing, pee amim pana he kaarna aethacha arhu achuw engkhechuw ajongga.
Changgechuw ninnuwchuw miheching waajiir amhinna waajiir ouwngtuchuw kenhingnabe esiingpaa nongga, kie ketaajeng waajiir ouwngtusamaa ing.
Ajiegachiinche ketaaing kelaarna kieing minghuwmaang, changgechuw amaching kiechuw imminchummaaga; changgechuw ketaalina waajiir atuchuwbe Thangnhangga.

Chonaching Thangpa ajuwngngeenli maataang engkhejege, apha aviemaalhiele ajiidong waajiir tumaaruw, amaing inthimpakaartenachuw elengte mindangvate, engkhejege belungriertenachuw minphuwngpivate; engkhejege ama aphanaching mibekheing Thangnhangte ataa ataaing amimpaanachuw phasawatehe.

Keu kene kesarhe, ninnuw ing engkhe rotumna lintaanghe tahlina ouwngrhumaatenuwge ninlhuwng namaaing enjiibesahie minthimaaruw, amachuwbe kinnuw apaarna ninnuw ing nimminjienaing ninnuw khuna kie ketaa rarahje Apollo nhingna hevehehie kemimttimgetha.
Ajiegachiinche achuw ing nangchuw imbitthigehe? Ajieche nimphamaa euwmga? Amachuw kithur nimphamaagenieche ajietuna ilhuwngttittugechuw?
Ninnuw ing ningeediechuw nimphapekha! Sawangje suwsechuwkha! Kinnuw emveluung eruwngkhangkhing paarnechuw! Kinnuwje ninnuwtho eruwngkhangkhing apaarnaing, ninnuw ing eruwng khangkhing ipaar kidiega.

Ajiegachiinche, thevang ichii arhupi mi khangkhing Thangnhang ing nhungkurrehching ttongjiirpahe romhing imminrheeng gehe, chonaching lolhiepaamle thangven michierhe engkhejege mi mhihlina kummhe embeernachuw ouwngshuwhsuwng.

Kinnuwbe Khrista rotum enhuwr ouwngshuwgung, changgechuw ninnuwbe Khrista nhingna isingchuw oungshuwgechuw, kinnuwbe esursagung, changgechuw ninnuwbe pernechuw; ninnuw ing empaanachuw nimphase, changgechuw kinnuwbe kimmhe bourna kimphaga.
Ateleje kinnuwche kimvin ittaam ing ongnung, kinchiije haarne, pien sherphuwje uwmmaa, romhorje kinsaaga engkhejege kingongnaje nemaa;
Engkhejege kintaaing tusauwngge nuwmsanung, ingeesehechuw bor kimpeega; veh immincher hechuw kinnuw ing kingkhaangga;
mee ing kinromhing enrothile aanlenaing kim meneemga; kinnuwbe ate iphang lolhiepaamna ebour pihkhangkhin mibekhenhingna ibour aethaang ouwngsuw suwng.
Kieng ningjaa nimphanaing hevehehie kebejiimaaga, changgechuw kening keminsii kesitihe khangkhing kerukugechuw.
Ajiegachiinche ninnuwchuw enrhiepi upa mee chiing suwm deenjetenuw, nimmapa enhimmaaga; ajiegachienche Khristalina aettha ttongjiir apaarna kieng keberhinggechuw.
Chonaching kieng kenhiehsaagechuw, ninnuw ing ketuhie eminjiepisaruw.

Heve linahing Thangpanhingna kening keminsii, kethachapah kisiti Timothi chuw ninnhingte kevicheerga. Amhin bekhena, ruwhchang bekhena, kieng keminchuwngenge, Khrista Jesunhingna euwm ketu kinlhiengna bekhe amaing ninnhingna ningeenthienaing etupiwate.
Changgechuw achuw engkheing atah thengmaanie techuwge huwng ttittunechuw.
Changkhangjenie Thangnhang ing irhupeeniebe apha tepie uwmniege thengvanggete; engkhejege elhuwngttittuhhe ttonglinamaa kieing entuchechuw minghuwvanggete.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang lepaachuwbe ttonglha tena maaga changgechuw pirthangga.
Kieng ninnhingna romhortho thengvang ketekhang, changmaanieche ningsienaing engkhejege belung enneem ing Chipi Enthiingna thengvanggetemo? Ajiekhang ningeediena?
Ningkaarna nepenuw pesarlina namaa nintu emvenechuw ate ttong kethiepe, hangchie naamaa etuhie thachamaahe kaarnadong isuwmaaga, amachuwbe achuw engkheing amapa lumhee linaga.
Belung nimminja gelummaage lhuwng ttittuh chuwge ongnechuw, Hangchie aatuhechuw ningkaartena thorvang nintemaakhang?
Ketaaing ningkaarna emvemaajening kechipi ing ningkaarna emveging, hangchie etu michuw kie ningkaarna emvekhangkhing waajiir ketupe.
Amachuwbe, Thangpa Jesu romhingna ninnuwtho kechipije enrhiing Thangpa Jesu pirthang jechuw emvega,
hangchie michuw Thangpa iniena achipi ikar arhunaing humchuw amemaangnaing sataannhingte pedohruw.
Elhuwng ttittuhchuwhie aettha asuwhnamaaga. Chor attiiti ing ataabekhe ihangpurga ate nimminghuwmaaga?
Ninnuw ing chor emvemaa khangkhing, aethar atum aansuwnaing belu chorchuw lhindohruw. Ajiegachiinche isiichertena imminlenpee Zou siti Khristachuw athehpehe.
Changtaanaching amalina enieng belu chorthoh kallatena ihangsuw aetthamaa chorthoh aeriimbuwchuw saluing, chor emvemaa enthiing engkhejege atataa buwchuw sateruw.
Kieng naamaa aatuhethoh onghaamaaruw tengge kevibejiilina,

Lolhiepaamtena hangchie naamaa etuhetho, changmaanieche kaaraamhe, ouwngruwhe, changmaanieche leh rotha arum hetho emvenenoh ing paarmaaruw ketemaaga; changmaanieche ninnuw ing lolhiepaamtena engkedoh rong nintega.

Atebe achuw engkheing unegemie teheniege, thacha nong etu, romhing reenge naamaa etu, karaam, leh rotha arum, ttong ikha, Zuw ouwngruw changmaanieche ouwngruw tuhenieche, khangchie mithoh emvenenoh maaruw ichiepang ketemaaga, ishaje shahaamaaruw teingge ninnhingna kebejiibesaga.
Ajienachiinche taangna aeonghechuw waajiir ketuna kithu ajii uwmkhang? Ninnuw ing asungna aeonghechuw waajiir nintu maakhang?
Changgechuw taangna aeonghechuw Thangnhang ing waajiir atuga. Ninnuw ningkaarna itthamaa michuw thorruw.
Ningkaarna achuw engkheing une engkhe taalina ttong suwnechuw, thachahe nhingna valuing dhormo ichermaahe mhekungna waajiir atunaing ninthona aetthachaang nintuga?
Engkhejege enthiing miheching lolhiepaamhie waajir tuvang atega atehie nimming huwmaaga? Engkhejege lolhiepaamhie ninnuw ing waajiir tutenuwbe isiingpah wajiir isuwchuw ninnuw ing nintuchemaaga?
Enieng thangven michierheje waajiir tuvang aetega ateje minghuwmaachuw. Amachuwgeniebe irhinglehing etumaa arhumaa itthamaa nong hangjehmeh euwmdohga!
Chogenieche hangchie isiingpahlina enna engkuh nintugeniebe ruwhchang mhekungna ajiedongmaa mihenhingna ajietunache nimvipeega?
Ninning aanjaanaing kerhierga! Uneh ningkaarna waajiir abetthuwche evierlhah achuwdong euwmmaaga?
Amaching une engkheing engkhe taalina ttong abesuw, amajechuw thachamaahe nhingte ewagehe?

Ateche ningkaarna engkhele engkhe waajiir amhinna inlhinchuwhie ninnuwhie esurrarahgechuw endangne. Amachangbe ninnuw ing alaarchuw ajietuna nindierpimaaga? Amachingbe ninnuw ing emmeniechuw ajietuna ninrhumaaga?
Changgechuw nintaa raraaing laarsachuwge, ningnguw ninneh thachahe nhingna nimbebuwhga.
Dhormo ichermaaheching Thangnhang lepaa phamaanie atehie nimminghuw maaga? Nintaaching emmusamaaruw; Naamaa etu, leh rotha erum, lumheepuwsar enlaarhe, pesarnajeer nepenuw najir ouwngteuhe,
ouwngruw, kaaraam, Zuw ouwngruw, ttong ikha, ram aberuwemmeniehing Thangnhang lepaachuw phamaahenie.
Ningkaarna achuw engkheing hanghing nintuse. Changgechuw Thangpa Jesu Khrista romhinna aeta Thangnhang chipi romhinglina ninnuwchuwbe eetthiege imminlhiempeepe engkhejege imminchumpeepe.
“Kenhingnabe arhucherse,” Changgechuw amabekheching aekana cher maaga. “Kenhingnabe arhucherga” changgechuw kiebe ajii jiibekhe naje mine enshuw maaning.

Isahphuw peeching pibourtaga, engkhejege pibourching isaaphuw taga; changgechuw Thangnhang ing engkheje engkheje memaangvate. Changgechuw ihumhie naamaa ituna rotumnamaaga, Thangnhang rotumga engkhejege Thangnhang ing hum rotumga;
engkhejege Thangnhang ing Thangpachuw ithietena aminrhingga engkhejege aenieje ama aruwngper apaarna rhingwateruw.
Ninnuw ninghumchuw Khristata abaagehe ichii nimminghuwmaaga? Chogeniebe hum abaachuw kieing liejohningge ichuwmaa abaa besuw wang ketekhang? Chovechuw ouwngsuw maaresie.
Engkhejege ichuwmaa nepenuwte aewakah chonaching amathoh hum engkhe ouwngsuwga ichii minghuw maachuw? Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing arhier, aannhieching hum engkhe ouwngsuwgehe.
Changgechuw Thangpanhingte aekah chonaching Thangpatho chipi engkhe panggehe.
Naamaa itunamaa tenruw, mee ing atubekhe isiicherhie hum tena ethengga; changgechuw naamaa itu ama miching ataararah ahumtalina isiicher atuga.
Chonaching nintaa nintaa hum hehie Thangnhangtena nimpha, ninsungna eong Chipi Enthiing eenga ate minghuwmaachuw? Engkhejege ninnuw ate ninrinneta ouwngsuw maasechuw;
Ajiegachiinche ninnuwchuw amin ing ingngeeliepe. Chonaching nintaa nintaa hum sungna Thangnhangchuw athang alaar mimpaanaruw.
Ate ninnuw ing nimvibejii ama ttonglina: “miheching een aeniemaaching aetthasega.
Changgechuw naamaa etu anhimtaana pesarbekheching ata ata anepenuw oumresie, nepenuwhejeng ata ata apuwsar meneheresie.
Apuwsar ing anepenuw nhingna pevang atechuw peresie, changching nepenuwjeng impuwsarhechuw peheresie.
Nepenuw ing ahumchuw atamaaga, apuwsartaga; engkhejege khangkhing ichieng apuwsarjeng ahumchuw atamaaga, anepenuwtaga.

Ninnuw ing ahinthamna apha nimbethiingchena ing apha amongna ninnuw ennhieng ning eenrhuna maaniege ninnuw engkhele engkhe engkhaammaaruw engkhejege nintaa nintaaing ninghum ninsuwr chemaa taana sataan ing imbetheemnamaang ninnuw avonhie enchumsaruw.
Changgechuw kieing kerhierhie ttongtho kepeemaagechuw, arhunaing kerhierpeegechuw.

Changgechuw mibekhe kietho enghaajeng aeong kidiega. Changgechuw mibekheing atah atah kithur, engkheing engkhepang apha enhuw ijieng, engkhejege lintaang engkheing atu aanlhiinglina Thangnhangtena aphaga.
Een iniemaalhiehe engkhejege mhihkhuwnuw henhingna kerhierga, emmenieng kietho enghaaing een iniemaaching tthane.
Changgechuw entaaching khaamchemaaheniebe een nieheresie; ajiegachiinche belung aekaang ing ongchangchingbe een inieching tthasehne.
Changgechuw een iniehe nhingna ttongtho kepeegechuw, kiemaaging, changgechuw Thangnhangtenaga, amachuwbe nepenuw ing apuwsar mamaaresie.
Changgechuw entthehphuwniebe een niemaaresie, changmaanieche apuwsarnhingte inliresie; engkhejege apuwsarching anepenuwchuw mamaaresie.
Lintaanghenhingna kieng kerhierga, Thangpaing arhiermaaga, achuw engkhe uneheching thachamaa nepenuw beniebe engkhejege nepenuwching amathoh ipaarhah rhuniebe entthephuwmaaresie.
Nepenuw achuw engkhe apuwsarchuw thachamaa migeniebe amathoh ipaarhah rhuniebe nepenuwching entthephuw maaresie,

ajienachiinche, anepenuw apaarna thachamaa apuwsarchuw aminthiingga, amana thachamaa anepenuwje apuwsar apaarna enthiingga. Amachuw maaniege asitiheje athachamaa siti ouwngsuwgehe, changgechuw atebe enthiinggehe.
Changgechuw athachamaaching entthephuwniebe entthephuwresie, amalina thacha unechuw aphierna ajiidong uwmmaa. Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangching dejiim apeenaing ingeenpehe.
Nepenuw nang ing napuwsar aekar nachemaa nachechuw ajiekhang naminghuwga? Apuwsar nangching nanepenuw ikar nachemaa nachechuw ajiekhang naminghuw chega?
Changgechuw, Thangnhang ing mibekhelina ajihsim khangkhing engkhejege mibekhechuw aeen khangkhing amaing changching jieresie. Kieching ruwhchang bekhena changching keminsernagehe.
Achuw engkhe vintin besaing aeenga? Amaing vintinmaachuw enshuwmaaresie, Achuw engkhechuw Thangnhang aeenle vintinmaalhiega? Vintinna jongmaaresie.
Vintinching ajiidongmaaga, vintinmaaching ajiidongmaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang ttongtho aminjie ching ishuwcherga.
Mibekheching aeenlina ngeh nghe uwmjehresie.
Nang suwh ing naongle ingeenga? Amalina belung minjamaa, changgechuw nang ing ningvesang phateniebe amachuw ithiseh minjiesare.
Ajiegachiinche suwh ing aongle Thangpanhingna aeen michuw Thangpanhingna ningvesang miga, changching ichiing ningvesangching aeen michuw Khrista minega.
Ninnuwchuw amin pege ingeeliega; mihe suwh hungeenshuwmaaruw.
Keu kene kesarhe, atah atahna aeen mi bekheching Thangnhangtho enrhiing inheh ongresie.
Ate een iniemaalhiehe rotum Thangnhangtena ttongtho phamaaing, changgechuw Thangnhang ningsie aphabesa aethacha arhukhangkhing kieing kekharsaachuw kiphuwngga.
Ajiegachiinche atele ijachaamlinahing mee engkheching ange ngeh eongjeching itthaga ichiing kemindeennaa.
Nang een niesechiemo? Aantthena lham jongmaa. Nang een niemaalhie chie? Een niena jongmaare.

Changgechuw nang ing een nieteniebe nanhingna isiicher uwmmaa, engkhejege lunghaaching een nieniebe anhingna isii cher uwmmaa. Changkhangjenie hangchieheching humna jasavatehe, amahie madoh tenuwge ketenaa.
Kieing kemindeenchuwbe keu kene kesarhe, aphachuw innheengse, Atele betthiimnung anepenuw euwmheching euwmmaa ngenge ongheresie,
engkhejege belung ijaheching, ijamaa ngenge, enrotha aerhohching rotha irhohma ngenge uwmsing, naathii aalieheching aaliemaa ngenge ongheresie.
Lolhiepaam lerchii abelah miheching amana evalhuwdoh maa ngenge ongheresie. Ajienachiinche heve lolhiepaamhie ihungttiimga.
Belung ijang ningum namaaing kemindeensaaga. Een iniemaalhie pesarching ajiekhang Thangpaing amindeen tusagete ichiin, Thangpa nonglina abelung enriimne.
Changgechuw een iniebesaching anepenuwchuw ajiekhang aning tungvate tege lolhiepaam piselina enriimsane,

hanghing abelungrier chuw entthege, engkhejege een iniema nepenuw, changmaanieche lunghaaching humle chipi entongte ajiekhang minthiingvang ketega tege Thangpa nonglina abelung aminlhuwga, chonaching een iniebesa nepenuwching ajiekhang kepuwsar amindeen minthunggete tege lolhiepaam nonglina belung aminlhuwga.
Ninnuw rotumna kerhierga, nintaalina insapah kebaangmaaga, changgechuw belung enlehtenuwge Thangpa nhingte belungriir nimpinaing belungriir enttheluing ongsaruw ketesaaga.

Changgechuw achuw engkheching ouwngrhubesa lunghaachuw alham itthaing tuchemaaing teniebe, amana akum atha tangrong atenaateniege een inieching tthawate teniebe, amindeen enhuw ijiing turesie. Chovelinaching amaing isiicher tumaa. Riikhie ouwngchumheresie.
Changgechuw achuw engkheing abelungrier aetthajeng neerniege, itumaa arhumaaing tuluing lunghaathohching een niemaaning teniege abelungrier ineer acheching echumchuw amindeenga.
Chonachinbe asanuw lunghaachuw riekhie aanchumna apih miching aettha atuga; chona asitichuw riekhie aanchumna apimaaching ithiseh aetthachuw tuvate.
Apuwsarchuw arhinglechingbe anepenuwchuw apuwsarlina aphierga, apuwsarching theniebe amaing aadie engkhete een aniena arhupeepe; changgechuw Thangnhang nhingna rhingvang atega.
Changgechuw kie kewaajiirnabe een nieluung aeongjeh chin ithiseh bor phasawate. Engkhejege heve kebelungriirna ishuwhie Thangnhang chipiching imboumga ichiin kemindeense.
Ateche leh rothate ipih peeseh linaga; iniebekheing eminghuw achenachuw euwmga ichii eminghuwse. Aminghuwcheching elhuwngttittuw abesuwga, changgechuw ningsieching ahimminlhuwngga.
Achuw engkheing keminghuwpaaga teniebe, amaing rhiervang atechuw aminghuw maalhiega.
Changgechuw, achuw ingkheching Thangnhangchuw aning minsiiniebe, amamichuw Thangnhang ing aminghuwpeega.
Chonaching leh rothate apih pihchuw isah eenna chuwbe inieng iminghuwga, leh rotha hiebe lolhiepaamna ajiedongmaaga, chonaching Thangnhang engkhepangchuw maaniege lintaang uwmmaa ichii eminghuwga.
Ajienachiinche Thangvenna changmaanieche lolhiepaamna lehga aetehie uwmkhangjenie hangchie leh nhimpaane, aapuwje nhimne

changkhangjenie enienhingnabe Thangnhang engkhe, emapachuw uwmne, anhingtena pihbekhe ehungthengga engkhejege ama arotumga; engkhejege Thangpa engkhe Jesu Khristachuw uwmne, ama apaarna pibekheje ihungshuwga, inieje euwmgemie.

Changgechuw aminghuw chenachuw mibekhenhingna uwmmaa. Changgechuw achuw engkhe nhingnabe atele iphang leh rotha irum waakhar auwmtana leh rothate apihpihsehchuw asaanaahe; engkhejege emmenieng atataa atataamaa aminghuwna belungrier asurtaana minthiingmaasehe.
Chogejenie aesaaphuw pihching iniechuw Thangnhangte aanheengna pechemaa. Inieng aesaamaataana itthamaaseh uwmmaa, sajemenie itthasehmaaga.
Changgechuw nintunumpang nintuching isurhe rotum khih minsiena aansuwnamaang enriimsaruw.

Ajiegachiinche naminghuwche nang ing leh rotha rumna eensungnaching buwchuw asaana eong nangchuw achuw engkheching emhuwniebe, isur michuw echumalaar aminghuwna belungrierchuw leh rothate apih pihchuw asaanaing nabetthohmaagekhang?
Ajiegachiinche aminghuwche ching Khristaing arotumna ithie, isurpa nau nanechuw namemaangga.
Engkhejege hanghing nau nanehe nhingna isiicher tuchiege engkhejege ensurna taalina echum alaar aminghuwna belungrierchuw besuwchiege ninnuw ing Khrista taalina isiicher nintuga.
Chovelinaching isaana pihchin keu kenehechuw khih minsiena besuwteniebe, keu kenehechuw ingkhi aminsienamaaing, kieing avonhie sah samaadehning.
Kieche ningvesang kephamaakhang? Kie ttongjiirpa engkhe maaging khang? Kieng Jesu Thangpachuw kemhuwbesamaa khang? Thangpalina ninnuwhie nong kitulina aanra maage chuwkhang?
Mi lintaangte ttongjiirpa engkhe eensuwhmaajening ninnhingnabe ttongjiirpaging. Ajienachiinche Thangpa nhingna ttongjiirpa engkhe keensuwna chumchuw ninnuwgechuw.
Kiechuw chaang ingeebeerhe nhingna besangwang ketechuw hevehiege.
Isah eennalina keethu euwmmaaga?
Lintaang ttongjiirpahe, Thangpa unehe amana Kephas khangkhing kinnuw ing athacha nepenuw engkhe aanrhiiphuwna keethu euwmaaga?
Changmaanieche Barnabasthoh kieche kimvin avana nong kintuchuw aminchinna aetthamaaga?
Achuw engkheing arinneching raarmi nong atu emvega? Darkhaber thieniege ama aanra asaamaa achuw uwmne? Engkhejege Zou aru deenniege emmenie anithin asaamaa achuw uwmne?
Kieng humlina hevebekhehie kerhierga? Engkhejege waajiir ttongthojeching hevebekhehie arhiermaakhang?
Ajiegachiinche Mosi waajiir ttongthona abejiibesaga, “Saang aachiir shier charchuw anher phiermaaruw.” Thangnhang ing shiercharhe rotumna amindeenga?

Changmaanieche hevehie irotumna arhiermaagekhang? Amararahga, amahie irotumna abejiiga, Ajiegachiinche lhie athiepale saang aachiirpaheching phawang inte uwmne atechuw mindeenniege anongchuw atuhaagehe.
Ningkaarna chipi amhuw kebetthegenieche, kinnuw ing ninnuw nintu humlinaching aanra kumtenuwche, ama kimphachuw kintulamthi tahnaga?
Mi lintaangheching ninnhingtena iphachuw rhupeetenuwche, ama ithi ing kinnhingnache rhumaa vang nintegekhang?
Enthiing pihlina anong etuheching Thangnhang een pihchuw asaaga ate, engkhejege hebekoungna anong atuheching hebekoungna euwm pihchuw aphaga atehie minghuwmaachuw?
Amakhangkhing aettha ttongjiir aminjaamheching ttongjiir aminjaamlina rhingvang atega echiehie Thagnhang ing ajiserga.

Changgechuw kieing hangchie aphanaing ajiidong tumaaing. Changmaanieche khangchie alhamchuw aphana tuning tengge hevehie kebejiimaaga. Amachuwbe achuw engkheing kieng ketu kebelung ngamnachuw ngarhe ouwngshuwvang atechangbe ithieching aetthaga.
Changgechuw kieng aettha ttongjiir itongmaa arhumaaga. Kieng ttongjiirchuw minjaam maavang ketegeniebe kenhingna ijanachuw phawanggie!
Ajiegachiinche kieng kidieching hevehie tuningbe ketumin uwmne, changgechuw kieng kidieching ketumaageniebe kenhingna injipee anong imminserna pangchuw ketusaaga.
Kieing ketusaa amin keethur chuw ajiiga? Chonache aettha ttongjiir keminjaamle ketumin uwmluing minjaam ningge chotahnaching kieing phawang ketechuw ngemaavang ketega.
Ajienachiinche hevebekhelinahing ningvesangpa engkhe gejening, enhimseh kekana rotumna, kie ketaahie suwh ngenge kebesuwsaaga.

Jehudihechuw aekana aphanaing, kieng Jehudihe nhingna Jehudi engkhe hungeensuwsing; waajiir ttongtho derna aeongheching kanavang atelina ketaaching waajiir ttongtho derna ongmaajening, waajiir ttongtho derna aeonghenhingna kieje hungeen suwhsing.

Waajiir ttongtholina taangte aeonghechuw kanavang ichielina kieje waajiir ttongtholina taangna eong ouwngsuwsing, Kieing Thangnhang ttongtho tena ningvesang phamaajening, kie Thangpa Khrista ttongtho derna eongging. Chotaanaching taangna aeonghechuw kichewang ketega.
Esurhenhingna kie esurchuw ouwngsuwging, amaching esurhechuw kichewang ketega. Kieng ketucheching mi tepiechuw irhingna amimphanaing, mibekhenhingna kie hungeensuw chersing.
Hevebekhehie aettha ttongjiirlina kituga, amaching ama borchuw kiehje phawang ketega.
Eten entaarnahe kaarna engkhepang ing mana aphaga ate minghuw maachuw? Ninnuwje amachuw nimphanaing khangkhing tenruw.

Engkhejege entaarnahe kaarna achehnaing eten mibekheching alham bekhena ataachuw asuwrchena atuga. Changgechuw emmenieche maangvang ate luhu aphana atugehe, inieche aemaang inemaachuw aphanaching aetuga.
Chotaanaching kieng atataa asha iuwmmaa khangchie ouwngsuwhluing etensaging; thiechuw akee ing asuh khangkhing keenteuhphuwmaaga;
changgechuw ketaahie tantie empesah ingge suwhkhangkhing kesiihga, amaching aettha ttongjiirchuw lintaanghe nhingte keminjaamnhuwna epaangmaa keensuwnamaaga.
Keu kene Kesarhe, ninnuw ing heve nimminghuwmaahie idesamaang, amachuwbe imapa imapuw heching rodu derna sihege rimchie aalenhe,
engkhejege emmenieng rodu sungna engkhejege rimchie sungna Mosi ing chii aluhe,
engkhejege emmeniebekheching Thangnhang ing apih isahphuwje sahege,
engkhejege emmeniebekheing Thangnhang ing apih enghaajeh lhungpuwtena isuw chiije aeenhe; ajiegachienche ingeenhuw ajii Chipitena isuw lhungpuwsungtena eenhaahege ama lhungpuwchuw Khrista chuwga.
Changgejenie Thangnhang ing aanheem chuw aning tungmaa, chotaanaching rampakaarna amemaangpehe.
Ate hevehehing bietimnachuw ouwngshuwge emmenieing ichamaa atuhechuw inieng minjiening ichiin uwmmaaruw.
Ninnuw ing ate leh rotha irum atukhangkhing tumaaruw; hevehie abejiibesaga, “Miheching isaa eenwang ichiin onghege, engkhejege belaavang ichiin ehangthiehe.”
Engkaarna achuw engkheing naamaa tuhege, mi chiing sumnhielhie eenthum aenie engkhena ithiehe khangkhing, inieng tumaamenie.
Achuw engkheng Thangnhangchuw chaang ibeerhege emmeniechuw berur ing atheh khangkhing, Thangnhangchuw chaang ibeermaa menie.
Engkaarna achuw engkheng ttongchor chorhege aemaanghe khangkhing ninnuwjeng ttongchor chormaaruw.
Hevebekhehie aandangnaing ennhingna suwhse, changgechuw hevehehing inienhingna enrhierpeenaing abejiiga. Ajienachiinche attuhna aphachuw hungthengse.
Chonaching achuw engkheing inhehpah ing ineerging teniebe tiehvang ketega tesing enriimsaresie.

Minhingna isuwh aekhaang chemaawang ichii abetheemching ninnhingna thengmaalhie. Thangnnhanghie aethacha arhuga, ninnuw ing ninche ama ithie ing ninnuwchuw imbetheemnamah ing rhumaanie; changgechuw aekhaang ninchena ama chaang ingeebeerchuw aalenna lham iminthiewate.
Chonaching, kilhanghe, leh rotha rumvang ichiitena tendohruw.
Kieing isinghenhingna ittong khangkhing ittongging; kieing kerhierhie; ninnuw ing imindeen pisaruw.
Enieng bor iphana ama belinching Khrista thie ephahaa maagekhang? Ama tal ibekhii khing Khrista humchuw iphasah maagekhang?
Ajiegachiinche ama talchuw engkhepangga, inieng nhimpahjemenie hum engkhepang gemie, ajienachiinche inie bekheing talchuw enttimjeh isaahaaga.
Israel heching atuhe chuw mindeenruw; inthina pih asaaheching hebekoungnaching emvebesa maagehekhang?
Chogenieche kieng ajie kerhierga? Leh rothana athibesa pihchuw lintaang leh rotha engkhega changmaanieche changchie rothachuw pihseh engkhega ketekhang?
Maa, kieng thachamaahenhingna kemindeenga, emmenieng ronhamte apigehe, Thangnhangnhingte maaga. Ninnuw ing ronham enlehchuw keediemaaga.
Ninnuw ing Thangpa belinthoh ronhamhe belinthoh een rhumaanie. Ninnuw ing Thangpa asaanathoh ronham lehthesah iliehah rhumaanie.
Changmaanieche aenieng Thangpaing aminghuwnaing inthiemaavang ategehe khang? Aenieng ama ithi ing ipergemie khang?
Aangkheng arhucherga, changgechuw aangkheng aekanamaaga; aangkheng arhucherga, changgechuw amabekheching atthaana ahintunachuwmaaga.
Achuwdong ing arinnepang jongmaaresie, changgechuw veemchaang tthanaje jongresie.
Kithierna sah ajuwr pihchuw echum alaar minjongluing saruw.
Ajiegachiinche simriipaam asungna euwmbekheje Thangnhangtaga.
Thachamaahe kaarna achuw engkheing eriimna eenheniege, engkaarna thengning tetenuwbe echum aelaar aminghuwnaing jongluing nimmhekungna avisiechuw sah.
Changgechuw achuw engkheing hevehie leh rothate apih piga teheniebe, amachuw enrhierpeetaana echum aelaar ouwnghuw belungrier enhuw ejieng samaaruw;

echum aelaar aminghuwna belungrierlina kerhierhie nanhingnarah maaga, lintaanghe nhingnajega; ajiegachienche lintaang engkhe nhingna echum aelaar aminghuwna belungriirching ningvesang kephachuw ajietuna waajiir atuga?
Kieng empaana kidie taanaching kerotum phasaningbe Thangnhangte kemimpaalina ajietuna irhiersawang ategehe?
Chonaching isah een ouwngshuwjenie, changmaanieche ajie engkhe lintaang etugejenie aangkheng Thangnhang athanglaar auwmna turuw.
Jehudiheje, Greekheje engkhejege Thangnhang ruwhchang hechuw khih minsiena tumaaruw;
Kieje alhambekhena kerotum atthanapang jongluing mibekhe belung angamna ketusaaga, chonaching emmeniechuw ikarpi arhunaga.
Kieng Khrista ing atu keminjie khangkhing, ninnuwjeng kieng ketuhie iminjiepiruw.
Ninnuw ing alham bekhena ibeher maachuwge keminchuw amabekhehie ninnuw ing ihnepah ing nimmin jietahna keminpah sanaachuw.
Changgechuw pesarbekhe losechuw Khristaga, nepenuw lose chuw pesarga, engkhejege Khrista losebe Thangnhangga ate ninnuw nimminghuw keediega.
Aluw mingkhumge ahintham, changmaanieche Thangnhang ttong ahimphuwng mi bekheing alosechuw aajaga.

Changgechuw aluw mingkhumluing ahintham nepenuw changmaanieche Thangnhang ttong aminthang nepenuw bekheing inlosehchuw ijavang ategehe; ajiegachienche hangchie aatu nepenuw heching aluw amingkor nepenuw hetho enghaajega.
Ajienachiinche nepenuw ing enluw mingkhummaaheniebe ensamje mingkorheresie, changgechuw asam atin changmaanieche amingkor nepenuw ching aning minjaaniebe, aluw mingkhumresie.
Ajiegachiinche pesarbe Thangnhang rotha, engkhejege aandangna aansuwtaana alose mingkhum maavang atega; changgechuw nepenuwbe pesarta aandangnachuwga.
Ajienachiinche nepenuwtena pesar ihungshuwmaaga, changgechuw pesartena nepenuw ihungshuwga.
Ajienachiinche nepenuw rotum pesarchuw asemmaaga; changgechuw pesar rotum nepenuw asemga.
Chonaching minven michierlina nepenuwching aloselina ituche aandangna bietimnachuw tuvang atega.
Changkhangjenie Thangnhangnhingna pesar emveluwng nepenuwpang euwm tthamaa, engkhejege nepenuw emveluwng pesarpang euwm tthamaa.
Ajiegachiinche nepenuwchuw pesar sungtena asem khangkhing, pesarje nepenuw sungtena aberhingga. Chonaching euwmbekhe Thangnhangtena chochorga.
Ningtah ing nimwaakhar tusaruw; nepenuw ing aluw mingkhumluing Thangnhangte ahinthamchuw tthanekhang?
Pesar ing asam minkornieche, amachuw anhingna ichonaga ate anunu ouwngshuw amararahching ninnuwchuw imminchuw maakhang?
Changgechuw nepenuwching asam mingkornieche, anhingna empaanaga?; ajiegachienche luw amingkhumna asamchuw apeega.
Changgechuw achuw engkheching rhunum nummaaniebe, eniebekhenhingnaje Thangnhang ruwhchang he nhingnaje changchie chuw iuwmmaaga.
Ninnhingna heve ttongthohie kepeetaanahing ninnuwchuw mimpaa maangchuw. Ajienachiinche ningeengkongle atthana isuw gelummaage atthaanamaa ouwngshuwne.
Mensarimna ruwhchang engkhepang ing ningeengkongle ningkaarna aminghuwmaa emvenechuw atehie kethiese, chonaching amachuw uwmrarahsiete tengge kemindeennaa.
Amachuwbe ningkaarna ittha mihechuw aandangna ningeenlehnamaa esuwga.
Ninnuw ing amhin engkhena ningeengkongle ninsaa Thangpa mhaarnachuw isah rhumaa;
ajiegachienche ninsaale mi bekheing lintaang mhekungna enta enta imbuwchuw ninsaana, engkhejege mi engkheche avin ttaamne, lintaang engkheching Zuw beruwne.

Amachuwche ajiega! isah eenna ningeensung nindeenmaaga? Changmaanieche ninnuw ing Thangnhang ruwhchangchuw ninjuumga? chona adeenmaahechuw ningjaa nimpeega? Kieng ninnhingna ajieche rhierpeegechuw? Hangchie linahing ninnuwchuw rhumaangchuw.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa nhingtena kephasaachuw ninnhingna keminsernagechuw: Thangpa Jesu asuwrhe yenna amang tal chuw viliege,
Thangnhangnhingte himmimpaage, bekhiege, chona hanghing arhier, “Ninnuw rotumna kehumchuw amahiega, ebeher maavang ichieching hevehie etupeeruw.”
Ensaasuwdeh enhuwna khang ngengeching belinchuw jiliege, hanghing arhier, “Kethiesungna Thangnhang ttongneer itharchuw amahiega, Amahie ningeenleching kie embehernamaaing aphabekhena etupeeruw.”
Ajiegachiinche heve tal hie ninsaabekhena engkhejege heve belinhie ningeenleching Thangpa ajuwngngeenlimaataang Thangpa ithiechuw nimminjaamga.
Chonaching achuwchuwgejenie Thangpa talchuw engngephuw oummaang saniebe, Thangpa belinchuw eenniebe Thangpa athiele ahumlina alaarga.
Mibekheching ataa ataaching embeersaniege ama inhuwna talchuw saresie, amana belinsungtenachuw eenresie.
Ajiegachiinche, Thangpa abechiichuw minghuwluing saniege aeen miching anhingna waajiir atunaing isa een atuga.
Heve hangchie linahing ningkaarna aanhim surnechuw, inaje naanechuw, alheheching ithiega.
Changgechuw, enieng aetah aetahchuw atataaing waajiir tusameniebe, aenhingna waajiirchuw ttomaanie.
Changgechuw aenhingna Thangpaing waajiir atuleching lolhiepaamtho enrhiing isiicherte ibounamaaing endiirpeega.
Chovelinaching, keu kene, kesarhe, ninnuw ing sahwang ichieching ningeengkongle, engkhele enkhe enghaasaruw.
Achuw chuwgejenie ninvin ttaamniebe, ninngeengkonge isiicherte abounamaang, eensungna saheresie. Engkhejege lintaang tongwang ketebekhe kethengle minthievanggechuw.
Ateche keukene, kesarhe, chipitena kithur ethenghie ninnuw ing minghuwluing euwmjehhie aedesamaang.
Ninnuw ing nimminghuwbesaga, amachuwbe lintaang yaati khangkhing ningumle attong ishuwmaa leh ching engkhe engkhete iphierge enrhiega.
Thangnhang Chipi apaarna achuw engkhedong ing “Jesuhie seraap aphaga” temaahe, engkhejege Chipi Enthiing apaarna maaniege achuwdong ing, “Jesuhie Thangpaga” ateje rhierchemaa, amahie eminghuwpiruw.
Kithurhie asiesieh uwmne, changgechuw Chipi engkhepangga.
Anong etunaje asiesieh uwmne, engkhejege Thangpabe engkhegethah.
Anongje asie sieh uwmne, engkhejege nongbekhechuw aatupi Thangnhang engkhepangga.
Mibekhenhingna atthaanaching Chipitena aandangna ttongchuw apeega.
Achuw engkhe nhingnache Chipi apaarna ivierna ttong, engkhejege engkhenhingnache Chipi amararah enhuw ijieing aminghuwchena ttong apeepe;
lintaang engkhena Chipi apaarna athacha, lintaang engkhena Chipi engkheching aena amindamna kithur,

engkhejege lintaang engkhena ituchemaa nong atuna, lintaang engkhena Thangnhang ttongjiirna, lintaang engkhena Chipihechuw aminghuwchena, lintaang engkhena ttong lintaang lintaang attongchena, lintaang engkhena ttong ahimmindangchena apeegehe.
Changgechuw, hevebekhehie Chipi ing aadie inhuw ijiing ataa ataalina simpeehege engkhepang Chipiching amintuga.
Ajiegachiinche humhie engkhepangga engkhejege abaa inhimpah uwmne, ama hum abaa bekhehie nhimkhangjenie hum engkhepangga, khangkhing ichiing Khristajega.
Ajiegachiinche Chipi engkhepangching iniebekhechuw hum engkhepang teching chii enluhpehe. Jehudihe, Greek heje, suwhgejenie, ningvesang aphaheje Chipi engkhepangtena aeeenga.
Ajienachiinche humchuw abaa engkhepangmaaga, inhimgehe.
Khih ching “kie kih maagingkhake kie humta maaging” tenieche, amachuw humtena maaging ichiing rhierchemaanie.
Chonaching kiebe mhee maagingkhake kie humtena maaging ichii rhumaanie.
Humbekhechuw mhigenieche, athiechena akhutega? Aangkheng aanagenieche aberim athiena akhona uwmne?
Changgechuw ateche Thangnhangching aadie inhuw ijieng humna abaahechuw ammim paarpeega.
Amabekheching abaa engkhepanggenieche humche akhotega?
Ate abaa nhimjenie hum engkhepangga.
Mhiching kihchuw nang ajiedong ikanamaagechie teniege rhier chemaanie; changmaanieche loseching khih nhingna ninnuwbe kenhingna ikana maagechuw ichiing rhierchemaanie.
Amachuw maanie, humna isurseh abaaheching ithiseh aekanaga;
engkhejege enjaphuw aeuwmmaa teniege imindeen hum abaahechuw ithiseh enjaphuwchuw abesuwga, engkhejege itthamaa abaaheching itthaseh nong atuna euwmga.
Changgechuw itthasehga ichii abaaheching enjaphuw iuwm nasheh chuwmaaga. Changgechuw enjaphuw iuwmmaa iveh abaahningna Thangnhang ing ithiseh enjaphuw pege aminchumga.
Humna aantthena uwmluing abaa heching engkhele engkhe rotum enghaajeng endumpiwang ategehe.
Abaah engkheching janiebe, abaa bekheching ija aphahaagehe; engkhejege abaa engkhechuw ejameniebe, abaahbekheching enrotha aerhohga.
Ninnuwbe Khrista hum ensuwtenuwge, ninnuw bekhe ama abaagechuw.

Ruwhchangsungna mi alheh chuw mensang ttongjiirpahe, amenhenaching laarchangpahe aminthumna thiimpuw embesuwpipe; ama inhuwna ituchemaa nong ituna, aena amindamna kithur, ebumpi achehna nong, upatuna nong, ttong lintaang lintaang aettongnaje impeepe.
Aangkheng ttongjiirpagehe? Aangkheng laarchangpagehe? Aangkheng upa atugehe? Aangkhengching etuchemaa atugehe?
Aangkheng ing aena amindamna kithur aphagehe? Aangkheng ing lintaang ttong aettonggehe? Aangkheng ing ttong aminthangchegehe?
Changgechuw elhungseh kithurchuw belung ilhuwpaaing idesaruw. Engkhejege ama athiseh lham engkhe avonhii kieng ninnhingna minthiegechuw.
Kieing tepangtena engkhejege thangven michierhe ttongbekhe ttongchejening ningsiechuw deenmaaningbe aarurpang ithie daarkhuwng, engkhejege inrhing kortaanchuwging.

Kieng Thangnhang laarchangpahe ttong kithur phajening, riirtena ttongbekhe, ihe isingnabekhe minghuwjening engkhejege thacha uwmningge boungbekhe pimchejening ningsie deenmaaningbe kie ajiedong maaging.
Kedeenbekhechuw adeenmaahenhingte pecherjening, engkhejege kehumhie mhihsungte abethuna pedohjening kenhingna ninsiichuw uwmmaa niebe ajiedong ikanamaaging.
Ningsieching isipaa abedaarchega, lungsiije adeenga; ningsii eheching kallaamaa, lhuwngttittumaa, meejuwmmaa.
Ichamaa nongtumaa, areennepang jongmaa, belung sehmaa, aetthamachuw mimpaamaa;
Dormo echermaalina rotha minrhomaa, changgechuw aettha atulina rotha aaminrhoga;
Aangkheng abedaarga, aangkheng athachaga, aangkheng amindeenpiga, aangkheng akhaangpee chega.
Ningsiiching awadongna uwmmaa, changgechuw Thangnhang ttong aphuwngcheje ttiimvate, ttong lintang lintaang aettongje ttiimvate; aminghuw eviernaje ttiimvate.
Ajiegachiinche inieng alhehpang eminghuwga, engkhejege alhehpang Thangnhang ttong eminthangga;
changgechuw aleer asuwlechingbe alhehchuw tangcherwate.
Kenepangle, nepangkhangkhing aettongging, nepangkhangkhing keminghuwga, nepangkhangkhing kemindeenga, kehangviernhuwtebe nepang ing atubekhe keminchinga.

Ajiegachinche atele inieng mengsengna minthim mhumhu aemhuwga, changgechuw aenhuwtebe imhele imheh ouwngteuvateruw. Atelehingbe alhehpang keminghuwgethaa; enhuwtebe kiechuw imminghuwkier khangkhing kiejeng minghuwkiirvanggete.
Changgechuw ateche aethacha, imindeen engkhejege ningsie hevehehie aphabekhena iuwmga; engkhejege hevekaarna ilhuwngseh chuwbe ningsiehiega.
Ningsiichuw aphanaing jiesaruw engkhejege chipitena kithurchuw aphanaing belung minlhuwsehruw.
Ajiegachiinche ttong ittongcheching mihenhingna iwattongmaaga, Thangnhangtenavang atega, ajienachiinche achuwdong ing minghuwchemaa, changgechuw amaing chipitena enthurchuw arhierga.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ttong aminthang amaching mihechuw aminlhuwngna, abetthona engkhejege belung amengamna ttong ing ittongga.
Ttong lintaang lintaang ing ittonghechuwbe entaaing ensemsagehe changgechuw Thangnhang ttong aminthangheching ruwhchangchuw ahingngeethohga.

Ninnuwbekheing ttong lintaang lintaang aettong kieing kidiena changgechuw ninnuw ing Thangnhang ttong nimminthangching ithiseh kidiena. Engkhejege ruwhchangchuw ahingngeethohna ttongchuw minthangmaaniebe, lintaang lintaang ttong ittonghie Thangnhang ttong aminthangching ilhuwngsehga.

Ate keu kene, kesarhe, ninnhingna thengningge lintaang lintaang ttongching ttongjening kehimphuwng ttong ing, aminghuwchena Thangnhang ttong keminthangching, changmaanieche ivierna ttongching aminchuwnaing ninnhingna ttongmaaningche ninnhingna ajieche kekanase?
Irhingmaa pihjeching aarurche uwmge, riesiim, tihligejenie ingngeerurna asiesieh erur mindangmaanieche, riesiimgemo, tihli eruwlgemo achuwng minghuw vatekhang?
Ajienachiinche tumpi erurching amamaa erur mindangnieche achuwngche raar thengne teniege enthongwatekhang?
Khangkhing ichieing ninuwjeng ilepah ttong iminghuwcheching ttongmaatenuwche, ajie arhierga ate ajiekhang minghuwvateruw? Amachuw ngarhena ittongte ithengga.
Lolhiepaamna aarur lintaang inhimpah euwm arhuwse, engkhejege aminghuwna bietimna emveluwng ajiedong uwmmaa.
Kieng aarurchuw ajie arhiernaga minghuwmaaningche, ittong mi nhingna kie attong keminghuwmaa paam engkhetena miging, engkhejege ittong mijechuw aminghuwmaa paam engkhetena michuwvate.
Khangkhing ichiing Chipitenachuw enhimpaa ningngeedietaana, ruwhchangchuw aminlhuwngnaching jongruw.
Heve hangchie lina ttong lintaang lintaang ittongching ttong abilichenaing hinthamsaresie.
Ajiegachiinche kieng ttong lintaang ing hinthamningbe, kechipiching hinthamniege changgechuw kewaa kharching aekana tumaa, ngarhega.
Chogenieche amachuw ajiega? Kieng kechipiching hinthamningge, changgechuw kewaakharjeng hinthamvate; kieng kechipina lha tusaningge, keminghuwjeching lhah tusa wanggete.
Changmaanieche nang ing chipithoh enrhieng mimpaa teniebe lintaanghe ching ajie arhiernaga atechuw aminghuw maataana nahinthamlina ajiekhang “Amen” techewate?
Ajiegachiinche nangchingche itthapahching namimpaa saaga, changgechuw lintaangchuwche hinsem peemaachii.
Ninnuw ithi ing ttong lintaang lintaang ittong kechese, amalinaching Thangnhangchuw kemimpaasahna.
Changgechuw ruwhchangsungna mi lintaanghechuw arhierpeenaing mi aminghuwmaa ttong chiing sum aettong changbe miching minghuwchevang ichii rongapang ing ittongchuw kidiesehga.
Keu kene, kesarhe, nepang belung irin minchinruw, itthamaalina nepang ouwngshuwnung ningwaakharnache upa ouwngshuwsaruw.

Waajiir ttongthona hevehie abejiibesaga, “Ttong lintaang lintaang ing ittong miheching, engkhejege mipaamtena nherna kieng heve mihenhingna ttongwanggete; changgejenie kiechuw aeronge maahenie.” tege Thangnhang ing arhierga.
Chogenieche, ttong lintaang lintaang chuwbe thachahe rotummaaga, changgechuw athacha maahe rotum bietimnaga; changgechuw Thangnhang ttong aminthangching thachamaahe rotummaaga, thachahe rotumga.

Chonaching ruwhchangbekhe engkongtenuwge ningingkheng ing lintaang lintaang ttongching ttongtenuwche taangna aeonghe changmaanieche thachamaaheching valhuwheniege emmenieching ninnuwchuw imvihgehe itemaa niehekhang?

Changgechuw, Thangnhang ttong minthangtenuwge chaleching thachamaa mi engkhe, changmaanieche taangna aeongmi engkheching valhuwniege eongbekhe apaarna alaar minghuwsaniege, eongbekhe apaarna amachuw waakhar amintupeegehe;
Ama abelungriertena amindeen ouwngthuwrjechuw ehungngeenphuwng achega; engkhejege hanghing “ningkaarna atataa Thangnhang ongne” atechuw amaing himphuwngniege aluh beluniege Thangnhangchuw rumsavate.

Chogenieche kilhanghe ajie suwhwate? Ninnuw ing ningeengkongbekhena dhormo empaana lha, nimminchuwgejenie, ttong ephuwnggejenie, lintaang lintaang ttong, ttonghechuw abilinagejenie engkheter nindeenga. Nongbekhe alhuungnachuw turuw.
Achuw engkheing ttong lintaang lintaang ttongvang nintegeniebe ennhii maanieche ouwngthumna minthiluing mensa nhungkur ineng ttongheresie; amana mi engkheing biliresie.
Changgechuw ttong bilipiwang ichii uwmmaaniebe, ama ruwhchang sungna dereng ing ongresie; engkhejege atah athienen ing Thangnhangte ttongsaresie.
Thangnhang ttongthangpahe ennhiile ouwngthumheching ttongheresie, engkhejege lintaangheching atatahgemo atatahmaagemo ichiechuw itursaheresie.
Changgechuw apaangna iongjeh mi lintaanghenhingna amindangpi uwmnieche mensapaching dereng ongresie.
Ajiegachiinche mibekheching aliechenaing, engkhejege abetthonaing, ninnuw ing engkheter Thangnhang ttong ephuwng arhuga;
engkhejege Thangnhang ttong atongna belungriir isuw thachahechuw Thangnhang ttong aatonghe derna ionggehe;
Ajienachiinche Thangnhanghie ouwngtochorchor Thangnhangmaaga, dejiim auwmnaga. Thachahe ruwhchangbekhena hanghing minjiewang ategehe.
Nepenuwheching ruwhchang sungna dereng ing ongheresie, ajiegachienche emmenieng ittong rhumaa, changgechuw waajiir ttongthohching arhierkhangkhing emmenieng ideurjeh ing valhuwsavang ategehe.
Emmenieng minghuwning ente uwmniebe aeen aeenna empuwsarhenhingna siesaheresie, ajiegachienche ruwhchangsungna ttongvang ichiehie ningjaanaga.
Changmaanieche Thangnhang ttonghie ninnhingtena ehungsuwga? Changmaanieche ninnhingnapang aewathengga?
Achuw engkheing laarchangpa engkheging teniege changmaanieche chipi paangkar tenaging teniege kharsaniebe kieing ninnhingna kevibejiihie Thangpa ttongthohga ichiehie minghuwresie.
Achuw engkheing hevehie minghuw chemaa niebe Thangnhang aminghuwmaaga.
Chonaching kilhanghe Thangnhang ttong aminthangnaing belung eminlhuwpiruw, lintaang lintaang ttong ing ittongchuw khaammaaruw.
Changgechuw nintubekhe aetthajeh ing engkhejege mensa nhungkur menenuwng turuw.
Keu kene kesarhe, ninnhingna keminjaam aettha ttongjiirlina atele keminthiegechuw. Amachuw ninnuw ing phachuwge amalina aeneergechuw.
Ninnhingna keminjaamhie inhehing bechuw sahtenuwbe ama ttongjiirching ninnuwchuw engkarpeega. Amamaa geniebe ngarhe ninthachaga.
Ajienachiinche kieng kephasaachuw mensarim ninnhingte keminsernagechuw, amachuwbe ttongjiir lerii enhuw ijieing Khristachuw isiicher etutaana ithiega.
Ama ttongjiir lerii enhuw ijieng anieminthumna hangrhingse.
Chona amaing Kephas nhingna emphuwngge, aanhuwna summalhie ennhiehenhingna emphuwngga.
Ama inhuwna une roza ronga ithiheching amhuwgehe, engkaarna aanhim atele ongnehe, alheheche theesehe.
Ama inhuwna Jakoble ttongjiirpanhingna emphuwngge.
Nhungkurrehna, akum isuwmaa khangkhing aberhing nepanghangchie kenhingnaje immindangpeega.
Ajiegachiinche isiingseh ttongjiirpahe kaarna, ttongjiirpa romhing irinchuw kieging, ajienachiinche kieng Thangnhang ruwhchanghechuw ija chaam kepigehe.

Changgechuw Thangnhang lungsiiching kiehie hanghing embesuwpiga, engkhejege ama lungsiichuw kenhingna ate ngarhemaase. Ama pangmaage emmenie ithi ing anongchuw ketusaaga, changgechuw kieng ketusaamaaga, kie enrhiepihbor Thangnhang ningsiiching entupiga.
Chogeniebe kiegejening, ninnuwgejetenuw, hanghing ttongjiir iminjaamga, engkhejege hanghing ninnuwjeng ninthachaga.
Ithietena ihangrhing Khristachuw kimminjaamgenieche ningkaartena mi alhehheching ihangrhinghie uwmmaa nintechuw ajiekhang arhierchegehe?
Ithietena ihangrhingchuw uwmmaanieche Khristaje hangrhingmaalhie.
Chona Khristachuw hangrhingmaa lhienieche, ttongjiir kimminjaamhechuw ngarhese, amana nimmindeenchuw ngarhe ouwngshuwga.
Ithiehechuw ihangrhing maageniebe Thangnhangching Khristachuw ithietena aminrhing maaga, chona Thangnhangching Khristachuw ithietena aminrhingga ate kinnuw alaar saarkhie aapichuwgung.
Ajiegachiinche ithiehechuw hangrhing maaniebe, Khristaje ihangrhingmaaga;
Khristachuw hangrhing maaniebe, ninthachahie ngarhega; ate iphang ninnuw isiicher tuchuwge ongnechuw.
Chogeniebe Khristanhingna aejaarhechuw maangsehe.
Irhinglepang inieng Khristachuw atataa minghuw luing rhingmeniebe, mibekhetena inieng ithiseh ningttuwnagemie.
Changgechuw atebe ithiehe kaartena mensa aanra Khristachuw ithiehekaartena hangrhingse.
Mi engkhe apaarna ithiechuw athengtaana, Mi engkhe jeching apaarna ithiehe ihangrhingje isuwhga.
Ajiegachiinche Adamlina mibekhe ithiekhangkhing Khristana khangkhing mibekhe hangrhingvate.
Changgechuw mibekhe ataa ataaing mensah nhungkur nevate, Khristaching amhourrim aanraga, ama inhuwna Khristaching ajuwngle Khristanhingna aeonhechuwwang ategehe.
Ama inhuwna Thangpaing Thangnhangte, amapanhingna, eruwng lepaa pewang ate aphanaching, Thangpa aderna asiibekhe, athanglaar engkhejege pirthangbekhe memaangvang ate aphanaching attuwnachuw vievate.
Ajiegachiinche araar asaa bekhechuw akhih derna asiihmaataang eruwng ensuwniege paarvang atega.
Anhungkurrehna memaangvang ichii araarchuwbe ithiechuwga.
Ajienachiinche “Thangnhangching euwmbekhechuw akhihderna asiihpe.” Changgechuw “euwmbekhe” ate sungnahing Krista aderna iuwmbekhechuw asiihpee Thangnhangchuw emvemaaga.
Pihbekhe Khrista derna asiihnhuwte Asapa rarahchuw iuwmbekhe derna asiihpee Thangnhang aderna uwmchervate chonaching Thangnhangchuw iuwmbekhe tahlina aapuw enshuwvang atega.
Chovechuwmaaniege Ithiehechuw hangrhingmaadehnieche, chii aluhheching ajie tuvatehe? Ithiehechuw hangrhingmaa dehnieche, emmenielina emmenieng ajietuna chii aluhgehe?
Enieje thang bekhena khih minsiina ajietuna iuwmgemie?
Keu kene kesarhe, Thangpa Jesu Khristatena kephasaa ninnuwlina kelhuwngnachuw rhiersaingge kieing aanasiir ithieging tengge atataa kerhierga.
Simriipaam miheching entuhe Ephesiana rampa sahhetho entohnungge, kieng kekana ajie uwmvate? Ithiehechuw hangrhingmaa nieche, “Inieng sateruw, eenteruw, ajiegachienche ateunie thevang aetegethaa.”
Emimmunamaaheresie: “Itthamaa aalhangching aettha ajiinachuw amemaangga.”
