Nimbelungriir enchiimsanuwng isiicher nongchuw avonhie tumaaruw. Ajiegachiinche achuw engkhechuwbe Thangnhang ing atuchuw minghuwchemaa. Ninnuw ing ninning aanjaanaing hevehie kerhierga.
Changgechuw achuw engkheching rhiervate. “Ajiekhang ithiehechuw hangrhingvang atega? Ajiekhangchie humching hangrhingvang atega?
Ejehmeh inhuwrgechuw, natahching navor amhuwchuw themaaniebe hangrhingmaa;
Amhuw navorchuw suwhvang ichii atahchuw navormaaga, changgechuw amhuw chuwpang navorga, Gehu mhuwgejenie changmaanieche lintaang amhuwgejenie atataa amhuwchuw navorga.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing aadie enhuw ijieing abourchuw apiga, engkhejege amhuw engkheterching atah atah abourchuw apiga
Abourbekhe enghaajeh abourmaagehe, changgechuw tepanghum abour engkhe, sahheching lintaang engkhe, vatiheching lintaang engkhe, engkhejege ngaheching lintaang engkhega.
Thanventena humje uwmne, lolhiepaamtena humje uwmne; changgechuw Thangventenaching athanglaar lengwaar engkhe, lolhiepaamtenaching lintaang engkhega.
Inie aethanglaar engkhe, thah athanglaar engkhe, engkhejege aarsii tena thanglaar lintaang iuwmga; ajiegachienche aarsii thanglaarje asiesiehga, engkheing aarsii engkhetho engkhe enthiergehe.
Khangkhing ithietena ihangrhingjechuw changching ichiega, amhuw avorchuwbe thevate, engkhejege ihangrhingchuwbe themaadehnie.
Enjaphuw euwmmaaga abetthega, chona athang alaarthoh hangrhingvate, isurching abetthega pirthang ing hangrhingvate.
Anunu hum uwmniebe, chipitajechuw euwmga.
Khangkhing ichiin enjiige aeuwmga, “Mensa Adamchuw ihangrhing mi ouwngshuwse,” anhungkur Adamchuw irhing apee chipi ouwngshuwse.
Changechuw chipitenachuw mensamaaga, mitenachuw men aesaga, ama aenhuwna chipitenachuw euwmga.
Amensa michuwbe lolhiepaamtena gekhage, lolhietenaga, amenhiena michuwbe Thangventenaga.
Lolhietena mi khangkhing, lolhietena mihechuw hanghing lolhietenagehe, engkhejege Thanventena isuwkhangkhing Thangventena isuw mihejechuw Thangventena gehe.
Lolhietena isuw mi rotha aminlu khangkhing Thangventena isuw mi rothajechuw rinwateruw.
Keu kene kesarhe, kieing heve kerhierhie sabechiele thieching Thangnhang lepaa epha achemaaga, engkhejege maangvang ichieching maangmaavang ichiechuw phamaanie.
Rongeruw, riirtena ttong rhiergete; Eniebekhe jaarmaamenie.

Apha amongnapang, mhee vokhepang eechaasungna nhungkur tumpi irur auwngle, eniebekhe entehcherwateruw. Ajienachiinche tumpi irur uwngvate, ithiehechuw maangmaavang ichiinaching hangrhingvatehe engkhejege enteh cherwateruw.
Maanvang atechuw maangmaavang ichieching pien aserkhangkhing serniege engkhejege thevang ichieching themaadehvang ichii pien aserkhangkhing serwatehe.
Maangwang ichieching maangmaavang ichiechuw serniege, engkhejege thehvang ichieching thehmaavang ichii pien aserleheching abejii ttongchuw alirsuwvate. “Thehvang ichii raarchuw chehge abedorpe.”
“O, Ethie, nachechuw akhotega?
O Ethie, natuurkha chuw akhotega?”
Ethiena aarhuwchuwbe isiicherga, engkhejege isiicher pirthangchuwbe waajiir ttongthohga.
Changgechuw Thangpa Jesu Khristanhingna raar achena impee Thangnhangchuw impaana ouwngshuwresie.
Chotaanaching, kening keminsii unehe, ninnuw ing inoumchuwkha Thangpa nhingte ngarhemaaga ate minghuwnung, inheh, enlaamaadeh, Thangpa nonglina aphabekhena inoumhechuw ouwngshuwruw.
Ateche thachahe rotum sheer nintthena lina kieng Galatia ruwhchanghe nhingna kebettho khangkhing ninnuwjeng etupeeruw.
Kethengleching, sheer ttheluing hapta men aesah inienaheching ninnuw ing nimphasaa enhuw ijiing mibekheing emingkongpisaruw.
Engkhejege kevatungleching ninnuw ing ninrhu achuw engkhenhingna lerii enjiitho enrhiing Jerusalemte ninnuw ing nimpi kithurchuw minrin sawang getehe.
Kieje isi chehningbe, emmenietho sihaawanggete.
Makedonia paamchuw ilenningge virvanggechuw ajiegachiinche Makedonia ilenning ketesaaga–
Engkhejege ninnuwtho apha amongna aeonghaa arhuse, changmaanieche pherbiesungnaje aeonghaajemie arhuse, Lintaangte Kesina uwmjenie iboum savangninte.
Ajienachiinche ninnuwchuw lhamlena velaang ing ouwngtuwkhochuw aedemaang; Thangnhang ing irhuniebe ninnuwtho apha among onghaamenie ketega.
Changgechuw kie Pentikost inie ipha Ephesusna cheengvanggete;
Ajienachiinche nong etuna aetthapah eengkhaarchuw eemhongpeege uwmne, engkhejege enrhumaaheje aenhimpaa ongnehe.
Timothi athengleching ningkaarna itteluing ningonghaanaing rukuum itupeeruw, ajiegachienche amaje kieng ketukhangkhing Thangpa nong atuga.
Chonaching achuwdong ing ataalina rotha iminsiihpeemaaruw, amang kenhingte athengnaing, idejeh ing lhamlena ithapeesaruw; ajienachiinche kieng unehetho etheng kehaasaaga.
Ate une Apollo khulina, kieng amachuw unehetho enrhiing ninnhingna athengna enhimpaa kerhiersaaga, changgechuw atele amaing thengning temaadeh, changgechuw amaing taancha aphale thengvate.
Nimmhih mimviernung, ninthachalina niirtihruw, pettha enshuwnung iperpaaing uwmruw.
Nintubekhena ningsielina turuw.
Ate keu kene kesarhe, kenhiisaanaachuw ninnuw ing Stephanas eengkuwchuw nimminghuwse, emmeniehie Akaiatena mensa thacha ilhuwsagehe, emmenieng enthiinghe nong etulina belung aminlhuwgehe.
Changchie nonglina aboumnaing nong aatubekhe derna belung iminlhuwpiruw tengge kerhiersaana.
Stephanas, phortunetas engkhejege Akhia hechuw athengtaanahe kerotha rhosane.
Ajiegachiinche emmenieng kieje ninnuw belung awaarna ouwngshuwgehe, chonaching ninnuw ing emmeniechuw iminghuwpisaruw.
Asiatena ruwhchangheching ninnuwchuw ouwngrumsanaahe. Akuila engkhejege Priska engkhejege ingeenna engkong ruwhchangheching ninnuwchuw Thangpa romhingna ouwngrumsaanaahe.
Une amana kesarheching rotha ouwngkurnaahe. Enthiing himbeen enjuhthoh enrhiing engkhele engkhe rukuum ouwngtusaruw.
Paul kieng kerumsaachuwhie kekirarahing kebejiiga.
Achuw engkheng Thangpachuw aning minsiimaaniebe seraap phasaresie.
Thangpachuw enrang juwngresie (maranathan) Thangpa Jesu lungsii ching ninnuwchuw eenrhiephuwresie.
Khrista Jesu apaarna keningsii ninnhingna uwmjehresie.
Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ejieng Jesu Khrista ttongjiirpa Paul, engkhejege une Timothi ttongjiir: Korinthna aeong Thangnhang mihetho Akaia paamtena aeong enthiing mihenhingna:
Aemapa Thangnhangle Thangpa Jesu Khristatena lungshiile adejiimchuw ninrotum ouwngshuwresie.
Aeta Thangpa Jesu Khristata Thangnhangje, amapaje ouwngshuw ningsie ihe, engkhejege, ikuhpee ihe mibekhe amapachuw kemimpaa saana.
Amaing belungriir ngamna itupeege ama apaarnaching enieing ijachaam aphahechuw embelung immengamchenaing, amaing enieje belung amengamna impeepe.
Ajiena chiinche Jesu Khrista ijachaamchuw khaanghaamiege chonaching Khristatena belung ngamnaing dimsemie.

Enieng ijachaam iphatahna, amachuw nimbelung ngamna engkhejege isiichertena imminlenpee nimphanaga; belung ngamna kimphaching ninnuwjeng belung ngamna nimphanaga; engkhejege kinnuw ing ija chaam kingkhaang khangchiethoh enrhieng ikhaangnajechuw ninchenaga.
Ninnuw ing ijachaam nimphasah khangkhing, belung ngamnaje kimphaga ichiing mindeennuwng atataa nimmindinchuw ahnehnaga.
Ajienachiinche keu kene kesarhe, Asiana ijachaam kimphachuw ninnuwjeng iminghuwpisatenuwge kintena; Ijachaam kimphachuw minhih lamthige rhingvanggungte ichie kimmindeen maaga.
Kinnuw kintahlina ithienajechuw kimphaga, amabekhechuw kinnuw pang ing mindeenluing ithietena emminrhing Thangnhangnhingna kinthachanaga.
Amaing hangchie ittiishuwpaatena engkarpeepe, engkhejege ekarpivate; amaing avonhie ikarpivate tesaungge anhingna kinmindin saahga.
Ninnuwjeng kinrotumna hinthamchuwge emboumnaachuw, chonaching mi inhimpah apaarna kinnhingna impee kithurlinaching mibekheing Thangnhang chuw mimpaavate.

Atatah kimbelungriir kimminlhuwngnachuwbe kintulina echumaelaar aminghuwna saarkhie chuw hevehiega, Thangnhangtena enthiing belungrier inheh, humtenamaa, Thangnhangtena lungsiiching lolhiepaamna, atah ithi ing ninnhingna kintaaing hevehie kintusaaga.
Chonaching ningnuw ing hevehie patenuwge nimminghuwchenaing kebejiiga. Chonaching ningnuw ing itthajeh ing minghuwche wangninte ichiing kemindeennaa.
Atelehingche alhehpang nimminghuwga, changgechuw Thangpa Jesu iniena ninnuwhie kinlhuwngna ningeenshuwtana, kinnuwje nintachuwgung.
Hangjehmeh kemindeensaaga, kieng ninnhingte mensarim thengning ketesaaga, amaching ningnuw ing enhimseh ninrotha rhohvate.
Chona Makedoniana thengningge engkhejege kehungeenlile virvanggechuw, amana Judiate ivithavangninte ichiing kemindeennaa.

Chonaching kieing hanghing kemindeenhie iniir kechemaa khangkhing immenge gechuw? Changmaanieche, kieing kemindeenchuw kenhingnache “uwng, uwng,” engkhejege “maa, maa” chuw aansuwna, kieing hum inhuw ijieing kekharga?
Changgechuw Thangnhangche aethacha arhu gekhage, ninnhingtebe kettonghie “Uwng engkhejege Maa” ama khamaaga.

Ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing, kieng Silvanus engkhejege Timothi ing ningkaarna ttong kimminjaam Thangnhang Sapa Khrista Jesuchuw “uwng” changmaanieche “Maa” ketenamaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang nhingnabe “uwng” atega.
Ama ttongdeenbekhelina anhingna Thangnhangching “uwng” atega, ama inhuw ijieng inieng Thangnhang emimpaanaing athang alaar auwmnaing anhingna “Amen” aetega.
Changgechuw Khristalina ningnuwtho enrhieng iniechuw emmenie tho thou ingeetehpeechuw Thangnhangga.
Iniebekhechuw chum innampee, engkhejege silungriirna achipi enthaarpihchuw imapa Thangnhangga.
Ningnuwchuw kening minsiichuw uwngge kieing Korinthte ate aepha ethengmaaging ichiehie kechipilina saarkhii aansuwnaing Thangnhangchuw keeenga.
Kinnuw ing ninthachalina aapuw aansuwna kintumaaga, changgechuw ninrotha rhohna aaboumchuwgung; ajiegachiinche ninthacha lina aetthajeng neernechuw.
Chotaanaching ningnuwchuw avonhie belung ijatho enrhiing kevirnamaaing kebelung neerse.
Ningnuwchuw belung ijana peningchuwbe, belung ijana kipi michuw maaniege kieche achuwching kerotha minrhovate?
Kie kerotha irhohching ninrotha irhohga tesaingge ingam ing thachaingge, kemindeense, amanaching kethengkhohle kebelung ngamna entupeeheching belung ijah impeena maaing hanghing kevibejiiriga.
Belungriir asuhpaaing kemhi riechietho kebejiihie nimbelung ajahnaing ketemaaga, changgechuw ningnuwchuw ijehmeh kening keminsiigechuw atechuw nimminghuwna chingga.
Changgechuw achuw engkheching belung ijana tuniebe kenhingnapang aminjamaaga, mibekhe belung jana atuga.
Ama khangchiechuw mibekheching ninrukuchuw ama rotum ouwngshuwse;
chonaching abelung jalamthiniege amamaate aminthengna maaing kuhpeetenuwge belung ngamnachuw tupeevang nintega.
Chonaching ninning nimminsiihchuw minghuw rim heresie tengge keminthangsaaga.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuwching alhambekhena ninrhier aminjie aminjiemaa aandangna amahie kebejiiga.
Changgechuw achuw engkhe ningnuw ing ningkuhpee mi engkhechuw kiejeng kekuhpeega; ajienachiinche kieing amachuw kuhpeeningchuwbe ninrotumna Khrista in Kiejechuw engkupeega.
Ajiegachiinche Sataan ing itahlina achehna uwmmaa; inieng atubekhe enthongchuw iminghuwcherga.
Kieing Khrista aettha ttongjiir aminjaamnaing Troas kewatungche Thangpa nong ituna kelham emmhongge.
Changgechuw une Titus keenteuphuwmaa taana kebelungriir jalamthige mibekhechuw lhamsuw then ingge Makedoniate keminthengpe.
Changgechuw aphabekhena Khrista apaarna kinnuwchuw kimmhe empaatho enrhiing abrim ichiipaa aettha ttongjiirchuw atongnaing enrhie Aapuw Thangnhangchuw Kimmimpah sahna.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing akarbesahe engkhejege aemaangbesahe Kaarna iniebe Thangnhang boumna Khrista ningsie abrimchuw ouwngshuwnung,
Emmobeshahe nhingnabe ithiekaartena ithie abrimchuw ouwngshuwgehe, akarpisahe nhingnabe ihangrhingtena irhing abesuw aberimchuw ouwngshuwga. Heve nonglina pettachuw achuwga?

Ajienachiinche kinnuwbe Thangnhang ttong amimbourhe mihechuw maagung; changgechuw belungrier inhehthoh enrhiing, Thangnhang tenakhangkhing, Thangnhang mhekungna, Khristatho enrhiehe ttongching ittonggung.
Avonhie kinnuw kinthienen ing empaa sagung khang? Changmaanieche, achuw engkhetena khangkhing ninnhingtena engkhejege miching rhuvang ichii ttongjiirchuw kingnge uwmnekhang?
Kimbelungriirna abejii besa, mi bekheing pahege aminghuw, ama leriichuw ningnuwgechuw;
Ningnuwchuwbe kinnhingna impee, muh ing abejiimaa, lhuwngpeelina enjiimaa mihe belungrier sungna abejii irhing Thangnhangtena Chipi Enthiing ing abejii Khrista ttongjiirgechuw.
Thangnhangnhingte Khrista apaarna belung ngamsanechuw,
ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing kinrotumpanglina ajiedong kintuche uwmmaa, ama etu achenachuw Thangnhang tenaga.
Thangpaching iniebekhechuw aethar ttongdeen anong atuhe chena embesuwpe; amachuw bejiige impimaaga, changgechuw Chipitenaga; ajiegachienche leriihchinbe athehga, changgechuw Chipiching aminrhingga.
Lhuwngpeelina abejii waajiir ttongtho chuwbe emmose, changgechuw jungttiimsavang ate, Mosinhingna Thangnhang athang alaarthohching aanrhiitaana Israelheching amhena embeer chemaahe,
changching shuwnieche, Chipi Enthiingtena athang alaar chuwche ijehmeh athang alaar uwmaa niekhang?
Ajienachiinche isii-cheer abouhna athang alaarchuw uwmnieche, dhormo ichertena athang alaarching avonhie amachuw athisega!
Ajiegachiinche engkaangseh athang alaar linaching, athang alaarchuw ate jungeen mohse.
Ajienachiinche jungeemmoh vang ichie lham ing hangjehmeh athang alaar uwmnieche, jungttiim maavang ichiechuwbe ijehmeh athang alaar uwmvang atega!
Hangchie eendinhii kinguwmtaana, thona aetthapaaing nong kintusaaga.
Eniebe emmovang ichie Mosi mhe athang alaar euwmchuw Israelheching embeer enchenamaang mhekhum amingkhum khangchie maagemie.
Atenie iphang ttongdeen beluwchuw impabortaanaching emmhe amingkhumhechuw enjohmaalhie, Khrista nhingna itheng ama apaarna mhekhumchuw uwngkhummaase.
Atenie iphang Mosi waajiir ttongthohchuw empataana embelungriir mhekhumchuw amingkhum jegehe.
Changgechuw achuw engkheching Thangpanhingte vaanlehniebe mhekhumchuw aliepijohga.
Ate Thangpachuwbe Chipiga, engkhejege Chipi ongtaanaching ningvesangchuw iuwmga.
Changgechuw inie bekheng mhe mingkhum luing Thangpa athang alaarchuw mingsengna ibeermeniege, amathoh enghaajeh Chipi amhechuw Thangpa apaarna athang alaarte impeemsemie.
Chonaching Thangnhang lungsii apaarna anong etunahechuw phasamiege ebelungriir siingmaa,

ouwngthurmiege ningjaa aphana anongchuw minchin meniege amamaa amamaa rhierluing Thangnhang ttongchuw amamaate tuluing atataa imminthie apaarna Thangnhang mhibeerna mibekhe ichummaa ichum aminghuwna itah itahching minghuwmeniege, ningjaaing nong etubekhe aebethinpe.
aettha ttongjiirchuw mingkhum jemeniebe, aemaanghe nhingna enieng imingkhumjega.
Thangnhang rotha Khrista athang alaar aettha ttongjiirtena lengwaar chuw aminlengnamaa, engkaarna thachamaahe belungrierchuw lolhiepaamtena lehechig immhi aminchupe.
Ajiegachiinche kinrotumna kimminjaam maaga, changgechuw Khrista Jesuhie Thangpaga teuwngge kinnuw ing Jesu khulina ningnuw minechuwgung kintega.
Ajiegachiinche hanghing Thangnhang ing arhier, “Lengwaarchuw inthimpakaarna lengrise,” ate Thangnhangching Jesu Khrista amhena Thangnhang athang alaarchuw aebelungriirna immim vaarpeega.
Changgechuw isungna Chipi lerchie inthinhie beersungna lerchie isii khangchiega, eniebe beergemie, ruwngper chuwbe Thangnhang tenaga.
Alhambekhena jakhang jenung jasamaauwng, kinnuw ing belungrier ijanabekhelinaje belung minjamaa uwng,
kinnuwchuw ijachaam ipehejenie bethinmaa uwng, aelhinhejenie maangmaauwng.
Jesu Irhingchuw kintaalina amindangnaing, Jesu ithiechuw humna aphabekhena, amhinbekhena kinreenga.
Ajienachiinche Jesu irhingjechuw thevang ichii kinnuw humsungna aandangnaing, Jesu khulinaching kinnuw chuw aphabekhena ithienate nempeega.
Amachuw suwhniebe ithieching kinnhingna, chona irhingching ninnhingna nong atuga.
Changgechuw aettha ttongjiirna arhier “Kieng kethachataanaching ittongging.” Amakhangkhing kinnuwjeng kinthacha engkhepang tena Chipi Enthiing apaarna ittongsagung;
ajiegachienche, Jesu Khristachuw aminrhing Thangnhangching kinnuwje Jesutho enrhieng hangrhingvanggungte, engkhejege ningnuwtho emeneervate ate kimminghuwse.
Heve bekhehie ningnuw rotumga, engkhejege Thangnhang athang alaarchuw mimpaa sesehtenuwge ichie lina ningnuw rotumna ama lungsiichuw aminlhuwngga.
Chovelinaching kimbelungriir minsieng maauwng; changgechuw huwmtena chuw maangkhangjenie, kinsungna aeong michuwbe aanasiir ahimmin tharga.
Ajiegachiinche amongna ijachaam kimphaching kinnuw nhingna athang alaar ittiim inemaa inhimseseh ahimbesuwga.
Ajiegachiinche Kinnuw ing kimmhuw pihchuw ebeer uwngge, changgechuw atebe mheeching amhuwmaateching eebeerga. Emhihing imhuwhiebe ttiimvate, mheeching amhuwmaa hechuw aphabekhena ittiim nemaanie.
Ajiegachiinche, lolhiepaam apha amongna eenthurna hum een hie ttiimvate changjenie ittiimnemaavang ichii kihching atumaa thangven eenchuw Thangnhang ing ouwngtupise.
Ajiegachiinche heve lolhie thaamnahing ijapaaing engkii miege thangvenna paarnawang ichiechuw pien iserkhangkhing ihaajega.
Atatah, inhuwtebe ama asungna ongmeniege isephor ing uwmmaamenie.
Ajienachiinche pienthaam hum sungnahing, ipee rhiihpaa ing ittaagemie, chovechuw aliejohna idemaamie, changgechuw thevang atechuw irhingching abedornaing, pienkhangkhing iserchuw eediega.
Ama rotumching Thangnhang atah rarahching isemge, engkhejege aenhuwte phawang itechuw aandangnaing Chipi Enthiingchuw impeethethehga.
Chonaching aphabekhena enieng belung ngamsanemie, ajiegachiinche heve hum eensungna aeongleching Thangpatho endaagemie.
Enieng emhuw ichelinaching irhingmaagemie changgechuw aethachataana irhingjegemie.
Uwng, enieng belung ngamsanemie, engkhejege humtena asiih euwmnaing, engkhejege Thangpatho eonghaa idiesehga.
Chonaching humna ongjemenie, aasiihching ongjemenie, inieng ama aning chimnachuw imindeenga;
ajienachiinche iniebekheching Khrista waajiir tuna amhinna neervang etegeruw, chotaanaching mibekheching ama ama ing humna atu enhuw ejieng, aetthagejenie aetthamaa gejenie, aatumin phasavate.
Thangnhang attiechuw ouwngshuwsa uwngge mihechuw kimmineem gehe. Thangnhangjeng kinnuwchuw imminghuwsage engkhejege ninnuwjeng nimbelung riirna nimming huwcherga ichie kemindeennaa.
Kinnuw ing ninnhingna kintaaing avonhie empaa samaagung, changgechuw kinnhingtena minghuwtenuwge ninthenening empasahe ttong nimbesangchenaing kintega.
Ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing amamaate kharjenung amachuw Thangnhang nhingtega; engkhejege kimbelungriir chumsajenie amachuw ninrotumga.
Ajiegachiinche Khrista ningsiiching iniechuw ouwngshuwrpe, chonaching kinnuw ing kimmindeen chuwbe mibekhe rotumna thise, engkhejege mibekheje thisehe.
Chonaching irhingheching enthenening rhingluing, emmenie rotum thege ihangrhing Thangpa nhingna arhingnaing Thangpaing mibekhe rotumna ithiega.
Chonaching atebe achuw engkhedong ing hum inhuw ajie khangkhing mindeenmaamie, inieng Khristachuw hum tenakhangkhing mhuwjemenie ate Thangpachuw khangkhing ichie avonhie imhuwchuw iminchinpe.
Chonaching achuw engkheching Khrista nhingna uwmniebe aethar asemchuw ouwngshuwse; ebeerruw, beluwbekhe ttiimge aetharchuw hungeenshuwse.
Aangkheng Thangnhangtenaga; Thangnhangching iniechuw Khrista apaarna ataathoh iminteuhge enhingna aanteuhna nongchuw impeepe.

Amachuwbe Thangnhangching Jesu Khrista apaarna lolhiepaamhie anhingte aminteuga ichiing iminghuwnaga. Miheching isiicher atuchuw teemluing belungrier engkhepang euwm achenaing ttongjiirchuw impeesaape, engkhejege aanteuhna ttongjiirchuw inhingna imminsernape.
Chonaching kinnuwbe Khrista mee ama attongjiir aareenpachuwgung, Thangnhangching kinnhingna iminsernape. Chonaching Khrista rotum kinnuw ing ninnhingna aanchum naing kinhiisaagechuw.
Thangpa apaarna kinnuw ing Thangnhang dhormo icher ahungeen shuwna ing, isiicher aminghuwmaadeh Thangpachuw aerotumna isiicher aatu eensuwga.
Thangnhang nong etuhaa ouwngshuwsa uwngge ninnuw ing Thangnhang ningsiichuw ngarhe epha ouwngshuwlu ing kinnuwjeng kinnhie saagechuw.
Ajiegachiinche amaing arhier,
“Irhupina aphana kieng ningnuwchuw rongewanggechuw,
engkhejege isiichertena imminlen iniena ninnuwchuw boumvanggechuw.”
Ebeerruw, atelehing arhupeena aphaga; ebeerruw, atelehing isiichertena aminlenpee iniega!
Kinnuw ing nong kintule isiicher auwm namaang, ajie engkhe khi minsiena peluing, Thangnhang nong aatuhe khangkhing kintaachuw alham bekhena kimmin dangga:
Ekhaang achenaseh, ijachaam sungna, ija inangbekhena, icherkaarna,
romhor kinsaah kaarna, mikhumsungna enkhumbekhena, ttong isuwhbekhena, ijapaaing nong kintule, ijaar phaluing, vinttaam kintongbekhena;
enthiinglina, kimminghuwlina, isii khaanguwngge, lungsiilina, Chipi Enthiingna, ningsie taalina,
atataa ttonglina, Thangnhang ruwngperna, talitachangtena dhormo icher raar piendeer apaarna,
empaanale enjaphuw euwmnamaana, aettha engkhejege aetthamaa ttongjiirlina, amamaa ittonghe khangchie gejenie atataachuwgung.
Kimminghuw maahe khangkhing uwmjenie, changgechuw atebe imminghuwcherpehe; Ithiethoh enghaajehgung changgechuw rhingnung. Iminjapaahejenie ithehmaahe;
iminjaahejenie aphabekhena nongesanuwng; sara ouwngsuwhkhangjenuwng mi inhimpah sawang kimbesuwga; kindeenchuwbe ajiedong uwmmaa changgechuw kindeencherse.
Korinth na aeong mihe; atataa ittonggung; kimbelungriir ninnhingna kimmindangcherga.
Kinnuw ing kingeetongmaa gechuw changgechuw ningnuw ing ningsiilina ningngeetongsaaga.
Amapaching asitihechuw arhierpee khangkhing kerhierpeegechuw chotaanaching nimbelungriir imhongnuwng rongeruw.
Thachamaa mihetho belungrier engkhepang ing onghaamaaruw. Dhormo icherhele dhormo ichermaa ajiekhang enghaawatekhang?
Khristale Saitaanchuw belungrier engkhepang uwmchevatekhang? Chona athachale athachamaa hechuw aanghaana ajie uwmne?
Thangnhang eenle leh rothahechuw ajiekhang enghaavatekhang? Ajiega chiinche, iniebe irhing Thangnhang een enthiinggemie; Thangnhang ing hanghing arhier:
“Kieng emmeniesungna ongvanggete,
beveje bevevanggete;
Kieng emmenie Thangnhang ouwngshuwningge,
engkhejege emmeniebekhe keta ouwngshuwvatehe.
Chonaching Thangnhang ing arhier,
Ennhingtena jungsuwnung aasiih ongruw,
engkhejege enthiingmaa chuw parmaaruw;
engkhejege kieng aelhaangvang gechuw.
Kieng nimmapa ouwngshuw vanggete,
engkhejege ninnuwng kesapa,
Kesanuw ouwngshuw vangninte,
achehcher Thangnhangching arhierga.”

Chonaching kening keminsii ninnuw, heve ttongneer hie impeepe. Chonaching, inie ihum engkhejege chipichuw amimbour bekhetena minthiingsanuwng, Thangnhangchuw ttiisameniege enthiingchuw alir besuwsateruw.
Nimbelungriirna amhin ipesaruw; kinnuw ing achuwnhingnadong valaar maauwng, achuwdong memaang maauwng, achuw engkhe nhingnadong kingkana tusa maauwng.
Ningnuwchuw aminlaarna kejongmaaga, ajiegachinche ningnuwhie kimbelungriirna euwmgechuw, amachuwbe ningnuwtho thehaarhinghaa vateruw tengge ayen kerhierbesaga.
Ningnuwlina thona ketusaana, elhuwngje lhuwngsaning, belung ngamnaje uwmsaning, ijah inang bekhena kerotha rhohsapaane.
Makedonia kintung nhuwteje kinjah mindeche samaauwng. Engkhe engkhetena belung ijaana thengge, lintaanghethoh ennauwngkuh engkhejege belungrierna enttiisagung.
Belungriir ijahechuw rotha aminrhona apeeche Thangnhangching Titus athengtaana kinnuw kinrotha imminrhope.

Ama ithengpangchuwmaage ningnuw khuna rotha minrhona anhingna asuwtaanajega, amaing kinnhingna ningnuwng ninghaaje, nimbelungriir ijah, kerotumna nimbelungriir ilhuwjechuw atongpe, amaching kie Kerotha rhohsesehne.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuwchuw keleriihing nimbelung minjajenie, amachuw kening tthanamaa uwmmaa; keningtthaanamaa uwmjenie, ama leriiching ningnuwchuw amongpang belung imminjaga ate kieng kemhuwse,

Ateche nimbelungriir aminjana ouwngshuwluing, nimbelungriir ehoungna eenshuwnaing kerotha rhohne; changgechuw ajiekhangchie kinnhingtena aemaangna nimphana maang, Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijieng nimbelungriir keminjape.

Ajienachiinche Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijieng belung ija ching isiichertena aminlen phanaching belung kiena uwmluing belungrier houngna abesuwga; changgechuw lolhiepaam belung aejahching ithiena isuwga.

Ajiegachiinche ibeerruw, Thangnhang amindeen enhuw ijieng ningnuw belungrier kimminjaaching ningnuw ing enriimsachuwge; uwng, nintaaje embeersachuwge, uwng, ningning ichiimaa; uwng, enttiina; uwng, ninghaaje nimmindeen; uwng, belung elhuwpaa; uwng, lholhaa athuwrna ahimbesuwga. Alham bekhena ningnuw nintaaching ama alhamlina minthiingsuwng ichiing nimmin dangse.

Kieing ninnhingna bejiikhangjening, ichamaa aatuhelinamaaga, engkhejege ichamaa tuge adierche amami khujechuw maaga, changgechuw kinrotumna ningnuwchuw immenhehna Thangnhang mhihbeer na ninnhingna amindangna rotum kebejiiga.
Hevelinahing kinnuw belungrier ngamsane.
Kimbelungriir angamnasehchuw, ama pangmaage, ningnuwbekheing Titus belung nimmengamtaanaching enhimseh kinrotha rhosane.
Ajiegachiinche kieng ningnuw khuna anhingna lhuwngsaningbe ningjaa phasamaang; changgechuw kinnuw ing aphabekhena atataachuw kinrhier khangkhing Titus mhekungna kinlhuwngnachuw atataa ouwngshuwvate.
Ama ningsiechuw ninnhingteje ahinthiga, ajiegachiinche amaing ninnuw ing attongrhier nimminjiechuw aanthiese, hanghing ninnuw ing enttiipah ing enchiimchuwge rukoum ninghetuga.
Ninnhingna kebelungriir kemengamtho enrhiing kerotha rhosapaane.
keu kene kesarhe, Makedonia ruwhchanghenhingna ajimindang Thangnhang lungsiichuw kinnuw ing ninnhingna keminthangsaana;

emmenieng ijah ichaamsungna chaang embeerna aenhourhege, changgechuw khangchie kaarna inhimseh rotha irhohsagehe, chona ajiedong adeenmaa sarapah migehe changgechuw iteem ichehmaa khangkhing apeesaagehe.
Ninnhingna atataa kerhierga, emmenieng enchechuw apeegehe, amapangmaage, enchechuw minthihege apeesaagehe.
Ningsiina alhamte enthiing mihe nong ituhaa arhunaing kinnuwchuw engngeh sahgehe.
Hangjehmeh tuvatehe ichiing kimmindeenmaaga, changgechuw entah Thangpa nhingna mensah pedoh hege chona Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijieng kinnhingna impeegehe.
Ayen Titus ing abetthiimbesa khangkhing ningkaarna heve lungsiijehie alir asuwna kinnuw ing kimbettohga.
Ningnuw ing ninthachalina, ninttonglina, nimminghuwcheh lina, nindierchelina, ninningsiilina nimvehna uwmmaa, alhambekhena ihanglhuwngchuw khangkhing heve lungsiilinaje hanglhuwngsaruw.
Hevehie ttongtho impeega ichiing mindeenmaaruw, changgechuw lintaangheching adiirche apaarna ninningsii atatahjechuw chaang ibiir ingge ittongging.
Ajiegachiinche Jesu Khrista lungsiichuw nimminghuwga, amachuwbe, amaing sawangpagejenie, amaing sarah aansuwtaana ningnuw ing sawang ningeenshuwnaing ninnuw rotumna sara ejungeensuwga.
Hevenahing kieng kemindeenchuw keminthiegechuw; ajiegachiinche hevehie ninrotumna ikanaga, ayen lintaang heching men sahege entuchuwpang maage, tuning nintechuw nimbetthiimga.
Nintuna alirchuw ninghena pang ing betthotenuwbe boumning nintepah belungrier ninrintho ouwnglusavate.
Mi engkheing adeenpang pihchuw pesaning teniebe amachuw Thangnhang ching aalhaangga, adeenmaa pihchuwbe nhemaadehnie.
Mi lintaang ing hevehie kanasing, ningnuwchinche ija nimphanaing ketemaaga.

Changgechuw engkhele engkhe aanttim naga, emmenieng adeenhejeching ningnuw nimvehnachuw aminjumnaing, heve aphana nindeenbekheching imvehnachuw ningeephiehching itthaga; amaching intteem samvang nintega.
Hevehie hanghing abejiibesaga, “Inhimpaa amingkongmiching anhingna ajiedong belhiehmaa, engkhejege tepieti amingkong miching avehna uwmmaadeh.”
Changgechuw kebelungriirna keminpah khangkhing Titus belungrierna abeshuw Thangnhangchuw mimpaasateruw.
Ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing kimbetthochuw arhupang linamaage, atah ing mensah abelungrierna mindeenge ewaga.
Amathoh enrhiing aettha ttongjiirlina ruwhchang bekhekaarna impaa arhu unechuw kimvicheerga;
amachuw pangmaaga, Thangpa athanglaar engkhejege kimbethonglina kinnuw ing nong kintu lungsiilina kinnuwtho enrhiing ramkhie isihaa aansuwnaing ruwhchangheching amahie kingeeteurga.
Kinnuw ing nong kintusaa kithur hevelina achuw engkheing kinnuwchuw imminlaar namaaing hevehie kintusaaga.
Hevehie Thangpa mheebeernapang ouwngshuwlu ing mi mhihbeernaje nong bekhe kintuhaanaing mensa kimmindeenbesaga.
Emmeniethoh enrhiing keu kenehe kimvicheerhie apha isihpaaing alhambekhena ibiir uwngge iboum arhu nonglina ittha miga, ningnuwchuw belung mengamsauwngge amaje abelungriir lhuwsapahne.
Titus hiebe kie kilhangga, engkhejege ningnuw rotumna kietho nong kintuhaaga; heve une hehiebe ruwhchanghe Jelha aareengehe, Khrista attheh alaargehe.
Amanaching ninningsii ching engkhejege ningnuw khuna kinlhuwngna abiechuw ruwhchanghe mhekungna ningnuw ing iminthiepeeheruw.
Ate enthiinghenhingna nimboumna alham bekhelina bejiimaajening arhuse,

Nimboum numnumpahga ichie keminghuwtaana Makedonia henhingna belungrier lhuwngsaning, engkhejege Akaia mihechuw ajengkum betthiimge aboumnaing enthongchersehe atechuw keminthanggehe. Nimbelung ilhuwpah ing mi inhimpah belungrier rhingse.
Atelena lhamlinahing belungrier kinlhuwngnachuw ngarhe aansuwnamaang kieing kerhierbesa khangkhing ningnuw ing ningeenthong naing, keu kenehechuw kevicheergehe.
Kiethoh enrhienuwngge Makedonia mihetho kinthengle ningnuw ing bethongneh maatenuwbe ninwnuw pangmaage, kinnuwje ningjaa phawanggungte ninrotum ing hevelina ajiedong irhierphuw uwmmaanie.

Chonaching pewang ninte peehchuw bethongchernuwng, itumaa arhumaaga ichiing mindeenluing apeenaing mensa emmeniehie kecheerga, pening ninte belungrierchuw aandangnaing kethengle bethongchernuwng heseruw.
Amahie behermaaruw; tepiepang abetthehching tepiepang koumvate, engkhejege inhimpah abetthehching inhimpah koumsavate.

Menerluing apeeching Thangnhang aning aminsiitaana, mibekheching nimpeehphana ijehmeh pewang atega atechuw menerluing, itumaa arhuwmaaga ichiing tuluing atah atah ing amindeen enhuw ijieng peresie; ajiegachiinche rotha rhoh apee minhingna Thangnhang ing aning aminsiiga.
Engkhejege alham bekhena, apha bekhena ouwngsuwjor ing aettha nong bekhelina inhimpaa nindeennaing, Thangnhang ing ninnhingna amenhim lungsiina nongbekhe amenhimchega.
Hevehie abejiibesaga,
“Amaing ngarheng asimpiga,
sarahenhingna apiga,
dhormo icherchuw akum ttiimmaanie.”
Sachii abettheh minhingna amhuw, engkhejege savang ichii isaaphuw aapee Thangnhangching amhuwje pewate, enhimje imenhimpiwate, engkhejege dhormo icher aanrachuw eminthipiwate;
Menerludehing apeena iphang ningnuwchuw alham bekhena sawang ibesuwpeewate, chotaanaching inie apaarna Thangnhang mimpaanachuw abesuwchega.
Ajiegachiinche heve nong nintutaana mi enthiinghe emvehnachuw eboumpangmaage, Thangnhang mimpaana seseh ensuwga.

Heve nong nintuching ninthachachuw nimmindangga, mijeching Thangnhangchuw mimpaasavatehe engkhejege ningnuw ing Khrista aettha ttongjiirchuw nimminjiega ajienachiinche ninnuw ing ngarhe ing nimpee heve bekheing mibekheching Thangnhangchuw mimpaa vatehe.
Thangnhangchuw ninnhingna ijehmeh lungsii euwmga ichie minghuwvatehe engkhejege belung elhuwpaaing hinthamsa chevatehe.
Thangnhangtena irhier ichemaa kithurlina Thangnhangchuw empaa ouwngshuwresie.
Ningnuwthoh aeonghaalechingbe kebelungriir esiingpaaga, changgechuw keenkenhuwteche belungrier elhuwngsa Paul ketaaing Khrista belungriir idoung engkhejege abelungrier ittha lina kerhiergechuw;

kinnuwhie humlina isigehe tehege amindeen mi alhehhe taalina kieing kethona mindanggete tengge kemindeenlina kethacha menheh ingge ama thonachuw keongle aminthienamaang kieng ninnhingna kenhiesaagechuw.
Kinnuw ing humna sikhangjenuwng, hum enhuw ijieng raarchuw ouwngteuphuw maa uwng.
Ajiegachiinche raarpihechuw hum tena maaga, changgechuw itthamaa roper abekhiina Thangnhang mhekungna kinchena aeuwmga.
Thangnhangchuw aminghuwchena losingchuw rhumaahege elhuwngmemohbekhe nongbekhechuw bekhieuwngge amana emwaakhar khangchiebekhe akhumna, amaching Khrista ttongrhier aminjienaing kintuga.
Ningnuw ing kinrhier nimminjiechuw alir ninsuwle, irhier aminjiemaa bekhechuw tantie apeena kingeenthongna euwmga.

Nimmana euwm peehe chuw ningnuw ing ningngeebiirga. Achuw engkheing, ataachuw Khrista taging ate ataaching enthachaniebe, ataaching waakhar tusing, amaing kie Khrista ta enshuwsing ate khangkhing kinnuwjegung.
Ate Thangnhng ing impee kintuchelina elhuwngraraagung, ichiinche hevehing ningnuwchuw, nimmaangnamaaga. Chovelinaching kinnuw ing kinning minjaasa maauwng.
Kieing kebejiibekhe leriiching keminttiikhang khing kiechuw ningkharna maang hevehie kerhierga.
Ajiegachiinche emmenieng arhier, “Amaing abejii lerii hechuw iluwpaaga engkhejege perpaane, changgechuw atah amvelechinbe surne, engkhejege attongje ajiedongmaaga.”
Changching amindeen miching raarkhena kingonglena ttongjiir kimvibejii hetho ningkaarna kingonglena hechuw aantthiirna ajiedong uwmmaa ichiechuw minghuw rimheresie.
Changgechuw immhinnapang impaasahe engkaanglhah aanchuwhechuw kintaarna maaga. Enthenen ing entaarnahege enthenen ing itthasehgung tehege entaarnahe emmeniechuwbe aminghuwmaa enhuwrgehe.
Changgechuw kinnuwchuwbe arii minthiuwnge kinlhuwngna tumaauwng changgechuw Thangnhang ching ariichuw insempeecherga amanaching ningkaarna nong kintu hevejehie ama sungnaching kintuga.
Ninnhingna Khrista ttongjiir aettha arinhie kinnuw ing men isarimgung, changgechuw arii elennungge nintaalina arii kingeelenna uwmmaa.
Mi lintaang ing atulina arii ilennungge lhuwngsamaanung, changgechuw Thangnhang ing atu arii sungna ninthacha hangtthasesehsing nongchuw tusateruw.
Ama enhuwteching ninnuwnhingna pangmaage paam lintaangte aettha ttongjiir minjaam chesanungge, amaching mee ing atubesalina kimbelung alhuwngna ajiedong uwmmaanie.
“Achuw engkheching lhuwngsaning teniebe Thangnhangte lhuwngsaresie.”
Ajiegachiinche enthenen empaasachuw rhupeemaa, changgechuw Thangnhang ing arhupihe chuwgethaa.
Kieng tepie kenhuwrtaanahing idiirpeesaruw; ajienachiinche ningnuw ing hevebekhena endiirpeesagechuw.
Ajiegnchiinche enthiing lunghaa khangkhing ningnuwchuw Khristate apinaing, apuwsar engkhepang Khrista nhingna kieing ningnuwchuw kettongnier keminsernagechuw.
Changgechuw berur ichamaa amindeen ching Eve memunage, Amakhangkhing nimbelungriir entehniege belungrier enthiingle enchiim ing Khristachuw mindeen maatenuwmo tengge ittesaning.

Achuw engkhe thengniege kinnuw ing kintong ttongjiirtho enhaaluing lintaang Jesu themin tongniege, engkhejege mensana chipi nimphabesathoh inttimmaa chipi phatenuwge, changmaanieche ayenna ninrhumaa aettha ttongjiir lintaang tongheniege chale ching ikhaang ninchena inhehching ongchetenuwbe itthagechuw.
Kieje ttongjiirpahe kaarna isurseh maaging tengge inteemsaging.
Changgechuw kettonglina ihe esingmaa gejening, mee ing aminghuwlinabe vehsamaang. Changgechuw alhambekhena kinnuw ing engkaarna hevehie ninnhingna kephuwng saaga.
Kieing ninnhingna ngarhe Thangnhang aettha ttongjiir keminjaam taana ningnuw ing ahanglhuwngna kethienening enturpaa isiicher ketugena?
Kieing ninnhingna nong ketuleching lintaang ruwhchangtena ketumin lieingge ningnuwchuw keberute enthagehe.

Kieing ningnuwtho onghaamiege kivehle achuw engkhe nhingna irhiihpah kepeemaaga; ajiegachienche Makedoniatena etheng keu keneheching kevehna bekhe aminteugehe. Engkhejege ningnhingna pee irhiihpaa aansuw namaaing kethienening alham bekhena kedierga, ketaajeng kediersaaga.
Khristatena atataachuw kenhingna auwmtaana Akaia entongtena ikhaamchevang ate uwm maanie.
Ajietuna hanghing kerhierga? Kening minsiimaangchuwge chonamaaga? Thangnhang ing imminghuwse.
Kinnuw ing kintu hangchie kintuga tehege ennajir enthachahe ttongjiirpa lintaanghechuw ennong aminchin naing atele ketuhie tuhvang ketega.
Emmeniechuwbe mi mheebeernapang ttongjiirpagehe eteheresie tehege amindeen, mi amimmuna amamaa ttongjiirpagehe.
Amalina ning amorna ajiedong uwmmaa, amachuwbe, Seitaanjeching ileng thangven michiergung atenaing atuga.
Chotaanaching ama mineheching elengtena minegung entenaing enturihga. Attuhna iniena entu enhuw ijieng phasavatehe.
Avonhie kenuhsahga, achuw engkhe gehejenie kiehie inhuwrga eteniege mindeen maaresie, inhuwrga tetenuwge mindeen tenuwbe kiejeng tepiepang kelhuwngnaing inhuwrkhangkhing iliepiruw.
Kerhier ttonghie Khristaing amindeenchuw maaga; changgechuw kethacha inhuw ijieng kettonglinahing inhuwr khangkhing elhuwngsaging.
Changgechuw miheching humtena belungrier enhuw ejieng lhuwngheniebe kiejeng khangkhing tuvang ketega.
Ningnuwche vierchuwge inhuwrhechuw nindierpisehe.
Achuw engkheching mine ibesuw heniege, athehnaing ijongheniege, nintaalina ekana phaheniege, ejuumheniege, nimmhena eebeen heniege dierchevangninte.
Kie entursapaa ichiekhangkhing kethienening enjoumsaingge ittongging. Chogejenie achuw engkheching ajielinagemo lhuwngsaniebe, inhuwr ngengeching ttongluing kieje elhuwngnachuw kechese.
Emmeniechuw Hebru geheniebe kieje Hebruging, emmenieng Israel sitigeheniebe kieje amachuwging, Abrahamtena isuwh geheniebe kieje amachuwging.
Emmenieche Khrista nong etugehena? Kieing imvipa khangkhing ittonggingkie aetthalhaaging; ketutaanaje kethipaagehe, Mikhumsungna inthinlina kethisehgehe, romhor isaalinaje, ithieje ithiederging.
Jehudiheching romhorbie vosummilliena engkhe aeta vorongameh kephabesaga.
Romhor ing vothummeh embingehe, avonhii lhung ing indeenggehe, vothum Jahaz ikiilina kekhaangga, yen engkhe siim engkhe rimchie sungna kekhaangga;

Ramkhiepang isiging, eva ijemehna ijana kinhur, ouwngruwhekaarna kejana, mipaamtena ijachaam kepha, lintaang yaatihe-nhingtena ijah kepha, khupuwna ijah kepha, rampakaarna ijah kepha, rimchiesungna ijah kepha, echummaa unehenhingtena kejaana,
kenoumtaana kejaana, jaarcheluing kekhaangna, vinttaamchiihaar kekhaang, aphabekhena vinttaam ketong, pharbiena pienserphuw euwmmaa.
Taangtena ijabekhe kepha taalina, ruwhchanghelina kebelungriir ijah aanasiir ketaalina enderse.
Achuw engkhe asurtaalina kieje isurmaaging? Achuw engkhe ijanang aphalina kieje ijaanachuw kekhaang saamaakhang?
Kieing lhuwngsaningbe, kie kesurna anhimtaana lhuwngsa gete.
Thangpa Jesu Thangnhangje ouwngshuw aemapaje ouwngshuw, ittiim inemaaing mimpaavang ichie Thangnhangching amamaa ittongmaaging ichie aminghuwse.
Damaskasna eruwng Aretas derna lepaa aapuching suwrgete itege Damaskas khupuwchuw aaher.
Engkhejege kiechuw bekaangsungna aethaarhege ropar enlongna ijibebohege akilitena irhingsaging.
Kieng kekana uwmmaajenie, lhuwngsagete; ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing immindangpee engkhejege emphuwngpi bekhechuw rhiersagete.
Kum suwmmalhie millie aphape kieing Khristana aeong mi engkhechuw aminthumna Thangvente arhiepe, (hum aeuwmga aeuwm maaga minghuwmaang, Thangnhang aminghwuse.)
Hangchie michuw kieng keminghuwse (hum emvega emvemaaga minghuw maang, Thangnhang aminghuwse)
Amachuw Paradise te arhiepe, engkhejege tepang ing irhierjoh arhumaa, aettong arhumaa ttong amaing athie.
Hanchie milina kieing lhuwngsagete, changgechuw kie ketaalinabe kesurtaa namaage, lhuwngsa maaning.

Ajiegachiinche kieing elhuwngchuw ideningbe, kie enhuwr ouwngsuwmaaning, ajiegachiinche kieng atataachuw rhiervanggete; Changgechuw achuw engkheching aemhuwjenie, kenhingtena athiegejenie, minthiniege kielina awaakhar minlhuwniege tengge kieing esiingsaging.
Immindangpee ittiishuw papa linaching lhuwngsavate tege ketaalina ilhing engkhe kebechiina impeepe, amahie kelhuwngna maang, kiechuw iminjanavang ichii Saitan michierchuwga.
Heve hangchiehie iliepijohre tengge Thangnhangte vothum kenhie saaga;

Engkhejege amaing kenhingna arhier, “kieing kepeechie lungsiihie nanhingna ouwngshuwne, ajiegachienche kieing kepi ruwngperhing isurlina ouwngshuwga” Amanaching Khrista ruwngper ketaalina auwmna ing kevehna tahlina kerotha irhohsaging.
Amanaching kisurtahlina, ningjaa kephalina, ijah chaamlina, immenanghelina, icherpaa auwmlina kening chiesane; ajiegachienche kieng kesurleching ipersaging.
Kie inhuwrchuw ouwngshuwsing. Ningnuw ing hangraa embesuwgechuw; ajienachiinche ningnuw ing emimpaavang ninte rarahga, kie ajiedong maagejening kie ttongjiirpahe lintaang tenatho isursamaaging.
Ketuna abiehechuwbe, luliimna nong ketu, ittiishuwpah nong ketulina, ittiisuwpaa nong ketulina kekhaangche bekhenaching ningkaarna ttongjiirpa aandangna abiehechuw ketusaaga.
Ajiegachiinche iboumvang ninte nonglina nimpih arhiina maang ruwhchang lintaang lintaangtena ningnuw ing ninsurna ajie uwmnechuwkhang? Kelaarnahie ikuhpisaruw.

Ninnhingna avominthumna kethengnaing enthongingge, hena ongning, engkhejege nimpih minrhiimaaningchuw, ajiegachiinche ningpeehechuw ketemaaga, nintaachuw kejonggechuw; ajienachiinche asitiheching amapa amanuwhe rotum minghuwngmaanie, changgechuw amapa amanuwheching asitihe rotum minghuwngvang atega.
Chipina ninrhingnaing kedeenbekhe rotharhoing minlhuwsaningge, engkhejege ketaaje pedohgete ketega. Kieing ningnuwchuw keningminsiiningchuwbe ningnuwche ninning iminsii chuwchuw maavang nintega?
Kiehie nimpih rhiina ouwngsuwsamaang ichiehie ningnuwjeng minghuw siengnungte. Kieing mincheningchuwge kechaangna euwh khangkhing achuw engkheching mindeensiete.
Kieing kevicheer emmenie achuw engkhe apaarna ninnhingtena kieng kekana kephapena?
Thacha une engkhetho Tituschuw kevicheerga. Titusching ninnhingtena ajiekhangchii aekana aliebesa uwmne? Chipi engkhepangna isihaa alham engkhepangna kinjiehah maagekhang?

Nimbelungriirnache apha hangjehmeh sungna kinnuw ing ninnhingna inuumsa uwnghie kirotum kintusaaga ichiiing nimmindeenga? Changmaaga! Thangnhang mheebeerlina Khrista nhingna ittonggung, unehe, kintusaabekhehie ningnuwchuw ahanglhuwngnaing kintusaaga.

Kinttiinachuwbe kethengkhohle kieing kihdie ngenge ningnuwchuw kephamaaje arhuwse, engkhejege ningnuw ing ningeediemaa ngenge kiechuw ningnuw ing imhuw vangninte; enna ouwngkuh, kallaana, ther iphuwrpah, arinne ajong, mi bekhena nong, aettong thaangthaang, elhuwngttittuh, echuwchaamaa, engkhele engkhelina ttong isuwh, khangchie aeuwm arhuse.

Kie keenttiinachuwbe avonhie kethengleching Thangnhang ing nimmhekungna kiechuw injimindour, imminsiing arhuse, engkhejege ayen isiicher tuhege emmenieng entubesa enthiingmaa, naamaa itu engkhejege, echuw chaamaalina belungrier ahuwngmaa emmeniebekhe rotum kieing keselungriirna ttaasavanggete.
Kieng thengvang ketehie aminthumnaga. “Mi ennhie ouwngthum nherna saarkhie apeena meneervanggechuw.”

Mensang isiicher aatuhenhingna, engkhejege lintaanghe nhingna kerhierbesaga, engkhejege kieing amenhiena keonglena khangkhing, atele ongmaa jening, mensang kerhierga, amachuwbe kieing avonhii thengningbe, emmeniechuw karpimaahening.
Ajiegachiinche Khristaing kesungna ittongga ichii aandangna ningnuw ing ninjongga; ningnuw aminchuwna Thangpahie isurmaaga, changgechuw ningnuw sungna atuchega.

Thingkherlina athileching atuchenachuw tumaajenie Thangnhang atuche apaarna ihangrhingga. Ajienachiinche inieje Thangpatho isursagemie changgechuw Thangnhang ruwngperching inieje Thangpatho hangrhingwateruw.

Ningnuw ing ninthachana ongnechuwmo ongmaachuw nintaaing chaang embeerruw; nintaa enjongsaruw. Changmaanieche Jesu Khristachuw nimbelungriirna ongne ate nintaaing uwnghuw maachuw? Uwmmaaniebe, ningnuw ing chaang embeer maasechuw.
Changgechuw kinnuw ing heve chaang embeernaing kintuchemaa uwmma ichiehie mhuwchevang ninte.
Kinnuwhie ajiedongmaa khangkhing uwmjenung ninlaarna maaing Thangnhangte kinthampeegechuw, amahie itu kinchega teuwngge kimmin dangnamaaga.
Ajienachiinche kinnuw ing atataachuw rhumaa uwngge ajiidong etu chemaauwng, changgechuw atataa rotumga.
Ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing kinchemaale engkhejege ningnuw ing ninchele kinnuwje kinrotha irhohga; ninnuw ingnintthaa naseh kinghinthamsaana.
Thangpaing impee enhuw ijieng abekhiinamaa, aatthanaseh ahintunaing kethengle eperpah ing kerhaangnamaang raalkhena keongle kevibejiiga.

Attuhtaana, keu kene kesarhe, lhamsuw kethennaachuw! Atthaanaseh etupeeruw, keminimsaachuwhie irhupeeruw, belungrier enlehruw, idejeh paarsaruw, Thangnhang aningsii engkhejege adejiimching ningnuwchuw inrhiiphuwresie.
Enthiing himbeeng ouwngjunung engkhele engkhe enrhiimsaruw.
Mi enthiingheching raalkhena lhamsuw enthennaahe.
Thangpa Jesu lungsii, Thangnhang ningsii, amana Chipi Enthiinglina engkhepang ningumnaing inrhiiphuwresie.
Mee tenamaa, mee ing atutana ihungviemaa changechuw Jesu Khrista tena engkhejege Thangpachuw ithiehekaartena aminrhing amapa Thangnhang tena ttongjiirpa ihoungvie Paul ing,
Galatiana aeong ruwhchanghe nhingna hevena aeong unepasahetho keberhiimsah naachuw.
Imapa Thangnhang engkhejege Jesu Khrista lungsii engkhejege dejiim chuw ninnhingna uwmresie.
Imapa Thangnhang engkhejege amaing amindeen enhuw ijieng heve apha sungna euwm itthamaa lolhiepaamtena iniechuw engkarpeenaing Khristaing atah raraa isiicher etulina impeesape.
Ittiim inemaa athang alaarchuw anhingna ouwngshuwresie.
Khrista lungsiilina Thangnhangching iniechuw aeeensage amachuw bethinchuwge lintaang aettha ttongjiir engkhete enrang isichuwhie kening rhiipaane.
Heve aettha ttongjiirhie lintaang engkhe maaga, mi alheh ing nimbelung ning emmemorhege, Khrista aettha ttongjiirchuw amamaate ingkigehe.
Changgechuw kinnuw ing ninnhingna kimminjaam aettha ttongjiirtena enlejejoh ttongjiir engkhe kinnuw rarahing changmaanieche thangventena michier engkheing minjaamniebe amaang seraap pharesie.
Kinnuw ing ayen kinrhierkhangkhing, kieng ateleje avonhii kerhierga, amachuwbe achuw engkheing nimphabesatena enlejejoh aettha ttongjiir engkhe tongheniebe, amaang seraap pharesie.

Ajiegachiinche kieing atele miheching arhuna kejongga, changmaa nieche Thangnhang taga? Changmaanieche kieing mihechuw belung akinaing ketuga? Ateleje kieing mi belung kina tuningbe, kieng Khrista mine hinsuwhmaavang ketega.
Keu kene kesarhe, amahie kerhierpigechuw: Ninnhingna keminjaam aettha ttongjiirhie mitena maaga.
Achuw nhingtenadong kilhaangmaaga, engkhejege tam ingge kihetena maaga, changgechuw kieing Jesu Khristaing ajihmindangpi apaarna kephasaaga.
Ayen Jehudihe dhormona kesile ketubekhechuw ninthiebesaga, kieng Thangnhang ruwhchangchuw veh kemincher amana amemaangna ketuga;
kemapa kemapuheching poraa insinachuw enhimseh kebelungriir lhuwge, keyaati, kemihe kaarna Jehudihe dhormolina men aesapachuwging.
Changgechuw lintaang yaatihe kaarna kiechuw Thangnhang Sapachuw akhu keminjaamna nonglina kemanuw vinsungna keuwmle ekhepeesage,
Thangnhang lungsii apaarna ingeenching kesungna Thangpachuw immindangpeetaana, yaati lintaangte aettha ttongjiir keminjaamna impeega, kieing tepangtena ttong siisa maaing.
Jerusalemna aeong kemana ttongjiirpahe nhingnarah thengmaing. Mensang Arabia paamte vasiver ingge, aanhuwna Damaskaste ehungeenliging.
Kumthum inhuwte Piterchuw kehangvirche amathoh inie summalhie ronga meh icheengging.
Thangpa nepa Jakob maaniege ttongjiirpa lintaanghe ouwngteumaauwng.
Hevebekhehie keminchemaa gechuw, Thangnhang mhekungna kebejiiga.
Ama inhuwna kieing Siria paamte engkhejege Silisiate engkeging.
Hevebekhena Judiatena thacha ruwhchangheching eminghuwmaalhiehe.
Emmenieng enthiechuwbe, “Mensangche veh immincherhege, aebekhievang ichie aatu miching ateche thacha lhamte themin atongna!” atehiega.
Chonaching kieng heve ketutaana emmenieng Thangnhang amimpaagehe.
Kum shuwm malhie millie aanhuwte Jerusalemte Barnabasthoh thenguwngge, Titusje kinrhiega.

Kesinachuw Thangnhang ajihmindang inhuw ijieng isiging. Ajihmindang inhuw ijieng ttongjiirhie ajiekhang yaati lintaanghe nhingna keminjaamga ichiehie ouwngruwruw ing upahe nhingna keminthangga, changgechuw mensang ketule, atele ketuhehie ngarhe aemaangchuw kerhumaaga.
Ramkhii isihaa Titushie Greektena migumpachuw vin tinrarahresie temaahe.
Changgechuw kinnuwhie mine aansuwnaing, Khrista Jesu apaarna kinnuw ing kimphasah ningvesangna kinttong riirtena arongenachuw aabiirna ouwngruwruw ing aevalhuw unehechuw aminlhuwtaa nahe isuwgesiete;
Aettha ttongjiir atataachuw ningnuwtho auwmjehnaching ennhingna kinnuw ing pungpha amongpangje enderna valhuwmaauwng.
Engkhejege upa aachinghegung ateheching kenhingnabe emmeniechuw ajiedongmaagehe, ajienachiinche Thangnhang ing mimheh aabiirmaaga, emmenieing ithisehmaahe.
Engkhe eentongteche vintinhe rotum aettha ttongjiirchuw Piter nhingna aminserkhangkhing, kenhingna vintin maahe rotum aettha ttongjiirchuw emminsernape atechuw emmhuwche.
Ajiegachiinche vintinhe ttongjiir nonglina Piter rotum apih Thangnhangching lintaang yaatihe nhingte kerotum impeesape;

Kenhingna impee lungsiichuw ruwhchanghe ichuwbor ouwngsuwh enromhing Jakob, Kephas, engkhejege Johon heching imminghuwche Barnabasle kiechuw yaatilintaang henhingte, engkhejege emmenieche vintinhekaarna siheniege nong entusehnaing entachangna kie embesuwgehe.
Sara savehechuw behermaavang nintega kintechuw amindeengehe; amararahchuw kieje belung keminlhuwga.
Piter ing alaarna auwmtaana Antiok avatungle amhe kungnarah kerukuga.

Ajiegachiinche Jakobnhingtena vintinhechuw avatung maa lhiele amaing lintaang yaati mihetho ensaahaahe; changgechuw emmenieng avatungheche vintinhechuw attietaana, athienen ing aanhuw inlige aantthena lham ajongpe.
Jehudi lintaanghejeng amathoh enrhiehege aetthachaang tuhege Barnabasjechuw emmenieng amamaate arhiepehe.

Emmenieching aettha ttongjiir atataachuw minjiemaa sehe ate kemhuwtaana, emmeniebekhe mhekungna kieing Kephas, Piter nhingna kerhier, “Nang ing Jehudiche ouwngshuwchiege Jehudihe atukhangkhing simaachiege, yaati lintaangheching ouwngtukhangkhing siteniebe, yaati lintaanghechuw Jehudihing atukhangkhing minjieresie natega?”
Enieje Jehudi ing emberhingga engkhejege, isiikha atuhe yaati lintaang maagemie;

changgechuw Jesu Khrista athachataana Thangnhang nhingna ichumchuw aphagehe, waajiir ttongtho anong atuching achumnachuw aphamaaga atechuw iminghuwga. Khrista aethachataana inieje Thangnhang nhingte ichum aphanang temiege Khristachuw ithachaga. Waajiir ttongtho iminjieching achuwdong Thangnhang ing minchumpeemaa.

Khrista tho eenchumtaanaching Thangnhang nhingte imminchumnaing itugenieche inieje yaati lintaang hetho inttimjeh isiicher ituhaaga ichiehie endangga, changgeechuw amachuwgenieche Khristaching isiicher nong atuga? Amachuw maaga.
Ajiegachiinche kerhumaabesa peechuw avonhie hintuningbe, ketaaing aelaar aatuging ichie keminthiega.
Ajienachiinche Thangnhang nhingte arhingnaing waajiir ttongtho apaarna kie waajiir ttongtho lina ithieging.

Kieching Khristatho enrhing thingkherlina ithiehaa kimphape; engkhejege atele irhing inghie kiemaaging, changgechuw kesungna Khristachuw irhingga; engkhejege kieng atele humna kerhingna irhing kephahie kiehie aning imminsii kerotumna ithie Thangnhang sapachuw athacha apaarna kie irhingsaging.
Thangnhang lungsiichuw kieng ngarhe besuwmaang, ajiegachienche waajiir ttongtho apaarna aminchumchuw iphageniebe Khristachuw ngarhe ithiega.
Enhuwr Galatia mihe! ninning emmemorhe achuw aeuwmgehe? Nimmhekungnarah Jesu Khristachuw thingkherlina athehechuw nimmhuwcherleching!
Ningnuw nhingtena engkhepang minghuwning ketenaa: Chipi Enthiing nimphahie waajiir ttongtho nintutaa nagemo, changmaa nieche aettha ttongjiir ninthiechuw ninthachatana nimphaga?
Ijehme enhuwrgechuw? Chipi Enthiinglina nimbettiimching ate humlina nimbettuhga?
Changjehmeh ijachuwching ngareh ing imaang arhuga? Amachuw geniebe atataa ngarhehing nintuga.
Chonaching Chipi Enthiing apaarna nintuchena phachuwge ningkaarna mee ing atuchemaa nintukhache waajiir ttongtho nimminjietaanagemo changmaanieche aettha ttongjiir ninthiechuw ninthacha taanaga?
“Abraham ing Thangnhangchuw thachage anhingna dhormo icherga tega amindangga,”
chonaching athachatena ihuwngsuw emmeniechuwbe Abraham sitigehe ate minghuwruw.
Engkhejege yaati lintaangheching enthacha apaarna minchumpeevatehe tege aettha ttongjiirna mensarim Thangnhang ing arhierbesaga, “Yaatibekhe nanhingna bor phawatehe.”
Chovelinahing, athacha bekheching Abrahamthoh borchuw aphagehe.

Ajiegachiinche Waajiir ttongtho lina nong aatubekheching seraapsungna inthingehe, ajienachiinche hevehie enjiibesaga, “Waajiir ttongtho leriina abejiibesa bekhechuw tumaaheniege, aminjiemaa mibekhe seraap aphabesagehe.”
Thangnhang mhekungna waajiir ttongthoching achuwdong ing aminchumna pemaa atehie atataaga, ajiegachienche dhormo icherching athachaching rhingvate.
Waajiir ttongthohie athacha tena maaga; changmaaniebe, “Achuw engkheing waajiir ttongtho anong minjieniebe, amaching rhingvang atega.”
Khristaing inie rotumna seraapchuw ringe inie waajiir ttongtho seraapchuw aatinpe; ajiegachienche hevehie abejiibesaga, “Thingkherlinna intheh mibekhe seraap aphabesaga.”
Khrista Jesu apaarna Abraham borchuw yaati lintaanghenhingna alir asuwnaga, engkhejege inieng ithacha apaarna Chipi Enthiing ttongneer chuw phawang aetega.

Keu kene kesarhe, kieng hum inhuw ijieng irhingle isina alhamchuw mindanggete: Tepangtena ttongniergejenie amachuw atudoh nhuwnabe achuwdong ing amachuw ngareh ing tumaa, changmaanieche, ajiegemo engkhedong thinchehmaa.
Ttongneerhechuw Abrahamnhingte, engkhejege atuti baasiinnhingna arhierbesaga, “Atuti abaasiin he” mi inhimpah aandangna arhiermaaga, changgechuw engkhepanglina arhierga, amachuwbe Khristaga.

Kerhiernachuw hevehiega: Thangnhangching ttongdeenchuw semge amachuw alir suwgete tege, ama waajiir ttongthochuw kum chamillielhie sumthum enhuwte ithengga amaching ttongneerchuw bekhiechemaanie engkhejege Thangnhang ing ttong adeenbesajechuw betthiir chemaanie.
Ajiegachiinche phawang atechuw waajiir ttongtho tenageniebe amachuw ttongneertena ethengmaaga. Changgechuw Thangnhang ing Abraham nhingte ttongneer apaarna arhupiga.

Chogenieche waajiir ttongthochuw ajiega? Ttongnier aphabesa Thangpaching ajuwngmaataang miheching atu aetthamaa-bekhe aminghuwchena ing ahinthinga. waajiir ttongthochuw minven michierhe apaarna aminteupipa akeenaching atuche nachuw athinga.
Aminteupipa chuwbe mi engkhepang rotummaaga, changgumpachuw Thangnhang chuwbe engkhepangga.

Waajiir ttongthoching Thangnhang ing ttong adeenchuw arhu maagana? Amachuwmaa resie, ajiegachienche waajeer ttongthoching irhingna apeechuw ouwngshuwnieche, waajiir ttongtho apaarna miheching dhormo icher phavang ategehe.
Changgechuw aettha ttongjiirching isiicher aderna akhumcherpe, amanaching thacha apaarna attongneerchuw Jesu Khrista athachahenhingna pevang atega.
Thachahie athengmaa lhiele engkhejege thachahie amindangmaa lhiele waajiir ttongtho aderna ikhumge enrhungga.
Changgechuw thacha apaarna iniechuw imminchumpeenaing Khrista athengmaataang waajiir ttongthoching inghinrhiega.
Ateche aethacha apha inie chuw ahimphataanaching iniechuw enrhii mine adernaching uwm maasemie.
Chonaching ningnuwbekheing ninthacha apaarna Jesu Khristalina Thangnhang siti ouwngsuwsechuw.
Ajiegachiinche Khrista nhingna chii iluh emmenie bekheing pien enserkhangkhing Khristachuw asergehe.
Jehudije Greekje neluing, mineje, aapuwje neluing, pesarje, nepenuwje nemaa, ningnuwbekhe Khrista Jesunhingna engkhepanggechuw.
Ningnuw ate Khrista mi getenuwbe, Abraham sitisine ttongneerlina irii akuumhechuw ouwngsuwsechuw.
Kieing kerhierchuwbe irii kuumvang ichii miching adounglebekhe, amaang iuwmbekhelina aapuw ouwngshuw jenie minetho inttimjehgehe;
changgechuw amapa ing bie ateem iniechuw ahimphamaataang amaing arhuwngpigehe, pih apanahe aderna aeongga.
Khevekhangkhing enieng nepang iuwmleching lolhiepaamna asina derna isuwrge ensiiga.
Changgechuw apha inie chuw avienhuwte Thangnhang ing nepenuw ing aberhing waajiir ttongtho aderna aberhing asapa ajincheerpe.
Heve asapaching waajiir ttongtho derna aeheonghechuw aatinpinaga, hanghing inieng ihinjuh sapahe khangkhing eensuwnaga.
Ningnuwbe asapahe ningeensuwtaana Thangnhang sapa chipichuw ninsungna thaarge, isungna aeong chipiching “Abba, ipa” tege ahimphuwngga.
Chonaching nang mine ouwngshuwmaasechie, changgechuw asapa ouwngshuwsechie; asapachuw ouwngshuwteniebe, Thangnhang apaarna irii aakuumchuw ouwngshuwsechie.
Thangnhang nimminghuwmaa lhiele anunu iuwm lehhechuw asepa nintuga.

Atebe Thangnhangchuwninghimminghuwpe, changmaanieche Thangnhangching ningnuwchuw imminghuwpe, amachuw geniebe ajietunaching isurhe amana ouwngturpah ing insina lhamte ajiekhang avonhii inligechuw? Amate avonhii mine ouwngshuw ningeediega?
Ningnuw ing inie, atha, apha engkhejege kumchuw elupaaing anong nintuga!
Ningnuwlina hangjehmeh ijachaam kephasaahie maangrong atega tengge enttiisaging.
Kilhanghe, kenhiisaagechuw, ningnuw khangkhing iongsaging chonaching ningnuwjeng kie hanghing aeongpisaruw. Ningnuw ing ketaalina itthamaa nintuje uwmmaa.
Emindeenpisaruw, ketaa kenaana uwmge kesurtaana mensarim ninnhingna aettha ttongjiir keminjaamga;

kieing hanghing keuwmtaana ninnhingna chaang embeer engkhechuw ningnuw ing tho ninsamaa changmaanieche ninrhumaa etupimaachuw; changgechuw Thangnhang michier khangkhing, Jesu Khrista ngenge kiechuw rukuum ouwngtugechuw.
Chonaching ningnuw tthanachuw akhutega? Kieng ninnhingna saarkhii kepeegechuw, amachuwbe, chetenuwbe, nimmhih ikherjohtenuwge kiechuw ipening tevang nintega.
Chogenieche ninnhingna atataa keminchuwtaanachuw kiehie ningnuwng ouwngrhumaa ehung eensuwging?
Emmenieng belungriir elhuwpaaing ningnuwchuw enjongmaaga, changgechuw ningnuw ing belungriir elhuwpaa ninjongnaing emmenieng ningnuwchuw aamvena maaing aadiegehe.
Changgechuw kie ninnuwtho aeonghaalepang ouwngshuwluing, aphabekhena aettha nong ituna nintaalina belungriir ilhuwhechuwbe itthapahga.
Kening keminsii nepanghe, ninsungna Khrista rothachuw aanthin maataang ninrotumna nedoung aberhingle inapaa khangkhing kieje uwmsaning.
Ningnuwlina kebelungriir ajalamthiching ningkaarna ongningge kirur minteh ningge asiih entehjoning ketenaa.
Wajiir ttongtho derna ongning ate ningnuw aebesangruw: waajiir ttongtho chuw rongemaachuw?
Ajiegachiinche hevehie abejiibesaga, amachuwbe Abraham ing sapa ennhie adeen, engkhechuw mine nepenuw ing aberhing, engkhechuw ningvesang ing aberhing.
Mine nepenuw ing aberhingchuw humtenaga, changgechuw ningvesangtenachuwbe ttongneerlina aberhingga.
Ama aandangna chuwbe, nepenuw ennhiehie ttongneer ennhiechuwga; engkhechuw Sinai boungtena mine ouwngshuw vang ate aanrhing Hagarchuwga.
Hagarhie Arab lepaatena euwm Sinai boungga, atelena Jerusalemtho enghaaga, changgechuw Jerusalemhie asitihetho mine ongnehe.
Changgechuw lintaang nepenuwchuwbe thangventenaga, amabe ningvesang tenaga, amabe imanuwga.
Ajienachiinche hevehie bejiihge iuwmbesaga.
“Neh aberhingmaa nang ing rotha rhosare;
lhaahtu khangkhing uwngruw;
nedoung aberhingna ijah phamaachuw;
ajiegachienche apuwsar euwm nepenuwtena athienen itieng nepenuw sitiheching nhimne.”
Kilhanghe, ate ningnuwbe Isaak khangkhing ttongneer sitigechuw.
Changgechuw chalena humtena aberhingching Chipite ithiechuw aminja khangkhing ateleje ehungviega.
Changgechuw aettha ttongjiir ing ajie arhierse? Mine nepenuwle asitichuw thor, ajienachiinche mine nepenuw sapaching ningvesang nepenuw sapatho irii akuumna uwmmaa.
Chonaching, kilhanghe, iniebe mine nepenuw siti maagemie, changgechuw Ningvesang nepenuw sitigemie.
Ningvesang ing euwm ichehna Khristachuw geniebe ningvesang immimphape; Chonaching inhehpaaing neerruw, engkhejege Mineching arin pee avonhie rinmaaruw.
Rongeruw! Paul kieng kerhierpigechuw, amachuwbe, ningnuw ing vitin nongchuw rhutenuwbe Khrista hie ninrotumna ajiedong kana maase.
Vintin aarhuhe nhingna avonhie saarkhii kepinaachuw, chovechuwbe, emmenieching waajiir ttongtho bekhe atunaing ler aturgehe.
Waajiir ttongtho apaarna echum aphana aatu ningnuwbe Khristatena arhuw empehse; lungsiitena jungtiehsechuw.
Ajiegachiinche iniebe Chipi apaarna ithachaching dhormo icherchuw mindin miege aehaaga.
Ajienachiinche Khrista Jesu nhingna vintinheje vintin maaheje ajiedong kanamaa; changgechuw ningsii apaarna etu aethacha amachingga.
Ningnuw aetthajeh ing tennechuw; atataachuw aminjiena achuw ingche arhu maaga?
Heve embetthohhehie ningnuw ingeen Thangnhang chuwmaaga.
Chor tepiepang ing atumbekhe amimpourga.
Ningnuw ing lintaang belungrier rinmaachuw tengge kieng ningnuw khuna Thangnhang kethachaga; changgechuw ningnuwchuw imminja mi amachuw, achuw chuwgejenie entaalina awaajiir ttumsavate.
Changgechuw kilhanghe, ate iphang vintin khu minjaamtenuwche, ajielina kiehie atele iphang imminjagechuw? Chonaching thingkher ttong keminjaamhie khih minsiina ouwngsuwmaanie.
Ningnuwchuw immindechemaa emmeniechuw vintintena ithi ing ataaje intinbangniebe, kening tthavang atega.

Keu kene kesarhe, ningnuwhie ningvesang aphanaing ingeenpe; hevelina, ningnuw ing ningvesang nimphachuw hum nong etuna rotum ing tumaaruw, changgechuw ningsie apaarna engkhele engkhe suwhkhangkhing sepa ouwngtusaruw.
Ajienachiinche, waajiir ttongtho aangkhenghie ttong engkhepang ing alir asuwga, amachuwbe, “nang ing veemchaanghechuw nataa ngenge naning minsiivang natega.”
Changgechuw ningnuw ing engkhele engkhe insitenuwbe ningnuw engkhele engkhe emmoh cher vangninte ichielina enriimsaruw.
Kieng kerhierchuwbe Chipi apaarna siruw, engkhejege hum ing aadiehchuw alir besuwmaaruw.

Ajiegachiinche hum ing aadieching Chipi nongchuw arhumaaga, engkhejege Chipi ing aadieching hum nongchuw arhumaaga; ajienachiinche ningnuw ing ningeedieh bekhe nintunamaaing, heve ennhiehie engkhele engkhe ouwngrhu maahege aeuwmgehe.
Ningnuwchuw Chipiching irhieniebe waajiir ttongtho derna ongmaachuw.
Humtena ehungtheng nonghechuwbe hevehehiega; ennajir naamaa etuhe, enthiingmaa, ketho belungrier,
leh rotha arum, enser nong etu, raar beshuwna belungrier, aehar belungrier, enna ouwngku, enner, belung isii areennepang aabiir, abekhienapang atu, adoung achang amene,

Mita amener, zuw ouwngruw, atu aanlhiing itthamaa heve hangchie tho enghaabekhe chuwga; hangchie nonghehie anunu aatuheching Thangnhang lepaachuw phachemaanie tengge mensang keminthiechuw khangkhing, kieng ateleje hevelina mensang kerhierga.
Changgechuw Chipitena ishuw aanrachuwbe: Ningsii, rotha rhona, belungrier enleh, isi aekhaang ache, belung aettha, aettha nong aadie, athacha aettha,
Belungriir edoung, ataa ouwngsuwrche, hangchiehe tahlina waajiir ttongtho ajiedong uwmmaa.
Chona Khrista Jesutena mihechuwbe hum ing aadie engkhejege angepah hechuw thingkherlina athehpe.
Chipinaching rhingmeniebe, amalinaching isije sisateruw.
Engkheing engkhe tahlina ouwngshuw memoh ing uwmluing, engkheing enkhe tahlina belung siihna tuluung enkheching engkhe tahlina enner belungrier mengum maavang aetega.
Kilhanghe, achuw engkheching kaa valaar niege ninshuwrgeniebe Chipina euwm ningnuwching belungriir idejeh ing minchumpisaruw, engkhejege ningnuwjeng aetthamaaching embetheem namaang enriimsaruw.
Engkhele engkhe nimpeeh irhiichuw ouwngdumsaruw, hanghing Khrista waajiir ttongchuw alir besuwruw.
Achuw engkheing ataasaachuw ajiedongmaa Khangkhing uwmniege changgechuw amaing mi engkheging teniebe athienening emmusaga.
Mi bekheing atah atah ing atuchuw chaang embeerresie, mee ing atuthoh mindeenluing, ataaching atusha nong alhuwngnachuw atahching phasawate.
Ajienachiinche mibekhe atah atah ing apeehchuw rinsaresie.
Ttongjiirchuw aalhaangmiching aminchuwpi anhingtena atthana alhambekhelina bumsavang atega.
Nintaaing enchesamaaruw emmuna maaruw. Thangnhangchuw achuwdong ing enchephuwga temaaresie, ajiegachienche atah atah ing avorchuw kuwmsavang atega.
Ajienachiinche atah ing hum nonglina vorniebe atah ing ahumtena imaangnachuw kuwmsavate; changgechuw Chipilina amhuw avorching Chipitena ittiim inemaa irhingchuw kuwmsavate.
Ittha nong etuleching jasamaa menie; ajiegachienche ittha etuchuw minchinluing tujehmeniebe apha engkhena kuwmsavang eetega.
Chogeniebe enieng apha iphalehing engkhejege ama itheeng thacha eenkuw henhingna itthachuw tusateruw.
Ibeerruw, ajiih enrhorpah ing ninnhingna keki ing kebejiiga!
Hum mhesuw aminthie aadie bekheching ningnuwchuw harir ing vin atinnachuw immintugehe; Khrista thingkher khuna ningnuwchuw immin janamaa panggetha.
Ajiegachiinche vintinhe rarahjeng entaaing waajiir ttongthochuw minjiemaahe; changgechuw emmenieng ningnuw ninghum khuna lhuwngsaning entetaana ningnuwchuw vintin immintu numnumgehe.
Changgechuw Thangpa Jesu Khrista thingkher khuna maaniege kelhuwngnachuwbe ouwngsuwmaaresie, ama apaarna lolhiepaamching kenhingte, amana kieing lolhiepaam entongte thingkherlina thising.
Vin atinching changmaanieche atinmaaching ajiedong maaga, changgechuw aangkheng ithar asemchuwga.
Arhing punsie sungna heve nong anunuhie aminjiele heching Thangnhangching Israel mihenhingna belungriir dejiim engkhejege ningsienachuw phasaheresie.
Atebekhe achuwdong ing veh emincher maaheresie, Ajienachiinche Jesu rotumna ketaalina bie kerin hevehing Khrista amineging ichii amindangga.
Keu kene kesarhe, Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii ninchipitho enrhiesaresie. Amen.
Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijieng Jesu Khrista ttongjiirpa Paul–
Ephesiana eonghe Jesu Khristanhingna athachapah enthiing mihenhingna:
Emapa Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista aningsiithoh belungrier dejiimchuw ninrotum ouwngshuwsaresie.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista amapaje ouwngshuw Thangnhangchuw mimpaawang aetaga! Khristanhingna iniechuw minven alolah amhin iuwmhesungna chipi kithur impeepe,
Lolhiepaam asemmaa lhiele Thangnhangching iniechuw enthiing ing engkhejege ebour iuwmmaa anhingna eongnaching, Khrista nhingna amichuw eensuw naing ingeeteurpe.
Aning iminsiisage, Jesu Khrista apaarna asiti aansuw naing iniechuw mensang imbethiengpe, amahie amaing amindeen sahchuwga.
Asapa nhingna amin uwmluing impee ningsie ihe athang alaar kithur impeelina mimpaateruw.
Jesu Khrista athieching iniechuw eetinpige engkhejege isiicher etuchuw ouwngkuhpipe. Thangnhang ningsie ihechuwbe hangjehmeh elhuwngga.
Ama lungsii hangjeh inhimhie ajilhiega. Avierna bekhele riirphana aminghuwchena empipe.
Ama aningchiina inhuw ijieng amaing amindeen ouwngthupah ttongchuw aenhingte injiminthiepe.
Aphachuw avieh inienaching abethong nongchuwbe, anhingte aeuwmbekhe mingkongniege, thanventena iuwm lolhiepaamtena peebekhe minchumchervang atega.
Amaing arhierlina engkhejege amindeen inhuw ijieng amaing ameniirbesabekhe abetthu naing Khrista nhingna iriichuw impeepe.
Khrista nhingna mensa asa etulina ama athang alaar amimpaana aansuw naing euwmgemie.
Anhingnaching ningnuwjeng atataa ttongchuw ninthietaana, imminlenpee aettha ttongjiirchuw thachachuwge ama ttongdeenlina Chipi Enthiing ing chum namge abie iuwmbesaga.
Thangnhang ing amihenhingna ttong adeen chuw akoumnaing Chipi Enthiing ing ineerpige Thangnhang ing aatinbesa ami inieing athang alaar mimpaateruw.
Ningnuw ing ninthacha Jesu Khristanhingna engkhejege mi enthiinghechuw ninning minsiichuwge.
Ningnuw ing ninghinthamchuw enthiesaingge amalina minchinluing kemimpaasah naachuw.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista nhingna Thangnhang athang alaar aeuwmpah amapachuw nimminghuw taana losing iviernatho aphuwngna Chipi kithurchuw ipevate.

Nimbelungriir mhee eengkhaar emmhongniege ama elengchuw aminghuwnaing amaching ajie mindeenge ningnuwchuw ingeenga ichie aminghuwna, ijehmeh abor aetthachuw amihenhingna ttong adeenhie minghuwtenuwge,
athachahe nhingna atuche ruwngper ijehmeh minhine ichiechuw inhingna impee ama ruwngper rarahching nimbelungriir eengkhaarchuw imhongpeewate.
Khristaje ithietena hangrhingge thangvenna aeuwm amhin naching atachangna amengongpe.
Minven amhinbekhena aapuw ouwngsuwh athang alaar, aruwngper, etu acheh aapuwhe, engkhejege lolhiepaamna pangmaage, hungsuwvang ate athang aeuwm romhing bekhelina Thangnhang atachangna amengongpe.
Thangnhangching aangkhengchuw Khrista akhibeja derna sege ruwhchangbekhehie alose abesuwga.
Ruwhchanghie Khrista humga, chonaching aeuwmbekhe ouwngshuwjor aminsiepeega.
Ningnuw ing ka valaarchuwge isiicher nintutaana ithiegechuw.
Chalechingbe lolhiepaamtena ichamaa nong tuchuwge aeuwmgechuw, lolhiele miven alolahna euwm Thangnhang ttongrhier aminjiemaalina irhing atele nong aatu chipi aanhuw jiechuwge aeonggechuw.
Inieje emmeniekhang khing hum ing aadiechuw tumiege. Hum ing aadie entongte ayen aeuwmgemie, engkhejege lintaanghetho enghaajeng belung isii sitihechuw eenshuwmiege iheuwmgemie.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ningsie chuw itang aenemaa itaalina aningsii inhimseh auwmtaana,
iniechuw chipi alhamte ttongrhier minjieluing themiege aeongle Khristatho irhingchuw iphape. Ama lungsiiching engkarpeepe–
engkhejege amathoh hangrhingmiege Jesu Khrista nhingna minven amhinbekhena aeonghaagemie,
hungvievang ate kum ijehmeh sungna amaing iteem ichemaa lungsii asawangching Khrista Jesu nhingna immindangpeega.
Ajiegachiinche ninthacha apaarna ningnuwchuw Thangnhang lungsiiching ingeetinpe, amahie nintutaana ithengmaaga, Thangnhang kithurga–
Nong nintutaa namaaga, amanaching achuwdong ing lhuwngttittuh maavang nintega.
Ajiegachiinche iniehie Thangnhangching insemga, aettha nong tuvang ichii lina ching insemga, amaing chove nonghechuw irotumna bethongcherge amalina rhingmeniege itthachuw tuvang itega.
Chogenieche humna yaati lintaang ningnuwchuw hum ing asem vintinheching ‘vintinmaahe’ entehechuw mindeensaruw.

Chalechinbe ningnuwhie Khrista tho endaapaagechuw. Ningnuwchuw paam lintaang miching ongchuwge Thangnhang ing aateurbesa Israelhe kaarna emvemaagechuw. Thangnhangching amihenhingna ttongneer apee ttongdeen sungna ninrotum emvemaaga. Lolhiepaamnahing asa aeuwmmaa, engkhejege Thangnhang iuwmmaa migechuw.
Changgechuw ayen Khrista Jesu tho endaapah aeong ningnuwchuw Khrista thieching innheeng sechuw.
Ajienachiinche Thangpabe inie belungrier dejiimchuwga, amaing aruh ennhie lolana bangchuw abekhiepe.

Aruh engkhele engkhechuw anhingna engkhepang ing minchumniege mi ithar abesuwnaching waajiir ttongthole waajiir asina aminjienathoh ingeen lehnamaa bekhechuw ahumlina memuwhge belungrier dejiim uwmna ouwngtupeega.
Thingkherlina ithie apaarna Thangnhangte aannhiechuw hum engkhepangte aminchumnaing Thangpa humna engharhechuw Thangnhangte aminchumpe.
Thangpaching juwngge endaapah aeong ningnuw engkhejege, innhingna aeong emmenie nhingna belungriir dejiim aminjaamga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa apaarna Amapa aongtaate Chipi engkhepangna aannhieching iwalhuw achepe.
Chonaching ate ningnuw mipaam lintaangtena maasechuw, ramkhie mije ouwngsuwhmaa sechuw changgechuw enthiing thachahetho Thangnhang eengkuw ouwngsuwhsemie.
Jesu Khrista atahching bangriekiing lhuwngpuwchuw ouwngshuwge ttongjiirpahe laarchangpahe ameniir talina een hintumiege.
Amaching eenchuw himminteuh cherge Thangpa nhingna enthiing ahinnhiina een abesuwga.
Anhingnaching ningnuwjeng eenchuw hintuchuwge amasungna Chipi apaarna Thangnhangchuw icheengga.
Chotanahing yaati lintaang ningnuwlina Khrista Jesu khuna rhingkhum mi, Paul kieing Thangnhangte kehin nhiesahga.
Thangnhang lungsii apaarna heve nong immintuhie ningnuw ing thiesung ninte.
Thangnhang ing kenhingna riirtena ouwngthur immindangpee amahie emongpah ninnhingna kebejiibesaga,
amachuw nimpataana Khrista ttong riirtenachuw imhuw ninchese.
Ayenna misienhe nhingna heve ttong riirtenahie aminphuwngpee maaga, changgechuw atebe Chipi Enthiing apaarna enthiing ttongjiirpahele laarchangpahe nhingna aphuwngga.
Ama riirtenachuw hevehiega; aettha ttongjiirching Khrista Jesu nhingna engkhejege ama ttongneerlinaching Zati lintaanghejeng irii ikuum, engkhejege hum engkhepangna ephaphuwchuw ipha ichepe.
Thangnhang ruwngper lina ngarhe kithur apaarna kiechuw aettha ttongjiir nong aatuchuw ibesuwsage.
Kiebe isiengseh enthiing mitenaje isienglhah chuwging, changgechuw Khrista nhingtena aejong ichehmaa lerhiichuw lintaang yaatihe nhingte aminjaamnaching engkhejege,
peebekhe aatu Thangnhang nhingna ayenbekhe enthur riirtena ttong euwmbesachuw ajiega ichie abesuwnaching enthiing mihekaarna isiengpah kenhingna impeepe.
Chonaching heve aphanaing ruwhchanghe apaarna minven lolaana iuwm amhinna aeong aapuwhe, aatuchehe emmenieching alham asiesiehing Thangnhang ahe asingnachuw aminghuwnaga.
Hevebekhehie ittiim inemaa Thangnhang ing abethongchuw Thangpa Jesu apaarna ahimbesuwga.
Hanghing Khrista nhingna aethonathoh enttiiluing ethenggemie, hevehie Khrista ithacha apaarnaga.
Chonaching ninrotum kieng ija-chaam khaangsaingge iveh ningum namaaing kethamsaana, hevebekhehie ningnuw thanglaar auwmnaga.
Hevelinahing Ipa nhingna khiruwkhuw phin ingge kehinthamsaaga,
Amachuwbe lolhiepaamle minvenna aeong eengkuw bekheching atataa romhingchuw aphagehe.
Asawangpah athang alaartena ruwngperchuw ama Chipi apaarna nimbelungriirna nong etu amimpernaing kehinthamga,
chonaching ninthacha apaarna Khristachuw nimbelung riirna cheengvate. Ama ningsii apaarna arojung apinaing kehinthamga.
Amaching mi enthiinghetho enrhiing Khrista ningsiechuw ijehmeh mimpeege isiega, ijehmeh mingkaangge ouwngthuga echie nimbelungriirna nimminghuwnaga,
engkhejege irhier ichemaa aningsiichuw minghuwvangninte chonaching Thangnhang Chipichuw ninselung shungna asiihnaing kehin thamga.
Ate Thangnhang ing atuche ruwngper enhuw ijieng ihinthamle imindeenchuw minthige isungna itu acheh, ama anhingnaching;
ruwhchang sungna engkhejege Khrista Jesu nhingna ittiim inemaa misien bekhelina athang alaar cheengresie. Amen.
Chonaching mikhum sungna aeong kieing kenhiisaagechuw, Thangnhang ing ingngeen enhuw ijieng itthajeh ing asina etupisaruw.
Belungriir idourle engkhejege idoungtho enrhiing, ningsii iuwmtho enrhiing engkhele engkhe ikhaangche eensuwpiruw.
Chipiching nimbelungriir enchumnung, chonaching engkhele engkhe belungrier enlehnung aong naing itupeeruw.
Thangnhang ing ningnuwchuw asa engkhena engkhepang ingngeen khangkhing, hum engkhe, chipi engkhe,
Thangpa engkhe, ithacha engkhe, chii iluh engkhepanga;
Mibekhe taalina, aangkheng isuwcher, engkhejege euwmbekhelina Mapa Thangnhangchuw engkhepangga.
Changgechuw mi engkhe engkheing Khrista kithur aepha enhuw ejieng lungsiichuw impeepe.
Chonaching hanghing arhierga,
“Amaing engkaangpaate ahangkarleching,
asuwrhe suwh inhimpah arhii,
engkhejege mihenhingna kithurchuw apeega.”
(Hevehie arhierle, “Ama hungkarge,” atehie amaing arhiernachuw ajiega? Amachuwbe mensang jungttumge lolhiederteching ttumse.
Chonaching ijungttum mitho ihangkar michuw engkhepangga, lolhie minven achungte ihangkar Thangpa iuwmbekhena isiikangga.)

Engkhejege kithurhechuw achuw engkhenhingna ttongjiirpahe, achuw engkhena laarchang nongtuna, achuw engkhehena aettha ttongjiir aminjaamna, achuw engkhehenhingna ruwhchanghe apuhna, engkhejege aminchuwthie apigehe.
Eniebekheing aethachana engkhejege Thangpa ahum ruwhchang ahintuna impeesamga.
Chotaanaching Thangnhang Sapa ithachathoh iminghuwcheh tahlina mibekhe aanchumna ching ouwngteupohmeniege Khrista khangkhing ittha mihechuw ouwngshuw sateruw.
Enieng nepangkhangkhing engkhe engkhete inghirmeniege engkhejege thierhaang khangkhing ttongneer nongbekhena engkhe engkhete thieing aseem chuw ouwngsuwhluing,
changgechuw ningsiilina atataa ttongmeniige, alose ouwngshuw Khrista nhingte etubekhelina aminlhuwngna tuvang itega.
Thangpatena hum ameebekhechuw, minteu meniege ichajeh ing minjum meniege engkhejege itthiemeniege lintaang lintaang atuna anong asim inhuw ijieng, ningsiinaching ahanglhuwngnachuw tusateruw.
Chonaching hevehie Thangnhang nhingna nintunaing kerhierpeegechuw amachuwbe yaati lintaanghejeng emmenieng amindeenlina ngarhe ing isihe khangkhing avonhii simaaruw.
Emmenie belungrierna imminghuwche maataana, embelungriir bechege imminghuwchuw minthimge Thangnhang Chipitena lintaang mi ouwngshuwsehe;
embelungriirchuw ahimbechetaana immindeen phacheluing enthiingmaa nong entunaing aetthamaa lhamte entaachuw apigehe.
Khrista nimminghuw chuw hang ing maavang atega.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuw ing Thangpa khuchuw thietenuwge anhingna imminchuw Khristanhingna atataachuw enrhierpeepe.
Ningnuw ing mamenna nimpaarlina imaangbesa beluw humtenachuw bethinruw;
engkhejege ningnuw rhingrhierchuw mintharnuwng,
Thangnhang ing arhier inhuw ijieng atataa dhormo icher engkhejege enthiingjeh asembesa ithar mikhangkhing eensuwruw.
Chonaching amamaa aettong bethinnuwng mibekheing ama ama veemchaanghetho atataah ing enrhierruw; ajiegachienche engkhele engkhe hum engkhepanggemie.
Ther phuwrjenie isiicher tumaaruw; ninther iphuwrchuw inie bethamaaruw;
Diabol nhingna amhin pemaaruw.
Eenruwching avonhii beromaaresie, changgechuw amachuw tuluing aki ing atuche nongchuw tusing iveh mi adinmaahe nhingna ipee achenaing nuwmresie.
Ninnhertena aetthamaa ttong suwhmaaresie, changgechuw aathieheching lungsii nong ikanalina ahintunaing aettha nong tuning teresie.
Thangnhang Chipi Enthiingchuw minja maaruw, imminlenpee inie apha phanaching Thangpaing abie, chum eensuw peepe.
Ekhapah, ther ephuwrpah, belung isii, euwng chorchor, engkhejege ichamaa ittong kallah belungrierbekhe ninnhingna uwmjeh maaresie.
Engkhele engkhe enchaarruw, belungrier edoung ing uwmruw; Thangnhangjeng Khrista apaarna ningnuwchuw ouwngkupee khangkhing, engkhele engkhe ouwngkuhpeeruw.
Chonaching ningnuw ing lungsii euwm asitihe khangkhing Thangnhang ing atuchuw iminjiepeesaruw;
Khristaing ningnuwchuw aning iminsiige Thangnhang nhingte ningnuw rotumna Thangpa ataarahching aberim ichiepah enlhen apee khangkhing ningnuwjeng ningsielina sisaruw.
Changgechuw ningkaarna enthiing mi aansuwche naing naamaa itu, enthiingmaa bekhelina, changmaanieche kaaraam romhing jechuw ninnherna besuwmaaruw.
Ebour nong isilina, enhuwr ttong ittong changmaanieche ichuwchaamaa ngarshaing ittong hevehekhe tumaavang nintega, changgechuw ama hangchie ituchang empaana turesie.
Hevehie minghuw rimruw, amachuwbe naamaa itu, enthiingmaa nong ituhe, leh rotha erumna belungrier elhuwpaa mihenhingna Khrista amana Thangnhang lepaa atungna engkhejege aphaphuw uwmmaa.
Achuwdong ing nintaalina ajiedongmaa ttong ing imminchemaa heresie; ajienachiinche hangchie ttongrhier aminjiemaa sitihelina Thangnhang belung isii ittumga.
Chonaching khangchie mihetho enrhiemaavang nintega.
Ajienachiinche ningnuw ayen inthimna aeheonggechuw, atebe Thangpa mi ningeensuw taana lengwaargechuw, chonaching lengwaar sitihe khangkhing ongvang nintega.
Ajienachiinche, lengwaar aanrahe chuwbe; aangkhengna aettha, dhormo icher, engkhejege ichum nongbekhena euwmga.
Thangpa aning chiivang atechuw atunaing ruw lievang nintega.
Aanraa iuwmmaa inthim nong etu mihetho enrhiemaaruw, amachangbe entthanamaachuw mindangpeeruw.
Ajienachiinche emmenieng ouwngruw ing atu nonghechuw ephuwng inning enjaaga.
Changgechuw amimphuwngche nongbekhechuw lengwaarga.
Chonaching hanghing arhierga,
Ijaar nang hangthiere,
engkhejege ithie kaartena hangrhing chona Khrista ing natalina lengwate.”
Ajiekhang rhingvang ketega ichiing enriimsaruw, inhuwrhe khangkhing simaaruw, changgechuw evier isingpaaing uwmruw.
Aettha tuna apha nimphaleching ngarhe memaang maaruw, ajiegachienche aphahie tthamaa.
Chonaching nhuwrmaaruw, changgechuw Thangpaing amindeenchuw minghuwsaruw.
Zuw beruwmaaruw, amana enna ouwngku suwhvate, changgechuw Chipii ing siihruw.
Engkhele engkhe dhormo lhahching, mimpaana lha ing, engkhejege chipitena lhaching ttongnuwng turuw, engkhejege Thangpa nhingte belung ilhuwpahing lha tusaruw;
Alham bekhena Thangpa Jesu Khrista romhingna Mapa Thangnhangte apha bekhena mimpaaruw.
Khristachuw ijasanuwng engkhele engkhe eengjasaruw.
Lumhihhe! Thangpa ija sanung nimpuwsarchuw ijanuwng paarruw.
Ajiegachiinche Khristaje atahrah hum ikarpi aapuw ruwhchang lose chuw ouwngshuwga, khangkhing ichieng apuwsarching anepenuw losega.
Ruwhchang ing Khrista derna aeongkhangkhing, nepenuwhejeng khangkhing ichieng alhambekhena empuwsarhe ttong minjie heniege ongheresie.
Apuwsarhe, Khristaing ruwhchangchuw aning minsiige atahrarah apidoh khangkhing ninlumhihechuw ninning minsiiruw;
Ruwhchangchuw chiile attongrhier ing minlhiemge Thangnhang nhingte aminthiingna ing Khristachuw ithiega,
anhingna athang aetthapaa, abie uwmludeh ing, alaarna ajiedong iuwmmaa, ebourje iuwmmaadehching anhingte apidohnaing atega.
Khangkhing ichie empuwsarching entaararah khangkhing innepenuwhechuw inning minsiivang ategehe. Anepenuw aning aminsii miching ataachuw aning aminsiiga.
Ajienachiinche achuwdong ing ataachuw betermaa, changgechuw ataachuw ahinjuna asherna; khangkhing ichie Khristajeng ruwhchanghechuw atuga;
Ajiegachiinche inie Thangpa hum abaagehemie.
“Chonaching miching amapa amanuw bethinge anepenuw nhingte ouwngchum gehe; engkhejege emmenie ennhiechuw hum engkhepang ouwngshuwvang ategehe.”
Heve ttonghie ouwnghuw ichemaa riirtenaga, engkhejege kieng Khristale ruwhchanglina kerhierga.
Ningnuw ing hanghing ichiing nintaa raraa khangkhin ninnepenuwchuw ninning minsiivang nintega; engkhejege nepenuwching impuwsarchuw ijavang ategehe.
Nepanghe Thangpa nhingna nimmapa nimmanuw ing arhier minjieruw, hevehie amaing aadie nong ichumchuwga.
“Nimmapa, nimmanuwchuw ijasaruw” hevehie mensa ttongdeenle ttongneerchuwga.
“Chonaching nasitaa bekhena ninrasii aettha amana lolhiepaamna rhiingrierievangninte.”
Engkhejege, mapahe, ninsitihe belung siina tumaaruw. Chovechangbe Thangpanhingte ittha lham ajiena minchuwsaruw.
