Suwhhe, Khrista ttongrhier nimminjie khangkhing aapuwhechuw enttieng, enchiim ing belung edoung ing enttongrhier minjieruw;
Mi mhesuw ibeertenuwge itukhangkhing tuluing Khrista suwhhekhangkhing nimbelungriirtena Thangnhang aadie ching tupeeruw.
Mi sepa ketuga ichiing kharluing, Thangnhang anong ketuga ichiin mindeen ing belungrier ilhuwpa ing nongbekhe tupeeruw,
suwhgejenie ningvesang aphahegejenie ittha nong atulinaching Thangnhang nhingtena inttimjeh phawang atega.

Engkhejege, aapuwhe, khangkhing ichiing ninsuwhenhingna ittha tupeeruw, engkhejege minttii maaruw, ajiegachienche enta engkhejege nintaje enshuw aapuwtataachuw Thangvenna ongne, ama ing adoung achang tumaadeh.
Kettongjiir attuhna chuwbe Thangnhang nhingna eper ing engkhejege ama ruwngper atuchelina rhingruw.
Ningnuw ing itthamaa seitaanching immemunachuw enteuphuw achenaing Thangnhang raar pise bekheching enthongruw.

Ajienachiinche inieng eenteuphuwhie hum bechiile thietalinamaaga, changgechuw lolhiepaam aapuhhelina, aatuchehelina, inthim lolhiepaam aatuchehelina, thangven amhin amhinna aetthamaa chipihe taalina raar ouwngtogemie.
Chonaching itthamaa inie kaarna abedaar achenaing nincheh bekhe tunuwng Thangnhang raar piendeer bekhetho inhehpah neersaruw.
Chonaching ichum khapaaing enchiimnuwng dhormo icher belung abedaarnaching bedaarruw.
engkhejege belungriir dejiim aettha ttongjiirlina enthongnuwng ningkhi thinnuwng:
Hevebekhetho enrhiing thacha phuwchuw chinung neerruw; engkhejege anhingna itthamaa mhihkhangkhing ittuwng thar evachuw ichuwchevangninte.
Isii chertana aminlenche raar lukhum, Thangnhang ttong Chipi chimsiechuw ithohruw;
Aphabekhena ahinthamnale ahinnhie achena Chipi Enthiing apaarna hinnheruw, engkhejege enthiinghe mibekhe rotum aphabekhena ninghinnhielina nimmhih mimviernuwng khaangruw;
Ittha ttongjiir minjaam vang ketenahing Thangnhang ing riirna iuwm ttongjiirchuw ipeniege kechebekhe ching keminjaam chehnaing Kerotumje ithampeesaruw.
Amalina Thangnhang ttongjiir aarinpa thierrhuw ing emphierchuwging. Kieng thona itthapah ing kehimphuwng cher achehnaing ihinthampisaruw.
Chonaching ningnuwjeng, kie ajiekhang uwmning engkhejege ajie ketuga atechuw aminghuwnaing Thangpa ithacha arhu nong kintuhaa kening keminsii une Tichikus ing kekhuhie ninnhingna tongsavate.
Ningnuw ing kinnuw khu nimminghuwna ing engkhejege nimbelungriir ahimbekhahna ing amahie kevicheerga.
Emapa Thangnhangle Thangpa Jesu Khrista adejiim engkhejege ninthachatho enrhiing ningsiechuw une bekhelina uwmresie.
Thangpa Jesu Khristachuw ittiim inemaa ningsie iuwmhelina Thangnhang lungsiichuw cheengsaresie.
Khrista Jesu ameene Paul engkhejege Timothi kinnuw ing Khrista Jesu nhingna Phillipiana aeong Deacon amana upahe engkhejege enthiinghe nhingna;
Emapa Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista ningsii nintaalina cheengresie.
Ningnuwhie keenthiejehtahnachuw Thangnhang kemimpaasahga.
Aphabekhena ninrotumna kehinthamsaa kechetaana kerotha rhohsane;
Ajiegachiinche ningnuw ing amhuwrna betthiimge ateleje ninthacha nonglina embuwmgechuw.
Kieng kebelungriir kemengamsaana, ajiegachienche ningsungna aettha nong embetthiimpiching Jesu Khrista inie aviemaataang alir ibesuwpeewate.

Ningnuwbekhe chuw beherluing hanghing kemindeenhie turimvang aetaga, ajiegachienche ningnuw ing kebelungriir nimmenhehga, ajiegachienche meekhum sungna keongle eattha ttongjiirlina keniirna engkhejege alir asuwna kietho enrhieng ningnuwjeng ningsiichuw iphasahga.
Ajienachiinche Khrista Jesu ningsii tho enrhiing ninnuwbekhelina kemindeenhie Thangnhang ing kesaarkhiiga.
Hevehie ninrotumna kehinnhiehga, amachuwbe, ninningsii chuw hinthi sesehniege amana ninningsii tho enrhieing losing asuwhna, nimminghuwchena auwmnaga.
Chona itthaseh nongchuw tutenuwge Khrista ajuwngphanang enthiingjeh ebour aeuwmmah ing ningngumna,
Thanghang athang alaar engkhejege empana lina jesu Khrista apaarna eensuw, dhormo icher aanrah ching siih ruw.
Keningsii ningnuw ing ketaalina ishuw ketu nong aettha ttongjiirhie itthaseh hungeenshuwse ichiehie ningnuw ing minghuwtenuwge ketena.
Engkhejege kiehie Khrista anong ketutana ephierhege engkhejege Eruwng aarhunghejeching engkhejege meebekheching aminghuwgehe.
Ateleje meekhum sungna ongning hevehing Thangnhangchuw inhehpah athachanaing keu kene aanhim ing enttii uwmluing Thangnhang ttongjiirhie thona aetthaing nintuchenaga.
Achuw engkheching thener rinhege, enna ouwngkuna aminjaamgehe, changgechuw lintaang hechinbe belungrier aetthajeh Khrista ttongjiirchuw aminjaamgehe.
Lintaangheching aettha ttongjiirlina iniirga ichii minghuwhege enningsii amindanghe;
Changgechuw lintaangheching kie emphierlinahing ijachaam ahinthinaing inrinne jonghege Khrista ttongjiir aminjaamhe.
Hevehehie ajietuna ishuwga? Emmenieng alhambekhena ituthaang thaang gehejenie Khrista ttongjiir aminjaamgehe, amalinaching kerotha rhosane, minrhosehvanggete.
Ajiegachiinche kieing keminghuwse engkhejege Khrista Chipilina ninghinthamga, hanghing kejaanabekhehing meekhumtena ibethinvatehe ichii keminghuwse.

Kening minjamaadehning changgechuw aphabekhena thona aettha itta ing ateleje irhingna gejenie, ithiena gejenie, kehumna Khrista amimpaanachuw ouwngshuwvate, hevehie kehaajehga engkhejege atataa minghuwsaingge kejiiga.
Ajiegachiinche kie Khristalina irhingsaging, engkhejege ithie phajening kekanasehga.
Changgechuw humna rhing jeningbe Thangnhang anong tuchevangete, changgechuw irhinggemo ithie nagemo akhuche ateurvang ketega? Minghuw chemaing.
Heve ennhie lolaana Kemindeenleching engkesaningge Khristatho enrhieching kidiesehga. Ajienachiinche choveching kerotumna itthasehga.
Changgechuw humna keuwmjeh hevehing ninnhing nabe aekanaga.
Ningnuw ing engkanasechuw ichii keminghuwga engkhejege ningnuwtho onghaa meniige ninnong nintu ahinthinaing engkhejege ninthacha lina ninrotha arhohna boum vanggechuw.
Hevehing avonhie kethengle Khrista Jesu nongna rotha rhohna inhimseh saruh phasaningge ketega.

Khrista Aettha Ttongjiirlina irhinggung ichiehie aetthajeh minghuwsaruw. Kie avonhie thengjening engkhejege enteuh chemaa khangjemenie belungrier engkhepang ing Aettha ttongjiirlina enleh tenuwge nintuhaa chuw thiesawanggete.
Nintaalina aettonghekha ttiemaaruw. Hevebekhe nimmindangtaana Thangnhangtena engkarpee nimphachuw aandangnaga engkhejege ouwngrhumaa meehechuwbe maangsavatehe.
Thangnhang ing Khrista ninthachalina aningsii impeega, hevehing ettuwmaaga, Thangnhang ing Khrista nonglina ija cham ning khaangnajechuw impeega.
Ningnuwtho aeongle ouwngrhumaahe ching ijachaam impee nimmhuwga, changchie ijachaamchuw ningnuwjeng nimphakha ateleje khang ngenge nimphase.
Chogenieche Khristanhingna nong embetthoh, ningsiina belungriir immindepee, Chipi Enthiinglina saruh iphasah ningsiinale lungsiilina nong tutenuwbe.
Belungriir engkhepang uwmtenuwbe, ningsiina enghaajeh deentenuwge, enlehpohtenuwge amaching alir ibeshuwpeeruw.
Ninrinnepang kharmaaruw, elhuwng ttittuh belungriir rinmaaruw, changgechuw mee lintaanghechuw ijasateniege belung edoung ing uwmruw.
Narhingnapang kharmaaruw, changgechuw mee lintaang rotumna belung minlhuwruw.
Jesu Khrista nhingna aeuwm belungriir khang khing uwmruw:
Amaing Thangnhang gelhang uwmkhangjenie Thangnhangtho inttimging teniege tumaadeh.
Thangnhangtho enghaachuw bethinge meene khangkhing aeuwmchuw arhuga,
tepang khangkhing berhingge mee ngenge emhuwga.
Engkhejege meekhangkhing arhingle Thangnhang arhier aminjie,
ithie iphang minjiege thingkherlina ithiega.
Chonaching Thangnhang ing rhupeege romhing bekhetahlina elhuwng romhing aminringa.
Chonaching Thangvennaje, simriipaamnaje,
lolhiepaam adernaje meebekheching khiruwkhuw phinheniege rumvatehe,
engkhejege attong aeuwmbekheheching Jesu Khristachuw Thangpaga teheniege Amapa Thangnhang tthelaar meuwm vatehe.

Ajiegachiinche keningsii ningnuw ing kemhekungna pangmaage ningnuwtho aeongleje kerhier minjiechuwge, Changgechuw ningkaarna keong maaleje isiichertena imminlenpee nongchuw itthajeh ing enttiing enchiimnuwng etupeesaruw,
ajiegachienche ningsungna Thangnhang ing nong aatu amaching amindeen nong atuchenachuw tusaruw.
Nong nintu bekhena aangnge ichiemaa engkhejege ensangchorchornuwng tumaaruw.
Amaching ningnuw ing heve ichamaa belungrier ikum meehe kaarna ninlaar auwmnamaaing engkhejege Thangnhang sitihe khangkhing simriipaamna aarsii elengkhangkhing lengruw.
Ningnuwching hanghing irhingna ttongchuw nimbechuwthertahna kieing Thangpa inienaching ngarhe itenmaa engkhejege ngarhe nong ketuchuw ouwngshuwh maaning.
Changgechuw ningnuw ing ninthachalina nintaa nimpeedoh, engkhejege nong nintuchetahna kerotha rhohne engkhejege ningnuwbekhetho enrhiing rotha rhosavateruw.
khangkhing ichiing ningnuwjeng kietho ninrotha rhorim sieng ninte.
Thangpa Jesuchuw mindeensaingge ninnhingte Timothi enrang viecheerningge ama khuchuw thieningge kerotha rhohsavate.
Ningnuw eebeerpeevang ichiehie ama maaniege lintaang mee aeuwmmaaga.
Lintaanghechinbe enrotumpang mindeenhege Khrista Jesu nonglina embelung minlhuwmaahe
Timothihie ajie khangchiega ate minghuwvangninte, amaing amapa sepa atukhangkhing Aettha Ttongjiirlina kietho ttongjiir aminjaam mee engkhega ichieje minghuwvang ninte.
Ninnhingte enrang vicheerning ketega amahie kinhuwching rinvate.
Kie ninnhingte enrang athengchenaing Thangnhangchuw kethachana.
Ate iphang nong kintuhaa raarmi ouwngshuw keu kene Epaphroditus, meela ouwngshuw kenong ouwngtupeechuw vicheergete tengge kemindeensaapahga;
Ama anaatahna abelunggriir ijasapaaga, changgechuw ningnuw bekhechuw aanteuhphuwnaing amindeensah paaga ate ningnuw ing ninthiega.
Ajiegachiinche atataa thevang ate sampaarpang ivehga changgechuw Thangnhang ing amachuw boumsage kieje emboumga, amaching ijanapaa uwmmaase.
Chonaching ningnuw ing avonhie nimmhuwtaana ninrotha rhohniege kie kejaanaje attiirnaing kebelungriir ilhuwpaaing kevicheerga.
Ninrotha irhohpaaing Thangnhangnhingna rotha hekursaruw engkhejege hangchie meehejechuw ijasaruw.
Ajiegachiinche Khrista nonglina ithietena irhing amahie iluwpaaing itupeesaruw, amaing kenhingna nintuchemaa nonglina achipi amenermaaga.
Attuhtaana keu kenehe Thangpa nhingna ninrotha minrhoruw.
Enghaajeh ttongjiir kebejiitaana keve minchermaaing, engkhejege hevehing ningnuwchuw emmenhehnaga.
Utihechuw enriimsaruw, ichamaa nong ituhechuw enriimsaruw, vintinhechuw enriimsaruw.
Ajiegachiinche iniebe Thangnhang Chipichuw mindeensamiege Jesu Khrista nhingna belungriir elhuwng phasamiege humna atuhechuw imenihmaaga.
Changgejenie ketaaing humlina kerhuna aeuwmje arhuse, achuw engkheching humlina athachaga ichiing mindeenniebe, kieng kethigehe;
Kiebe inie neeriina vintinpa Israelhe mee, Benjamin sungkhor, Abria mee Abria, waajiir ttongtholina Pharisiging;
Belungriir alhuwtahna ruwhchanghe amenang waajiir ttongtho aanhuw ijii, dhormo icherlina isiicher iheuwmmaa meeging.
Changgejenie kenhingna aekanabekhehie Khrista khulina aemaangbesaga ichiing keliesahga.

Ama ithi ing Thangpa Jesu Khrista keminghuwching athichertahna kedeenbekhehie ithuwbesa aemaanggehe tengge keliega, kerinnena dhormo icher waajiir ttongtho chuwmaage, Thangpa kethacha apaarna Thangnhangching imminthie amalina Thangpachuw kekanaga ichiing keliega.

Hanghing amathoh pumkhepaa uwmsawanggete, waajiir ttongtho keminjietahna kepha, dhormo icher ing keuwmna ajiedong uwmmaa. Atebe Khrista nhingna apee dhormo icherchuw kethacha apaarna Thangnhangtena kephape.
Kieng Thangpaching, avonhii ihangrhingching aruwngper engkhejege Thangpatho ithie hungeenhaasah ingge amaing ijachaam akhaangchuw kieje phasagete ichiechuw keminghuwnaga.
kieng hevehehie phasaningbe kieje ithietena hangrhingvanggete ichii asa kedeenga.
Kieing vatungnavang ichiechuw vatungsing engkhejege kephape ketemaaga; changgechuw ama ketaarchuw kephamaataang ing taarsaingge kerotum besuwning ketega, ajiegachienche Khristaing ata embesuwpipe.
Keningsiihe, amabekhechuw keta kebesuwpe ketemaaga, changgechuw changchie engkhe ketuching kinhuwtenachuw beher ingge kemana aeheuwmchuw aphanaing ketusaaga.
Khrista Jesu apaarna Thangnhang ing Thangvente ingeen ama manachuw aphanaching itensaging.
Chipilina aehanglhuwng mee bekheching hanghing mindeensateruw, engkhejege hangchiehie minghuw chemaatenuwge rhuwmaatenuwbe Thangnhang ing imindangpeeresie.
Changgechuw inieng atataa ibechuwbesachuw minchinluing jiesateruw.
Keu kene kesarhe, kinu iminjiipeeruw, engkhejege kinnuw ing kimminthiebekhe kintu aminjienaing aanhuw jienuwng turuw.
Mee aenhimpaaing Khrista thingkher arhumaa uwmnehe, hevebekhehie aphabekhena kerhierbesaga, engkhejege ateleje kemhiriechii eboung kerhierga.
Emmenieng enjii lhamchuwbe aemaangnaga, empeebuwrchuw arumgehe, enthanglaarbe ningjaachuwga; simriipaam peelina embelungriir apeegehe.
Changgechuw iniebe Thangven lepaa meegemie, ama amhinnaching engkarpee Thangpa Jesu Khristachuw aehaajega.
Thangpaching aeuwmbekhechuw akhi derna asiihcheh ruwngper apaarna ttiimvang ichie ihum hehie ata khangchie thanglaar teching iminteh peewate.
Chovelinaching keu kene kasarhe, kieng inhimpah ouwngteuhphuwthahening kete keu kenehe, kerotha rhohna engkhejege kelhuwngna ningnuwbe, Thangnhang nhingte hanghing inhehpah niirsaruw, keningsiihe.
Thangnhangte belungrier engkhepang auwmchenaing, Euodiasle Sintikechuw kebetthosanaahe.

Keelhang nang ing kietho belung ilhuwpaaing nong tuhaamiege, nepenuwheching hevehehie atuchena rhierpeehere. Nepenuw emmeniehing kietho Aettha ttongjiir kimminjaamga. Emmenieng Klement engkhejege lintaanghetho enrhieuwngge nong kintuhaaga. Ihring leriina enromhing enjiihbesagehe.
Aanasiir Thangnhangnhingte ninrotha minrhoruw avonhii kerhiersaana, ninrotha minrhoruw.
Nimbelungriir aedoungchuw meenhingna mindangruw, Thangpachuw innheengse.
Ajielinadong belung minjamaaruw, changgechuw Thangnhang nhingte ivehbekhechuw hinthamsanung minthangsaruw.
Khrista Jesu apaarna mee ing amimmhuw ichema, Thangnhang dejiimching ninbelungriir ningwakhar bekhe ingahpisawate.

Attuhtaana, keningsiihe, atataa nongbekhe, enjaphuw arhubekhe, ichum nong bekhe, enthiingbekhe, ittha nong bekhe, aettha ttong bekhe; itthapahbekhe engkhejege impaa arhu uwmniebe amachuw mindeensaruw.
Ningnuw ing kenhingtena nimminghuw, nimpha, ninthie engkhejege nimmhuwbekhehie itupeeruw; engkhejege belung dejiim impee Thangnhangching eenrhiephuwvate.
Ningnuw ing kerotumna avonhie eebeersachuwge Thangnhangchuw kemimpaasahnaa, engkhejege minchinludehing eebeersachuwge, changgechuw amabekhe amindangna apha phache maasing.
Kieing kivehtahna phaning tengge ittongmaaging, ajiegachienche ketaaing kedeensaalina ouwngshuwhsaging.

Tepiepang deensajening irhingna keminghuwse; inhimpah kedeenleje irhingna keminghuwse, ajiejie thengkhangjenie aphabekhena amahechuw ouwngshuwging ichiing kemindeenga isahphuw kedeenleje, kedeenmaaleje rotha rhoh ipaar kechega.
Jesu Khrista apaarna ishuwbekhe kedierchega, ajiegachienche amaing heve paangkarhie impeega.
Ajiejie shuwhkhangjenie ningnuw ing ijachaam kephale emboumsagechuw.
Philippina aeonghe, ninnhingna Aettha Ttongjiir mensarim keminjaamkha eenthiepisaruw. Kieing Makedonia kemaale kie embumhehie ningnuw panggethahchuw.
Thessolonikana keongle ningnuw ing vonu vonu kekana pihseh embum gechuw.
Atatah ninnhingtena phagete tengge kemindeen maaga, changgechuw aettha nong nintutaana nindeen ahinthina keedieshaga.

Kekana pihbekhe kephasaase, kanavang ichii enlhiejor kephaga, engkhejege kanavang ichii pihbekhe Epaphroditus ing ihinreenpeege kephase. Ningnuw ing impeeshah pihhehie aberim ichiipah Thangnhangte aning ichiepahga.
Engkhejege Thangnhang ing ninrotumna ningkana bekhe enlhiejor Jesu Khrista asawangle athanglaarching ninning achienabekhechuw ipesaresie.
Ate Amapa Thangnhang nhingte ittiim inemaa empaanachuw ouwngshuwresie. Amen.
Khrista Jesunhingna enthiingmihechuw keberhiimsahnaahe. Kiethoh aeonghaa kilhanghejeng emberhiemnaahe.
Enthiing mibekhejeng, engkhejege hevesungna eruwnghe eengkuwhejeng emberhiemnaahe.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii ninchipitho cheengresie.
Khrista Jesu ameene Paul engkhejege Timothi kinnuw ing Khrista Jesu nhingna Kolosina aeong thacha unehe engkhejege enthiinghe nhingna;
Emapa Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista ningsii nintaalina cheengresie.
Jesu Khrista, Amapa Thangnhang ningnuwlina aphabekhena kemimpaasahna;
Ajiegachiinche Khrista Jesu nhingna ninthacha engkhejege enthiinghe meebekhetena ningnuw ningsie khuhie kinthiega.
Ajiegachiinche ninrotumna thangvenna nimminghoungchuw nimminghuwtaanaga; amahie aettha ttongjiir mensarim ninnhingna thengge ninthie amachinga.
Hevehie simriipaambekhenaje aanrachuw endangge engkhejege aehanglhuwng khangkhing ningnuwng Thangnhang lungsii ttongchuw thiesachuwge atataa nimminghuw ama aanienaching ninnhingnaje ethengga.
Heve Thangnhang lungsii Epaphrastena ninthiega, ama kinnuwtho nong kintuhaaga engkhejege kinning kimminsiiga. Irotumnaje ama athacha inhehpah Khrista meenega.
Chipi Enthiing apaarna ningnuw ningsiichuw amaing kinnhingna atongga.
Chovelinahing kinnuw ing ama ttong kinthie iniena betthiimge chipitena losing, nimmindeen bekhechuw Thangnhang aadie inhuw ejieng asiihkang naing tesaungge Thangnhangte ihinnhie minchinsamaauwng.
Aattha nong bekhena aanrah uwmnuwng, ninthacha hanglhuwngniege;
Ninrotha irhoh, aekhaang achehnaing Thangpa attheh alaar inhuw ijieng imenhehpisaniege;
Ama elengnaching enthiingheching phawang ate lerchii nimphasahnaing Thangnhang mimpaasanuwng.
Inthim paangkartena ningnuwchuw aekarsage aning aminsiih Sapa Eruwng lepaateching impeemsahpe.
Iniebekhechuw isiichertena imminlenpee Asapa nhingna aeuwmga.
Thangpa Jesuhiebe imhuw ichehmaa Thangnhang arothaga, aeuwmbekhelina mensarim aberhingchuwga.
Thangvennaje simriipaamnaje aeuwm, aapuhe, imhuw icheh, imhuw ichehmaa peebekhe, eruwnghe paangkar aangkheng Thangpa anhingtena engkhejege arotumna asembesaga.
Aeuwmbekhena amabe mensa iheuwmbesaga, engkhejege anhingna ouwngteucherga.
Amabe ihum ruwhchang alosega, amabe abetthiimnachuwga, ithiekaartena mensarim aberhing chuwga, chotaanaching aeuwmbekhe kaarnaje mensa phaam aringa.
Ajiegachiinche anhingna Thangnhang amindeen isiikangchuw aeuwmga.
Engkhejege ama apaarna Thangnhangching Thangvenna aeuwm, simriipaamna aeuwmje anhingte ahimminteuga, engkhejege thingkherlina athie ebouching dejiimjechuw amengumchega.
Ningnuwbe ayen itthamaa ituhekaarna mhar, mee lintaang ing uwmchuwge, aarhumaahechuw eenshuwchuwge;
atebe amaing ahumna iminchumge, ama ithie apaarna ningnuwchuw enthiing, ebouriuwmmaa, ninlaarna aeuwmmaa eenshuwsechuw.

Ningnuw ing ninthie, Thangven derna atubesa bekhelina aettha ttongjiir aminjaambesa, meene Paul kiejeng anong kihintuche ama ttongjiirlina keminghuw kebelungriir kemengam amalina ningnuw ing inhehpah uwmtenuwbe hevebekhehie ninrotum ouwngshuwvate.
Ate kieng ningnuwlina ijachaam kepha hie kerotha rhohsane, engkhejege ketaalina, kehumna Khristaing ijanang aphachuw alir ashuwnaing kitusaahie ruwhchanglinaga tesaingge kerhuga.
Kieing Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw itthajeh ing aminghuwchenaing Amaing icheersage ama meenechuw eenshuwging.
Kum kumbekhena meesienhetena ouwngthur endangluing eheuwmbekhe ate enthiinghe nhingna uwmphuwngse.
Emmenie nhingna Thangnhang ing lintaang yaatihekaarna ouwngthur ttong athanglaar asawangchuw mindangning atega; amachuwbe athang alaar asa ninnhingna aeuwm Khristachuwga.
Meeheching Khristate ipeedoh achenaing minjaam uwngge, ruku uwngge, minchuwuwngge ama losing ivier ing meebekhe Khristate ahanglhuwngnaing kintuga.
Ajiegachiinche kesungna pirthang impee ama anong ketu inhuw ijieng kechehbekhe tusa ingge ichiing inuumsaging.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuw rotumna kejanachuw minghuwtenuwge ketega amachuwbe Laodekiana aeonghe rotum engkhejege kemhe amhuw maalhiehe meehe nhingnajega.
Emmenieng embelungriir himbetthoh heniege ningsielina aanchumna engkhejege Thangnhang lungshiina asawang Khristachuw imminghuwrimnaing embelung akichena mengumtenuwge ketega.
Anhingna isingna, iviirna, aminghuwtena lerchiibekhe thurge aeuwmga.
Achuwdong ing ninnhingna ttong ensangtenuwge ninthachalinaching iminchemaa heresie.
Ajiegachiinche ketaaing ningkaarna ongmaajening kerotha rhohna ningnuw ing achaangjeh Khristachuw ninthacha chuw ibiirsaingge kechipichuw ningnuwtho enrhiijega.
Ningnuw ing Thangpa Khristachuw aelhaangtenuwbe aphabekhena anhingna arhingnaing paarsaruw.
Anhingna ninrojungchuw siensing amatahlina hintunung ninthachaje menhehnuwng nimminchuw lina enlhiejor ing mimpaaruw.

Khrista tena ehungshuw maaniege, meeheching amamaa mindeenge aettong, aekana iuwmmaa arhierching enrhienamaaing enriimsaruw. Hangchie mindeenge arhierhie mee nhingtenaga, Khrista tenamaaga engkhejege lolhiepaam tepangtenaga.
Thangpanhingna Thangnhangtena itthabekhechuw ahumna amindangga.
Engkhejege Khristanhingna ningnuwjeng changriir immimphaga, amabe aapuwhe khuwpu chiipuhe tahlina alosega.
Kee ing atumaa vintinching Thangnhang Chipitena vintin aphaga, Tepangtena humna atuchuw mintehge Khristate vintin nintuga.
Chii ninluhtaana Thangpatho lolhiete ideemge engkhejege Thangpaing ithiehe kaartena aminrhing Thangnhang anongchuw enthacha apaarna Thangpatho ihangrhinggechuw.

Ningnuw ing isiicher nintutahnaching, isiicherching nintaachuw ningvesang phachemaachuwge chipi nongna ithiegechuw; changgechuw Thangnhang ing Jesu Khrista apaarna irhing nimphape, engkhejege isiicher nintujechuw ouwngkupeepe.
Amaing aechathemaa nong etu aeuwmbekhe, wajiir ttongtho aebekhietahna ilerturbekhechuw thingkherlina jopiching thahege itthamaabekhechuw aliijohpe.
Engkhejege ama Khrista thingkhernaching aapuwhe engkhejege aatuchehe pirthanghechuw memuhcherge amana araarchuw chege endang sengsong amindangpe.
Chonaching isa eenlina, aeriim iniena, changmaanieche eongna inielina achuwdong ing ningnuwchuw waajiir itumaaheresie.
Hevehehie hungshuwvang ichii arothaga; changgechuw atataa hungshuwvang atechuwbe Khristaga.
Mee lintaangheching ouwngturpah ngenge minven michierhechuw enrum apaarna ninnhingna ishihmaaheresie, mheerovaam emhuw peelina mindeenheniege humna ishuw jiihege ngarheing lhuwngnehe.
Heve hangchieheching alosechuw inheh bechuwmaahe; alose Khrista arhuw aanjumna ama apaarna arotharhuw ing aminteu humbekhechuw Thangnhangtena ihanglhuwngga.
Ningnuw ing simriipaam ajiidongmaa chipitena ningvesang aphana Khristatho thehaatenuwbe, ajietunaching simriipaamna irhingkhangkhing nintaaing waajir ttongtho minjiechuwge aeonggechuw?
“Amahie bechuwmaa, amahie mintinmaa, iparje parmaa?”
Hangchie bekhehie simriipaam khuna aettonggehe, isibesah ithie ttongthohga.

Hevehangchie ttongthohehie ivierna ngenge tihne, changgechuw hangchie ttongtho, tepang ing atu dhormo, meehechuw belungriir amindoungna hum amenangna entugetha, engkhejege heve entuhing meeheching isiicher itthamaa atubekhechuw minchinchemaahe.
Ningnuw ing Khristatho hangrhingtenuwbe Thangventena peechuw jongruw, ama amhinnaching Khristaing Thangnhang atachangna aeongga.
Ningnuw ing thangventena peehepangchuw mindeenruw, simriipaamtenachuw belungrier pemaaruw.
Beluw isiicher humchuw ithiega engkhejege ate Thangnhangnhingna Khristatho ouwngthurgechuw.
Ningnuw nhingna Khristachuw aamphuwngleching ningnuwjeng attheh alaartho enrhiing uwmphuwng vangninte.
Chonaching simriipaam ing aadie belungriir bekhechuw bethinruw, amachuwbe naamaa itu, enthiingmaa nong, ichamaa belungrier irin, leh rotha irum (Kaaraam nong bekhe) thehcherruw;
Irhierpee arhumaa, isiicher itu sitihelina Thangnhang belung isiichuw ithengga.
Heve hangchie nintulina rhingchuwge, ayenje heve hangchie nintutaana sichuwge;
changgechuw ningnuwbekhe atebe hangchie belung isii, ther iphuwr, kallaa, aetthamaaing ittong ninnherna ishuwbekhe bethinruw;
engkheing engkhelina amamaa ttong ing embemaaruw; ajiegachienche beluw mee ouwngshuwchuwkha nimmaacherpe.
Engkhejege ningnuwchuw insempee Aapuw arotha inhuw ijieng ithar ing irhing piendeer imminser peepe.

Ama ithar irhing rhingriinaching Greek mee nemaa, Jehudi nemaa, vintinheje vintinmaaheje, lintaang paamtena mee, Sinthiatena mee, shuw engkhejege ningvesang apha meegejenie aanthierna uwmmaa, changgechuw Khrista chuwbe aangkhengga, aeuwmbekhena aeuwmga.
Ate ningnuwbe Thangnhangta ouwngshuwsechuw, chonaching ningsie ihe belungriir, lungsiina nong ing, belung aedoung ing, ideh belungrier engkhejege ikhaangche piendiir ing enthongruw.
Engkhele engkhelina ikhaangchena, achuw engkheching engkhelina anongenamaa uwmniebe engkheing engkhelina ikuhpee achenaing etupeeruw;
Engkhejege hevebekhehie nintutaalina alir ashuwchenaing ningshii ing emphierruw.
Khristatena belung dejiimching ninsungna aapuw eenshuwsing, heve nong linahing ningnuwchuw hum engkhepangna engeenga. Engkhejege mimpaasaruw.

Khristaing arhier ttongchuw nimbelungriirna inheh ing uwmresie; iviernabekheing engkhele engkhe ouwngchumnuwng engkhejege ouwngkunuwng, dhormo icherna lhah, empaana lhah engkhejege chipitena lhah lungsiithoh enrhiing belungriertenaching Thangnhangte tusaruw.
Engkhejege ningnuw ing nintubekhe, ninttongle engkhejege nintubekhena Amapa Thangnhangchuw mimpaanuwng Thangpa Jesu romhing engkhejege ama apaarna etupeeruw.
Lumheehe, Thangnhangnhingna nimpuwsarhe ttong minjienuwng ichapingpang ongruw.
Apuwsarhe, ninlhumheechuw ning minsiinuwng, entaalina siihthipaaing tupeemaaruw.
Nepanghe, nintubekhena ningmapa ningmanuw ttongrhier minjieruw; ajiegachienche hevehie Thangnhang ing arhu nongchuwga.
Mapahe, ninsitihe belung siina, changmaaniege embelungriir akiena tupeemaaruw.
Shuwhhe, taangna meeing amhuwnaing tuluung ningtaalina aapuw ouwngshuwheching arhier minjieruw.
Mee lintaang nhingna nintukha maage, Thangnhang nhingna nintukhangkhing nintubekhe belungrier ilhuw turuw.
Phavang ninte lerchii Thangnhangtenachuw nimminghuwse; ningnuw ing Thangpa Jesuchuw anong nintuga.
Ajiegachiinche ichamaa nong atuching atah ing atu ichamaa nong phasavang atega, engkhejege adoung achang ibiirge atumaaga.
Aapuwhe, Thangvenna aeong nintaalina Aapuw ouwngshuw ongne ichii minghuwnung ninshuwhhenhingna atataa aetthachuw tupeeruw.
Ninghinthamle empaatho enrhieng riikiengjehnung, belungrier ilhuw ing aanasiir hinnheruw.

Khangchiehe aphanaching Kinrotum Thangnhang ing aettha ttongjiir lham aamhongnaing ihinthampiruw, amaching riirtena luwhriina minthang chevang gungte; ajiegachienche ama luwhriina ttongjiirlina iphierhege rhingkhumna ongning.
Hevehing kieing mimphuwng chevang ketechuw mindangchevanggete.
Aphabekhena taancha ibiirnung taangna aeonghekaarna enriimsaruw.
Ningnuw ing meebekhenhingna ajiekhang besangvang nintega ichii aminghuwnaing, bechii achiina khangkhing, lungsiithoh enrhieng aphabekhena attongna tusaruw.
Ithachalina eenneeh arhu Thangpa ameene ouwngshuwhaa engkhejege kening keminsiih keu kene Tichikus ing kikhubekhe ninnhingna tongvate.
Ningnuw ing kinnuw khu nimming huwnaing engkhejege amaing nimbelungriir amengamnaing amahie ninnhingte kevicheerga.
Amaing ithacha eenneeh arhu keningsii keukene Onesimushie amatho kevicheerga; emmenieng hevena ishuwbekhelina ninnhingna itongpeesavatehe.
Meekhum sungna kietho aeonghaaung Aristarkus, Barnabas atuti Mark-anhingna ttongtho nimpha amahie athengle rotha ikurpee saruw.
Engkhejege Jesu ate Justusjeng ningnuwchuw lhamsuw enthennaa, emmeniehie Thangnhang Eruwng lepaana nong kintuhaa vintinhekaarna emmenie panggehe, emmenieng belung emmengamgehe.

Ningkaarna mee engkhe eenshuw Epaphrus, Khrista Jesu ameene amajeng lhamsuw enthennaa. Ningnuw ing Thangnhang nimmindeenbekhe lina alir ashuwna engkhejege inheh belungrier auwmnaing aphabekhena eperpaa ing ahinthamsaaga.
Ajiegachiinche ama rotumna Laodekiana engkhejege Hierapolisna aeonghe rotum nong atuga ichii khu kieing saarkhie kepeese.
Eningsiih ithiim Luk engkhejege Demasjeng ningnuwchuw lhamsuw enthennaa.
Laodekiana aeong keu kenehe nhingna, engkhejege Nymphana, engkhejege eengngeennaa engkonghe ruwhchangheje lhamsuw kethennaahe.
Heve ttongjiir leriihehie nimpanhuwte Laodekia ruwhchangteje amachuw empanaing engkhejege Laodekiatena ttongjiir leriijechuw ningnuwjeng nimpanaing itupeesaruw.
Engkhejege nang ing Thangnhangtena napha nonghechuw alir ashuwnaing belungrier minlhuwre tenung Arehippusnhingna irhierpeesaruw.
Paul kieng lhamsuw kethennahie ketaaing kebejiiga. Kie emphier ing iuwm inghie aebehermaaruw. Lungsii ching ningnuwchuw eenrhiephuwresie.
Paul, Silvanas amana Timothi ing Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista nhingna aeonghe Thessolonika ruwhchangnhingna: Lungsii engkhejege belungrier dejiim ningnuw nhingna cheengresie.
Ningnuw rotumna Thangnhangchuw aphabekhena kimmimpaasaana engkhejege kinghintham bekhena beher maauwngchuw.

Ningnuw ing ninthachalina anongchuw mindangchuwge ninningsii taalina nong ijaapaaing tusachuwge, engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista nhingtena belung ngamna nintu ningkhaangbekhechuw Thangnhang nhingna behermaa uwngchuw.
Keu kenehe, Thangnhang ing aning imminsiitaana ningnuwchuw ingeeteurpe.
Amachuwbe kinnuw ing ninnhingna kimminjaam aettha ttongjiir pangching atumaaga amahie Chipi Enthiing paangkarnaga engkhejege kimminjaam ttongjiir kemindanghie nimminghuwga.
Chipi Enthiinglina rotha rhonatho enrhieng ijachaam nimphakaarna ttongjiirchuw phasamiege Thangpa anu iminjie mihe ouwngshuwsemie.
Chonaching Makedoniale Akhaiana aeong thachahenhingna aandangna ouwngshuwsechuw.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa aettha ttongjiirchuw Makedonia amana Akaia paamna nimminjaam amachuwpang maage Thangnhangteje ninthacha chuw amhinbekhena enjaamse, ammaching irhierphuw ajiedong uwmmaa.
Ajiegachiinche ninnhingna kinthengle ajiekhang ichiin ishuwga ichiechuw miheching ingeensir hechuwbe, leh rotha ninrum nongchuw bethinchuwge Thangnhangte hungeenlechuwge irhing Thangnhang nong nintu,
ithietena ihangrhing, Thangnhang belung isiitena imminlenpee, thengrimvang ate asapa Jesuchuw ninghaaga ichie hiega.
Keu kene, Kesarhe, ninnhingna mamen kinthengle nongkintukha ngarhemaaga.

Changgechuw Thessolonikana kinthengmaalhiele Philipina ijapaa ningjah kimphahechuw nimminghuwcherga. Amahechuw enrhumah ejemeh uwmjenie Thangnhangching attongjiir aetthachuw atongnaing ninnhingna aminjaamna kinthona tthase.
Ajiegachiinche kinnuw ing kimbetthonachuw hie kinlaarna changmaanieche enthiingmaa kimmindeen, changmaa nieche mi minchena kintumaaga.
Thangnhang ing amindeen enhuw ijieng ittongsagung, changgechuw hevehie itu arhuna impisaaga. Miheching amindeen atunaing kintumaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang belungrier aatoh aning chiinaing kintuga.
Ajiegachiinche nimminghuw khangkhing, mi mimpaana etuchaang ttong, changmaanieche kaaraam uwngge etuthaangthaang tusamaauwng, Thangnhang ing saarkhiega.
Kinnuw ing Khrista ttongjiirpahe khangkhing tuchejenuwng, milintaangtena gejenie, ninnhingtena gejenie, lintaang lintaang tenagejenie miheching immimpaana jongsamaauwng.
Changgechuw amanuw ing asitihechuw hinjuhge apisaa khangkhing, kinnuw ing ningkaarna belung aetthachuw hungeensuwsung.
Ningnuwchuw hangjehmeh ibeersauwng chuwge ninnhingna Thangnhang aettha ttongjiirpang maage, kinchipije ipi achena kintusaaga, ajiegachienche ningnuwbekhe kinningsiichuw ouwngshuwsechuw.
Keu kene, kesarhe, ningnuw ing kintusaa bekhe, ijachaam kimphabekhe ningeenthiese, ningnuw ing irhiih pee ninrinnamaa ing, yen siim nong tusauwngge Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw ninnhingna kimminjaamga.
Thachabekhe ninnhingna kinsinabekhehie enthiingjeh, eteumjeh, engkhejege ibour iuwmmaaga ichielina Thangnhang engkhejege ningnuwjeng saarkhiegechuw.
Amapaching asitehe nhingna atu khangkhing ninnhingnaje kintuga.
Ama athang alaar euwmpaa eruwnglepaate arhienaing ingeen Thangnhang aning chiena ningnuw ing ningongnaing kinrhierpigechuw, engkhejege kimbetthogechuw.

Kinnuwjeng aphabekhena Thangnhang kimmimpaana alham lintaangje aeuwmga, amachuwbe ningnuw ing Thangnhang ttongjiirchuw ning eelhaangle humtena khangkhing ningeelhaang maaga, changgechuw Thangnhang ttongjiirga techuwge ningeelhaangga, amachuw Thangnhang ttongjiir rarahga.

Ajiegachiinche, keu kene, kesarhe, Khrista Jesu nhingna aeong Judia paamtena ruwhchang henhingna isuwh khang nge ngeh ninnhingnaje isuwhga, innhingtena ija nimpha khangkhing emmenieje Jehudihenhingna ijachaam aphagehe.
Jehudiheching Thangnhang laarchangpahechuw thehege, amapangmaage kinnuwje imminjapaagehe Thangnhang aadiemaa tuhege mibekhelina arhumaagehe,
Yaati lintaangte ikarpina ttongjiir atongna lhamje kamhege. Hanghing emmenieng isiicher atuhechuw thinrihege aminsiegehe; changgechuw attunachinche Thangnhang belung isiichuw entaalina ethengga.
Keu kene, kesarhe, belungrierna pangmaage, humna apha amongna entthemiege, mhuwningchuw kintesaaga, avonhie ouwngteuvateruw ichie kemindinsaana.
Ajiegachiinche ninnhingna thengning ketega, atataa Paul kieing avonhie thengning ketesaaga, changgechuw sataan ing kimmana ingkhinpe.
Thangpa Jesu ajouwngngeenlile amhekungna asa euwm changmaanieche rotha rhona, changmaanieche belung alhuwngna luhu ephaphuwchuw ajiega?
Uwng, ningnuwhie kinnuw thanglaar engkhejege kinrotha rhohnachuwgechuw.
Chotahnaching kinnuw ing ikhaang kinchemaa taana Athenna kethienen ing keongnaing kimmindeensaape,
Chotanaching heve ija inanghing achuw engkhedong aminlaanamaang ninthacha amenhehnaing engkhejege embumna rotumna une Khrista aettha ttongjiirlina nong etu Timothy kimvicheerga.
Chonaching heve ijachaam ing achuwdong enthacha amaangnamaaing, hevejehie kinnhingna ensiihga ichie nimminghuwga.
Ninnhingna kengongle kinnuwhie iminjavatehe atechuw mensang kimminghuw cherga, khang ngenge ate isuwga.

Chotahnaching ikhaang kechemaa lamthitana, ningnuw ing ninthacha aminghuwnaing amahie kimvicheerga; kieing enttiisaning amachuwbe ningnuwchuw itthamaaing imbetheem engkhejege kintubekhe ngarhe maangvang ategumta kintetaanaga.

Changgechuw Timothi ing ninnhingtena hungthengge ningnuw ing ninthacha engkhejege ningsie rotha rhohna ttong, kinnuwjeng mhuwningchuw kinte khangkhing kinnuwtho aanteuna apha bekhena kinnuwchuw eenthiechuwge atechuw atongpe.
Hevelinahing keu kene, kesarhe, ningnuw khuna kinnuw ing ijachaam kimphabekhena ningnuw ing ninthacha anhehtaana kinthona hangtthase.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuw ing Thangnhangte inheh ongtenuwbe irhinggung.
Ningnuw khuna rotha rhohna Thangnhang mhekungna kimphabekhehie ajiekhang abilina Thangnhangchuw mimpaavang kintega?
Ningnuw ing ninthacha ivehbekhelina amintthaana mhele mhe ouwngteumeniege kintetaana yen siim neluing kinghinthamsaaga.
Ate Thangnhang Emapa amaing Jesu engkhejege Thangpa Jesuching ninnhingte athengna lham iminthiesaresie.
Kinnuwjeng ningnuwchuw kinning kimminsii khangkhing engkhele engkhelina engkhejege mibekhelina ninningsiichuw Thangnhang ing inhim minthipiresie.
Thangpa Jesuching enthiinghe mibekhetho ajuwngleching Emapa Thangnhang mhekungna isiicher auwmnamaang enthiingje ing imenhehpiresie.

Attuh taana, keu kene, Kesarhe, Thangnhang ing aadie ninrhingnachuw kinnhingtena aelhaangchuwge ipaargechuw. Chotahnaching ningnuw ing atthaanaseh ing Thangpa Jesu romhinglina ihinnhietho enrhiing kimbettho saagechuw.
Jesu Khrista apaarna kimminchuw chuwkha nimminghuwga.
Thangnhang ing aadiechuwbe, ningnuw ing enthiingjeh, naamaa itu bethintenuwge;
engkhele engkheching ningnuw ninghumchuw suwrche tenuwge enthiingte engkhejege enjasuw ing nimpaarnaing,
ichuwmaa belungriir ereen yaati lintaangching Thangnhang minghuwluing,
Amalinaching achuw engkhedong ing auw anehelina mincheheniege itthamaa tumaaheresie. Ajiegachiinche Thangpaing hangchiebekhelina phuw aliepiga.
Thangnhang ing iniichuw enthiingmaing auwmna ingeen maaga.
Chonaching heve ttonghie aliemaa miheching mihenhingna arhumaa atu maagehe, changgechuw Chipi Enthiing impee Thangnhangnhingnaga.
Keu kene, kesarhe, ningsiinalina ninnhingna avonhie abejiina kanapaamaa; ajiegachienche engkhele engkhe ningsie euwmnachuw Thangnhang ing imminchuwpe.
Ajiegachiinche Makedoniana aeonghe unehe nhingna amachuw nintupe. Changgechuw, keu kene, kesarhe, kinnuw ing kimbetthosaagechuw, amachuwbe, hanghing hinthi lhalhaaruw.
Engkhejege ningnuw ing taangna aeonghe mhekungna itthaje ing ninsinaing, ajiedong avehna maaing,
edehjeh aeongna, arinneng atusaa, engkhejege aki ing avanuumsaalina kinnuw ing kimminchuwhie etupisaruw.
Changgechuw keu kene kesarhe, belung ngamna euwmmaa thachamaahe milintaang heching belung ija khangkhing belung ninjana maaing, mensa ithiehe khu minghuwheresie kintega.
Jesu Khristachuw thege avonhie hangrhingge ichiehie aethachataanaching Jesuchuw thachahege ithiehechuw Thangnhangching anhingte hinrhievate.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpaing arhier inhuw ijieng ninnhingna kinrhierga, amachuwbe, Thangpa ajuwngle irhing ing aeongheching ithiebesahe nhingna men hesamaahenie.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa ata raraa Thangventena irurtho, Thangven michier erurtho, Thangnhang tumpi erurtho enrhiing juwngvate. Engkhejege Khrista nhingna ithieheching mensang hanrhingvate;
Ama enhuwna aeheong irhing eniebekheing emmenietho enrhieng minvenna Thangpachuw aanteuphuw naing rudulite ihingkiwvate; engkhejege hanghing inieje apha bekhena Thangpatho enrhieng onghaavateruw.
Chovelinaching engkhele engkheing heve ttonglinahing thona imintthaapeesaruw.
Chotahnaching keu kene, kesarhe, heviehie aviena akum athalina bejiijening ekanapah uwmmaa.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa ajuwngnachuwbe yenna ouwngruw itheng khangkhing thengvate ichii nimminghuwga.

Emmenieng rhierheniege, “atelebe idega, belungrier ijana uwmmaa” atehe aphana rahching, nedoung auwmle nepenuw ing inakhangkhing entaalina imaangnachuw thengvate, engkhejege emmenieng ensiijoh chemaahenie.
Changgechuw keningsiihe ningnuw, inthimna aeongmaagechuw, amanaching Thangpa ajuwngnachuw ouwngruwhe itheng khangkhing ninnhingna ithengkhochuw suwhmaaresie.
Ningnuwbe ilengle siim sitigechuw. Iniebe yentena inthim tenamaagemie.
Chonaching iniebe mi lintaanghe khangkhing jaarmaavang aetega changgechuw mengmeniege irhingjeh ing ongvang aetega.
Aejaarheching yenna aejaargehe, Zuw ouwngruwheching yenna ouwngruwgehe.
Changgechuw iniebe siim mi eensuwtaana, aethacha engkhejege ningsie chimsie, raarlukhumlina isiicher tena aminlen asalina niirmeniige belungrier inhehchuw ensuw teruw.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing iniehie abelungsii impinaing ensiimaaga, changgechuw Thangpa Jesu Khrista apaarna irhingna aphanaing ensiiga;
Inieng hangthiejemenie, jaarjemenie, Thangpatho irhinghaanaing irotumna ama ithiega.
Chovelinaching ninnuw ing nintu khangkhing engkhele engkhe ouwngttonuwng enuwmpisaruw.
Keu kene, kesarhe, ningkaarna aenuumhe, Thangpanongna ninchungna aeonghe, ningnuwchuw ouwngrukuhpi emmeniechuw aetthajeing nimminghuwnaing,
Emmenieng nong atulina ningsieing enhimseh ningee janaing ningnuwchuw kinnhiesaagechuw. Ningkaarna ideje apaarna itupeesaruw.
Keningsiihe, etarhechuw rukuruw, Chipina isurhechuw belung ngamna rhierpiruw, ipaangmaahechuw bumsaruw, tesauwngge kimbetthogechuw.
Achuw engkheing itthamaa atulina phuw liemaaruw. Changgechuw engkheing engkhe rotumna mibekhe rotum aettha atunaing apha bekhena ejongpisaruw.
Aphabekhena rotha eminrhopiruw,
Empeh ludeh ing hinthamsaruw.
Alham bekhena mimpaaruw; ajiegachienche heviehie ninrotumna Khrista Jesunhingna Thangnhang ing ameendinga.
Chipi Enthiingchuw ichuwmaaruw
Laarchanghe ttongchuw rothipimaaruw.
Nong etubekhechuw chaang ibeerruw; aetthachuw bechuwtherruw.
Aetthamaa bekhe bethinruw.
Belungriir ideh, Thangnhang dejiim naching iminthiingsaresie; engkhejege ninchipije, irhingna Chipi, engkhejege humna isiicher uwmluing Khrista ajuwngleching ipharesie.
Ningnuwchuw ingeen Thangpachuwbe aetthacha arhuga, amaing amabekhechuw itupeechervate.
Keningsiihe kinrotum ihinthampisaruw.
Enthiing himbeen ouwngjuhching unebekhechuw eberhiimpisaruw.
Emmeniebekhena heve ttongjiirhie ipapiruw tengge Thangpa romhingna keminsernagechuw.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsiiching aphabekhena ningnuwchuw eenrhiephuwresie.
Paul, Silvanus, engkhejege Timothi ing Emapa Thangnhang nhingte, engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khristanhingna aeong Thessolonika ruwhchanghe nhingna;
Epa Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii engkhejege dejiimchuw ninnhingna uwmresie.
Keu kene, kesarhe, ninthachaje hangttha sesehge, ninnajirnaje ningsie uwmsesehchuwge, amalina Thangnhangchuw aphabekhena mimpaa raraa vang kintega.
Chonaching Thangnhang ruwhchang henhingna kinnuwje nimpaarna persauwngge, ijanang, veh immincherhe nimphachuw deerchechuwge ninthachana iniir ninchelina lhuwngsanung.
Hevehie Thangnhang dhormo ichum waajiir amindangnaga, ajiegachienche amaching Thangnhang Eruwngpaamte itung ninchenaga, engkhejege hevelinahing ijanangchuw nindierga.
Ajiegachiinche heve Thangnhang ichumching nintaalina ijanang impihechuw entaalina ijanang peniege,
ijanang nimpha nindiercheching kinnuwtho rotha rhona phahaavateruw. Thangpa Jesu ing Thangven michier atuchepaa hethoh ajimindang iniena amahie suwvang atega.
Thangnhang aminghuwmaaje Thangpa Jesu aettha ttongjiir aminjiemaa hechuw phuw alienaing ittuwngjorjor mhi ing phuw lievate.
Hevehehing ittiim inemaa maangvang ichie tantie phaheniege javatehe, engkhejege emmeniechuw Thangpa athang alaar euwm mhekungna entthevatehe.
Kinnuw ing saarkhie kimpi athachahe ching amaing athang alaarthoh, enthiing mihetho enjuwngle thachabekhe mhekungna inningrhii imaangna phavatehe.
Hevelinahing inie i Tthangnhang ing ningnuwchuw ieenge ichapa thachahe aansuwnaing ninthacha nonglina, aettha atuna ama ruwngperlinaching aphabekhena kinghin nhiiga.
Ama nintutaanaching Thangpa romhingchuw ninsungna minlhuwtenuwge, ningnuw ing anhingna uwmtenuwge, hevehie Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii nimpha taanaga.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista ajuwngle engkhejege anhingte engkongcher nawang ichie lina kenhiisaagechuw,
amachuwbe chipitenagejenie, ttongjiir enjii tenagejenie kinnuw ing kintu ngenge ichiin Thangpa inie ate thengse tehekhangjenie aethupaaing nimwaakhar jamaaresie engkhejege ollaangmaaruw.
Achuwdong ing ningnuwchuw hanghing iminchemaa resie. Ajiegachiinche Thangnhanglina raar ituhe waajiir iuwmmaa maangvang ichii Thangnhang ajehna michuw aamphuwngmaataang amachuw suwhmaa lhienie.
Ama michuwbe ataasaaing Thangnhangging teniege euwmbekhelina aarhumaa athienen ing elhuwngsaching Thangnhang aongna eenna aeongnalina rumvang ichie Thangnhang khangkhing ongvate.
Ningnuwthoh aeonghaale hevebekhehie keminchuwchuwkha ningeenthiemaaga?
Engkhejege ama mi inie aamphuwngnachuw atelechinbe akhaamga ate nimminghuwga.
Ajiegachiinche amaing ningrhiena waajiir iuwmmaaching nong tuge ongne, changgechuw chove akhaamna iniechuw aliejoh maataang suwh maanie.
Engkhejege apha inie chuw aviele waajiir ttongtho aminjiemaa ataachuw emphuwngvate; Thangpa Jesuching anhertena aaphuwching thehniege engkhejege memaangchervate.
ama waajiir iuwmmaaching satan nong atu inhuw ijieng atuchena bekhetho, bietimnabekhetho, amamaa ittiisuwtho,
maangvang atehenhingna enche arhubekhe mincheheniege atataa ningsie nonghechuw arhumaahelina akarpinachuw aphanamaaing emmenieng liemaahe.
Chovelinaching emmenieng amamaachuw thachavang nintega teheniege amamaa nong etunaching Thangnhang ing avibethinga.
Engkhejege atataachuw thachamaa heniege, dhormo ichummaa hum anongena ajonghechuw minlaarvate.

Changgechuw Thangpaing aning imminsii, keu kene, kesarhe, ningnuw khuna apha bekhena Thangnhangchuw amimpaanahie kinnongga, ajiegachienche, ningnuwchuw Thangnhang ing ayen chipi Enthiing ing iminlhiemge atataa ninthachalina isiichertena aminlennaing ingeetourpe.
Chonaching ningnuwchuw Thangpa Jesu Khrista athang alaar nimphanaing, kinnuw ing aettha ttongjiir kimminchuwlina ingeenga.
Chonaching keu kene, kesarhe, inhehpaaing neerruw, kinnher ing kinrhierlinagejenie, kelerii nimpatanagejenie poraatenagejenie amachuw inheh bechuwruw.
Jesu Khrista ataarahching aning iminsiige, ittiim inemaa embetthoh engkhejege ama lungsii apaarna ittha asa euwm Imapa Thangnhangching nimbelungriir iminrhopiresie.
Itthabekhe nong, engkheje ninttong ing immeniechuw betthohnung nimbelungriir nongeresie.
Attuhtaana, keu kene, kesarhe, Thangpa ttonghie ninnhingna isuwkhangkhing enrang enjaamsing, athang alaar alhuwngnaing kinrotumna ihinthampiruw.
Mibekheing thacha aansuw maatanaching mi echuwmaahe, itthamaahelitena eensiih kinchenaing ihinthampisaruw.
Changgechuw Thangpachuwbe aethacha arhuga, amaing imimperpiwate, engkhejege itthamaatena ningnuwchuw ekarvate.
Kinnuw ing kimpi ttongthohechuw ituje nintuga, etuje tuvangninte tesaungge Thangpanhingna asaa kintusaaga.
Thangpaing nimbelungriir chuw Thangnhang ningsiena engkhejege Khristaing akhaang aechelina eenrhiephuwresie.
Keningsiihe, ate Thangpa Jesu Khrista romhingna ttongtho kepigechuw, amachuwbe etarhe engkhejege ningnuw poraalina isimaahe uwnepasahe nhingtena enttheruw.
Ajiegachiinche kinnuw minjievang ninte alham nintaaing nimminghuwse; ajiegachienche ningkaarna kingongle kaatar ing ongsamaauwng.
Kinnuw ing mi lintaangtena ngarhe ing samaauwng, changgechuw ningnuw nintaalina pih arhiinamaaing, nuumsauwngge, ijabekhe khaangsauwngge yen siim nong kintuga;
Kinnuw ing kintuche auwm maa taanamaaga, changgechuw kinnuwchuw nimminjienaing, kintaaing aandangna ninnhingna kimmindangga.
Kinnuw ing mi lintaangtena ngarhe samaauwng, changgechuw ningnuw nintaalina pih arhiinamaaing, nuumsauwngge, ijabekhe khaangsauwngge yen siim nong kintuga;
Ajiegachiinche ningkaarna achuw engkheching nongtuluing etar, ajiedong tuning atemaa emvene ichie kinthiese.
Khangchie uwnehechuw Thangpa Jesu Khrista romhingna ideje thapa susing arinnaing asaasaana ing ttongtho penung betthopiruw.
Keukene, kesarhe, ningnuw ing ittha nong nintulina jamaaruw.
Achuw engkheching heve ttongjiirna kimbejii inhuw ijie ing minjiemaa niebe ama michuw minghuwruw, amaing ningjaa aphanaing enrhiemaaruw.
Immenieching ningnuwchuw enjehnaga ichiin liemaaruw, changgechuw thacha engkhekhang khing irukuhpiruw.
Atebe dejiim impih Thangpa Jesu ing aphabekhena dejiim belungriir alham bekhena. Thangpaing ningnuw bekhechuw eenrhiephuwresie.
Heve lhamsuw thenna hie Paul ketaasaaing kebejiisaaga. Kie kettongjiir bekhena hanghing kebejiiga.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsiiching ningnuw bekhetalina cheengsaresie.
Ingkarpee Aaphuw Thangnhang engkhejege ama ttongtho enhuw ijiing Khrista Jesu ttongjiirpa Paul kieing, kethacha lina kesapa Timothi nhingna,
Thangnhangtena lungsii engkhejege aningsii engkhejege belungrier dejiim Thangpa Jesu Khrista tenachuw uwmsaresie.
Kieing Makedoniate Kesiphana nanhingna kebettho khangkhing Ephesusna aeongpisare, chona amamaaing aminchuwhe mee ongnehe, khangchie meeheching amamaa aminchuwna maaing chingre.

Tepang meeheching entu themhinlina, etang inemaa meesienhe themhinna nabelungriir napeenamaaing ennhingna eennaana abesuwnaahe. Thangnhang nongchuwbe aethachalinaga, khangchie ittongheching ittha ajiidong beshuwhmaahenie.
meehe rotumna avatungna ttongthohchuwbe ningsie linaga. Hangchii ningsii meeheching belungrier enthiing, atataachuw minghuwniege atataa enthacha uwmvang ategehe.
Lintaangheching hanghing temaahe, emmenieing engkhe engkhete bevehege, engkhejege ikanamaavang ate ttong aminjienaahe.
Emmenieng chaadin ttongtho aanchuwpahe enshuwchaangnehe, changgechuw ajie arhiergehe minghuwmaahe; emmenieing amahechuw ajiiga ichieje minghuwluing atunaahe.
Changgechuw waajiir ttongthohchuw aettha ing minjieniebe amachuw itthaga ichii aeminghuwse.

Inieing iminghuwse, amachuwbe dhormo icherhe rotum waajiir ttongtho hie atumaaga, changgechuw waajiir ttong aminjiemaa, ittha atumaahe, Thangnhang amindeenmaa engkhejege isiicher atuhe, enthiingmaa, imaanghe, manuw mapa athehe engkhejege meethehe,
Nepenuw pesarlina ichuwmaahe, eennajir ichamaa ituhe mee aberuhe, echummaaing ittong, atataa ttong arhiermaa engkhejege Thangnhang ttonglina isimaahechuwgehe.
Hevehehie athang alaar aeuwm Thangnhang aettha ttongjiir kenhingte aminserna ama inhuw ijiing atataachuw aminchuwnaing, heve rotumna waajiir ttongthohie atuga.
Kenhingna impee pirthang Khrista Jesu Thangpachuw kemimpaasahna, ajiegachienche anong itunaching kiechuw aekharge, ithacha arhu kenong atuga tege immindangpeepe.
Ayen kieing Thangpalina itthamaa kerhier, veh kemincher engkhejege ningjaa aeauwmmaa meegejening ningsiechuw kephasaape, ajiegachienche kethachaching kehetuga.
Engkhejege Thangnhang lungsii Khrista Jesu apaarna kethacha ama ningsiethoh enrhiing belhiejor ing impeepe.
Khrista Jesuching isiicher etuhechuw akarnaing simriipaamna ijuwngga ate ttonghie aethacha arhuga engkhejege meebekheching aelie arhuga; heve isiicher kaarnahing kieing amhuwrchuwging;
changgechuw ittiim inemaaing irhing Thangpachuw athacha meebekhe nhingna aandangna amhuwr ishuw khangkhing Khrista Jesuching isihpaa idierpige amindangnaing, hevelina kieing ningsii kephasaaga.
Ate ittiim inemaa Eruwng, maangvang atemaa, imhuw ichemaa Thangnhang engkhepang nhingna ittiim inemaa enjaphuw arhu amimpaana ouwngshuwresie. Amen.

Kesiti Timothi, nang nakhuna mensarim Thangnhang ttong keminchuwchie inhuw ijiing heve ttongthohie keminsergechie. Heve keminchuw inhuw ijiing nang ing ittha raarchuw nathacha engkhejege aettha, echummaa ichum aminghuwna belungrier rin ing ouwngtewphuwre;
Nathachalina nonghechuw ture engkhejege atataa tuvang ichiechuw minghuwre. Achuw engkheching hanghing entumaataang enthachachuw ikiegehe.
Himanea engkhejege Alexanderheching hanghing ichiegehe. Kieing emmeniechuw saitaante kepigehe, hanghing ichamaa ttongchuw Thangnhang lina enrhierna maanachinga.
mensarim meebekhe rotum ihinnhiena etupisaruw. Meebekhe rotum ihinnhie, engkhe engkhe rotumna engkhejege mimpaasanuwng hinnheruw.
Eruwnghe rotum, elhuwng pham irinhe bekhe rotum ihinnhie, inhiina, amimpaana etupisaruw.
hevebekhehie Thangnhang mhekungna ittha engkhejege arhuchuwga.
Amaing meebekheching ikarpee aphanaing engkhejege atataa aminghuwnachingga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangle meehe lolaana aminteuchena engkheje aeoumga, amabe Khrista Jesu humna aeuwmga.
Amachuwbe meebekhe aatinpi Khrista Jesuga hevehie taancha ichapaana impeega.
Ajiegachiinche kiechuw ttongjiirpa engkheching ttongjiir aminthangna ikharsage, (kieing atataa kerhierga, amamaa kerhiermaaga) hanghing thacha nonglina lintaang yaati nhingte thiimpuwching engkharpe.
Hanghing ichiing pesarheching belung isii uwmluing ensangchor chor tuluing ingki eenthiing aethoheniege ahinthamchuw kidiega.

Engkhejege nepenuwhejeng ningjaa deenheniege embelungriir suwrhesing aanluna piendeer ivie kidiena. Ensam besieheniege, sana engkhejege mukta amin ilupaaing enthongluing ittha nonglina enthongsaheresie.
Changgechuw emmenieng ittha nong tuheniege entthanachuw amindangna Thangnhangchuw ijavang ategehe.
Nepenuwheching alir ishuw ing pesarhe derna dereng ongheniege ttong rongeheniege minjiewang ategehe.
Nepenuw ing pesarchuw minchuwvang ate engkhejege pesar tahlina ruwngper bechuwvang atemaagehe, emmenieng ideje paarvang ategehe.
Ajiegachiinche Adamchuw mensang asemga, aanhuwna Eve ga;
engkhejege Adamchuw mensang aminchemaaga changgechuw Eve ga.
Changgechuw emmenieng enthacha lina, ningsielina enthiinglina atataa lhamte embelung suwrheniege neh inrinleje karpivatehe.
Heve arhierhie atataaga, achuw engkheching ruwhchangna upa pham tugete teniebe amaing ittha nong aadiega.
Emmeniechuw aromhing itthamaa arinmaa, nepenuw engkhepang puwsar ouwngshuw, Zuw aeenmaa, abelungrier asuwrche, chaang ine ihe, aetthalina ipi ihe, ouwngchuw ihe,
Zuw ouwngruwma, enna ouwngku atumaa; changgechuw abelungrier idoung, aningnge ipermaa, sheer endiepa aeuwmmaa hangchie meevang atega.
Amaing asitihechuw aettha lham ajiena angkhejege aeenkuw sungna aettha nong atuchena eebeer chevang atega.
Achuw engkheching aeengkuwhechuw aabiirna minghuwmaaniebe amaing Thangnhang ruwhchangchuw ajii khang eebeerchewate?
Changgechuw itharpeh belung ihoung meeching tumaaresie, amaing lhuwngtti ttuniege diabol ing aadie waajiirte bowate.
Engkhejege amaing romhing itthamaa rinluing taangte aeongheching itthaga ate aminghuw meevang atega, amanaching diabol chaangna auwnamaang tuvang atega.
Khangkhing ichiing ruwhchangsungna Deakanheje akhu ittha, anonlina belungriir ilhuw, anher itammaa, darkhachiiabedeumaa, sheerpang amindeenmaa meevang atega,
Enthiing, echum alaar minghuwniege Thangnhang ing aminthie atataa enthachalina neervang ategehe,
engkhejege hangchielina mensarim chaang ibiirheresie amabekhechuw tthane ichie nimminghuwnhuwte deakan pham tuvang ategehe.
Khangkhing nepenuwheje mee ing ajahechuw ouwngshuwvang ategehe engkhejege meekhu itthamaapang tongvang atemaagehe, engkhejege anongtubekhena ithacha arhu ouwngshuwvang ategehe.
Deakanheching engkhepang puwsar ouwngshuwheniege asitihe, aeengkuwhechuw ibiirthievang atega.
Ajiegachiinche deakanheching nongchuw itthaje atuheching ataa rotum ittha pham Jesu Khrista nhingna aeuwm athachalina itthachuw aphagehe.
Imen athengnaing kemindinsaaga; changgechuw vathengningbe, Thangnhang eensungna ajiekhang tuvang nintebekhechuw amindangnaing nanhingna kevibejiiga;
Kieing vatherningbe nang ing Thangnhang eengkuwsungna ishuwhechuw minghuwre, amachuwbe irhing Thangnhang ruwhchang chuwga, ama Thangnhang ruwhchangchuwbe atataa ichuh amingkamna aborchuwga.
Amahehie Thangnhang arumna ouwngthupah rhingriega ichii meebekheing arhuga:
“Amaing humna jungeen phuwngse,
Thangpa Chipina atataa dhormo icherchuw abeshuwpe,
Thangven michierheching amhuwpe,
yaatibekhena aminthangpe,
simriipaam ing athachape,
Attheh alaartho enrhieing aadumpehe.

Chipi Enthiingching enthiingkiir arhierga, amachuwbe attuhna inie ahungvieleching mee alhehheching atataa aminchuwhechuw minchin watehe, emmenieching ichamaa chipihe ttongrhier minjie heniege ronham ing aminchuw jievatehe.
Heve hangchie aminchuwhehie mee aminche meetena ethengga, emmenieng ichum aelaarlina ajiidong minghuwmaahenie, ama aminghuwnachuw ensapa thiirching betthiirwate.
Emmenieng riekhie ouwngchum echummaaga tewatehe; engkhejege emmenieing isaa arhumaa isaaphuw uwmne teheniege; changgechuw amabekhechuw Thangnhang ing apigehe teheniege rotha rho ing sachewatehe.
Thangnhang ing asem pihbekhe itthacherga engkhejege Thangnhangchuw mimpaaheniege aelhaangheniebe itthacherga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang arhier enhuw ijieing hinnhemeniege sameniebe enthiingcherga.
Hanghing heve ttongthohehie keu kenehe belungrierna thinpi teniege nang ing nathacha ttongbekhe, atataalina naminjieching ihinjuhniege Khrista Jesu ittha nong aatuchuw ouwngshuw wang niete.
Changgechuw amamaa mhekhuwnuw heching asem themin, enttong liemaare, nathienen ing Thangnhang amindeenchuw ithiseh nahenaing enriimsare.

Ajiegachiinche humtena aminchuwhechuwbe tepiepang aekanagethah, changgechuw Thangnhang anong atuchuwbe alhambekhena aekanaga. Thangnhang anong ituhiebe irhingle bor aphana engkhejege inhuwtenaje eakanaga.
Kieing kerhierhie atataaga, meebekheing lierarahwang atega.
Ajiegachiinche hevelinahing anongje ketuga, achehnaje kejongga, amachuwbe meebekhe rotum, athachahe rotumna ingkarpee aapuw irhing Thangnhangteching iniebekhe asa tumiege iniirgemie.
Hevebekhehie betthoh heteniege minchuw rimvang natega.
Nepanggechie ichiing achuwdong ing ijuummaaresie, changgechuw nattong nalhana, nasi natungna, ningsiina, chipina, ithachana, enthiingna ittha abiechuw thachahe nhingna mindangre.
Kie kethengmaataang meekaarna aettha ttongjiir pateniege, minchuwheng betthohere.
Nanhingna impee kithurchuw nahseenmaa tumaare, hevehie laarchanghe ttong ing upa khuwpuheching imben nataalina sehhege impeegehe.
Hevebekhehie ture, nabelungriir minlhuwng ing tuhere, amaching meeheching nanong ahinthichuw mhuwvatehe.
Natahlina ishuwje embier ing minchuwheteniege natutaana nangje nattong arongehejeng ikarpichuw phawatehe.
Etar upahechuw iper ing rukumaahere changgechuw namapa khangkhing chona nepanghechuw nanehekhangkhing tuhere,
Nepenuw upahechuw nangnuwkhangkhing, lunghaahechuw nasarhe khangkhing belungrier enthiing ing betthohhere.
Mheekhuwnuwhechuw eluw ing tupeeruw.

Changgechuw achuw engkhe mheekhuwnuwching asiti atutihe uwmniebe, asiti atutiheching mensarim Thangnhang amindeenchuw amindangnaing emmapa emmanuw, amapu amapi lertour ahinsingna tuheresie; ajiegachienche heve etuhing Thangnhang ing arhu anongchuwga.
Mheekhuwnuwching athienenpang tatahgeniebe aphabekhena Thangnhangte minchinluing yen siim hinthamsavang atega.
Mheekhuwnuwching humna anongena tuniebe arhingle ithietho enghaaga.
Emmenieching enromhing itthamaa khu auwmnamaaing heve ttongtho hehie pehere.

Amaing ameehechuw ibeerthievang atega, eluwsheh chuwbe, aeengkuwhechuw ibeerthievang atega. Amaing hevehie tumaaniebe amaing atataa athachachuw aminjiemaaga. Ama khangchie meebe athachamaahe ithi ing ichamaaga.
Kum sumru aphamaalhie mheekhuwnuw hechuw mhekhuwnuw kaarna mimvemaaruw, vokhepang een iniebesavang atega.

Ama nepenuwchuw aettha nonglina meeing aminghuw enshuwvang atega, nedounghe ajuhthie, ramkhiemeehechuw isaa-een apithie, enthiinghe khi aatthiipi, ija echaamhe abumpi, aphabekhena ittha nongna belung aminlhuwchegeniebe mhekhuwnuw kaarna mimveruw.
Changgechuw aedoung mheekhuwnuwhechuw ama kaarna mimvemaaruw; ajiegachienche emmenieng Khristachuw beherheniege een inie idewatehe.
mensa ttong indeenbesa akiitaana isiikhate bowatehe.
Engkhejege hangchie nepenuwheching eenbekhena lhuwhege apha amemaangnaahe; Emmenieng thethielhuwngthie vattonghege mee lintaanghe amemaangnaahe, rhiermaavang ichii khuje atongnaahe.
Chonaching aedoung mheekhuwnuwheching een inieching tthawate, siti aberhing, aeengkuw aabiir, ittong chor chor khangchiehe tumaaheniebe aarhumaaheching entaalina ttongmaahenie.
Changgechuw aedoung mheekhuwnuwheching hangchie tuhege ingeenhuw enlehhege diabol ajiinaahe.

Achuw engkhe athacha inhehching auwne kaarna mhekhuwnuw uwmniebe amaing emmeniechuw bumresie, engkhejege ruwhchang ing emmenie hangchie aabiirna minjamaaruw, amaching ruwhchang ing mhekhuwnuw aajuw eengkuw uwmmaaheniebe boumheresie.
Ruwhchang upahe engkhejege nong imminchuwhechuw saruh ennhie ijavang nintega.
Ajiegachiinche aettha ttongjiir ing arhier, “ninuw ing saang aatiir shierchuw anher phiermaaruw; engkhejege nong aatu meeching atumin phawang atega.”
Mee ennhie enthum ing saarkhie ineermaaniege upa engkhechuw lhinmaaruw.
Lintaang meehejeng aanttiinang isiicher aatu upahechuw meehe mhekungna rukuruw.

Adoung achang tuluing, mensaing waajiir tuluing nang ing heve nonghehie naminjiechenaing, Thangnhangtena, Khrista Jesutena, engkhejege aaturbesahe Thangven michierhe mhekungna nanhingte keminsernagechie.
Achuw engkhe nhingna enrang naki baangmaare, engkhejege; Lintaanghe isiikha atuhe kaarna emvemaa, nathienen enthiing ing ngasare.
Chiipang eenmaare, changgechuw, navin aatthamaataana engkhejege aphabekhena nasurtanaching darkha chii tepie een.
Mee alhehheching isiicher atuhechuw endangcherga, engkhejege, isiicher atuhechuw wajiir atuna immana iheuwmga; changgechuw lintaangheching atuhechuw enhuwte ouwnghuwphene.
Khangkhing ichieng aettha aatuhechuwbe endangcherga, engkhejege oumphuwng maajenie thurchemaanie.
Thangnhang romhing engkhejege ttongthohchuw aetthamaaing atongnamaaing shuwh bekheching aapuhe chuw aejawang ategehe.

Thachahe aapu aeuwmheching unepasa khangkhing aeuwm gekhage emmeniechuw nahseenma tumaaheresie; changgumpachuw unepasa enshuwgehe, ajiegachienche nong entulina ikana aphahe thachaheching ningsieing innhingna tuheresie. Heve nonghehie minchuwhenung betthohheruw.
Achuw engkheing amamaa ttongtho minchuwniege engkhejege atataa ttong. Thangpa Jesu Khristatena, engkhejege Thangnhang ing amindeen inhuw ijieing ttongtaachuw rhumaaniebe.
Ama mee amamaa aminchuwlina elhuwngsagetha, ajiidong aminghuwmaaga, amaing ningnge tuna ttong engkhejege mee menaana atuga, amaching kallaa, imbinna, itthamaaing ettong, ichamaapang akhar;
itthamaa meenhingtena ttonglha shuwhna ahinringa. Emmenie hangchiitena atataa aeuwmmaa, Thangnhang amindeenhie kanavang ichii lhamga tege akharhe atataa lham amemochuwgehe;
Ajiegachiinche abelungrier ingam ing Thangnhang amindeenching ithiseh akanaga.
Ajiegachiinche simriipaamna ajiedong jinrinmaamie engkhejege ithihleje ajiedong rinmaamie.
Changgechuw isaaphuw, iserphuw dinmeniebe belung ngamvate.
Changgechuw sawang shuwning ateching aethachamaa lhamte, chaangsungte engkhejege inhuwr lham itthamaate ebowgehe, hangchiehing meehechuw aemaangnate abebugehe.

Ajiegachiinche sheer aadiepaa belungriir ing maangvang ichiitaate abebuga, emmenie sheer inhimseh phaning entetaana ichumchuw bethinhege sinehe, engkhejege ijanang ing entaalina isii asinkhangkhing janehe.
Changgechuw Thangnhang mee nang ing hevebekhetena ensinsare, engkhejege dhormo icher nong, Thangnhang amindeenna, nathachalina, ningsielina, aekhaang ichelina belungriir aettha inhuw jiesare.
Aettha raarchuw ouwngteuphuw, ittiim inemaa irhingnachuw bechuw, amateching nangchuw ingeenpe, engkhejege meehe mhekungna saarkhiebekhe aettha arhiernachuw naphuwngpe.
Aeuwmbekhelina irhingna aapi Thangnhangtena engkhejege Pontus Pilat nhingna aettha ttong amimphuwng amana saarkhie apih Jesu Khrista mhekungna kieing nanhingte keminsernagechie.
Heve ttongtho bekhehie belungriir elhuw ing minjie, amahie Thangpa Jesu Khrista athengmaataang tuvang natega.
Bor impee aapuw, engkhejege Engkhepang attheh alaar aeuwm, Eruwnghe chungna Eruwng, aapuhe chungna aapuw, ithie inemaa, atuchehcher anhingna aeuwm,
Achuwdong ing amhuwmaa, emhuw achemaa Thangpachuw uwmphuwngvang atechuw Thangnhang ing taancha aetthana imindangpiwate; anhingna enjashuwpah ittiim inemaaing ipaar uwmresie. Amen.

Simriipaamna atele aeong sawanghenhingna minserhere, emmenieng belungriir lhuwngttumaa heresie, ouwnghuw ichemaa lerchiilina belungriir peluing iniebekhechuw impeeche, pih bekhe ouwngshuwhjor impee Thangnhangnhingte emmenieing haajeheresie.
Itthachuw tuheresie, aetthalina sawang ashuwnaing, atunaing, epeeh aehe amana lintaanghethoh isim ihe ouwngshuwheresie.
Hanghing emmenieng atataa irhingnachuw bechuwheniege, hungvievang ichii apha rotumna ittha eenmhinkhangkhing enrotum minghuwngsaheresie.
Timothi, nanhingna keminserna chiehie ibeerthiehere, Achuw engkhe Thangnhangtenamaa ichamaa aettong enhuwrhe nongtena inseensare;
lintaangheching changchiilina kimminghuwga tehege atataa enthachachuw abethingehe.
Thangnhang lungsii ing ningnuwbekhechuw eenrhiephuwresie.
Khrista Jesunhingna irhing ttongneer Thangnhang ing amindeen inhuw ijieing Khrista Jesu ttongjiirpa Paul kieing,
kening keminsii kisiti Timothi nhingte Aepa Thangnhangtena Thangpa Jesu Khrista ama lungsii, aningsii engkhejege belungriir dejiim uwmresie.
Tiena aemapa aemapuching atuhebekheching kewaakhar enthiing ing anong ketu Thangnhangchuw kemimpaashana, hanghing yen siim neluing kehinthamshaale enthiinchiege kemimpaaga.
Namheeriichie ibowchuw enthiin ge nangchuw mhuwningchie kete kerotha rhohnachuw phasanggete.
Kieing atataa nathacha keenthiese. Changchii nathacha mensana namapi Lois engkhejege nangnuw Eunisga. Nangjeng ama nge ngeh nathachachuw keminghuwse.

Hevelinahing nanhingna Thangnhang ing impee keethur naanthienaing keedieshana. Ama Thangnhang keethurhie keki nataalina kebaangle naphaga, ama napha keethurhie alhuwngnaseseh mhee ittuwngkhangkhing ttuwngresie.
Thangnhang ing eniehie enttii chipi impeemaaga changgechuw Thangnhang ing chipi ruwngper engkhejege ningsii engkhejege atah adierna chipi impeega.

Chotahnaching Thangpa jesuchuw meekaarna aetong naning minjaamaa, engkhejege kieje naning iminjaanamaare ajiegachienche Thangpa khuna meekhumsungna ongning, changgechuw aettha ttongjiirlina kietho ija khaangsate, Thangnhang ing amahie atuchena paangkar impeese.
Thangnhang ing ikarpige enthiing meehechuw embesuwpe. Amabekhehie aenieng itutaana ishuwmaaga, Amaing ikarpige, insempiga; ajiegachienche amahie amaing aadie inhuw ijiing ama lungsii impeega.

Heve lungsiihie ayen abetthiimpele Jesu Khrista apaarna impeega. Changgechuw atebe aeniechuw ingkarpee aapuw Khrista apaarna uwmphuwngse. Thangpaching ethiechuw memaangge, aettha ttongjiir apaarna irhing engkhejege ithie inemaachuw anhingna eenjipipe;
Heve aettha ttongjiir hevelina kiehie ttongjiir aminjaamna Ttongjiirpa engkhejege aanchuwpaing eenthinsape.

Hevelinahing kieng ijaachaam kekhaangsaaga; changgechuw kening minjamaaing, ajiegachienche kieing kethacha Thangpachuw keminghuwga, engkhejege ama Inie iphang amaing kiechuw ikorsavate atehie kethachaga.
Khrista Jesulina aeuwm nathachana engkhejege ningsiilina, nang ing kenhingtena nathiebesa atataa ttonghekha minjietihre.
Nanhingna keminserna aetthachuw isungna inthin chipi Eonthiing apaarna bichuwther.
Phigelus engkhejege Hermogenes emveng Asiana aeongbekheing kiechuw imahege ichii ttonghie nang ing naminghuwga.
Onesiphorus eengkuwhechuw Thangnhang ing inning minsiiheresie tengge Kethamsaana, ajiegachienche amaing kiehie apha inhimpah rotha imminrhoga. Amaing kie meekhumna aeongga ichii aning iminjaamaa.
Changgechuw amaing Romte awaale belung elhuwpaa kiechuw enjongsaaga.
Thangnhang ing ama inienaching aningsiichuw phasaniege lungsiichuw Thangnhangtena ataalina uwmsaresie. Engkhejege amaing Ephesusnaje aettha entupiga ichii naminghuwga.
Kesiti nang ing, Jesu Khrista nhingna aeuwm lungsiinaching inhehpaaing ongsare.
Keing nang keminchuwchiekha mee lintaangjeng amabekhe aminghuwgehe amahechuw emmeniehejeng mee lintaangte minchuw saheresie.
Jesu Khrista aettha raarmi engkhe khangkhing ija ikhaang achenaing ture.
Raarmee engkhe ouwngshuwching aalhuwnghe ttongtho inhuw ijiing tuning atega engkhejege raarmeeching aphachuw meebekheing atuhechuw aminjiegehe.
Enlaana itenheching, amaing achehnaing asina hechuw minjiechewang ategehe.
Enuumpa lhie aathiepaching chiibaar ihungthengchuw mensa phavang atega.
Kieng ajii kerhierga mindeensare, ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing hevebekhehie aminghuwna ipesaresie.
Jesu Khrista behermaa, amabe David sungkhourtena aberhing engkhejege ithiehekaartena ihangrhingga, ama ttong keminjaamhie aettha ttongjiirga.
Hevelinahing tumaavang ichii alaarpachuw ouwngshuw ingge thiirrhuw ing emphierchuwging; changgechuw Thangnhang ttongchuwbe iphier arhumaaga.
Chonaching kieng hevebekhehie khaang ingge kerhuga, hevehing Thangnhang ing aateurbesahechuw Jesu Khrista nhingna aeuwm ikarpeena aphanaing keboumgehe, ama athang alaarchuwbe ittiim inemaaga.
Arhier ttonghie atataaga:
Inieing amatho thehaame niebe Thangpatho hangrhingha vateruw;
Inieching ijaachaam khaangche meniebe Amatho paarhaa vateruw;
amachuw rhumaa meniebe,
amajeng irhumaanie.
Inieng aethacha uwmmaajenie.
Thangpabe aphabekhena thachana aeuwmjega.
Hevehehie ennhingna tongpiruw, engkhejege aekana maavang ichii, aathieheching amamaate rongevang ate ttong, ennaana ttong shuwvang ichii hechuw Thangnhang mhekungna minttiiheruw.
Atatah ttonghechuw echumjeh tongpiruw, ningjaana alham aeuwmmaa aatu meeching, Thangnhang nhingte arhuchenang ataararahchuw apeedohna turesie.
Changgechuw imaangna ittong thaang thaang mee Kaarna emvemaa; ajiegachienche emmenieng Thangnhang amindeenmaa belungrier hinthiseseh wate.
Engkhejege emmenie ttongching ahinsaaseseh lena khangkhing hinrinvatehe; engkaarna Himanea engkhejege Philetusjegehe.
Atebe avonhie ihangrhingchuw uwmmaanie teheniege atataatena mee tepiehe eenthachachuw memaang watehe.

Changgumpachuw Thangnhang eenmhin enlaamaadeh amachuwbe uwmjene, amahie bejiihge aeuwmga: “Thangnhang ing ameehechuw aminghuwse,” engkhejege “Thangnhang romhing aeenbekheching dhormo ichermaa nong bethinheresie.”

Ilhuwngpaa eensungna sanaing atu, lupaing asem bekamjekhiipang aeuwm maaga changgechuw thing ing atu, per ing atu aeuwmga, bekam jekhie kaarna alhehhechuw aetthaseh nongtuna, lintaanghechuw elelhaa nong etuna rotumgehe.

Chonaching achuw engkheching atahchuw eonthiingje seniege, ama meechuwbe iluwpaa nong ituna minsuwvate, aminthiingbesa aapuw ing sichinnawang ichii aekana, aettha nong bekhena abethong bekamchuw eenshuwvate.
Changgechuw iler lunghaahe ichamaa entubekhetena eenseensare, engkhejege eenthiing belungrier aeuwm Thangnhangchuw aanhinhe dhormo icher, thacha nong, ningsiina, belungriir ide inhuw jiire.
Changgechuw inhuwr, ipangpaa ttong ing enna oungkuw ishuwga ate minghuw ing amatena impimre.
Engkhejege Thangnhang meeneheching enna oungkuh tumaavang ategehe, changgechuw atubekhena belungriir aedoung, ouwngchuw aehe, ikhaang ache,
Ichamaahechuw belungriir aettha lhamte hingkivang atega; ama atuching Thangnhang ing emmeniechuw echum lham belungrier ikih chevate.
Engkhejege diabol ing chaang achouwng sungna uwhvang ichiitena abethinchuw phavate.
Hevehie minghuwruw, amachuwbe attuna iniehe ahimphale belungriir jana attuna iniehechuw shuwvate.

Changchii inienaching meeheching enthenenpang amindeen sheerpang ajong apha vievate. Emmenieng belungriir lhuwngttittuing meehechuw thosamaahenie, meekhu aetthamaapang ttongvatehe. Manuw mapa ttongrhier minjiemaahenie, aettha atupee aminghuwmaa, entershuwpaa,
engkhele engkhe ningsii impemaa, belungriir enleh arhumaa, meepang aminlaar, atah asuwr achemaa, atherpang iphuwr, aettha hechuw abeter uwmphuwngvate.
Itthamaa meehetho enleh nong itu, waakhar tuluing nong atu, iphingpaa, elhuwngttittuh arin, Thangnhang ningsii aeuwmmaa hum ing aadiete ishi,
Thangnhang amindeen ngenge teniege atataa Thangnhang ningsii lham ajiemaa hangchiebekhetena impeemsare.

Ajiegachiinche hangchieheching eensung eensungte valhuwheniege ipaangmaa nepenuwhechuw peuhvatehe; Emmenie hangchie nepenuwhechuw isiicher paagehe. Khangchii nepenuw echuwmaaheching ichamaa nong tuvatehe.
Hangchii nepenuwheching eethar ttongpang thiening tewatehe changgechuw atataachuwbe minghuwmaadehhenie.

Jannes engkhejege Jambres hehie behermaaruw. Emmenieng Mosichuw rhumaahe. Emmeniehetho enghaagehe. Emmenieng atataachuw rhumaahe, emmeniehie aettha akhar achemaa meegehe engkhejege thacha lham ajiena jongchemaahe.
Changgechuw ouwngtubekhe hanglhuwng chemaanie amana meebekheching inhuwrgehe tewate. Hanghing Jannesle Jambres nhingna ishuwga.
Ate nang ing ketu keenlhiingbekhe naminghuwga. Ketu nong kewatungna, kethacha, kekhaangche, ningsii nong ketu namhuwcherga.
Ijachaam engkhejege kenangnabekhe, amana Antiokna, Ikoniumna engkhejege Listrana. heve amhinbekhena ijachaam kephabekhena, changgechuw Thangnhang ing kejaanabekhetena ingkarpeega.
Atatahga, Jesu Khrista nhingna Thangnhang amindeenheching hangchie ijachaam khaangvatehe.
Engkhejege mee aetthamaa heching mee mincheheniege aetthamaa hinthivate, changgechuw entaa rarahje inhuwrteching bowatehe.
Changgechuw nang ing natambekhe achuw nhingtena natamga amalina niirjere.
Engkhejege nasiimnale betthiimge eonthiing aettha ttongjiir naminghuwbesaga; Khrista Jesuchuw ithacha apaarna isiichertena imminlenbesaga ichieching naviernachuw impeebesaga.
Aettha ttongjiir bekhehie Thangnhang ing impeega, engkhejege amahie mee aminchuwnaing, ichummaachuw arokunaing, aminchumnaing, dhormo echum ing ajiechenachuwga.
Chonaching Thangnhang ameeheching aminghuwcher achehna nongbekhena aettha atuchehnaga.
Thangnhangle Jesu Khrista mhekungna irhinghe, engkhejege ithiehelina waajiir tuvang ate, ama Eruwng lepaa uwmphuwngvang ichielina, engkhejege avonhie juwngvang ate ttonghie keminsernagechie.
Aettha ttongjiirhie minjaam, apha bekhena enthongre, meeheching enthachanaing vatongpeehere, aekhaang achehnaing tu, naminchuw bekhechuw imminghuwchehnaing, rokuhere engkhejege betthohhere.

Ajiegachiinche emmenieching aettha naminchuwhechuw ikhaang chehmaavang ate inie hungvievate, changgechuw meeheching lintaang aanchuwpahe jongheniege emmenieng amindeenchuw tongvatehe, engkhejege emmenieheching meeing rongening atepang tongvatehe.
Atatah ttongjiirchuw minchinheniege rongewatehe engkhejege amamaa theminhechuw minjiewatehe.
Changgechuw nangbe aphabekhena enriimsare, Aettha Ttongjiir hie minjaam, engkhejege Thangnhang sepohing tuvang atebekhechuw tu.
Kie atebe hevelina chipi bethinrong ketega, engkhejege engkevang kete aphaje innheengse.
Aettha raar ouwngtuphuw wang ichiibekhe keenteuphuwpe, tuvang ketebekheje kebetthupe, kethachaje kengahsahpe.

Atele betthiimge engkhejege dhormo icher luhuchuw kerotumna ensiihpeepe, amahie dhormo icher Aapuw Thangnhangching ama inienaching ipesavate; amahie kenhingnapang impeemaaga changgechuw Thangpa itheng ahaajeh meebekhe nhingnaga.
Kenhingte enrang athengchena etupeesare,
Ajiegachiinche Demusing simriipaamnongte abelung minlhuwge image Thessolonikate engkese, kreskenching Galatiate, amana Titusching Dalmatiate engkesehe.
Luk chuwbe kietho onghaanuwng. Markchuw jong ing virhiere, ama kenhigna aekanapaaga.
Changgechuw Tichikusche Ephesuste kecheerpe.
Troasna Karpusnhingna kemaa pien iserphuw, lerii bekhetho, elusehchuwbe savinna enjiikha, nang ing nathengle aeve rinpeerimre.
Kori thier aatupa Alexanderching ketaalina aetthamaapaa atuga; Thangnhang ing atahlina aatu enhuw ijieng lholhaa ethuwrpiwate.
Amalina nangje enriimsare; ajiegachienche amaing iminjaambekhe ttongjiir itu ichenamaaing atuga.
Mensarim kerotumna aettongsaging, hevelina achuwdong ing ebuwmsamaase; meebekheching emmaape, emmeniechuw Thangnhang ing kuhpecheresie.

Changgechuw ttongjiir keminjaamhie kebetthuwchernaing engkhejege lintaang yaatiheching athiechenaing, Thangnhang ing keboumna iniirpeege paangkar impeese; engkhejege. Kiehie rhimpuw behtena engkarpeega.
Thangnhangching ketaalina itthamaa tuvang ichii bekhetena ikarpeege Ama Thangven lepaa iphang irhiipeevate. Thangnhang athang alaarchuw ittiim inemaa uwmresie. Amen.
Priskale Akuila chuw, engkhejege Onesiphorus eengkuw bekhehechuw lhamsuw kethengehe.
Erustus hie Korinthna kemaape, engkhejege Militana Trophimus anaatahna kemaape.
Pherbie aphamaalhiele athengna itupeesare. Eubulusjeng lhamsuw enthenna, Amana Pudens, Linus, Klaudia, engkhejege Khristana unebekhejeng lhamsuw enthennaahe.
Thangnhang ing nachipitho eenrhiephuwresie.
Lungsii nanhingna cheengresie.

Thangnhang ing aatourbesa engkhejege Thangnhang ing amindeen atataachuw aetthajehing aminghuwchena, Thangnhang ameene engkhejege Jesu Khrista ttongjiirpa Paul kieng ittiim aenemaa rhingrie auwmna ttongneer mindeensa ingge–
Ittiim aenemaa emindeentahna eminghuw ama ithacha ithengchuw Thangnhang ing ayen ttong adeenbesaga, engkhejege Thangnhangchuwbe amamaa arhiermaadehga.
Ama aphanaraaching attongrhierchuw mimphuwngge, ttongchuw simriipaamna minjaamge, ama ttong bekhechuw imminlenpee Thangnhangching kenhingna imminsernape.
Tita nanhingna, atataa Kesapa ouwngshuw nataalina Ipa Thangnhang engkhejege imminlenpee Aapuw Khrista Jesu lungsii engkhejege dejiimchuw cheengresie.
Nong ituphuw ivehbekhechuw etu arhubekhe abetthunaing Kretna kemaagechie. Engkhejege nang ing khuwpuwbekhena ajiekhangchii upahe itourvang ichiega atechuw aatournaing kemaagechie.
Upa eenshuwvang atehechuwbe, echummaa ataalina ronher ichamaa arinmaa, alumhi engkhepang aeuwm, asitiheje thachalina irhingche; erhier ttong aminjiehe enna ouwngku aeuwmmaa sitivang ategehe.

Ajiegachiinche upa ouwngshuwheching Thangnhang nongchuw ibeerthiewang ategehe. Chonaching atahlina ichummaa ronher irin ouwngshumaavang atega. Amaing belungriir elhuwng ttittuw, arinnepang ajong, changmaamieche abelung isiethaang thaang meemaawang atega. Darkha chii eenbourmaavang atega. Amaing meethoh embinmaawang atega. Engkhejege mee memunaniege aphabekhena sawang aanshuwna tumaawang atega.
Upa Eenshuwching meehechuw ebumpee ihe, aettah aadie, abelungriir asuwrche, eenthiing. Engkhejege atataalina niirchewang atega.
Aatatah minchuwvang ichiechuw abetthohchena, ttongrhier akhihechuw enlaar amindangchena, ttong aminchuw bekhe ithacha arhu aetthajehing abechuwche upavang atega.
Ama kaarnaching meettongrhier aminjiemaahe, aekanamaa ajiidongmaa lina ittong chorchor engkhejege meehechuw amamaate akihe uwmnehe, engkhejege vintin khuna ittonghechuwga.
Emmenie hangchie nher mingkhumchewang atega; hangchie meeheching sheer aadie tahnaching minchuw maavang ichiechuw minchuwhege, mee eengkuw inhimpah abekhiigehe.
Kretna emmee laarchangpa engkheching arhier, “Kretna aeonghechuwbe apha bekhena atataa rhiermaahe, itthamaa rampasa, kaatar, pibowr ilhuwnggehe.”
Ama saarkhiehie atataaga. Emmenieing atataachuw aminjienaing eper ing rukupihere.
Emmenieing Jehudihe themin engkhejege ttongthohchuw minjiehege atataachuw arhumaagehe.
Eenthiing meehenhingnachinbe aangkheng eenthiingcherga; changgechuw aemaanghe, enthacha aeuwmmaahenhingna ajiidong aeuwmmaahe immindeen itthamaa ittha minghuwluing ebourgehe.
Emmenieching Thangnhangchuw kimminghuwga atenaahe, changgechuw entu nonghechingbe arhumaadehgehe; emmeniebe entershuwpaa, ttongrhier aminjiemaa engkhejege aettha nonglina ajiidong aekanamaagehe.
Changgechuw nang ing ittha dhormo icher sinachuw aminjienaing minchuwhere,
pesar upaheching embelungriir asuwrche, embelungriir edour, evier engkhejege, enthachana, ningsiena idiirchena inheh ouwngshuwheresie.

Khangkhing ichiing nepenuw upahejeching enthiing ing paarvang ategehe, emmenieing mee khu aetthamaa tongmaaheresie engkhejege darkha chii inhim eenmaavang ategehe. Emmenieing aetthachuw tongvang ategehe.
Hanghing ichiing emmenieing aedoung nepenuw heching empuwsarhe, ensitihechuw inning minsiivang ategehe.

Emmenieching aedoung nepenuwhechuw avierna engkhejege enthiing ing empaarnaing engkhejege eengkuw aabiirthiehe ouwngshuwvang ategehe, lungsii ihe engkhejege empuwsarhe ttongrhier aminjiechehe meevang ategehe. Hanghing Thangnhang ttonglina aetthamaa entaalina lintaang ing ttongmaahenie.
Khangkhing ichiing aedoung pesarheching embelungriir asuwrchenaing minchuwhere.
Entubekhena entah entaaing aettha nong ituchuw aanshuwnaing mindanghere.
Engkhejege nang ing nattongtaana iminlaarchemaawang ichii atataa ttonghechuw mindangre. Amaching nataalina aettonghechuw ningjaa phasa vatehe.
Shuwheching alhambekhena aapuwhe ttong aminjiechena, entubekheching aejasaheniege besangmaavang ategehe,
emmenieching Aapuwhe pee beromaavang ategehe, apha bekhena aapuwheching aethacha arhuchuw enshuwvang ategehe.
Ajiega chiinche hanghing entutaana Thangnhang ing ikarpisage aettha nong atuchegehe atechuw mindangvang ategehe.
Heve Thangnhang lungsii hing simriipaamna iuwm aadiehchuw rhuluing, belungriir suwrchemeniege, dhormo icher ing irhing ichenachuwga.
Hanghing elhuwngpaa Thangnhang engkhejege aeniebekhe ingkarpee Jesu Khrista hehaameniege rhingvang aetega.
Iniebekhe isiichertena ikarpige engkhejege, aetthamaatena ningvesangje ipege, amapang ing adeen enthiingchuw ipesage ataachuw aerotumna ithiega.
Heve ttonghie minthangre, ninchebekheching betthohhere. Achuwchuwgejenie ataalina thou ensamaa entu enshuwmaaresie.
Emmenieing aapuwhe, aatuchehe upahe derna apaarna, ttongrhier aminjieche aettha nongbekhena atuchenaing minchuwhere.

Achuw engkhe lina aetthamaa enttongnamaaing, angengeh elhuwng aeuwmmaa, belung aettha amindangna, belungriir idoung ing auwmchena, lintaanghe nhingnaje ittha belungriir amindangche hangchiehie meebekhena amindangnaing minchuwhere.

Ajiegachiinche ayen inieje inhuwr, ttongrhier aminjiemaa, ichamaing ittong, hum ing aadie lintaanghechuw ituga, engkhejege kummhehpalate belung minlhuwmiege, engkhele engkhe ennermiege entershuwpaa meegemie.
Changgechuw ingkarpee Aapuw Thangnhang ningsii ajimindangpe.
Thangnhangtho aateuchena dhormo icher etuching owungshuwluing, amaing aning imminsii enhuw ijieing Thangnhang ing chiina eetthiege engkhejege Chipi Enthiingna imintharpeege ingkarsaape.
Ama Thangnhang Chipichuw itaalina Jesu Khrista apaarna ajilhiega.
Chonaching alungsii iriikumna ittiim inema asa aminchum irhingnachuw iphape,
Heve arhierhie atataaga.
Kieng hevelinahing meebekheing atataaga ichii aminghuwchuw keediesaanaa. Thangnhang athacha meebekheching aettha nong etu irhing ing apaarna enriimsaheresie.

Changgechuw aenhourhe khangkhing ittong thaangthaang, aekanamaa eengkuhelina ittong, meeheching Mosi ttongtholina ttonghege belungriir aminjaa, enna uwngku abeshuwtena inseensare. Hangchii ituching meerotum ikana ajiidong hinrinchemaanie.
Engkhele engkhe amintthena aatuhechuw mensarim rokunung rhuwmaaniebe avonhienaching rokuruw.
Hangchii meechuw ichamaa isiicher aatuchuwga, ichamaa atuching alaarchuw ataaing amindangga.
Kieing Artemas changmaanieche Tichikus chuw nanhingte vicheerningge Nikopolis phana nang ing kenhingte athengnaing itupeesare; ajiegachienche amanaching pherbie tongning ketesaanaa.
Waajiir aehepah Zenas engkhejege Apolos hechuw belung ilhuwpahing eveh uwmludehing vithahere.
Emeeheching aettha nong itunaing paarheresie; lintaangheching kanavang ichii aettha tuhesing ittha aandangnamaachuw enshuwmaahenie.
Kiethoh aeonghaa bekhetho lhamsuw kinthennaachuw. Lungsiiching ningnuw bekhetalina cheengresie.
Jesu Khrista nonglina meekhumsungna aeong Paul engkhejege keukene Timothi–
Keningsii kilhang, nong etuhaa Philimonnhingte,
