Chona kinsarhe Apphia nhingteje; nong kintuhaa Archipus nhingte naeensungna engkonghe ruwchang nhingna;
Imapa Thangnhangtena engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsii dejiimchuw ninnhingna uwmresie.
Kieing kethamsaahle aphabekhena Thangnhangchuw mimpaasaingge keenthienaachii.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpa Jesu nhingna thachabekhelina naning naminsii engkhejege nathachachuw kethiega.
Kethamsaachuwbe nathachalina Khristatena iphabekhe aettha nonghechuw minghuwsiingniete,
Naningsii nongbekhena kerotha aerhosapaaga engkhejege belungriir lhuwngnaje kephasaaga, ajienachiinche keukene eensuw napaarna enthiinghe belungriir naminrhohse.
Hevelinahing kieing thona aettha nanong natulina Khrista nhingte lhuwngsaingge kebetthohgechie,
Changgechuw Paul kie tarsing, engkhejege ate Khristalina meekhumna ateleje aeongging.
Kieing kesiti meekhumsungna keberhing Onesimus khulina kerhiirsaana.
Amahie ayen nanhingna ajiidong ekanamaaga, changgechuw atebe kenhingnaje, nangnhingnaje ekanachuw hungeenshuwse.
Ataararaaing keselungriir nanhingte kepee khangkhing amahie kevibelisaaga.
Amaing namahuhna aettha ttongjiirlina meekhumna aeong kenong eentupinaing kenhingna amahie sening ketega;
Changgejenie nang naningsiichuw etumaa arhumaaga ichiing uwmluing, natunumpa khangkhing ouwngsuwhsing, nang ing narhumaachuw tuning tesamaaing.
Ajiegachiinche ittiimmaa apha nang ing avonhii napha arhunaing, hevelina apha tepie nanhingtena imminttheje arhuse;

Atebe suwh ouwngshuwluing, shuwh ithi ing aetthaseh naning naminsii une ibeshuwpisaing kening keminsiih ithi ing nang ing naning iminsiipivangniete, humtena ningsiihchumaaniege Thangpanhingna naning naminsiih uwmsaresie.
Kiehie naalhang engkhega ichiing iliepiteniebe Onesimushie avonhie iliepisare.
Amaing nanhingna alaarna uwmjenie, lerchii atour uwmjenie amabekhechuw kenhignte aemingkaapisare.
Paul, ketaaing kebejiisaaga amachuwbe amaing atour bekhechuw kieng belisawang gete; engkhejege, amapangmaage nataararaaje kenhingna ler natourse ichii kerhiersahmaaga.
Uwng, keu kene, Thangpa apaarna nanhingtena ikanapah emboumchuw keediega. Khrista apaarna kebelungriir imindepisare.
Heve kebejiih ttongjiirhie itupiwangniete ichii mindeensaingge kevibejiiga, kemindeensaachuwbe heve ithi ing kenhiisaachiehie etupiwangniete.
Engkhejege, kie ketungna adeen ibethongpisare. Thangnhangnhingte nahinthamtaana kie ehungngeenlina phasawanggete tengge kemindinsaanaa.
Jesu Khristalina kietho meekhumna aeonghaa Epaphrasing nangchuw lhamsuw enthennaa.
Engkhejege kiethoh nong kintuhaa Mark, Aristarkus, Demas, engkhejege Luk emmeniejeng lhamsuw enthennaahe.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista lungsiiching nachipichuw eenrhiephuwsaresie.
Ayenching Thangnhang ing tiena aemapuw henhingna engkhejege Laarchangpahe apaarna Thangnhang ing rhierge,
changechuw changchii iniehechuw ahuwngvienhuwte Asapa apaarna aenhingna irhierpeege. Ama apaarna simriipaamna aeuwmbekheje esempeege anhingna peebekhe irii ikumpa hungeenshuwse.

Asapaching attheh alaarthoh enrhieng Thangnhangchuw mindangge engkhejege Thangnhang amapa rarahchuw aandangnaga. Asapaching amaing atuche ruwngper attongching peebekhe akilina sege meebekhe isiicher minlhiemcherge thangvenna Aalhuwngseh atachangna ongse.
Thangnhang ing Thangven meechierlina engkaangseh romhing minringe asapachuw thangven meechierhe tahlina ilhuwngsehchuw hungeenshuwse.
Thangnhang ing hangchiehie thangven meechier henhingna rhiermaadeh, amachuwbe,
“Nanghie kesapagechie,
atenie kieng keberhinggechie.”
Thangnhangjeching thangven meechierhe nhingna hevehie rhiermaadeh,
“kie amapa ouwngshuwvanggete,
engkhejege amaing kesapa ouwngshuwvate.”
Engkhejege Thangnhang ing asapa amhuwrchuw simriipaamna ajincheerle, amaing arhier.
“Thangven meechierheching Asapachuw rumheresie.”
Thangnhang ing thangven meechierhelina arhierchuwbe;
“Thangnhang ing thie khangkhing asemgehe,
engkhejege ameenehechuw mhee ittuwng khangkhing asemgehe.”
Changgechuw Asapa khuna hanghing arhier,
“O! Thangpa naaruwng ongnachuwbe ittiim inemaaing uwmjehvate,
naaruwng lepaachuw dhormo icher ing waajiir tuvangniete.”
Dhormo icherhechuw naning minsiichiege,
aetthamaahechuw beterchiege,
ajiegachienche Thangnhang,
na Thangnhangching rotha rhohna thou eetehge aalhanghechuw aminthiga.
Engkhejege,
Oh Thangnhang, abor borna lolhiepaam semchiege amana minvenhie nakiching nasemga;
Emmeniebekhe thechervatehe,
changgechuw nangbe uwmjehvangniete,
emmeniechuwbe pienkhangkhing ijuwrwate.
Piendeerkhangkhing aejuwrvate,
pienkhangkhing entehchervate changgechuw nangbe angenge uwmjevangniete nakumje aetang nemaanie.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing thangven meechierhenhingnachingbe hanghing rhiermaadeh:
“Nang eenrhumaa meehechuw nakhiderna nasiihmaataang ketachangna ongre?”
Emmeniechuwbe isiichertena aminlenpee meehechuw aboumna nong atunaing ajihcheer chipihe maagekhang?
Chotahnaching inieng bovanggete temeniege, inah ing ithiebesahe ttonghe tahlinahing aebelungriir minlhuwsehvang aetega.
Ajiegachiinche thangven meechier apaarna ttongjiirhechuw atataageniebe, engkhejege isiicher, ttongrhier aminjiemaa entubekhelina tantie phavang ategehe.

Inieng hangjehmeh ilhuwng isiichertena imminlenpeehie naseenmaa meniebe ajiekhang irhingchuw phavang aetega? Thangpa apaarna mensarim isiichertena imminlenpee ttonghie aphuwngbesaga, amattong aathieheching atataaga tehege amenhehgehe.
Amasungnaching Thangnhang ing bietimnahe, luwrhiina nonghe, lintaang lintaang ittiishuwpapaa mindangge engkhejege amaing amindeen inhuw ijieng chipi Eenthiing kihthurje apeegehe.
Ajiegachiinche inieng irhier ttonglina hungvievang ichii lolhiepaamhie Thangnhangching thangven meechier aderna semaadeh,
changgechuw achuw engkheching saarkhie pehege enrhier,
“Thangnhang nang ing mindeenpeevang ichii meechuw ajiega?
Changmaanieche thevang ichii emmeniechuw ibeerpeevang natehie?
Nang ing amongna thangven
meechierhekaarna isieng ing tuchiege;
nang ing amachuw athang alaar enjashuw irhuna napeepe,
engkhejege peebekhe tahlina aapuw nabesuwpe.”
Aeuwmbekhe talina amachuw apuw aminsuwpe, amachuw tthideluung aeuwmbekhe talina apuw aminsuwpe. Changgechuw meeching peebekhe tahlina aapuw ouwngshuwchuw mhuwmaalhiemie.

Changgechuw apha tepiena Jesuchuw thangven meechierhetena isienglhah asiihchuw imhuwse, atebe ijachaam khaangge Thangnhang lungsiiching meebekheing ithiechuw amintin chenaing tuge athang alaar aajanachuw apeepe.

Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ing asitihe inhimpahhechuw hinrhieniege athang alaar emphanaing, isiichertena ahinrhie amhuwr isuwpaching ijanang aakhaang apaarna thangnhang ing peebekhe semge; amaing tthavate ate inhuw ijieng Jesuchuw changriir amimphape.
Ajiegachiinche aminthiingbesa Jesuje engkhejege aminthiingbesa ameehechuw emmapa Thangnhang engkhepangga; chonaching Jesu ing emmeniechuw unepasagehe ichii aning minjamaa.
Hanghing arhier,
“Kieng, naromhingchuw keu kene kesarhe-nhingna minjaamvanggie,
ruwhchanghe kaarna nangchuw mimpaavangechie.”
Engkhejege avonhie, “Kieng anhingna belung mengamvanggie.” Engkhejege avonhie, “Henahing kieng kesitihe Thangnhang impeehechuw.”
Ajiegachiinche sitiheching sabechiena emphaphuw emphatana engkhejege Thangpa ithie apaarna ithie amincheh aapuw, diabolchuw amemaangnaing,
ithiechuw ttiihege ama meene aeonghechuw abethinchernaing Jesu ing emmenietho enghaajeng ithiega.
Ajiegachiinche amaing thangven meechierhechuw buwmgete tege ithengmaaga, changgechuw Abraham siti senehechuw ibumpeenaga.
Chovelinaching Thangpaing meehechuw isiicher akuhpeena ing, Thangnhangtena ningsie ihe engkhejege aethacha arhu khorpuw elhuwng aanshuw naing Thangpaing auw anehethoh enghaajeh aeuwmte ibuwga.
Ajiegachiinche ijaanang chaang embierge amaching chaang embierhe meebekhechuw abum achega.
Chotahnaching thangventena ingeenbesa eenthiing asaruh aphabesa keu kene, kesarhe inieng ithachabesa engkaangseh khorpuw engkhejege Ttongjiirpa Jesuhie imindeenpeesaruw.
Amaing Thangpachuw engkaangseh khorpuw ibesuwpeege Mosi ing Thangnhang athacha ngenge ichiing amaing Thangnhang amindeenbekhe thachahe eengkuwna atuga.
Ajienachiinche een aatu meechuw een ithi ing enjaphuw iuwmkhangkhing, Thangpahie Mosi ithi ing enjaphuw arhuga.
Eenbekhehiebe tepang ing atuga, changgechuw Thangnhang ing peebekhe atucherga.
Engkhejege Mosibe Thangpa eengkuwbekhelina meene khangkhing inhuwte shuhvang ichii nongbekhe saarkhie apigetha.
Changgechuw Thangpa Khristaing aeengkuw bekhe tahlina Thangnhang Sapa aethacha arhuchuwga. Inieng aethona ittha engkhejege enhehpaaing niirchemeniebe inieje ama eengkuwgemie.
Chotahnaching Chipi Eonthiinging arhier,
“Atenie ningnuw ing aarur thietenuwbe,
rampasuwngna ningnuwchuw chaang ingeebiir khangkhing nimbelungriir beche maaresie.
Ama amhinnaching nangpu nangpihechuw chaang eebeerhege kum summillie nong ketu amhuwgehe.
Chonaching heve meesienhelina kebelung isii,
engkhejege kieng kerhier,
‘Emmenieng aphabekhena embelungriir bevehege kemindeen lhamchuw minghuwmaahe!
Kebelung isiipaaing ttongneer pehengge,
Keja mindena amhinnaching walhuwchemaasehe!”
Keu Kene Kesarhe, irhing Thangnhangchuw ninbethinna atu achuw engkhe athacha uwmma abelungriir itthama ningkarna enve arhuse tenuwng enriimsaruw.
Changgechuw achuw engkhe ningkaarna isiicher belungrier ing auwmnamaaing ‘atenie’ ichii inie auwmlehing engkhele engkhe entthohsaruw;
Ajiegachiinche inieng amhuwrna aethachabesalina attuhna iphang bechuw meniebe inieje Khristatho saruh ipha meehe ouwngshuwvateruw.
Hevehie arhierbesaga,
“Atenie ningnuw ing aarur thie tenuwbe,
aarhumaa belungrier arinhe khangkhing nimbelungriir bechemaa resie.”
Achuwgehe Thangnhang irurche thiehege arhumaa meehechuw? emmeniechuwbe Mosi ing Egyptena ahinrhiehechinga.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing kum summillie entaalina belung isiehie? Isiicher aatuhelina maakhang; emmeniechuwbe rampasungna ithiemaa gehekhang?
Engkhejege entaalina Thangnhang ing ttong deenge ija amindena amhinte aewalhuw achemaahechuw? Engkhejege Thangnhang ttongdeen aminjiemaahe nhingnamaakhang?
Emmenieng enthachamaa tahna aewalhuw achemaagehie ichii imhuwse.
Chotahnaching Thangnhang eenna aewalhuw arhuna ttongneer uwmkhangjenie amanaching awalhuwna chemaavang aetega tenuwng enriimsaruw.
Ajiegachiinche enhingna ttong aminjaam khangkhing aenhingnaje arhierga. Changgechuw emmenieng thiehejenie kanamaahe, engkhejege thiehejenie enthacha maatahna aelhaangmaahe.
Athacha iniechinbe Thangnhang Eongnanie amhin aewalhuw ichese. Thangnhang ing hanghing arhier,
“Kebelung isiiching ttong kedeenga,
emmenieching ja min lhenna ongna amhinteching walhuwchemaahenie.”
Ajiegachiinche aettha ttongjiir lintaangna hanghing arhier, Thangnhang ing asariina inielina arhier, engkhejege asarii iniena ija amindehga.
Avonhie lintaang ttongjiirnaje arhier, “Emmenieching atihledong keja keminde amhinna lhuwchemaahenie.”
Ajiegachiinche mee tepieching ama amhinna avalhuwna aeuwmgekhage, engkhejege mensarim aettha ttongjiir aathieheching ttong rhier aminjiimaatahna valhuwchemaahe,
Chotahnaching avonhie inie engkhe perihhege– “Atenie inie” ichiehie aenhuwte David apaarna, mensah arhierkhangkhing:
“Atenie inienahing aarur thietenuwbe,
nimbelungriir bechemaresie.”
Ajiegachiinche Joshuaing emmeniechuw ija mindenachuw apeegeheniebe, Thangnhang ing inhuwte inie lintaanglina rhiermaavang atega.
Chotahnaching Thangnhang meehe rotumna ija mindena inie uwmjehne;
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang iongna nie iniena aevalhuw amaching Thangnhang ing anongtena ija aminde khangkhing amaje anongbekhetena ija amindega.
Chonaching mee achuwdong ing ttongrhier aminjie maatahna ivalhuwchemaa aemaanghe khangkhing aanshuwnamaang inieje eongna nie amhinte avalhuwnaing tusateruw.

Thangnhang ttongchuwbe irhing, nong tuge aeuwm, paangkhelichang eengngeepah chimsie ithi ing engeepaa, rhingrierle chipi engkhejege humbekhe aantuena saruw phana singe amintthehche, engkheje amindeennale abelungrier bekhelina waajiir atuchega.

Amaing atubesa peebekhe anhingna endangchemaa aeuwmmaadehga. Peebekhe simriipaamna ouwngthurcheluing endangcherga, aeuwmbekhe anhingna endangsengsong amhuwga. Engkhejege anhingna inieng itubekhe nongchuw tongvang aetega.
Enieng elhuwngseh khorpuw thanvente Thangnhangnhingte ihesi ama Thangnhang sapaga. Chotahnaching atebe aethachachuw menhemeniege ongsateruw.

Itah khorpuwchuw ate deenmiege amaing isurnabekhe imminghuwpeese; amaing lolhiepaamna aongle alhambekhena chaang embier aanteuphuwga, engkhejege inieng chaang embier itahlina etheng khangkhing anhingnaje ethengga, changgechuw amaing isiikha tumaadeh.
Chonaching aningsii engkhejege kanavang ichii aphana ebowmpeevang ichii ouwngkupeena lungsii iphanaing eruwng aongnabouwmte thona itthaing inheengsateruw.

Khorpuwbekhehie meekaartena kharhege nong amintugehe, emmenie nonghechuwbe Thangnhangte tuvang ichii inthina pee pewang atehechuw abumnaing aminsernagehe; hangchie khorpuwheching isii cher lina Thangnhangte enlhenna pee apeegehe.
Atahrarahje isur aethaang hetho enghaa uwmge chove meeheching ajiidong minghuwluing amamaate ipier hechuw idejeh akhaangpeechega.
Engkhejege khorpuwje hebekoungna meehe rotumna aminlhen apiga, changgechuw atahraraaje isursagekhage atahin isiicher atulinaje enlhen apeega.
Engkhejege achuwdong ing enjaphuw phamchuw atahraraaing aalhaangmaaga, changgechuw Aaronchuw aeenkhangkhing amaje Thangnhang ing aeenga.
Khangkhing ichieng khorpuw elhuwng aanshuwnaing athienening empaasamaa; hanghing Thangnhang ing Khristanhingna arhier,
“Nang kesapagechie;
atenie inienahing Nangpa ouwngshuwsing.”
Lintaang aettha ttongjiirna arhier,
“Nang ittiim inemaa khorpuwgechie,
Melkizedektena aanhuw ijieing ihungshuwgechie.”

Thangpaing simriipaamna meethoh enghaaing arhingle, ithietena aekarpee ache Thangnhangnhingte ttaage, amhee riechie ibouthoh enrhieng hinthamge engkhejege hinnhehsage Thangnhang ing amindeen atutaana abesangpeega.
Jesuhie Thangnhang sapagejenie amaing ijaanang aphalina ttongrhier aminjienachuw atamsaape.
Engkhejege Thangpaching amabekhe tuchehcherge Thangnhang ttongrhier aminjiebekhe mee rotumna Thangpaing isiikhatena aminlenchenachuw ouwngshuwse.
Melkizedek ing atu inhuw ijieing Thangnhang ing Thangpachuw khorpuw elhuwng phamchuw apeepe.
Hevelinahing irhierphuw aenhimpaa uwmne, changgechuw ninronge thiemaatahna heve ttonghie arhierna luwne.

Ate ningnuwchuwbe ouwngshuwjeh ing mee nimminchuw arhupe, changgechuw ningnuwhie avonhie Thangnhang ing eluwseh imminchuw ttonglina achuw engkhenhingtena iminchuwvang ichii thengse. Ate iphang nedoung ipeephuw sangkhom sajehwang ichieng uwmnechuw, enche asahna enthongmaachuw.
Ajiegachiinche sangkhompang aeenheching dhormo icher nong etulina awaakhar shuwchemaa, ajiegachienche emmenieng nedoung ing uwmjehne.
Changgechuw aesaaphuw enche buwhiebe changrier aephahe rotumga emmenieching aetthamaa aettha aminjongchegehe.

Chotahnaching inieng Khrista khu abetthiimnachuw betthomeniege alir ashuwnataate hinnhuwteruw; engkhejege Thangnhangchuw thachameniege mamenna ichamaa etubekhe bethin meniege Khristalina irhingnaing betthiimsateruw.
Chiiluhnalina imminchuw, engkhejege, meetahlina kee isii, ithiehe aehangrhing, engkhejege ittiim inemaa waajiir etulina avonhie hinthur samaamenie.
Engkhejege Thangnhang irhupeeniebe kinnuw ing tusavanggungte.
Ajiegachiinche Khristachuw mahege aeuwmheching avonhie inrhingnate enteh arhuga? Emmenieng atataachuw tamsahege Thangnhang keethurje engkhejege Chipi Enthiingje emphabesaga,
engkhejege Thangnhang ttong atthaanaje mintinhege, thengvang ichii ruwngperhechuw phasahege,

engkhejege Thangpachuw embethin emmenie hangchieching avonhie belungrier amintharnahie shuwchemaanie; ajiegachienche emmenieng Thangnhang sapachuw inghum rotumnapang thingkherlina thehege endangjejohing ningjaa apeegehe.
Ajiegachiinche atahlina khuw ejusuwrbour, aamhuwherotumna thingnhah lhuwngnhah abeshuwpee lolhieching Thangnhangtena borchuw aphaga.
Changgechuw elheengchechor himminmhunniebe ama lolhiechuw arhumaaga engkhejege seraap aphanachuw innheengga; ama attuhnachuwbe mheena bethuwate.
Changgechuw keningsiihe, kinnuw ing hanghing ttongkhangjenuwng ningnuw khuna aetthaseh engkhejege isiichertena imminlenpee chuw kinthachaga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhanghie atataa atuga, amaing nintu nongbekheje behermaadehnie, engkhejege mee nimbum ningsii nong nimmindangchuw behermaanie, engkhejege mee nimbumchuw Thangnhang ing enthievate.
Ningnuw ing minchinludehing ninthachalina engkhejege ekhaangche apaarna ttongneerchuw apha meehechuw minjienuwng uwmtenuwge,
Ningnuwbekheing attuhna ipha nimmindeenchuw alir ipha, nimphanaing tusaruw.
Thangnhang ing Abraham nhingna ttong adeenle amaing ttongneerlina elhuwngseh romhing achuwtenadong auwmmaataana, atahrarah romhingna ttongneer apee,
hanghing arhierga, “kieng atataa bor pewanggechie engkhejege mimpungvanggechie.”
Engkhejege ikhaang achebekhe khaangge enhuwte ttongneer chuw aphaga.
Meeheching emmenie ithi eng elhuwng romhing rhierhege waasaah atunahe, engkhejege ttong amenhehnaing emwasaahching ningnge atuhechuw abetthuwgehe.
Hanghing Thangnhang ing attongrhier enteh arhuwmaa ttongneer aphahenhingna inhimseh minthiining tege awasaahching emmeniechuw aminteugehe;

Awalhuwna aphanaing itenbesah inieing aemana aeuwm phaning aetepah imindeen abechuwnaing enteh arhuwmaa abie ennhii Thangnhang ing nong atuna, mee amemumaa engkhejege wasaah atuching anhingtena ikarpi aphana rotha rhohnachuw ipesage. Heve ttongneer ennhielinahing asa elhuwng auwmnaing inhingna rotha irhoh amana paangkar impeega.
Inieng amate iwalhuw chena immindeenpah belungriirhie zahaaj ameniirna thiertho enghaaga, amararah hing ichipi akarna Thangven pien adeen enthiingseh sungte awalhuwnaga.
Jesu ing ama piendeenteching walhuwge alhamje aemhongge Melkizedek khangkhing elhuwngseh khorpuw ouwngshuwse.
Heve Salem Eruwng Melkizedek Thangnhangtena elhuwngpah khorpuw ching Abraham ing eruwnghechuw raalna vachehge ahungeenlile ouwngtuwphuwge bor apee,

engkhejege amaing akhuum peebekhe saruh suumna saruh engkhe apeega, ama Aromhing aminghuwnachuwbe “Dhormo icher Eruwng” atenaga ajiegachienche ama Salem Eruwngga, aromhing aminghuwna engkhechuwbe “Dejiim aeuwm Eruwng” atenaga.
Amapa amanuw aeuwmmaa, ahungshuwna meesien endangmaa, amaing ahungshuwna inie engkhejege athihnaje uwmluing ittiim inemaa, changgechuw Thangnhang sapa khangkhing ittiim neluing khorpuw ouwngshuwga.
Amahie ijehmeh elhuwngga ibeerruw; Anhingte sungkhor apeepa Abraham ing avapha aetthaseh peekaarna saruh suumna engkhe apee.
Engkhejege khorpuw Levi siti seneheching auw anehenhingtena waajiir ttongdeen inhuw ijieng Abraham siti sene ouwngshuw khanggejenie saruh suumna engkhe iphana ttongdeen aphagehe.
Changgechuw Melkizedek ing Levi sungkhortenamaagejenie Abraham nhingtena saruh suumna engkhe liege bor apee, amabe Thangnhangtena ttongdeen aphataanaga.
Changkhanggejenie achungtena elhuwnglhaaching adertena isiinglhahchuw bor apeega ichiehie arhumaa uwmmaanie.
Heve khorpuwhechuwbe amongna rhingheniege thesavang ategehe; changgechuw Abrahamtena saruh suumna engkhe apha Melkizedekchuwbe ithie inemaaga.
Levi atahraraaing tholom aphaga teniege achuw engkheching rhiersiete, amajeching Abraham khangkhing tholom apeega.
Changgechuw Melkizedek ing Abraham aanteuphuwle Levibe amapa vinsuwngna uwmge aberhingmaa lhiega.

Levi sungkhortena khorpuwhe nhingna Israelhechuw waajiir ttongtho apeegehe; chonaching levi sungkhortena khorpuw heching atuchecher gehenieche Aaron sungkhortena romhing arinmaa Melkizedek aanhuw ijiiching khorpuw engkhe amindangna ajie ikana uwmne?
Amana khorpuw aanshuwna alhamchuw entehjohniebe waajiir ttongtho tena alhamje entehte ithengga.
Ajiegachiinche amahie sungkhor lintaangtenachuw atenaga, ama sungkhortena mee lintaang engkheching hebekoungna eenthina nong atumaaga.
Ajiegachiinche Judas sungkhortena Thangpa Jesuhie ihungshuwga atehie endangne, engkhejege ama sungkhortena khorpuw aanshuwnachuw Mosi ing ajiidong tongmaa.
Melkizedek khangchie khorpuw lintaang engkhe ithenggenieche heve ttonghie ichum rarahga;
Thangpachuwbe humtena ttongtho inhuw ijieng ithengmaaga, changgechuw ittiim inemaa irhing ruwngper inhuw ijieng khourpuw ehungviega.
Ajiegachiinche hevehie saarkhiega,
“Nangbe ittiim inemaa khourpuwgechie;
Melkizedektena ehungshuwgechie.”
Alham engkhena temeniebe amenna ttongthohchuw asurtahna, aekana auwm maatahna amaagehe.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongthohching ajiedong atuchena uwmmaa; chonaching aetthaseh imindeenching mindangge ama apaarna Thangnhang nhingte innheengsehgemie.
Chona amahie ttongneer emveluung ethengmaaga.
Emmeniechuwbe ttongneer emveluung khorpuw ouwngshuwgehe; changgechuw Thangnhang ing anhingna arhier,
“Thangpaching ttongneer apeepe,
abelungrier mintehmaanie,
nangbe ittiim inemaa khorpuwgechie.”
Chotaanaching Jesuchuw inhimseh engkaang ttongneer lina khorpuw, engkhejege itthaseh khorpuw eenshuwse.
Mensana khorpuwhechuw irhingje maageheke khourpuw aanshuwnabor rhumaage inhimporgehe.
Changgechuw Thangpabe ittiim inemaa khorpuwchuw eenshuwse.
Chotaanaching ama apaarna Thangnhang aanheeng meeheching ittiim inemaa ikarpi aphachegehe, ajiegachienche Thangpabe enrotumna ttong aanuumpee aphabekhena irhingchuwga.
Ajiegachiinche hangchie enthiing, alaarna aeuwmaa, ibour aeuwmmaadeh, isiicher atuhekaartena akhebesa engkhejege minventenaje engkaangseh khorpuw ilhuwnghie aenhingna matih ichaga.

Ayenche khorpuwheching entaaing atu isiicher rotum engkhejege enhuwte mee lintaanghe rotumna inthipee apeehekhangkhing Thangpa nhingnabe aekana uwmmaa; ajiegachienche Thangpaing atararah pedohge vokhepangna atugetha.
Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongthohching ivehpah lolhiepaam meechuw khorpuw abesuwgehe, changgechuw anhungkurtena meechuw ttongneerchinbe ittiim inemaa changrier apha Asapa chuw khorpuw pham apeega.
Kinnuw ing kinrhierna alhamchuwbe hevehiega, amachuwbe aeta elhuwngseh khorpuw amaching Thangven paamna Elhuwngpah Eruwng ongtaa atachangna aeongga.
Meeing atumaa Thangnhang ing atataa atu thaamna enthiingpah amhinnaching nongchuw atuga.
Ajienachiinche khorpuw elhuwngbekheching keethurle inthina pee apinaing pham apeegehe, chonaching heve khorpuw elhuwng nhingna inthina pee deenwang atega.
Thangpaing simriipaamna aeheonggeniebe waajiir ttongtho inhuw ijieing keethurchuw pevang ate aeheong gehekhage khorpuw elhuwngchuw hungsuwh maavang atega.

Khorpuwheching atu nongbekhehie thanvenna aeuwm arothaasiechuw amindanggehe. Mosiching pienthaam tuning atele Thangnhanging anhingna arhier; “Bunglina nanhingna immindangpee khangkhing aangkheng atunaing ture.”
Chonaching Khristachuwbe itthaseh peelina Thangnhangtho lolhie mee alehna ttongneer apee khangkhing lintaangtho itthaseh nong atunachuw aphape.
Ajiegachiinche amenna ttongneerchuw ahelaarmaageniebe amenhiena rotum amhin hejongmaavang atega.
Hanghing emmenieng alaarhechuw mindangge Thengnhang ing arhier,
“Thangnhangching rhierge, Israelhe eengkuwle Judas eengkuwhe nhingna kieng ithar ttongneer tuvanggete;
Emmapa emmapuwheching Egyptna ingongle,
ingkina bechuwhengge kerhielehe,
Innhingna ttongneer kepee khangchiemaaga,
Ajiegachiinche emmenieng kettongnier embelungriirna cheengmaage ennhingna kebelungriir pechemaaing.
Thangnhangching rhierge, ama apha inhuwteching Israel eengkuwhenhingna hintuvang kinte ttongneerchuw hevehiega:
Kieng emvaakharna kettongnier sevanggete,
embelungriirna bejiivanggete,
engkhejege emmenie Thangnhang ouwngshuwvangete,
emmenieng kemee ouwngshuw vatehe.
Engkhejege, “Thangnhangchuw minghuwruw”
teheniege emmenieching engkhele engkhe nhingna minchuwmaahenie,
changmaanieche, emmenieng unepasahechuw minchuwmaadehenie,
Ajienachiinche emmenieng isiingtena ilhuwngphana eminghuwchervatehe.
Ajienachiinche emmenieng isiicher atubekheje kening minsii wanggetehe,
engkhejege isiicher entubekhe eenthiipeemaahening.”
Ttongnier ithar arhiertahnaching mensanachuw beluw aminshuwpe; chotahnaching beluw aeuwmbekhechuw maangvang atecherga.
Ate mamenna ttongdeennaching Thangnhang anong atuna alham engkhejege aerumna lolhiepaamtena eenthiing amhin aeuwmga.
Ajiegachiinche taangtena pienthaam asungna Eenthiing Mhinchuw tuge chona thoumhi abelengna tebal, engkhejege Thangnhangte ipeephuw tal asiihna aeum ama amhinnaching asiihgehe.
Amenhiena pien akhar apaangnaching eenthiingseh pien akharchuw aeuwmga.
Ama asungnaching aberim ichiipaa abethuna sanaing aalhuum ttongdeen asiihna upu aeuwm; upu sungnaching Mana asiihna sanabeer, ihangsien Aaron romhor, engkhejege ttongdeen enjiih lhung apee aeuwm.
Ama atahlinaching attheh alaar aeuwm Cherubim ennhieching Lungsii uwmnachuw amingkhumhe. Heve pee bekhelinahing tongjemenie tongsuwmaamenie.
Engkhejege hanghing enthongcherhege khorpuwheching ennongchuw atunaing mensa pien deen teching aphabekhena ivalhuwgehe.
Changgechuw amenhiena piendeen sungnabe khorpuw elhungching kumna vokhepang ivalhuwgethaa. Ama atah rotumna engkhejege meehe isiicher rotumna enthina thie emveluung valhuwmaa.
Chipi Eenthiingching minthiege, mensa piendeenching kharge auwmle, eenthiingkaarna eenthiingseh amhinnaching avalhuwna lhamchuw atelechinbe mindangmaalhie.
Heve piendeenhie atele ishuw aandang nachuwga; Keethur engkhejege inthina pee aangkheng apeegehe, amaheching apee meeching atataa engkhejege alaar belungrierchuw changrier mimphachemaa.
Ajienachiinche amachuwbe taangna isaa eenna engkhejege huwmtena abetthiimna panggethah, amachuwbe itharchuw atheng maalhielepang taangtena nonggethah.

Changgechuw hevena aeuwmbesa pee itthabekhe rotum khorpuw elhuwng Khristachuw thengse, Amabe elhuwnglhaa engkhejege changrier ipha keeching atumaa, lolhiepaamtena atumaa piendeentena khourpuw eenshuwga.
Keer thie changmaanieche shiirti thie emveluung atahrarah thietho enrhieng Eenthiing amhinnaching ittiim inemaa aerotumna vokhepang valhuwge ittiim inema imminlenpichuw eenshuwga.
Ajienachiinche ibour meeheching keerthie, shiirthie engkhejege shierti abethuna alungvuwhing aathihching humna ibourchuw aminlhiemgenieche,
Ittiim inemaa chipi apaarna ibour uwmludehing Khrista atah thieching Thangnhang nhingte pedohge, ithie nongtena ichum alaar aminghuwna belungrier vojehmeh ithi ing iminthiingpeevate.
Chotahnaching Thangpabe ttongdeen ithar aminteunaga, mensana ttongdeen inhuw ijiing alaarhechuw aatinpeenaing aberhingga, engkhejege aateurbesahechuw ittiim inemaa ttong adeenchuw aminteunachuwga.
Ajiegachiinche aminteunachuw aanrhunachuw auwmtaanaching amachuw asembesa meeching aanrhuna linaching thevang atega.
Ithienachuw ashuwnhuwteching aanrhunahechuw inhegethah, ama aanrhuna atu meeching arhinglechinbe mindangmaalhie.
Chonaching mensana ttongdeenchuw thie emveluung ahintumaaga.

Waajiir ttongneer sungtena abetthonabekhechuw Mosiching meehenhingna aphuwngle shiertile keer thie amana chiile isin samhuwrpien engkhejege hisopchuw liege thiimjii leriile mee tahlina ithige hanghing arhierga;
“Amahie Thangnhang ing immintu ttongneer thiechuwga.”
Ama khangkhing ichiing, piendeen engkhejege asungna nong atunahe birbekhe tahlina thiechuw aathiga.
Waajiir ttongtho adernaching peebekhe thieching aminlhiemga ichie arhuse, engkhejege thie iphuwrmaaniege akuhpina aeuwm maaga.
Chotahnaching Thangventena aanttimna peechuw hevehehing minthiingvang atega, changgechuw Thangventena peechuwbe hevehe itheeng athina pee lhuwne.
Ajiegachiinche atataa aanttimna kee ing atu eenthiing amhinnaching Khristaing valhuwmaa; changgechuw Thangvennaching aerotumna Thangnhang mhekungna amindangchenaing Thangpaching ivalhuwga.
Chona khorpuw elhuwngching Eenthiing Amhinteching akumsiir atah thie emveluung aevalhuw khangkhing Thangpabe atah rarahchuw aphabekhena pege ivalhuwmaaga;
chogenieche Thangpaing simriipaam abettiimpele aphabekhena ijachaam khaangvang atega. Changgechuw atebe apha attiimphana atah rarahchuw vokhepang apeedohching isiicher alhinnadohnaching emphuwngga.
Chona simriipaam meechuw vokhepang thehvate, changgechuw heve inhuwna waajiir tuwate.
Amakhangkhing Khristaje mee isiicher akuhpinaing atahchuw vokhepang pedohge, isiicher tena aminlenna rotum Thangpachuw ahahjeh he nhingna isiikha emveluung amenhiena emphuwngrivate.

Ajiegachiinche waajiir ttongthohchuwbe adeliim atatahthoching inttimmaaga, changgechuw ittha thengvang ichiechuw amindangnagetha. Akum akumna apidohna inthina peeching Thangnhang nhingte aannheeng mee heching mapung mimpha chemaa.
Amaching mapung aphanachuw cheniebe Thangnhang aarumheching vokhepangnaching minthiing heniege isiikha entu belungrier rinmaavang ategehe engkhejege vonuh vonuh inthina apidohchuw ngemaavang ategehe.
Changgechuw ama athina apidohching mee isiicherchuw akum akumna aanthinachuw uwmne.
Ajienachiinche shierchar engkhejege keer thieching isiikha atuhechuw iliejoh chemaa.
Chovelinaching Thangpaing simriipaamna thengge arhier:
“Inthinale ipidohna pee nang ing idemaachii,
changgechuw nang ing Kerotumna natahchuw embethongpipechie;
Hebbe bethuchuwge nimpidoh engkhejege isiicherlina ninthi peeching kening tungmaanie.
Chonaching kerhierga, ‘Ebeer, Thangnhang,
namindeenchuw tusagete tengge ijuwngging,
O Thangnhang’ ttongjiir ouwnglhum leriina kiekhu enjiige uwmne.”
Achungnahie arhierle, “enlhenna inthi pee nimpee, hebbe bethuchuwge nintu, isiicherlina nimpibekhe aedemaasing, engkhejege kening tungmaa” amabekhehie waajiir ttongtho inhuw ijiing nintugetha,
chona amaing athinrih, “Ebeer, namindeenchuw tugete tesaingge ijuwngging.” Amennachuw memaangningge amenhienachuw hintugete atetahnaga.
Engkhejege hevehie Thangnhang ing amindeenchuwga, amachuwbe Jesu Khristaching atahrarah vokhepangna meebekhe rotum apeebesaga.
Aanasier khurpuwheching ennong inthinachuw tuhege engkhejege vonu vonu tukhanghejenie atihledong isiicher atuhechuw aeliejoh chemaahe.
Changgechuw Thangpachinche isiicherlina vokhepang inthina pee apiching ittiim inemaa Thangnhang atachangna ongse;
Ama aphana betthiimge aarhumaa mee bekhechuw akhiderte asiihmaataang hehaage aeuwmga.
Ajiegachiinche amaing vokhepang apeedohching aminthiingbesahechuw ittiim inemaa changrier amimphapehe.
Chipi Enthiingjeching aenhingna saarkhie apeese, amachuwbe,
Thangpaching arhier,
“Heve inhuwna emmenie nhingna kieching tuvang kete ttongdeenchuw hevehiega,
Kieching kewaajiir ttongchuw embelungriirna thaarvanggete,
engkhejege emvaakharnaje bejiihvanggete.”
Amaing avonhie arhier; “Isiicher eentule alaarnahechuw mindeenbour maahening.”
Chonaching hangchie ikuhpinachuw uwmniebe isiicher ikuhpinaching inthi uwmmaa.
Chotahnaching, kilhanghe, Jesu thie apaarna inieng eenthiingmhinna alhuwhnachuw iphaga,
Ama ahumchuw piendeenchuw ouwngshuwge ama apaarna irotum itharle irhingna lhamchuw aamhongga.
Thangnhang eengkuwna khorpuw elhuwngpaachuw ideenpe.
Chonaching itthamaa itu belungriirchuw athieching minlhiem cher meniige chona humchuw chii eenthiingching aetthiemeniege belungriir eenthiingtho thachameniege Thangnhangchuw inheengsateruw.
Engkhejege enlahludehing aemindeenlina belung menhehsateruw, ajienachiinche ttong enniirpi ama aethacha arhuga.
Engkhele engkhe tahlina ningsii ihe nong atuna rotha rhorhoh mindeensateruw.
Mee lintaangheching atukhang khing eengkonghii bethinluing engkhele engkhe enthohsateruw; aaniechuw innheengse ichii imhuwkhangkhing aatthanaseh tusateruw.
Atatahchuw iphanhuwte iminghuwgleching isiikha tumeniebe, isiicherlina aminthiingna inthi na uwmmaa.
Changgechuw Thangnhang waajiir engkhejege mhitho enghaaje abelung isiiching aarhumaahechuw amemaangna mhi ensahpahchuw uwmjehne.
Mosi waajiir ttongthohchuw naseenma meeching saarkhie ennhie eenthum ching pehege lungsii phaluheng ithiegehe.

Thangnhang sapachuw akhi ing achiina atahchuw aminthiingpee ttongthohchuw ibour thiega tege amindeen, engkhejege lungsiina Chipi Enthiing chuw ningjaa apee meechuw ijehmeh inhim itthamaa lie chivang atega techuwge nimmindeenga?
Ajiegachiinche “Phuw lievang ichiehie kieging, kieing phuw lievang ketega” arhiirchuw aeminghuwse. Engkhejege avonhie, “Thangpaching ameehelina waajiir tuvate.”
Irhing Thangnhang keelina itiechuw ittiishuw paaga.
Ayen immimwaarpeenhuwte ija inangtho enrhieng ijachaam nimphakha eenthiesaruw.
Apha engkhena mhedie meemhuw kaarna eesehge ichamaaching entugehe, engkhejege apha engkhenache ijachaam apeehe meehetho ijachuw nimphahaaga.

Ajienachiinche ningnuw ing meekhumna akhumhetho ijanangchuw ningkhaangga, engkhejege ninrotumna itthaseh enlahluing aeuwm peechuw uwmne atechuw ningnuw ing minghuwchuwge, nimpee insihhechuw rotharhoing ninrhuga.
Chonaching elhuwngpaa matih icha kithur phavang ninte ninthona itthachuw lhinmaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuw ing Thangnhang amindeenchuw tutenuwge, amaing ttongdeen impeechuw aphanaing khaangsavang nintega.
Ajienachiinche apha tepie uwmniege,
thengvang ichii Thangpachuw, engkhejege minthermaanie.
Changgechuw dhormo icherching athachalina rhingvate,
engkhejege amaing aanhuwte eenliniebe,
kechipiching anhingna kebelungriir ngamna uwmmaanie.
Changgechuw iniechuwbe aanhuwte eenlivang ate meehe maagemie, changgechuw ichipi akarna phana athacha meegemie.
Thacha ichiehie emindinchuw phawanggete ichieng belungrier imengam, imhuwchema pee lina belung ingam ing imindin chuwga.
Ajiegachiinche athachaching ayenna imapuwheching Thangnhang arhupichuw aphasaagehe.
Simriipaam aangkheng Thangnhang nherna ishuw ttongching atuga ichiehie aethachaching iminghuwchehse, chotahnaching ninnhingna endangmaa aeuwmhehie endangte amaing asemga.

Athachataanaching Abelching Kain ithiseh inthina pee apeega, ama apaarna Thangnhang ing apee kithurtahlina saarkii pege dhormo icherga ichii ataaching saarkhie aphaga; engkhejege athacha apaarna ama thejenie ate ipha arhiernaahe.

Athachaching Enokching ithie amhuwnamaang thangvente ikarga, engkhejege Thangnhangching ajoliedoh inhuw ijiing teuhmaasehe; ajienachiinche amaing thangvente akarmaa lhiele Thangnhang aningtungna atuga.
Chotahnaching athacha uwmluing Thangnhang aning tungna aeuwmmaaga. Ajienachiinche Thangnhang aanheeng meeching Thangnhanghie uwmne teniege mindeenvang atega amaching aajonghe bekhechuw kithur apeega.

Athachatahna Noah ing amhuwmaalhie nonglina amhee aviirnachuw phage, Thangnhangchuw enttiing athachataana aeengkuwhe akarnaing rukuwngpuw atu; ama apaarna amaing simriipaam aminlaarchepe, engkhejege athacha inhuw ijiing dhormo icher iriikuumpa eenshuwse.
Athachatahna Abrahamchuw ram engkhete siniege ramchuw aphanaing aeenleching akhute isiging ichii minghuwmaajenie amaing minjiege isiga.
Atthachatahna amaing ttong adeenbesa ramteching mharpakhangkhing attongnier engkhepangtena irii kuumvang ate Issakle Jakob chuw rhiehege pien thaamna ipaargehe.
Ajiegachiinche amaing Thangnhang ing atubesa, asembesa khupuw eenmhinnaching ahaajehga.
Athachaching Sarahching ttongdeenchuw aethacha arhuga ichiin mindeenge akum khirkhangjenie neh arinna ruwngperchuw aphaga.
Chotaanaching ithiena lhampuw ibiirge iuwm pesar engkhepangtena minven aarsii engkhejege rimchie siiphiena siih khangkhing inhim sitibaasien aberhingga.
Emmeniebekhe heching enthachalina thehege ttongdeenchuw phachemaa hejenie raarkhena amhuwhechuw rukuwm atusaagehe engkhejege lolhiepaamna ramkhie isikhangkhing mindeenhege ithiegehe.
Emmenieng hanghing rhierhege empaamchuw ajongsagehe ichiehie endangne.
Emmaabesa ramchuw ngeheniebe ingeenlina eentongte inli rhuvang ategehe.
Changgechuw ateche itthaseh paam, Thangventenachuw enchiehaar nge ngeh ahaasahgehe; engkhejege Thangnhang chuw entaga ichii ningjaanahie Thangnhang ing mindeenmaa.
Athachataanaching Abrahamchuw chaang aabiirle asapa engkhepang Issakchuw apidohnaing apeechehga.
Amaing Thangnhang ttongdeen aphachuw eenshuwjenie engkhejege ama sitibaasienhie asapa Issaktena shuwvate tekhangjenie asapa engkhepangchuw apeedohga.
Thangnhang ing ithiebesa lham ing aminrhingga ichiechuw thachage, amatena aandangnaching Issakchuw ithiebesatena avonhie aphaga.
Athachataanaching Issak ing hungshuwvang ichielinaje Jakoble Esauchuw bor apeegehe.
Athachatahna Jakob ching athiphana Joseph sapa bekhechuw bor apeega; engkhejege aromhor amhurna endiesage Thangnhangchuw arumsahga.
Athachatahna Joseph ing athiphana Israel sitihe aangkenachuw mindeenge athen achienachuw abetthohgehe.
Mosihie aberhingnhuwte tha eenthum amapa amanuwheching athurhe, ajienachiinche itthapaa nedoung ing emmhuwtaana Eruwng ttongthohchuw ttiemaahe.
Athachataanaching Mosi ing hangvierge Pharoah asanuw sapachuw eenshuwning temaa;
sapachuw aanshuwchang ing apha tepie isiicher kaarna aongchang Thangnhang meehetho enrhieing ijanang iphachuw aatoursahpe.
Egyptna lerchiibekhe ithi eng Khrista nonglina ningjaana iphaching itthaseh lerchiiga ichiin amindeenga; ajiegachienche enhuwte phavang ate kiithurteching abelung ilhuwga.
Athachaching Eruwng belung isiechuw ttieluing Egypt paamchuw abethinga; ajiegachienche amhuwchemaa Thangnhangchuw amhuw ngenge akhaangsahga.
Mensa aberhing nedoung amemaangching emmeniechuw ashuwh namaaing athachataana aminlenpee isiicher ikuhpee thie aathinongchuw ahintupe.
Enthachaching isin rimchie aliehna taang shiphie khangkhing aalengehe; Egyptena meeheching ama ngenge ilente ateheche rimchiiching abeluwcherpehe.
Enthachataana Jeriko suwng aroperchuw inie nesarie iherhege ichimcherga.
Athachatahna ichuwhmaa Rahabching ram embier sepehechuw athurtahna irhier aminjiemaa meehetho ithiesahmaa aphaga.
Engkhejege kieing heve ithi ing ajieche rhiergete? Ajienachiinche Gideon, barak, Semsan, Jeptha, David amana Samuel hetho laarchangpahe themin atongna uwmbor maanie.
Enthachataana emmenieng Eruwng lepaa hechuw chehege dhormo icherchuw mindanghege Thangnhang ttongneerchuw aphagehe. Enthachataana emmenieching kurkam rhimpuw nher akhumchegehe.
Mhee ittuwngchuw thehege chimsii kaartena irhinghe, ipaangmaa tena persahege, raarna entuwchena pettha eenshuw hege, meepaamtena raarmihechuw athorchegehe.
Enthachataana nepenuwheching immee ithiehechuw ihangrhing aphagehe. Mee alhehhechuwbe itthasehtena ihangrhingnachuw aadietahnaheching maadohvang ichiechuw rhumaahege ija chaamchuw akhaanggehe.
Mee lintaangheche meniejena aphahe engkhejege abinhe; lintaanghechuw phierhege meekhum sungte athaargehe.
Emmeniehechuw lhung ing deenghege athehgehe, alheh lheh bejenhege chim ing athehgehe. Zoule keer akohching eengkhumhege emvegehe; emmenieng ijanang, ijachaam pehege, minjahege aeonggehe.
Simriipaamhie enrotumna ajiidong atthaana uwmmaa. Emmenieng ittong ensapah siihpaamna, ramthingkaarna, khoursungna, boungkuwsungna emversiesiegehe.
Engkhejege emmenieng enthachatahna emmeniebekhelina saarkhie phahejenie emmenieng ttongnierchuwbe phachemaahe;
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangching aerotumna itthaseh nonglina abethongga. Amanaching abethongchuw iniebekhe apaarna emmenieje changrier aphanaga.
Rudukhangkhing inhim saarkhiiheching ruwkuwrhege iniejeng peerhiih irinbekhe ipaang enthor isiicherchuw bethinteruw, chona aemana lam iten eenlangna chuw khaangmeniege tensateruw.
Aethachana abor engkhejege changrier amimpha Jesuchuw ibeerjehteruw, engkhejege imana rotha rhohna iuwmhe rotum thingkherlina ithie ningjaanachuw khaangge Thangnhang aongna atachangna ongga.
Chotahnaching nimmindeen kieniege nimbelungriirje akiena auwmnamaaing isiicherheching Thangpa ing arhumaa nong atuhe hangjehmeh akhaangsahchuw mindeenruw.
Isiicherchuw aanteuphuwching ithie iphakhah khaangmaalhiechuw.
Engkhejege ningnuwchuw asitihe khangkhing imminchuw aettha ttongjiirchuw nimbeherga? Amachuwbe,
“Kesitihe, Thangnhang ouwngrukuchuw ajiemaa ngengeh ing kharmaaruw,
engkhejege ingeeseleching nabelung minsiimaa,
Ajienachiinche Thangnhang ing aning aminsiihchuw arukuga,
engkhejege Thangnhang ing arhu asitibekhechuw abinga.”
Ningnuw ing ningkhaang chechuw eengeechaanaga; Thangnhang ing asitihekhangkhing eengngeechaaga. Ajienachiinche amapaching aachaama nepang achuwdong uwmmaa.
Asitibekhe aachaanaching emvemaatenuwbe asitichuw ouwngshuwmaachuwge salam siti ouwngshuwgechuw.
Iniechuw enrukupee manuw mapa uwmge emmeniechuw eejagehe; inieng ijasehwang ichii ichipihe Imapa derna rhingmaa meniekhang?
Ajienachiinche emmenieng apha amongtina iniechuw enrukugehe, khangkhing aenhingnaje Thangnhangtena ittha saruh aphana, aekanaseh aphanaing amaing ouwngrukuga.
Ingeechaa aphanachinbe napaane, anongena uwmmaa, changgechuw hanghing aachaabesa inhuwtebe dhormo icher dejiim aanrachuw apeega.
Chonaching ningkee irhiih engkhejege ningkhiruwkhuw isurchuw himmingkenruw;
engkhejege akhi aebongching lhampuwna akhi aerlung itthang ajiiche khangkhing ningkhi ing ninsina lham minteumruw.
Mee bekhetho belungrier enlehnung engkhejege enthiingjeing apaarnaing turuw, ajienachiinche amachuw maaniege Thangnhangchuw mhuwchemaanie.
Thangnhang lungsiitenachuw achuwdong ing abelungrier abehirnamaaing enriimsaruw. Ikhapah thingbourchuw hangmhuwngge ama arhuwching lintaang he nhingte mimbowrmaaheresie.
Achuw engkheching naamaa tuniege Esauing dhormo ichermaa buw chara engkhepang ing irii kuumsavang ate ajuwrkhangchie tena enriimsaruw.
Enhuwteche Esauching phavang ate borchuw aphanaing amhi riechie ibo ing jongsajenie rhupeemaase, ajiegachienche abelungrier ahoungna aphachuw phachehmaase ichii nimminghuwga.
Israel sitihe khangkhing ipar arhu, mhi ittuwng bungteching inthimle endukaarna thiekhuw enleh,
engkhejege tumpi irurna, ttong erur ing ningnuwng ningeen nhingmaaga; ama erurchuw aathieheching avonhie ttong lha engkhedong athienamaaing anhiesahgehe.
Ajienachiinche shaheching bung amachuw parniebe lhung ing deengnung thehvang nintega ichii ttongthohchuw ikhaang achemaagehe;
Engkhejege imheeching imhuwchuw changjehmeh ittiishuwpaaga temeniebe, Mosiching rhierge, ‘Kettiilamthieng enchiimging.’
Changgechuw ningnuwchuwbe Zion Boungle irhing Thangnhang khupuw, thangven Jerusalem engkhejege iteem ichehma thangven meechierhe ongtaa teching engkonggechuw.
Thangvenna eromhing abejiibesa sapa asitihe amhuwrheching aangkongna engkhejege ruwhchangna meebekhe tahlina waajiir Aapuwnhingna, engkhejege changrier amimpha dhormo icherhe chipikaarna,
ttongdeen ithar apee Jesu engkhejege Abel thietena itthaseh ttongjiir reenge thie aajeh buumna engkonggechuw.

Ninnhingna ttong enrhierpee Khristachuw arhumaa nintuna maaing enriimsaruw, ajiegachienche simriipaamna Mosi ttongjiir thiening atemaabekhe irhingmaagehe amanaching thangven tttongjiirchuw rhumaa meniebe ithienachuw akhirna uwmmaa.
Chalena Thangnhang irurching simriipaamhie minchiimge changgechuw atebe, “Apha engkhena simriipaam hie pangmaage thangven paamje minchiimvang ketega” tege ttong adeenbesaga.
“Avonhie,” arhier ttong aandangnachuwbe atubesa ennu peebekhe liedohniege maangvang atega, chonaching ennuhmaavang ichii peepangchuw uwmjehvate.
Ennuhmaadehvang ichii Eruwngpaamchuw iphatanaching mimpaasa meniege, inieng ijasameniege engkhejege ttiisa meniege Thangnhang aningtungnaing erumthoh enrhiing anong tusateruw.
Ajienachiinche mhee khangkhing abethuche inie i Thangnhangga.
Unepasa ningsiichuw mengumteruw.
Mharpahechuw rukuum itu behermaaruw, ajiegachienche, amaching achuw engkheing minghuwluing thangven meechierhechuw rukuum atugehe.
Meekhum sungna aeonghechuw aeonghagemie ichiin mindeenruw, engkhejege humna aeuwm irhinggechuw, chonaching ijachaam akhaanghechuw behermaaruw.
Riekhie enchumhie enjashuw arhuga ichiin mindeenruw, engkhejege ijaarna amhin mimbour maaheresie; ajienachiinche echuw chamaa aatuhe engkhejege naamaa aatuhechuw waajiir tuvang atega.

Nintu ning eenlhiengbekhena sheer endiepah belungriir rinmaaruw; engkhejege nataa natah ing nindeenlinaching ninning tungresie; ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing arhier, “Atihledong mimvemaaningchii engkhejege bethinmaaningchie.”
Chonaching thona ittha belung aemengamga,
“Thangnhanghie embumpee Aapuwga,
Ittesamaaing;
meeheching ketaalina ajie tuchehwatekhang?”
Thangnhang ttong imminchuwpeehe upahechuw behermaaruw; emmenieng inrhingsih enghenachuw mindeennung enthacha nong entuchuw minjieruw.
Jesu Khristahiebe ayenieje, atenieje, ittiim inemaa aphabekhena aeuwmjehga.
Lintaang lintaangtena engkhejege amamaa imminchuwhelina ningnuwchuw amamaate irhiemaa heresie; ajienachiinche nimbelungriirchuw aesaaphuw peeing ikiluung lungsii ing emmenhehching itthaga.
Piendeen eenna nong itu khorpuwheching inieng inthina hebekoungna aeuwm isahphuwchuw isah amatimaagehe.
Ajiegachiinche khorpuw elhuwngching isiicherlina apeena enthiing amhinte aminlhuw thie amana asahbekhechuw khaampah uwmna taangte abethugehe.
Chonaching Jesu ataararah thieching meehechuw aminthiingna sungkoungpaangte ijah akhaangga.
Chotaanaching sungkoungteching vasimeniege ningjaana aphachuw khaang haateruw.
Ajiegachiinche simriipaam nahing ttiimmaavang ichie khupuw dinmaamie, chotahnaching thengvang ichie khupuwchuw aejongga.
Thangpa apaarna Thangnhangte amimpahna apha neluing tusameniege inherna ishuw aanraching mimpaasateruw.
Ittha atunalina engkhele engkhe embum nongchuw behermaamenie, ajienachiinche Thangnhang aningchiena ipeedoh nongchuw hevehiega.

Ningnuwchuw eengngeebiirpee upahe ttongchuw minjieruw engkhejege enderna ongruw; ajienachiinche emmenieng ninchipichuw ingkhaangpigehe engkhejege nong atuhelina embelungriir jaheniebe amachuw ninrotumna ikanapahga.
Ihinthampisaruw, ajienachiinche alhambekhena itthachuw etu arhunaing kintthaanamaa kintthaana aminghuwchena belungriir uwmsanuwng.
Ninnhingte kiehie enrang kethengchenaing etupeeruw tesaingge kebetthosaanachuw.
Atebe ittiim inemaa ttongdeen athieching Zou aaserpee elhuwngseh aapuw Thangpa Jesuchuw ithiehe Kaartena ihangrhing dejiim aapuw Thangnhang;

ama apaarna Thangnhang mheena ichuwng ing isungna nongchuw itupeege, amaing amindeen atunaing ittha nongbekhe lina ningnuwchuw changrier imimphapeeresie; ittiim inemaa mimpaanachuw ouwngshuwresie. Amen.
Changgechuw Keu Kene Kesarhe, Kebetthona emongpah ttong kebejiilinahing khaangsateruw.
Euwne Timothichuw meekhumsungtena abethinpehe ichiehie minghuwvang nintega. Imen thengningbe amathoh enrhieng phasawanggechuw.
Nintaalina nong atu upahe engkhejege enthiing meebekhechuw lhamsuw kethensaanaahe. Italitena unepasaheje lhamsuw kethensaanaahe.
Lungsiichuw ningnuwtho eenrhiesaresie. Amen.
Thangnhang engkhejege Thangpa Jesu Khrista ameene Jakobnhingtena ttongjiir: Enjehcherhege aeong yaati summalhie ennhiehenhingna. Keberhiimsahnaachuw.
Keu kene, Kesarhe, ninthachalina chaang ingeebeerchuw khaangchetenuwbe amaching alir ashuwchega ichiing minghuwnung rotha minrhoruw.
Ajienachiinche nathachachuw chaang ingngeebiirle amaching aekhaang achenachuw ithengga;
engkhejege iveh uwmludehing alir ashuwche changrier iphachuw aanshuwnaing ikhaangche nonglina alir ninshuwche ouwngshuwresie.
Ningkaarna ivierna ivehdoh uwmniebe amaner uwmlu ing meebekhena apithie Thangnhang nhingte hinnheresie engkhejege chovechuw nanhingna ipevate.
Changgechuw phawanggete ichiing thachasing hinnheresie; ajiegachienche abelungrier inhehmaa meehechuwbe thieing engkhe engkhe amhinte aminlu rimchietho enghaaga.
Ajienachiinche, ama meeching Thangnhangtena ajiedong phawang ichii uwmmaa, ama meechuwbe abelungrier enttah, alhambekhena aniirna aeuwmmaa meega.
Esiingpah thacha sarahechuw hingngethovate ichieng mindeensaniege
engkhejege sawangheching jungbovate ichie mindeenheresie, ajienachiinche sawangheching phena riipaarkhangkhing ttiirwang ategehe.
Ajiegachiinche chungnie hangshuwniege ensaching anhahhechuw juwrvate; apaarje ttiirwate, atthanabekhejechuw maangvate. Khangkhing ichie sawanghejechuw ennong entuleching maangchervate.
Itthamaaing amineemle akhaangcheh chuw arepaa itthaga, ajienachiinche amachuw tthane teniege arhupee tahna aning aminsiihhe lina Thangnhang ttongdeen aeuwmbesa irhing lukhumchuw phasavate.
Achuw engkhe nhingna itthamaaching meneemniebe Thangnhang ing atuga temaaresie; ajiengachiinche hangchieheching Thangnhangchuw meneemchemaa, engkhejege Thangnhangching achuwdong itthamate meneemmaa.
Changgechuw amaang aadie itthamaaching vikige itthama eentheemte abebuga.
Changchie aadieching neh ringe isiikha aberhingga; engkhejege isiikhaching changrier himphage ithienachuw aberhingga.
Keningsiihe hanghing ningnuwchuw eminmunamaaresie.
Ittha ipeena aangkheng engkhejege changrier amimphacheh kithurbekhe thangventena, Mapa lengwaartena ithengga, anhingna eenteh engkhejege eentehna uwmmaa.
Akeeing atubekhena mensa sachie eenshuwnaing atataa attongching iniebekhehie abelungrier ing amindeenpang imberhingga.
Keningsii keu kenehe, amabekhehie nimminghuwga, changgechuw meebekheing arongethie, ettongpahmaa, abelung isiethiemaaing uwmruw.
Ajiegachiinche belung isiiching Thangnhangtena dhormo icheer nong tuchemaa.
Chonaching ibowrbekhe engkhejege ichama etuhechuw minchinnuwng, ninchipi ikar acheh belung sungna aphinbesa ttongchuw belung idourjeing aelhaangsaruw.
Changgechuw ttong ninthiechuw aatuhe ouwngshuwnung, engkhejege nintaasah ing enchenuwng aathiepang ouwngshuwmaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche achuw chuwgejenie ttongchuw rongeniege tumaaniebe angenge amhesuwchuw mengsengna amasah aabiirthoh enghaaga.
Ajienachiinche atahpangchuw mhuwge emmodohge, ama ajiekhangchiega ichii abeherdohga.
Changgechuw ningvesang ing changrier aepha waajiir ttongtholina vakuwmge aphabekhena ibiirge aeuwm, vathiege abeherdoh mee ouwngshuwmaa changgechuw aatupa ouwngshuw meeching atuchuw arasii itthaga.
Achuw engkheing abelie suwrmaaniebe, abelungrier aminchesage, atahpang ing dhormo icherging mindinniebe, amaing atu dhormochuw ngarhega.
Imapa Thangnhang mhekungna enthiing ibour iuwmmaa dhormochuw hevehiega, mapa aeuwm maahe, engkhejege mhikhuwnuwhe ijachaam aabiirpee engkhejege itthamaa simriipaamching akichemaa amachuwga.
Keu kenehe, athang alaar aeuwm Thangpa Jesu Khristachuw ninthacha nhuwnachinbe meemhe ibiirnuwng tumaaruw.
Ajiegachiinche sana keechie nieniege piendiir itthah enthong mee engkhechuw ningkaarna valhuwniege, engkhejege sarapah mee engkheching piensii piennoh vieniege avalhuwche,

peindiir itthah enthongchuw ibiirtenuwge, “Nang aettha amhinnahing aeongpeesare,” engkhejege saranhingnache, “nang amanakhing niirjere,” changmaanieche, “Nang kikhider apaangnahing ongre,” tetenuwche,
ningnuw ing ninnajir adoung achang itu engkhejege itthamaa belungrier enhuw ijieng waajiir nintumaakhang.

Keningsii keu kenehe, rongeruw; simriipaam ing aabiirtahna sarahechuw enthachalina sawang aanshuwna ing, engkhejege aningsii henhingna ttong adeenbesa Thangven lepaa iriikuumhe aanshuwnaing aateurmaaghekhang?
Changgechuw ningnuwching sarahechuw ijapeemaachuwge, sawanghechinche iminjahege, engkhejege waajiir amhinte ingkihechuw emmeniemaage hekhang?
Enjahshuw romhing nimminrin hechuw meniejehna ing atuhechuw emmenie maakhang?
Aettha ttongjiir inhuw ijieng, “nang ing veemchaanghechuw nataa ngenge ning minsiivang nintega” ate Eruwng waajiir ttongthohchuw alir suwtenuwbe, atataa nintuga.
Changgechuw ningnuw ing adoung achang tutenuwbe isiicher nintuga, engkhejege waajiir ttongthohching ninnuwchuw waajiir ttong nimbekhiete ithengga.
Ajiegachiinche achuw chuwgejenie waajiir ttongthohchuw ketucherga tekhangjenie engkhepang bekhieniebe aangkheng abekhiega.
Ajienachiinche, “Mee aelhangnuwthoh naamaa tumaare” Avonhieje arhier, “mee thehmaare” ateperi. Naamaa tumaajetenie mee theteniebe, waajiir ttongtholina navalaarte ithengga.
Ningvesangna waajiir ttongthohching waajiir etu meehe khangkhing ningnuw ing aettonggechuw, ituje nintuga.
Ajiegachiinche lungsii anong amindangmaa anhingna waajiir ttongthohching lungsiina mimvemaase; lungsii aeuwmching waajiir ttongthohchuw achega.
Keu kene engkhejege Kesarhe, achuw mee engkheching anongchuw kituga teniege aetuche tumanieche chonaching ajie ikana phavang atega? Athachapangching karpi vatekhang?
Nau nane engkhe changmaanieche nasar najuwr engkheing piendeer engkhejege buw asahphuw vehdohnieche,
Chona ningkaarna engkheching teniege, “Nabelung ingam ing engkesare, elumje lum ing, navinje varesie teniege anhingna kanavang ichii peechuw pemaanieche aekana ajie uwmne?
Khangkhing ichiing athachajechuw nong emvemaaniebe athienen ithiesaga.

Changgechuw achuw mee engkheching teniege, “Nang nathacha uwmne chonaching kiebe anong etu itthachuwging; nang ing nathachachuw anong enveluing lintaang kenhingna iminthiehre, engkhejege kieing ketu nong ing nanhingna kethacha mindanggechii.
Thangnhang engkhepangga atehie nathachase; nathachachuw aetthaga. Ramrhii ronham hejeng changching thachahege enchiimnehe.
Inhuwr, nong etu emveluung athachachuwbe aekana ajiidong uwmmaa ichiehie mindangresie nintega?
Imapa Abrahamching asapa Issakchuw inthina amhinnaching apeedohnhuwte anongching aminchum maakhang?
Athachale anongchuw ishuwhaaga ichiehie nimminghuwmaaga? Anongching atahchuw changrier amimphaga.
Aettha ttongjiirna alir ashuwse, hanghing– “Abraham ing Thangnhangchuw athachataana dhormo icher engkhejege Thangnhang lhupaga atega.
Nongching meechuw aminchumga, athachapangching atumaaga ichiehie nimmhuwse.
Khangkhing ichiing, ichuwchaamaa Rahabching meela ram embeerhechuw rukuum atupeetah nahe amachuw aminchum maagekhang?
Chipi emvemaa humching ithiekhangkhing, anong emvemaa athachajechuw khang ngenge ithiega.
Keu kene, Kesarhe, ningnuw ing aanchuwpahe ouwngshuwchermaaruw, ajienachiinche aanchuwpahe nhingna irhieseh waajiir ttumvate ichiehie minghuwruw.
Ajiegachiinche inie aannhim ing ilaarna aeuwmga. Achuw engkheching arhierle laardoh maaniebe ama meechuw changrier ipha meega, engkhejege atah ahumbekhe asuwrchehga.
Inieng sikurchuw irhier aminjienaing abena thierrhuw menie miege atah aangkheng engkhe engkhete aebehirchega.
Ibiirruw, ruwkuwngje lhunpah khangjenie, engkhejege thieching mimverjenie isiengpah ruwkuwng ahurnaching behirning ate entongte abehirchega.
Khangkhing ichie belieje isiengpah hum abaa engkhegethah changgechuw iperpaa elhuwngpaaing ittongga.
Mhirhii attietiching rampapuw aminttungga.
Beliejehie mhitho enghaaga, ichum kaarna abaah engkhega, itthama simriipaamga; hevehing ihumchuw aminbour engkhejege norohtena mhiching irhingsina mhi aminttuungga.
Ajiegachiinche sah engkhejege vatihe, avin ing ileenhe riimchiesungna aeuwm peebekhe alaachega, engkhejege tepang meehing alaacherga.
Changgechuw beliehiebe achuwdong ing laachemaa; amahiebe etang inemaa itthamaachuwga, engkhejege ithiena arhu ing isiikangga.
hevehing inieng Imapa Thangnhangchuw imimpaaga, hevehing inieng Thangnhang arothahsii ing atubesa meehechuw eeshergehe.
heve nherrarahtena amimpaanale aashernachuw ihungshuwga. keu kene, kesarhe, hangchiehie beshuwmaa dehvang aetega.
Chiitaangching akhor engkhe pangtena ikha chiile ithum chie iphourchaakhang?
Keu kene, Kesarhe, thechangborching keruum aanrah, changmaanieche darkha abaana thechang enrachaakhang? Engkhejege. Bechii achiiching chiitatah beshuw chevatekhang?
Ningkaarna ivierpah engkhejege aminghuwcher chuwche achuwga? Amaing eviergeniebe belung edoung ing anong itthaching atthanabekhe mindangresie.
Changgechuw nimbelungriir ikhahpahing nimmener engkhejege arinnepang ajong uwmtenuwbe lhuwngttittumaaruw engkhejege ichumlina mi minchemaaruw.
Ama hangchie evierhie thangventena maaga, changgechuw lolhiepaamtena, chipi nong emvemaa ronham nongga.
Ajienachiinche nimmener belungrier arinnepang amindeentahnaching inna ouwngkuh engkhejege itthamaa nongbekhe ishuwga.

Changgechuw thangventena iviernachuwbe amhuwrsuw enthiingga, aanhuwna dejiim aeuwm aadie, abelungrier idoung ahinthamna arhu engkhejege lungsii ihe, aanrahing isiikang, abelung inhehmaa itthachaang itu iuwm maaga.
Dhormo ichertena aanrah belungrier aminlehhe rotumna dejiim auwmnaing amhuw avorga.
Ninnajir ing raar entochuwhie engkhejege enna ouwngkuhhie akhutena ethengga?
Ningnuw ing ning ngeediechuw nimphamaa tahna mee ninthehga, phasaning nintepahna changgechuw phamaachuw, chotahnaching ennachuwge raar ishuwga. Thangnhangte hinnhemaachuwge chonaching nindeenmaaga.
Kummheh pala ningngeedielina ninnhie tahnaching ajiedong nimphamaaga.
Naamaa ituhe! simriepaamtho lhu nintuhie Thangnhangte raar nintuga ichiehie minghuwmaachuw? Achuw engkheching simriipaamtho enrhiejehniebe athie ama Thangnhangtalina raar atuga.
Changmage “isungna eenthin Thangnhang ing empi chipihie arotumpang adiega” ichie Thangnhang ttongna arhier hie chumma techuwge ningkharga.
Changgechuw Thangnhang ing lungsie inhimseh empise, chona Thangnhang ing arhier, “ilhuungmemohchuw rhumaang changgechuw ouwngtursahe nhingna lungise apeega.”
Chotahnaching Thangnhang derna ongsaruw, saitaanchuw rhupeemaaruw, engkhejege ama tenwate.
Thangnhangchuw aenhingsaruw, engkhejege amaing eenheengvate, nakee minthiingresie, Isiicher aatuhe; engkhejege belungirier enttahhe, nimbelungriir minthiengresie.
Tacham lienuwng ttaaruw, engkhejege nimmenie enjakha ttaasaruw, ninrotha irhohkha ijachaamte mintehsaruw.
Thangpa mhibierna eentur ing uwmsaruw, engkhejege amaing eethohvate.

Keu kene, kesarhe, engkheing engkhelina itthamaaing ttongmaaruw, achuw engkheing engkhe tahlina ttongniege, changmaanieche waajiir tuniebe waajiir ttongtholina aettongga, engkhejege waajiir ttongtholina waajiir atuga; changgechuw nang ing waajiir ttongthochuw waajiir tuteniebe, amachuw aminjiemaa meegechie, changgechuw waajiir aatupagechie.
Ikar acheh, amemaangcheh, waajiir ttongtho aapee chona waajiir atu Thangpa engkhepanggetha. Chotaanaching veemchaang waajiir aatu nangche achuwging natega?
“Ateniemaanieche ateunie enieng heve khupuwna tungmeniege, kum engkhe cheengmeniege, sheer taarmeniege ninte athi nintaar ningnuw atele thengsaruw,
Ateuhnie ajii shuwvate minghuwmaachuw. Ninrhingnachuw ajiiga? Ningnuwhie apha amongpangna umphuwngchuwge emmovang ichii rudugechuw.
Chovechangche, “Thangnhang arhugenieche rhingmeniege, hevejehie amana amajehie tusagete.” teruw.
Changgechuw ateche atahpa ouwngshuwchuwge elhuungsagechuw. Hangchie atahpa ouwngshuwhbekhehie itthamaaga.
Achuw chuwgejenie ittha atunache minghuwniege, amachuw tumaaniebe isiikha atuga.
Ateche thengruw, sawang ningnuw, nintaalina ijanang thengvang atetahnaching tacham lienuwng ttaruw.
Ninlerninchiibekhe jeengcherse, nimpien nindierbekheje sadieng angeecherpe.

Sana lopa nindeenbekhekha thierrhieng aalhumpe, ama thier rhieching nintaalina saarkhie ouwngshuwvate, engkhejege mheekhang khing nimbechie bethuwate; ningnuw ing attuhna iniena lerchii nimming huwngpe.
Rongeruw! Ninlhie ikuum enrotha minhechuw minchechuwge nimmemaang, emmenieching uwngnehe engkhejege sachie amingkonghe irurchuw lhie aapuw Thangnhang aananaa thengse.
Ningnuw ing simriipaamna enlhiejor nongesachuwge paarnechuw, ninthienening mintahchuwge ithiena iniechuw viese.
Dhormo icher meechuw beterchuwge ninthehpe, chona emmenieng deermaahe.

Chotaanaching keu Kenehe, Thangpa ajuwngmaataang khaangchehruw. Ibeerruw, lolhiepaamtena amin elupah chiibaarlina imenlhah etheng engkhejege nhungkurtena khuw asuwrmaataang lhiethiepaching khaangge ahehahga.
Khaangcheruw, ajiegachienche Thangpa juwngvang atehie innheengse.
Keu Kenehe, ningnuwchuw waajiir atunamaaing engkhelina engkheing ttong mintam maaruw; waajiir aatupachuw eengkhaar boumna niirjene.
Keu kenehe, Thangpa romhingna arhier Thangnhang ttongjiirpahechuw ijachaam khaanghege engkhejege ikhaang acheh aandangnachuw eelhaangpeesaruw.
Ibeerruw, akhaangchehechuw enrasie tthane itega. Job ing akhaangchuw ninthiega, engkhejege ajiekhangrimche Thangpahie ningsii ihega ate Thangnhang tena attuhna abethongchuw ningnuwng nimmhuwga.

Changgechuw keu Kenehe, alhambekhe lina eluwsehechuwbe, thangven, simriipaam, changmaanieche lintaang lintaanglina ttong deenmaaruw, changgechuw ningnuw waajiirna nimbunamaaing ‘uwng’ tetenuwche ‘uwng’ teruw, engkhejege ‘maa’ tetenuwbe ‘maa’ teruw.
Ningkaarna achuw engkheching ijachaam khaangge ongnemo? Amaing hinnheresie. Achuw engkheching rotha rhohnemo? Amaing mimpaana lhah turesie.
Ningkaarna inakih uwmnemo? Amaing ruwhchang upahe eenheresie, engkhejege emmenieng Thangpa romhingna riechie thou iteheniege arotumna hinnhe heresie;
hanghing athachaing ahinnhie ching inachuw karpeewate, engkhejege Thangnhang ing bethievate; amaing isiicher tuniebe kuhpeevate.
Chonaching ina nindamnaing, ningnuwng engkhele engkhelina isiicher nintu phuwngsanung, engkhele engkhe rotum hinnhesaruw. Dhormo icher meeing ahinnhiechuwbe anong atulina eperpaaga.
Elijahhie nangle inie hangchiegethah, amaing khuw asuwrnamaaing iperpaa ahinthamche kumthum tha kuru lolhiepaamna khuw isuwrmaaga.
Engkhejege avonhie ahinthamsaache minventena khuw suwrge amaching lolhietena chiibaar hangmhungse.
Keu kenehe, ningkaarna achuw engkhechuw atataa lhampuwtena bevedohjenie amachuw achuw engkheching himbilicheniebe,
ama meeching isiicher atuchuw himbiliniebe achipichuw ithiebesatena akarga, chona isiicher ijehmehchuw amingkhumpeega atehie minghuw saresie.
Jesu Khrista ttongjiirpa Peter ttongjiir: Pontus, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia engkhejege Bithiniana aeong ahinthor enjarcher mihenhingna:
Thangnhang Amapaching aatourbesa engkhejege amenebesa, Jesu Khrista thieching aathibesa, Chipi Enthiing ing aminlhiem apaarna: Ama lungsii engkhejege dejiimchuw ninnhingna inhimseh uwmresie.
Thangpa Jesu Khrista Thangnhang engkhejege Amapachuw mimpaasateruw! Ama aningsii inhuw ijieng ithiehekaartena Jesu Khrista aminrhing apaarna ithar ing inrhing apha irhing asaaching,
engkhejege imaangmaa, ibour iuwmmaa, jungchuwrmaavang ate ninrotumna Thangvenna iphaphuw lerchiichuw aerotumna avonhie ennhinpeepe.
Thangnhang ruwngper ing attuh iniena mimphuwngvang ate abethongbesa isiichertena imminlenpee aethacha apaarna ningnuwchuw enrhungpipe.
Ateche apha amongtina ijachaambekhe khaangsachuwge nimbelungriir jakhangjenie ninrotha minrhosaruw.

Maangvang ate sanaje mhisungna bethuge, amana aetthaseh ningnuw ing ninthacha aetthachuw enthiing ching Jesu Khrista ajuwng eenphuwngle, empaana, athang alaar engkhejege enjaphuw auwmnaing ningnuwchuw chaang ingeebeerga.
Mhuwmaajetenuw amachuw ninning nimminsiihga, ateleche mhuwmaachuw changgechuw ninthachase, engkhejege ihimphuwng ichemaa rotha imminrhoga,
ajiegachienche ninthacha auwmtaanaching isiichertena imminlenpee chipihechuw ensuwgechuw.
Nintaalina thengvang ate isiichertena imminlenpee lungsii phavang nintelina laarchangheching mensang rhierhege ajongbesagehe,
Khristaching ijachaam phavang ate ama inhuwna thanglaar auwmnachuw atilevang atega atechuw emmeniesungna iuwm Khrista Chipi Enthiingching saarkhie pege emmenieing ajonggehe.

Enrotumpang ing atuhe eensuwhluing ninrotumje atugehe atechuw ennhingna aphuwngga, amachuw atebe thangventena ajincheer Chipi Enthiing apaarna aettha ttongjiir aminjaamheching ninnhingna enrhierpeepe; heve ttongbekhehie thangven meechierheching mhuwning atepaagehe!
Chotahnaching amachuw atuchenaing mindeensaruw; nintaa nintaaching ngaasaruw; Jesu Khristachuw ajuwngeenphuwngle jinrinvang ate lungsiilina asa belungriir menhesaruw.
Ttongrhier aminjie nepanghe khangkhing, ningnuw ing nimminghuwmaa lhiele itthamaa nintuchuw uwmluing,
chovechang, ningnuwchuw ingeen Thangpa enthiing khangkhin, ningnuw ing ningsi ningtubekhena enthiingchuw ensuwruw;
ajiegachienche hevehie enjiibesaga, “Ningnuw ing minthiingvang nintega, ajiegachienche kie enthiingging.”
Mibekheing atulina adoung achang atumaa anong inhuw ijieing waajiir atu Thangnhangchuw Epa tetenuwbe miramna ningonglehing ittesaruw.
Nimmapa nimmapuwtena irii maangvang ichii amongtina aeuwm lupa sana khangchie pihching ingeetinmaaga.
Changgechuw ichamaa engkhejege ibour iuwmmaa Zou thie khangchie amin ilupaa Khrista thieching,
Lolhiepaam asemmaalhiele bettiimge hevelina amenebesa attuhna inienahing ninrotumna amindangga,

Thangpachuw ithiehe kaartena hangrhingge, athang alaar empee Thangnhangchuw Khrista apaarna thachachuwge, amaching aethachale belung ngamnachuw anhingte engkhejege imindeenchuw Thangnhangte anheengpe.
Ate atataa irhier aminjielina ninchipihechuw imminthiing pipe, amaching aenajir ningsie impeegechuw, ama ningsiechuw belungsungtevang atega.
Ajiegachiinche maangvang ichii amhuwtena maa, aemaang arhumaa, irhing engkhejege enlaaluing euwm Thangnhang ttong apaarna ningnuwchuw avonhie emberhingpe.
Ajiegachiinche,
“Humbekhehie phuwrtho enghaaga,
engkhejege athang alaarbekhechuw phuwrpaar khangchiega.
Phuwrchuw juwrvate, engkhejege apaarje.
Ttiervate; changgechuw Thangnhang ttongchuwbe ittiim inemaa aeuwmga.”
Chona ningnuw ing nimminjaam aettha ttongjiirchuw ninnhingna kimminthanghiega.
Chonaching itthamaa etu, mi aminche, aetthachaang atu, enner, kallaa, thethie lhungthie etu engkhejege itthamaabekhe minchinruw.
Isiichertena engkarpeechuw aphanaing nedounghe khangkhing chipi ahinjuh chuchu enthiing abedoukhangkhing–
nimmintintaana isiichertena imminlenchuw phavangninte.
Irhing lhung, mihechinche aadiemaa, changgechuw Thangnhang chinche aatourbesa amin elupaa Thangpa,
engkhejege Jesu Khrista apaarna Thangnhang nhingna arhupee chipitena apidoh enlhen, enthiing khorpuwhe aansuwnaing nintaaching irhing lhunghe khangkhing nintaaing hintusaruw.
Amahie aettha ttongjiirna enjiine,
“Ebeeruw, Zionna aatourbesa amin elu bangriekiing lhung kephinpe;
engkhejege achuw engkhe amachuw athachaching ningjaana phamaanie.”
Thacha ninnhingna chinbe amachuw amin elupaaga, changgechuw athachamaahe nhingnachinbe,
“Een aatuheching ikanamaaga ate lhungching,
ama rarahching bangriekiing apuw ouwngsuwse.”
Engkhejege,
“Khi minsiina lhung engkhejege etiehna lhungpuw.”
Amalina ttong aminjiemaataana tiehsehe, amachuw emmenienhingna abesuwga.
Ningnuw hie inthimtena ama ninrhiena eelengte engngeen amachuw minpanalina nong etuna engngitour besa misien, eruwnta khorpuw, engthieng yaati, ama ataasa meegechuw.
Ayen ningnuw Thangnhang mimaagechuw, changgechuw atebe ami ouwngsuwsechuw; ningnuwchuw aning imminsiimaaga, changgechuw atebe ningsie nimphape.
Keningsiihe, chipitaalina raar atu hum ing aadietena ningngaachena, mipaamtena suwh engkhejege mharpahekhangkhing ningnuwchuw kerhierpigechuw.

Ningnuw ing itthamaa nintuga atehe ningkaarna yaati lintaangheng atonglina emmenieng aettha nintuchuw eebeerhege, aabiirche iniena emmenieng Thangnhangchuw immimpaa naing ninsi nintung engkaarna itthang sisaruw.

Eruwnghie mibekhelina aapuw ouwngsuwga, engkhejege paam aapuw heching ichamaa etuhelina aberimna tuniege ittha ituhechuw amimpaa naing acheergehe, amanaching Thangpatena khangchie lolhiepaamtena eruwnghe aderna ongruw.
Ajiegachiinche ittha nintuchuw aanhuwrheching entuthiemaahechuw aminderengna Thangnhang ing aadiega.
Ningvesanghe khangkhing ongruw, ningvesang nimphachuw itthamaa etuchaangkhangkhing tuluing Thangnhang mine khangkhing paarruw,
Mibekhechuw ijaruw, Thacha unehechuw ninning minsiiruw, Thangnhangchuw ttiiruw engkhejege eruwngchuw ijasaruw.
Minehe, ittha engkhejege idour apuwhe pang derna eenttie ongchuw pangmaage ichamaahpah apuwhe dernaje changching ongruw.
Achuw engkheing ataalina amamaa ijachaam isuwchuw khaangcheniebe amachuw mimpaavang aetega.
Ajiegachiinche ninlaarnachuw uwmniege romhor satenuwche atthana ajie uwmne? Changgechuw ittha nintulina ijachaam khaangtenuwbe amachuw Thangnhang arhuga.
Ajiegachiinche hevelina ningnuwchuw ingeenga, amachuwbe Khristaching aandangna imaapige ningnuw rotumna ijachaam aphaga, chonaching ningnuw ing akhibie jievang nintega.
“Amabe isiicher tumaadeh. Engkhejege anherna mi aminchena himbesuwmaa.”
Anhingna isehejenie emmeniechuw isehmaahe; amaing ijanang aphale minttiimaahe; changgechuw atataa waajiir atu Thangnhang nhingte aminserga.
Isiicherte ithie inieing dhormo ichertongte arhingnaing Thangpa ataarah thingkherna atahing isiicher ireenpige, romhor bieching inabekhe amintthape.
Ajiegachiinche ningnuw ing Zouhekhangkhing bevechuwge, changgechuw atebe Zou aasernhingna engkhejege ninchipi enrhungpi aapuwnhingte hungeenlisechuw.
Lumheehe khangkhing, nimpuwsar derna ongruw; Thangnhang ttong aminjiema emmeniechuw engngilhangnuwhe ttongdehluung, ettha engngeen lhieng ching emmeniechuw thachate wekinang,
emmenieng nang ing natu eenthieng nong engkhejege enjasuw kha emmhuwtana.
Ningnuw ing ningeenthongle ninluw ningkhuw, sana inie, piendier ing ningeenthong taangna amhuwna aanthongnaching uwmaaruw;
Changgechuw ningeen thongnachuwbe riirtena chipina ideh maangmavang ate piendier ing ouwngthongruw, amahie Thangnhang mhekungna amin eluwpaaga.
Ajiegachiinche hanghing ichieng ayen Thangnhangte embelung elhuwpaa enthiing nepenuwhejeng empuwsar derna enrhier minjiehege enthieng piendeer ing enthonggehe.
Khangkhing ichieng Sarahjeng Abrahamchuw ijage arhier aminjiega. Ningnuw ing ittha nong tutenuwge enttii uwmmaatenuwbe ama sitihe ensuwgechuw.

Apuwsarhe, khangkhing ichieng ninlumhi hechuw isurlhaa engkhega ichieng irhinghaa lungsii nimphasaa khangkhing ijasanuwng, aminghuw enhuw ijieng paarhaaruw; engkhejege hevehing ninghinthamchuw entongmaanie.
Attutaana, chipina belungriir engkhepang, ningkhaanghaa, unepasa khangkhing ningsie empe, belungriir edoung, belungrier isiing ing uwmsaruw.
Itthamaachuw itthamaaing thuwrmaaruw, changmaanieche, ingeesemichuw iseh maaruw, changgechuw chovechangbe bor peruw; ajiegachiengche bor aphanaing hevelina ningnuwchuw ingeenpe.
Ajiegachiinche,
“Achuw engkheching arhingrierchuw aning minsiiniebe,
rotha rhona iniechuw idesaniebe,
itthamaa attongnamah anher kamresie.
Engkhejege itthamaatena hungeenlising ittha turesie;
belung idechuw jongsing,
amachuw thorresie.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang mhee dhormo icherhetaalina aeuwmga,
engkhejege aphabekhena ahinnhiehechuw athiepigehe.
Changgechuw itthamaa atuhechuw Thangnhangching rhupeemaa.
Ittha etulina nimbelung minlhutenuwbe itthamaa etuvang ate achuwga?
Changgechuw dhormo icher nong nintutaana ija khaangtenuwbe ninrasii itthaga; engkhejege emmenieng immin ttiichuw ttiemaaruw, belungje minjamaaruw;

Changgumpachuw nimbelung riirna Khristachuw Thangpaga tenuwng rhuruw. Nimbelung riirna aeuwm asa intuchuw ensiihe mi bekhena abesangna apha bekhena enthongsanuwng ongruw, changgechuw belung edoung ing enttieng turuw.
Khrista nhingna nintu itthachuw minthiining tehege ittha maate ningkhu engngeensir mihechuw inning enjaa aphanaing ninnuwtena itthamaa ittha amindangna belungrierchuw enthiengjeng mengumruw.
Thangnhang eng amindeen chuwgeniebe itthamaa entutaana ijachaam iphachangbe ittha tuniege ijachaam aphaching aetthasehga.

Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang nhingte ninnuwchuw ahinrhienaing dhormo ichermaahe changbe dhormo icher, amachuwbe Khristajeng isiicher etutaana vokhepang ithiega; Thangpachuw humlina ithiega, changgechuw chipilina aminrhingga.
Chovelinaje amaing amachuw aminjaamnaing mikhumna aeonghe chipihenhingna aminjaamga;
Ayen Noah apaarle ruwkuwngpuwchuw ahintule Thangnhang ing isihpaa ahaapihe aphanaching chipiheching ttongrhier minjiemaahege; asungna inthin mi tepiehechuw, mi erih hechuw chii apaarna akarpigehe.

Chiiching hanghing atukhangkhing chiite luhhege, ate ningnuwchuw engkarpeepe, amahie humlina ebour aminlhiem nachuwmaaga, changgechuw Jesu Khrista ihangrhing apaarna Thangnhang nhingte ittha echum alaar aminghuwnaga.
Ama ate thangvente karge Thangnhang atachangna ongse; thangven michierhetho, itu achehetho engkhejege ruwngperhechuw aderte asiipe.
Khristaing humna ijachaam phage, ama belungrier rinnung raar piendier ing enthongruw, ajiegachienche humna ija akhaangbesa miching isiicher atuchuw abettuhpe.
Ate ningnuw rhingriena tepangtena ichamaa inhuw ijieing avonhie ninrhingnamaaing Thangnhang ing amindeen inhuw ijieng rhingvang nintega.

Ajiegachiinche nepenuw pesarlina ichamaa, hum ing aadie, zuw ouwngruw, atu aanlhiing ichamaa, ittongthathaang, engkhejege entersuw leh rotha irum hevebekhe isibesa aphana tujetenuw, yaati lintaang heching aadie atuhe isibesa aphahechuw ensuwse.
Ateche khangchie aminbuwr nongbekhechuw ning eenvemaataanaching inning rhiihege amanaching ningkhu itthamaaing atonggehe.
Heve miheching, atele irhingheje, ithiebesaheje waajiir atuna abethong anhingna entubekhe pevang ategehe.
Ajiegachiinche hevelinahing ithiebesahechuw humlina entu inhuw ijieng waajiir atunaing, Thangnhang ing amindeen inhuw ijieng chipina arhingnaing, emmenie nhingnaje aettha ttongjiir aminjaampigehe.
Hevebekhe attunachuw innheengse, chonaching amachuw achenaing ninghinnhielina enriimsanuwng ningbelungriir meneersaruw.
hevebekhelinahin engkhele engkhe ningkaarna ningsie emperuw; ajiegachienche ningsiehing isiicher inhimpah amingkhumchega.
Ettongchorchor uwmluing engkheing enkhe ouwngkursaruw.
Mibekhe nhingna kithur apha inhuw ijieng ningkaarna Thangnhangtena nimpha lungsii ittha nong aapuwhe khangkhing nong tuhaaruw.

Achuw engkheing ttongniebe Thangnhang ttong inhuw ijieng ttongresie; achuw engkheing nong tuniebe Thangnhang ing api atuche enhuw ijiing turesie; alham bekhena Thangnhangchuw Jesu Khrista apaarna amimpaanaga. Ittiim inemaa athang alaar iuwmga. Amen.
Keningsiihe, ningnuwchuw chaang embeerna nintaalina itheng innheepah ijachaam nimbedaarchuw ningrhiena nong nintaalina ajii isuwga tenuwng ninning dongmaaresie.
Changgechuw Khristaing athang alaartho aamphuwng iniena inhimpah ninrotha arhona engkhejege belungrier anongena, Khristaing ijanang aphalina saruh apha ningnuw rotha minrhoruw.
Khrista romhinglina miheching iseheniebe ninrasii itthaga; ajiegachienche Chipi athang alaarchuw nintaalina endangga.
Changgechuw ningnuw achuw engkhedong ing mitheh, ouwngruw, echamaa itu mi, changmanieche mi memaangna atulina ijanang aphachuw ouwngsuwmaaruw.
Changgechuw Khristian engkheing ijanang khaangcheniebe aning enjaamaaresie, ajiegachienche aromhingchuw ninreenga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang eengkuwsungna waajiir atunachuw abetthiimpe, amachuw enhingtena mensa betthiimniebe, Thangnhang aettha ttongjiir ajiemaahe attuhnachuw ajiekhang suwhvang atega?
Engkhejege,
“Dhormo icheerhechuw ijapaaing karpiniebe,
Thangnhang amindeenmaa,
engkhejege isiicher aatuheche entaalina ajii shuwvate.”
Chonaching Thangnhang ing amindeen inhuw ijieng ijanang akhaang ache mihejeching, insempee Aapuwchuw athacha nong ittha atuheching inchipi minsernaheresie.
Ate upahe ouwngsuwh inieng, Khrista ijanang akhaang saarkhie mimphuwngvang ichii athang alaar iphahaa kieng ningkaarna aeong upahe ningnuwchuw kebetthogechuw.
Etumaa arhuma khangkhing tuluing, belungrier elhuw ing ningkaarna aeong Thangnhang Zou aruhchuw eebeerpisaruw;
Ninnhingna imminsernahe taalina aapuwkhangkhing tuluing Zou aruhhenhingna ittha aandangnachuw ouwngsuwhruw.
Engkhejege Zou aaser aapuw elhuwngchuw aamphuwngleching athanglaar luhuhchuw phavangninte.
Khangkhing ichieng, nepanghe, nong etu upahe derna ongsaruw, ningnuw bekheing engkhele engkhe sepa entunuwng belung edoung ing enthongnuwng ongruw; ajiegachienche,
“Thangnhang ing elhuwngtittuhhechuw rhupeemaa,
changgechuw, belung edounghenhingna lungsii apeega.”
Chonaching belung edoung ing Thangnhang ruwngper derna ongruw, amaching apha ittha taanchana iminlhuwngsavate.
Ninning dongna bekhechuw anhingte vituurruw, ajiegachiinche ningnuw rotumna immindeenpiga.
Nimblungriir suwrcheruw, inriimsaruw; ningnuwchuw eenrhumaa Diabol ing kurkam rhimpuw khangkhing achuw engkhechuw sagete tege ijongge bevene.
Ninthachalina inhehpaaing enteuphuwruw, ajiegachiinche khangkhing ichieng ninguw ninneheching ijanang akhaangchuw lolhiepaamna isuwbesaga ate minghuwruw.

Engkhejege Thangpatena ittiim inemaa athang alaarlina ningnuwchuw Khrista nhingte ingeenbesa ama lungsii bekhe impee Thangnhang ataararah ing ningnuw ing apha tepie ija khaangtenuwge ningnuwchuw ebilipivate, emenhehpiniege parsavangninte.
Ittiim inemaa phana ipaar atuchena ruwngperchuw anhingna ensuwresie. Amen.
Athacha inhehpah Silvanus euwne anhingna amongpang ing kebejiiga, amahie kieing betthoingge hevehie Thangnhang lungsiiga tesaingge saarkhie kepigechuw; heve lungsiilina hing inheh ing nierruw.
Ningnuw khangkhing eengeetourbesa Babilon ruwhchangheching emberhiimsanaahe, kesapa Markjeching emberhiimsahna.
Ningsii himbeeng ouwngjuhthoh enrhiing engkhele engkhe rukuum ouwngtusaruw.
Khristana aeonghe ningnuw talina dejiimchuw uwmresie.
Jesu Khrista amine engkhejege ttongjiirpa Simon Peter, Ingkarpi Thangnhangle, engkhejege Jesu Khrista dhormo icher apaarna amin eluwpaa ithacha iphahaahe nhingna.
Thangnhangle Thangpa Jesu Khrista nimminghuw lungsii engkhejege dejiim ninnhingna hinthiresie.
Thangnhangtena enthiing ruwngperching ama athang alaar engkhejege itthaching iniechuw ingeen amachuw iminghuw apaarna irhingnale Thangnhang imindeen insuwhnabekhe aenhingna impipe;

Hevebekhe iphalinahing amaing impee amin eluwpaa ttongneerhe, amana hevebekhe apaarna itthamaa lolhiepaamtena ibowrbekhetena ensiijohmiege, hangchie hum ing aadiebekhe mamiege Thangnhang maong aanghaana saruh aphachuw ouwngsuwhsemie.
Chonaching heverarah lina ningnuw ing ninthachachuw ahimbumnaing, ittha atuna, ittha etulina aminghuwna,
engkhejege nimminghuwlina ataa dur oungleche na ataa dur oungleche taalina ikhaang ihe, ikhaang ihelina Thangnhang amindeenchena,
Thangnhang amindeen taalina unepasa khangkhing ningsie ihena engkhejege unepasa ningsiena ningsiechuw vithinruw.
Ajiegachiinche hevebekhelina hanglhuwngtenuwbe Thangpa Jesu Khrista chuw atataa aminghuwna rotum hevebekhehing ningnuw ing nintuchemaa engkhejege aanra iuwmmaachuw ensuwmaatenuw.
Ajiegachiinche hevebekhe iuwmmaa michuwbe mensana isiicher atubesa beluw aminthiingpichuw beherniege, innhingna euwm amhuwchemaa amheeechuwgehe.
Chotahnaching keu kene, Kesarhe, ningnuwchuw ingeenbesa engkhejege ingeetourbesalina immenhenaing inhimse nuumsaruw; ajiegachienche hevebekhehie tutenuwbe akhunadong tiemaatenuw.
Ajiegachiinche hanghing ichieng Thangpa ye ouwngsuw aapuwje ouwngsuw Jesu Khrista tena ittiim inemaa lepaate avalhuwna ninnhingna enlhiejor epesavate.
Chotanaching ningnuwng hevehehie minghuwtenuwge ninnhingna euwm atataalina inheh ningongnaing ningnuwchuw hevehelina ningeenthienaing apha bekhena enthongningge ongvanggete.
Heve hum kebechiina kerhinglehing ningnuwching ningeenthienaing kebetthochuwhie echumga tesaingge kemindeenga;
Ajiegachiinche Jesu Khristaing immindangpeelina ketheena iniechuw hungeennheengse ate keminghuwsaape.
Engkhejege kechipi kebethin inhuwte aphabekhena ningnuw ing hevebekhehie ningeenthiechenaing kechebekhe tusavanggete.
Ajiegachiinche Thangpaing amapa Thangnhangtena enjasuwna engkhejege athanglaar aphaching elhuwngpaa athang alaartena.

Engkhejege enieng Thangpa Jesu Khrista ruwngper ching ijuwngchuw ninnhingna immindang aphana thethie lhuwngthieing ittong theminhechuw minjiemaaung, changgechuw iniebe Thangpaing elhuwngpaa athang alaarchuw kimmhee rarahching kimmhuw saarkhiechuwgung.

Ajiegachiinche Thangpaing amapa Thangnhangtena enjaphuw engkhejege athang alaar aphalina, elhuwngpaa athang alaartena hangchie irur ing arhier, “Amahie kieing kening keminsiipaa kesapaga, anhingna kieng kening chimsane;
Kinnuw ing enthiing bounglina atahthoh kingeenrhiele heve erur hii kinnuwjeng kinthiega.

Chotahnaching inhingna iuwm Thangnhang ttongjiirpa ttonghechuw kimmenhega; heve ttonghie ningnuw ing khuw ahungvaarmaalhiele engkhejege nimbelungriirna yieng aarsii ahungsuwmaa lhiele, inthimna eleng thoumhilina belungrier petenuwbe itthapahing nintuga.
Mensarimna ningnuw ing heve ttongjiir aettha amimphuwngchuw nintaaing nintongmaaga ate minghuwruw.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ttong amimphuwngbekhehie tepang humtena ethengmaadega, changgechuw Chipi Enthiing ing minlaage Thangnhangtena ahinrhierga.

Changgechuw mikaarna Thangnhang ttongjiirpa etuchaang jungsuwsehe; khangkhing ichieng ningkaarnaje enchuwchaang etuhe uwmvatehe. Emmenieching aatinpa aapuwrahchuw rhumaaheniege, aemaang abesuw amamaa ttongjiir enruw ing hinrinvatehe engkhejege emmenie entaalina enrang aemaangna ahimbesuwgehe.
Changgejenie emmenieng enthachachuw mi enhimpahing minjieheniege, emmenielina ichum lhamchuw itthamaaing tongvatehe.

Engkhejege engkaaraamching enttongtho ituchaang tuheniege ningnuwchuw ijuwrpeese ibesuwvatehe, emmeniechuw alaargehe ichiehe aphuwngna ayen atebesaga chona emmeniechuw memangvang ate miheching idejehmaaga engkhejege ijaarmaaga.
Ajiegachiinche thangven michierheching isiicher tuniebe Thangnhang ing tthimaaniebe, engkhejege waajiir tuvang ichie atthihhechuw longkongte lhinheniege inthim turiite pecherheniebe
engkhejege ayenna beluw lolhiepaamchuw karpilung Thangnhang athachamaahe taalina chii aminliem aphana dhormo icher ttong aminjaam Noachuw mi sarii tho tthihnieche.
Engkhejege Sodomle Gomorrah khuwpuw ennhiichuw lungvuw besuwge aemaangte bebohenieche;
Engkhejege itthamaa entu ingeenlheengching aminjapaa dhormo icher Lot chuw karpinieche,
(Ama dhormo icher miching engkaarna paarge, amhuwtaana engkhejege athietaana aanasiir ama dhormo icher chipichuw emmenieing waajiir ttongtho aminjiemaa nonglina aminjahe;)
Chonaching Thangnhang ing dhormo enthiinghechuw ijachaamtena akarna aminghuwga, engkhejege dhormo ichermaahechuw waajiir etuna inie aphamaataang tantie apeena iuwmjega.
