Ama ithiseh ebour ichamaa humlina aeong aanhuw ijiihechuw, engkhejege aapuwhechuw naseenmaahechuw waajiir tuvang ichii inie phana asiihna iuwmga.
Lhuwngttittuing arinnepang amindeenheching athanglaar elhuwnghenhingna itthamaaing ittong ttiemaahe,
thangven michierheching enchena empaangkar uwmpaakhangjenie Thangpa mhekungna echummaa mihe romhing taalina itthamaa wajiir hinrinmaahe.

Changgechuw emmeniechuwbe suwrheniege memaangvang ichie rampa sah khangkhing aberhinggehe, imminghuwmaa nonglinaje echamaapah ttong ing ittong gehe, chotahnaching emmeniechuw rampa sah khangkhing memaang vatehe.

Hanghing enlaarnachuw entuching phuw ilie mhuwheniege ijana, emmaraarchuw akhaanggehe; siimttimna ichuwmaa rotha rhonachuw itthaga ateheching ningnuwtho the ninsaahaale emmenieing mi mimmuhege rotha aminrhonaahe, emmenie hangchie hie ebourgehe engkhejege ichamaapaachuw ouwngsuwgehe.

Immhiching nepenuwhelina ichamaa tunaching abelenggehe, engkhejege immhichuw isiicher tuna minchinmaahe, enniirna aminghuwchemaa mihechuw mineemhege embelungriirtena kaaraampah nong tuna enthongbesagehe, emmeniehie seraap apha sitigehe.
Atatah lhamchuw jiemaahege, bevehege Bosor sapa Balaam ing asina lham jiehege emmosehe: Balaam ing ichamaa atu enning aminsiipehe,
changgechuw amaing alaar nonglina tantiechuw aphape; aarur isuwmaa sikursiing ing mi irur ing hangttongge Thangnhang ttongjiirpa abevihnachuw akhaampe.
Emmeniehie chii ephuwrma chiitaang engkhejege thiekhuw aerhaang ing arhenbesa rudugehe, enrotumna inthimseh abiechuw atthipigehe.
Ajienachiinche ekanamaa ilhuwng ttittuhing ttonghege alaarbesa hum ing aadie lhamna ipaarhechuw kihege ichamaa lhamte amengonggehe.
Emmenieching mihenhingna ningvesangna ttong menierhege entachuwche ichamaa mineching iuwmjegehe, ajiegachienche ajiejie suwhkhangjenie aapuw enshuw amararahching ataachuw mine abesuwga.

Ajiegachiinche emmenieng ikarpi aapuw Jesu Khristachuw imminghuwtaana lolhiepaamna ebour lhamtena emmenieng irhingna apha inhuwte avonhii ebour lhamte inliheniebe nhungkurtena enrhingnaching mensana inrhingnatena ehungtthamaasehga.
Ajiegachiinche dhormo icherna lhamchuw minghuwhege, emphabesa enthiing ttongthotena inghirjoh saruhchinbe emmenieing minghuwmaa heniebe tthasevang ategehe.
Hevehie atataa ttongtah inhuw ijieng suwse, “Uhti ing asohbesate avonhie hungeenlise,” engkhejege, “Entthiebesa vonuwching enuwngte avonhie embourse.”
Keningsiihe, atebe hevehie amenhiena kebejii leriiga; engkhejege heve leriinahing ningnuwching ningeenthienaing kebetthogechuw.
Ayenna enthiing laarchanghe ttongle engkhejege ttongjiirpahe apaarna ekarpi aapuw Thangpa ttongthohchuw eenthiepisaruw.
Attuna iniena mi meniejena tuheniege, hum ing aadielina tuvatehe atehie mensang minghuwvang nintega.
Emmenieching hanghing rhiervatehe: “Amang juwngvang ate ttongnierchuw akhunaga? Ajiegachiinche imapa imapuwhechuw enjaar inienang pee bekhe lolhiepaamna iheuwmbesa ngenge uwmjene!”
Emmenieng imminghuwbekhe abeherpehe, amachuwbe ayen betthiemge Thangnhang ttong ing Thangven engkhejege chiitena, engkhejege chiiliehna lolhiepaam iheuwmga;
Heve apaarna aeuwm lolhiepaamchuw chiiching beluwge amemaangga.
Changgechuw waajiir inietho Thangnhang amindeenmaahechuw amemaang inie iphakhah, atelena thangvenhetho lolhiepaam hehie mhite abethunaing atthijega.
Changgechuw keningsiihe, Thangpa nhingnabe inie nikhehie kum chiing engkhetho enghaaga, chona kum chiing engkhehie inie engkhetho enghaaga ichiehie behermaaruw.
Attongnierlina Thangpa iniechuw itherga atehie, engkhejege hevehie aminthermaaga changgechuw achuwdong memaang ning atemaaga, Mibekheing embelungriir ahoungna aphanaing atuga.

Changgechuw Thangpa iniechuw owngruw ing etheng khangkhing thengniege erur eperpaatho enrhiing maangvate, engkhejege pee euwmbekhe ensaching jinchervate, engkhejege lolhiepaamna iuwmbekhe kaangchervate.
Peebekhehie maangchervang atetaanaching, Thangnhang iniechuw haajemeniege engkhejege belung elhuwpaaing chona enthiing ing ipaartaana, Thangnhang khangkhing enthiing aeongnaing,
Thengvang atechuw haameniege, Thangnhang inie athengle thangvenna euwmbekhe minttungniege engkhejege iuwm peebekheje mhiching jinchervate.
Changgechuw attongnier enhuw ijiing, inieng dhormo icher ing ipaar ithar thangven engkhejege ithar lolhiepaamchuw aehaaga.
Chonaching keningsiihe, hevebekhe suwhvang ichie ihaajetaana Thangnhang mhilina ibour engkhejege itthamaa emveluung, ideje ningnuwchuw emphanaing nuumsaruw.
engkhejege Thangpaing isihpaa akhaangchuw isiichertena imminlenpeega ate mindeensaruw. Ama khangkhing ninningsii une Paul ing Thangnhang ing apee iviernachuw ninnhingna kebejiisaaga.

Hanghing ichieng abejii ttongjiirbekhe sungna ttong alhechuwbe aminghuwna luwpaane, aminghuw maahele belungrier inhehmaaching ttongjiir lintaangchuw amamaate aliehe khangkhing amamaate liehege emaangsagehe.
Chotahnaching, keningsiihe, heve ttonghie mensang minghuwnuwng, itthamaahe enlaarna-teching irhiiheniege nimbelungriir inhehchuw amaangnamaaing enriimsaruw.
Changgechuw lungsiilina engkhejege iniehechuw engkarpee aapuw Thangpa Jesu Khristanhingna aekhaangchenaing hanglhuwgruw. Anhingna ateleje ittiim inemaa phana athang alaar uwmresie. Amen.
Abourna betthiimge euwmbesa, ithiibesa imhihing imhuwbesa, inieng mhuwmiege iparbesa irhing ttonglina kinnuw ing kimminthangga.
Heve irhinghie uwmphuwngse, engkhejege imhuwcherpe, amapatho aeonghaa engkhejege inhingna uwmphuwng irhing ittiim inemaa amalina saarkhie ouwngshuw ninnhingna kimminthangpe.
Kinnuw ing kimmhuw engkhejege kinthiechuw ningnuwjeng kinnuwtho saruh chuw iphahaana, kinnuw ing ninnhingnaje kinrhierpe; engkhejege saruh iphahaahehie amapatho asapa Jesu Khristatho iphahaaga.
Kinnuw ing hevebekhe kimbejiihing aerotha rhohnachuw alir asuwga.
Kinnuw ing anhingtena ttongjiir kinthiechuw ninnhingna kimminjaamga, amachuwbe, Thangnhanghie lengwaarga anhingna inthim uwmmaadeh.
Inieng amatho ilhaang saruh ephahaaga temeniege inthimna bevemeniebe, mi nimminchenaga engkhejege atataachuw nintumaaga.
Changgechuw inieng elengna bevemeniebe, atararah elenggekhage inieje engkhele engkhe aalhaang saruh ephahaachuwgemie, engkhejege asapa Jesu thieching isiicher bekhetena imminthiing piga.
Enieng isiicher tumaauwng temeniebe, itaasaahing enchesagemie, engkhejege inhingna atataachuw uwmmaa.
Enieng isiicher etuchuw phuwngsameniebe, isiicher etuchuw ikuhpivang ichie engkhejege dhormo ichermaa bekhetena eniechuw imminthiingnaing amabe ithacha arhu engkhejege atataa chuwga.
Enieng isiicher tumaauwng temeniebe, amachuw mi amemunachuw ibesuwga, engkhejege ama attongchuw enhingna aeuwmmaaga.

Keningsii nepanghe, ningnuw ing isiicher nintunamaaing heve ttonghehie ninnhingna kebejiiga, changgechuw achuw engkheching isiicher tuniebe Ipa mhekungna irotumna enniirpi dhormo icher Jesu Khrista ongne.
Engkhejege ataa raraa isiicher etulina atah apidoh imminlhiempee aapuwga; inie rotum pangmaaga, changgechuw lolhiepaam mi bekhe rotumjega.
Enieng amaing arhier ttongthohechuw minjiemeniebe choveching amachuw eminghuwga atechuw endangga.
Achuw engkheching teniege, “Kieng amachuw keminghuwpe,” changgechuw attongthohechuw minjiemaaniebe ichummaa arhierga, engkhejege anhingna atataachuw uwmmaa;
Changgechuw achuwchuwgejenie attong aminjieching itthajeng Thangnhangchuw aning aminsiichuw alir asuwga, amaching enieng anhingna ongnemie ichie eminghuwga;
Anhingna aphabekhena ongning ate amaching Thangpaing atukhangkhing sivang atega.
Keningsiihe, ninnhingna ithar ttongtho kebejiimaaga, changgechuw abetthiimpelena nimphabesa beluw ttongtho ninthiebesachuwga.
Changgechuw ninnhingna ithar ttongtho kevibejiiga, hevehie anhingnaje ninnhingnaje atataachuwga; ajiegachienche inthimchuw ttiimge atataa elengching lengge uwmne.
Elengnaching ongning teniege auw anehechuw ahar miching ate iphang inthimna aeongga.
Auw ane aning aminsiiching elengna aeongga, engkhejege anhingna khi minsiena uwmmaa.
Changgechuw auw ane ahar michuwbe inthimna ongge, inthimsungna emvega, engkhejege inthimching amhee minthimge akhute isiging ichie minghuwchemaa.
Keningsii nepanghe, kieing ningnhingna kebejiiga, amachuwbe, Ninnuwng isiicher nintubekhe Thangpa romhinglina ouwngkuhpipe.

Epahe, ninnhingna kebejiiga, ajiegachienche aborna betthiimge iuwmje Thangnhangchuw ningnuw ing nimminghuwse; Elerhe, kieing ninnhingna kebejiiga, ajiegachienche itthamaa engkhechuw ninchepe; Nepanghe, ninnhingna kebejiiga, ajiegachienche ningnuw ing Epachuw nimminghuwse.

Kilhanghe, kieing ninnhingna kebejiiga, ajiegachienche abetthiimpelena iuwm Thangnhangchuw nimminghuwpe. Elerhe, kieing ninnhingna kebejiiga, ajiegachienche ningnuwbe pernechuw, engkhejege Thangnhang ttong ninnhingna apha bekhena uwmne, engkhejege ningnuw ing itthamaa engkhe amachuw ninchepe.
Simriipaamchuw, engkhejege simriipaam sungna euwm peehechuw ninning minsiemaaruw. Achuw engkheing siimrii paamchuw aning minsieniebe amapa aningsiichuw anhingna uwmmaa.
Ajiegachiinche simriipaamna iuwmbekhe hum ing aadie, mheing aadie, engkhejege irhingnalina ouwngshuwmemoh belungrierbekhe Epatenamaaga, changgechuw simriipaamtenaga.
Engkhejege simriipaamje amaing aadiebekhe aemaang inega; changgechuw Thangnhang ing amindeen atu miching ittiim inemaa aanasiir irhingga.
Nepanghe, attuhna aphachuwga! Ningnuw ing Khrista arhumaachuw thengse ate ninthiega, ateleje Khrista arhumaa hechuw thengsehe; hevehing attuhna iniega ate iminghuwse.

Emmeniebe inhingtena tensehe, changgehcuw emmeniehie aetahmaaga; ajiegachienche emmeniechuw aetahgeniebe inietho aphabekhena onghaavang aetega; changgechuw emmeniebekhe aetahmaagehe ate aandangnaing tensehe.
Changgechuw ningnuwchuwbe enthiing thou ingeetehchuw nimphape, engkhejege ningnuw ing amachuw nimminghuwga.
Ningnuw ing atataachuw nimminghuwmaaga tengge kebejiimaaga, changgechuw amachuw nimming huwtaana, engkhejege ichamaa ttong arhier engkhe dong atataatena ethengmaaga ichie kebejiiga.
Mee aminmuchuw, jesuhie Khristaga ichii arhuma amachuwga? Amapa engkhejege asapajechuw arhumaa antichristchuw amahiega.
Asapachuw arhumaa mibekheching Amapaje phamaanie; A Sapachuw arhu miching Amapaje aphaga.
Ningnuw ing abetthiimpelena ninthiebesabekhe ninnhingna rhingjehresie. Abetthiimpelena ninthiebesachuw ninnhingna rhingjeniebe ningnuwjeng A Sapanhingna engkhejege amapa nhingna aphabekhena ongvate.
Amahie inhingna ttongneer impibesachuwga, amachuwbe, ittiim inemaa irhingchuwga.
Ningnuwchuw amamaate imemunaheniege ichielina heve ttonghie kebejiiga.

Ningnuw ing anhingtena thou aatehchuw aphabekhena ninnhingna uwmne, achuw engkheing ningnuwchuw imminchuwna ikana uwmmaa; changgechuw heve ttongbekhelina amaing thou ingeetehpeetaana ningnuwchuw imminchuw, atataachuw amamaa irhier uwmluing ningnuwchuw imminchuw khangkhing, Thangpa nhingna aphabekhena ongruw.
Engkhejege ate nepanghe anhingna ongjeruw, Thangpachuw aamphuwng iniena ibelung ngamna uwmniege ama ajuwngleching ningjaanachuw phamaamenie.
Amachuw dhormo icherga ichie minghuwtenuwbe, dhormo icher mi bekheching anhingtena ithar ing inrhingga.

Ebeerruw, iniechuw Thangnhang siti ibesuwpeege itaalina amindang Thangnhang ningsienahie ijehmeh innheega! Chonaching atebe enie asitigemie; lolhiepaamching amachuw minghuwmaa ajiegachienche lolhiepaam ing Thangpachuw aminghuwmaa taanaga.

Keningsiihe, ate iniebe Thangnhang sitigemie, ajiesuwvate ate atele minghuwmaa lhiemie, Thangpachuw; inieng iminghuw chuwbe ataa aamphuwng inienaching amathoh enghaa vateruw, ataachuw inieng mhuwvateruw.
Engkhejege, ama enthiingkhangkhing achuw engkhe thangpachuw mindeensaniebe entaachuw enthiingga.
Achuw engkheing isiicher tuniebe waajiir ttongtho aeuwmmaa alaarchuwga; isiicher etuhie waajiir ttongtho iummaaga.
Isiicherchuw areennaing Thangpachuw uwmphuwngga, anhingna isiicher uwmmaa.
Anhingna aeongching isiicher tumaa; isiicher atuching Thangpachuw mhuwmaa engkhejege minghuwmaa.
Nepanghe, achuwdong ing iminche maaheresie. Achuw chuwgejenie ichum atuching, Thangpaing dhormo icher khangkhing dhormo icherga.
Achuw engkheing isiicher tuniebe diabol sitiga; ajiegachienche diabol chuwbe abetthimpele isiicher atubesaga. Diabol anongchuw amemaang naing. Thangnhang Sapachuw uwmphuwngse.

Thangnhangtena inrhing mibekhe isiicher tumaa, ajiegachienche Thangnhang ttongchuw anhingna aphabekhena aeuwmga, engkhejege isiicher tuniege aeong chemaa, ajiegachienche amabe Thangnhangtena inrhingga.
Hanghing Thangnhang sitihele diabol sitihechuw amindangga echummaa atu michuw, engkhejege auw anehe aning aminsiimaa miching Thangnhangtena maaga.
Ajiegachiinche abetthiimpelena ningnuw ing ninthie ttongchuw hevehiega, amachuwbe engkhele engkhe ningsie empevang etega.
Enieng ichamaa amindeentaana anepa atheh Ken khangchiemaavang etega. Engkhejege ajietuna amachuw athehga? Ajiegachiinche amaing atuhie itthamaaga engkhejege anepachuwbe dhormo icherga.
Keu kene, kesarhe, lolhiepaam ing eharniebe ninning mindongmaaruw.
Enieng ithietenachuw eelenpe ate iminghuwga, ajiegachienche inieng engkhele engkhe ningsie empesemie. Achuw chuwgejenie aningsii euwmmaaching ithiebesaing aeuwmjega.
Auw ane, asarhe aharhechuwbe mithehgehe, engkhejege mithehechuw ittiim inemaa irhing ennhingna uwmmaa ichiehie iminghuwse.
Ama ningsiichuw inieng iminghuwga, amachuwbe Thangpaing aerotumna achipi abethinga, enieje iuw inehhelina ichipi bethin vang aetega.
Lolhiepaamna iuwmbekhe dinmeniege auw ane, asarhechuw engkana pee pevang ichie mhuwniege apimaa miching Thangnhang ningsiechuw ajiekhang anhingna uwmvang atega?
Edoung nepanghe, inieng inher ing changmaanieche irhierching naning minsiimaamenie, changgechuw anong ing engkhejege atataaing ningsie uwmsateruw.
Engkhejege heve etutaana atataa etuga ate minghuwvateruw engkhejege ibelungriirchuw anhingna imindangga.
Ebelungriirching rhumaameniebe Thangnhangchuwbe ibelungriir ithi ing elhuwngga, amaing euwmbekhe aminghuwga.
Keningsiihe, ebelungriirching iniechuw erhumaa tumaaniebe Thangnhangte ebelungriir lhuwngna euwmga;
engkhejege ihinnhiebekhe anhingtena iphaga, ajiegachienche ama attongrhier bekhe minjiemiege, amaing arhuchuw ituga.
Engkhejege, hevehie attongthochuwga, inieng asapa Jesu Khrista romhingchuw thachameniege engkhele engkhe ningsie empevang aetega.
Ama attongtho aminjie mibekhe anhingna aeonggehe, engkhejege innhingna amaje aeongga. Engkhejege heve itutaanaching amaing impee chipi Enthiing ing inhingna aeongga ichie iminghuwse.
Keningsiihe, chipibekhechuw thachamaaruw, changgechuw chipihechuw chaang ibeerruw; ajiegachienche aatuchaang laarchanghe inhimpah lolhiepaamna thengsehe.
Thangnhangtena chipichuw nimminghuwga, amachuwbe Jesu Khristahie humna ethengga ate arhu bekhechuw Thangnhangtenaga;
Engkhejege Jesuhie arhumaa chipibekhe Thangnhang tenamaaga. Engkhejege amahie Thangpa arhumaa chipihega, amachuw thengse ate ninthie besaga, atelerahing lolhiepaamna ongne.
Edoung nepanghe, ningnuw Thangnhangtagechuw, engkhejege immeniechuw ninchepe, ajiegachienche ningsungna aeongching lolhiepaamna aeong ithi eng elhuwngga.
Emmeniechuwbe lolhiepaamtenaga, chonaching emmenieng lolhiepaamtena ittonggehe, engkhejege lolhiepaam ing enttong arongegehe.

Eniebe Thangnhangtena gemie. Thangnhang aminghuwheching ettong arongega, engkhejege Thangnhangtena maaheching ettong rongemase. Chonaching enieng atataa chipi eminghuwga engkhejege amamaa chipijechuw iminghuwga.
Keningsiihe, engkhele engkhe ningsie empeteruw, Ajiegachiinche ningsiehie Thangnhangtaga, engkhejege ningsie ihe mibekhe Thangnhangtena inrhinga, engkhejege Thangnhangchuw aminghuwga.
Ningsii adeenmaa miching Thangnhangchuw minghuwmaa; Ajiegachiinche Thangnhanghie ningsiechuwga.
Hanghing Thangnhang ningsienachuw aekaarna imphuwngse: inieng irhingchuw iphanaing Thangnhang ing a Sapa engkhepangchuw lolhiepaamna ajibethinga.

Hevena ningsiechuw uwmme, amachuwbe inieng Thangnhangchuw ining iminsii amachuwmaaga, changgechuw Thangnhang ing iniechuw aning imminsiitaana a Sapa engkhepangchuw isiicher etulina ataachuw ingeetinpeena ing apidohga.
Keningsiihe, Thangnhang ing hangjehmeh aning iminsiiniebe, inieje engkhele engkhe ningsie empevang aetega.

Thangnhangchuw achuwdong ing mhuwmaadeh; inieng engkhele engkhe ningsie empemeniebe, Thangnhangchuw aphabekhena inhingna aeongga; engkhejege Thangnhangchuw aeongga, engkhejege aningsiichuw isungna changrier aphaga.
Hevehing inieng anhingna engkhejege amaing inhingna aphabekhena ongne ichie iminghuwse, ajiegachienche amaing achipichuw inhingna impipe.
Engkhejege amapaching asapachuw lolhiepaam akarpi aapuw aansuwnaing ajibethinpe ate imhuwse, engkhejege saarkhie ipiga.
Jesu Khristachuw Thangnhang Sapaga teniege achuw engkheing phuwngniebe Thangnhang ing anhingna, engkhejege atahching Thangnhang nhingna aphabekhena aeongga.
Chotahnaching inieng minghuwmiege Thangnhang ing iniehie aning imminsiichuw aethachaga.
Thangnhanghie ningsiechuwga, engkhejege achuw engkheing ningsielina aeongchuwbe Thangnhang nhingna aeongga.
hanghing ningsiechuw inieng alir isuwpe, amaching waajiir iniena aethona aatthanagaa, ajiegachienche amaing euwmkhangkhing inieje lolhiepaamna aeuwmgemie.
Ningsii ing enttii uwmmaa, changgechuw alir asuw, ningsiena enttiichuw uwmaase ajiegachienche enttiichuwbe tantie ephanachuwga, engkhejege enttii miching ningsienaching alir asuwmaaga.
Enieng Thangnhang ining iminsiiga, ajienachiinche amaing mensang aning imminsiiga.

Achuw engkheing Thangnhangchuw kening keminsiiga teniege auw anehechuw beterniebe ama echummaa aarhier miga, ajiegachienche amaing amhuw auw anehechuw aning aminsiimaa amaing amhuwmaa Thangnhangchuw aningminsiichemaa.
Engkhejege Thangnhangchuw aning aminsii miching auw aneheje aning minsiivang atega ate ttongthohie inieng anhingtena iphaga.
Jesuhie Khristaga ate mibekhe Thangnhangtena inrhingga, engkhejege manuw mapachuw aning aminsiiching sitiheje aning aminsiiga.
Thangnhangchuw ining minsiimiege attongrhier iminjieleching Thangnhang sitihechuw kening keminsiiga ichiechuw endangga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ttongthohechuw tumeniebe amachuw ining iminsiiga, ama ttongthobekhechuw irhiipaamaaga.
Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangtena inrhing bekheching lolhiepaamchuw achepe. Lolhiepaamchuw ichenachuwbe aethachachinga.
Jesuchuw Thangnhang Sapa rarahga teniege thacha maaniege lolhiepaamhie ache achuw uwmne?

Chiile thietho enrhiing ijuwng Thangpachuw amahiega, amahie Jesu Khristaga; chiipangchuw maage chiiching engkhejege thietho ijuwngga. Engkhejege Chipi Enthiingching ama saarkhiiga chiinche Chipi Enthiingchuwbe atataaga.
Saarkhii ouwngthum uwmne; amachuwbe
Chipi Enthiing engkhejege chii, engkhejege thiechuwgehe, heve ouwngthumhie ouwngrhugehe.
Enieng humtena saarkhiichuw liemeniebe, Thangnhang saarkhiechuw elhuwngsega; ajiegachienche amachuwbe Thangnhangching asapalina api Thangnhang saarkhiega.

Achuw chuwgejenie Thangnhangsapa athacha nhingna heve saarkhiehie uwmne. Thangnhang athachamaa miching Thangnhangchuw mi aminche abesuwga. Ajiegachiinche Thangnhangching asapalina saarkii apichuw amaing athachamaaga.
Ama saarkhiechuw hevehiega: Thangnhangching ittiim inemaa irhingnachuw impipe, ama irhingnachuw a Sapa nhingna aeuwmga.
Asapachuw aphahe miching irhingchuw aphaga; Thangnhang Sapachuw aphama miching irhingchuw phama.
Thangnhang Sapa romhingna athacha ninnhingna ittiim inemaa irhing uwmne ichie aminghuw naing heve ttongjiirhehie ninnhingna kebejiiga.
Engkhejege aenhingna iuwm aethonachuw hevehiega, amachuwbe amang amindeen inhuw ijieng hinnhemeniebe amang ihinnhiichuw athiega.
Engkhejege inieng ajiejiegejenie ehinnhiichuw amaing athiega atechuw minghuwmeniebe, inieng anhingna ihinnhiibekhe iphape ichiin iminghuwse.

Achuw engkheing auw anehechuw athinamaa isiicher atuchuw, amaing hinnhevang atega, engkhejege Thangnhang ing anhingna aethiena abesuwmaa aatuhe rotum irhingnachuw pesavate. Ithiena abesuw isiicher atuje uwmne; hevelinahing amaing hinnhevang atega ketemaaga.
Itthamaa atubekheching isiicheer atuga, changgechuw ithie besuwvang atemaa isiicherje uwmne.
Thangnhangte inrhing mibekhe isiicher atumaaga, changgechuw Thangnhangtena inrhingching ataachuw asersaaga, engkhejege itthamaa engkheching amachuw parchemaa ate inieng iminghuwse.
Eniebe Thangnhangtagemie, engkhejege lolhiepaam mibekhenhingna itthamaa engkhe aderna ongnehe ateje iminghuwse,

engkhejege amachuw aminghuwchenaje impeega ateje iminghuwse; chotahnaching atataa Thangnhangchuw iminghuwga, engkhejege a Sapa Jesu Khristanhingna ongmiege enieng atataa Thangnhangnhingna aeonggemie. Amahie atataa Thangnhang chuwga, engkhejege ittiim inemaa irhingchuwga.
Keningsii nepanghe, leh rotha irumtena impimsaruw.
Aateurbesa nepenuw upa engkhejege asitihenhingna kieng atataalina kening keminsii, engkhejege kiepangmaage atataachuw aminghuw mibekhenhingnajega;
Ajiegachiinche atataachuw inhingna aeuwmga, engkhejege ittiim inemaa aenietho ongne ichii linaga.
Amapa Thangnhangtena engkhejege Thangnhang a Sapa Jesu Khrista dejiim, lungsii engkhejege aningsiiching echumle ningsiiching eenrhiephuwresie.
Thangnhang nhingtena ttongtho aephabesakhangkhing, atataana isi nasitihe achuw engkheching atuhechuw kephataana inhimpah kerotha rhone.

Changgechuw ate keningsiinuw, kieng kethamsaanaachie; kieng ithar ttongtho kebejii khangkhing maage, changgechuw inieng engkhele engkhe ningsie empevang aetega atehie abettiimpelena bettiimge iphabesachuw kebejiiga.
Engkhejege ama ttongthona isihie ningsiichuwga. Ningnuw ing abettiimpelena ninthiekhangkhing ningsielina sivang nintega ate ttongthochuw hevehiega.
Jesu Khristahie hum ing ijuwngga ate arhumaa mee aminchehe inhimpah lolhiepaamtena suwhsehe, khangchie mihechuw mi aminche migehe engkhejege Khrista arhumaa migehe.
Ningnuw ing nintubekhe amaangna maaing ichapaa kithur aphanaing, nintaa nintaaing enriimsaruw.
Achuw chuwgejenie Khristaing aminchuwlina uwmjehmaaniege, amachuw elenniebe amaching Thangnhangchuw teumaa. Aminchuwlina aeuwmjeh meeching Thangnhangle a Sapachuw adeenga.
Achuw engkheing ninnhingna thengniege khangchiechuw hinrinmaaniebe ningeensuwngna bethung maaruw, engkhejege rukuumje tumaaruw.
Achuw engkheing emmeniechuw rukuum tuniebe itthamaa atulinaching amaje emvega.
Bejiivang ichie aenhimpah uwmjenie heve chena, muk ing bejiinumnum maang; changechuw ninrotha aerhochuw alir asuwnaing kie thengningge nimmhekungna attongna enthongsaning.
Aatourbesa ninnenuw sitihenhingna kiuwsaanaachie.
Upa kieing atataalina kening keminsii Gaiusnhingna
Keningsii nang ing nachipitena nong nahintuchekhangkhing alhambekhena nahintuchenang nataalina narhie atthanachuw kieng kemindeensaaga.
Ilhanghe alheheching thenghege nang ing natu atataalina saarkhie napeele kie kerotha rhosapaane, chona nang ing atataalina isigechie.
Kesitiheching atataalina sinehe ichie kethie heve ithi ing kerotha rhona uwmsamaaing.
Keningsiih, nang ing ilhaanghenhingna, amachuwbe namhuwmaa lhiehe mhargehejenie entaalina ittha ithacha arhu nong nang ing natupisehe.

Emmenieng ruwhchanghe mhekungna nang ing ningsie nong natupihechuw saarkhie apihe; Thangnhang nonglina nang ing tthavate ichienaching emmenie ramkhie emvasitaana itthang ramkhie insitaana vithasahe teniebe tthavate.
Emmenieng thachamaahe nhingtena ajiidong lieluing Khrista nonglina isisagehe.
Chonaching atataalina nong ituhaachuw aandangnaing emmeniechuw bumsavang aetegehe.
Kieing ruwhchangna ttongjiir kebejiisaaga; changgechuw engkaarna elhuwng aadie Diatrephes ing kettongchuw liemaase.

Chonaching amamaa thethie ibesuwge atubekhe kethengleching mindangsavang gete. Chonaching heve ttongpang ing amindeen tung luing elhanghechuw rukuum itu arhumaaga. Rukuum tuning atepaahechuw ruwhchangtena athorgehe.
Keningsii, itthamaa atuhe anuchuw minjiemaare, changgechuw ittha anuchuw iminjiepire. Ittha atu michuw Thangnhangtaga; itthamaa atu michuw Thangnhang amhuwmaaga.
Mibekheing Demetrias khuchuw itthang atongnaahe. Atataalinaje saarkhie pege amindangse. Kinnuwje itthaang kintongsaana. Engkhejege saarkhie kimpibekhechuw atataaga ate nimminghuwse.
Nanhingna bejiivang kete inhimpah uwmne, changgechuw kieng mukle kolom ing bejiining tesamaang.
Changgechuw kieng nangchuw enrang eenteunaing mindeensaingge, imhele imhe eenteule rhiersavanggete.
Nanhingna belungriir dejiim uwmresie. Hena aeong eelhangheching lhamsuw enthennaahe. Amatena eelhangbekhenhingna enromhing rhiersaingge lhamsuw kethensaana.
Jesu Khrista mane Jakob une ttongjiirpa Jehuda ing engkhejege aeenbesa ninnhingna, amapa Thangnhang nhingna aningsiihe Jesu Khrista nhingna enlaa luing aesiihe nhingna:
Ama lungsii, dejiim, engkhejege ningsie ningnhingna isiikang uwmresie.

Keningsiihe, Iniebekheing isiichertena imminlenpeelina bejiigete tengge keenthongle, enthiinghenhingna vokhepang apibesa aethacha rutumna belungriir elhuwpaaing abejiina taancha kephatho ninthachalina belung ngamna enjiihmaa arhumaa kenhingna uwmse.

Ajiegachiinche, achuw engkhe ningkaarna ouwngruw valhuwge; emmeniehie ayen alaarga ichie amenebesa, Thangnhang amindeenmaa engkhejege Thangnhang lungsiichuw amamaate akihe aeta Apuw engkhepang engkhejege Thangpachuw arhumaa migehe.
Ate ningnuw ing hevebekhehie ninthiechergejenie, avonhie ningeenthienaing, amachuwbe Egypt paamtena amihechuw Thangnhang ing vokhepangna karpihege, changgechuw inhuwteche athachamaahechuw amemaangga.
Engkhejege empaarna amhinna aeongje arhumaa, changgechuw empaarna amhin peemhege abethin thangven michierhenhingna elhuwng waajiir atunaing inthimpaate ittiim enemaaing phierhege asiihpe.

Sodomle Gomorrah engkhejege asiir apaangna khuwpu inhimpahheje emmenieng entuthoh enghaa naamaa ituhe, engkhejege hum ing aadielina isihe; chotahnaching ittiim inemaa mhinna ijachaam bedaarhege, ama aandangnachuw isuwhga.
Chove khangkhing raraa emmenieje enromhang sege humchuw amimbourgehe, entaalina aapuw ouwngsuwh Thangnhangchuw mahege athang alaar elhuwnghechuw ichamaaing atonggehe.
Changgechuw elhuwngseh thangven michier Mikal ing diaboltho ouwngrhumaahege Mosi humlina insihege atahlina waajiir betthomaa, changgechuw hanghing arhier, “Thangnhang ing aechaaresie.”
Changgechuw hangchie mihechuwbe ouwnghuwdong aminghuwmaahe linaching embelung minsiihege belungrier aeuwmmaa waakhar isuwmaa sahekhangkhing ouwngnunu ing entaachuw amemaangsahgehe.
Jasawatehe! Ajiegachiinche emmenieng Kain lham chuw ajiepehe, sheer idehege Balaam alaartaate valhuwsehe, engkhejege Kora ttongsuwlina emmeniechuw maangsehe.

Ningsii aeriim, isaa eenna aeonghaa ibourgehe, enttii aeuwmmaa enthenen embiersagehe; chii inthinmaa rudu thieing arhiechuwgehe; aanrah iuwmmaa, vonhie ithiebesa, arojungje aaphibesa pherbie thinggehe.
Intahlina ningjaanachuw; rimchie chii ouwnglu chii penti ihangphuwrchuwgehe; enjaa nongnong arrsiigehe, emmenie rotum inthim enduchuw ittiim inemaang aatthipigehe.
Hevebekhelinaje Adamna betthiimge misien asariina Enoching Thangnhangtena suwvang ichie minthangge, arhier, “Ebeerruw, Thangpaing ami enthiing chiingchiing ing enrhiege thengsehe.”

Mibekhe taalina waajiir atunaing, engkhejege Thangnhang athachamaa nong entubekhe taalina, engkhejege Thangnhang athachamaa isiicher atuheching Thangpa taalina itthamaaing ittongbekhechuw aminlaarnaing jungthengse.

Emmeniehie ittong chorchor migehe engkhejege mi itthamapang aatonggehe, emmenieng entu itthamaa belungrierpang tuhege, entaache itthapaagung ichieng uwmhege, emmenieng kanavang ichiena mihechuw mimpaa chaanghege aeong migehe.
Changgechuw keningsii ningnuw, Thangpa Jesu Khrista ttongjiirpaheching ayen arhierbekhechuw eenthiepisaruw;
ajiegachienche emmenieng ninnhingna arhierbesaga, “Attuna iniena mi asiimnahe Thangnhang ing aadiemaa hum ing aadie isihe michuw thengvate.”
Emmeniechuwbe lolhiepaam belungrier apih, chipi aphamaahe, mi mintthena aatongchuwgehe.
Changgechuw, keningsii ninnuw, ninthacha enthiingjelina meniernuwng Chipi Enthiing hinnhenung ongsaruw.
Ittiim inemaaing ninrhingnaing Thangpa Jesu Khrista tena lungsiichuw ninghaajele Thangnhang ningsielina nintaaing inriimsaruw.
Enthachalina inhemaahechuw belungrier ilhuw ing minchuwheruw.
Lintaanghechuw mhisungtena hingkijohnung karpiruw; engkhejege humna ibour piendeerjechuw beternuwng, lintaanghechuw enttiitho enrhiing ningsiechuw mindangpeeruw.
Atebe ningkhi nimmingsiinamaaing ningnuwchuw ibourtena immindiepiche engkhejege, inhimseh rotha rhonate ibour iuwmmaa Thangpa athang alaar aeuwm amhekungna ningnuwchuw emmeniirche,

Eniebekhechuw engkarpeeche aapuw engkhepang Thangnhangte ae Thangpa Jesu Khrista apaarna enjaphuw arhu, athang alaar elhuwng, ama ruwngper engkhejege aapuw ensuwh aphachuw aviemaataang, atele, engkhejege ittiim inemaaphana ensuwresie! Amen.
Suwhrimvang ate aminehenhingna amindangnaing Thangnhangching Jesu Khrista nhingna apeechuw taang aphuwngna ttongjiirga; Khristaching amine Johonnhingna thangven michier jichierge amindangpiga.
Amaing Thangnhang ttong engkhejege Jesu Khrista saarkhie lina amaing amhuwbekhechuw saarkhie apiga.
Heve laarchang ttong apahe michuw engkhejege asungna enjiibekhechuw minjiecheniebe emmeniechuw enrasie itthaga; ajiegachienche aphachuw innheengse.
Johon ing Asiana euwm ruwhchang sariehenhingna abejiega; atele iuwm, ayenje iuwm, engkhejege thengvang ichie Thangnhangtho Eruwng ongna apaangna aeong chipi sariena,

engkhejege aethacha arhu saarkhie, ithiehekaartena mensa aberhing, engkhejege lolhiepaam eruwnghe aapuw Jesu Khrista lungsii engkheje dejiim ninnhingna uwmresie. Eniebekhechuw aning imminsii Thangpa thieching isiichertena embejohpipe.
Eruwng lepaa engkhejege Thangpa amapa Thangnhang abuwmna khorpuw ibesuwpeege Thangpa athang alaar ing ipaarchuw ittiim inemaaing uwmresie. Amen.
Ebeerruw, Thangpahie rudutho enrhiing juwngne; meemhibekheing mhuwvate issieing aakhu mibekhejeching; Thangpa athengtaanaching lolhiepaam yaati bekheing embelung javate. Khangkhing suwhresie! Amen.
Atele isuwh, ayen ishuwbesa, avonhie suwhvang ichie ruwngper euwm Thangnhangching arhier, “Kiebe abettiimna engkhejege attunaging.”
Ninguw ninne ouwngsuw, Jesulina ijachaamtho eruwngpaamna, engkhejege amalina adierche ningnuwtho iphahaa Johon kieng Thangnhang ttongle Jesu saarkhie kepitaana Patmos ichie paamttiina aeonging.
Thangpa inienaching chipina ongeengge, ketuung nhuwngna erur engkaangpaa tumpi erurching arhier kethie.
“Nang ing namhuwchuw leriina bejii ing, ruhchang sariihe, amachuwbe Ephesia, Smirna, Purgamos, Thiatiranhingna, Sardianhingna, Philadelphia nhingna engkhejege Laodece nhingna vitha.”
Achuwching embiega tengge inghireengge kibierche, engkhejege kevaanlehche sana thoumhi abelengna aki sarii kemhuwpe.
engkhejege thoumhi abelengna akhihe aliehnaching Mi Sapatho enghaajeh, apienserchuw akhimhur phana amingkhum, engkhejege abelungna sanaing eenchiimchuw kemhuwpe.
Aluwle asamchuw ivaarje shamuwr, rubournge nge ing ipurga; engkhejege amhichuw mhirhiithoh enghaage,
engkhejege akhimhuwrhechuw mhisungna aminloungbesa itthapaa pithraitho enghaage; engkhejege aarur ing chiipuw eleung rosangengechuwga.
Akih tachangna aarsii achi, anhertena enrhehpaa ahaa ennhie iuwm chiimsie chige; engkhejege amhesuwchuw elengpah inietho enghaaga.
Kieng amachuw kemhuwleching ithiekhangkhing akhiboumna vatiesing; engkhejege ama aki tachang ing ketaalina sege arhier, “Ittemaa; kiebe mensa engkhejege anhungkur chuwging,
engkhejege irhingchuwging; engkhejege kie theingge, engkhejege, ebeerruw, kie ittiim inemaaching rhingning, ithieching engkhejege noroh chabi kenhingna uwmne.
Chonaching atenie isuw, amanhuwna suwhvang ate namhuwchuw bejiire;

ketachang kekihlina namhuw aarsii sariele sana thoumhi abelengna sarii mehna iuwm ouwngthur ttongchuwbe: Aarsii sariichuw ruwhchang sarii thangven michierhe, engkhejege thoumhi abelengna akhi sariichuwbe ruwhchang sariichuwga.”
“Ephesusna iuwm ruwhchang thangven michiernhingna bejii: Akee tachangna aarsii sariichuw bechuwge sana thoumhi akhi sarii kaarna hungbeve vabevege aeong anhingna arhierga.

“Natu nanong, naanlhieng, nadierche, engkhejege itthamaahechuw nang ing dierchemaachie ate, engkhejege ataa athenen ttongjiirpaging ate, atataaing ensuwmaahechuw chaang ebierge emmenieng emmemuna nang ing naphaga ichie keminghuwga.
Kiejeng nadierche; keromhinglina indierpipechii, engkhejege amalina jamaadechie.
Changgechuw nataalina kerhumaa uwmne, nang ing mensa naningsiichuw namaape.
Nang ing akhunakhing itiegechie enthiesare, nabelung huwngre, mensa nanongchuw tu; changmaanieche, nabelungriir huwngmaateniebe kieing nanhingna thengningge thoumhi akhichuw amhintena pimvanggete.
Changgechuw hevechuwbe natuse; Kieing kebeter Nikolaitan he nong entuchuw nangjeng nabeterse.
Chipiching ruwhchanghe nhingna arhierchuw aana iuwm miching thiesaresie. Araar ache minhingna Thangnhang Paradisna iuwm irhing thingbourlitena asaaphuw kieng pevanggete.
“Smirnana aeong ruwhchang thangven michier nhingna bejii: Thege avonhie ihangrhing mensa engkhejege attuhna Thangpaching hevehie arhierga.
“Kieng ijanang engkhejege nasarachuw keminghuwse, changgechuw nang savanggechie, entaasaaing Jehudigung tehege, atatahingche ensuwmaa, satan khuwngsangtho aeonghaa itthamaagehe.

Nang ing ijanang diervang natechuw ttiemaa. Ebier, ningnuwchuw chaang ingeebiernaing diabolching ningnuwkaarna alhehechuw mikhum sungte elhinrong atena, engkhejege inie nesuumbekhe ijanang phavangninte. Nang ing ithie iphang aethacha arhu ensuwsare, engkhejege kieng irhing luhu pevanggechie.
Chipiching ruwhchanghe nhingna arhierchuw aana euwm michin thiesaresie. Araar ache michuw amenhiena ithieching minjachemaanie.
“Pergamosna aeong ruwhchang thangven michiernhingna bejiire! Tali tachang ingeepaa chiimsie adeen Thangpaching ttonghie arhierga.

Naongnachuw keminghuwga, chotahnaching Satan ongna uwmne; engkhejege nang ing keromhing inhepaaing nabechuwse, engkhejege Satan ing aongna amhinna, ning buwmna atheh kie kesaarkhii ouwngsuw, kieng kethacha Antipas ing apaar inienarimching nang ing kenhingna nathachachuw irhumaa tumaa chie.

Changgechuw nataalina ttong tepie uwmne, ajiegachienche ama amhinnaching Balaam ing aminchuw ttong aminjie nanhingna ongnehe, leh rothana apih asaana, naamaa atunahe, Israel sitihe mhekungna akhi minsiina avilhinchuw amaing Balaknhingna aminchuwpe.
Khangkhing ichieng Nieolaitan hechin aminchuw chuw enghaajeh aminjiehe nanhingna ongnehe.
Chonaching nabelungriir huwng; changmaaniebe nanhingna enrang thengningge, kenhertena chiimsieching nataalina raar tovanggechie.

Chipi ing ruwhchanghe nhingna arhierchuw aana aeuwmching thiesaresie. Raar aache anhingna ouwngthur mana pevanggete, engkhejege lhungwaar engkhe, engkhejege ama lhunglina abejiibesa aethar romhing enkhe anhingna pevanggete; amachuw apha michuw maaniege achuw engkhedong ing romhingchuw minghuwmaa.

“Engkhejege Thiatira sungna aeong ruwhchang thangven michiernhingna bejii: Mhirhiithoh enghaa akhimhuwrhe itthapaa mhina eluungbesa khangkhing eleng pithraitho enghaa Thangnhang sapaching heve ttonghehie arhierga.
“Nanongtu, ningsiena, nathacha inheh, nanong natutho nadierche engkhejege attuhna natuching mensatenachuw nathise ate keminghuwse.

Changgechuw nataalina kettonghie uwmne, amachuwbe, nataa nathienening ttongjiir nepenuwging ate Jezebel chuw nang ing narhuse, engkhejege amachinbe keminehechuw naamaa atunaing, engkhejege leh rothate apibesa pih asaanaing mihechuw arhienaahe.
Ama ing abelungrier amintenaing anhingna apha kepiga, ama ing atu naamaa anongtena abelungrier mintening temaase.
Enriemsaruw, kieng ajaartaate kejilhinga, engkhejege amathoh naamaa atuha atahlina inhimpah ijanachuw vilhinvanggete ama ing abelungrier mintemaniebe.
Kieng asitihechuw athinaing tuvanggete, engkhejege immindeen embelungriir aajongchuw kieging atechuw ruwhchang bekheching minghuwvatehe, engkhejege kieng mi ama ama ing atu inhuw ijieng pevanggechuw.
Changgechuw Thiatira na aeong abelhieching, heve ttonghie aliemaa, sataantena ouwngthupaa ttong aliemaahe ninnhingna kerhierga, kieng nintaalina irhiipaa ajiidong vilhinmaaning.
Changgumpachuw ningnuw ing nindeensaachuw kieing kethengmaataang inheh bechuwsaruw.
Engkhejege araar ache engkhejege alir iphang kettongrhier aminjie anhingna kieng yaatihe tahlina atuchena pevanggete.
Bir aekiecher khangkhing emmeniechuw thier romhor ing minvar vanggete kiejing ke Mapa nhingtena kepha inhuw ijie ing.
Kieng anhingna yieng aarsiichuw pevanggete.
Chipiching ruwhchanghenhingna arhierhie aana iuwmching thiesaresie.

“Sardisna aeong ruwhchang thangven michiernhingna vibejii: Thangnhangtena chipi sarii engkhejege aarsii sarii euwm Thangpaching heve ttonghehie arhierga. nang natuchuw keminghuwse, nang rhingnechie ichie naromhing uwmne, engkhejege nanghie ithiegechie.
Ijaarchiekha hangthie, engkhejege thevang ichie abelhiehechuw empaangkar thinpihere; ajiegachienche kie ke Thangnhang mhekungna nang ing natubekhe alir asuwnaing euwmchuw phamaasing.

Chonaching nang ing ajiekhang naphaga engkhejege naminchuwpigehe enthiesare; engkhejege amachuw minjieng nabelungriir mintere. Changgechuw nang ing enriimsa maateniebe, ouwngruwkhangkhing kie thengvanggete, chona ajie aphana nataalina thengvang atechuw minghuwmaadeh tenie.
Changgumpachuw empien endier aminbourmaa Sardisna naromhing tepie uwmne; emmenieng kietho enrhiing pien iwaar vienungge inlhinvang gungte, ajiegachienche emmeniechuwbe mati icha migehe.

Araar ache michuw hanghing iwaar piendier ing enthongvatehe; kieng aromhingchuw irhing leriitena memuhmaadehning, engkhejege kieng aromhingchuw Epata engkhejege Thangpa thangven michierhe mhekungna rhupeevanggete.
Chipiching ruwhchanghe nhingna arhierhie aana euwm amaching thieresie.

“Philadelphiana aeong ruwhchang thangvenmichier nhingna vibejiire: David ing adeen chapi chuw anhingna iuwm, enthiingle, atataa mi ttongchuw amahiega: Amachuw emmhongniege kamchemaa vang ate, kamniege achuwdong ing aamhongma Thangpaching heve ttonghehie arhierga.

“Kieng natuchuw keminghuwse. Ebier, achuwdong ing akamchemaa aamhongbesa eengkhaar engkhe namhekungna kepigechie, napaangkar tepie uwmnechie, engkhejege kettongrhier mingjieteniege keromhing narhumaa tumaachie.

Ebier, Sataanhe aruh, atahing Jehudigung teheniege, atataaing ouwngsuwhmaa, mi aminchehe ongnehe, emmeniechuw nanhingte thengheniege nakhiboumna minrum vanggetehe, engkhejege kieng nangchuw kening keminsii innhingna minthangvanggete.

Ajiegachiinche nang ing kerhier ttongchuw khaangchiege naminjielina, simriipaamna ipaarmibekhe chaang kibeernaing lolhiepaam aangkhengna thengvang ate chaang abeerna apha tena nangchuw kieng ngaavanggechie.
kie enrang thengrong ketena; mi achuwdong ing nalukhum aliechenamaang, nang ing nadeenchuw inheh bechuwre.

Araar ache michuw kieng Thangnhangtena enthiing eenna ichuw engkhe besuwvanggete; engkhejege amaing ama amhintena avonhie insinmaanie; engkhejege ke Thangnhang romhing, kie ke Thangnhang khuwpuw, ke Thangnhangtena Thangventena ijungttum ithar Jerusalem aromhing, engkhejege ketaa rarahtena ithar romhingchuw atahlina bejiivanggete.
Chipiching ruwhchang henhingna arhierchuw aana iuwmching thieresie.
“Engkhejege Laodekiana aeong ruwhchang thangven michier nhingna vibejii: Amen ate thacha iper engkhejege atataa saarkhie, Thangnhang ing asempaam abettiimnachuw hevehiega:
Nong natuchuw keminghuwse, nanghie besaje besamaachie, ideje demaachie, ensah changmaanieche ideching umteniebe tthavang atega;
Nang ing besaphuwphuw chiege, ensaje besamaachie, ideje demaachie, chovelinaching nanghie kinhertena bethaavanggechie.
Kie sawangging, lerchii kidinpohpe, ajiidong vehmaasing nate inhuw ijieng, engkhejege nasarapaa, nanangna, sara, mhichuw, pien asermaahe naminghuwmaa taana,

sawang naansuw naing mhiing aminluwng sana, nang nataalina aserna, napien serluing ningjaa aandangnamaa iwaar piendier, nang ing namhuwnaing namhi aatehna thou, kenhingtena naalienaing minthievanggechie.
“Kieng kening keminsii bekhechuw kerokuhga, enchaaje kichaagehe, chotahnaching nachipi minlhuw, engkhejege nabelungriir huwng.
Ebier, achuw engkheing kirur thieniege eengkhaarchuw aemhongniebe kieng anhingna valhuwningge amathoh the sahaavanggii.
Kieing cheningge Epa Ongtaana Thangpatho aeonghaa khangkhing, raar aache anhingnaje kie keongtaana aeonghaana pevanggechie.
Chipiching ruwhchanghe nhingna arhierhie aana iuwm amaching thiesaresie.

Heve inhuwna kehingngeebierche thangvennaching eengkhaarchuw emmhongge amana aeuwmjechuw mhuw ingge; engkhejege kieing kethie mensa irurching tumpi irurkhangkhing kenhingna arhier, “hingeenheengre! Heve inhuwna suwhvang atechuw mindangpivang gechie.”
Chalerahching chipina uwmsing, engkhejege Thangvenna eruwng ongnachuw uwmge ama tahlina mi engkhe aeong.
Aeongchuw kibierche jesperle Sardis engkhejege korneliantho enghaa ing aruwngchuw kemhuw, engkhejege immeraaltho enghaajeh tinusapa ing eruwng aongtahchuw rokuurge.
Eruwng ongna arokuursungnaching eruwng ongna sumnhielhie millie aeuwm, engkhejege eruwng ongnahe tahlina pien iwaar ing enthong, entaalina sana luhu ikhum upa sumnhielhie millie aeonghe kemhuw.
Ama ingongtahtena bitti ebow aarur engkhejege khuw enre erur ing ijunguwng; engkhejege ama mhekungnaching Thangnhang chipi sarietena mhi ittuwng mherhii sarie aeuwm;
engkhejege eruwng ongna amhekungna elengjerjer rimchiekhangchie aeuwm.
Eruwng ongtaa arokuurnaching amhiching ariekiingbekhena isiikang irhing sah millie aeuwm.
Achipi iuwm mensachuw kurkam, rhiimpuwtho enghaa, amenhienachuw shiertitho enghaa, aminthumnachuw mikhangchie amhe aeuwm; engkhejege amillienachuw enjaa vati, laangtatho enghaachuw aeuwm.

Engkhejege achipi iuwm milliechuw, engkhe engkhelina abetha kru kru aeuwm engkhejege arokuur arovenaje, asungteje amhiching isiikang aeuwm; engkhejege emmenieching yensiim jaminlhenlu ing lha atugehe,
“Enthiing, enthiing, enthiing,
isuwbesa atele isuw engkhejege hungsuwvang ichii,
achecher Thangpa Thangnhangga.”
Engkhejege chipi aeuwmheching eruwng ongna atahlina iongjeh ittiim inemaa irhing Thangpa anhingna athang alaar, enjasuwpaaing amimpaaleching,

Upa sumnhielhie millieching eruwng ongtaa ataalina aeong Thangpa mhekungna vatiehege, ittiim inemaa irhing Thangpachuw rumvatehe, engkhejege eenluhuchuw eruwng ongtaa amhekungna jiseniege lhaing mimpaahege:
“Kin Thangpa Thangnhang nangbe Thanglaar,
enjaphuw engkhejege ruwngper epha narovwarse.
ajiegachienche Thangpa nang ing aangkheng ensempichergechie,
engkhejege Thangpa nang ing namindeen inhuw ijiing hevehii isuwga,
engkhejege ensempigechie.”
Chona eruwng ongtaa ataalina aeong Thangpa aki tachangna aleh achang enjiibesa, chum sarieing anambesa leriichuw kemhuw.
Ataalina chum anamchuw aemhonghege engkhejege eperpaa thangven michierching erur engkaangpaaing aminthang, “Achuwching chum anambesahehie engkhejege heve ouwngjuur leriihe bejarchevate?”
Engkhejege Thangvenna changmaanieche simriipaamna, leriichuw abejar, changmaanieche embier ache achuwdong uwmmaahe.
Leriichuw bejarvang ate engkhejege ibier chevang ichie achuwdong auwm maataana inhimpah ttaasing.

Chonaching upahekaarna engkheching kenhingna arhier, “ttaamare, ebier, Judas, sungkhortena rhimpuw hie, amahie Davidtena ehungsuw arojungpuw amaing raarchuw achepe, chotahnaching amaing lerii ouwngjorle chum sariichuw emmhong achega.”

Ama inhuwnaching eruwng ongtaalina engkhejege erhing chipi sah milliehe engkaarna, engkhejege upahe alienaching ariikie sarii, amhi sarii aeuwm athehbesahe khangchie, Zousiti inierchuw kemhuwpe. Emmeniechuw simriipaam bekhena ajibethin chipi sariihe Thangnhangtenachuwgehe.
Zou sitiching thengge eruwng ongna ataalina aeong Thangpa akih tachangtena aliejohpe.

Leriichuw aliejohtaanaching chipi euwm millieching upahe sumnhielhie millieching Zousiti mhekungna vatiesehe. Emmenieching ttingse engkhetertho asungna aberim ichiipaaing isiikang enthiing miheching ahinthamna sana kamseng aeuwm.
Emmenieng hanghing lha ithar tuhege:
“Nanghie leriichuw alieche,
ama chumchuw naamhongcheh Thangpagechie,
ajiegachienche Thangpa nanghie enthehpe,
engkhejege sungkhor yaati, mibekhe,
engkhejege yaatibekhetena nathieching Thangnhang rotum Thangpa nang ing naaliepe.
Emmeniechuw Thangnhang rotum eruwng lepaa,
engkhejege Khorpuwhe aansuwnaing ouwngtupipe,
engkhejege emmenieng lolhiepaamna eruwng khangkhing paarvatehe.”

Chona eruwng ongtaana chipi aeuwm sahe engkhejege upahe arokuurnaching aeong thangven miechier inhimpahhe erurjechuw kemhuw, ithieje kethie, emmeniechuw eteemtaanaching chiing chiing, chiingza chiingzagehe,
emmenieng engkaangpaa erur ing lha atuhe:
“Ruwngper, sawangpa, evierpa, eperpaa, enjasuwh,
athanglaar euwm engkhejege bor aphana athehbesa Zou amahie erovaar phuwga.”
Chonaching lolhiepaamna aeonghe, lolhiesungna (aderna) aeonghe rimchiepuw sungna aeonghe, amaing atubesa irhing bekheching heve lhah atuhe,
“Eruwng ongtaana eeong Thangpa nhingna,
engkhejege Zou sitinhingna empaana,
enjaphuw arhu,
athang alaar iuwm ipaarchuw ittiim inemaa ouwngsuwresie.”
Engkhejege irhing sah millieching rhierhege, “Amen!” Engkhejege upaheching vatiehege arumpehe.
Chona Zousitiching chum sariitena engkhe aamhongchuw kemhuwpe, engkhejege chipi iuwm sah millietena engkheching khuw enrekhangkhing uwngge “huwngre” ate kieng kethiepe.
Kibierche kebuwmna raraa sikur ipur engkhe aeongchuw mhuw ingge; atahlina aeong michuw ropher engkhe chige, chona anhingna luhuchuw apipe, engkhejege raar achepa engkheching raar achenaing engkese.
Chum anam amenhienachuw Zou sitiching aamhongle, irhing sah amenhienaching arhier, “huwngre!”

Chona, lintaang sikur engkhe elengjeh isin jungsuwse; ama taalina aeong nhingna simriipaamna dejiim aliejonaing, miheching engkhele engkhe aanthehna arhupipe, engkhejege elhuwngpaa chimsie engkhe anhingna apipe.
Aminthumna chumchuw aamhongleching, aminthumna irhing sahching “huwngre” atechuw kethie. Engkhejege kemhuwchuwbe, ibier, ouwngduh sikur engkhe, ataalina aeongching erhiih amintina pee ennhie achi;

engkhejege irhing sah millietena erurkhangkhing arhier, “Gehu saang sheer engkhe lopa alheh engkhe, engkhejege barli sheer ouwngthum lopa alheh engkhejege thoule darkha chii hechuwbe permaare ate kethie!”
Aminliena chumchuw amaing aamhongleching, amilliena chipi ipaar irhingching “huwng” tege arhier kethie.

Chona kibierche mhuw ingge sikur idaang iearchuw, ama taalina aeongchuw Ithie romhing aringa, engkhejege norohching aanhuw ajiepe. Engkhejege simriipaam alheh millie taalina chimsie, vinttaam asuwhna, ina ikibekhe chona lolhiepaam rampa sahheching athehnaing, emmeniechuw apipehe.
Avorongana chumchuw aamhongleching Thangnhangttong arotumna saarkhie impitaanaching athebesahe chipihechuw inthina hebekoung aderna kemhuwpe;

emmenieng erur engkaangpahing iuwnghe, “Atuchecher aapuw, enthiingle atataa aapuw, simriipaamna euwmbekhetalina Thangpa nang ing waajiir tuchiege, ijehmeh isieing kinnu thie iphuwr lina phuw iliepimaa vang natega?”
engkhejege mibekhena pien iwaar apipehe, chona emmeniekhangkhing thehvang ate minehetho auw anehechuw entheng chermaataang apha amongna enja mindeheresie tege ennhingna arhierpipe.
Avoruna chumchuw aamhongleching, kibierche, iperpaa lienglaang thengse, inie ing sahmhuwr pienkhangkhing jungbeduhse, thaching thiekhangkhing ensuwse;
engkhejege iperpaa thie irhaangching aminlaa thechang bour ing iaer thechang ibowkhangkhing minventena aarsiihechuw simriipaamna jungbuhse;
engkhejege minvenchuw lerii aajuur khangkhing aliejope, engkhejege boungbekheje, chii ouwnglu bekheje ama ama auwmtaatena apimpe;
engkhejege lolhiepaam eruwngheching, aatucheheching, raar aachinghe, sawanghe, eperpaaheching, minebekheing, engkhejege ningvesang apha mibekheching entaa entaa boungkuhsungte ouwngthursehe;
Emmenieng boung boungna, engkhejege lhuwngpuwhe nhingna arhierhe, “kintaalina jungboing eruwng ongtaa lina aeong Thangpa amhekungtena, engkhejege Zousiti ther iphuwrtena kinnuwchuw ithursare.
ajiegachienche emmenietaalina ther phuwrna iniechuw thengse, engkhejege achuwngche nierchewate?”

Heve inhuwna lolhiepaamna, rimchie sungna, changmaanieche thingbour bekhelina thie arhaang namaang, lolhiepaam na iuwm thie aseh millie abechuw thangven michier minlieching lolhiepaam ariikieng milliena ineer kemhuwpe.

Irhing Thangnhang chum achi lintaang thangven michier engkheching iniesuwtena ihangkar kemhuwpe; engkhejege paamchuw engkhejege rimchie amemaangna apih thangven michier millieing engkaangpaa erur ing uwngge arhier,
“lolhiepaam, engkhejege rimchie engkhejege thingbourbekhe amemaangna inie i Thangnhang minehechuw embecharlina chum anammaataang memaang maalhiere.”
Engkhejege chum anamhe mi masingchuw kethiepe, Israelhe sungkhortena chum anambesa chiingza engkhe, chiing summillie lhie millie aphape.
Jehuda sungkhortena chiing summalhie ennhiechuw chum anampe; Reuben sungkhortena chiing summalhie ennhieje, Gadtena chiing summalhie ennhie,
Ashertena summalhie ennhie, Naphtalitena summalhie ennhie, Mannassehtena summalhie ennhie,
Simon tena chiing summalhie ennhie, Levitena chiing summalhie ennhie, Issachar tena chiing summalhie ennhie,
Zebulun tena chiing summalhie ennhie, Josephtena chiing summalhie ennhie, Benjamintena chiing summalhie ennhiega.

Ama inhuwna kibierche mi achuwdong ing iteem achemaa, Yaatibekhetena, sungkhor, mihe amana attong euwmbekhetena ouwngsuwr iwaar pien ing enthong, ingki ingkina inhu anha achi mi inhimpah eruwng ongtaa engkhejege Zousiti amhekungna nierhege,
erur engkaangpaaing iuwnghe, “Isiichertena aminlenpihie eruwng ongtaana aeong Thangnhang Zousititenaga!”

Engkhejege thangven michier bekheching eruwng ongna; upahetena, engkhejege achipi ipaar arokuornaching inierhe, emmenieng eruwng ongtaa amhekungna embelung ing vatiehhege Thangnhangchuw varumhege rhierhege lha atuhe.
“Amen! Rasie ittha, athang alaar, ivier, empaana, enjasuw, ruwngper engkhejege atuchepaa ittiim inemaa Thangnhangchuw ouwngsuwresie! Amen.
Chona upahe kaarna engkheching kenhingna ahinrhier, “ouwngsuwr iwaar pien aserhehie achuwgehe, engkhejege akhutenagehe?”
Kieng anhingna kerhier, “Aanchungpa, nang ing naminghuwse, emmeniehiebe ijachaam eperpaa apha tena ehungsuwgehe, empienchuw Zousiti thieching arosuwhbesagehe.

Chotahnaching emmeniebe Thangnhang eruwng ongna amhekungna aeonggehe; engkhejege emmenieng Thangpachuw yen siim neluing enthiing eenna arumgehe, engkhejege eruwng ongna taalina aeong Thangpaching entaalina mingkhumpivatehe.
Emmenieng avonhii imvin taammaanie, avonhii enchii haarmaanie; engkhejege entaalina inie ensanajechuw besuwpimaanie.
Ajiegachiinche eruwng ongna alienaching aeong Zousitiching entaalina aaserpa ouwngsuwniege, irhing chiitaang luungna teching sewatehe. Thangnhangching immhitena mhiriechiibekhe nhuwrpi vatehe.”
Zousitiching chum sariichuw aamhongleching Thangvenna pungpha tangkhevah idereng ongsehe.
Engkhejege Thangnhang mhekungna inier Thangven michier sariichuw tumpi sarii api kemhuwpe.

Engkhejege sana riechie bour aachi lintaang minven michierching thengge hebekoung aboumna nierse. Eruwng ongna mhekungna sana hebekoung amhinnaching enthiing miheching ahinthamnatho minchumniege vipevang ate aberim ichii inhimpahchuw anhingte apipe.
Chona thangven michier kihtena aberim ichii amhikhuwtho enthiing mihe ahinthamnachuw Thangnhang boumte hangtungse.

Engkhejege thangven michierching aberim ichii bourchuw aalhaangpe, amaing amachuw hebekoung amhinna mhi ing thenge lolhiepaamte ajilhinpe; engkhejege khuw enre, aarur, bittih ebuw eperpaa engkhejege lienglaang thengse.
Chonaching Thangven michier sarii heching achihe tumpi sarii mehchuw atumnaing enthongsehe.

Mensapa Thangven michier ching tumpichuw atumche iriirle mhi, thietho emvenohge jungsuwse, engkhejege amahechuw lolhiepaamte ajilhinpe; engkhejege lolhiepaam alheh ouwngthumna engkhechuw kaangcherse, Thingbour bekhechuw alheh ouwngthumna engkhe kaangcherse, engkhejege phuwr iear bekhe kaangcherse.
Amenhiena thangven michierching tumpichuw atumche mhi ing ikaang boungpuwkhangchie rimchiesungte ajilhinpe; amana rimchie alheh, aruh enthumna alheh engkhe thie umvurse.
Engkhejege rimchiena euwm chipi irhing enlaa achebekhe aruh ouwngthumna engkhethise, engkhejege ruwkuung aruh ouwngthumna engkhechuw amemaangpe.

Aminthumna Thangven michierching tumpichuw atumche mhirhiikhangkhing ittuwng elhuwngpaa aarsii engkhe mimventena jungboge iwabekhe aruh ouwngthumna engkhe taalina enkhejege chiitaangbekhe taalina jungbose.
Aarsii romhingchuw Wormwood atega, engkhejege chii saruh ouwngthumna engkhechuw thingkha ngenge ouwngsuwge mi inhimpah ithiega, ajiegachienche chiichuw ikhapaa aansuwchertaanaga.

Avomilliena thangven michierching tumpichuw atumche iniechuw saruh ouwngthumna engkhe chona tha engkhejege aarsii saruh ouwngthum, aminthimnaing, engkhejege siim saruh ouwngthumna engkhe, yennaje changching alengnamaang, inietena, thatena, aarsiitena saruh ouwngthumna engkhe yenkhangkhin lengmaase.

Chonaching kibierche minvenna enjaa vakur engkheching iperpaa irur ing uwngge: “rasie itthamaa, rasie itthamaa, rasie itthamaa!” tege tumvang ichii thangven michier ouwngthumna tumpi lintaang lintaang arurching atumpe.
Arongana thangven michierching tumpichuw atumche, aarsii engkhechuw minventena lolhiete ijungbouchuw mhuw ingge, edong inemaa khor akhumna chabichuw apipe.
Amaing edong enemaa khor anherchuw aamhongpe; engkhejege mhi eluwngpaa mhikhuw khangkhing anhertena mhikhuh hungsuwse; inieje thaje anhertena ihungsuwching minthimpohse.
Ama mhikhuwtena lolhiepaamna khiteh inhimpah hungsuwse; engkhejege simriipaamna nouseh khangchieng atuchekhangkhing emmenie nhingnaje apipehe.
Engkhejege abecherna Thangnhang chum aeuwmmaa mihepangmaage, simriipaam ittuurheje, iaer imhuwngbekhe, changmaanieche thingbourje, parmaaruw tege innhingna arhier.
Engkhejege emmenieching amahechuw tha ronga theluing aminjana ennhingna apipe; emmenieng aminjahechuw nousehing asintaana amenanghe khangchiega.
Chalechingbe miheching inthinachuw jongvatehe, changgechuw phamaahenie, ithiechuw edepaavatehe, changgechuw ithieching tenpeevatehe.
Kheteh hechuw raartuvang ichieng enthongbesa sikurhe ngenge gehe. Sana luhutho enghaajeh akhumgehe, emmhechuwbe tepang mhetho enghaagehe.
Nepenuwhe sam khangchieje isiingehe enghajechuw rhiimpuw hathoh enghaagehe.
Emmenieng ngalhii khangchie thiirkoh aviehe, emmenie irurchuwbe tthaantthen erurtho enghaa, sikur inhimpah raarna isihe rosatho enghaagehe.
Nousehtho enghaa enrumije isiingehe, aminjuhna nherje aeuwmgehe, enrumiching mihechuw tha ronga amenaana ache aeuwmgehe.
Entaalina edong aenemaa khor apana thangven michierching eruwngkhangkhing aeong; aromhingchuwbe Hebru ttong ing ‘Abaddon,’ Greek ing ‘Apallyon’ atega.
Mensana rasie itthamaachuw ingkhirse, avonhie rasie itthamaa ennhie umneree.
Chona avoruna thangven michierching tumpichuw atumtaana Thangnhang mhekungna aeuwm sana hebekoungtena ariekie millietena irur kethiepe.
Tumpi chige aeuwm avoeeriina Thangven michier nhingna arhier: “Elhuwngpa iwa Euphratestena aphier thangven michier milliemeh hechuw bethinruw.”
Apha, inie, tha, akum ama rotumna abethongbesa Thangven michier milliechuw, tepanghe saruh ouwngthumna engkhe athenaing abethinpehe.
Chona sikurlina aeong raarmihechuwbe chiingza ennhiega; kieng emmenie ateemhechuw kethiepe.

Kimhi rovaamna kemhuw sikurhetho entaalina aeonghechuw hanghing ichiegehe: mhitho enghaa belung abedaarchuw, sapphira khangkhing aerga, kantuh khangkhinje iaerga, sikur losehechuw kurkam, rhimpuw losetho enghaaga; mhi, mhikhuw engkhejege kantuhchuw embesungtena isuwhga.
Embesungtena ihungsuw inaki bie arin tepanghe saruh ouwngthumna engkhechuw mhikhuw engkhejege kantuhing lolhiepaamna aeonghechuw athehcherpehe.
Sikurheching entuchechuwbe ennherna, enrumina aeuwmga; ajiegachienche enrumihechuw beruwrtho enghaaga, anloseje aeuwmga, emmenieching mihechuw aminliemgehe.

Ama aminjaheching athehmaahe abelhie miheching ronhamhe, sana atu, lupa, pithrai, lhuwng engkhejege thing leh rotha, imhuwje, ithieje, isije achemaa hevehechuw arumnamaaing, emmenie ingkihing atu nongtena embelungriir huwngmaahe;
emmenieng mi atheh taanahe, aasherhe, naamaa ituhe, changmaanieche ouwngruw entutena embelungriir huwngmaahe.
Ruduing akhum eperpaa Thangven michier engkhe Thangventena ijungttum kemhuwpe; aloselina tunusapaing akhar, amhechuw iniekhangkhing, akhichuw mhi ichuwtho enghaaga;
Akihna emmhongbesa lerii isiing achi, akhi tachang ing riimchiesungte, taliching lolhiepaamna achiinape,
Choveenhuwnaching Kurkam rhimpuw enrhaam khangkhing engkangpa irur ing iuwng kemhuwpe amaing aberhaamche, khuw inre sarii irur jungsuwse.
Khuw enre sariiching aanrhetaana, kieng bejiirong ketepe; engkhejege khuw enre sariiching ahinrhierhechuw “chum namre changgechuw bejiimaare” ate thanventena erur engkhe kethiepe.
Rimchiele paamtaalina iniir Thangven michierching atachangtena abenchuw minvente ithohge,

engkhejege minvenle asungna aeuwmbekhe, lolhiepaam engkhejege asungna aeuwmbekhe, engkhejege rimchiepuwle asungna aeuwmbekheje asempe ittiim inemaa irhingchuw aromhing rhierge ttonnier apipe, “Aphachuw shihmaanie!
Chonaching Thangven michier asariina erur atum aanie aaniena amaing tumvang ate aphana amine laarchanghe nhingna aphuwng inhuw ijieng Thangnhangtena enthur ttongchuw alir suvang atega.”
Changching minventena kethie irurching kenhingna arhier, “vah, rimchiepuwle lolhiepaam chienage enier thangven michier kihna aamhongbesachuw valie.”
Engkhejege thangven michier nhingna thengingge lerii isiingchuw kenhiiche amaing tege, “Valieng sare, navinsungnache khaniege, nabenache khienhieng khangkhing thumvate.”
Thangven michier keetena lerii isiingchuw valieingge kesaape, engkhejege amachuw kebenache khienhieng khangkhing ithumga changgechuw kebedor nhuwteche khaase.
Chonaching, kenhingna rhierge, “Mibekhetena, yaatibekhetena attong attong ing engkhejege eruwnghe khuna avonhii Thangnhang ttong minthangvang natega.”
Chona romhortho enghaa isie emong amintina engkhe ipege arhier, “Hangthie, Thangnhang een hebekoung engkhejege amana aeong Thangnhang arumhechuw mintihere.

Thangnhang een taangna aeuwm tebouhhie bethinre, amachuw mintimaare; ajiegachienche amahie yaati lintaangte apibesa, engkhejege emmenieng tha summil lielhie ennhie sungna enthiing khupuw chuw ingkhi ing chiinavatehe.
Kieng kesaarkhii ennhienhingna atuchenahe pevanggie, engkhejege emmenieng rhuwpien serheniege inie chiing engkhe roza chanhie sumru Thangnhang ttong minthangvatehe.
Lolhiepaamna Thangpa mhekungna inier, kiruum thingbour ennhietho thoumhi ennhiechuw emmenie hiega.
Achuw engkheing entaalina amemaangna tuheniebe embesungtena mhi hungsuwniege araarhechuw bethuchevatehe; achuw engkheching emmeniechuw amaangna tuheniebe khangkhing ichiing thevatehe.

Emmeniehing Thangnhang ttong aminthang aphana khuw asuwrnama, minven akamna etu achegehe; engkhejege emmenieng aadie aadie chiibekhe taalina chiichuw thie abesuwna, lolhiepaamje engkhe engkhetena aena eki besuwniege amemaangje achegehe.
Saarkhii apihechuw embetthuleching idong inemaa khortena ihungsuw sahching emmenietho raar eentoheniege, cheheniege thehchervatehe.
Emmenieng Thangpa athena amhin khurpuw elhuwng lhampuwna athehhechuw mintorvatehe. Khupuw romhingchuw amindangna ttongching Sodomle Egypt ategehe.
Ittohbesa ethiehechuw, asungkhor, attong attong ing, ayati ayatihe miheching inie nethumle tangkhena ebeervatehe engkhejege thente avarhihechuw rhumaahenie.
Lolhie paamtena miheching entaalina rotha rhohnaing tuheniege kithur empevatehe. Ajiegachiinche lolhiepaamna aeong mihechuw laarchang ennhieheching minjavatehe.
Inie nethum attimchuw attuh inienachinbe Thangnhangtena irhing aaphuwchuw ensungte valhuge, emmenieng ingkhi ing hangniirsehe, engkhejege emmeniechuw amhuw mihe taalina enttiipah thengse.
Minventena engkaangpaa irurching innhingna, “hetehing hangkarruw” atechuw emmenieching athiepehe. Engkhejege emmenie ennhieching rudulina thangvente karsehe; amana emmenie araarheching amhuwpehe.
Ama aphana na rahching eperpaa lienglaang thengge khupuw chuw saruh suwmna engkhe chimcherse; engkhejege abelhieching inhimpah ittehege Thangventena Thangnhangchuw amimpaapehe.
Amenhiena ijachaamchuw aalenpe; ebeer, aminthumna ijaanachuw enrang thengse.

Chonaching, avosariina thangven michierching tumpichuw atumpe, engkhejege minventena engkaangpaa erurheching arhierhe, “lolhiepaam eruwng lepaachuw Thangpa engkhejege Aantinpa eruwng lepaa ouwngsuwse, engkhejege amaing ittiim inemaaing paarvate.”
Chona Thangnhang mhekungna eruwng aongtaana aeonghe upahe sumnhielhie millieching embelung ing vatiehege Thangnhangchuw rumhege enrhier,
Thangpa Thangnhang, Ruwngpuw,
isuwbesaje ouwngsuwh kimmimpaanaachie,
ajiegachienche elhungpah ruwngper liechiige hungpaarsechie.
Engkhejege yaatiheching entherphuwrse,
ajienachiengche nather iphuwrchuw hungviese,
engkhejege ethiehechuw waajiir atuna apha,
chona namine laarchangpahe engkhejege,
enthiinghe engkhejege naromhingchuw enttii esiing elhuwnghe chuw mana ipina engkhejege lolhiepaam ammaang michuw memaangna apha viese.”
Chona Thangvenna iuwm Thangnhang eenchuw emmhongse, eensungna iuwm ttongdeen upuchuw endangse; engkhejege betti ebou ouwngtochorchor, khuwngreh, eriir ebuw, lienglaang itheng jungsuwse.
Ama inhuwna elhuwngpaa bietimna Thangvenna kemhuwpe; nepenuw engkheching iniechuw pienkhangkhing serge, thachuw akhiderna, aarsii summalhie ennhiechuw aluhuh alu taalina akhum;
Ama nepenuwchuw neh aringa, nechuw berhingvang atetahnaing iuwngbourga;

Engkhejege lintaang bietimna engkhe Thangvenna kemhuwpe; chona thanvenna elhuwngpaa beruwr alose sarii ariekie sarii aeuwm, engkhejege alose sarielinaching eruwng luhu akhum elhuwngpaa isin beruwr engkhega.

Arumiching minven aarsiihe saruh ouwngthumna engkhechuw vikige lolhiepaamte ajilhinpe. Chona nepenuwching nedoung berhingge beruwrching asitichuw asaanaing, nedoung berhingvang ate nepenuw boumna niirse.
Asiti pesarchuw aberhingpe; asapaching yaatibekhechuw thier romhor sherpivang atega chona, asitihie Thangnhang boum aongna eruwng ongtaate arhiedohpe.
Engkhejege nepenuwching rampasungte tense. Ama amhinnaching emmenieng amachuw inie chiing engkhe chanhie sumru ajunaing, Thangnhang ing abethongbesa amhin euwmga.
Thangvennaching ate raar uwmse; Mikalching ama thangven michierhechuw rhiege beruwrtaalina raar ouwngtosehe.
Changgechuw emmenieng icheje chemaasehe, Thangvenna avonhie amhinje phamaasehe.
Chona beruwr elhuwngpaa, beruwr itarpuw Diabol engkhejege Saitan ate, lolhiepaam bekhechuw amemuh aapuwchuw ajilhinpe, changgechuw ama thangven michierhechuw amatho enrhiing ajilhinpe.
Engkhejege Thangvenna engkaangpaa erur ing hevehie arhier kethiepe,
“Atebe engkarpee,
engkhejege ruwngper engkhejege ithanghnang alepaa engkhejege Khrista ama atucheh chuw thengseh ajienachiengche zeng siim euh enehe ethanghnang emhekungna aminlaarmeechuw ajibebuhpeh.
Emmenieng amachuw Zousiti thie, ama khuna emmenieng saarkhie api ttongching achepe, engkhejege emmenieng enchipichuw ithie ipha menermaahe.

Chotahnaching, Thangven engkhejege asungna ipaarbekhe, rotha minrhoruw! Lolhiepaam engkhejege rimchie rotumnabe jasaruw, ajiegachienche Diabolching arotum apha tepiepang uwmne ate minghuwge aenhimpaa ather phuwrge emmenie kaarte juwngse.”
Hanghing beruwrching amachuw lolhiepaamte ajilhinpe atechuw amhuwche, pesarti aberhing nepenuwchuw ajongpe.

Chona nepenuwching rampakaarna beruwrching aphanamaa enthurniege apha engkena, apha ennhie attim beruwr mhekungtena ajupina amhin phanaching aanjaanaing anhingna elhuwngpaa vakur abetha ennhie apisaape.
Chonaching beruwrching nepenuwchuw chiipuw ing atennaing nepenuw ateunhuwngna iwakhangkhing anhertena ahinsimpe.
Changgechuw lolhiepaamching nepenuwchuw boumge anher hingeemhongge beruwrching anhertena ahingseem iwachuw abedorpe.
Engkhejege beruwrching nepenuwchuw abelung minsiige asiti lintanghe, Thangnhang ttongbekhe aminjie engkhejege Jesu saarkhie inhepah abechuwhetho raar aantuphuwnaing vasise.
Amache riimchie siidie taalina iniir.
Engkhejege ariikie suwm, alose sarie, amana ariikielina eruwng luhu suwm aeuwm, aloselina Thangnhang naseenma romhing arin sah engkhe riimchiesungtena aehangkar kemhuwpe.
Kieng kemhuw sahchuw rhimpuw aanluga, akhichuw aevumkhangkhing, anherche kurkam, anhertho enghaaga. Beruwr ching anhingna atuchena paangkar, eruwng ongna engkhejege ruwngperchuw apipe.
Alose engkhechuw thevang ichiepang iveh iliimbesa ngenge ing uwmge, changgechuw abiechuw idamdohga. Lolhiepaam bekheching inning rhiige sah inhuwchuw ajiehe.

Emmenieng beruwrchuw arumpehe, ajiegachienche amaing atuchena paangkarchuw sahlina pege, engkhejege sahchuw rumhege enrhier, “heve satho enghaa ajie uwmnekhang, engkhejege ataalina achuwching raar ouwngtouphuw chevang atega?”
Anhingna elhuwngpaa Thangnhangchuw na aseenma ing attongchena anher apipe, engkhejege tha suwmmillielhie ennhie phana atuchenachuw apipe.
Amaing Thangnhang taalina na aseenma rotum Thangnhang romhingchuw engkhejege Thangnhang aongnachuw, engkhejege thangvenna ipaarhechuw, itthamaaing attongnaing anher aamhongpe.
Enthiinghetho raar ouwngtohege emmeniechuw achenaing anhingna apipe; engkhejege sungkhor, mi, ttong engkhejege yaatibekhe taalina atuchena anhingte apipe.
Lolhiepaam abettiimpelena athebesa Zousiti irhing leriina atah atah romhing abejiimaa, lolhiepaamna aeongheching amachuw rumvatehe.
Achuw engkheing aana uwmniebe thiesaresie.

Achuw engkhe mikhum sungte asiinaing suwrniebe mikhumtaate sivatehe, achuw engkheching chimsiiching theniebe amachuw chimsiiching thevate. Enthiing miheching deercheheniege engkhejege enthachachuw henahing aeuwmga.
Chona sah lintaang engkhe lolhiepaam tena ihangthie kemhuwpe; ama ariikie ennhiechuw Zousiti riikietho enghaaga, engkhejege amaing beruwr khangkhing ittong.
Amaing mensa sahing atuche bekhechuw amhekungna atupe; engkhejege ithie arhuna bie reenge ihangdam mensa sahchuw lolhiepaamna engkhejege asungna ipaarbekhehechuw aminrumpe.
Amaing mibekhe mhekungna lolhiepaamna minventena mhi ajibetthumna bietimna elhuwngpapaa atu.

Engkhejege ama sah mahuhna amaing anhingna apibekhe bietimnalina lolhiepaamna aeonghechuw aminchenape, hanghing lolhiepaamna aeonghechuw aminchenape, hanghing lolhiepaamna ipaarheching chimsie bie areenbesa, avonhie ihangrhing sah rotha tuheresie ate.
engkhejege ama sah rothaching attongnaing, ama sah rothachuw arummaa bekhechuw athenaing, engkhejege, ama sah rothana emphuw achena amatijechuw anhingna apipe.
Engkhejege isingje, elhuwngje, sawangje, saraaje, chona ningvesanghe, minehe, emmeniebekhe ingki tachangna, changmaanieche embecharlina aminghuwna bietimnachuw empipe;
ama bietimnachuw, engkhejege ama sah romhing changmaanieche aromhing ateemnachuw apha mihechuw maaniege achuwdong ing enlie changmaanieche ijuwr achenamaaing amaing atupe.
Hanghing ivierna aeuwmga; aminghuwche miching sahing apee masing ateemnachuw jongresie, ajiegachienche amachuw mi engkhe ateemnaga; ama ateemnachuw chiing kuru sumrulhie kuruga.
Chona kieng kibierche Zion boungtaalina Zousitichuw nierge, amatho enrhieng embecharlina Zousiti romhingle amapa romhing enjii mi laak engkhe chiing summillielhiemillie hechuw aeonghe,
engkhejege Thangventena erur engkhe chii eluwng zor zor rosatho enghaa eperpaa khuw enre erurkhangkhing kethiepe, engkhejege, kethiechuw ttingse atumhe erur tho enghaaga.

engkhejege eruwng ongtaatena irhing sah millie, engkhejege upahe aeonghe mhekungna ithar lha khangkhing lha atuhe; engkhejege lolhiepaamna aeonghe mi laak engkhe chiing summillie lhie millie he chumaaniege lhachuw achuwdong ing ouwngchuw chemaahe.

Emmeniehie nepenuwhelina ibour iuwmmaahechuwga, ajiegachienche emmeniehie enthiinggehe. Zousiti asitah bekhena isigehe. Emmeniehie mi kaartena Thangnhang, engkhejege Zousiti ongna amhinna amhuwr sachie aanra aansuwnaing aaliebesagehe
engkhejege ennherna mi amimuna uwmmaahe, ibour abie aeuwmmaagehe.

Chona lolhiepaamna aeonghenhingna, yaatibekhena, sungkhorbekhena, ttongbekhena, engkhejege mibekhena atongnaing, ittiim inemaa aettha ttongjiir aminjaamna thangven michier lintaangheching minven aliehna enjaa kemhuwpe;

Amaing erur engkaangpaaing arhier, “Thangnhangchuw ttieruw engkhejege athang alaar mengumruw, ajiegachienche amaing waajiir tuvang ate hungviese; engkhejege amachuw rumsaruw, amaing thangven, lolhiepaam, riimchie, engkhejege chitaang iphuwrbekhe asemga.”
Chona lintaang thangven michier amenhienaching ahinrhier, “Tiehse, tiehse, yaatibekhelina amaing atu naamaalina ather ephuwr zuw amingeen Babilon elhuwngchuw tiese.”
Chona lintaang thangven michier aminthumnaching engkaangpaa erur ing uwngse, “ama sahchuw engkhejege ama rothachuw rummiege, abecherna, changmaanieche akina bietimna phaheniebe,

Amaje Thangnhang belung isie kamsengna amimve abethongbesa Thangnhang belung isietena zuw eenvate; engkhejege mhina, engkhejege kantuhing enthiing thangven michierhe amana Zousiti mhekungna minjavatehe.
Engkhejege emmeniechuw aminjahe mhikhuwchuw ittiim inemaaing hangkarvate. Engkhejege sah ama arothachuw arumheching, ama romhing bietimna arinheching, yen siim enja mindemaahe.
Enthiing mihetho Thangnhang ttong aminjie, engkhejege Jesu athachaheching ikhaang adierchenachuw aeuwmgehe.

Chona thanventena erur engkhe kethieching hanghing arhier, “Atele betthimniege Thangpa nhingna ithiehechuw, enrasie itthagehe atehie bejiire.” Chipiching besangge, “Changrarahga nong entuhelinaching jaluing enja mindeheresie; ajiegachienche entubekhe nong entutho enrhienehe.”
Ama inhuwna kibierche, ewaarje rudu, engkhejege ama rudu tahlinaching alosena sana luhu, akina ingngeepah thaangki achi Misapatho enghaa engkhe aeong.

Thangven michier engkheching enthiing eentena hungsuwge rudutahlina aeong Thangpa nhingna engkaangpah erur ing uwngse; Thangpaing thaangkichuw jipege, saangchuw kuumre ate, ajienachiinche kuumvang ichie aphachuw viese, ajiegachienche lolhiepaam saang mhinse.
Engkhejege rudu tahlina aeong Thangpaching lolhiepaamna Thangpa thaangkichuw pege lolhiepaamchuw akuumpe.
Lintaang thangven michier engkheching thangvenna euwm enthiing eentena jungsuwge; amajeng thaangki engkhe achi.

Chona thangven michier engkheching hebekungtena jungsuwge amaing mhi tahlina atuchena euwmga, engkhejege amaing thaangki ingeepaa achi nhingna erur engkaangpahing uwngge eenge arhier, “lolhiepaamna darkha aanrah alhu alhu ing aeuwm imhinbekhekha mingkongre.”
Thangven michierching athaangkichuw lolhiepaamna jibithinge darkha aanrachuw kuumge amachuw Thangnhang ather iphuwrna darkha aanrah aachiirnamhin elhuwngpaateching avilhinpe,
engkhejege darkha aanrah aachiirna amhin khupuw taangteching achiinape, engkhejege sikur aha asurna phana isii amhintena mail roza ennhiephana thiechuw luwngse.

Ama inhuwna thangvenna elhuwngpaa engkhejege luliimna bietimna engkhe, amachuwbe ijachaam rhiereh aphana sarii adeen thangven michierhechuw kemhuw; ama ijanapaa rhierehhie attuhnaga, ajiegachienche hevehelina Thangnhang ther aphuwrnachuw tangse.

Engkhejege mhitho emveno mengsengtho enghaa rimchiethoje enghaa, satena arotha romhing tahlina masing ateemna kaarnaching raar aacheheching Thangnhang tingseh chihege mengsengtho enghaa rimchiena inier kemhuwpe.
Emmenieching Thangnhang mine Mosi engkhejege Zousiti lha ahintuhe:
“Aapuw Thangnhang,
nang ing natu nonghie elhuwngpaa engkhejege luliimnaga!
Oh ettiim enema eruwng nalhampuw hii ichum engkhejege atataachuwga,
O Thangpa achuwng narohmingchuw ttiimavate engkhejege mimpamavate Ajiegachiinche nangpang enthiinggechie.
Yaatibekhe thengniege nangchuw erumvatehe;
ajiegachienche ichum mawajeer chuw eendangse
Ama inhuwna kibierche saarkhie amindangna thangventena Thangnhang eenchuw emmhongse
engkhejege thangven eentena rhiere sarietho enrhing thangven michierhe sariichuw jungsuwsehe. Emmeniechuw pien elengjer enthiingjeching enthonghege embelunglina sana dierhiin aphiernaching enchiimhe.
Irhing sah millietena engkheing thangven michierhe sariihe nhingna ittiim inemaa irhing Thangnhang ather ephuwr sana kamseng sariichuw minsiekangge thangven michierhe nhingte apipe.

Ama inhuwna Thangnhang athang alaarle aruwngper mhikhuw ching Thangnhang erumna eenchuw aaboumpe, amana thangven michierhe sarietena rhiereh sarii chuw atangmaataang een chonaching achuwdong ing aevalhuw chemaahe.
Chona enthiing eentena engkaangpaa erur engkheching thangven michierhe sarii nhingna arhierchuw kethiepe, “sinuwng Thangnhang ther phuwrna kamseng sariichuw lolhiepaamte lhiehuruw.”
Changching mensaching vage ama kamsengchuw lolhiepaamna ajilhiepe; amaching sah bietimna entaalina iuwm, engkhejege arotha arum mihe taalina entersuwpaa itthamaa ipenchuw abesuwpe.
Amenhienaching akamsengchuw rimchiete ajilhiepe, amachuw ithiehe thiekhangkhing ouwngsuwhse, engkhejege irhing chipibekhe rimchie sungnachuw thisehe.
Aminthumnaching akamsengchuw iwabekhe engkhejege chiitaang iphuwr bekhena ajilhiepe, amaching thie umvurcherse.
Chona chiibekhe thangven michierching hevehie arhier kethiepe; “Ateleje ayenje, enthiing Thangpa nanghie echumpaagechie, ajiegachienche nang ing hevebekhehie waajiir natuga.
Emmenieng enthiinghe, chona Thangnhang laarchanghe thie abesuwgehe, nang ing thie namingeenhie mati ichaga.
Hebekoungching hevehie arhier kethiepe, “uwng O apuw Thangnhang, atuchecher nanggechie, nawaajiirbekhe ichumga, engkhejege atataachuwga!”
Avomilliena thangven michierching akamsengchuw inietaalina ajilhiepe, chonaching mhi ensaaching mihechuw abethucherna inie nhingna apipe.
Mibekhechuw mhi ensahching kaanghege, engkhejege rhiereching aphahe miheching atuche Thangnhang romhingchuw itthamaaing ttongsehe, engkhejege Thangnhangchuw amimpaana embelungrier huwngmaahe.
Avorongana thangven michier ing akamsengchuw sah eruwng ongtaalina ajilhiepe; engkhejege apaamchuw minthimse. Amana mibekheching anaalamtheeng embelie asipehe.
Emmenieng Thangventena Thangnhangchuw anaalamtheeng engkhejege impentaana itthamaaing ttongsehe, changgechuw entubekhelina embelungriir huwngmaahe.
Avoruhnaching akamsengchuw elhuwngpaa Euphrates iwate ajilhiepe; chonaching iniesuwtaatena itheng eruwnghe lham abethongna ama chiichuw amingkaangpe.
engkhejege beruwr anhertena, ama sah anhertena, engkhejege Thangnhang ttong amingthangchaang atuhe emmenie embetena uttohkhangchie enthiingmaa chipi ouwngthum ihungsuw kemhuwpe;

ajiegachienche emmeniechuwbe ronhamhe chipigehe, engkhejege bietimnaje inhimpah atuhe; emmenieng lolhiepaambekhe eruwnghechuw atuchecher Thangnhangta elhuwngpaa raarna akhum chernaing amateching engkesehe.
Ebeerruw, ouwngruw khangkhing kie thengvanggete, piendier uwmluing uwmniege aningjaa aandangna maaing enriimjeh, engkhejege apiendier aabiirjeh meechuw arasii itthaga.
Engkhejege ichamaa chipiheching eruwnghechuw ingeedie Hebru ttong ing Harmogedon ate amhinte akhumpehe.
Asariina thangven michierching akamsengchuw thie kaarna ajilhiepe; engkhejege enthiing eentena engkaangpaa irur engkhe eruwng ongtaatena jungsuwge arhier, “Amahie ttuhse.”
Engkhejege bitti ibou erur, khuw enre enhimpaa suwhse; engkhejege eperpaa lienglaang thengse; hangchie lienglaang itheng lolhiepaamna mee ahungpaarlena bettiimge suwhmaalhie.

Elhuwgpaa khupuwchuw eenthum ing abekhiipe, yaatibekhe khupuwje chimcherse; engkhejege elhuwngpaa Babilon nhingna Thangnhang ther ephuwr mhi ettung zuw kamsengchuw apinaing Thangnhang mhekungna amachuw aanthiepe.
Engkhejege rimchiihe lolaana euwm ram bekheje tencherse, engkhejege boungbekheje uwmmaase.
Engkhejege minventena kilo sumnga irhiih iriir meetaalina jungbouse. Chona iriirtena rhiereh inaheching Thangnhangchuw itthamaaing atongpehe; ajiegachienche ama rhierehchuwbe enhimpaa eperga.
Chonache kamseng sarii ichi thangven michier sarietena engkheching thengge kenhingna arhier, “huwng, kieng ichuwmaa nepenuw chii inhimpah taalina aeonghie waajiir atuna nanhingna minthiegechie.
Amaing lolhiepaam eruwnghetho naamaa atupe, engkhejege lolhiepaamna ipaarhechuw amaing naamaa atuna zuw ing beruwsehe.

Chona amaing kiehie chipi enthiing apaarna rampakaarte enrhiepe; engkhejege Thangnhangchuw naseenma romhing ing isiikang, alose sarii, ariekii suwm iuwm isinjejor sah taalina aeong nepenuw engkhe kemhuwpe.

Engkhejege nepenuwching elengkeker engkhejege isinjejor pien serge, sanaing, mani lhung ing, mukta lhung ing enthongga; akina entersuwpaaing isiikang, amachuwbe amaing naamaa atuna enthiingmaa pee ing isii, sana kamseng achiga,
engkhejege abecherna luliimna ouwngthupaa ttong, Babilon elhuwngpaa ichuwmaa nepenuwhe, engkhejege lolhiepaamna entersuwpaa peehe amanuw ate romhing enjiiga,
engkhejege enthiing mihe engkhejege Jesu khuna atheh bekhe saarkhiehe thieching ouwngruw nepenuwchuw kemhuwpe. Kieing amachuw mhuw ingge irhier chehluing kening rhiise.

Engkhejege thangven michierching kenhingna arhier, ajie techiege naning irhiiga? Kieing nepenuwlina, engkhejege amaing arhii sah, alose sarii, ariekii suwm ipaar ama ouwngthupaa ttongchuw minchuwgechie.

Nang ing namhuwbesa sahchuwga, atebe uwmmaase, engkhejege amahie adongna iuwmmaa khortena hungsuwrong atena, hungsuwrong atena engkhejege amaangnate engkesavate. Lolhiepaam abetthiimpelena irhingjeh leriina aromhing abejiimaa lolhiepaamna ipaarheching sahhie ajiekhang iheuwmga atechuw immhuwtaana inning rhiivatehe, ajiegachienche apha engkhenache uwmga, atebe uwmmaase changgechuw avonhii thengvate.
Hevehing ivierna belungrierchuw aminghuwnaga, Aloseh sariichuwbe nepenuw ing aongna boung sariichuwga; emmeniehie eruwng sariichuwgehe.
Rongamehhechuwbe busehe, engkheche uwmjene, lintaanghechuw thengmaalhiehe, chona engkhechuw thengniege apha tepie ongvate,
engkhejege apha amongnapang uwmge, ateleche iuwmmaa sahchuw avoeeriina eruwngga, sariekaarna emvega, engkhejege amahie maangvang atetaate isiga.
Ariikie suwmmeh namhuwchuw apaam aphamaalhie eruwng suwmhechuwga, changgechuw emmenieng eruwnghe khangkhing sah thoching apha engkhepang atuchena aphaga.
Emmeniehie belungriir engkhepang iuwmgehe, engkhejege etu achenale paangkar euwmnachuw sah nhingna apigehe.

Emmenieching Zousiti taalina raar tovatehe, changgechuw Zou sitiching chevatehe. Ajiegachiinche amahie Thangpabekhe Thangpaga, eruwngbekhelina eruwngga, engkhejege aanhuw ajieheching eenhege aatourgehe, chona ithacha arhuchuwgehe.
Engkhejege kenhingna arhier, “ichuwmaa nepenuw ing aongna chii enhimpaachuw mihe, mee aruh, yaatihe engkhejege ttonghechuwga.
Nang ing namhuw ariikie suwm amana sahchuw, emmeniehing ichuwmaa nepenuwchuw beterheniege, amaangnaje tuheniege piendeer uwmlu ing sewatehe, ataaje saheniege, mhisungnaje bethuchervatehe.

Ajiegachiinche Thangnhang ttongbekhe alir asuwmaataang, Thangpaing amindeen atunaing, belungrier engkhepang ing auwmnaing, engkhejege sahching enlepaa apinaing Thangnhang ing embelungriirna athinpigehe.
Hang ing namhuw nepenuwchuwbe lolhiepaam eruwnghe taalina ipaar elhuwngpaa khupuwchuwga.
Ama enhuwnaching lintaang elhuwngpaa atuche thangven michier engkhe thangventena ijungttum kemhuw; ama athang alaarching lolhiepaamchuw aminwaarpe.
Amaing engkaangpaa erur ing uwngge, “Ttiirse, elhuwngpaa Babilonchuw ttiirse! Ronhamhe ongna eensuwse, enthiingmaa chipihe apaarna engkhejege enthiingmaa entersuwpaa vatihe ongna eensuwse.

Ajiegachiinche amaing naamaa atutaana mhikhangkhing ittuwng zuw aberutaana yaatibekhe tiehse; engkhejege lolhiepaam eruwngheching amatho naamaa atupehe, engkhejege lolhiepaam sheerbaar ataarheching amaing atu anongelina sawang suwsehe.”
Chona thangventena erur lintaang ing arhier kethiepe,
Kemihe nepenuw amahningtena hungsuwruw ajienachiengche ama aasiih icherna ningnginvenamaang engkhejege amaing taangtii phavang atena ningngeenvenamaang.
Ajiegachiinche isiicher atuchuw thangven phanaing ouwnghuwngse,
engkhejege avalaar bekhe Thangnhang ing behermaa.
Amaing atukhangkhing anhingnaje peruw,
engkhejege amaing atu inhuw ijieing anhingte saruh ennhie peruw;
amaing amimve kamsengna arotum saruh ennhie mimveruw.
Ijehme amaing ataachuw amimpaa engkhejege anongena atuching,
amabekhelina anhingna ijanang,
belung ijana peruw.
Ajiegachiinche abelungriirna arhier,
‘Kie Ruwngnuwging, mhikhuwnuw maaging,
belung ijana mhuwmaadehning.’
Chotahnaching inie engkhenabe ina iki inhimpah, hangchie, ithie,
belung ijah engkhejege vinttaam chiihaar thengvate;
ama mhina kaangchervate; ajienachiinche ataalina waajiir etu Aapuw Thangnhangchuw eperpaaga.”
Amatho naamaa ituhaahe ketho eentuhaa lolhiepaam eruwngheching amachuw abethuna mhikhuw emmhuwtaana, ttaavatehe, embelungje ebeengvatehe.
Amaing ija aphachuw enttiitaana raarkhena neerheniege rhiervatehe,
“Aro, aro, elhungpaa khupuw, Babilon, eperpaa khupuw!
ajiegachienche pungpha engkhesungna nawaajiirchuw thengse.”
