Engkhejege lolhiepaam lerchii ataarheching arotumna ittaje ttaahege, belung ijapaa aphahe, ajiegachienche lerchii ataar pihechuw avonhie iliepimaasehe,
peehe chuwbe Sana, lopa, mani, mukta, ennar limon pien, isin pien, mukapien engkhejege isinjejorpien, amin elupaa thing, pithrai, thiir engkhejege marbal lhunghe;
engkhejege usingsaa thing, maromaraang, dhup, entehna thou, kundruk, darkha chii, jaam itthapaa engkhejege Gehu, shiirhe, Zouhe, sikur garihe, suwhheengkhejege tepang chipihe.
“Rhingrier nong nongepaatena aanrachuw nanhingtena tense, sawang pettha nadeenbekhe maangcherse, ate vokhe hungeen limaanie!”
Heve nepenuw apaarna sawang embesuw pee sawangheching ija inang aphachuw enttiitaana raarkhena nierhege ttaahege, belung ija paaing uwnghege,
“Aro, aro, elhuwngpaa khupuw, elengjeh pien ing enthonghe, sana, mani engkhejege muktaing enthonghekha!

Ajiegachiinche pungpha engkhesungna hangjeh inhim lerchii maangcherse!” Engkhejege jahaz aapuwbekheing amhin engkhete ruwkuwng etungbekheing, ruwkuwng aahurbekheching, engkhejege rimchie apaarna irhing aphaheching raarkhena nierhege,
ama ikaang mhikhuw ebeerhege euwnghe, “Hangchie ilhuwngpa khupuwhie ajuthoh enghaase teteruw!”

Enlosena perkhuw lhiehege ittale, belung ijapaaing euwnghe, “Aro aro, elhuwngpaa khupuw, riimchiepuwna ruwkuwng aahurhebekheing amin elupaa pee inhimpahching sawang isuwhgehe changgechuw pungpha engkhepangna maangsehe.
O, Thangven, enthiing mihe, ttongjiirpahe, engkhejege Thangnhang laarchangpahe, emmenie khuwnahing rotha minrhoruw; ajiegachienche Thangnhang ing ama taalina nimwaajiir chuw ouwngtupipe.”
Chona eperpaa thangven michier engkheing elhuwngpaa chakri lhung hangchie lhungsuwng viliege rimchiete jilhinge arhier, “elhuwngpaa Babilon khupuwchuw jilhinniege, avonhie amachuw mhuwmaahenie;

Ttingse atumhele lha etuhe erur, tili atumhetho tumpi atumhe erur nenhingtena atevokhe thiemaahenie. Kule kuhsu ihe michuw nanhingna avonhie phamaadeh henie; chakri erur nanhingna atevokhe thiemaahenie;

Thoumhi eleng atevokhe lengmaanie; engkhejege riekhie eenchum Lerpa engkhejege lernuwhe erur nanhingna atevokhe thiemaahenie; ajiegachienche nang ing lerchii aalurmihe chuwbe lolhiepaam elhuwngpapaaing aeumgehe; ajiegachienche nang ing mee naasertahna yaatibekhechuw namemucherga.
Engkhejege laarchangpahe thie, enthiing mihe, lolhiepaamna nathehhe thiechuw anhingna endangse.
Hevehe inhuwna thangvenna mi inhimpahching engkaangpaa erurkhangkhing hevehie arhier kethiepe; “Hallelujah! engkarpee, athang alaar engkhejege ruwngperhie Thangnhangtaga,

ajiegachienche ama waajiirhie echum engkhejege atataaga amaing lolhiepaamhie naamaa atu nong ing amemaang elhuwngpaa nepenuw ichuwmaachuw waajiir atupe, engkhejege amineheje thieching atahlina lolha athuwrpe.
Emmenieching avonhie uwnghege enrhier, “Hallelujah! nepenuw litena mhikhuwh kha ittiim inemaaing khuwne.”
Upahe suwmnhie lhie millie hetho chipi aeuwm sah millie heching eruwng ongna tahlina aeong Thangnhangchuw arumpehe. Emmenieng uwnghege, “Amen, Hallilujah!” ategehe.
Engkhejege Eruwng ongtaatena erur engkhe euwngching rhierge, “Thangnhang attietho enrhieng aminehe ising elhuwng mibekheing Thangnhangchuw mimpaasaruw.”
Engkhejege mi inhimpah erur khangkhing, chiirosah ngenge, engkhejege khuw enre ngenge erurching rhierge, “hallelujah! ruwngper Aapuw Thangnhangchuw paarse.
Irotha minrhomeniege amachuw mimpaasateruw! Ajiegachiinche Zou siti riekhie aanchumna innhingse, engkhejege Thangpa lernuwching enthongcherse;
engkhejege elengjer, enthiingjeh, ennaar limon pien chuw aviena anhingte apipe; ajiegachienche ennaar limon pien chuwbe dhormo icherhe anongga.
Chonache Thangnhangching kenhingna rhierge, “Hevehie bejiire: Zou siti riekhie aanchumna aeriimte aeen mihechuw enrasie itthaga! Engkhejege amaing rhierrige, “Thangnhang atataa ttonghie hevehehiega.”

Chonaching amachuw arumnaing akhibeja paangna vatiesing. Engkhejege amaing kenhingna avirhier, “amahie tumaa! Kiebe nangtho engkhejege Jesu saarkhie ipi unehetho mine itusahga. Thangnhangchuw varumsare Ajiegachiinche Jesu saarkhie chuwbe Thangnhang laarchang ttong achipiga.”

Chona thangven emmhong kemhuwpe, engkhejege chonaching sikur ipurchuw neerge, atahlinna aeong aromhingchuwbe, Ithacha iuwmpah engkhejege atataachuwga, engkhejege amaing dhormo icherlina waajiir tuge raarje aanteuphuwga.
Amhichuw mhi ittuwngtho enghaaga, engkhejege aloselina eruwng luhu inhimpah akhumga. Atah maaniege achuwdong ing aminghuwmaa enjii besa romhing enjiiga.
Thiena aluhbesah pienchuw aserga, engkhejege aromhingchuw Thangnhang ttong atega.
Ipurle enthiingjeh amana ennaarjeh avie thangven raar mi heching sikur ipurlina onghege aanhuw ajiigehe.
Engkhejege yaatibekhechuw athehnaing anherna ingngeepah chiimsie chige mihechuw thier romhor ing serwate. Engkhejege amaing achecher Thangnhang ther iphuwr darkha chii aatiirna chuw achiinape.
Ama apienserlina engkhejege adaarlina, Eruwnghetahlina eruwng engkhejege Thangpahe tahlina Thangpa ate abejiibesa romhing aringa.
Changching thangven michier engkhechuw inielina ineer kemhuw; amaing minven aliena enjaahe vatibekhe nhingna eperpaa uwngge, “Hungruw, Thangnhang imhaar amhinnaching engkongruw.

Ningnuw ing eruwnghe ensa, raarmi elhuwnghe ensa, eperpaa aatuchehe abechii, sikurhe abechii engkhejege atahlina aeonghe abechii euwmbekhe ningvesang aphahe, suwhe; isingheje, elhuwngheje embechiechuw asahnaing engkongruw.
Chona sikurlina aeonghe, emmenie raarmihe tahlina raar atunaing satho lolhiepaam eruwnghe enraarmihetho enthonghege ouwngkonghechuw kemhuwpe.

Chona sahle, amatho enrhie amhekungna bietimna atu Thangnhang ttong aminthangchaang atuhechuw asuwrpehe; bietimnaheching sachuw amminghuwna bietimna aphabesahechuw engkhejege arotha arumhechuw aminchepehe, emmenie ennhiechuw kantuh abethu mhittuwngsungte irhing ing ajilhinpe.
Engkhejege abelhiebekhechuw sikur tahlina aeong Thangpa abetena isuwh chimsii ching athepe; engkhejege vatibekheching emmenie bechiihechuw sahege imvin vasehe.
Chona thangven michier engkhechuw adongna iuwmmaa khor chapile thierrhuw akina chige thangventena ijungttum kemhuwpe.
Amaing leh beruwr itarpuw, diabol, Sataanchuw suwrge kum chiing engkhe rotum phierge,

idong inemaa khorsuwngte ajilhinpe, engkhejege kum chiing engkhechuw atangmaataang amaing mihechuw aminchenamaa ing chapiching kamge atahlina chum anampe. Heve inhuwna amachuw apha tepie uwmniege bethinvate.

Chona inhimpaa eruwng ongnaje inhimpahje kemhuw, engkhejege ama tahlina aeonghechuw waajiir atuchena apipehe, engkhejege Jesu saarkhie, chona Thangnhang ttonglina alose atinhe, engkhejege sah, engkhejege arotha arummaahe, embecherlina, ingkina bietimna ateu maahe chipihechuw kemhuwpe; engkhejege emmeniechuw hangrhinghege Khristatho kum chiing engkhe paarhaasehe.
Abelhiehe ithieheching kum chiing engkhechuw attuhmaataang ihangrhingmaagehe. Amahie mensa ihangrhingchuwga.

Mensa ihangrhing naching arotum apha michuw arasie ittha engkhejege enthiinghechuwga; emmenie linaching amenhiena ithiena amati uwmmaa; changgechuw emmeniebe Thangnhang engkhejege Khrista khorpuwhe ensuwvatehe, Thangpatho enrhieng kum chiing engkhe paarvatehe.
Kum chiing engkhe inhuwna khor sungna aeong Sataanchuw bethinvate.
Engkhejege lolhiepaam ariikieng milliena aeong Gogle Magog ching yaati bekhechuw aminchenaing jungsuwvatehe, emmeniechuw raar atunaing iwana siih khangje inhimgehe.
Lolhiepaam adongna phana sihege mi enthiinghetho, engkhejege ningsienapaa khupuw arovebekhe arokuurpehe; chona minventena mhi jungttumge, emmeniechuw kaangsehe.
Emmeniechuw imminche diabol jechuw, sahjechuw, Thangnhang ttong aminthangchaanghe ongnaje, mhi engkhejege kantuh chiiting asuwngna alhinpehe, emmeniechuw ittiim inemaa yen siim neluing minjavatehe.
Chona eruwng ongna elhuwngpaa iwaar engkhe, ama tahlina aeong Thangpachuw kemhuw; Thangpa amhekungna lolhiepaamje, minvenje tensehe, engkhejege emmenie rotum amhin teumaasehe.

Chonaching ithiehechuw isiing elhuwng inemaaing eruwng ongtaa amhekungna enier kemhuwhe; chona leriichuw abejarpe, engkhejege lerii lintaang engkhe, irhingna leriije abejarpe. Leriihna enjii atahin atu inhuw ijieng abejiiching waajeerchuw atupe.
Rimchiiching asungna ithie hechuw apipe, chona ithiele ithie lepaana ithiehejechuw apipehe, engkhejege emmenie bekhechuw atah atahching atu nong inhuw ijie ing waajiir atupe.
Ithiele ithie lepaajechuw mhisuwngte athaapehe, amachuwbe, mhi ittuwng chiiting, amachuw amenhiena ithiechuwga.
Engkhejege irhing leriina enjiimaa mi uwmniebe amaje mhi sungnaching athaga.
Ama enhuwnaching ithar thangven amana ithar lolhiepaam kemhuwpe; ajiegachienche ayenna thangvenle ayenna lolhiepaam aalenpe, rimchie avonhie uwmmaase.
Thangventena enthiing khupuw, ithar Jerusalemching, apuwsar rotum enthong nepenuw aami itharkhangkhing bethongge, thangventena ijungttum kemhuwpe.
Ama eruwng ongtaatena engkaangpaa erur engkhe hevehie arhier kethiepe,
“Ebeer, Thangnhang Khaampah eenchuw mihetho enrhienehe.
amaing emmenietho onghaanehe,
emmenieing Thangpa mee eensuwvatehe,
Thangnhang chuw emmenietho enrhieheniege emmenie Thangnhang ensuwvate.
Engkhejege Thangnhang atahching immhiriichiebekhe nhuwrpivatehe,
ithieje avonhie uwmmaanie,
belung ikii ija, ittaa,
ina iki avonhie uwmmaanie;
mensana peebekheje aalenpe.”
Chaleching eruwng ongtaana aeongching arhier, “ebeer kieng aeuwmbekhe ithar ing ketupe,” engkhejege amaing arhier, “hevehie bejii, ajiegachienche heve ttonghehie ithacha arhu engkhejege atataaga.”
Chona amaing kenhingna arhier, “Kebetthupe,” kiehie Alpha engkejege Omegachuwging, Abettiim attuhnachuwging. Irhing chiitaangtena achii aehaar amaching kenhingna aminchaaing phasavatehe.
Raar aachepaching amahie phasavate, engkhejege kieng ama Thangnhang eensuwningge emmenieng kesapahe en suwvatehe.

Changgechuw enttiipang enttiihe, athacha iuwmmaahe, ibourhe, mithehe, naamaa atuhe, mipang aaserhe, rotha aarumhe, engkhejege mee amemunahe bekhe ongna amhin chuwbe mhile kantuhtho enrhieng ittuwng chiiting asungnachingvang atega; hevehie amenhiena ithiechuwga.”

Chona attuhna rhiere sarii isiikang kamseng sariina achi thangven michier sariemeh engkaarna engkheing kepaangna thengge hanghing arhier, “enthongre, Zou siti rotum alumhi, lernuw chuw minthiegechie.”
Engkhejege amaing kiechuw engkaangpaa boungteching chipiching irhiege, thangventena Thangnhangtena Jerusalem ithar ijungttumchuw imminthiepe.
Thangnhang athang alaartho enrhieng lengge, amin elupaa lhung ilengjer nge ngeching lengge, jaspertho enghaa mani lhungtho enghaaga.

Ata elhuwngpaa, engkaangpaa ropar, sungkoung suummalhie ennhie, engkhejege sungkoungnaching thangven michier suummalhie ennhiechuw ongge, Israelsitihe sungkhor romhing summalhie ennhiechuw atalina enjii kemhuwpe;
Tehangte sungkoung ouwngthum, Anhate sungkoung ouwngthum, Atite sungkoung ouwngthum, engkhejege Tetaate sungkoung ouwngthum aeuwm.
Ama khupuwna ropar abetthiimna eenmhin suummalhie ennhie, emmenie tahlina Zou siti engkhejege ttongjiirpahe romhing summalhie ennhie iuwm.
Khupuw sungkoung roparchuw amintinaing kietho ettongha ama miching sanaing atu amintina romhor achi.
Ama khupuwchuwbe ariekiing millie euwmga, ama adung avam isie enghaajega; engkhejege amaing khupuwchuw mail chiing engkhe charongaching amintipe; ama adung avam, engkaangchuw enghaajega.
Amaing ama roparchuw thangven michierching tepang ing amintinachuw chige roparjechuw amintiche khutuh roza suummalhie millie abesuwpe.
Ama roparchuw jasper lhung ing atuga, khupuwchuwbe enthiing menseng nge ngeh ichie sanaing atuga.
Khupuw ropar eenmhinchuw amin ilupaa lhungheching abethonggehe, amensa eenmhinchuw jasper lhung, amenhienachuw saphire lhung ing, aminthumnachuw kalkedoning, avomillienachuw emerald lhung ing,

arongachuw onyx, avorunachuw carnelian, avosariinachuw chrysolite, avoeeriinachuw beryling, aeekuwnachuw topazing, avosuumnachuw krisophrasas, asuummalhie engkhechuw jacinth, engkhejege asuummalhie ennhienachuw amethystching atugehe.
Engkhejege atebuw eengkhaar bekhechuw amin elupaa peals lhung, ama khupuw sorohhechuw enthiing sana, inlimjejer mengseng khangchieng atuga.
Ama asungnaching Thangnhang enthiing een mhumaaing, ajiegachienche atuchecher Aapuw Thangnhangching engkhejege Zou sitiching ama enthiing een ensuwgehe.
Khupuwchuw alengna inieje thaje ikana uwmmaa, ajiegachienche Thangnhang thanglaarching amachuw aminlengga, ama thoumhichuwbe Zou sitichuwga.
Yaatibekheching ama elengnaching bevewatehe; lolhiepaam eruwngheching enthang enlaarchuw amasungna avireenhe.
Ama ropar eengkhaarbekhechuw siimna kammaanie, ajiegachienche amana yen uwmmaadehnie;
emmenieing ama asungnaching yaatihe engthang enlaar, enjasuwnahechuw hinrinvatehe.
Zousitita irhing leriina abejiibesa inthin chumaaniege, ama asungna ajiekhangchie enthiingmaa, entersuw nong, mi minchena amamaa atuhe migejenie valhuwmaadehnie.
Chonache Thangnhangtho Zousiti ongnatena eluwng, idekhangkhing eleng, irhing iwachii engkhe amaing imminthiepe.
Ama iwa apaang enkhe entongteje engkheteje aanra euwm makhal suummalhie ennhie enra irhing thingbour iuwm, ama aanrachuw athasiir enraga; ama thingbour anhaching yaatibekhe aena-iki amindamna chuwga.
Seraap apha khangchie ajiedong avonhie uwmmaanie, engkhejege ama khupuw asungna Thangnhang engkhejege Zou sitita eruwng ongna uwmvate, Thangpa amineheching Thangpachuw rumsavatehe.
Emmenieng Thangpa amhesuwje mhuwvatehe, Thangpa romhing embecherna taarvatehe.

Yen avonhie uwmmaanie; emmenieng thoumhi engkhejege inie eleng ikana uwmmaanie, ajiegachienche Aapuw Thangnhangching emmeniechuw minwaarpivate; engkhejege emmenieng ittiim inemaa eruwng ing paarvatehe.

Engkhejege amaing kenhingna arhier, “heve ttonghehie aethacha arhuga engkhejege atataachuwga; ajiegachienche Thangnhang ttongjiirpahe enchipi Aapuw Thangnhangching atataa enrang suwhvang ichie Thangpa aminehe nhingna aminthienaing thangven michier ajibethinpe.
“Ebeer, kie enrang juwngvanggete! Heve leriina inthin ttong aminjieheching enrepaa tthavatehe.”
Hevebekhe rongege amhuwchuw Johon kieging. Hevehehie thiesaingge kemhuwleching, imminthiepee thangven michier nhingna kikhiruwkhuw phin ingge rumning keteleching,

changgechuw kenhingna arhier, “nang ing hevehie tumaare! Kieje naalhang mineging, nangtho engkhejege naalhang laarchangpahetho, engkhejege heve lerii aminjie bekhetho enghaagemie. Thangnhangchuw rumsare!”
Engkhejege amaing kenhingna arhier, “lerii hevena aminthang ttongbekhehie chum nammare, ajiegachienche aphachuw innhingse.

Itthamaa atuheching itthamaachuw tuhesing heongheresie, engkhejege ebour atuheching ebour ing emjeheresie; ittha atuheching ittha nong atuching hetujeheresie, engkhejege enthiingheching enthiing ing heongresie.”
“Ebeerruw, kie enrang juwngvanggete; kieing kithurchuw mibekhena atah atah ing atu inhuw ijieing apina kieing kerinse,
kiebe Alpha engkhejege Omega, Abettiimna engkhejege Attuhna, mensa engkhejege attunachuwging.
Emmenieng irhing thingbour paangna etheng achenaing, ama khupuw avalhuwna, sungkoung sungkoungna alhuwnaing, empien ouwngsuwr arosuhheching enrepah aetthagehe.
Utihe, mi aaserbekhehe, naamaa ituhe, mithehe, rotha arumhe amana mi amimmunahe tuning atehe aadie atuhe, mee bekhe taangna aeonggehe.

“Jesu kieng ruwhchanghe rotum ing ninnhingna heve ttonghehie saarkhie apinaing kieing thangven michier kejincherga. Kiebe David arojung engkhejege siti baasien engkhejege yiengna eleng aarsiichuwging.”
Chipile lernuwching “huwngre” atena.
Hevehie arongebekheching “huwngruw” teheresie.
Engkhejege achii ihaar miching thengsaresie,
thengning ateheching irhingna chiichuw aminchaaing eensaheresie.
Leriih hevena inthin aathiebekhelina kieng saarkhie kepise; achuw engkheching heve ttonghehie avithin uwmniebe, Thangnhang ing atahlina lerii heve sungna abejiibesa romhor enachuw vithinvate;
Engkhejege achuw engkheching heve lerii sungtena laarchang ttonghie liejohniege, heve lerii sungnahing aminthi irhingna thingbourle enthiing khupuw tena arotumchuw Thangnhang ing liepeejohvate.
Hevebekhelina saarkii api miching hanghing arhierse, “Atatah enrang juwngvanggete.”
Amen, ijuwngpire, Thangpa Jesu.
Thangpa Jesu lungsiiching enthiing mihenhingna enrhiephuwresie. Amen!
